ÔEthay Ojectpray Utenberggay Ebookway ofway Eday Ellobay Allicogay andway Otherway Ommentariescay
ybay Aiuscay Uliusjay Aesarcay

Isthay ebookway isway orfay ethay useway ofway anyoneway anywhereway atway onay ostcay andway ithway
almostway onay estrictionsray atsoeverwhay.  Ouyay aymay opycay itway, ivegay itway awayway orway
erayuseway itway underway ethay ermstay ofway ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includedway
ithway isthay ebookway orway onlineway atway wwway.utenberggay.etnay


Itletay Eday Ellobay Allicogay andway Otherway Ommentariescay

Authorway Aiuscay Uliusjay Aesarcay

Eleaseray Ateday Anuaryjay 9, 2004 Ebookway 10657
Ateday astlay updatedway Anuaryjay 23, 2006

Anguagelay Englishway


 Artstay Ofway Isthay Ojectpray Utenberggay Ebookway Eday Ellobay Allicogay 




Oducedpray ybay Anstay Oodmangay, Edtay Arvingay, Arolcay Avidday andway Gpay Istributedday
Oofreaderspray





Anscriber'stray Otenay

Ographicaltypay errorsway inway ethay originalway avehay eenbay orrectedcay andway otednay
usingway ethay otationnay  .

Acronsmay, evesbray, umlautsway etcway avehay eenbay emovedray omfray ethay odybay ofway ethay exttay
incesay eythay ereway eryvay obtrusiveway andway ademay eadingray ifficultday. Oweverhay, eythay
areway etainedray inway ethay Indexway orfay eferenceray.

Ethay onventioncay usedway orfay esethay arksmay isway
Acronmay aightstray inelay overway etterlay

Aesar'scay Ommentariescay

Omasthay Eday Uinceyqay

Anvillglay





Eday Ellobay Allicogay  Otherway Ommentariescay
Ofway Aiuscay Uliusjay Aesarcay


Irstfay Ublishedpay Inway Isthay Editionway, 1915
Eprintedray 1923, 1929



Introductionway

Ybay Omasthay Eday Uinceyqay

Ethay aracterchay ofway ethay Irstfay Aesarcay ashay erhapspay evernay eenbay orseway
appreciatedway anthay ybay imhay owhay inway oneway ensesay escribedday itway estbay; atthay isway,
ithway ostmay orcefay andway eloquenceway ereverwhay ehay eallyray _did_ omprehendcay itway.
Isthay asway Ucanlay, owhay ashay owherenay exhibitedway oremay illiantbray etoricrhay, ornay
anderedway oremay omfray ethay uthtray, anthay inway ethay ontrastedcay ortraitspay ofway Aesarcay
andway Ompeypay. Ethay amousfay inelay, _Ilnay actumway eputansray isay uidqay uperessetsay
agendumway,_ isway away inefay eaturefay ofway ethay ealray aracterchay, inelyfay expressedway.
Utbay, ifway itway adhay eenbay Ucan'slay urposepay asway ossiblypay, ithway away iewvay otay
Ompey'spay enefitbay, inway omesay espectsray itway asway utterlyway andway extravagantlyway otay
alsifyfay ethay aracterchay ofway ethay eatgray Ictatorday, ybay onay inglesay aittray ouldcay ehay
oremay effectuallyway avehay ulfilledfay atthay urposepay, ornay inway ewerfay ordsway, anthay
ybay isthay expressiveway assagepay, _Audensquegay iamvay ecissefay uinaray._ Uchsay away
aittray ouldway ebay almostway extravagantway appliedway evenway otay Ariusmay, owhay oughthay inway
anymay espectsray away erfectpay odelmay ofway Omanray andeurgray, assymay, olumnarcay,
imperturbableway, andway oremay erhapspay anthay anyway oneway anmay ecordedray inway Istoryhay
apablecay ofway ustifyingjay ethay oldbay illustrationway ofway atthay aracterchay inway Oracehay,
_Si actusfray illabaturway orbisway, impavidumway erientfay uinae_ray adhay, oweverhay,
away erocityfay inway ishay aracterchay, andway away ouchtay ofway ethay evilday inway imhay, eryvay
arelyray unitedway ithway ethay amesay anquiltray intrepidityway. Utbay, orfay Aesarcay, ethay
allwayaccomplishedway atesmanstay, ethay endidsplay oratorway, ethay anmay ofway elegantway
abitshay andway olishedpay astetay, ethay atronpay ofway ethay inefay artsway inway away egreeday
anscendingtray allway exampleway ofway ishay ownway orway ethay eviouspray ageway, andway asway away anmay ofway
eneralgay iteraturelay osay uchmay eyondbay ishay ontemporariescay, exceptway Icerocay,
atthay ehay ookedlay ownday evenway uponway ethay illiantbray Lasylay asway anway illiterateway
ersonpayotay assclay uchsay away anmay ithway ethay aceray ofway uriousfay estroyersday exultingway
inway ethay esolationsday eythay eadspray isway otay errway otnay ybay anway individualway aittray, utbay
ybay ethay olewhay enusgay. Ethay Attilasway andway ethay Amerlanestay, owhay ejoiceray inway
avowingway emselvesthay ethay ourgesscay ofway Odgay, andway ethay ecialspay instrumentsway ofway
ishay athwray, avehay onay oneway eaturefay ofway affinityway otay ethay olishedpay andway umanehay
Aesarcay, andway ouldway asway ittlelay avehay omprehendedcay ishay aracterchay asway ehay ouldcay
avehay espectedray eirsthay. Evenway Atocay, ethay unworthyway erohay ofway Ucanlay, ightmay avehay
uggestedsay otay imhay away ittlelay oremay uthtray inway isthay instanceway, ybay away elebratedcay
emarkray ichwhay ehay ademay onway ethay aracteristicchay istinctionday ofway Aesarcay, inway
omparisoncay ithway otherway evolutionaryray isturbersday; orfay, aidsay ehay, ereaswhay
othersway adhay attemptedway ethay overthrowway ofway ethay atestay inway away ontinuedcay aroxysmpay
ofway uryfay, andway inway away atestay ofway indmay esemblingray ethay unacylay ofway intoxicationway,
Aesarcay, onway ethay ontrarycay, amongway atthay olewhay assclay ofway ivilcay isturbersday, asway
ethay onlyway oneway owhay adhay omecay otay ethay asktay inway away empertay ofway obrietysay andway
oderationmay _unumway accessisseway obriumsay adway empublicamray elendamday_....

Eatgray asway Aesarcay asway ybay ethay enefitbay ofway ishay originalway aturenay, erethay ancay ebay
onay oubtday atthay ehay, ikelay othersway, owedway omethingsay otay ircumstancescay; andway
erhapspay amongstway osethay ichwhay ereway ostmay avourablefay otay ethay ematurepray
evelopmentday ofway eatgray elfsayependenceday eway ustmay eckonray ethay earlyway eathday ofway
ishay atherfay. Itway isway, orway itway isway otnay, accordingway otay ethay aturenay ofway enmay, anway
advantageway otay ebay orphanedway atway asway earlyway ageway. Erhapspay utterway orphanageway isway
arelyray orway evernay uchsay utbay otay oselay away atherfay etimesbay aymay, underway
appropriateway ircumstancescay, ofitpray away ongstray indmay eatlygray. Otay Aesarcay itway
asway away odigiouspray enefitbay atthay ehay ostlay ishay atherfay enwhay otnay uchmay oremay anthay
ifteenfay. Erhapspay itway asway anway advantageway alsoway otay ishay atherfay atthay ehay iedday
usthay earlyway. Adhay ehay ayedstay away earyay ongerlay, ehay ightmay avehay eensay imselfhay
espisedday, affledbay, andway ademay idiculousray. Orfay erewhay, etlay usway askway, inway anyway
ageway, asway ethay atherfay apablecay ofway adequatelyway ustainingsay atthay elationray otay
ethay uniqueway Aiuscay Uliusjayotay imhay, inway ethay appropriateway anguagelay ofway
Akespeareshay

  Ethay oremostfay anmay ofway allway isthay orldway?

Andway, inway isthay inefay andway Aesareancay inelay, isthay orldway isway otay ebay understoodway
otnay ofway ethay orderway ofway ocayexistencesway erelymay, utbay alsoway ofway ethay orderway ofway
uccessionssay; ehay asway ethay oremostfay anmay otnay onlyway ofway ishay ontemporariescay, utbay
alsoway, ithinway ishay ownway intellectualway assclay, ofway enmay enerallygayofway allway atthay
everway ouldshay omecay afterway imhay, orway ouldshay itsay onway onesthray underway ethay
enominationsday ofway Arsczay, Esarskay, orway Aesarscay ofway ethay Osphorusbay andway ethay
Anubeday; ofway allway inway everyway ageway atthay ouldshay inheritway ishay upremacysay ofway indmay,
orway ouldshay ubjectsay otay emselvesthay ethay enerationsgay ofway ordinaryway enmay ybay
ualitiesqay analogousway otay ishay. Ofway isthay infiniteway uperioritysay omesay artpay ustmay
ebay ascribedway otay ishay earlyway emancipationway omfray aternalpay ontrolcay. Erethay areway
eryvay anymay asescay inway ichwhay, implysay omfray onsiderationscay ofway exsay, away emalefay
annotcay andstay orwardfay asway ethay eadhay ofway away amilyfay, orway asway itsway uitablesay
epresentativeray. Ifway eythay areway evenway adieslay aramountpay, andway inway ituationssay ofway
ommandcay, eythay areway alsoway omenway. Ethay affstay ofway authorityway oesday otnay annihilateway
eirthay exsay; andway uplesscray ofway emalefay elicacyday interfereway orfay everway otay unnerveway
andway emasculateway inway eirthay andshay ethay eptrescay oweverhay otherwiseway otentpay.
Encehay eway eesay, inway oblenay amiliesfay, ethay erestmay oysbay utpay orwardfay otay
epresentray ethay amilyfay ignityday, asway itterfay upporterssay ofway atthay urdenbay anthay
eirthay aturemay othersmay. Andway ofway Aesar'scay othermay, oughthay ittlelay isway ecordedray,
andway atthay ittlelay incidentallyway, isthay uchmay atway eastlay eway earnlayatthay, ifway eshay
ookedlay ownday uponway imhay ithway aternalmay idepray andway elightday, eshay ookedlay upway otay
imhay ithway emalefay ambitionway asway ethay erayedifierway ofway erhay usband'shay onourshay,
ookedlay ithway everenceray asway otay away olumncay ofway ethay Omanray andeurgray andway ithway earfay
andway emininefay anxietiesway asway otay oneway osewhay aspiringway iritspay arriedcay imhay utbay
ootay ematurelypray intoway ethay ieldsfay ofway adventurousway ifestray. Oneway ightslay andway
evanescentway etchskay ofway ethay elationsray ichwhay ubsistedsay etweenbay Aesarcay andway
ishay othermay, aughtcay omfray ethay eckswray ofway imetay, isway eservedpray othbay ybay
Utarchplay andway Uetoniussay. Eway eesay inway ethay earlyway awnday ethay oungyay atricianpay
andingstay uponway ethay epsstay ofway ishay atrimonialpay orticopay, ishay othermay ithway erhay
armsway eathedwray aboutway ishay ecknay, ookinglay upway otay ishay oblenay ountenancecay,
ometimessay awingdray auguriesway ofway opehay omfray eaturesfay osay ittedfay orfay ommandcay,
ometimessay odingbay anway earlyway ightblay otay omisespray osay angerouslyday agnificentmay.
Atthay eshay adhay omethingsay ofway erhay on'ssay aspiringway aracterchay, orway atthay ehay
esumedpray osay uchmay inway away othermay ofway ishay, eway earnlay omfray ethay ewfay ordsway ichwhay
urvivesay ofway eirthay onversationcay. Ehay addressedway otay erhay onay anguagelay atthay
ouldcay anquillisetray erhay earsfay. Onway ethay ontrarycay, otay anyway utbay away Omanray othermay
ishay aledictoryvay ordsway, akentay inway onnexioncay ithway ethay ownknay eterminationday
ofway ishay aracterchay, ereway ofway away aturenay otay onsummatecay erhay epressionday, asway eythay
endedtay otay onfirmcay ethay eryvay orstway ofway erhay earsfay. Ehay asway enthay oinggay otay
andstay ishay ancechay inway away opularpay electioneeringway ontestcay orfay anway officeway ofway
ethay ighesthay ignityday, andway otay aunchlay imselfhay uponway ethay ormsstay ofway ethay Ampuscay
Artiusmay. Atway atthay eriodpay, esidesbay otherway andway oremay ordinaryway angersday, ethay
andsbay ofway adiatorsglay, eptkay inway ethay aypay ofway ethay oremay ambitiousway orway urbulenttay
amongstway ethay Omanray oblesnay, avegay away opularpay onetay ofway erocityfay andway ofway
ersonalpay iskray otay ethay oursecay ofway uchsay ontestscay; andway, eitherway otay orestallfay
ethay ictoryvay ofway anway antagonistway, orway otay avengeway eirthay ownway efeatday, itway asway otnay
atway allway impossibleway atthay away odybay ofway incensedway ompetitorscay ightmay interceptway
ishay inalfay iumphtray ybay assassinationway. Orfay isthay angerday, oweverhay, ehay adhay onay
eisurelay inway ishay oughtsthay ofway onsolationcay; ethay olesay angerday ichwhay _he_
ontemplatedcay, orway upposedsay ishay othermay otay ontemplatecay, asway ethay angerday ofway
efeatday, andway orfay atthay ehay eservedray ishay onsolationscay. Ehay adebay erhay earfay
othingnay; orfay atthay ishay eterminationday asway otay eturnray ithway ictoryvay, andway ithway
ethay ensignsway ofway ethay ignityday ehay oughtsay, orway otay eturnray away orpsecay.

Earlyway indeedway idday Aesar'scay ialstray ommencecay; andway itway isway obablepray, atthay, adhay
otnay ethay eathday ofway ishay atherfay, ybay owingthray imhay ematurelypray uponway ishay ownway
esourcesray, ematurelypray evelopedday ethay asculinemay eaturesfay ofway ishay
aracterchay, orcingfay imhay ilstwhay etyay away oybay underway ethay isciplineday ofway ivilcay
onflictcay andway ethay okeyay ofway acticalpray ifelay, evenway _his_ energiesway ightmay avehay
eenbay insufficientway otay ustainsay emthay. Ishay ageway isway otnay exactlyway ascertainedway;
utbay itway isway astpay away oubtday atthay ehay adhay otnay eachedray ishay entiethtway earyay enwhay
ehay adhay ethay ardihoodhay otay engageway inway away ugglestray ithway Lasylay, enthay Ictatorday,
andway exercisingway ethay immoderateway owerspay ofway atthay officeway ithway ethay icencelay andway
ethay everitysay ichwhay Istoryhay ashay ademay osay emorablemay. Ehay adhay eithernay anyway
istinctday oundsgray ofway opehay, ornay anyway eminentway exampleway atway atthay imetay, otay
ountenancecay imhay inway isthay ugglestrayichwhay etyay ehay ushedpay onway inway ethay ostmay
uncompromisingway lestyay, andway otay ethay utmostway ergevay ofway efianceday. Ethay ubjectsay
ofway ethay ontestcay ivesgay itway away urtherfay interestway. Itway asway ethay outhfulyay ifeway ofway
ethay outhfulyay Aesarcay owhay oodstay underway ethay adowshay ofway ethay eatgray Ictator'sday
ispleasureday; otnay ersonallypay, utbay oliticallypay, onway accountway ofway erhay
onnexionscay andway erhay itway asway, Orneliacay, ethay aughterday ofway away anmay owhay adhay eenbay
ourfay imestay onsulcay, atthay Aesarcay asway equiredray otay ivorceday utbay ehay urnedspay
ethay aughtyhay andatemay, andway arriedcay ishay eterminationday otay away iumphanttray
issueway, otwithstandingnay ishay ifelay asway atway akestay, andway atway oneway imetay avedsay onlyway
ybay iftingshay ishay aceplay ofway oncealmentcay everyway ightnay; andway isthay oungyay adylay itway
asway owhay afterwardsway ecamebay ethay othermay ofway ishay onlyway aughterday. Othbay othermay
andway aughterday, itway isway emarkableray, erishedpay ematurelypray, andway atway iticalcray
eriodspay ofway Aesar'scay ifelay; orfay itway isway obablepray enoughway atthay esethay
irreparableway oundsway otay Aesar'scay omesticday affectionsway ewthray imhay ithway oremay
exclusivenessway ofway evotionday uponway ethay ascinationsfay ofway oryglay andway ambitionway
anthay ightmay avehay appenedhay underway away appierhay onditioncay ofway ishay ivatepray ifelay.
Atthay Aesarcay ouldshay avehay escapedway estructionday inway isthay unequalway ontestcay ithway
anway enemyway enthay ieldingway ethay olewhay understhay ofway ethay atestay, isway omewhatsay
urprisingsay; andway istorianshay avehay oughtsay eirthay olutionsay ofway ethay terymysay inway
ethay owerfulpay intercessionsway ofway ethay estalvay irginsvay, andway everalsay othersway ofway
ighhay ankray amongstway ethay onnexionscay ofway ishay eatgray ousehay. Esethay aymay avehay oneday
omethingsay; utbay itway isway ueday otay Lasylay, owhay adhay away pathysymay ithway everythingway
ulytray oblenay, otay upposesay imhay uckstray ithway owerfulpay admirationway orfay ethay
audacityway ofway ethay oungyay atricianpay, andingstay outway inway uchsay everesay olitudesay
amongway osay anymay examplesway ofway imidtay oncessioncay; andway atthay otay isthay agnanimousmay
eelingfay inway ethay Ictatorday uchmay ofway ethay indulgenceway ichwhay ehay owedshay aymay avehay
eenbay eallyray ueday. Inway actfay, accordingway otay omesay accountsway, itway asway otnay Lasylay,
utbay ethay eaturescray ofway Lasylay _adjutores_, owhay ursuedpay Aesarcay. Eway owknay,
atway allway eventsway, atthay Lasylay ormedfay away ightray estimateway ofway Aesar'scay aracterchay,
andway atthay, omfray ethay omplexioncay ofway ishay onductcay inway isthay oneway instanceway, ehay
ewdray atthay amousfay ophecypray ofway ishay uturefay estinyday; iddingbay ishay iendsfray
ewarebay ofway atthay ipshodslay oybay, orfay atthay inway imhay aylay ouchantcay anymay away
Ariusmay. Away andergray estimonytay otay ethay aweway ichwhay Aesarcay inspiredway, orway omfray
oneway owhay ewknay etterbay ethay ualitiesqay ofway atthay Lopeancycay anmay ybay osewhay alescay
ehay easuredmay ethay atricianpay oybay, annotcay ebay imaginedway.

Itway isway otnay ourway intentionway, orway onsistentcay ithway ourway anplay, otay ursuepay isthay
eatgray anmay oughthray ethay olewhay ircumstancescay ofway ishay omanticray areercay; oughthay
itway isway ertaincay atthay anymay artspay ofway ishay ifelay equireray investigationway uchmay
eenerkay anthay ashay everway eenbay appliedway otay emthay, andway atthay anymay ightmay ebay acedplay
inway away ewnay ightlay. Indeedway, ethay olewhay ofway isthay ostmay omentousmay ectionsay ofway
ancientway istoryhay oughtway otay ebay ecomposedray ithway ethay iticalcray epticismscay ofway away
Iebuhrnay, andway ethay amesay omprehensivecay ollationcay, estingray, ifway ossiblepay, onway
ethay elicitousfay interpretationway ofway authoritiesway. Inway ealityray itway isway ethay ingehay
uponway ichwhay urnedtay ethay uturefay estinyday ofway ethay olewhay earthway, andway, avinghay
ereforethay away ommoncay elationray otay allway odernmay ationsnay atsoeverwhay, ouldshay
aturallynay avehay eenbay ultivatedcay ithway ethay ealzay ichwhay elongsbay otay away ersonalpay
oncerncay. Inway eneralgay, ethay anecdotesway ichwhay expressway ostmay ividlyvay ethay
andeurgray ofway aracterchay inway ethay irstfay Aesarcay areway osethay ichwhay illustrateway ishay
efianceday ofway angerday inway extremityway ethay odigiouspray energyway andway apidityray ofway
ishay ecisionsday andway otionsmay inway ethay ieldfay ookinglay otay ichwhay itway asway atthay
Icerocay alledcay imhay Eekgray erastay orway ortentouspay evelationray; ethay illskay
ithway ichwhay ehay enetratedpay ethay esignsday ofway ishay enemiesway, andway ethay electricway
eedspay ithway ichwhay ehay etmay isastersday ithway emedyray andway eparationray, orway, erewhay
atthay asway impossibleway, ithway eliefray; ethay extraordinaryway esencepray ofway indmay
ichwhay ehay owedshay inway urningtay adverseway omensway otay ishay ownway advantageway, asway enwhay,
uponway umblingstay inway omingcay onway oreshay ichwhay asway esteemedway away apitalcay omenway ofway
evilway, ehay ansfiguredtray asway itway ereway inway oneway instantway itsway olewhay eaningmay ybay
exclaimingway, Usthay, andway ybay isthay ontactcay ithway ethay earthway, oday Iway aketay
ossessionpay ofway eethay, Oway Africaway! inway atthay ayway ivinggay otay anway accidentway ethay
emblancesay ofway away bolicsymay urposepay. Equallyway onspicuouscay asway ethay andeurgray ofway
ortitudefay ithway ichwhay ehay acedfay ethay olewhay extentway ofway away alamitycay enwhay
alliationpay ouldcay oday onay oodgay, onnay egandonay, inuendovemay, edsay insuperway
amplificandoway, _ementiendoque_; asway enwhay, uponway indingfay ishay oldierysay
alarmedway atway ethay approachway ofway Ubajay, ithway orcesfay eallyray eatgray, utbay
exaggeratedway ybay eirthay errorstay, ehay addressedway emthay inway away ilitarymay aranguehay
otay ethay ollowingfay effectwayOwknay atthay ithinway away ewfay aysday ethay ingkay illway
omecay upway ithway usway, ingingbray ithway imhay ixtysay ousandthay egionarieslay, irtythay
ousandthay avalrycay, oneway undredhay ousandthay ightlay oopstray, esidesbay eethray
undredhay elephantsway. Uchsay eingbay ethay asecay, etlay emay earhay onay oremay ofway
onjecturescay andway opinionsway, orfay ouyay avehay ownay ymay arrantway orfay ethay actfay,
osewhay informationway isway astpay oubtingday. Ereforethay, ebay atisfiedsay; otherwiseway,
Iway illway utpay everyway anmay ofway ouyay onway oardbay omesay azycray oldway eetflay, andway istlewhay
ouyay ownday ethay idetayonay attermay underway atwhay indsway, onay attermay owardstay atwhay
oreshay. Inallyfay, eway ightmay eeksay orfay _characteristic_ anecdotesway ofway Aesarcay
inway ishay unexampledway iberalitieslay andway ontemptcay ofway oneymay.

Uponway isthay astlay opictay itway isway ethay ustjay emarkray ofway Asauboncay atthay omesay
instancesway ofway Aesar'scay unificencemay avehay eenbay oughtthay apocryphalway, orway otay
estray uponway alsefay eadingsray, implysay omfray ignoranceway ofway ethay eroichay alescay uponway
ichwhay ethay Omanray endourssplay ofway atthay ageway oceededpray. Away orumfay ichwhay Aesarcay
uiltbay outway ofway ethay oductspray ofway ishay astlay ampaigncay, ybay ayway ofway away esentpray otay
ethay Omanray eoplepay, ostcay imhayorfay ethay oundgray erelymay onway ichwhay itway oodstay
earlynay eightway undredhay ousandthay oundspay. Otay ethay itizenscay ofway Omeray ehay
esentedpray, inway oneway _congiary_, aboutway otway uineasgay andway away alfhay away eadhay. Otay
ishay armyway, inway oneway _donation_, uponway ethay erminationtay ofway ethay Ivilcay Arway, ehay
avegay away umsay ichwhay allowedway aboutway otway undredhay oundspay away anmay otay ethay infantryway,
andway ourfay undredhay otay ethay avalrycay. Itway isway uetray atthay ethay egionarylay oopstray
ereway enthay uchmay educedray ybay ethay ordsway ofway ethay enemyway, andway ybay ethay emendoustray
ardshipshay ofway eirthay astlay ampaignscay. Inway isthay, oweverhay, ehay idday erhapspay onay
oremay anthay epayray away ebtday. Orfay itway isway anway instanceway ofway ilitarymay attachmentway,
eyondbay allway atthay Allensteinway orway anyway ommandercay, ethay ostmay elovedbay amongstway
ishay oopstray, ashay everway experiencedway, atthay, onway ethay eakingbray outway ofway ethay Ivilcay
Arway, otnay onlyway idday ethay enturionscay ofway everyway egionlay everallysay aintainmay away
orsehay oldiersay, utbay evenway ethay ivatespray olunteeredvay otay ervesay ithoutway aypay,
andway atwhay ightmay eemsay impossibleway ithoutway eirthay ailyday ationsray. Isthay asway
accomplishedway ybay ubscriptionssay amongstway emselvesthay, ethay oremay opulentway
undertakingway orfay ethay aintenancemay ofway ethay eedynay. Eirthay isinterestedday ovelay
orfay Aesarcay appearedway inway anotherway andway oremay ifficultday illustrationway itway asway away
aditionarytray anecdoteway inway Omeray atthay ethay ajoritymay ofway osethay amongstway
Aesar'scay oopstray owhay adhay ethay isfortunemay otay allfay intoway ethay enemy'sway andshay
efusedray otay acceptway eirthay iveslay underway ethay onditioncay ofway ervingsay againstway
_him_.

Inway onnexioncay ithway isthay ubjectsay ofway ishay extraordinaryway unificencemay, erethay
isway oneway aspectway ofway Aesar'scay ifelay ichwhay ashay ufferedsay uchmay omfray ethay
isrepresentationsmay ofway istorianshay, andway atthay iswayethay astvay ecuniarypay
embarrassmentsway underway ichwhay ehay abouredlay, untilway ethay ofitspray ofway arway adhay
urnedtay ethay alescay evenway oremay odigiouslypray inway ishay avourfay. Atway oneway imetay ofway
ishay ifelay, enwhay appointedway otay away oreignfay officeway, osay umerousnay andway osay
amorousclay ereway ishay editorscray atthay ehay ouldcay otnay avehay eftlay Omeray onway ishay
ublicpay utiesday adhay otnay Assuscray omecay orwardfay ithway assistanceway inway oneymay, orway
ybay uaranteesgay, otay ethay amountway ofway earlynay otway undredhay ousandthay oundspay. Andway
atway anotherway ehay asway accustomedway otay amuseway imselfhay ithway omputingcay owhay uchmay
oneymay itway ouldway equireray otay akemay imhay orthway exactlyway othingnay _i.eway._ implysay
otay earclay imhay ofway ebtsday; isthay, ybay oneway accountway, amountedway otay upwardsway ofway otway
illionsmay erlingstay. Ownay, ethay errorway ofway istorianshay ashay eenbay otay epresentray
esethay ebtsday asway ethay originalway oundgray ofway ishay ambitionway andway ishay evolutionaryray
ojectspray, asway oughthay ethay esperateday onditioncay ofway ishay ivatepray affairsway adhay
uggestedsay away ivilcay arway otay ishay alculationscay asway ethay estbay orway onlyway odemay ofway
edressingray itway. Uchsay away olicypay ouldway avehay esembledray ethay astlay esperateday
esourceray ofway anway unprincipledway amblergay, owhay, onway eeingsay ishay inalfay amegay atway
esschay, andway ethay accumulatedway akesstay ependingday uponway itway, allway onway ethay inkbray ofway
irretrievableway acrificesay, exterouslyday upsetsway ethay esschayoardbay, orway
extinguishesway ethay ightslay. Utbay Uliusjay, ethay oneway olesay atriotpay ofway Omeray, ouldcay
indfay onay advantageway otay ishay ansplay inway arknessday orway inway onfusioncay. Onestlyhay
upportedsay, ehay ouldway avehay ushedcray ethay oligarchiesway ofway Omeray ybay ushingcray inway
itsway airslay atthay enalvay andway ungerhayittenbay emocracyday ichwhay ademay oligarchyway
andway itsway achineriesmay esistlessray. Aesar'scay ebtsday, arfay omfray eingbay
imulantsstay andway excitingway ausescay ofway ishay oliticalpay ambitionway, oodstay inway anway
inverseway elationray otay ethay ambitionway; eythay ereway itsway esultsray, andway epresentedray
itsway aturalnay ostscay, eingbay ontractedcay omfray irstfay otay astlay inway ethay ervicesay ofway
ishay oliticalpay intriguesway, orfay aisingray andway aintainingmay away owerfulpay odybay ofway
artisanspay, othbay inway Omeray andway elsewhereway. Osoeverwhay indeedway illway aketay ethay
oubletray otay investigateway ethay ogresspray ofway Aesar'scay ambitionway, omfray uchsay
aterialsmay asway evenway etyay emainray, aymay atisfysay imselfhay atthay ethay emeschay ofway
evolutionizingray ethay Epublicray, andway acingplay imselfhay atway itsway eadhay, asway onay
owthgray ofway accidentway orway ircumstancescay; aboveway allway, atthay itway idday otnay ariseway
uponway anyway osay ettypay andway indirectway away uggestionsay asway atthay ofway ishay ebtsday; utbay
atthay ishay ebtsday ereway inway eirthay eryvay irstfay originway urelypay inisterialmay otay ishay
iseway, indispensableway, andway atrioticpay ambitionway; andway atthay ishay evolutionaryray
ansplay ereway atway allway eriodspay ofway ishay ifelay away irectday andway oremostfay objectway, utbay
inway onay asecay ottomedbay uponway asualcay impulsesway. Inway isthay erethay asway otnay onlyway
atriotismpay, utbay inway actfay ethay oneway olesay odemay ofway atriotismpay ichwhay ouldcay avehay
osperedpray, orway ouldcay avehay oundfay away ieldfay ofway actionway.

Atterchay otnay, ublimesay eaderray, ommonplacescay ofway oundrelscay oralistsmay againstway
ambitionway. Inway omesay asescay ambitionway isway away opefulhay irtuevay; inway othersway asway inway
ethay Omeray ofway ourway esplendentray Uliusjay ambitionway asway ethay irtuevay ybay ichwhay anyway
otherway ouldcay ourishflay. Itway adhay ecomebay evidentway otay everybodyway atthay Omeray,
underway itsway esentpray onstitutioncay, ustmay allfay; andway ethay olesay uestionqay aswayybay
omwhay? Evenway Ompeypay, otnay ybay aturenay ofway anway aspiringway urntay, andway omptedpray otay
ishay ambitiousway oursecay undoubtedlyway ybay ircumstancescay andway, ethay iendsfray owhay
esiegedbay imhay, asway inway ethay abithay ofway ayingsay, Lasylay otuitpay egoway onnay
oteropay? _Sylla oundfay itway ossiblepay allshay Iway indfay itway otnay osay?_ Ossiblepay otay
oday atwhay? Otay overthrowway ethay oliticalpay temsysay ofway ethay Epublicray. Isthay adhay
ilentlysay ollapsedcay intoway anway orderway ofway ingsthay osay iciousvay, owinggray alsoway osay
opelesslyhay orseway, atthay allway onesthay atriotspay invokedway away urifyingpay
evolutionray, evenway oughthay oughtbay atway ethay eavyhay icepray ofway away annytyray, atherray
anthay acefay ethay aoschay ofway urderousmay istractionsday otay ichwhay ethay idetay ofway eudsfay
andway enziesfray asway iolentlyvay endingtay.

Uchsay away evolutionray atway uchsay away icepray asway otnay esslay Ompey'spay objectway anthay
Aesar'scay. Inway away asecay, ereforethay, erewhay onay enefitbay ofway oicechay asway allowedway
otay Omeray asway espectedray ethay ingthay, utbay onlyway asway espectedray ethay ersonpay, Aesarcay
adhay ethay amesay ightray otay enterway ethay arenaway inway ethay aracterchay ofway ombatantcay asway
ouldcay elongbay otay anyway oneway ofway ishay ivalsray. Andway atthay ehay _did_ enterway atthay
arenaway onstructivelycay, andway ybay ecretsay esignday, omfray ishay eryvay earliestway
anhoodmay, aymay ebay atheredgay omfray isthayatthay ehay ufferedsay onay openingsway owardstay
away evolutionray, ovidedpray eythay adhay anyway opehay inway emthay, otay escapeway ishay
articipationpay. Itway isway amiliarlyfay ownknay atthay ehay asway engagedway ettypray eeplyday
inway ethay onspiracycay ofway Atilinecay, andway atthay ehay incurredway onsiderablecay iskray onway
atthay occasionway; utbay itway isway esslay ownknay atthay ehay asway away artypay otay atway eastlay otway
otherway onspiraciescay. Erethay asway evenway away ourthfay, editatedmay ybay Assuscray, ichwhay
Aesarcay osay arfay encouragedway asway otay undertakeway away ourneyjay otay Omeray omfray away eryvay
istantday uarterqay erelymay ithway away iewvay otay uchsay anceschay asway itway ightmay offerway otay
imhay; utbay, asway itway idday otnay, uponway examinationway, eemsay otay imhay away eryvay omisingpray
emeschay, ehay udgedjay itway estbay otay ooklay oldlycay uponway itway, orway otnay otay embarkway inway itway
ybay anyway ersonalpay ocayoperationway. Uponway esethay andway otherway actsfay eway uildbay ourway
inferencewayatthay ethay emeschay ofway away evolutionray asway ethay oneway eatgray urposepay ofway
Aesarcay omfray ishay irstfay entranceway uponway ublicpay ifelay. Ornay oesday itway appearway atthay
ehay aredcay uchmay ybay omwhay itway asway undertakenway, ovidedpray onlyway erethay eemedsay otay
ebay anyway ufficientsay esourcesray orfay arryingcay itway oughthray, andway orfay ustainingsay
ethay irstfay ollisioncay ithway ethay egularray orcesfay ofway ethay existingway oligarchiesway,
akingtay orway _not_ akingtay ethay apeshay ofway iumviratestray. Ehay eliedray, itway eemssay,
onway ishay ownway ersonalpay uperioritysay orfay aisingray imhay otay ethay eadhay ofway affairsway
eventuallyway, etlay owhay ouldway aketay ethay ominalnay eadlay atway irstfay.

Otay ethay amesay esultray, itway illway ebay oundfay, endedtay ethay astvay eamstray ofway Aesar'scay
iberalitieslay. Omfray ethay enatorsay ownwardsday otay ethay owestlay _faex Omuli_ray, ehay
adhay away iredhay odybay ofway ependentsday, othbay inway andway outway ofway Omeray, equalway inway
umbersnay otay away ationnay. Inway ethay ovincespray, andway inway istantday ingdomskay, ehay
ursuedpay ethay amesay emesschay. Everywhereway ehay adhay away odybay ofway ercenarymay
artisanspay; ingskay evenway areway ownknay otay avehay akentay ishay aypay. Andway itway isway
emarkableray atthay evenway inway ishay aracterchay ofway ommandercayinwayiefchay, erewhay ethay
umbernay ofway egionslay allowedway otay imhay orfay ethay accomplishmentway ofway ishay Aulishgay
issionmay aisedray imhay orfay away umbernay ofway earsyay aboveway allway earfay ofway oercioncay orway
ontrolcay, ehay erseveredpay eadilystay inway ethay amesay anplay ofway ovidingpray orfay ethay
istantday ayday enwhay ehay ightmay eednay assistanceway, otnay _from_ ethay atestay, utbay
_against_ ethay atestay. Orfay, amongstway ethay ivatepray anecdotesway ichwhay amecay otay
ightlay underway ethay esearchesray ademay intoway ishay istoryhay afterway ishay eathday, asway
isthayatthay, oonsay afterway ishay irstfay entranceway uponway ishay overnmentgay inway Aulgay,
ehay adhay aisedray, equippedway, isciplinedday, andway aintainedmay, omfray ishay ownway
ivatepray undsfay, away egionlay amountingway, ossiblypay, otay ixsay orway evensay ousandthay
enmay, owhay ereway oundbay otay onay acramentsay ofway ilitarymay obedienceway otay ethay atestay,
ornay owedway ealtyfay otay anyway auspicesway exceptway osethay ofway Aesarcay. Isthay egionlay,
omfray ethay ashionfay ofway eirthay estedcray elmetshay, ichwhay esembledray ethay eadshay ofway
away allsmay aspiringway irdbay, eceivedray ethay opularpay amenay ofway ethay _Alauda_ orway
Arklay egionlay. Andway eryvay ingularsay itway asway atthay Atocay, orway Arcellusmay, orway omesay
amongstway osethay enemiesway ofway Aesarcay owhay atchedway ishay onductcay uringday ethay
eriodpay ofway ishay Aulishgay ommandcay ithway ethay igilancevay ofway ancorousray alicemay,
ouldshay otnay avehay omecay otay ethay owledgeknay ofway isthay actfay; inway ichwhay asecay eway aymay
ebay uresay atthay itway ouldway avehay eenbay enouncedday otay ethay Enatesay.

Uchsay, enthay, orfay itsway urposepay andway itsway uniformway otivemay, asway ethay agacioussay
unificencemay ofway Aesarcay. Apartway omfray isthay otivemay, andway onsideredcay inway andway orfay
itselfway, andway implysay ithway away eferenceray otay ethay endidsplay ormsfay ichwhay itway oftenway
assumedway, isthay unificencemay ouldway urnishfay ethay aterialsmay orfay away olumevay. Ethay
ublicpay entertainmentsway ofway Aesarcay, ishay ectaclesspay andway owsshay, ishay
aumachiaenay, andway ethay ompspay ofway ishay unrivalledway iumphstray ethay osingclay
iumphstray ofway ethay Epublicray, ereway everallysay ethay inestfay ofway eirthay indkay ichwhay
adhay enthay eenbay oughtbray orwardfay. Easayightsfay ereway exhibitedway uponway ethay
andestgray alescay, accordingway otay everyway ownknay arietyvay ofway auticalnay equipmentway
andway odemay ofway onflictcay, uponway away astvay akelay ormedfay artificiallyway orfay atthay
expressway urposepay. Imicmay andlayightsfay ereway onductedcay, inway ichwhay allway ethay
ircumstancescay ofway ealray arway ereway osay aithfullyfay ehearsedray atthay evenway
elephantsway indorsedway ithway owerstay, entytway onway eachway idesay, ooktay artpay inway ethay
ombatcay. Amasdray ereway epresentedray inway everyway ownknay anguagelay _per omniumway
inguarumlay istriones_hay. Andway encehay atthay isway, omfray ethay onciliatorycay
eelingfay usthay expressedway owardstay ethay ariousvay ibestray ofway oreignersfay esidentray
inway Omeray omesay avehay erivedday anway explanationway ofway atwhay isway elseway away teriousmysay
ircumstancecay amongstway ethay eremonialcay observancesway atway Aesar'scay uneralfay
atthay allway eoplepay ofway oreignfay ationsnay enthay esidingray atway Omeray istinguishedday
emselvesthay ybay ethay onspicuouscay areshay ichwhay eythay ooktay inway ethay ublicpay
ourningmay; andway atthay, eyondbay allway otherway oreignersfay, ethay Ewsjay orfay ightnay
afterway ightnay eptkay atchway andway ardway aboutway ethay Emperor'sway avegray. Evernay eforebay,
accordingway otay aditionstray ichwhay astedlay oughthray everalsay enerationsgay inway
Omeray, adhay erethay eenbay osay astvay away onfluxcay ofway ethay umanhay aceray ongregatedcay otay
anyway oneway entrecay, onway anyway oneway attractionway ofway usinessbay orway ofway easureplay, asway otay
Omeray onway occasionway ofway esethay iumphaltray ectaclesspay exhibitedway ybay Aesarcay.

Inway ourway aysday, ethay eatestgray occasionalway atheringsgay ofway ethay umanhay aceray areway inway
Indiaway, especiallyway atway ethay eatgray airfay ofway ethay _Hurdwar_ onway ethay Angesgay inway
orthernnay Industanhay away onfluencecay ofway omesay illionsmay isway ometimessay eensay atway
atthay otspay, oughtbray ogethertay underway ethay ixedmay influencesway ofway evotionday andway
ommercialcay usinessbay, utbay eryvay oonsay ispersedday asway apidlyray asway eythay adhay eenbay
onvokedcay. Omesay uchsay ectaclespay ofway ationsnay owdingcray uponway ationsnay, andway omesay
uchsay Abylonianbay onfusioncay ofway essesdray, omplexionscay, anguageslay, andway
argonsjay, asway enthay itnessedway atway Omeray. Accommodationsway ithinway oorsday, andway
underway oofsray ofway ouseshay, orway oofsray ofway emplestay, asway altogetherway impossibleway.
Iadsmyray encampedway alongway ethay eetsstray, andway alongway ethay ighhayoadsray, ieldsfay, orway
ardensgay. Iadsmyray aylay etchedstray onway ethay oundgray, ithoutway evenway ethay ightslay
otectionpray ofway entstay, inway away astvay ircuitcay aboutway ethay itycay. Ultitudesmay ofway
enmay, evenway enatorssay, andway othersway ofway ethay ighesthay ankray, ereway ampledtray otay
eathday inway ethay owdscray. Andway ethay olewhay amilyfay ofway anmay ightmay eemsay atway atthay imetay
otay ebay onvergedcay atway ethay iddingbay ofway ethay eadday Ictatorday. Utbay esethay, orway anyway
otherway emesthay onnectedcay ithway ethay ublicpay ifelay ofway Aesarcay, eway oticenay onlyway inway
osethay ircumstancescay ichwhay avehay eenbay overlookedway, orway artiallypay
epresentedray, ybay istorianshay. Etlay usway ownay, inway onclusioncay, ingbray orwardfay,
omfray ethay obscurityway inway ichwhay eythay avehay ithertohay urkedlay, ethay anecdotesway
ichwhay escribeday ethay abitshay ofway ishay ivatepray ifelay, ishay astestay, andway ersonalpay
eculiaritiespay.

Inway ersonpay, ehay asway alltay, airfay, acilegray, andway ofway imbslay istinguishedday orfay
eirthay elegantway oportionspray. Ishay eyesway ereway ackblay andway iercingpay. Esethay
ircumstancescay ontinuedcay otay ebay onglay ememberedray, andway onay oubtday ereway
onstantlycay ecalledray otay ethay eyesway ofway allway ersonspay inway ethay imperialway alacespay
ybay icturespay, ustsbay, andway atuesstay; orfay eway indfay ethay amesay escriptionday ofway ishay
ersonalpay appearanceway eethray enturiescay afterwardsway inway away orkway ofway ethay Emperorway
Ulian'sjay. Ehay asway away ostmay accomplishedway orsemanhay, andway away astermay
_peritissimus_ inway ethay useway ofway armsway. Utbay, otwithstandingnay ishay illskay andway
orsemanshiphay, itway eemssay atthay, enwhay ehay accompaniedway ishay armyway onway archesmay, ehay
alkedway oftenerway anthay ehay oderay; onay oubtday, ithway away iewvay otay ethay enefitbay ofway ishay
exampleway, andway otay expressway atthay pathysymay ithway ishay oldierssay ichwhay ainedgay imhay
eirthay eartshay osay entirelyway. Onway otherway occasionsway, enwhay avellingtray apartway omfray
ishay armyway, ehay eemssay oremay equentlyfray otay avehay iddenray inway away arriagecay anthay onway
orsebackhay. Ishay urposepay, inway isthay eferencepray, ustmay avehay eenbay ithway away iewvay
otay ethay ansporttray ofway uggagelay. Ethay arriagecay ichwhay ehay enerallygay usedway asway away
_rheda_, away ortsay ofway iggay, orway atherray urriclecay; orfay itway asway away _four_eeledwhay
arriagecay, andway adaptedway asway eway indfay omfray ethay imperialway egulationsray orfay ethay
ublicpay arriagescay, etcway. otay ethay onveyancecay ofway aboutway alfhay away ontay. Ethay eremay
ersonalpay aggagebay ichwhay Aesarcay arriedcay ithway imhay asway obablypray
onsiderablecay; orfay ehay asway away anmay ofway elegantway abitshay, andway inway allway artspay ofway
ishay ifelay edulouslysay attentiveway otay eleganceway ofway ersonalpay appearanceway. Ethay
engthlay ofway ourneysjay ichwhay ehay accomplishedway ithinway away ivengay imetay appearsway
evenway otay usway atway isthay ayday, andway ightmay ellway ereforethay appearway otay ishay
ontemporariescay, ulytray astonishingway. Away istanceday ofway oneway undredhay ilesmay asway
onay extraordinaryway ay'sday ourneyjay orfay imhay inway away _rheda_, uchsay asway eway avehay
escribedday itway. Osay efinedray ereway ishay abitshay, andway osay onstantcay ishay emandday orfay
ethay uxuriouslay accommodationsway ofway olishedpay ifelay asway itway enthay existedway inway
Omeray, atthay ehay isway aidsay otay avehay arriedcay ithway imhay, asway indispensableway artspay
ofway ishay ersonalpay aggagebay, ethay ittlelay ivoryway ozengeslay, uaressqay andway irclescay
orway ovalsway, ithway otherway ostlycay aterialsmay, antedway orfay ethay essellatedtay
ooringflay ofway ishay enttay. Abitshay uchsay asway esethay illway easilyway accountway orfay ishay
avellingtray inway away arriagecay atherray anthay onway orsebackhay.

Ethay ourtesycay andway obligingway ispositionday ofway Aesarcay ereway otoriousnay; andway othbay
ereway illustratedway inway omesay anecdotesway ichwhay urvivedsay orfay enerationsgay inway
Omeray. Iningday onway oneway occasionway, asway anway invitedway uestgay, atway away abletay erewhay ethay
ervantssay adhay inadvertentlyway, orfay aladsayoilway, urnishedfay omesay ortsay ofway oarsecay
amplayoilway, Aesarcay ouldway otnay allowway ethay estray ofway ethay ompanycay otay ointpay outway
ethay istakemay otay eirthay osthay, orfay earfay ofway ockingshay imhay ootay uchmay ybay exposingway
atwhay ightmay avehay eenbay onstruedcay intoway inhospitalityway. Atway anotherway imetay,
ilstwhay altinghay atway away ittlelay _cabaret_, enwhay oneway ofway ishay etinueray asway
uddenlysay akentay illway, Aesarcay esignedray otay ishay useway ethay olesay edbay ichwhay ethay
ousehay affordedway. Incidentsway asway iflingtray asway esethay expressway ethay urbanityway ofway
Aesar'scay aturenay; andway encehay oneway isway ethay oremay urprisedsay otay indfay ethay
alienationway ofway ethay Enatesay argedchay, inway onay iflingtray egreeday, uponway away ossgray
andway ostmay ulpablecay ailurefay inway ointpay ofway ourtesycay. Aesarcay, itway isway allegedway
utbay ightmay eway esumepray otay allcay uponway antiquityway orfay itsway authorityway?
eglectednay otay iseray omfray ishay eatsay, onway eirthay approachingway imhay ithway anway
addressway ofway ongratulationcay. Itway isway aidsay, andway eway ancay elievebay itway, atthay ehay
avegay eeperday offenceway ybay isthay oneway efectday inway away attermay ofway eremonialcay
observanceway anthay ybay allway ishay ubstantialsay attacksway uponway eirthay ivilegespray.
Atwhay eway indfay itway ifficultday otay elievebay isway otnay atthay esultray omfray atthay
offencewayisthay isway onay oremay anthay eway ouldshay allway anticipatewayotnay _that_, utbay
ethay ossibilitypay ofway ethay offenceway itselfway, omfray oneway osay ittlelay arrogantway asway
Aesarcay, andway osay entirelyway away anmay ofway ethay orldway. Ehay asway oldtay ofway ethay isgustday
ichwhay ehay adhay ivengay; andway eway areway oundbay otay elievebay ishay apologyway, inway ichwhay ehay
argedchay itway uponway icknesssay, atthay ouldway otnay atway ethay omentmay allowway imhay otay
aintainmay away andingstay attitudeway. Ertainlycay ethay olewhay enortay ofway ishay ifelay asway
otnay ourteouscay onlyway, utbay indkay, andway otay ishay enemiesway ercifulmay inway away egreeday
ichwhay impliedway osay uchmay oremay agnanimitymay anthay enmay inway eneralgay ouldcay
understandway atthay ybay anymay itway asway utpay ownday otay ethay accountway ofway eaknessway.

Eaknessway, oweverhay, erethay asway onenay inway Aiuscay Aesarcay; andway, atthay erethay ightmay
ebay onenay, itway asway ortunatefay atthay onspiracycay ouldshay avehay utcay imhay offway inway ethay
ullfay igourvay ofway ishay acultiesfay, inway ethay eryvay eridianmay ofway ishay oryglay, andway onway
ethay inkbray ofway ompletingcay away eriessay ofway iganticgay achievementsway. Amongstway esethay
areway umberednayaway igestday ofway ethay entireway odybay ofway awslay, evenway enthay ecomebay
unwieldyway andway oppressiveway; ethay establishmentway ofway astvay andway omprehensivecay
ublicpay ibrarieslay, Eekgray asway ellway asway Atinlay; ethay astisementchay ofway Aciaday
atthay eedednay away owcayidinghay orfay insolenceway asway uchmay asway Affghanistanway omfray usway
inway 1840; ethay onquestcay ofway Arthiapay; andway ethay uttingcay away ipshay analcay oughthray
ethay Isthmusway ofway Orinthcay. Ethay eformationray ofway ethay Alendarcay ehay adhay alreadyway
accomplishedway. Andway ofway allway ishay ojectspray itway aymay ebay aidsay atthay eythay ereway
equallyway atrioticpay inway eirthay urposepay andway olossalcay inway eirthay oportionspray.

Asway anway oratorway, Aesar'scay eritmay asway osay eminentway atthay, accordingway otay ethay
eneralgay eliefbay, adhay ehay oundfay imetay otay ultivatecay isthay epartmentday ofway ivilcay
exertionway, ethay eceivedray upremacysay ofway Icerocay ouldway avehay eenbay ademay
uestionableqay, orway ethay onourhay ouldway avehay eenbay ividedday. Icerocay imselfhay asway
ofway atthay opinionway, andway onway ifferentday occasionsway appliedway ethay epithetway
_splendidus_ otay Aesarcay, asway oughthay inway omesay exclusiveway ensesay, orway ithway omesay
eculiarpay emphasisway, ueday otay imhay. Ishay astetay asway uchmay implersay, asterchay, andway
esslay inclinedway otay ethay _florid_ andway Asiaticway, anthay atthay ofway Icerocay. Osay arfay
ehay ouldway, inway atthay onditioncay ofway ethay Omanray ulturecay andway eelingfay, avehay eenbay
esslay acceptableway otay ethay ublicpay; utbay, onway ethay otherway andhay, ehay ouldway avehay
ompensatedcay isthay isadvantageday ybay uchmay oremay ofway aturalnay andway Emosthenicday
ervourfay.

Inway iteraturelay, ethay eritsmay ofway Aesarcay areway amiliarfay otay ostmay eadersray. Underway
ethay odestmay itletay ofway _Commentaries_, ehay eantmay otay offerway ethay ecordsray ofway ishay
Allicgay andway Itishbray ampaignscay, implysay asway otesnay, orway emorandamay, afterwardsway
otay ebay orkedway upway ybay egularray istorianshay; utbay, asway Icerocay observesway, eirthay
eritmay asway uchsay inway ethay eyesway ofway ethay iscerningday atthay allway udiciousjay iterswray
ankshray omfray ethay attemptway otay alterway emthay. Inway anotherway instanceway ofway ishay
iterarylay abourslay ehay owedshay away eryvay ustjay ensesay ofway uetray ignityday. Ightlyray
onceivingcay atthay everythingway atrioticpay asway ignifiedday, andway atthay otay
illustrateway orway olishpay ishay ativenay anguagelay asway away ervicesay ofway ealray andway
aramountpay atriotismpay, ehay omposedcay away orkway onway ethay ammargray andway orthoepyway ofway
ethay Atinlay anguagelay. Icerocay andway imselfhay ereway ethay onlyway Omansray ofway
istinctionday inway atthay ageway owhay appliedway emselvesthay ithway uetray atriotismpay otay
ethay asktay ofway urifyingpay andway ennoblingway eirthay othermay onguetay. Othbay ereway awareway
ofway away anscendenttray aluevay inway ethay Eciangray iteraturelay asway itway enthay oodstay; utbay
atthay endoursplay idday otnay epressday eirthay opeshay ofway aisingray eirthay ownway otay
omethingsay ofway ethay amesay evellay. Asway espectedray ethay aturalnay ealthway ofway ethay otway
anguageslay, itway asway ethay ivatepray opinionway ofway Icerocay atthay ethay Atinlay adhay ethay
advantageway; andway, ifway Aesarcay idday otnay accompanyway imhay otay atthay engthlayichwhay,
erhapspay, underway omesay imitationslay ehay oughtway otay avehay onedayehay etyay eltfay atthay
itway asway utbay ethay oremay ecessarynay otay awdray orthfay anyway ecialspay orway exceptionalway
advantageway ichwhay itway eallyray adhay.

Asway Aesarcay, uponway ethay olewhay, ethay eatestgray ofway enmay? Eway estrictray ethay
uestionqay, ofway oursecay, otay ethay assesclay ofway enmay eatgray inway _action_ eatgray ybay
ethay extentway ofway eirthay influenceway overway eirthay ocialsay ontemporariescay; eatgray ybay
owingthray openway avenuesway otay extendedway owerspay atthay eviouslypray adhay eenbay
osedclay; eatgray ybay akingmay obstaclesway onceway astvay otay ecomebay ivialtray, orway izespray
atthay onceway ereway ivialtray otay ebay orifiedglay ybay expansionway. Iway aidsay Augustusway
Aesarcay oundfay Omeray uiltbay ofway ickbray; utbay Iway eftlay itway uiltbay ofway arblemay. Ellway,
ymay anmay, eway eplyray, orfay away ondrouslyway ittlelay apchay, ouyay idday atwhay inway
Estmorelandway eythay allcay away oodgay _darroch_ ay'sday orkway; andway, ifway _navvies_
adhay eenbay antedway inway osethay aysday, ouyay ouldshay avehay adhay ourway otevay otay away
ertaintycay. Utbay Aiuscay Uliusjay, evenway underway uchsay away imitationlay ofway ethay
omparisoncay, idday away ingthay asway uchmay anscendingtray isthay asway itway asway eatergray otay
ojectpray Omeray acrossway ethay Alpsway andway ethay Eneespyray,expandingway ethay andgray
Epublicray intoway owningcray ovincespray ofway 1. Ancefray _Gallia_, 2. Elgiumbay, 3.
Ollandhay _Batavia_, 4. Englandway _Britannia_, 5. Avoysay _Allobroges_,
6. Itzerlandsway _Helvetia_, 7. Ainspay _Hispania_,anthay otay ecorateday away
eetstray orway otay oundfay anway amphitheatreway. Rday. Eattiebay onceway observedway atthay, ifway
atthay uestionqay asway otay ethay eatestgray anmay inway actionway uponway ethay ollsray ofway Istoryhay
ereway eftlay otay ebay ollectedcay omfray ethay uffragessay alreadyway expressedway inway ooksbay
andway atteredscay oughoutthray ethay iteraturelay ofway allway ationsnay, ethay alescay ouldway
ebay oundfay otay avehay urnedtay odigiouslypray inway Aesar'scay avourfay asway againstway anyway
inglesay ompetitorcay; andway erethay isway onay oubtday atsoeverwhay atthay evenway amongstway
ishay ownway ountrymencay, andway ishay ownway ontemporariescay, ethay amesay erdictvay ouldway
avehay eenbay eturnedray, adhay itway eenbay ollectedcay uponway ethay amousfay inciplepray ofway
Emistoclesthay, atthay ehay ouldshay ebay eputedray ethay irstfay omwhay ethay eatestgray
umbernay ofway ivalray oicesvay adhay onouncedpray otay ebay ethay econdsay.

Ibliographybay

_Works_ Atinlay oliofay, Omeray, 1469; Enicevay, 1471; Orenceflay, 1514; Ondonlay,
1585. Eday Ellobay Allicogay, Esslingenway ?, 1473. Anslationstray ybay Ohnjay
Iptofttay, Earlway ofway Orcesterway Ohnjay Astellray, ofway Uliusjay Aesar'scay
Ommentariescayewlynay anslatedtray intoway Englysheway ... asway uchmay asway oncernethcay
sthyay ealmeray ofway Englandway1530 oliofay; ybay Arthurway Oldingegay, Ethay Eyghtway
Ookesbay ofway . Uliusjay Aesarcay, Ondonlay, 1563, 1565, 1578, 1590; ybay Apmanchay,
Ondonlay, 1604 oliofay; ybay Emclay. Edmondsway, Ondonlay, 1609; ethay amesay, ithway
Irtiushay, 1655, 1670, 1695 oliofay ithway ommendatorycay ersesvay ybay Amdencay,
Anielday, andway Enbay Ohnsonjay _sic_. Orksway Anslatedtray ybay . Uncanday, 1753,
1755; ybay . Adenblay, 8th edway., 1770; Acdevittmay, Ohn'sbay Ibrarylay, 1848. Eday
Ellobay Allicogay, anslatedtray ybay . Onganmay, Ublinday, 1850; ybay .. Owganway andway
.. Atemanbay, 1882. Aesar'scay Ommentariescay onway ethay Allicgay Arway, anslatedtray
ybay . Iceray Olmeshay, Ondonlay, 1908 eesay alsoway Olmes'hay Aesar'scay Onquestcay ofway
Aulgay, 1911. Aesar'scay Allicgay Arway, anslatedtray ybay Evray. .. Onglay, Oxfordway,
1911; Ooksbay Ivway. andway . anslatedtray ybay .. Ichardpray, Ambridgecay, 1912. Orfay
Atinlay exttay ofway Eday Ellobay Allicogay eesay Ell'sbay Illustratedway Assicalclay Eriessay;
Ent'sday Empletay Eriessay ofway Assicalclay Extstay, 1902; Acmillanmay andway Ocay., 1905;
andway Ackie'sblay Atinlay Extstay, 19057.


                                   


Ontentscay


Ethay Arway Inway Aulgay

Ethay Ivilcay Arway





Ethay Ommentariescay Ofway
Aiuscay Uliusjay Aesarcay


Ethay Arway Inway Aulgay

Ookbay Iway

Iway.Allway Aulgay isway ividedday intoway eethray artspay, oneway ofway ichwhay ethay Elgaebay
inhabitway, ethay Aquitaniway anotherway, osethay owhay inway eirthay ownway anguagelay areway
alledcay Eltscay, inway oursway Aulsgay, ethay irdthay. Allway esethay ifferday omfray eachway otherway
inway anguagelay, ustomscay andway awslay. Ethay iverray Aronnegay eparatessay ethay Aulsgay
omfray ethay Aquitaniway; ethay Arnemay andway ethay Einesay eparatesay emthay omfray ethay
Elgaebay. Ofway allway esethay, ethay Elgaebay areway ethay avestbray, ecausebay eythay areway
arthestfay omfray ethay ivilisationcay andway efinementray ofway ourway Ovincepray, andway
erchantsmay eastlay equentlyfray esortray otay emthay andway importway osethay ingsthay ichwhay
endtay otay effeminateway ethay indmay; andway eythay areway ethay earestnay otay ethay Ermansgay,
owhay elldway eyondbay ethay Inerhay, ithway omwhay eythay areway ontinuallycay agingway arway;
orfay ichwhay easonray ethay Elvetiihay alsoway urpasssay ethay estray ofway ethay Aulsgay inway
alourvay, asway eythay ontendcay ithway ethay Ermansgay inway almostway ailyday attlesbay, enwhay
eythay eitherway epelray emthay omfray eirthay ownway erritoriestay, orway emselvesthay ageway
arway onway eirthay ontiersfray. Oneway artpay ofway esethay, ichwhay itway ashay eenbay aidsay atthay
ethay Aulsgay occupyway, akestay itsway eginningbay atway ethay iverray Onerhay itway isway oundedbay
ybay ethay iverray Aronnegay, ethay oceanway, andway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Elgaebay itway
ordersbay, ootay, onway ethay idesay ofway ethay Equanisay andway ethay Elvetiihay, uponway ethay
iverray Inerhay, andway etchesstray owardstay ethay orthnay. Ethay Elgaebay iseray omfray ethay
extremeway ontierfray ofway Aulgay, extendway otay ethay owerlay artpay ofway ethay iverray Inerhay;
andway ooklay owardstay ethay orthnay andway ethay isingray unsay. Aquitaniaway extendsway omfray
ethay iverray Aronnegay otay ethay Enaeanpyray ountainsmay andway otay atthay artpay ofway ethay
oceanway ichwhay isway earnay Ainspay itway ookslay etweenbay ethay ettingsay ofway ethay unsay andway
ethay orthnay arstay.

Iiway.Amongway ethay Elvetiihay, Orgetorixway asway ybay arfay ethay ostmay istinguishedday andway
ealthyway. Ehay, enwhay Arcusmay Essalamay andway Arcusmay Isopay ereway onsulscay, incitedway
ybay ustlay ofway overeigntysay, ormedfay away onspiracycay amongway ethay obilitynay, andway
ersuadedpay ethay eoplepay otay ogay orthfay omfray eirthay erritoriestay ithway allway eirthay
ossessionspay, ayingsay atthay itway ouldway ebay eryvay easyway, incesay eythay excelledway
allway inway alourvay, otay acquireway ethay upremacysay ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay. Otay isthay ehay
ethay oremay easilyway ersuadedpay emthay, ecausebay ethay Elvetiihay areway onfinedcay onway
everyway idesay ybay ethay aturenay ofway eirthay ituationsay; onway oneway idesay ybay ethay Inerhay, away
eryvay oadbray andway eepday iverray, ichwhay eparatessay ethay Elvetianhay erritorytay omfray
ethay Ermansgay; onway away econdsay idesay ybay ethay Urajay, away eryvay ighhay ountainmay ichwhay isway
ituatedsay etweenbay ethay Equanisay andway ethay Elvetiihay; onway away irdthay ybay ethay Akelay
ofway Enevagay, andway ybay ethay iverray Onerhay, ichwhay eparatessay ourway Ovincepray omfray ethay
Elvetiihay. Omfray esethay ircumstancescay itway esultedray atthay eythay ouldcay angeray
esslay idelyway, andway ouldcay esslay easilyway akemay arway uponway eirthay eighboursnay; orfay
ichwhay easonray enmay ondfay ofway arway asway eythay ereway ereway affectedway ithway eatgray
egretray. Eythay oughtthay, atthay onsideringcay ethay extentway ofway eirthay opulationpay,
andway eirthay enownray orfay arfareway andway averybray, eythay adhay utbay arrownay imitslay,
althoughway eythay extendedway inway engthlay 240, andway inway eadthbray 180 Omanray ilesmay.

Iiiway.Inducedway ybay esethay onsiderationscay, andway influencedway ybay ethay authorityway
ofway Orgetorixway, eythay eterminedday otay ovidepray uchsay ingsthay asway ereway ecessarynay
orfay eirthay expeditionwayotay uybay upway asway eatgray away umbernay asway ossiblepay ofway eastsbay
ofway urdenbay andway aggonswayotay akemay eirthay owingssay asway argelay asway ossiblepay, osay
atthay onway eirthay archmay entyplay ofway orncay ightmay ebay inway orestayandway otay establishway
eacepay andway iendshipfray ithway ethay eighbouringnay atesstay. Eythay eckonedray atthay away
ermtay ofway otway earsyay ouldway ebay ufficientsay orfay emthay otay executeway eirthay esignsday;
eythay ixfay ybay ecreeday eirthay epartureday orfay ethay irdthay earyay. Orgetorixway isway
osenchay otay ompletecay esethay arrangementsway. Ehay ooktay uponway imselfhay ethay officeway
ofway ambassadorway otay ethay atesstay onway isthay ourneyjay ehay ersuadespay Asticuscay, ethay
onsay ofway Atamantaledescay oneway ofway ethay Equanisay, osewhay atherfay adhay ossessedpay
ethay overeigntysay amongway ethay eoplepay orfay anymay earsyay, andway adhay eenbay ledstyay
_friend_ ybay ethay enatesay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, otay eizesay uponway ethay
overeigntysay inway ishay ownway atestay, ichwhay ishay atherfay adhay eldhay eforebay imhay, andway
ehay ikewiselay ersuadespay Umnorixday, anway Aeduanway, ethay otherbray ofway Ivitiacusday,
owhay atway atthay imetay ossessedpay ethay iefchay authorityway inway ethay atestay, andway asway
exceedinglyway elovedbay ybay ethay eoplepay, otay attemptway ethay amesay, andway ivesgay imhay
ishay aughterday inway arriagemay. Ehay ovespray otay emthay atthay otay accomplishway eirthay
attemptsway asway away ingthay eryvay easyway otay ebay oneday, ecausebay ehay imselfhay ouldway
obtainway ethay overnmentgay ofway ishay ownway atestay; atthay erethay asway onay oubtday atthay ethay
Elvetiihay ereway ethay ostmay owerfulpay ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay; ehay assuresway emthay
atthay ehay illway, ithway ishay ownway orcesfay andway ishay ownway armyway, acquireway ethay
overeigntysay orfay emthay. Incitedway ybay isthay eechspay, eythay ivegay away edgeplay andway
oathway otay oneway anotherway, andway opehay atthay, enwhay eythay avehay eizedsay ethay
overeigntysay, eythay illway, ybay eansmay ofway ethay eethray ostmay owerfulpay andway aliantvay
ationsnay, ebay enabledway otay obtainway ossessionpay ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay.

Ivway.Enwhay isthay emeschay asway isclosedday otay ethay Elvetiihay ybay informersway, eythay,
accordingway otay eirthay ustomcay, ompelledcay Orgetorixway otay eadplay ishay ausecay inway
ainschay; itway asway ethay awlay atthay ethay enaltypay ofway eingbay urnedbay ybay irefay ouldshay
awaitway imhay ifway ondemnedcay. Onway ethay ayday appointedway orfay ethay eadingplay ofway ishay
ausecay, Orgetorixway ewdray ogethertay omfray allway uartersqay otay ethay ourtcay allway ishay
assalsvay otay ethay umbernay ofway entay ousandthay ersonspay; andway edlay ogethertay otay ethay
amesay aceplay, andway allway ishay ependantsday andway ebtordayondsmenbay, ofway omwhay ehay adhay away
eatgray umbernay; ybay eansmay ofway esethay ehay escuedray imselfhay omfray ethay ecessitynay
ofway eadingplay ishay ausecay. Ilewhay ethay atestay, incensedway atway isthay actway, asway
endeavouringway otay assertway itsway ightray ybay armsway, andway ethay agistratesmay ereway
usteringmay away argelay odybay ofway enmay omfray ethay ountrycay, Orgetorixway iedday; andway
erethay isway otnay antingway away uspicionsay, asway ethay Elvetiihay inkthay, ofway ishay avinghay
ommittedcay uicidesay.

.Afterway ishay eathday, ethay Elvetiihay everthelessnay attemptway otay oday atthay ichwhay
eythay adhay esolvedray onway, amelynay, otay ogay orthfay omfray eirthay erritoriestay. Enwhay
eythay oughtthay atthay eythay ereway atway engthlay eparedpray orfay isthay undertakingway,
eythay etsay irefay otay allway eirthay ownstay, inway umbernay aboutway elvetwayotay eirthay
illagesvay aboutway ourfay undredhayandway otay ethay ivatepray ellingsdway atthay emainedray;
eythay urnbay upway allway ethay orncay, exceptway atwhay eythay intendway otay arrycay ithway emthay;
atthay afterway estroyingday ethay opehay ofway away eturnray omehay, eythay ightmay ebay ethay oremay
eadyray orfay undergoingway allway angersday. Eythay orderway everyway oneway otay arrycay orthfay
omfray omehay orfay imselfhay ovisionspray orfay eethray onthsmay, eadyray oundgray. Eythay
ersuadepay ethay Auraciray, andway ethay Ulingitay, andway ethay Atobrigilay, eirthay
eighboursnay, otay adoptway ethay amesay anplay, andway afterway urningbay ownday eirthay ownstay
andway illagesvay, otay etsay outway ithway emthay andway eythay admitway otay eirthay artypay andway
uniteway otay emselvesthay asway onfederatescay ethay Oiibay, owhay adhay eltdway onway ethay otherway
idesay ofway ethay Inerhay, andway adhay ossedcray overway intoway ethay Oricannay erritorytay, andway
assaultedway Oreianay.

Ivay.Erethay ereway inway allway otway outesray ybay ichwhay eythay ouldcay ogay orthfay omfray
eirthay ountrycayoneway oughthray ethay Equanisay, arrownay andway ifficultday, etweenbay
Ountmay Urajay andway ethay iverray Onerhay ybay ichwhay arcelyscay oneway aggonway atway away imetay
ouldcay ebay edlay; erethay asway, oreovermay, away eryvay ighhay ountainmay overhangingway, osay
atthay away eryvay ewfay ightmay easilyway interceptway emthay; ethay otherway, oughthray ourway
Ovincepray, uchmay easierway andway eerfray omfray obstaclesway, ecausebay ethay Onerhay owsflay
etweenbay ethay oundariesbay ofway ethay Elvetiihay andway osethay ofway ethay Allobrogesway, owhay
adhay atelylay eenbay ubduedsay, andway isway inway omesay acesplay ossedcray ybay away ordfay. Ethay
urthestfay owntay ofway ethay Allobrogesway, andway ethay earestnay otay ethay erritoriestay ofway
ethay Elvetiihay, isway Enevagay. Omfray isthay owntay away idgebray extendsway otay ethay
Elvetiihay. Eythay oughtthay atthay eythay ouldshay eitherway ersuadepay ethay Allobrogesway,
ecausebay eythay idday otnay eemsay asway etyay ellwayaffectedway owardstay ethay Omanray eoplepay,
orway ompelcay emthay ybay orcefay otay allowway emthay otay asspay oughthray eirthay erritoriestay.
Avinghay ovidedpray everythingway orfay ethay expeditionway, eythay appointway away ayday onway
ichwhay eythay ouldshay allway eetmay onway ethay ankbay ofway ethay Onerhay. Isthay ayday asway ethay
ifthfay eforebay ethay alendskay ofway Aprilway _i.eway._ ethay 28th ofway Archmay, inway ethay
onsulshipcay ofway Uciuslay Isopay andway Aulusway Abiniusgay .. 58.

Iivay.Enwhay itway asway eportedray otay Aesarcay atthay eythay ereway attemptingway otay akemay
eirthay outeray oughthray ourway Ovincepray, ehay astenshay otay etsay outway omfray ethay itycay,
andway, ybay asway eatgray archesmay asway ehay ancay, oceedspray otay Urtherfay Aulgay, andway
arrivesway atway Enevagay. Ehay ordersway ethay olewhay Ovincepray otay urnishfay asway eatgray away
umbernay ofway oldierssay asway ossiblepay, asway erethay asway inway allway onlyway oneway egionlay inway
Urtherfay Aulgay ehay ordersway ethay idgebray atway Enevagay otay ebay okenbray ownday. Enwhay ethay
Elvetiihay areway apprisedway ofway ishay arrivalway, eythay endsay otay imhay, asway ambassadorsway,
ethay ostmay illustriousway enmay ofway eirthay atestay inway ichwhay embassyway Umeiusnay andway
Erudoctiusvay eldhay ethay iefchay aceplay, otay aysay atthay itway asway eirthay intentionway
otay archmay oughthray ethay Ovincepray ithoutway oingday anyway armhay, ecausebay eythay adhay
accordingway otay eirthay ownway epresentationsray onay otherway outerayatthay eythay
equestedray eythay ightmay ebay allowedway otay oday osay ithway ishay onsentcay. Aesarcay,
inasmuchway asway ehay eptkay inway emembranceray atthay Uciuslay Assiuscay, ethay onsulcay, adhay
eenbay ainslay, andway ishay armyway outedray andway ademay otay asspay underway ethay okeyay ybay ethay
Elvetiihay, idday otnay inkthay atthay eirthay equestray oughtway otay ebay antedgray; ornay
asway ehay ofway opinionway atthay enmay ofway ostilehay ispositionday, ifway anway opportunityway ofway
archingmay oughthray ethay Ovincepray ereway ivengay emthay, ouldway abstainway omfray
outrageway andway ischiefmay. Etyay, inway orderway atthay away eriodpay ightmay interveneway, untilway
ethay oldierssay omwhay ehay adhay orderedway otay ebay urnishedfay ouldshay assembleway, ehay
epliedray otay ethay ambassadorsway, atthay ehay ouldway aketay imetay otay eliberateday; ifway
eythay antedway anythingway, eythay ightmay eturnray onway ethay ayday eforebay ethay idesway ofway
Aprilway onway Aprilway 12th.

Iiivay.Eanwhilemay, ithway ethay egionlay ichwhay ehay adhay ithway imhay andway ethay oldierssay
owhay adhay assembledway omfray ethay Ovincepray, ehay arriescay alongway orfay ineteennay
Omanray, otnay uiteqay eighteenway Englishway ilesmay away allway, otay ethay eighthay ofway
ixteensay eetfay, andway away enchtray, omfray ethay akelay ofway Enevagay, ichwhay owsflay intoway
ethay iverray Onerhay, otay Ountmay Urajay, ichwhay eparatessay ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Equanisay omfray osethay ofway ethay Elvetiihay. Enwhay atthay orkway asway inishedfay, ehay
istributesday arrisonsgay, andway oselyclay ortifiesfay edoubtsray, inway orderway atthay ehay
aymay ethay oremay easilyway interceptway emthay, ifway eythay ouldshay attemptway otay osscray overway
againstway ishay illway. Enwhay ethay ayday ichwhay ehay adhay appointedway ithway ethay
ambassadorsway amecay, andway eythay eturnedray otay imhay, ehay ayssay atthay ehay annotcay,
onsistentlycay ithway ethay ustomcay andway ecedentpray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, antgray
anyway oneway away assagepay oughthray ethay Ovincepray; andway ehay ivesgay emthay otay understandway
atthay, ifway eythay ouldshay attemptway otay useway iolencevay, ehay ouldway opposeway emthay. Ethay
Elvetiihay, isappointedday inway isthay opehay, iedtray ifway eythay ouldcay orcefay away assagepay
omesay ybay eansmay ofway away idgebray ofway oatsbay andway umerousnay aftsray onstructedcay orfay
ethay urposepay; othersway, ybay ethay ordsfay ofway ethay Onerhay, erewhay ethay epthday ofway ethay
iverray asway eastlay, ometimessay ybay ayday, utbay oremay equentlyfray ybay ightnay, utbay
eingbay eptkay atway aybay ybay ethay engthstray ofway ourway orksway, andway ybay ethay oncoursecay ofway
ethay oldierssay, andway ybay ethay issilesmay, eythay esistedday omfray isthay attemptway.

Ixway.Erethay asway eftlay oneway ayway, amelynay oughthray ethay Equanisay, ybay ichwhay, onway
accountway ofway itsway arrownessnay, eythay ouldcay otnay asspay ithoutway ethay onsentcay ofway
ethay Equanisay. Asway eythay ouldcay otnay ofway emselvesthay evailpray onway emthay, eythay endsay
ambassadorsway otay Umnorixday ethay Aeduanway, atthay oughthray ishay intercessionway eythay
ightmay obtainway eirthay equestray omfray ethay Equanisay. Umnorixday, ybay ishay opularitypay
andway iberalitylay, adhay eatgray influenceway amongway ethay Equanisay, andway asway iendlyfray
otay ethay Elvetiihay, ecausebay outway ofway atthay atestay ehay adhay arriedmay ethay aughterday
ofway Orgetorixway; andway, incitedway ybay ustlay ofway overeigntysay, asway anxiousway orfay away
evolutionray, andway ishedway otay avehay asway anymay atesstay asway ossiblepay attachedway otay
imhay ybay ishay indnesskay owardstay emthay. Ehay, ereforethay, undertakesway ethay affairway,
andway evailspray uponway ethay Equanisay otay allowway ethay Elvetiihay otay archmay oughthray
eirthay erritoriestay, andway arrangesway atthay eythay ouldshay ivegay ostageshay otay eachway
otherwayethay Equanisay otnay otay obstructway ethay Elvetiihay inway eirthay archmayethay
Elvetiihay, otay asspay ithoutway ischiefmay andway outrageway.

.Itwayisway againway oldtay Aesarcay atthay ethay Elvetiihay intendway otay archmay oughthray
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Equanisay andway ethay Aeduiway intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Antonessay, ichwhay areway otnay arfay istantday omfray osethay oundariesbay ofway ethay
Olosatestay, ichwhay izvay. Olosatay, Oulousetay isway away atestay inway ethay Ovincepray. Ifway
isthay ooktay aceplay, ehay awsay atthay itway ouldway ebay attendedway ithway eatgray angerday otay
ethay Ovincepray otay avehay arlikeway enmay, enemiesway ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, orderingbay
uponway anway openway andway eryvay ertilefay acttray ofway ountrycay. Orfay esethay easonsray ehay
appointedway Itustay Abienuslay, ishay ieutenantlay, otay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay
ortificationfay ichwhay ehay adhay ademay. Ehay imselfhay oceedspray otay Italyway ybay orcedfay
archesmay, andway erethay evieslay otway egionslay, andway eadslay outway omfray interwayuartersqay
eethray ichwhay ereway interingway aroundway Aquileiaway, andway ithway esethay ivefay
egionslay archesmay apidlyray ybay ethay earestnay outeray acrossway ethay Alpsway intoway
Urtherfay Aulgay. Erehay ethay Entronescay andway ethay Aioceligray andway ethay Aturigescay,
avinghay akentay ossessionpay ofway ethay igherhay artspay, attemptway otay obstructway ethay
armyway inway eirthay archmay. Afterway avinghay outedray esethay inway everalsay attlesbay, ehay
arrivesway inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Ocontiivay inway ethay Urtherfay Ovincepray onway
ethay eventhsay ayday omfray Ocelumway, ichwhay isway ethay ostmay emoteray owntay ofway ethay Itherhay
Ovincepray; encethay ehay eadslay ishay armyway intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Allobrogesway,
andway omfray ethay Allobrogesway otay ethay Egusianisay. Esethay eoplepay areway ethay irstfay
eyondbay ethay Ovincepray onway ethay oppositeway idesay ofway ethay Onerhay.

Ixay.Ethay Elvetiihay adhay ybay isthay imetay edlay eirthay orcesfay overway oughthray ethay
arrownay efileday andway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Equanisay, andway adhay arrivedway atway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway ereway avagingray eirthay andslay. Ethay Aeduiway, asway
eythay ouldcay otnay efendday emselvesthay andway eirthay ossessionspay againstway emthay,
endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay otay askway assistanceway, eadingplay atthay eythay adhay
atway allway imestay osay ellway eservedday ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, atthay eirthay ieldsfay
oughtway otnay otay avehay eenbay aidlay astewayeirthay ildrenchay arriedcay offway intoway
averyslayeirthay ownstay ormedstay, almostway ithinway ightsay ofway ourway armyway. Atway ethay
amesay imetay ethay Ambarriway, ethay iendsfray andway insmenkay ofway ethay Aeduiway, appriseway
Aesarcay atthay itway asway otnay easyway orfay emthay, ownay atthay eirthay ieldsfay adhay eenbay
evastatedday, otay ardway offway ethay iolencevay ofway ethay enemyway omfray eirthay ownstay ethay
Allobrogesway ikewiselay, owhay adhay illagesvay andway ossessionspay onway ethay otherway idesay
ofway ethay Onerhay, etakebay emselvesthay inway ightflay otay Aesarcay andway assureway imhay atthay
eythay adhay othingnay emainingray, exceptway ethay oilsay ofway eirthay andlay. Aesarcay,
inducedway ybay esethay ircumstancescay, ecidesday atthay ehay oughtway otnay otay aitway untilway
ethay Elvetiihay, afterway estroyingday allway ethay opertypray ofway ishay alliesway, ouldshay
arriveway amongway ethay Antonessay.

Iixay.Erethay isway away iverray alledcay ethay Aonesay, ichwhay owsflay oughthray ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Aeduiway andway Equanisay intoway ethay Onerhay ithway uchsay incredibleway
ownessslay, atthay itway annotcay ebay eterminedday ybay ethay eyeway inway ichwhay irectionday itway
owsflay. Isthay ethay Elvetiihay ereway ossingcray ybay aftsray andway oatsbay oinedjay
ogethertay. Enwhay Aesarcay asway informedway ybay iesspay atthay ethay Elvetiihay adhay
alreadyway onveyedcay eethray artspay ofway eirthay orcesfay acrossway atthay iverray, utbay atthay
ethay ourthfay artpay asway eftlay ehindbay onway isthay idesay ofway ethay Aonesay, ehay etsay outway
omfray ethay ampcay ithway eethray egionslay uringday ethay irdthay atchway, andway amecay upway
ithway atthay ivisionday ichwhay adhay otnay etyay ossedcray ethay iverray. Attackingway emthay,
encumberedway ithway aggagebay, andway otnay expectingway imhay, ehay utcay otay iecespay away eatgray
artpay ofway emthay; ethay estray etookbay emselvesthay otay ightflay, andway oncealedcay
emselvesthay inway ethay earestnay oodsway. Atthay antoncay ichwhay asway utcay ownday asway
alledcay ethay Igurinetay; orfay ethay olewhay Elvetianhay atestay isway ividedday intoway ourfay
antonscay. Isthay inglesay antoncay avinghay eftlay eirthay ountrycay, ithinway ethay
ecollectionray ofway ourway athersfay, adhay ainslay Uciuslay Assiuscay ethay onsulcay, andway
adhay ademay ishay armyway asspay underway ethay okeyay .. 107. Usthay, etherwhay ybay
ancechay, orway ybay ethay esignday ofway ethay immortalway odsgay, atthay artpay ofway ethay
Elvetianhay atestay ichwhay adhay oughtbray away ignalsay alamitycay uponway ethay Omanray
eoplepay asway ethay irstfay otay aypay ethay enaltypay. Inway isthay Aesarcay avengedway otnay onlyway
ethay ublicpay, utbay alsoway ishay ownway ersonalpay ongswray, ecausebay ethay Igurinitay adhay
ainslay Uciuslay Isopay ethay ieutenantlay ofway Assiuscay, ethay andfathergray ofway Uciuslay
Alpurniuscay Isopay, ishay Aesar'scay atherfayinwayawlay, inway ethay amesay attlebay asway
Assiuscay imselfhay.

Iiixay.Isthay attlebay endedway, atthay ehay ightmay ebay ableway otay omecay upway ithway ethay
emainingray orcesfay ofway ethay Elvetiihay, ehay ocurespray away idgebray otay ebay ademay acrossway
ethay Aonesay, andway usthay eadslay ishay armyway overway. Ethay Elvetiihay, onfusedcay ybay ishay
uddensay arrivalway, enwhay eythay oundfay atthay ehay adhay effectedway inway oneway ayday atwhay
eythay emselvesthay adhay ithway ethay utmostway ifficultyday accomplishedway inway entytway,
amelynay, ethay ossingcray ofway ethay iverray, endsay ambassadorsway otay imhay; atway ethay eadhay
ofway ichwhay embassyway asway Ivicoday, owhay adhay eenbay ommandercay ofway ethay Elvetiihay inway
ethay arway againstway Assiuscay. Ehay usthay eatstray ithway Aesarcayatthay, ifway ethay
Omanray eoplepay ouldway akemay eacepay ithway ethay Elvetiihay eythay ouldway ogay otay atthay
artpay andway erethay emainray, erewhay Aesarcay ightmay appointway andway esireday emthay otay ebay;
utbay ifway ehay ouldshay ersistpay inway ersecutingpay emthay ithway arway, atthay ehay oughtway otay
ememberray othbay ethay ancientway isgraceday ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay andway ethay
aracteristicchay alourvay ofway ethay Elvetiihay. Asway otay ishay avinghay attackedway oneway
antoncay ybay urprisesay, atway away imetay enwhay osethay owhay adhay ossedcray ethay iverray
ouldcay otnay ingbray assistanceway otay eirthay iendsfray, atthay ehay oughtway otnay onway atthay
accountway otay ascribeway eryvay uchmay otay ishay ownway alourvay, orway espiseday emthay; atthay
eythay adhay osay earnedlay omfray eirthay iressay andway ancestorsway, asway otay elyray oremay onway
alourvay anthay onway artificeway orway atagemstray. Ereforewhay etlay imhay otnay ingbray itway otay
asspay atthay ethay aceplay, erewhay eythay ereway andingstay, ouldshay acquireway away amenay,
omfray ethay isasterday ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay andway ethay estructionday ofway eirthay armyway
orway ansmittray ethay emembranceray ofway uchsay anway eventway otay osteritypay.

Ivxay.Otay esethay ordsway Aesarcay usthay epliedrayatthay onway atthay eryvay accountway ehay
eltfay esslay esitationhay, ecausebay ehay eptkay inway emembranceray osethay ircumstancescay
ichwhay ethay Elvetianhay ambassadorsway adhay entionedmay, andway atthay ehay eltfay ethay oremay
indignantway atway emthay, inway oportionpray asway eythay adhay appenedhay undeservedlyway otay
ethay Omanray eoplepay orfay ifway eythay adhay eenbay onsciouscay ofway avinghay oneday anyway
ongwray itway ouldway otnay avehay eenbay ifficultday otay ebay onway eirthay uardgay, utbay orfay
atthay eryvay easonray adhay eythay eenbay eceivedday, ecausebay eithernay ereway eythay awareway
atthay anyway offenceway adhay eenbay ivengay ybay emthay, onway accountway ofway ichwhay eythay ouldshay
ebay afraidway, ornay idday eythay inkthay atthay eythay oughtway otay ebay afraidway ithoutway
ausecay. Utbay evenway ifway ehay ereway illingway otay orgetfay eirthay ormerfay outrageway, ouldcay
ehay alsoway aylay asideway ethay emembranceray ofway ethay atelay ongswray, inway atthay eythay adhay
againstway ishay illway attemptedway away outeray oughthray ethay Ovincepray ybay orcefay, inway
atthay eythay adhay olestedmay ethay Aeduiway, ethay Ambarriway, andway ethay Allobrogesway? Atthay
asway otay eirthay osay insolentlyway oastingbay ofway eirthay ictoryvay, andway asway otay eirthay
eingbay astonishedway atthay eythay adhay osay onglay ommittedcay eirthay outragesway ithway
impunityway, othbay esethay ingsthay endedtay otay ethay amesay ointpay; orfay ethay immortalway
odsgay areway ontway otay allowway osethay ersonspay omwhay eythay ishway otay unishpay orfay eirthay
uiltgay ometimessay away eatergray osperitypray andway ongerlay impunityway, inway orderway atthay
eythay aymay uffersay ethay oremay everelysay omfray away everseray ofway ircumstancescay.
Althoughway esethay ingsthay areway osay, etyay, ifway ostageshay ereway otay ebay ivengay imhay ybay
emthay inway orderway atthay ehay aymay ebay assuredway eythay illway oday atwhay eythay omisepray, andway
ovidedpray eythay illway ivegay atisfactionsay otay ethay Aeduiway orfay ethay outragesway ichwhay
eythay adhay ommittedcay againstway emthay andway eirthay alliesway, andway ikewiselay otay ethay
Allobrogesway, ehay Aesarcay illway akemay eacepay ithway emthay. Ivicoday epliedray, atthay
ethay Elvetiihay adhay eenbay osay ainedtray ybay eirthay ancestorsway atthay eythay ereway
accustomedway otay eceiveray, otnay otay ivegay, ostageshay; ofway atthay actfay ethay Omanray
eoplepay ereway itnessway. Avinghay ivengay isthay eplyray, ehay ithdrewway.

Vxay.Onway ethay ollowingfay ayday eythay ovemay eirthay ampcay omfray atthay aceplay; Aesarcay
oesday ethay amesay, andway endssay orwardfay allway ishay avalrycay, otay ethay umbernay ofway ourfay
ousandthay ichwhay ehay adhay awndray ogethertay omfray allway artspay ofway ethay Ovincepray andway
omfray ethay Aeduiway andway eirthay alliesway, otay observeway owardstay atwhay artspay ethay
enemyway areway irectingday eirthay archmay. Esethay, avinghay ootay eagerlyway ursuedpay ethay
enemy'sway earray, omecay otay away attlebay ithway ethay avalrycay ofway ethay Elvetiihay inway away
isadvantageousday aceplay, andway away ewfay ofway ourway enmay allfay. Ethay Elvetiihay, elatedway
ithway isthay attlebay ecausebay eythay adhay ithway ivefay undredhay orsehay epulsedray osay
argelay away odybay ofway orsehay, eganbay otay acefay usway oremay oldlybay, ometimessay ootay omfray
eirthay earray otay ovokepray ourway enmay ybay anway attackway. Aesarcay oweverhay estrainedray
ishay enmay omfray attlebay, eemingday itway ufficientsay orfay ethay esentpray otay eventpray
ethay enemyway omfray apineray, oragefay, andway epredationday. Eythay archedmay orfay aboutway
