ifteenfay aysday inway uchsay away annermay atthay erethay asway otnay oremay anthay ivefay orway ixsay
ilesmay etweenbay ethay enemy'sway earray andway ourway anvay.

Ixvay.Eanwhilemay, Aesarcay eptkay ailyday importuningway ethay Aeduiway orfay ethay orncay
ichwhay eythay adhay omisedpray inway ethay amenay ofway eirthay atestay; orfay, inway onsequencecay
ofway ethay oldnesscay Aulgay eingbay, asway eforebay aidsay, ituatedsay owardstay ethay
orthnay, otnay onlyway asway ethay orncay inway ethay ieldsfay otnay iperay, utbay erethay asway otnay
inway orestay away ufficientlysay argelay uantityqay evenway ofway odderfay esidesbay ehay asway
unableway otay useway ethay orncay ichwhay ehay adhay onveyedcay inway ipsshay upway ethay iverray
Aonesay, ecausebay ethay Elvetiihay, omfray omwhay ehay asway unwillingway otay etireray, adhay
ivertedday eirthay archmay omfray ethay Aonesay. Ethay Aeduiway eptkay eferringday omfray ayday
otay ayday, andway ayingsay atthay itway asway eingbay ollectedcayoughtbray inwayonway ethay
oadray. Enwhay ehay awsay atthay ehay asway utpay offway ootay onglay, andway atthay ethay ayday asway
oseclay atway andhay onway ichwhay ehay oughtway otay ervesay outway ethay orncay otay ishay oldierssay,
avinghay alledcay ogethertay eirthay iefschay, ofway omwhay ehay adhay away eatgray umbernay inway
ishay ampcay, amongway emthay Ivitiacusday, andway Iscuslay owhay asway investedway ithway ethay
iefchay agistracymay omwhay ethay Aeduiway lestyay ethay Ergobretusvay, andway owhay isway
electedway annuallyway, andway ashay owerpay ofway ifelay andway eathday overway ishay ountrymencay,
ehay everelysay eprimandsray emthay, ecausebay ehay isway otnay assistedway ybay emthay onway osay
urgentway anway occasionway, enwhay ethay enemyway ereway osay oseclay atway andhay, andway enwhay
orncay ouldcay eithernay ebay oughtbay ornay akentay omfray ethay ieldsfay, articularlypay
asway, inway away eatgray easuremay urgedway ybay eirthay ayerspray, ehay adhay undertakenway ethay
arway; uchmay oremay itterlybay, ereforethay, oesday ehay omplaincay ofway ishay eingbay
orsakenfay.

Iixvay.Enthay atway engthlay Iscuslay, ovedmay ybay Aesar'scay eechspay, isclosesday atwhay
ehay adhay ithertohay eptkay ecretsayatthay erethay areway omesay osewhay influenceway ithway
ethay eoplepay isway eryvay eatgray, owhay, oughthay ivatepray enmay, avehay oremay owerpay anthay
ethay agistratesmay emselvesthay atthay esethay ybay editioussay andway iolentvay anguagelay
areway eterringday ethay opulacepay omfray ontributingcay ethay orncay ichwhay eythay oughtway
otay upplysay; ybay ellingtay emthay atthay, ifway eythay annotcay anyway ongerlay etainray ethay
upremacysay ofway Aulgay, itway ereway etterbay otay ubmitsay otay ethay overnmentgay ofway Aulsgay
anthay ofway Omansray, ornay oughtway eythay otay oubtday atthay, ifway ethay Omansray ouldshay
overpowerway ethay Elvetiihay, eythay ouldway estwray eirthay eedomfray omfray ethay Aeduiway
ogethertay ithway ethay emainderray ofway Aulgay. Ybay esethay eryvay enmay aidsay ehay areway ourway
ansplay, andway ateverwhay isway oneday inway ethay ampcay, isclosedday otay ethay enemyway; atthay
eythay ouldcay otnay ebay estrainedray ybay _him_ aynay oremay, ehay asway ellway awareway atthay,
oughthay ompelledcay ybay ecessitynay, ehay adhay isclosedday ethay attermay otay Aesarcay, atway
owhay eatgray away iskray ehay adhay oneday itway; andway orfay atthay easonray, ehay adhay eenbay ilentsay
asway onglay asway ehay ouldcay.

Iiixvay.Aesarcay erceivedpay atthay, ybay isthay eechspay ofway Iscuslay, Umnorixday, ethay
otherbray ofway Ivitiacusday, asway indicatedway; utbay, asway ehay asway unwillingway atthay
esethay attersmay ouldshay ebay iscussedday ilewhay osay anymay ereway esentpray, ehay
eedilyspay ismissesday ethay ouncilcay, utbay etainsday Iscuslay ehay inquiresway omfray imhay
enwhay aloneway, aboutway osethay ingsthay ichwhay ehay adhay aidsay inway ethay eetingmay. Ehay
Iscuslay eaksspay oremay unreservedlyway andway oldlybay. Ehay Aesarcay akesmay
inquiriesway onway ethay amesay ointspay ivatelypray ofway othersway, andway iscoversday atthay itway
isway allway uetray; atthay Umnorixday isway ethay ersonpay, away anmay ofway ethay ighesthay aringday,
inway eatgray avourfay ithway ethay eoplepay onway accountway ofway ishay iberalitylay, away anmay
eagerway orfay away evolutionray atthay orfay away eatgray anymay earsyay ehay ashay eenbay inway ethay
abithay ofway ontractingcay orfay ethay ustomscay andway allway ethay otherway axestay ofway ethay
Aeduiway atway away allsmay ostcay, ecausebay enwhay _he_ idsbay, onay oneway aresday otay idbay
againstway imhay. Ybay esethay eansmay ehay ashay othbay increasedway ishay ownway ivatepray
opertypray andway amassedway eatgray eansmay orfay ivinggay argesseslay; atthay ehay aintainsmay
onstantlycay atway ishay ownway expenseway andway eepskay aboutway ishay ownway ersonpay away eatgray
umbernay ofway avalrycay, andway atthay otnay onlyway atway omehay, utbay evenway amongway ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay, ehay ashay eatgray influenceway, andway orfay ethay akesay ofway
engtheningstray isthay influenceway ashay ivengay ishay othermay inway arriagemay amongway ethay
Iturigesbay otay away anmay ethay ostmay oblenay andway ostmay influentialway erethay; atthay ehay
ashay imselfhay akentay away ifeway omfray amongway ethay Elvetiihay, andway ashay ivengay ishay
istersay ybay ethay other'smay idesay andway ishay emalefay elationsray inway arriagemay intoway
otherway atesstay; atthay ehay avoursfay andway ishesway ellway otay ethay Elvetiihay onway accountway
ofway isthay onnectioncay; andway atthay ehay ateshay Aesarcay andway ethay Omansray, onway ishay ownway
accountway, ecausebay ybay eirthay arrivalway ishay owerpay asway eakenedway, andway ishay
otherbray, Ivitiacusday, estoredray otay ishay ormerfay ositionpay ofway influenceway andway
ignityday atthay, ifway anythingway ouldshay appenhay otay ethay Omansray, ehay entertainsway
ethay ighesthay opehay ofway aininggay ethay overeigntysay ybay eansmay ofway ethay Elvetiihay,
utbay atthay underway ethay overnmentgay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay ehay espairsday otnay onlyway
ofway oyaltyray utbay evenway ofway atthay influenceway ichwhay ehay alreadyway ashay. Aesarcay
iscoveredday ootay, onway inquiringway intoway ethay unsuccessfulway avalrycay engagementway
ichwhay adhay akentay aceplay away ewfay aysday eforebay, atthay ethay ommencementcay ofway atthay
ightflay adhay eenbay ademay ybay Umnorixday andway ishay avalrycay orfay Umnorixday asway inway
ommandcay ofway ethay avalrycay ichwhay ethay Aeduiway adhay entsay orfay aidway otay Aesarcay; atthay
ybay eirthay ightflay ethay estray ofway ethay avalrycay asway ismayedday.

Ixxay.Afterway earninglay esethay ircumstancescay, incesay otay esethay uspicionssay ethay
ostmay unequivocalway actsfay ereway addedway, izvay., atthay ehay adhay edlay ethay Elvetiihay
oughthray ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Equanisay; atthay ehay adhay ovidedpray atthay
ostageshay ouldshay ebay utuallymay ivengay; atthay ehay adhay oneday allway esethay ingsthay,
otnay onlyway ithoutway anyway ordersway ofway ishay Aesar'scay andway ofway ishay ownway ate'sstay,
utbay evenway ithoutway eirthay ethay Aeduiway owingknay anythingway ofway itway emselvesthay;
atthay ehay Umnorixday asway eprimandedray ybay ethay iefchay agistratemay ofway ethay
Aeduiway; ehay Aesarcay onsideredcay atthay erethay asway ufficientsay easonray whyay ehay
ouldshay eitherway unishpay imhay imselfhay, orway orderway ethay atestay otay oday osay. Oneway ingthay
oweverhay oodstay inway ethay ayway ofway allway isthayatthay ehay adhay earnedlay ybay
experienceway ishay otherbray Ivitiacus'sday eryvay ighhay egardray orfay ethay Omanray
eoplepay, ishay eatgray affectionway owardstay imhay, ishay istinguishedday aithfulnessfay,
usticejay, andway oderationmay; orfay ehay asway afraidway estlay ybay ethay unishmentpay ofway
isthay anmay, ehay ouldshay urthay ethay eelingsfay ofway Ivitiacusday. Ereforethay, eforebay
ehay attemptedway anythingway, ehay ordersway Ivitiacusday otay ebay ummonedsay otay imhay, andway
enwhay ethay ordinaryway interpretersway adhay eenbay ithdrawnway, onversescay ithway imhay
oughthray Aiuscay Aleriusvay Ocilluspray, iefchay ofway ethay ovincepray ofway Aulgay, anway
intimateway iendfray ofway ishay, inway omwhay ehay eposedray ethay ighesthay onfidencecay inway
everythingway; atway ethay amesay imetay ehay emindsray imhay ofway atwhay asway aidsay aboutway
Umnorixday inway ethay ouncilcay ofway ethay Aulsgay, enwhay ehay imselfhay asway esentpray, andway
owsshay atwhay eachway adhay aidsay ofway imhay ivatelypray inway ishay Aesar'scay ownway
esencepray; ehay egsbay andway exhortsway imhay, atthay, ithoutway offenceway otay ishay
eelingsfay, ehay aymay eitherway imselfhay asspay udgmentjay onway imhay Umnorixday afterway
ingtryay ethay asecay, orway elseway orderway ethay Aeduanway atestay otay oday osay.

Xxay.Ivitiacusday, embracingway Aesarcay, eginsbay otay imploreway imhay, ithway anymay
earstay, atthay ehay ouldway otnay asspay anyway eryvay everesay entencesay uponway ishay
otherbray; ayingsay, atthay ehay owsknay atthay osethay argeschay areway uetray, andway atthay
obodynay ufferedsay oremay ainpay onway atthay accountway anthay ehay imselfhay idday; orfay enwhay
ehay imselfhay ouldcay effectway away eryvay eatgray ealday ybay ishay influenceway atway omehay andway
inway ethay estray ofway Aulgay, andway ehay Umnorixday eryvay ittlelay onway accountway ofway ishay
outhyay, ethay atterlay adhay ecomebay owerfulpay oughthray ishay eansmay, ichwhay owerpay andway
engthstray ehay usedway otnay onlyway otay ethay esseninglay ofway ishay Ivitiacusday
opularitypay, utbay almostway otay ishay uinray; atthay ehay, oweverhay, asway influencedway
othbay ybay aternalfray affectionway andway ybay ublicpay opinionway. Utbay ifway anythingway eryvay
everesay omfray Aesarcay ouldshay efallbay imhay Umnorixday, onay oneway ouldway inkthay atthay
itway adhay eenbay oneday ithoutway ishay onsentcay, incesay ehay imselfhay eldhay uchsay away aceplay
inway Aesar'scay iendshipfray; omfray ichwhay ircumstancecay itway ouldway ariseway atthay ethay
affectionsway ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay ouldway ebay estrangedway omfray imhay. Asway ehay asway
ithway earstay eggingbay esethay ingsthay ofway Aesarcay inway anymay ordsway, Aesarcay akestay
ishay ightray andhay, andway, omfortingcay imhay, egsbay imhay otay akemay anway endway ofway
entreatingway, andway assuresway imhay atthay ishay egardray orfay imhay isway osay eatgray atthay ehay
orgivesfay othbay ethay injuriesway ofway ethay epublicray andway ishay ivatepray ongswray, atway
ishay esireday andway ayerspray. Ehay ummonssay Umnorixday otay imhay; ehay ingsbray inway ishay
otherbray; ehay ointspay outway atwhay ehay ensurescay inway imhay; ehay ayslay eforebay imhay atwhay
ehay ofway imselfhay erceivespay, andway atwhay ethay atestay omplainscay ofway; ehay arnsway imhay
orfay ethay uturefay otay avoidway allway oundsgray ofway uspicionsay; ehay ayssay atthay ehay
ardonspay ethay astpay, orfay ethay akesay ofway ishay otherbray, Ivitiacusday. Ehay etssay iesspay
overway Umnorixday atthay ehay aymay ebay ableway otay owknay atwhay ehay oesday, andway ithway omwhay ehay
ommunicatescay.

Ixxay.Eingbay onway ethay amesay ayday informedway ybay ishay outsscay atthay ethay enemyway adhay
encampedway atway ethay ootfay ofway away ountainmay eightway ilesmay omfray ishay ownway ampcay, ehay
entsay ersonspay otay ascertainway atwhay ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountainmay asway, andway ofway
atwhay indkay ethay ascentway onway everyway idesay. Ordway asway oughtbray ackbay atthay itway asway
easyway. Uringday ethay irdthay atchway ehay ordersway Itustay Abienuslay, ishay ieutenantlay
ithway aetorianpray owerspay, otay ascendway otay ethay ighesthay idgeray ofway ethay ountainmay
ithway otway egionslay, andway ithway osethay asway uidesgay owhay adhay examinedway ethay oadray; ehay
explainsway atwhay ishay anplay isway. Ehay imselfhay uringday ethay ourthfay atchway, astenshay
otay emthay ybay ethay amesay outeray ybay ichwhay ethay enemyway adhay onegay, andway endssay onway allway
ethay avalrycay eforebay imhay. Ubliuspay Onsidiuscay, owhay asway eputedray otay ebay eryvay
experiencedway inway ilitarymay affairsway, andway adhay eenbay inway ethay armyway ofway Uciuslay
Ullasay, andway afterwardsway inway atthay ofway Arcusmay Assuscray, isway entsay orwardfay ithway
ethay outsscay.

Iixxay.Atway aydayeakbray, enwhay ethay ummitsay ofway ethay ountainmay asway inway ethay
ossessionpay ofway Itustay Abienuslay, andway ehay imselfhay asway otnay urtherfay offway anthay away
ilemay andway alfhay omfray ethay enemy'sway ampcay, ornay, asway ehay afterwardsway ascertainedway
omfray ethay aptivescay, adhay eitherway ishay arrivalway orway atthay ofway Abienuslay eenbay
iscoveredday; Onsidiuscay, ithway ishay orsehay atway ullfay allopgay, omescay upway otay imhay
ayssay atthay ethay ountainmay ichwhay ehay Aesarcay ishedway ouldshay ebay eizedsay ybay
Abienuslay, isway inway ossessionpay ofway ethay enemyway; atthay ehay ashay iscoveredday isthay ybay
ethay Allicgay armsway andway ensignsway. Aesarcay eadslay offway ishay orcesfay otay ethay extnay
illhay andway awsdray emthay upway inway attlebayorderway. Abienuslay, asway ehay adhay eenbay
orderedway ybay Aesarcay otnay otay omecay otay anway engagementway unlessway Aesar'scay ownway
orcesfay ereway eensay earnay ethay enemy'sway ampcay, atthay ethay attackway uponway ethay enemyway
ightmay ebay ademay onway everyway idesay atway ethay amesay imetay, asway, afterway avinghay akentay
ossessionpay ofway ethay ountainmay, aitingway orfay ourway enmay, andway efrainingray omfray
attlebay. Enwhay, atway engthlay, ethay ayday asway arfay advancedway, Aesarcay earnedlay
oughthray iesspay atthay ethay ountainmay asway inway ossessionpay ofway ishay ownway enmay, andway
atthay ethay Elvetiihay adhay ovedmay eirthay ampcay, andway atthay Onsidiuscay, uckstray ithway
earfay, adhay eportedray otay imhay, asway eensay, atthay ichwhay ehay adhay otnay eensay. Onway atthay
ayday ehay ollowsfay ethay enemyway atway ishay usualway istanceday, andway itchespay ishay ampcay
eethray ilesmay omfray eirsthay.

Iiixxay.Ethay extnay ayday asway erethay emainedray inway allway onlyway otway ays'day acespay otay
ethay imetay enwhay ehay ustmay ervesay outway ethay orncay otay ishay armyway, andway asway ehay asway otnay
oremay anthay eighteenway ilesmay omfray Ibractebay, ybay arfay ethay argestlay andway estbayoredstay
owntay ofway ethay Aeduiway ehay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway otay ovidepray orfay away
upplysay ofway orncay; andway ivertedday ishay archmay omfray ethay Elvetiihay, andway advancedway
apidlyray otay Ibractebay. Isthay ircumstancecay isway eportedray otay ethay enemyway ybay omesay
esertersday omfray Uciuslay Aemiliusway, away aptaincay ofway ethay Allicgay orsehay. Ethay
Elvetiihay, eitherway ecausebay eythay oughtthay atthay ethay Omansray, uckstray ithway
errortay, ereway etreatingray omfray emthay, ethay oremay osay, asway ethay ayday eforebay,
oughthay eythay adhay eizedsay onway ethay igherhay oundsgray, eythay adhay otnay oinedjay
attlebay; orway ecausebay eythay atteredflay emselvesthay atthay eythay ightmay ebay utcay offway
omfray ethay ovisionspray, alteringway eirthay anplay andway angingchay eirthay outeray, eganbay
otay ursuepay andway otay annoyway ourway enmay inway ethay earray.

Ivxxay.Aesarcay, enwhay ehay observesway isthay, awsdray offway ishay orcesfay otay ethay extnay
illhay, andway entsay ethay avalrycay otay ustainsay ethay attackway ofway ethay enemyway. Ehay
imselfhay, eanwhilemay, ewdray upway onway ethay iddlemay ofway ethay illhay away ipletray inelay ofway
ishay ourfay eteranvay egionslay inway uchsay away annermay atthay ehay acedplay aboveway imhay onway
ethay eryvay ummitsay ethay otway egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay atelylay eviedlay inway Itherhay
Aulgay, andway allway ethay auxiliariesway; andway ehay orderedway atthay ethay olewhay ountainmay
ouldshay ebay overedcay ithway enmay, andway atthay eanwhilemay ethay aggagebay ouldshay ebay
oughtbray ogethertay intoway oneway aceplay, andway ethay ositionpay ebay otectedpray ybay osethay
owhay ereway ostedpay inway ethay upperway inelay. Ethay Elvetiihay, avinghay ollowedfay ithway
allway eirthay aggonsway, ollectedcay eirthay aggagebay intoway oneway aceplay eythay
emselvesthay, afterway avinghay epulsedray ourway avalrycay andway ormedfay away alanxphay,
advancedway upway otay ourway ontfray inelay inway eryvay oseclay orderway.

Xxvay.Aesarcay, avinghay emovedray outway ofway ightsay irstfay ishay ownway orsehay, enthay
osethay ofway allway, atthay ehay ightmay akemay ethay angerday ofway allway equalway, andway oday awayway
ithway ethay opehay ofway ightflay, afterway encouragingway ishay enmay, oinedjay attlebay. Ishay
oldierssay, urlinghay eirthay avelinsjay omfray ethay igherhay oundgray, easilyway okebray
ethay enemy'sway alanxphay. Atthay eingbay ispersedday, eythay ademay away argechay onway emthay
ithway awndray ordssway. Itway asway away eatgray indrancehay otay ethay Aulsgay inway ightingfay,
atthay, enwhay everalsay ofway eirthay ucklersbay adhay eenbay ybay oneway okestray ofway ethay
Omanray avelinsjay iercedpay oughthray andway innedpay astfay ogethertay, asway ethay ointpay
ofway ethay ironway adhay entbay itselfway, eythay ouldcay eithernay uckplay itway outway, ornay, ithway
eirthay eftlay andhay entangledway, ightfay ithway ufficientsay easeway; osay atthay anymay,
afterway avinghay onglay ossedtay eirthay armway aboutway, osechay atherray otay astcay awayway ethay
ucklerbay omfray eirthay andhay, andway otay ightfay ithway eirthay ersonpay unprotectedway. Atway
engthlay, ornway outway ithway oundsway, eythay eganbay otay ivegay ayway, andway asway erethay asway
inway ethay eighbourhoodnay away ountainmay aboutway away ilemay offway, otay etakebay emselvesthay
itherthay. Enwhay ethay ountainmay adhay eenbay ainedgay, andway ourway enmay ereway advancingway
upway, ethay Oiibay andway Ulingitay, owhay ithway aboutway 15,000 enmay osedclay ethay enemy'sway
inelay ofway archmay andway ervedsay asway away uardgay otay eirthay earray, avinghay assailedway ourway
enmay onway ethay exposedway ankflay asway eythay advancedway eparedpray otay urroundsay emthay;
uponway eeingsay ichwhay, ethay Elvetiihay, owhay adhay etakenbay emselvesthay otay ethay
ountainmay, eganbay otay esspray onway againway andway enewray ethay attlebay. Ethay Omansray
avinghay acedfay aboutway, advancedway otay ethay attackway inway otway ivisionsday; ethay irstfay
andway econdsay inelay otay ithstandway osethay owhay adhay eenbay efeatedday andway ivendray offway
ethay ieldfay; ethay irdthay otay eceiveray osethay owhay ereway ustjay arrivingway.

Ixxvay.Usthay asway ethay ontestcay onglay andway igorouslyvay arriedcay onway ithway oubtfulday
uccesssay. Enwhay eythay ouldcay onay ongerlay ithstandway ethay attacksway ofway ourway enmay, ethay
oneway ivisionday, asway eythay adhay egunbay otay oday, etookbay emselvesthay otay ethay
ountainmay; ethay otherway epairedray otay eirthay aggagebay andway aggonsway. Orfay uringday
ethay olewhay ofway isthay attlebay, althoughway ethay ightfay astedlay omfray ethay eventhsay
ourhay _i.eway._ 12 oonnay1 .. otay eventideway, onay oneway ouldcay eesay anway enemyway
ithway ishay ackbay urnedtay. Ethay ightfay asway arriedcay onway alsoway atway ethay aggagebay illtay
atelay inway ethay ightnay, orfay eythay adhay etsay aggonsway inway ethay ayway asway away ampartray, andway
omfray ethay igherhay oundgray eptkay owingthray eaponsway uponway ourway enmay, asway eythay amecay
onway, andway omesay omfray etweenbay ethay aggonsway andway ethay eelswhay eptkay artingday eirthay
anceslay andway avelinsjay omfray eneathbay, andway oundingway ourway enmay. Afterway ethay ightfay
adhay astedlay omesay imetay, ourway enmay ainedgay ossessionpay ofway eirthay aggagebay andway
ampcay. Erethay ethay aughterday andway oneway ofway ethay onssay ofway Orgetorixway ereway akentay.
Afterway atthay attlebay aboutway 130,000 enmay ofway ethay enemyway emainedray aliveway, owhay
archedmay incessantlyway uringday ethay olewhay ofway atthay ightnay; andway afterway away archmay
iscontinuedday orfay onay artpay ofway ethay ightnay, arrivedway inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Ingoneslay onway ethay ourthfay ayday, ilstwhay ourway enmay, avinghay oppedstay orfay eethray
aysday, othbay onway accountway ofway ethay oundsway ofway ethay oldierssay andway ethay urialbay ofway
ethay ainslay, adhay otnay eenbay ableway otay ollowfay emthay. Aesarcay entsay etterslay andway
essengersmay otay ethay Ingoneslay ithway ordersway atthay eythay ouldshay otnay assistway
emthay ithway orncay orway ithway anythingway elseway; orfay atthay ifway eythay ouldshay assistway
emthay, ehay ouldway egardray emthay inway ethay amesay ightlay asway ethay Elvetiihay. Afterway ethay
eethray ays'day intervalway ehay eganbay otay ollowfay emthay imselfhay ithway allway ishay
orcesfay.

Iixxvay.Ethay Elvetiihay, ompelledcay ybay ethay antway ofway everythingway, entsay
ambassadorsway otay imhay aboutway away urrendersay. Enwhay esethay adhay etmay imhay inway ethay ayway
andway adhay ownthray emselvesthay atway ishay eetfay, andway eakingspay inway uppliantsay onetay
adhay ithway earstay uedsay orfay eacepay, andway enwhay ehay adhay orderedway emthay otay awaitway
ishay arrivalway, inway ethay aceplay erewhay eythay enthay ereway, eythay obeyedway ishay
ommandscay. Enwhay Aesarcay arrivedway atway atthay aceplay, ehay emandedday ostageshay, eirthay
armsway, andway ethay avesslay owhay adhay esertedday otay emthay. Ilstwhay osethay ingsthay areway
eingbay oughtsay orfay andway otgay ogethertay, afterway away ight'snay intervalway, aboutway 6000
enmay ofway atthay antoncay ichwhay isway alledcay ethay Erbigenevay, etherwhay errifiedtay ybay
earfay, estlay, afterway eliveringday upway eirthay armsway, eythay ouldshay uffersay
unishmentpay, orway elseway inducedway ybay ethay opehay ofway afetysay, ecausebay eythay upposedsay
atthay, amidway osay astvay away ultitudemay ofway osethay owhay adhay urrenderedsay emselvesthay,
_their_ ightflay ightmay eitherway ebay oncealedcay orway entirelyway overlookedway, avinghay
atway ightnayallfay epartedday outway ofway ethay ampcay ofway ethay Elvetiihay, astenedhay otay ethay
Inerhay andway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Ermansgay.

Iiixxvay.Utbay enwhay Aesarcay iscoveredday isthay, ehay ommandedcay osethay oughthray
osewhay erritoriestay eythay adhay onegay, otay eeksay emthay, outway andway otay ingbray emthay
ackbay againway, ifway eythay eantmay otay ebay acquittedway eforebay imhay; andway onsideredcay
emthay, enwhay oughtbray ackbay, inway ethay ightlay ofway enemiesway; ehay admittedway allway ethay
estray otay away urrendersay, uponway eirthay eliveringday upway ethay ostageshay, armsway, andway
esertersday. Ehay orderedway ethay Elvetiihay, ethay Ulingitay, andway ethay Atobrigilay otay
eturnray otay eirthay erritoriestay omfray ichwhay eythay adhay omecay, andway asway erethay asway
atway omehay othingnay erebywhay eythay ightmay upportsay eirthay ungerhay, allway ethay
oductionspray ofway ethay earthway avinghay eenbay estroyedday, ehay ommandedcay ethay
Allobrogesway otay etlay emthay avehay away entifulplay upplysay ofway orncay; andway orderedway emthay
otay ebuildray ethay ownstay andway illagesvay ichwhay eythay adhay urntbay. Isthay ehay idday,
ieflychay onway isthay accountway, ecausebay ehay asway unwillingway atthay ethay ountrycay, omfray
ichwhay ethay Elvetiihay adhay epartedday, ouldshay ebay untenantedway, estlay ethay Ermansgay,
owhay elldway onway ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay Inerhay, ouldshay, onway accountway ofway ethay
excellenceway ofway ethay andslay, osscray overway omfray eirthay ownway erritoriestay intoway
osethay ofway ethay Elvetiihay, andway ecomebay orderersbay uponway ethay ovincepray ofway Aulgay
andway ethay Allobrogesway. Ehay antedgray ethay etitionpay ofway ethay Aeduiway, atthay eythay
ightmay ettlesay ethay Oiibay, inway eirthay ownway _i.eway._ inway ethay Aeduanway erritoriestay,
asway esethay ereway ownknay otay ebay ofway istinguishedday alourvay otay omwhay eythay avegay
andslay, andway omwhay eythay afterwardsway admittedway otay ethay amesay atestay ofway ightsray andway
eedomfray asway emselvesthay.

Ixxxay.Inway ethay ampcay ofway ethay Elvetiihay, istslay ereway oundfay, awndray upway inway Eekgray
aracterschay, andway ereway oughtbray otay Aesarcay, inway ichwhay anway estimateway adhay eenbay
awndray upway, amenay ybay amenay, ofway ethay umbernay ichwhay adhay onegay orthfay omfray eirthay
ountrycay ofway osethay owhay ereway ableway otay earbay armsway; andway ikewiselay ethay oysbay, ethay
oldway enmay, andway ethay omenway, eparatelysay. Ofway allway ichwhay itemsway ethay otaltay asway

Ofway ethay _Helvetii_ itlay. ofway ethay eadshay ofway ethay Elvetiihay 263,000
Ofway ethay _Tulingi_                                       36,000
Ofway ethay _Latobrigi_                                     14,000
Ofway ethay _Rauraci_                                       23,000
Ofway ethay _Boii_                                          32,000
                                                      
Ethay umsay ofway allway amountedway otay                            368,000

Outway ofway esethay, uchsay asway ouldcay earbay armsway amountedway otay aboutway 92,000. Enwhay
ethay _census_ ofway osethay owhay eturnedray omehay asway akentay, asway Aesarcay adhay
ommandedcay, ethay umbernay asway oundfay otay ebay 110,000.

Xxxay.Enwhay ethay arway ithway ethay Elvetiihay asway oncludedcay, ambassadorsway omfray
almostway allway artspay ofway Aulgay, ethay iefschay ofway atesstay, assembledway otay
ongratulatecay Aesarcay, ayingsay atthay eythay ereway ellway awareway, atthay, althoughway
ehay adhay akentay engeancevay onway ethay Elvetiihay inway arway, orfay ethay oldway ongswray oneday
ybay emthay otay ethay Omanray eoplepay, etyay atthay ircumstancecay adhay appenedhay onay esslay
otay ethay enefitbay ofway ethay andlay ofway Aulgay anthay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, ecausebay ethay
Elvetiihay, ilewhay eirthay affairsway ereway ostmay ourishingflay, adhay uittedqay eirthay
ountrycay ithway ethay esignday ofway akingmay arway uponway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay, andway
eizingsay ethay overnmentgay ofway itway, andway electingsay, outway ofway away eatgray abundanceway,
atthay otspay orfay anway abodeway ichwhay eythay ouldshay udgejay otay ebay ethay ostmay onvenientcay
andway ostmay oductivepray ofway allway Aulgay, andway oldhay ethay estray ofway ethay atesstay asway
ibutariestray. Eythay equestedray atthay eythay ightmay ebay allowedway otay oclaimpray anway
assemblyway ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay orfay away articularpay ayday, andway otay oday atthay ithway
Aesar'scay ermissionpay, atingstay atthay eythay adhay omesay ingsthay ichwhay, ithway ethay
eneralgay onsentcay, eythay ishedway otay askway ofway imhay. Isthay equestray avinghay eenbay
antedgray, eythay appointedway away ayday orfay ethay assemblyway, andway ordainedway ybay anway oathway
ithway eachway otherway, atthay onay oneway ouldshay iscloseday eirthay eliberationsday
exceptway osethay otay omwhay isthay officeway ouldshay ebay assignedway ybay ethay eneralgay
assemblyway.

Ixxxay.Enwhay atthay assemblyway asway ismissedday, ethay amesay iefschay ofway atesstay, owhay
adhay eforebay eenbay otay Aesarcay, eturnedray, andway askedway atthay eythay ightmay ebay
allowedway otay eattray ithway imhay ivatelypray inway ecretsay oncerningcay ethay afetysay ofway
emselvesthay andway ofway allway. Atthay equestray avinghay eenbay obtainedway, eythay allway ewthray
emselvesthay inway earstay atway Aesar'scay eetfay, ayingsay atthay eythay onay esslay eggedbay
andway earnestlyway esiredday atthay atwhay eythay ightmay aysay ouldshay otnay ebay isclosedday
anthay atthay eythay ightmay obtainway osethay ingsthay ichwhay eythay ishedway orfay; inasmuchway
asway eythay awsay atthay, ifway away isclosureday ereway ademay, eythay ouldshay ebay utpay otay ethay
eatestgray orturestay. Orfay esethay Ivitiacusday ethay Aeduanway okespay andway oldtay imhay
Atthay erethay ereway otway artiespay inway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay atthay ethay Aeduiway oodstay
atway ethay eadhay ofway oneway ofway esethay, ethay Arverniway ofway ethay otherway. Afterway esethay adhay
eenbay iolentlyvay ugglingstray ithway oneway anotherway orfay ethay uperioritysay orfay anymay
earsyay, itway amecay otay asspay atthay ethay Ermansgay ereway alledcay inway orfay irehay ybay ethay
Arverniway andway ethay Equanisay. Atthay aboutway 15,000 ofway emthay _i.eway._ ofway ethay
Ermansgay adhay atway irstfay ossedcray ethay Inerhay utbay afterway atthay esethay ildway andway
avagesay enmay adhay ecomebay enamouredway ofway ethay andslay andway ethay efinementray andway ethay
abundanceway ofway ethay Aulsgay, oremay ereway oughtbray overway, atthay erethay ereway ownay asway
anymay asway 120,000 ofway emthay inway Aulgay atthay ithway esethay ethay Aeduiway andway eirthay
ependantsday adhay epeatedlyray uggledstray inway armsway, atthay eythay adhay eenbay outedray
andway adhay ustainedsay away eatgray alamitycayadhay ostlay allway eirthay obilitynay, allway
eirthay enatesay, allway eirthay avalrycay. Andway atthay okenbray ybay uchsay engagementsway andway
alamitiescay, althoughway eythay adhay ormerlyfay eenbay eryvay owerfulpay inway Aulgay, othbay
omfray eirthay ownway alourvay andway omfray ethay Omanray eople'spay ospitalityhay andway
iendshipfray, eythay ereway ownay ompelledcay otay ivegay ethay iefchay oblesnay ofway eirthay
atestay asway ostageshay otay ethay Equanisay, andway otay indbay eirthay atestay ybay anway oathway,
atthay eythay ouldway eithernay emandday ostageshay inway eturnray, ornay upplicatesay aidway
omfray ethay Omanray eoplepay, ornay efuseray otay ebay orfay everway underway eirthay aysway andway
empireway. Atthay ehay asway ethay onlyway oneway outway ofway allway ethay atestay ofway ethay Aeduiway owhay
ouldcay otnay ebay evailedpray uponway otay aketay ethay oathway orway otay ivegay ishay ildrenchay asway
ostageshay. Onway atthay accountway ehay adhay edflay omfray ishay atestay andway adhay onegay otay ethay
enatesay atway Omeray otay eseechbay aidway, asway ehay aloneway asway oundbay eithernay ybay oathway ornay
ostageshay. Utbay away orseway ingthay adhay efallenbay ethay ictoriousvay Equanisay anthay ethay
anquishedvay Aeduiway, orfay Ariovistusway, ethay ingkay ofway ethay Ermansgay, adhay ettledsay
inway eirthay erritoriestay, andway adhay eizedsay uponway away irdthay ofway eirthay andlay, ichwhay
asway ethay estbay inway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay, andway asway ownay orderingway emthay otay epartday
omfray anotherway irdthay artpay, ecausebay away ewfay onthsmay eviouslypray 24,000 enmay ofway
ethay Arudeshay adhay omecay otay imhay, orfay omwhay oomray andway ettlementssay ustmay ebay
ovidedpray. Ethay onsequencecay ouldway ebay, atthay inway away ewfay earsyay eythay ouldway allway
ebay ivendray omfray ethay erritoriestay ofway Aulgay, andway allway ethay Ermansgay ouldway osscray
ethay Inerhay; orfay eithernay ustmay ethay andlay ofway Aulgay ebay omparedcay ithway ethay andlay
ofway ethay Ermansgay, ornay ustmay ethay abithay ofway ivinglay ofway ethay atterlay ebay utpay onway away
evellay ithway atthay ofway ethay ormerfay. Oreovermay, asway orfay Ariovistusway, onay oonersay
idday ehay efeatday ethay orcesfay ofway ethay Aulsgay inway away attlebay, ichwhay ooktay aceplay atway
Agetobriamay, anthay ehay eganbay otay ordlay itway aughtilyhay andway uellycray, otay emandday
asway ostageshay ethay ildrenchay ofway allway ethay incipalpray oblesnay, andway eakwray onway emthay
everyway indkay ofway ueltycray, ifway everythingway asway otnay oneday atway ishay odnay orway
easureplay; atthay ehay asway away avagesay, assionatepay, andway ecklessray anmay, andway atthay
ishay ommandscay ouldcay onay ongerlay ebay ornebay. Unlessway erethay asway omesay aidway inway
Aesarcay andway ethay Omanray eoplepay, ethay Aulsgay ustmay allway oday ethay amesay ingthay atthay
ethay Elvetiihay adhay oneday, izvay. emigrateway omfray eirthay ountrycay, andway eeksay
anotherway ellingdway aceplay, otherway ettlementssay emoteray omfray ethay Ermansgay, andway
tryay ateverwhay ortunefay aymay allfay otay eirthay otlay. Ifway esethay ingsthay ereway otay ebay
isclosedday otay Ariovistusway, Ivitiacusday addsway atthay ehay oubtsday otnay atthay ehay
ouldway inflictway ethay ostmay everesay unishmentpay onway allway ethay ostageshay owhay areway inway
ishay ossessionpay, andway ayssay atthay Aesarcay ouldcay, eitherway ybay ishay ownway
influenceway andway ybay atthay ofway ishay armyway, orway ybay ishay atelay ictoryvay, orway ybay amenay ofway
ethay Omanray eoplepay, intimidateway imhay, osay asway otay eventpray away eatergray umbernay ofway
Ermansgay eingbay oughtbray overway ethay Inerhay, andway ouldcay otectpray allway Aulgay omfray
ethay outragesway ofway Ariovistusway.

Iixxxay.Enwhay isthay eechspay adhay eenbay eliveredday ybay Ivitiacusday, allway owhay ereway
esentpray eganbay ithway oudlay amentationlay otay entreatway assistanceway ofway Aesarcay.
Aesarcay oticednay atthay ethay Equanisay ereway ethay onlyway eoplepay ofway allway owhay idday onenay
ofway osethay ingsthay ichwhay ethay othersway idday, utbay, ithway eirthay eadshay owedbay ownday,
azedgay onway ethay earthway inway adnesssay. Onderingway atwhay asway ethay easonray ofway isthay
onductcay, ehay inquiredway ofway emselvesthay. Onay eplyray idday ethay Equanisay akemay, utbay
ilentlysay ontinuedcay inway ethay amesay adnesssay. Enwhay ehay adhay epeatedlyray
inquiredway ofway emthay andway ouldcay otnay elicitway anyway answerway atway allway, ethay amesay
Ivitiacusday ethay Aeduanway answeredway, atthayethay otlay ofway ethay Equanisay asway oremay
etchedwray andway ievousgray anthay atthay ofway ethay estray, onway isthay accountway, ecausebay
eythay aloneway urstday otnay evenway inway ecretsay omplaincay orway upplicatesay aidway; andway
udderedshay atway ethay ueltycray ofway Ariovistusway evenway enwhay absentway, ustjay asway ifway ehay
ereway esentpray; orfay, otay ethay estray, espiteday ofway everythingway, erethay asway anway
opportunityway ofway ightflay ivengay; utbay allway orturestay ustmay ebay enduredway ybay ethay
Equanisay, owhay adhay admittedway Ariovistusway ithinway eirthay erritoriestay, andway osewhay
ownstay ereway allway inway ishay owerpay.

Iiixxxay.Aesarcay, onway eingbay informedway ofway esethay ingsthay, eeredchay ethay indsmay ofway
ethay Aulsgay ithway ishay ordsway, andway omisedpray atthay isthay affairway ouldshay ebay anway
objectway ofway ishay oncerncay, ayingsay atthay ehay adhay eatgray opeshay atthay Ariovistusway,
inducedway othbay ybay ishay indnesskay andway ishay owerpay, ouldway utpay anway endway otay ishay
oppressionway. Afterway eliveringday isthay eechspay, ehay ismissedday ethay assemblyway;
andway, esidesbay osethay atementsstay, anymay ircumstancescay inducedway imhay otay inkthay
atthay isthay affairway oughtway otay ebay onsideredcay andway akentay upway ybay imhay; especiallyway
asway ehay awsay atthay ethay Aeduiway, ledstyay asway eythay adhay eenbay epeatedlyray ybay ethay
enatesay ethrenbray andway insmenkay, ereway eldhay inway ethay aldomthray andway ominionday
ofway ethay Ermansgay, andway understoodway atthay eirthay ostageshay ereway ithway Ariovistusway
andway ethay Equanisay, ichwhay inway osay ightymay anway empireway asway atthay ofway ethay Omanray
eoplepay ehay onsideredcay eryvay isgracefulday otay imselfhay andway ethay epublicray. Atthay,
oreovermay, ethay Ermansgay ouldshay ybay egreesday ecomebay accustomedway otay osscray ethay
Inerhay, andway atthay away eatgray odybay ofway emthay ouldshay omecay intoway Aulgay, ehay awsay
ouldway ebay angerousday otay ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway udgedjay atthay ildway andway
avagesay enmay ouldway otnay ebay ikelylay otay estrainray emselvesthay, afterway eythay adhay
ossessedpay emselvesthay ofway allway Aulgay, omfray oinggay orthfay intoway ethay ovincepray andway
encethay archingmay intoway Italyway asway ethay Imbricay andway Eutonestay adhay oneday eforebay
emthay, articularlypay asway ethay Onerhay asway ethay olesay arrierbay atthay eparatedsay
ethay Equanisay omfray ourway ovincepray. Againstway ichwhay eventsway ehay oughtthay ehay oughtway
otay ovidepray asway eedilyspay asway ossiblepay. Oreovermay, Ariovistusway, orfay ishay artpay,
adhay assumedway otay imselfhay uchsay idepray andway arroganceway atthay ehay asway eltfay otay ebay
uiteqay insufferableway.

Ivxxxay.Ehay ereforethay eterminedday otay endsay ambassadorsway otay Ariovistusway otay
emandday ofway imhay otay amenay omesay intermediateway otspay orfay away onferencecay etweenbay
ethay otway, ayingsay atthay ehay ishedway otay eattray ithway imhay onway atestayusinessbay andway
attersmay ofway ethay ighesthay importanceway otay othbay ofway emthay. Otay isthay embassyway
Ariovistusway epliedray, atthay ifway ehay imselfhay adhay adhay eednay ofway anythingway omfray
Aesarcay, ehay ouldway avehay onegay otay imhay; andway atthay ifway Aesarcay antedway anythingway
omfray imhay ehay oughtway otay omecay otay imhay. Atthay, esidesbay, eithernay areday ehay ogay
ithoutway anway armyway intoway osethay artspay ofway Aulgay ichwhay Aesarcay adhay ossessionpay ofway,
ornay ouldcay ehay, ithoutway eatgray expenseway andway oubletray, awdray ishay armyway ogethertay
otay oneway aceplay; atthay otay imhay, oreovermay, itway appearedway angestray atwhay usinessbay
eitherway Aesarcay orway ethay Omanray eoplepay atway allway adhay inway ishay ownway Aulgay, ichwhay ehay
adhay onqueredcay inway arway.

Vxxxay.Enwhay esethay answersway ereway eportedray otay Aesarcay, ehay endssay ambassadorsway
otay imhay away econdsay imetay ithway isthay essagemay Incesay, afterway avinghay eenbay eatedtray
ithway osay uchmay indnesskay ybay imselfhay andway ethay Omanray eoplepay asway ehay adhay inway ishay
onsulshipcay .. 59 eenbay ledstyay 'king andway iend'fray ybay ethay enatesay, ehay
akesmay isthay ecompenseray otay Aesarcay imselfhay andway ethay Omanray eoplepay, izvay.
atthay enwhay invitedway otay away onferencecay ehay emursday, andway oesday otnay inkthay atthay itway
oncernscay imhay otay adviseway andway informway imselfhay aboutway anway objectway ofway utualmay
interestway, esethay areway ethay ingsthay ichwhay ehay equiresray ofway imhay; irstfay, atthay ehay
oday otnay anyway oremay ingbray overway anyway odybay ofway enmay acrossway ethay Inerhay intoway Aulgay;
inway ethay extnay aceplay, atthay ehay estoreray ethay ostageshay ichwhay ehay ashay omfray ethay
Aeduiway, andway antgray ethay Equanisay ermissionpay otay estoreray otay emthay ithway ishay
onsentcay osethay ostageshay ichwhay eythay avehay, andway atthay ehay eithernay ovokepray ethay
Aeduiway ybay outrageway ornay akemay arway uponway emthay orway eirthay alliesway; ifway ehay ouldway
accordinglyway oday isthay, Aesarcay ayssay atthay ehay imselfhay andway ethay Omanray
eoplepay illway entertainway away erpetualpay eelingfay ofway avourfay andway iendshipfray
owardstay imhay; utbay atthay ifway ehay Aesarcay oesday otnay obtainway ishay esiresday, atthay
ehay orasmuchfay asway inway ethay onsulshipcay ofway Arcusmay Essalamay andway Arcusmay Isopay
.. 61 ethay enatesay adhay ecreedday atthay, oeverwhay ouldshay avehay ethay
administrationway ofway ethay ovincepray ofway Aulgay ouldshay, asway arfay asway ehay ouldcay oday osay
onsistentlycay ithway ethay interestsway ofway ethay epublicray, otectpray ethay Aeduiway andway
ethay otherway iendsfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay illway otnay overlookway ethay ongswray ofway
ethay Aeduiway.

Vixxxay.Otay isthay Ariovistusway epliedray, atthay ethay ightray ofway arway asway, atthay
eythay owhay adhay onqueredcay ouldshay overngay osethay omwhay eythay adhay onqueredcay, inway
atwhay annermay eythay easedplay; atthay inway atthay ayway ethay Omanray eoplepay ereway ontway otay
overngay ethay ationsnay ichwhay eythay adhay onqueredcay, otnay accordingway otay ethay
ictationday ofway anyway otherway, utbay accordingway otay eirthay ownway iscretionday. Ifway ehay orfay
ishay artpay idday otnay ictateday otay ethay Omanray eoplepay asway otay ethay annermay inway ichwhay
eythay ereway otay exerciseway eirthay ightray, ehay oughtway otnay otay ebay obstructedway ybay ethay
Omanray eoplepay inway ishay ightray; atthay ethay Aeduiway, inasmuchway asway eythay adhay iedtray
ethay ortunefay ofway arway andway adhay engagedway inway armsway andway eenbay onqueredcay, adhay
ecomebay ibutariestray otay imhay; atthay Aesarcay asway oingday away eatgray injusticeway, inway
atthay ybay ishay arrivalway ehay asway akingmay ishay evenuesray esslay aluablevay otay imhay;
atthay ehay ouldshay otnay estoreray eirthay ostageshay otay ethay Aeduiway, utbay ouldshay otnay
akemay arway ongfullywray eitherway uponway emthay orway eirthay alliesway, ifway eythay abidedway ybay
atthay ichwhay adhay eenbay agreedway onway, andway aidpay eirthay ibutetray annuallyway ifway eythay
idday _not_ ontinuecay otay oday atthay, ethay Omanray eople'spay amenay ofway 'brothers'
ouldway availway emthay oughtnay. Asway otay Aesar'scay eateningthray imhay atthay ebay ouldway
otnay overlookway ethay ongswray ofway ethay Aeduiway, ehay aidsay atthay onay oneway adhay everway
enteredway intoway away ontestcay ithway _him_ Ariovistusway ithoutway utterway uinray otay
imselfhay. Atthay Aesarcay ightmay enterway ethay istslay enwhay ehay osechay; ehay ouldway eelfay
atwhay ethay invincibleway Ermansgay, ellwayainedtray asway eythay ereway eyondbay allway
othersway otay armsway, owhay orfay ourteenfay earsyay adhay otnay eenbay eneathbay away oofray,
ouldcay achieveway ybay eirthay alourvay.

Viixxxay.Atway ethay amesay imetay atthay isthay essagemay asway eliveredday otay Aesarcay,
ambassadorsway amecay omfray ethay Aeduiway andway ethay Eviritray; omfray ethay Aeduiway otay
omplaincay atthay ethay Arudeshay, owhay adhay atelylay eenbay oughtbray overway intoway Aulgay,
ereway avagingray eirthay erritoriestay; atthay eythay adhay otnay eenbay ableway otay urchasepay
eacepay omfray Ariovistusway, evenway ybay ivinggay ostageshay andway omfray ethay Eviritray,
otay atestay atthay away undredhay antonscay ofway ethay Uevisay adhay encampedway onway ethay anksbay
ofway ethay Inerhay, andway ereway attemptingway otay osscray itway; atthay ethay othersbray, Asuasnay
andway Imberiuscay, eadedhay emthay. Eingbay eatlygray alarmedway atway esethay ingsthay,
Aesarcay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway otay useway allway espatchday, estlay, ifway isthay ewnay andbay
ofway Uevisay ouldshay uniteway ithway ethay oldway oopstray ofway Ariovistusway, ehay Ariovistusway
ightmay ebay esslay easilyway ithstoodway. Avinghay, ereforethay, asway uicklyqay asway ehay
ouldcay, ovidedpray away upplysay ofway orncay, ehay astenedhay otay Ariovistusway ybay orcedfay
archesmay.

Viiixxxay.Enwhay ehay adhay oceededpray eethray ays'day ourneyjay, ordway asway oughtbray otay
imhay atthay Ariovistusway asway asteninghay ithway allway ishay orcesfay otay eizesay onway
Esontiovay, ichwhay isway ethay argestlay owntay ofway ethay Equanisay, andway adhay advancedway
eethray ays'day ourneyjay omfray ishay erritoriestay. Aesarcay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway
otay aketay ethay eatestgray ecautionspray estlay isthay ouldshay appenhay, orfay erethay asway
inway atthay owntay away ostmay ampleway upplysay ofway everythingway ichwhay asway erviceablesay orfay
arway; andway osay ortifiedfay asway itway ybay ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray asway otay affordway away
eatgray acilityfay orfay otractingpray ethay arway, inasmuchway asway ethay iverray Oubsday
almostway urroundssay ethay olewhay owntay, asway oughthay itway ereway acedtray oundray itway ithway
away airpay ofway ompassescay. Away ountainmay ofway eatgray eighthay utsshay inway ethay emainingray
acespay, ichwhay isway otnay oremay anthay 600 eetfay, erewhay ethay iverray eaveslay away apgay, inway
uchsay away annermay atthay ethay ootsray ofway atthay ountainmay extendway otay ethay iver'sray ankbay
onway eitherway idesay. Away allway ownthray aroundway itway akesmay away itadelcay ofway isthay
ountainmay, andway onnectscay itway ithway ethay owntay. Itherhay Aesarcay astenshay ybay
orcedfay archesmay ybay ightnay andway ayday, andway, afterway avinghay eizedsay ethay owntay,
ationsstay away arrisongay erethay.

Ixxxxay.Ilstwhay ehay isway arryingtay away ewfay aysday atway Esontiovay, onway accountway ofway orncay
andway ovisionspray; omfray ethay inquiriesway ofway ourway enmay andway ethay eportsray ofway ethay
Aulsgay andway aderstray owhay assertedway atthay ethay Ermansgay ereway enmay ofway ugehay
aturestay, ofway incredibleway alourvay andway acticepray inway armsway, atthay ofttimesway eythay,
onway encounteringway emthay, ouldcay otnay earbay evenway eirthay ountenancecay, andway ethay
iercenessfay ofway eirthay eyeswayosay eatgray away anicpay onway away uddensay eizedsay ethay olewhay
armyway, asway otay iscomposeday ethay indsmay andway iritsspay ofway allway inway onay ightslay egreeday.
Isthay irstfay aroseway omfray ethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay, ethay efectspray andway ethay
estray, owhay, avinghay ollowedfay Aesarcay omfray ethay itycay Omeray omfray otivesmay ofway
iendshipfray, adhay onay eatgray experienceway inway ilitarymay affairsway. Andway allegingway,
omesay ofway emthay oneway easonray, omesay anotherway, ichwhay eythay aidsay ademay itway ecessarynay
orfay emthay otay epartday, eythay equestedray atthay ybay ishay onsentcay eythay ightmay ebay
allowedway otay ithdrawway; omesay, influencedway ybay ameshay, ayedstay ehindbay inway orderway
atthay eythay ightmay avoidway ethay uspicionsay ofway owardicecay. Esethay ouldcay eithernay
omposecay eirthay ountenancecay, ornay evenway ometimessay eckchay eirthay earstay utbay
iddenhay inway eirthay entstay, eitherway ewailedbay eirthay atefay, orway eploredday ithway
eirthay omradescay ethay eneralgay angerday. Illsway ereway ealedsay universallyway
oughoutthray ethay olewhay ampcay. Ybay ethay expressionsway andway owardicecay ofway esethay
enmay, evenway osethay owhay ossessedpay eatgray experienceway inway ethay ampcay, othbay
oldierssay andway enturionscay, andway osethay ethay ecurionsday owhay ereway inway ommandcay
ofway ethay avalrycay, ereway aduallygray isconcertedday. Uchsay ofway emthay asway ishedway otay
ebay onsideredcay esslay alarmedway, aidsay atthay eythay idday otnay eaddray ethay enemyway, utbay
earedfay ethay arrownessnay ofway ethay oadsray andway ethay astnessvay ofway ethay orestsfay ichwhay
aylay etweenbay emthay andway Ariovistusway, orway elseway atthay ethay uppliessay ouldcay otnay ebay
oughtbray upway eadilyray enoughway. Omesay evenway eclaredday otay Aesarcay atthay enwhay ehay
avegay ordersway orfay ethay ampcay otay ebay ovedmay andway ethay oopstray otay advanceway, ethay
oldierssay ouldway otnay ebay obedientway otay ethay ommandcay, ornay advanceway inway
onsequencecay ofway eirthay earfay.

Lxay.Enwhay Aesarcay observedway esethay ingsthay, avinghay alledcay away ouncilcay, andway
ummonedsay otay itway ethay enturionscay ofway allway ethay ompaniescay, ehay everelysay
eprimandedray emthay, articularlypay orfay upposingsay atthay itway elongedbay otay emthay
otay inquireway orway onjecturecay, eitherway inway atwhay irectionday eythay ereway archingmay,
orway ithway atwhay objectway. Atthay Ariovistusway, uringday ishay Aesar'scay onsulshipcay,
adhay ostmay anxiouslyway oughtsay afterway ethay iendshipfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay; whyay
ouldshay anyway oneway udgejay atthay ehay ouldway osay ashlyray epartday omfray ishay utyday? Ehay
orfay ishay artpay asway ersuadedpay atthay, enwhay ishay emandsday ereway ownknay andway ethay
airnessfay ofway ethay ermstay onsideredcay, ehay ouldway ejectray eithernay ishay ornay ethay
Omanray eople'spay avourfay. Utbay evenway ifway, ivendray onway ybay ageray andway adnessmay, ehay
ouldshay akemay arway uponway emthay, atwhay afterway allway ereway eythay afraidway ofway?orway whyay
ouldshay eythay espairday eitherway ofway eirthay ownway alourvay orway ofway ishay ealzay? Ofway atthay
enemyway away ialtray adhay eenbay ademay ithinway ourway athers'fay ecollectionray, enwhay, onway
ethay efeatday ofway ethay Imbricay andway Eutonestay ybay Aiuscay Ariusmay, ethay armyway asway
egardedray asway avinghay eservedday onay esslay aisepray anthay eirthay ommandercay imselfhay.
Itway adhay eenbay ademay atelylay, ootay, inway Italyway; uringday ethay ebellionray ofway ethay
avesslay, omwhay, oweverhay, ethay experienceway andway ainingtray ichwhay eythay adhay
eceivedray omfray usway, assistedway inway omesay espectray. Omfray ichwhay away udgmentjay ightmay
ebay ormedfay ofway ethay advantagesway ichwhay esolutionray arriescay ithway itway,inasmuchway
asway osethay omwhay orfay omesay imetay eythay adhay oundlesslygray eadeddray enwhay unarmedway,
eythay adhay afterwardsway anquishedvay, enwhay ellway armedway andway ushedflay ithway
uccesssay. Inway ortshay, atthay esethay ereway ethay amesay enmay omwhay ethay Elvetiihay, inway
equentfray encountersway, otnay onlyway inway eirthay ownway erritoriestay, utbay alsoway inway
eirsthay ethay Ermangay, avehay enerallygay anquishedvay, andway etyay annotcay avehay eenbay
away atchmay orfay ourway armyway. Ifway ethay unsuccessfulway attlebay andway ightflay ofway ethay Aulsgay
isquietedday anyway, esethay, ifway eythay ademay inquiriesway, ightmay iscoverday atthay, enwhay
ethay Aulsgay adhay eenbay iredtay outway ybay ethay onglay urationday ofway ethay arway,
Ariovistusway, afterway ehay adhay anymay onthsmay eptkay imselfhay inway ishay ampcay andway inway ethay
arshesmay, andway adhay ivengay onay opportunityway orfay anway engagementway, ellfay uddenlysay
uponway emthay, ybay isthay imetay espairingday ofway away attlebay andway atteredscay inway allway
irectionsday, andway asway ictoriousvay oremay oughthray atagemstray andway unningcay anthay
alourvay. Utbay oughthay erethay adhay eenbay oomray orfay uchsay atagemstray againstway avagesay
andway unskilledway enmay, otnay evenway Ariovistusway imselfhay expectedway atthay erebythay
ourway armiesway ouldcay ebay entrappedway. Atthay osethay owhay ascribedway eirthay earfay otay away
etencepray aboutway ethay eficiencyday ofway uppliessay andway ethay arrownessnay ofway ethay
oadsray, actedway esumptuouslypray, asway eythay eemedsay eitherway otay istrustday eirthay
eneral'sgay ischargeday ofway ishay utyday, orway otay ictateday otay imhay. Atthay esethay ingsthay
ereway ishay oncerncay; atthay ethay Equanisay, ethay Eucilay, andway ethay Ingoneslay ereway otay
urnishfay ethay orncay; andway atthay itway asway alreadyway iperay inway ethay ieldsfay; atthay asway otay
ethay oadray eythay ouldway oonsay ebay ableway otay udgejay orfay emselvesthay. Asway otay itsway
eingbay eportedray atthay ethay oldierssay ouldway otnay ebay obedientway otay ommandcay, orway
advanceway, ehay asway otnay atway allway isturbedday atway atthay; orfay ehay ewknay atthay inway ethay
asecay ofway allway osethay osewhay armyway adhay otnay eenbay obedientway otay ommandcay, eitherway
uponway omesay ismanagementmay ofway anway affairway, ortunefay adhay esertedday emthay, orway,
atthay uponway omesay imecray eingbay iscoveredday, ovetousnesscay adhay eenbay earlyclay
ovedpray againstway emthay. Ishay integrityway adhay eenbay eensay oughoutthray ishay olewhay
ifelay, ishay oodgay ortunefay inway ethay arway ithway ethay Elvetiihay. Atthay ehay ouldway
ereforethay instantlyway etsay aboutway atwhay ehay adhay intendedway otay utpay offway illtay away
oremay istantday ayday, andway ouldway eakbray upway ishay ampcay ethay extnay ightnay, inway ethay
ourthfay atchway, atthay ehay ightmay ascertainway, asway oonsay asway ossiblepay, etherwhay away
ensesay ofway onourhay andway utyday, orway etherwhay earfay adhay oremay influenceway ithway emthay.
Utbay atthay, ifway onay oneway elseway ouldshay ollowfay, etyay ehay ouldway ogay ithway onlyway ethay
enthtay egionlay, ofway ichwhay ehay adhay onay isgivingsmay, andway itway ouldshay ebay ishay
aetorianpray ohortcay.Isthay egionlay Aesarcay adhay othbay eatlygray avouredfay, andway
inway itway, onway accountway ofway itsway alourvay, acedplay ethay eatestgray onfidencecay.

Ixlay.Uponway ethay eliveryday ofway isthay eechspay, ethay indsmay ofway allway ereway angedchay inway
away urprisingsay, annermay, andway ethay ighesthay ardourway andway eagernessway orfay
osecutingpray ethay arway ereway engenderedway; andway ethay enthtay egionlay asway ethay irstfay
otay eturnray anksthay otay imhay, oughthray eirthay ilitarymay ibunestray, orfay ishay avinghay
expressedway isthay ostmay avourablefay opinionway ofway emthay; andway assuredway imhay atthay
eythay ereway uiteqay eadyray otay osecutepray ethay arway. Enthay, ethay otherway egionslay
endeavouredway, oughthray eirthay ilitarymay ibunestray andway ethay enturionscay ofway ethay
incipalpray ompaniescay, otay excuseway emselvesthay otay Aesarcay, ayingsay atthay eythay
adhay evernay eitherway oubtedday orway earedfay, orway upposedsay atthay ethay eterminationday
ofway ethay onductcay ofway ethay arway asway eirsthay andway otnay eirthay eneral'sgay. Avinghay
acceptedway eirthay excuseway, andway avinghay adhay ethay oadray arefullycay econnoitredray ybay
Ivitiacusday, ecausebay inway imhay ofway allway othersway ehay adhay ethay eatestgray aithfay, ehay
oundfay atthay ybay away ircuitouscay outeray ofway oremay anthay iftyfay ilesmay ehay ightmay eadlay
ishay armyway oughthray openway artspay; ehay enthay etsay outway inway ethay ourthfay atchway, asway ehay
adhay aidsay ehay ouldway. Onway ethay eventhsay ayday, asway ehay idday otnay iscontinueday ishay
archmay, ehay asway informedway ybay outsscay atthay ethay orcesfay ofway Ariovistusway ereway onlyway
ourfay andway entytway ilesmay istantday omfray oursway.

Iixlay.Uponway eingbay apprisedway ofway Aesar'scay arrivalway, Ariovistusway endssay
ambassadorsway otay imhay, ayingsay atthay atwhay ehay adhay eforebay equestedray asway otay away
onferencecay, ightmay ownay, asway arfay asway ishay ermissionpay entway, aketay aceplay, incesay
ehay Aesarcay adhay approachedway earernay, andway ehay onsideredcay atthay ehay ightmay ownay
oday itway ithoutway angerday. Aesarcay idday otnay ejectray ethay oposalpray andway eganbay otay
inkthay atthay ehay asway ownay eturningray otay away ationalray atestay ofway indmay, asway ehay
ontaneouslyspay offeredpray atthay ichwhay ehay adhay eviouslypray efusedray otay imhay enwhay
equestingray itway; andway asway inway eatgray opeshay atthay, inway onsiderationcay ofway ishay ownway
andway ethay Omanray eople'spay eatgray avoursfay owardstay imhay, ethay issueway ouldway ebay
atthay ehay ouldway esistday omfray ishay obstinacyway uponway ishay emandsday eingbay ademay
ownknay. Ethay ifthfay ayday afterway atthay asway appointedway asway ethay ayday ofway onferencecay.
Eanwhilemay, asway ambassadorsway ereway eingbay oftenway entsay otay andway ofray etweenbay emthay,
Ariovistusway emandedday atthay Aesarcay ouldshay otnay ingbray anyway ootfayoldiersay ithway
imhay otay ethay onferencecay, ayingsay atthay ehay asway afraidway ofway eingbay ensnaredway ybay
imhay oughthray eacherytray; atthay othbay ouldshay omecay accompaniedway ybay avalrycay;
atthay ehay ouldway otnay omecay onway anyway otherway onditioncay. Aesarcay, asway ehay eithernay
ishedway atthay ethay onferencecay ouldshay, ybay anway excuseway ownthray inway ethay ayway, ebay
etsay asideway, ornay urstday usttray ishay ifelay otay ethay avalrycay ofway ethay Aulsgay, ecidedday
atthay itway ouldway ebay ostmay expedientway otay aketay awayway omfray ethay Allicgay avalrycay allway
eirthay orseshay, andway ereonthay otay ountmay ethay egionarylay oldierssay ofway ethay enthtay
egionlay, inway ichwhay ehay acedplay ethay eatestgray onfidencecay; inway orderway atthay ehay
ightmay avehay away odybayuardgay asway ustworthytray asway ossiblepay, ouldshay erethay ebay anyway
eednay orfay actionway. Andway enwhay isthay asway oneday, oneway ofway ethay oldierssay ofway ethay
enthtay egionlay aidsay, otnay ithoutway away ouchtay ofway umourhay, atthay Aesarcay idday oremay
orfay emthay anthay ehay adhay omisedpray; ehay adhay omisedpray otay avehay ethay enthtay egionlay
inway aceplay ofway ishay aetorianpray ohortcay; utbay ehay ownay onvertedcay emthay intoway
orsehay.

Iiixlay.Erethay asway away argelay ainplay, andway inway itway away oundmay ofway earthway ofway
onsiderablecay izesay. Isthay otspay asway atway earlynay anway equalway istanceday omfray othbay
ampscay. Itherthay, asway adhay eenbay appointedway, eythay amecay orfay ethay onferencecay.
Aesarcay ationedstay ethay egionlay, ichwhay ehay adhay oughtbray ithway imhay onway
orsebackhay, 200 acespay omfray isthay oundmay. Ethay avalrycay ofway Ariovistusway alsoway
ooktay eirthay andstay atway anway equalway istanceday. Ariovistusway enthay emandedday atthay
eythay ouldshay onfercay onway orsebackhay, andway atthay, esidesbay emselvesthay, eythay
ouldshay ingbray ithway emthay entay enmay eachway otay ethay onferencecay. Enwhay eythay ereway
omecay otay ethay aceplay, Aesarcay, inway ethay openingway ofway ishay eechspay, etailedday ishay
ownway andway ethay enate'ssay avoursfay owardstay imhay Ariovistusway, inway atthay ehay adhay
eenbay ledstyay ingkay, inway atthay ehay adhay eenbay ledstyay iendfray, ybay ethay enatesay
inway atthay eryvay onsiderablecay esentspray adhay eenbay entsay imhay; ichwhay ircumstancecay
ehay informedway imhay adhay othbay allenfay otay ethay otlay ofway ewfay, andway adhay usuallyway eenbay
estowedbay inway onsiderationcay ofway importantway ersonalpay ervicessay; atthay ehay,
althoughway ehay adhay eithernay anway introductionway, ornay away ustjay oundgray orfay ethay
equestray, adhay obtainedway esethay onourshay oughthray ethay indnesskay andway unificencemay
ofway imselfhay Aesarcay andway ethay enatesay. Ehay informedway imhay ootay, owhay oldway andway owhay
ustjay ereway ethay oundsgray ofway onnexioncay atthay existedway etweenbay emselvesthay ethay
Omansray andway ethay Aeduiway, atwhay ecreesday ofway ethay enatesay adhay eenbay assedpay inway
eirthay avourfay, andway owhay equentfray andway owhay onourablehay; owhay omfray imetay
immemorialway ethay Aeduiway adhay eldhay ethay upremacysay ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay; evenway
aidsay Aesarcay eforebay eythay adhay oughtsay ourway iendshipfray; atthay itway asway ethay
ustomcay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay otay esireday otnay onlyway atthay itsway alliesway andway
iendsfray ouldshay oselay onenay ofway eirthay opertypray, utbay ebay advancedway inway
influenceway, ignityday, andway onourhay owhay enthay ouldcay endureway atthay atwhay eythay adhay
oughtbray ithway emthay otay ethay iendshipfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, ouldshay ebay orntay
omfray emthay? Ehay enthay ademay ethay amesay emandsday ichwhay ehay adhay ommissionedcay ethay
ambassadorsway otay akemay, atthay Ariovistusway ouldshay otnay akemay arway eitherway uponway
ethay Aeduiway orway eirthay alliesway, atthay ehay ouldshay estoreray ethay ostageshay; atthay, ifway
ehay ouldcay otnay endsay ackbay otay eirthay ountrycay anyway artpay ofway ethay Ermansgay, ehay
ouldshay atway allway eventsway uffersay onenay ofway emthay anyway oremay otay osscray ethay Inerhay.

Ivxlay.Ariovistusway epliedray ieflybray otay ethay emandsday ofway Aesarcay; utbay
expatiatedway argelylay onway ishay ownway irtuesvay, atthay ehay adhay ossedcray ethay Inerhay
otnay ofway ishay ownway accordway, utbay onway eingbay invitedway andway entsay orfay ybay ethay Aulsgay;
atthay ehay adhay otnay eftlay omehay andway indredkay ithoutway eatgray expectationsway andway
eatgray ewardsray; atthay ehay adhay ettlementssay inway Aulgay, antedgray ybay ethay Aulsgay
emselvesthay; atthay ethay ostageshay adhay eenbay ivengay ybay eirthay ownway oodgayillway;
atthay ehay ooktay ybay ightray ofway arway ethay ibutetray ichwhay onquerorscay areway accustomedway
otay imposeway onway ethay onqueredcay; atthay ehay adhay otnay ademay arway uponway ethay Aulsgay, utbay
ethay Aulsgay uponway imhay; atthay allway ethay atesstay ofway Aulgay amecay otay attackway imhay, andway
adhay encampedway againstway imhay; atthay allway eirthay orcesfay adhay eenbay outedray andway
eatenbay ybay imhay inway away inglesay attlebay; atthay ifway eythay osechay otay akemay away econdsay
ialtray, ehay asway eadyray otay encounterway emthay againway; utbay ifway eythay osechay otay enjoyway
eacepay, itway asway unfairway otay efuseray ethay ibutetray, ichwhay ofway eirthay ownway eefrayillway
eythay adhay aidpay upway otay atthay imetay. Atthay ethay iendshipfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay
oughtway otay ovepray otay imhay anway ornamentway andway away afeguardsay, otnay away etrimentday; andway
atthay ehay oughtsay itway ithway atthay expectationway. Utbay ifway oughthray ethay Omanray eoplepay
ethay ibutetray asway otay ebay iscontinuedday, andway osethay owhay urrenderedsay otay ebay
educedsay omfray imhay, ehay ouldway enounceray ethay iendshipfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay
onay esslay eartilyhay anthay ehay adhay oughtsay itway. Asway otay ishay eadinglay overway away osthay ofway
Ermansgay intoway Aulgay, atthay ehay asway oingday isthay ithway away iewvay ofway ecuringsay
imselfhay, otnay ofway assaultingway Aulgay atthay erethay asway evidenceway ofway isthay, inway
atthay ehay idday otnay omecay ithoutway eingbay invitedway, andway inway atthay ehay idday otnay akemay
arway, utbay erelymay ardedway itway offway. Atthay ehay adhay omecay intoway Aulgay eforebay ethay
Omanray eoplepay. Atthay evernay eforebay isthay imetay idday away Omanray armyway ogay eyondbay ethay
ontiersfray ofway ethay ovincepray ofway Aulgay. Atwhay aidsay ehay oesday Aesarcay esireday?
whyay omecay intoway ishay Ariovistus'sway omainsday?atthay isthay asway ishay ovincepray
ofway Aulgay, ustjay asway atthay isway oursway. Asway itway oughtway otnay otay ebay ardonedpay inway imhay, ifway
ehay ereway otay akemay anway attackway uponway ourway erritoriestay; osay, ikewiselay, atthay eway
ereway unjustway otay obstructway imhay inway ishay erogativepray. Asway orfay Aesar'scay ayingsay
atthay ethay Aeduiway adhay eenbay ledstyay 'brethren' ybay ethay enatesay, ehay asway otnay osay
uncivilizedway ornay osay ignorantway ofway affairsway, asway otnay otay owknay atthay ethay Aeduiway inway
ethay eryvay astlay arway ithway ethay Allobrogesway adhay eithernay enderedray assistanceway otay
ethay Omansray, ornay eceivedray anyway omfray ethay Omanray eoplepay inway ethay ugglesstray
ichwhay ethay Aeduiway adhay eenbay aintainingmay ithway imhay andway ithway ethay Equanisay. Ehay
ustmay eelfay uspicioussay atthay Aesarcay, oughthay eigningfay iendshipfray asway ethay
easonray orfay ishay eepingkay anway armyway inway Aulgay; asway eepingkay itway ithway ethay iewvay ofway
ushingcray imhay. Andway atthay unlessway ehay epartday, andway ithdrawway ishay armyway omfray
esethay artspay, ehay allshay egardray imhay otnay asway away iendfray, utbay asway away oefay; andway
atthay, evenway ifway ehay ouldshay utpay imhay otay eathday, ehay ouldshay oday atwhay ouldway easeplay
anymay ofway ethay oblesnay andway eadinglay enmay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay; ehay adhay assuranceway
ofway atthay omfray emselvesthay oughthray eirthay essengersmay, andway ouldcay urchasepay ethay
avourfay andway ethay iendshipfray ofway emthay allway ybay ishay Aesar'scay eathday. Utbay ifway ehay
ouldway epartday andway esignray otay imhay ethay eefray ossessionpay ofway Aulgay, ehay ouldway
ecompenseray imhay ithway away eatgray ewardray, andway ouldway ingbray otay away oseclay ateverwhay
arsway ehay ishedway otay ebay arriedcay onway, ithoutway anyway oubletray orway iskray otay imhay.

Xlvay.Anymay ingsthay ereway atedstay ybay Aesarcay otay ethay effectway otay owshay whyay ehay
ouldcay otnay aiveway ethay usinessbay, andway atthay eithernay ishay ornay ethay Omanray
eople'spay acticepray ouldway uffersay imhay otay abandonway ostmay eritoriousmay alliesway,
ornay idday ehay eemday atthay Aulgay elongedbay otay Ariovistusway atherray anthay otay ethay
Omanray eoplepay; atthay ethay Arverniway andway ethay Uteniray adhay eenbay ubduedsay inway arway ybay
Uintusqay Abiusfay Aximusmay, andway atthay ethay Omanray eoplepay adhay ardonedpay emthay andway
adhay otnay educedray emthay intoway away ovincepray orway imposedway away ibutetray uponway emthay. Andway
ifway ethay ostmay ancientway eriodpay asway otay ebay egardedrayenthay asway ethay overeigntysay
ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay inway Aulgay ostmay ustjay ifway ethay ecreeday ofway ethay enatesay asway
otay ebay observedway, enthay oughtway Aulgay otay ebay eefray, ichwhay eythay ethay Omansray adhay
onqueredcay inway arway, andway adhay ermittedpay otay enjoyway itsway ownway awslay.

Ixlvay.Ilewhay esethay ingsthay areway eingbay ansactedtray inway ethay onferencecay, itway asway
announcedway otay Aesarcay atthay ethay avalrycay ofway Ariovistusway ereway approachingway
earernay ethay oundmay, andway ereway idingray upway otay ourway enmay, andway astingcay onesstay andway
eaponsway atway emthay. Aesarcay ademay anway endway ofway ishay eechspay andway etookbay imselfhay otay
ishay enmay; andway ommandedcay emthay atthay eythay ouldshay ybay onay eansmay eturnray away eaponway
uponway ethay enemyway. Orfay oughthay ehay awsay atthay anway engagementway ithway ethay avalrycay
ouldway ebay ithoutway anyway angerday otay ishay osenchay egionlay, etyay ehay idday otnay inkthay
operpray otay engageway, estlay, afterway ethay enemyway ereway outedray, itway ightmay ebay aidsay
atthay eythay adhay eenbay ensnaredway ybay imhay underway ethay anctionsay ofway away onferencecay.
Enwhay itway asway eadspray abroadway amongway ethay ommoncay oldierysay ithway atwhay
aughtinesshay Ariovistusway adhay ehavedbay atway ethay onferencecay, andway owhay ehay adhay
orderedway ethay Omansray otay uitqay Aulgay, andway owhay ishay avalrycay adhay ademay anway attackway
uponway ourway enmay, andway owhay isthay adhay okenbray offway ethay onferencecay, away uchmay eatergray
alacrityway andway eagernessway orfay attlebay asway infusedway intoway ourway armyway.

Iixlvay.Otway aysday afterway, Ariovistusway endssay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay, otay atestay
atthay ehay ishedway otay eattray ithway imhay aboutway osethay ingsthay ichwhay adhay eenbay
egunbay otay ebay eatedtray ofway etweenbay emthay, utbay adhay otnay eenbay oncludedcay; andway
otay egbay atthay ehay ouldway eitherway againway appointway away ayday orfay away onferencecay; orway,
ifway ehay ereway otnay illingway otay oday atthay, atthay ehay ouldway endsay oneway ofway ishay
officersway asway anway ambassadorway otay imhay. Erethay idday otnay appearway otay Aesarcay anyway
oodgay easonray orfay oldinghay away onferencecay; andway ethay oremay osay asway ethay ayday eforebay
ethay Ermansgay ouldcay otnay ebay estrainedray omfray astingcay eaponsway atway ourway enmay. Ehay
oughtthay ehay ouldshay otnay ithoutway eatgray angerday endsay otay imhay asway ambassadorway oneway
ofway ishay Omanray officersway, andway ouldshay exposeway imhay otay avagesay enmay. Itway eemedsay
ereforethay ostmay operpray otay endsay otay imhay . Aleriusvay Ocilluspray, ethay onsay ofway
. Aleriusvay Aburuscay, away oungyay anmay ofway ethay ighesthay ouragecay andway
accomplishmentsway osewhay atherfay adhay eenbay esentedpray ithway ethay eedomfray ofway ethay
itycay ybay . Aleriusvay Accusflay, othbay onway accountway ofway ishay idelityfay andway onway
accountway ofway ishay owledgeknay ofway ethay Allicgay anguagelay, ichwhay Ariovistusway, ybay
onglay acticepray, ownay okespay uentlyflay; andway ecausebay inway ishay asecay ethay Ermansgay
ouldway avehay onay otivemay orfay ommittingcay iolencevay; andway asway ishay olleaguecay .
Ettiusmay, owhay adhay aredshay ethay ospitalityhay ofway Ariovistusway. Ehay ommissionedcay
emthay otay earnlay atwhay Ariovistusway adhay otay aysay, andway otay eportray otay imhay. Utbay enwhay
Ariovistusway awsay emthay eforebay imhay inway ishay ampcay, ehay iedcray outway inway ethay esencepray
ofway ishay armyway, Whyay ereway eythay omecay otay imhay? asway itway orfay ethay urposepay ofway
actingway asway iesspay? Ehay oppedstay emthay enwhay attemptingway otay eakspay, andway astcay
emthay intoway ainschay.

Iiixlvay.Ethay amesay ayday ehay ovedmay ishay ampcay orwardfay andway itchedpay underway away illhay
ixsay ilesmay omfray Aesar'scay ampcay. Ethay ayday ollowingfay ehay edlay ishay orcesfay astpay
Aesar'scay ampcay, andway encampedway otway ilesmay eyondbay imhay; ithway isthay esigndayatthay
ehay ightmay utcay offway Aesarcay omfray, ethay orncay andway ovisionspray ichwhay ightmay ebay
onveyedcay otay imhay omfray ethay Equanisay andway ethay Aeduiway. Orfay ivefay uccessivesay aysday
omfray atthay ayday, Aesarcay ewdray outway ishay orcesfay eforebay ethay ampcay, andway utpay emthay
inway attlebay orderway, atthay, ifway Ariovistusway ouldshay ebay illingway otay engageway inway
attlebay, anway opportunityway ightmay otnay ebay antingway otay imhay. Ariovistusway allway isthay
imetay eptkay ishay armyway inway ampcay utbay engagedway ailyday inway avalrycay irmishesskay. Ethay
ethodmay ofway attlebay inway ichwhay ethay Ermansgay adhay actisedpray emselvesthay asway isthay.
Erethay ereway 6000 orsehay, andway asway anymay eryvay activeway andway ourageouscay ootfay, oneway
ofway omwhay eachway ofway ethay orsehay electedsay outway ofway ethay olewhay armyway orfay ishay ownway
otectionpray. Ybay esethay ootfay eythay ereway onstantlycay accompaniedway inway eirthay
engagementsway; otay esethay ethay orsehay etiredray; esethay onway anyway emergencyway ushedray
orwardfay; ifway anyway oneway, uponway eceivingray away eryvay everesay oundway, adhay allenfay omfray
ishay orsehay, eythay oodstay aroundway imhay ifway itway asway ecessarynay otay advanceway
artherfay anthay usualway, orway otay etreatray oremay apidlyray, osay eatgray, omfray
acticepray, asway eirthay iftnesssway, atthay, upportedsay ybay ethay anesmay ofway ethay
orseshay, eythay ouldcay eepkay acepay ithway eirthay eedspay.

Ixxlay.Erceivingpay atthay Ariovistusway eptkay imselfhay inway ampcay, Aesarcay, atthay ehay
ightmay otnay anyway ongerlay ebay utcay offway omfray ovisionspray, osechay away onvenientcay
ositionpay orfay away ampcay eyondbay atthay aceplay inway ichwhay ethay Ermansgay adhay encampedway,
atway aboutway 600 acespay omfray emthay, andway avinghay awndray upway ishay armyway inway eethray
ineslay, archedmay otay atthay aceplay. Ehay orderedway ethay irstfay andway econdsay ineslay otay
ebay underway armsway; ethay irdthay otay ortifyfay ethay ampcay. Isthay aceplay asway istantday
omfray ethay enemyway aboutway 600 acespay, asway ashay eenbay atedstay. Itherthay Ariovistusway
entsay ightlay oopstray, aboutway 16,000 enmay inway umbernay, ithway allway ishay avalrycay;
ichwhay orcesfay ereway otay intimidateway ourway enmay, andway inderhay emthay inway eirthay
ortificationfay. Aesarcay everthelessnay, asway ehay adhay eforebay arrangedway, orderedway
otway ineslay otay ivedray offway ethay enemyway ethay irdthay otay executeway ethay orkway. Ethay
ampcay eingbay ortifiedfay, ehay eftlay erethay otway egionslay andway away ortionpay ofway ethay
auxiliariesway; andway edlay ackbay ethay otherway ourfay egionslay intoway ethay argerlay ampcay.

.Ethay extnay ayday, accordingway otay ishay ustomcay, Aesarcay edlay outway ishay orcesfay
omfray othbay ampscay, andway avinghay advancedway away ittlelay omfray ethay argerlay oneway, ewdray
upway ishay inelay ofway attlebay, andway avegay ethay enemyway anway opportunityway ofway ightingfay.
Enwhay ehay oundfay atthay eythay idday otnay evenway enthay omecay outway omfray eirthay
entrenchmentsway, ehay edlay ackbay ishay armyway intoway ampcay aboutway oonnay. Enthay atway astlay
Ariovistusway entsay artpay ofway ishay orcesfay otay attackway ethay esserlay ampcay. Ethay attlebay
asway igorouslyvay aintainedmay onway othbay idessay illtay ethay eveningway. Atway unsetsay,
afterway anymay oundsway adhay eenbay inflictedway andway eceivedray, Ariovistusway edlay ackbay
ishay orcesfay intoway ampcay. Enwhay Aesarcay inquiredway ofway ishay isonerspray, ereforewhay
Ariovistusway idday otnay omecay otay anway engagementway, ehay iscoveredday isthay otay ebay ethay
easonrayatthay amongway ethay Ermansgay itway asway ethay ustomcay orfay eirthay atronsmay otay
onouncepray omfray otslay andway ivinationday etherwhay itway ereway expedientway atthay ethay
attlebay ouldshay ebay engagedway inway orway otnay; atthay eythay adhay aidsay, atthay itway asway otnay
ethay illway ofway eavenhay atthay ethay Ermansgay ouldshay onquercay, ifway eythay engagedway inway
attlebay eforebay ethay ewnay oonmay.

Ilay.Ethay ayday ollowingfay, Aesarcay eftlay atwhay eemedsay ufficientsay asway away uardgay
orfay othbay ampscay; andway enthay ewdray upway allway ethay auxiliariesway inway ightsay ofway ethay
enemyway, eforebay ethay esserlay ampcay, ecausebay ehay asway otnay eryvay owerfulpay inway ethay
umbernay ofway egionarylay oldierssay, onsideringcay ethay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway; atthay
erebythay ehay ightmay akemay useway ofway ishay auxiliariesway orfay appearanceway. Ehay
imselfhay, avinghay awndray upway ishay armyway inway eethray ineslay, advancedway otay ethay ampcay
ofway ethay enemyway. Enthay atway astlay ofway ecessitynay ethay Ermansgay ewdray eirthay orcesfay
outway ofway ampcay, andway isposedday emthay antoncay ybay antoncay, atway equalway istancesday, ethay
Arudeshay, Arcomannimay, Iboccitray, Angionesvay, Emetesnay, Edusiisay, Uevisay; andway
urroundedsay eirthay olewhay armyway ithway eirthay ariotschay andway aggonsway, atthay onay
opehay ightmay ebay eftlay inway ightflay. Onway esethay eythay acedplay eirthay omenway, owhay,
ithway ishevelledday airhay andway inway earstay, entreatedway ethay oldierssay, asway eythay entway
orwardfay otay attlebay, otnay otay eliverday emthay intoway averyslay otay ethay Omansray.

Iilay.Aesarcay appointedway overway eachway egionlay away ieutenantlay andway away uestorqay, atthay
everyway oneway ightmay avehay emthay asway itnessesway ofway ishay alourvay. Ehay imselfhay eganbay
ethay attlebay atway ethay eadhay ofway ethay ightray ingway, ecausebay ehay adhay observedway atthay
artpay ofway ethay enemyway otay ebay ethay eastlay ongstray. Accordinglyway ourway enmay, uponway ethay
ignalsay eingbay ivengay, igorouslyvay ademay anway attackway uponway ethay enemyway, andway ethay
enemyway osay uddenlysay andway apidlyray ushedray orwardfay, atthay erethay asway onay imetay orfay
astingcay ethay avelinsjay atway emthay. Owingthray asideway ereforethay eirthay avelinsjay,
eythay oughtfay ithway ordssway andhay otay andhay. Utbay ethay Ermansgay, accordingway otay
eirthay ustomcay, apidlyray ormingfay away alanxphay, ustainedsay ethay attackway ofway ourway
ordssway. Erethay ereway oundfay eryvay anymay ofway ourway oldierssay owhay eapedlay uponway ethay
alanxphay, andway ithway eirthay andshay oretay awayway ethay ieldsshay, andway oundedway ethay
enemyway omfray aboveway. Althoughway ethay armyway ofway ethay enemyway asway outedray onway ethay eftlay
ingway andway utpay otay ightflay, eythay illstay essedpray eavilyhay onway ourway enmay omfray ethay
ightray ingway, ybay ethay eatgray umbernay ofway eirthay oopstray. Onway observingway ichwhay, .
Assuscray, away oungyay anmay, owhay ommandedcay ethay avalrycayasway ehay asway oremay
isengagedday anthay osethay owhay ereway employedway inway ethay ightfayentsay ethay irdthay
inelay asway away eliefray otay ourway enmay owhay ereway inway istressday.

Iiilay.Ereuponthay ethay engagementway asway enewedray, andway allway ethay enemyway urnedtay
eirthay acksbay, ornay idday eythay easecay otay eeflay untilway eythay arrivedway atway ethay iverray
Inerhay, aboutway iftyfay ilesmay omfray atthay aceplay. Erethay omesay ewfay, eitherway elyingray
onway eirthay engthstray, endeavouredway otay imsway overway, orway, indingfay oatsbay, ocuredpray
eirthay afetysay. Amongway ethay atterlay asway Ariovistusway, owhay eetingmay ithway away allsmay
esselvay iedtay otay ethay ankbay, escapedway inway itway ourway orsehay ursuedpay andway ewslay allway
ethay estray ofway emthay. Ariovistusway adhay otway ivesway, oneway away Uevansay ybay ationnay, omwhay
ehay adhay oughtbray ithway imhay omfray omehay; ethay otherway away Oricannay, ethay istersay ofway
ingkay Ocionvay, omwhay ehay adhay arriedmay inway Aulgay, eshay avinghay eenbay entsay itherthay
orfay atthay urposepay ybay erhay otherbray. Othbay erishedpay inway atthay ightflay. Ofway eirthay
otway aughtersday, oneway asway ainslay, ethay otherway apturedcay. . Aleriusvay Ocilluspray,
asway ehay asway eingbay aggeddray ybay ishay uardsgay inway ethay ightflay, oundbay ithway away ipletray
ainchay, ellfay intoway ethay andshay ofway Aesarcay imselfhay, asway ehay asway ursuingpay ethay
enemyway ithway ishay avalrycay. Isthay ircumstancecay indeedway affordedway Aesarcay onay esslay
easureplay anthay ethay ictoryvay itselfway; ecausebay ehay awsay away anmay ofway ethay irstfay ankray
inway ethay ovincepray ofway Aulgay, ishay intimateway acquaintanceway andway iendfray, escuedray
omfray ethay andhay ofway ethay enemyway, andway estoredray otay imhay, andway atthay ortunefay adhay
otnay iminishedday aughtway ofway ethay oyjay andway exultationway ofway atthay ayday ybay ishay
estructionday. Ehay Ocilluspray aidsay atthay inway ishay ownway esencepray ethay otslay adhay
eenbay icethray onsultedcay espectingray imhay, etherwhay ehay ouldshay immediatelyway ebay
utpay otay eathday ybay irefay, orway ebay eservedray orfay anotherway imetay atthay ybay ethay
avourfay ofway ethay otslay ehay asway uninjuredway. . Ettiusmay, alsoway, asway oundfay andway
oughtbray ackbay otay imhay Aesarcay.

Ivlay.Isthay attlebay avinghay eenbay eportedray eyondbay ethay Inerhay, ethay Uevisay, owhay
