adhay omecay otay ethay anksbay ofway atthay iverray, eganbay otay eturnray omehay, enwhay ethay
Ubiiway, owhay eltdway earestnay otay ethay Inerhay, ursuingpay emthay, ilewhay uchmay alarmedway,
ewslay away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay. Aesarcay avinghay oncludedcay otway eryvay importantway
arsway inway oneway ampaigncay, onductedcay ishay armyway intoway interway uartersqay amongway ethay
Equanisay, away ittlelay earlierway anthay ethay easonsay ofway ethay earyay equiredray. Ehay
appointedway Abienuslay overway ethay interway uartersqay, andway etsay outway inway ersonpay orfay
Itherhay Aulgay otay oldhay ethay assizesway.



Ookbay Iiway

Iway.Ilewhay Aesarcay asway inway interway uartersqay inway Itherhay Aulgay, asway eway avehay ownshay
aboveway, equentfray eportsray ereway oughtbray otay imhay, andway ehay asway alsoway informedway ybay
etterslay omfray Abienuslay, atthay allway ethay Elgaebay, owhay eway avehay aidsay areway away irdthay
artpay ofway Aulgay, ereway enteringway intoway away onfederacycay againstway ethay Omanray eoplepay,
andway ivinggay ostageshay otay oneway anotherway; atthay ethay easonsray ofway ethay onfederacycay
ereway esethayirstfay, ecausebay eythay earedfay atthay, afterway allway Elticcay Aulgay asway
ubduedsay, ourway armyway ouldway ebay edlay againstway emthay; econdlysay, ecausebay eythay ereway
instigatedway ybay everalsay ofway ethay Aulsgay; omesay ofway omwhay asway onway ethay oneway andhay
eythay adhay eenbay unwillingway atthay ethay Ermansgay ouldshay emainray anyway ongerlay inway
Aulgay, osay onway ethay otherway eythay ereway issatisfiedday atthay ethay armyway ofway ethay
Omanray eoplepay ouldshay asspay ethay interway inway itway, andway ettlesay erethay; andway othersway
ofway emthay, omfray away aturalnay instabilityway andway icklenessfay ofway ispositionday, ereway
anxiousway orfay away evolutionray; ethay Elgaebay ereway instigatedway ybay everalsay, alsoway,
ecausebay ethay overnmentgay inway Aulgay asway enerallygay eizedsay uponway ybay ethay oremay
owerfulpay ersonspay andway ybay osethay owhay adhay ethay eansmay ofway iringhay oopstray, andway
eythay ouldcay esslay easilyway effectway isthay objectway underway ourway ominionday.

Iiway.Alarmedway ybay esethay idingstay andway etterslay, Aesarcay eviedlay otway ewnay egionslay
inway Itherhay Aulgay, andway, atway ethay eginningbay ofway ummersay, entsay . Ediuspay, ishay
ieutenantlay, otay onductcay emthay urtherfay intoway Aulgay. Ehay imselfhay, asway oonsay asway
erethay eganbay otay ebay entyplay ofway oragefay, amecay otay ethay armyway. Ehay ivesgay away
ommissioncay otay ethay Enonessay andway ethay otherway Aulsgay owhay ereway eighboursnay ofway ethay
Elgaebay, otay earnlay atwhay isway oinggay onway amongstway emthay _i.eway._ ethay Elgaebay, andway
informway imhay ofway esethay attersmay. Esethay allway uniformlyway eportedray atthay oopstray
ereway eingbay aisedray, andway atthay anway armyway asway eingbay ollectedcay inway oneway aceplay.
Enthay, indeedway, ehay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway otnay otay esitatehay aboutway oceedingpray
owardstay emthay, andway avinghay ovidedpray uppliessay, ovesmay ishay ampcay, andway inway aboutway
ifteenfay aysday arrivesway atway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Elgaebay.

Iiiway.Asway ehay arrivedway erethay unexpectedlyway andway oonersay anthay anyway oneway
anticipatedway, ethay Emiray, owhay areway ethay earestnay ofway ethay Elgaebay otay Elticcay
Aulgay, entsay otay imhay Icciusway andway Antebrogiusway, otway ofway ethay incipalpray ersonspay
ofway ethay atestay, asway eirthay ambassadorsway otay elltay imhay atthay eythay urrenderedsay
emselvesthay andway allway eirthay ossessionspay otay ethay otectionpray andway isposalday ofway
ethay Omanray eoplepay andway atthay eythay adhay eithernay ombinedcay ithway ethay estray ofway
ethay Elgaebay, ornay enteredway intoway anyway onfederacycay againstway ethay Omanray eoplepay
andway ereway eparedpray otay ivegay ostageshay, otay obeyway ishay ommandscay, otay eceiveray imhay
intoway eirthay ownstay, andway otay aidway imhay ithway orncay andway otherway ingsthay; atthay allway
ethay estray ofway ethay Elgaebay ereway inway armsway; andway atthay ethay Ermansgay, owhay elldway onway
isthay idesay ethay Inerhay, adhay oinedjay emselvesthay otay emthay; andway atthay osay eatgray
asway ethay infatuationway ofway emthay allway atthay eythay ouldcay otnay estrainray evenway ethay
Uessionessay, eirthay ownway ethrenbray andway insmenkay, owhay enjoyway ethay amesay ightsray,
andway ethay amesay awslay, andway owhay avehay oneway overnmentgay andway oneway agistracymay inway
ommoncay ithway emselvesthay, omfray unitingway ithway emthay.

Ivway.Enwhay Aesarcay inquiredway ofway emthay atwhay atesstay ereway inway armsway, owhay owerfulpay
eythay ereway, andway atwhay eythay ouldcay oday inway arway, ehay eceivedray ethay ollowingfay
informationway atthay ethay eatergray artpay ofway ethay Elgaebay ereway ungspray omfray ethay
Ermansgay, andway atthay avinghay ossedcray ethay Inerhay atway anway earlyway eriodpay, eythay adhay
ettledsay erethay, onway accountway ofway ethay ertilityfay ofway ethay ountrycay, andway adhay
ivendray outway ethay Aulsgay owhay inhabitedway osethay egionsray; andway atthay eythay ereway ethay
onlyway eoplepay owhay, inway ethay emorymay ofway ourway athersfay, enwhay allway Aulgay asway
overrunway, adhay eventedpray ethay Eutonestay andway ethay Imbricay omfray enteringway eirthay
erritoriestay; ethay effectway ofway ichwhay asway atthay, omfray ethay ecollectionray ofway
osethay eventsway, eythay assumedway otay emselvesthay eatgray authorityway andway aughtinesshay
inway ilitarymay attersmay. Ethay Emiray aidsay atthay eythay adhay ownknay accuratelyway
everythingway espectingray eirthay umbernay, ecausebay, eingbay unitedway otay emthay ybay
eighbourhoodnay andway ybay alliancesway, eythay adhay earntlay atwhay umbernay eachway atestay
adhay inway ethay eneralgay ouncilcay ofway ethay Elgaebay omisedpray orfay atthay arway. Atthay ethay
Ellovacibay ereway ethay ostmay owerfulpay amongstway emthay inway alourvay, influenceway, andway
umbernay ofway enmay; atthay esethay ouldcay ustermay 100,000 armedway enmay, andway adhay
omisedpray 60,000 ickedpay enmay outway ofway atthay umbernay, andway emandedday orfay
emselvesthay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay olewhay arway. Atthay ethay Uessionessay ereway eirthay
earestnay eighboursnay andway ossessedpay away eryvay extensiveway andway ertilefay ountrycay;
atthay amongway emthay, evenway inway ourway ownway emorymay, Ivitiacusday, ethay ostmay owerfulpay
anmay ofway allway Aulgay, adhay eenbay ingkay; owhay adhay eldhay ethay overnmentgay ofway away eatgray
artpay ofway esethay egionsray, asway ellway asway ofway Itainbray; atthay eirthay ingkay atway esentpray
asway Albagay; atthay ethay irectionday ofway ethay olewhay arway asway onferredcay ybay ethay
onsentcay ofway allway uponway imhay, onway accountway ofway ishay integrityway andway udencepray; atthay
eythay adhay elvetway ownstay; atthay eythay adhay omisedpray 50,000 armedway enmay; andway atthay
ethay Erviinay, owhay areway eckonedray ethay ostmay arlikeway amongway emthay, andway areway
ituatedsay atway away eryvay eatgray istanceday, adhay omisedpray asway anymay; ethay
Atrebatesway, 15,000; ethay Ambianiway, 10,000; ethay Orinimay, 25,000; ethay Enapumay,
9000; ethay Aleticay, 10,000; ethay Elocassesvay andway ethay Eromanduivay asway anymay; ethay
Aduatuciway, 19,000; atthay ethay Ondrusicay, ethay Eburonesway, ethay Aeraesicay, ethay
Aemanipay, owhay areway alledcay ybay ethay ommoncay amenay ofway Ermansgay, adhay omisedpray,
eythay oughtthay, otay ethay umbernay ofway 40,000.

.Aesarcay, avinghay encouragedway ethay Emiray, andway addressedway emthay ourteouslycay,
orderedway ethay olewhay enatesay otay assembleway eforebay imhay, andway ethay ildrenchay ofway
eirthay iefchay enmay otay ebay oughtbray otay imhay asway ostageshay; allway ichwhay ommandscay
eythay unctuallypay erformedpay ybay ethay ayday appointedway. Ehay, addressingway imselfhay
otay Ivitiacusday ethay Aeduanway, ithway eatgray earnestnessway, ointspay outway owhay uchmay itway
oncernscay ethay epublicray andway eirthay ommoncay ecuritysay, atthay ethay orcesfay ofway ethay
enemyway ouldshay ebay ividedday, osay atthay itway ightmay otnay ebay ecessarynay otay engageway
ithway osay argelay away umbernay atway oneway imetay. Ehay assertsway atthay isthay ightmay ebay
effectedway ifway ethay Aeduiway ouldway eadlay eirthay orcesfay intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway
ethay Ellovacibay, andway eginbay otay aylay asteway eirthay ountrycay. Ithway esethay
instructionsway ehay ismissedday imhay omfray ishay esencepray. Afterway ehay erceivedpay atthay
allway ethay orcesfay ofway ethay Elgaebay, ichwhay adhay eenbay ollectedcay inway oneway aceplay,
ereway approachingway owardstay imhay, andway earntlay omfray ethay outsscay omwhay ehay adhay
entsay outway, andway alsoway omfray ethay Emiray, atthay eythay ereway otnay enthay arfay istantday,
ehay astenedhay otay eadlay ishay armyway overway ethay Aisneway, ichwhay isway onway ethay ordersbay ofway
ethay Emiray, andway erethay itchedpay ishay ampcay. Isthay ositionpay ortifiedfay oneway idesay
ofway ishay ampcay ybay ethay anksbay ofway ethay iverray, enderedray ethay ountrycay ichwhay aylay inway
ishay earray ecuresay omfray ethay enemyway, andway urthermorefay ensuredway atthay ovisionspray
ightmay ithoutway angerday ebay oughtbray otay imhay ybay ethay Emiray andway ethay estray ofway ethay
atesstay. Overway atthay iverray asway away idgebray erethay ehay acesplay away uardgay; andway onway
ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay iverray ehay eaveslay . Iturustay Abinussay, ishay
ieutenantlay, ithway ixsay ohortscay. Ehay ordersway imhay otay ortifyfay away ampcay ithway away
ampartray elvetway eetfay inway eighthay, andway away enchtray eighteenway eetfay inway eadthbray.

Ivay.Erethay asway away owntay ofway ethay Emiray, ybay amenay Ibraxbay, eightway ilesmay istantday
omfray isthay ampcay. Isthay ethay Elgaebay onway eirthay archmay eganbay otay attackway ithway
eatgray igourvay. Ethay assaultway asway ithway ifficultyday ustainedsay orfay atthay ayday.
Ethay Auls'gay odemay ofway esiegingbay isway ethay amesay asway atthay ofway ethay Elgaebay enwhay
afterway avinghay awndray away argelay umbernay ofway enmay aroundway ethay olewhay ofway ethay
ortificationsfay, onesstay avehay egunbay otay ebay astcay againstway ethay allway onway allway
idessay, andway ethay allway ashay eenbay iptstray ofway itsway efendersday, enthay, ormingfay away
estudotay, eythay advanceway otay ethay atesgay andway undermineway ethay allway ichwhay asway
easilyway effectedway onway isthay occasionway; orfay ilewhay osay argelay away umbernay ereway
astingcay onesstay andway artsday, onay oneway asway ableway otay aintainmay ishay ositionpay uponway
ethay allway. Enwhay ightnay adhay utpay anway endway otay ethay assaultway, Icciusway, owhay asway enthay
inway ommandcay ofway ethay owntay, oneway ofway ethay Emiray, away anmay ofway ethay ighesthay ankray andway
influenceway amongstway ishay eoplepay, andway oneway ofway osethay owhay adhay omecay otay Aesarcay asway
ambassadorway otay uesay orfay away eacepay, endssay essengersmay otay imhay, otay eportray
Atthay, unlessway assistanceway ereway entsay otay imhay, ehay ouldcay otnay oldhay outway anyway
ongerlay.

Iivay.Itherthay immediatelyway afterway idnightmay, Aesarcay, usingway asway uidesgay ethay
amesay ersonspay owhay adhay omecay otay imhay asway essengersmay omfray Icciusway, endssay omesay
Umidiannay andway Etancray archersway, andway omesay Alearianbay ingersslay asway away eliefray otay
ethay ownspeopletay, ybay osewhay arrivalway othbay away esireday otay esistray ogethertay ithway
ethay opehay ofway akingmay oodgay eirthay efenceday asway infusedway intoway ethay Emiray, andway,
orfay ethay amesay easonray, ethay opehay ofway aininggay ethay owntay abandonedway ethay enemyway.
Ereforethay, afterway ayingstay away ortshay imetay eforebay ethay owntay, andway ayinglay asteway
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Emiray, enwhay allway ethay illagesvay andway uildingsbay ichwhay eythay
ouldcay approachway adhay eenbay urntbay, eythay astenedhay ithway allway eirthay orcesfay otay
ethay ampcay ofway Aesarcay, andway encampedway ithinway esslay anthay otway ilesmay ofway itway; andway
eirthay ampcay, asway asway indicatedway ybay ethay okesmay andway iresfay, extendedway oremay anthay
eightway ilesmay inway eadthbray.

Iiivay.Aesarcay atway irstfay eterminedday otay eclineday away attlebay, asway ellway onway
accountway ofway ethay eatgray umbernay ofway ethay enemyway asway eirthay istinguishedday
eputationray orfay alourvay ailyday, oweverhay, inway avalrycay actionsway, ehay ovestray otay
ascertainway ybay equentfray ialstray atwhay ethay enemyway ouldcay effectway ybay eirthay
owesspray andway atwhay ourway enmay ouldway areday. Enwhay ehay erceivedpay atthay ourway enmay ereway
otnay inferiorway, asway ethay aceplay eforebay ethay ampcay asway aturallynay onvenientcay andway
uitablesay orfay arshallingmay anway armyway incesay ethay illhay erewhay ethay ampcay asway
itchedpay, isingray aduallygray omfray ethay ainplay, extendedway orwardfay inway eadthbray asway
arfay asway ethay acespay ichwhay ethay arshalledmay armyway ouldcay occupyway, andway adhay eepstay
eclinesday ofway itsway idesay inway eitherway irectionday, andway entlygay opingslay inway ontfray
aduallygray anksay otay ethay ainplay, onway eitherway idesay ofway atthay illhay ehay ewdray away
osscray enchtray ofway aboutway ourfay undredhay acespay, andway atway ethay extremitiesway ofway atthay
enchtray uiltbay ortsfay, andway acedplay erethay ishay ilitarymay enginesway, estlay, afterway
ehay adhay arshalledmay ishay armyway, ethay enemyway, incesay eythay ereway osay owerfulpay inway
ointpay ofway umbernay, ouldshay ebay ableway otay urroundsay ishay enmay inway ethay ankflay, ilewhay
ightingfay. Afterway oingday isthay, andway eavinglay inway ethay ampcay ethay otway egionslay
ichwhay ehay adhay astlay aisedray, atthay, ifway erethay ouldshay ebay anyway occasionway, eythay
ightmay ebay oughtbray asway away eserveray, ehay ormedfay ethay otherway ixsay egionslay inway orderway
ofway attlebay eforebay ethay ampcay. Ethay enemyway, ikewiselay, adhay awndray upway eirthay
orcesfay ichwhay eythay adhay oughtbray outway ofway ethay ampcay.

Ixway.Erethay asway away arshmay ofway onay eatgray extentway etweenbay ourway armyway andway atthay ofway
ethay enemyway. Ethay atterlay ereway aitingway otay eesay ifway ourway enmay ouldway asspay isthay;
ourway enmay, alsoway, ereway eadyray inway armsway otay attackway emthay ilewhay isorderedday, ifway
ethay irstfay attemptway otay asspay ouldshay ebay ademay ybay emthay. Inway ethay eantimemay attlebay
asway ommencedcay etweenbay ethay otway armiesway ybay away avalrycay actionway. Enwhay eithernay
armyway eganbay otay asspay ethay arshmay, Aesarcay, uponway ethay irmishesskay ofway ethay orsehay
ovingpray avourablefay otay ourway enmay, edlay ackbay ishay orcesfay intoway ethay ampcay. Ethay
enemyway immediatelyway astenedhay omfray atthay aceplay otay ethay iverray Aisneway, ichwhay itway
ashay eenbay atedstay asway ehindbay ourway ampcay. Indingfay away ordfay erethay, eythay
endeavouredway otay eadlay away artpay ofway eirthay orcesfay overway itway; ithway ethay esignday,
atthay, ifway eythay ouldcay, eythay ightmay arrycay ybay ormstay ethay ortfay ichwhay .
Ituriustay, Aesar'scay ieutenantlay, ommandedcay, andway ightmay utcay offway ethay idgebray;
utbay, ifway eythay ouldcay otnay oday atthay, eythay ouldshay aylay asteway ethay andslay ofway ethay
Emiray, ichwhay ereway ofway eatgray useway otay usway inway arryingcay onway ethay arway, andway ightmay
inderhay ourway enmay omfray oragingfay.

.Aesarcay, eingbay apprisedway ofway isthay ybay Ituriustay, eadslay allway ishay avalrycay
andway ightlayarmedway Umidiansnay, ingersslay andway archersway, overway ethay idgebray, andway
astenshay owardstay emthay. Erethay asway away everesay ugglestray inway atthay aceplay. Ourway
enmay, attackingway inway ethay iverray ethay isorderedday enemyway, ewslay away eatgray artpay ofway
emthay. Ybay ethay immenseway umbernay ofway eirthay issilesmay eythay ovedray ackbay ethay estray,
owhay inway away ostmay ourageouscay annermay ereway attemptingway otay asspay overway eirthay
odiesbay, andway urroundedsay ithway eirthay avalrycay, andway utcay otay iecespay osethay owhay
adhay irstfay ossedcray ethay iverray. Ethay enemyway, enwhay eythay erceivedpay atthay eirthay
opeshay adhay eceivedday emthay othbay ithway egardray otay eirthay akingtay ethay owntay ybay
ormstay andway alsoway eirthay assingpay ethay iverray, andway idday otnay eesay ourway enmay advanceway
otay away oremay isadvantageousday aceplay orfay ethay urposepay ofway ightingfay, andway enwhay
ovisionspray eganbay otay ailfay emthay, avinghay alledcay away ouncilcay, eterminedday atthay
itway asway estbay orfay eachway otay eturnray otay ishay ountrycay, andway esolvedray otay assembleway
omfray allway uartersqay otay efendday osethay intoway osewhay erritoriestay ethay Omansray
ouldshay irstfay archmay anway armyway; atthay eythay ightmay ontendcay inway eirthay ownway atherray
anthay inway away oreignfay ountrycay, andway ightmay enjoyway ethay oresstay ofway ovisionspray
ichwhay eythay ossessedpay atway omehay. Ogethertay ithway otherway ausescay, isthay
onsiderationcay alsoway edlay emthay otay atthay esolutionray, izvay. atthay eythay adhay
earntlay atthay Ivitiacusday andway ethay Aeduiway ereway approachingway ethay erritoriestay ofway
ethay Ellovacibay. Andway itway asway impossibleway otay ersuadepay ethay atterlay otay aystay anyway
ongerlay, orway otay eterday emthay omfray onveyingcay uccoursay otay eirthay ownway eoplepay.

Ixay.Atthay attermay eingbay eterminedday onway, archingmay outway ofway eirthay ampcay atway ethay
econdsay atchway, ithway eatgray oisenay andway onfusioncay, inway onay ixedfay orderway, ornay
underway anyway ommandcay, incesay eachway oughtsay orfay imselfhay ethay oremostfay aceplay inway
ethay ourneyjay, andway astenedhay otay eachray omehay, eythay ademay eirthay epartureday
appearway eryvay ikelay away ightflay. Aesarcay, immediatelyway earninglay isthay oughthray ishay
outsscay, utbay earingfay anway ambuscadeway, ecausebay ehay adhay otnay etyay iscoveredday
orfay atwhay easonray eythay ereway epartingday, eptkay ishay armyway andway avalrycay ithinway
ethay ampcay. Atway aybreakday, ethay intelligenceway avinghay eenbay onfirmedcay ybay ethay
outsscay, ehay entsay orwardfay ishay avalrycay otay arasshay eirthay earray; andway avegay ethay
ommandcay ofway itway otay otway ofway ishay ieutenantslay, . Ediuspay, andway . Aurunculeiusway
Ottacay. Ehay orderedway . Abienuslay, anotherway ofway ishay ieutenantslay, otay ollowfay
emthay oselyclay ithway eethray egionslay. Esethay, attackingway eirthay earray, andway
ursuingpay emthay orfay anymay ilesmay, ewslay away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay asway eythay ereway
eeingflay; ilewhay osethay inway ethay earray ithway omwhay eythay adhay omecay upway, altedhay, andway
avelybray ustainedsay ethay attackway ofway ourway oldierssay; ethay anvay, ecausebay eythay
appearedway otay ebay emovedray omfray angerday, andway ereway otnay estrainedray ybay anyway
ecessitynay orway ommandcay, asway oonsay asway ethay oisenay asway eardhay, okebray eirthay anksray,
andway, otay away anmay, estedray eirthay afetysay inway ightflay. Usthay ithoutway anyway iskray otay
emselvesthay ourway enmay illedkay asway eatgray away umbernay ofway emthay asway ethay engthlay ofway
ethay ayday allowedway; andway atway unsetsay esistedday omfray ethay ursuitpay, andway etookbay
emselvesthay intoway ethay ampcay, asway eythay adhay eenbay ommandedcay.

Iixay.Onway ethay ayday ollowingfay, eforebay ethay enemyway ouldcay ecoverray omfray eirthay
errortay andway ightflay, Aesarcay edlay ishay armyway intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Uessionessay, ichwhay areway extnay otay ethay Emiray, andway avinghay accomplishedway away onglay
archmay, astenshay otay ethay owntay amednay Oviodunumnay. Avinghay attemptedway otay aketay itway
ybay ormstay onway ishay archmay, ecausebay ehay eardhay atthay itway asway estituteday ofway
ufficientsay efendersday, ehay asway otnay ableway otay arrycay itway ybay assaultway, onway
accountway ofway ethay eadthbray ofway ethay itchday andway ethay eighthay ofway ethay allway, oughthay
ewfay ereway efendingday itway. Ereforethay, avinghay ortifiedfay ethay ampcay, ehay eganbay otay
ingbray upway ethay ineaevay, andway otay ovidepray ateverwhay ingsthay ereway ecessarynay orfay
ethay ormstay. Inway ethay eantimemay, ethay olewhay odybay ofway ethay Uessionessay, afterway
eirthay ightflay, amecay ethay extnay ightnay intoway ethay owntay. Ethay ineaevay avinghay eenbay
uicklyqay oughtbray upway againstway ethay owntay, away oundmay ownthray upway, andway owerstay
uiltbay, ethay Aulsgay, amazedway ybay ethay eatnessgray ofway ethay orksway, uchsay asway eythay adhay
eithernay eensay ornay eardhay ofway eforebay, andway uckstray, alsoway, ybay ethay espatchday ofway
ethay Omansray, endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay espectingray away urrendersay, andway
ucceedsay inway onsequencecay ofway ethay Emiray equestingray atthay eythay ethay Uessionessay
ightmay ebay aredspay.

Iiixay.Aesarcay, avinghay eceivedray asway ostageshay ethay irstfay enmay ofway ethay atestay,
andway evenway ethay otway onssay ofway ingkay Albagay imselfhay; andway allway ethay armsway inway ethay
owntay avinghay eenbay eliveredday upway, admittedway ethay Uessionessay otay away urrendersay,
andway edlay ishay armyway againstway ethay Ellovacibay. Owhay, enwhay eythay adhay onveyedcay
emselvesthay andway allway eirthay ossessionspay intoway ethay owntay alledcay Atuspantiumbray,
andway Aesarcay ithway ishay armyway asway aboutway ivefay ilesmay istantday omfray atthay owntay,
allway ethay oldway enmay, oinggay outway ofway ethay owntay, eganbay otay etchstray outway eirthay andshay
otay Aesarcay, andway otay intimateway ybay eirthay oicevay atthay eythay ouldway owthray
emselvesthay onway ishay otectionpray andway owerpay, ornay ouldway ontendcay inway armsway
againstway ethay Omanray eoplepay. Inway ikelay annermay, enwhay ehay adhay omecay upway otay ethay
owntay, andway erethay itchedpay ishay ampcay, ethay oysbay andway ethay omenway omfray ethay allway,
ithway outstretchedway andshay, afterway eirthay ustomcay, eggedbay eacepay omfray ethay
Omansray.

Ivxay.Orfay esethay Ivitiacusday eadsplay orfay afterway ethay epartureday ofway ethay
Elgaebay, avinghay ismissedday ethay oopstray ofway ethay Aeduiway, ehay adhay eturnedray otay
Aesarcay. Ethay Ellovacibay adhay atway allway imestay eenbay inway ethay allianceway andway
iendshipfray ofway ethay Aeduanway atestay; atthay eythay adhay evoltedray omfray ethay Aeduiway
andway ademay arway uponway ethay Omanray eoplepay, eingbay urgedway eretothay ybay eirthay oblesnay,
owhay aidsay atthay ethay Aeduiway, educedray otay averyslay ybay Aesarcay, ereway ufferingsay
everyway indignityway andway insultway. Atthay eythay owhay adhay eenbay ethay eaderslay ofway atthay
otplay, ecausebay eythay erceivedpay owhay eatgray away alamitycay eythay adhay oughtbray uponway
ethay atestay, adhay edflay intoway Itainbray. Atthay otnay onlyway ethay Ellovacibay, utbay alsoway
ethay Aeduiway, entreatedway imhay otay useway ishay accustomedway emencyclay andway enitylay
owardstay emthay ethay Ellovacibay ichwhay ifway ehay idday, ehay ouldway increaseway ethay
influenceway ofway ethay Aeduiway amongway allway ethay Elgaebay, ybay osewhay uccoursay andway
esourcesray eythay adhay eenbay accustomedway otay upportsay emselvesthay eneverwhay anyway
arsway occurredway.

Vxay.Aesarcay aidsay atthay onway accountway ofway ishay espectray orfay Ivitiacusday andway ethay
Aeduansway, ehay ouldway eceiveray emthay intoway ishay otectionpray, andway ouldway arespay
emthay; utbay, ecausebay ethay atestay asway ofway eatgray influenceway amongway ethay Elgaebay,
andway eprayeminentway inway ethay umbernay ofway itsway opulationpay, ehay emandedday 600
ostageshay. Enwhay esethay ereway eliveredday, andway allway ethay armsway inway ethay owntay
ollectedcay, ehay entway omfray atthay aceplay intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Ambianiway,
owhay, ithoutway elayday, urrenderedsay emselvesthay andway allway eirthay ossessionspay.
Uponway eirthay erritoriestay orderedbay ethay Erviinay, oncerningcay osewhay aracterchay
andway ustomscay enwhay Aesarcay inquiredway ehay eceivedray ethay ollowingfay informationway
Atthay erethay asway onay accessway orfay erchantsmay otay emthay; atthay eythay ufferedsay onay
ineway andway otherway ingsthay endingtay otay uxurylay otay ebay importedway; ecausebay eythay
oughtthay atthay ybay eirthay useway ethay indmay isway enervatedway andway ethay ouragecay
impairedway atthay eythay ereway away avagesay eoplepay andway ofway eatgray averybray atthay eythay
upbraidedway andway ondemnedcay ethay estray ofway ethay Elgaebay owhay adhay urrenderedsay
emselvesthay otay ethay Omanray eoplepay andway ownthray asideway eirthay ationalnay ouragecay
atthay eythay openlyway eclaredday eythay ouldway eithernay endsay ambassadorsway, ornay
acceptway anyway onditioncay ofway eacepay.

Ixvay.Afterway ehay adhay ademay eethray ays'day archmay oughthray eirthay erritoriestay, ehay
iscoveredday omfray omesay isonerspray, atthay ethay iverray Ambresay asway otnay oremay anthay
entay ilesmay omfray ishay ampcay atthay allway ethay Erviinay adhay ationedstay emselvesthay onway
ethay otherway idesay ofway atthay iverray, andway ogethertay ithway ethay Atrebatesway andway ethay
Eromanduivay, eirthay eighboursnay, ereway erethay awaitingway ethay arrivalway ofway ethay
Omansray; orfay eythay adhay ersuadedpay othbay esethay ationsnay otay tryay ethay amesay
ortunefay ofway arway asway emselvesthay atthay ethay orcesfay ofway ethay Aduatuciway ereway
alsoway expectedway ybay emthay, andway ereway onway eirthay archmay; atthay eythay adhay utpay eirthay
omenway, andway osethay owhay oughthray ageway appearedway uselessway orfay arway, inway away aceplay otay
ichwhay erethay asway onay approachway orfay anway armyway, onway accountway ofway ethay arshesmay.

Iixvay.Avinghay earntlay esethay ingsthay, ehay endssay orwardfay outsscay andway
enturionscay otay oosechay away onvenientcay aceplay orfay ethay ampcay. Andway asway away eatgray
anymay ofway ethay urroundingsay Elgaebay andway otherway Aulsgay, ollowingfay Aesarcay,
archedmay ithway imhay; omesay ofway esethay, asway asway afterwardsway earntlay omfray ethay
isonerspray, avinghay accuratelyway observedway, uringday osethay aysday, ethay army'sway
ethodmay ofway archingmay, entway ybay ightnay otay ethay Erviinay, andway informedway emthay atthay
away eatgray umbernay ofway aggagebayainstray assedpay etweenbay ethay everalsay egionslay, andway
atthay erethay ouldway ebay onay ifficultyday, enwhay ethay irstfay egionlay adhay omecay intoway
ethay ampcay, andway ethay otherway egionslay ereway atway away eatgray istanceday, otay attackway atthay
egionlay ilewhay underway aggagebay, ichwhay eingbay outedray, andway ethay aggagebayaintray
eizedsay, itway ouldway omecay otay asspay atthay ethay otherway egionslay ouldway otnay areday otay
andstay eirthay oundgray. Itway addedway eightway alsoway otay ethay adviceway ofway osethay owhay
eportedray atthay ircumstancecay, atthay ethay Erviinay, omfray earlyway imestay, ecausebay
eythay ereway eakway inway avalrycay orfay otnay evenway atway isthay imetay oday eythay attendway otay
itway, utbay accomplishway ybay eirthay infantryway ateverwhay eythay ancay, inway orderway atthay
eythay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway obstructway ethay avalrycay ofway eirthay eighboursnay ifway
eythay amecay uponway emthay orfay ethay urposepay ofway underingplay, avinghay utcay oungyay
eestray, andway entbay emthay, ybay eansmay ofway eirthay umerousnay anchesbray extendingway onway
otay ethay idessay, andway ethay uickqayiarsbray andway ornsthay ingingspray upway etweenbay emthay,
adhay ademay esethay edgeshay esentpray away ortificationfay ikelay away allway, oughthray ichwhay
itway asway otnay onlyway impossibleway otay enterway, utbay evenway otay enetratepay ithway ethay eyeway.
Incesay ereforethay ethay archmay ofway ourway armyway ouldway ebay obstructedway ybay esethay
ingsthay, ethay Erviinay oughtthay atthay ethay adviceway oughtway otnay otay ebay eglectednay ybay
emthay.

Iiixvay.Ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray ichwhay ourway enmay adhay osenchay orfay ethay ampcay
asway isthay Away illhay, ecliningday evenlyway omfray ethay optay, extendedway otay ethay iverray
Ambresay, ichwhay eway avehay entionedmay aboveway omfray isthay iverray erethay aroseway away
econdsay illhay ofway ikelay ascentway, onway ethay otherway idesay andway oppositeway otay ethay
ormerfay, andway openway omfray aboutway 200 acespay atway ethay owestlay artpay; utbay inway ethay
upperway artpay, oodyway, osay uchmay osay atthay itway asway otnay easyway otay eesay oughthray itway
intoway ethay interiorway. Ithinway osethay oodsway ethay enemyway eptkay emselvesthay inway
oncealmentcay; away ewfay oopstray ofway orsehayoldierssay appearedway onway ethay openway oundgray,
alongway ethay iverray. Ethay epthday ofway ethay iverray asway aboutway eethray eetfay.

Ixxay.Aesarcay, avinghay entsay ishay avalrycay onway eforebay, ollowedfay oseclay afterway
emthay ithway allway ishay orcesfay; utbay ethay anplay andway orderway ofway ethay archmay asway
ifferentday omfray atthay ichwhay ethay Elgaebay adhay eportedray otay ethay Erviinay. Orfay asway
ehay asway approachingway ethay enemyway Aesarcay, accordingway otay ishay ustomcay, edlay onway asway
ethay anvay ixsay egionslay unencumberedway ybay aggagebay; ehindbay emthay ehay adhay acedplay
ethay aggagebayainstray ofway ethay olewhay armyway; enthay ethay otway egionslay ichwhay adhay
eenbay astlay aisedray osedclay ethay earray, andway ereway away uardgay orfay ethay aggagebayaintray.
Ourway orsehay, ithway ethay ingersslay andway archersway, avinghay assedpay ethay iverray,
ommencedcay actionway ithway ethay avalrycay ofway ethay enemyway. Ilewhay eythay omfray
imetay otay imetay etookbay emselvesthay intoway ethay oodsway otay eirthay ompanionscay, andway
againway ademay anway assaultway outway ofway ethay oodway uponway ourway enmay, owhay idday otnay areday otay
ollowfay emthay inway eirthay etreatray urtherfay anthay ethay imitlay otay ichwhay ethay ainplay
andway openway artspay extendedway, inway ethay eantimemay ethay ixsay egionslay ichwhay adhay
arrivedway irstfay, avinghay easuredmay outway ethay orkway, eganbay otay ortifyfay ethay ampcay.
Enwhay ethay irstfay artpay ofway ethay aggagebayaintray ofway ourway armyway asway eensay ybay osethay
owhay aylay idhay inway ethay oodsway, ichwhay adhay eenbay agreedway onway amongway emthay asway ethay
imetay orfay ommencingcay actionway, asway oonsay asway eythay adhay arrangedway eirthay inelay ofway
attlebay andway ormedfay eirthay anksray ithinway ethay oodsway, andway adhay encouragedway oneway
anotherway, eythay ushedray outway uddenlysay ithway allway eirthay orcesfay andway ademay anway
attackway uponway ourway orsehay. Ethay atterlay eingbay easilyway outedray andway ownthray intoway
onfusioncay, ethay Erviinay anray ownday otay ethay iverray ithway uchsay incredibleway eedspay
atthay eythay eemedsay otay ebay inway ethay oodsway, ethay iverray, andway oseclay uponway usway almostway
atway ethay amesay imetay. Andway ithway ethay amesay eedspay eythay astenedhay upway ethay illhay otay
ourway ampcay andway otay osethay owhay ereway employedway inway ethay orksway.

Xxay.Aesarcay adhay everythingway otay oday atway oneway imetay ethay andardstay otay ebay
isplayedday, ichwhay asway ethay ignsay enwhay itway asway ecessarynay otay unray otay armsway; ethay
ignalsay otay ebay ivengay ybay ethay umpettray; ethay oldierssay otay ebay alledcay offway omfray
ethay orksway; osethay owhay adhay oceededpray omesay istanceday orfay ethay urposepay ofway
eekingsay aterialsmay orfay ethay ampartray, otay ebay ummonedsay; ethay orderway ofway attlebay
otay ebay ormedfay; ethay oldierssay otay ebay encouragedway; ethay atchwordway otay ebay ivengay.
Away eatgray artpay ofway esethay arrangementsway asway eventedpray ybay ethay ortnessshay ofway
imetay andway ethay uddensay approachway andway argechay ofway ethay enemyway. Underway esethay
ifficultiesday otway ingsthay ovedpray ofway advantageway; irstfay ethay illskay andway
experienceway ofway ethay oldierssay, ecausebay, avinghay eenbay ainedtray ybay ormerfay
engagementsway, eythay ouldcay uggestsay otay emselvesthay atwhay oughtway otay ebay oneday, asway
onvenientlycay asway eceiveray informationway omfray othersway; andway econdlysay atthay
Aesarcay adhay orbiddenfay ishay everalsay ieutenantslay otay epartday omfray ethay orksway
andway eirthay espectiveray egionslay, eforebay ethay ampcay asway ortifiedfay. Esethay, onway
accountway ofway ethay earnay approachway andway ethay eedspay ofway ethay enemyway, idday otnay enthay
aitway orfay anyway ommandcay omfray Aesarcay, utbay ofway emselvesthay executedway ateverwhay
appearedway operpray.

Ixxay.Aesarcay, avinghay ivengay ethay ecessarynay ordersway, astenedhay otay andway ofray
intoway ateverwhay uarterqay ortunefay arriedcay imhay otay animateway ethay oopstray, andway
amecay otay ethay enthtay egionlay. Avinghay encouragedway ethay oldierssay ithway onay urtherfay
eechspay anthay atthay eythay ouldshay eepkay upway ethay emembranceray ofway eirthay ontedway
alourvay, andway otnay ebay onfusedcay inway indmay, utbay aliantlyvay ustainsay ethay assaultway
ofway ethay enemyway; asway ethay atterlay ereway otnay artherfay omfray emthay anthay ethay
istanceday otay ichwhay away artday ouldcay ebay astcay, ehay avegay ethay ignalsay orfay
ommencingcay attlebay. Andway avinghay onegay otay anotherway uarterqay orfay ethay urposepay ofway
encouragingway ethay oldierssay, ehay indsfay emthay ightingfay. Uchsay asway ethay
ortnessshay ofway ethay imetay, andway osay eterminedday asway ethay indmay ofway ethay enemyway onway
ightingfay, atthay imetay asway antingway otnay onlyway orfay affixingway ethay ilitarymay
insigniaway, utbay evenway orfay uttingpay onway ethay elmetshay andway awingdray offway ethay overscay
omfray ethay ieldsshay. Otay ateverwhay artpay anyway oneway ybay ancechay amecay omfray ethay orksway
inway ichwhay ehay adhay eenbay employedway, andway ateverwhay andardsstay ehay awsay irstfay, atway
esethay ehay oodstay, estlay inway eekingsay ishay ownway ompanycay ehay ouldshay oselay ethay imetay
orfay ightingfay.

Iixxay.Ethay armyway avinghay eenbay arshalledmay, atherray asway ethay aturenay ofway ethay
oundgray andway ethay eclivityday ofway ethay illhay andway ethay exigencyway ofway ethay imetay, anthay
asway ethay ethodmay andway orderway ofway ilitarymay attersmay equiredray; ilstwhay ethay egionslay
inway ethay ifferentday acesplay ereway ithstandingway ethay enemyway, omesay inway oneway
uarterqay, omesay inway anotherway, andway ethay iewvay asway obstructedway ybay ethay eryvay ickthay
edgeshay interveningway, asway eway avehay eforebay emarkedray, eithernay ouldcay operpray
eservesray ebay ostedpay, ornay ouldcay ethay ecessarynay easuresmay ebay akentay inway eachway
artpay, ornay ouldcay allway ethay ommandscay ebay issuedway ybay oneway ersonpay. Ereforethay, inway
uchsay anway unfavourableway atestay ofway affairsway, ariousvay eventsway ofway ortunefay
ollowedfay.

Iiixxay.Ethay oldierssay ofway ethay inthnay andway enthtay egionslay, asway eythay adhay eenbay
ationedstay onway ethay eftlay artpay ofway ethay armyway, astingcay eirthay eaponsway, eedilyspay
ovedray ethay Atrebatesway orfay atthay ivisionday adhay eenbay opposedway otay emthay, owhay
ereway eathlessbray ithway unningray andway atiguefay, andway ornway outway ithway oundsway, omfray
ethay igherhay oundgray intoway ethay iverray; andway ollowingfay emthay asway eythay ereway
endeavouringway otay asspay itway, ewslay ithway eirthay ordssway away eatgray artpay ofway emthay
ilewhay impededway ereinthay. Eythay emselvesthay idday otnay esitatehay otay asspay ethay
iverray; andway avinghay advancedway otay away isadvantageousday aceplay, enwhay ethay attlebay
asway enewedray, eythay everthelessnay againway utpay otay ightflay ethay enemyway, owhay adhay
eturnedray andway ereway opposingway emthay. Inway ikelay annermay, inway anotherway uarterqay otway
ifferentday egionslay, ethay eleventhway andway ethay eighthway, avinghay outedray ethay
Eromanduivay, ithway omwhay eythay adhay engagedway, ereway ightingfay omfray ethay igherhay
oundgray uponway ethay eryvay anksbay ofway ethay iverray. Utbay, almostway ethay olewhay ampcay onway
ethay ontfray andway onway ethay eftlay idesay eingbay enthay exposedway, incesay ethay elfthtway
egionlay asway ostedpay inway ethay ightray ingway, andway ethay eventhsay atway onay eatgray
istanceday omfray itway, allway ethay Erviinay, inway away eryvay oseclay odybay, ithway
Oduognatusbay, owhay eldhay ethay iefchay ommandcay, asway eirthay eaderlay, astenedhay
owardstay atthay aceplay; andway artpay ofway emthay eganbay otay urroundsay ethay egionslay onway
eirthay unprotectedway ankflay, artpay otay akemay orfay ethay ighesthay ointpay ofway ethay
encampmentway.

Ivxxay.Atway ethay amesay imetay ourway orsemenhay, andway ightlayarmedway infantryway, owhay adhay
eenbay ithway osethay owhay, asway Iway avehay elatedray, ereway outedray ybay ethay irstfay assaultway
ofway ethay enemyway, asway eythay ereway etakingbay emselvesthay intoway ethay ampcay, etmay ethay
enemyway acefay otay acefay, andway againway oughtsay ightflay intoway anotherway uarterqay; andway
ethay ampcayollowersfay owhay omfray ethay Ecumanday Ategay andway omfray ethay ighesthay idgeray
ofway ethay illhay adhay eensay ourway enmay asspay ethay iverray asway ictorsvay, enwhay, afterway
oinggay outway orfay ethay urposespay ofway underingplay, eythay ookedlay ackbay andway awsay ethay
enemyway aradingpay inway ourway ampcay, ommittedcay emselvesthay ecipitatelypray otay
ightflay; atway ethay amesay imetay erethay aroseway ethay cryay andway outshay ofway osethay owhay amecay
ithway ethay aggagebayaintray; andway eythay affrightedway ereway arriedcay omesay oneway ayway,
omesay anotherway. Ybay allway esethay ircumstancescay ethay avalrycay ofway ethay Eviritray ereway
uchmay alarmedway osewhay eputationray orfay ouragecay isway extraordinaryway amongway ethay
Aulsgay, andway owhay adhay omecay otay Aesarcay, eingbay entsay ybay eirthay atestay asway
auxiliariesway, andway, enwhay eythay awsay ourway ampcay illedfay ithway away argelay umbernay ofway
ethay enemyway, ethay egionslay ardhay essedpray andway almostway eldhay urroundedsay, ethay
ampcayetainersray, orsemenhay, ingersslay, andway Umidiansnay eeingflay onway allway idessay
ividedday andway atteredscay, eythay, espairingday ofway ourway affairsway, astenedhay omehay,
andway elatedray otay eirthay atestay atthay ethay Omansray ereway outedray andway onqueredcay,
andway atthay ethay enemyway ereway inway ossessionpay ofway eirthay ampcay andway aggagebayaintray.

Xxvay.Aesarcay oceededpray, afterway encouragingway ethay enthtay egionlay, otay ethay ightray
ingway; erewhay ehay erceivedpay atthay ishay enmay ereway ardhay essedpray, andway atthay inway
onsequencecay ofway ethay andardsstay ofway ethay elfthtway egionlay eingbay ollectedcay
ogethertay inway oneway aceplay, ethay owdedcray oldierssay ereway away indrancehay otay
emselvesthay inway ethay ightfay; atthay allway ethay enturionscay ofway ethay ourthfay ohortcay
ereway ainslay, andway ethay andardstayearerbay illedkay, ethay andardstay itselfway ostlay,
almostway allway ethay enturionscay ofway ethay otherway ohortscay eitherway oundedway orway ainslay,
andway amongway emthay ethay iefchay enturioncay ofway ethay egionlay, . Extiussay Aculusbay, away
eryvay aliantvay anmay, owhay asway osay exhaustedway ybay anymay andway everesay oundsway, atthay
ehay asway alreadyway unableway otay upportsay imselfhay; ehay ikewiselay erceivedpay atthay ethay
estray ereway ackeningslay eirthay effortsway, andway atthay omesay, esertedday ybay osethay inway
ethay earray, ereway etiringray omfray ethay attlebay andway avoidingway ethay eaponsway; atthay
ethay enemyway onway ethay otherway andhay, oughthay advancingway omfray ethay owerlay oundgray,
ereway otnay elaxingray inway ontfray, andway ereway atway ethay amesay imetay essingpray ardhay onway
othbay anksflay; ehay alsoway erceivedpay atthay ethay affairway asway atway away isiscray, andway atthay
erethay asway otnay anyway eserveray ichwhay ouldcay ebay oughtbray upway; avinghay ereforethay
atchedsnay away ieldshay omfray oneway ofway ethay oldierssay inway ethay earray orfay ehay imselfhay
adhay omecay ithoutway away ieldshay, ehay advancedway otay ethay ontfray ofway ethay inelay, andway
addressingway ethay enturionscay ybay amenay, andway encouragingway ethay estray ofway ethay
oldierssay, ehay orderedway emthay otay arrycay orwardfay ethay andardsstay, andway extendway ethay
ompaniescay, atthay eythay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway useway eirthay ordssway. Onway ishay
arrivalway, asway opehay asway oughtbray otay ethay oldierssay andway eirthay ouragecay estoredray,
ilstwhay everyway oneway orfay ishay ownway artpay, inway ethay ightsay ofway ishay eneralgay, esiredday
otay exertway ishay utmostway energyway, ethay impetuosityway ofway ethay enemyway asway away ittlelay
eckedchay.

Ixxvay.Aesarcay, enwhay ehay erceivedpay atthay ethay eventhsay egionlay, ichwhay oodstay
oseclay ybay imhay, asway alsoway ardhay essedpray ybay ethay enemyway, irectedday ethay ibunestray
ofway ethay oldierssay otay effectway away unctionjay ofway ethay egionslay aduallygray, andway akemay
eirthay argechay uponway ethay enemyway ithway away oubleday ontfray; ichwhay avinghay eenbay oneday,
incesay eythay oughtbray assistanceway ethay oneway otay ethay otherway, ornay earedfay estlay
eirthay earray ouldshay ebay urroundedsay ybay ethay enemyway, eythay eganbay otay andstay eirthay
oundgray oremay oldlybay, andway otay ightfay oremay ourageouslycay. Inway ethay eantimemay, ethay
oldierssay ofway ethay otway egionslay ichwhay adhay eenbay inway ethay earray ofway ethay armyway, asway away
uardgay orfay ethay aggagebayaintray, uponway ethay attlebay eingbay eportedray otay emthay,
uickenedqay eirthay acepay, andway ereway eensay ybay ethay enemyway onway ethay optay ofway ethay illhay;
andway Itustay Abienuslay, avinghay ainedgay ossessionpay ofway ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway,
andway observedway omfray ethay igherhay oundgray atwhay asway oinggay onway inway ourway ampcay, entsay
ethay enthtay egionlay asway away eliefray otay ourway enmay, owhay, enwhay eythay adhay earntlay omfray
ethay ightflay ofway ethay orsehay andway ethay utlerssay inway atwhay ositionpay ethay affairway asway,
andway inway owhay eatgray angerday ethay ampcay andway ethay egionlay andway ethay ommandercay ereway
involvedway, eftlay undoneway othingnay ichwhay endedtay otay espatchday.

Ixxvay.Ybay eirthay arrivalway, osay eatgray away angechay ofway attersmay asway ademay, atthay ourway
enmay, evenway osethay owhay adhay allenfay ownday exhaustedway ithway oundsway, eantlay onway
eirthay ieldsshay, andway enewedray ethay ightfay enthay ethay ampcayetainersray, oughthay
unarmedway, eeingsay ethay enemyway ompletelycay ismayedday, attackedway emthay oughthay
armedway; ethay orsemenhay ootay, atthay eythay ightmay ybay eirthay alourvay otblay outway ethay
isgraceday ofway eirthay ightflay, ustthray emselvesthay eforebay ethay egionarylay
oldierssay inway allway artspay ofway ethay attlebay. Utbay ethay enemyway, evenway inway ethay astlay
opehay ofway afetysay, isplayedday uchsay eatgray ouragecay atthay enwhay ethay oremostfay ofway
emthay adhay allenfay, ethay extnay oodstay uponway emthay ostratepray, andway oughtfay omfray
eirthay odiesbay; enwhay esethay ereway overthrownway, andway eirthay orpsescay eapedhay upway
ogethertay, osethay owhay urvivedsay astcay eirthay eaponsway againstway ourway enmay
encethay, asway omfray away oundmay, andway eturnedray ourway artsday ichwhay adhay allenfay
etweenbay ethay armiesway; osay atthay itway oughtway otnay otay ebay oncludedcay, atthay enmay ofway
uchsay eatgray ouragecay adhay injudiciouslyway aredday otay asspay away eryvay oadbray iverray,
ascendway eryvay ighhay anksbay, andway omecay upway otay away eryvay isadvantageousday aceplay;
incesay eirthay eatnessgray ofway iritspay adhay enderedray esethay actionsway easyway,
althoughway inway emselvesthay eryvay ifficultday.

Iiixxvay.Isthay attlebay eingbay endedway, andway ethay ationnay andway amenay ofway ethay Erviinay
eingbay almostway educedray otay annihilationway, eirthay oldway enmay, omwhay ogethertay ithway
ethay oysbay andway omenway eway avehay atedstay otay avehay eenbay ollectedcay ogethertay inway ethay
ennyfay acesplay andway arshesmay, onway isthay attlebay avinghay eenbay eportedray otay emthay,
incesay eythay ereway onvincedcay atthay othingnay asway anway obstacleway otay ethay
onquerorscay, andway othingnay afesay otay ethay onqueredcay, entsay ambassadorsway otay
Aesarcay ybay ethay onsentcay ofway allway owhay emainedray, andway urrenderedsay emselvesthay otay
imhay; andway inway ecountingray ethay alamitycay ofway eirthay atestay, aidsay atthay eirthay
enatorssay ereway educedray omfray 600 otay eethray; atthay omfray 60,000 enmay eythay ereway
educedray otay arcelyscay 500 owhay ouldcay earbay armsway; omwhay Aesarcay, atthay ehay ightmay
appearway otay useway ompassioncay owardstay ethay etchedwray andway ethay uppliantsay, ostmay
arefullycay aredspay; andway orderedway emthay otay enjoyway eirthay ownway erritoriestay andway
ownstay, andway ommandedcay eirthay eighboursnay atthay eythay ouldshay estrainray
emselvesthay andway eirthay ependantsday omfray offeringway injuryway orway outrageway otay
emthay.

Ixxxay.Enwhay ethay Aduatuciway, ofway omwhay eway avehay ittenwray aboveway, ereway omingcay
ithway allway eirthay orcesfay otay ethay assistanceway ofway ethay Erviinay, uponway isthay attlebay
eingbay eportedray otay emthay, eythay eturnedray omehay afterway eythay ereway onway ethay archmay;
esertingday allway eirthay ownstay andway ortsfay, eythay onveyedcay ogethertay allway eirthay
ossessionspay intoway oneway owntay, eminentlyway ortifiedfay ybay aturenay. Ilewhay isthay
owntay adhay onway allway idessay aroundway itway eryvay ighhay ocksray andway ecipicespray, erethay
asway eftlay onway oneway idesay away entlygay ascendingway approachway, ofway otnay oremay anthay 200
eetfay inway idthway; ichwhay aceplay eythay adhay ortifiedfay ithway away eryvay oftylay oubleday
allway esidesbay, eythay adhay acedplay onesstay ofway eatgray eightway andway arpenedshay
akesstay uponway ethay allsway. Eythay ereway escendedday omfray ethay Imbricay andway Eutonestay,
owhay, enwhay eythay ereway archingmay intoway ourway ovincepray andway Italyway, avinghay
epositedday onway isthay idesay ethay iverray Inerhay uchsay ofway eirthay aggagebayainstray asway
eythay ouldcay otnay ivedray orway onveycay ithway emthay, eftlay 6000 ofway eirthay enmay asway away
uardgay andway efenceday orfay emthay. Esethay avinghay, afterway ethay estructionday ofway eirthay
ountrymencay, eenbay arassedhay orfay anymay earsyay ybay eirthay eighboursnay, ilewhay oneway
imetay eythay agedway arway offensivelyway, andway atway anotherway esistedray itway enwhay agedway
againstway emthay, oncludedcay away eacepay ithway ethay onsentcay ofway allway, andway osechay isthay
aceplay asway eirthay ettlementsay.

Xxxay.Andway onway ethay irstfay arrivalway ofway ourway armyway eythay ademay equentfray alliessay
omfray ethay owntay, andway ontendedcay ithway ourway enmay inway iflingtray irmishesskay
afterwardsway, enwhay emmedhay inway ybay away ampartray ofway elvetway eetfay inway eighthay, andway
ifteenfay ilesmay inway ircuitcay, eythay eptkay emselvesthay ithinway ethay owntay. Enwhay,
ineaevay avinghay eenbay oughtbray upway andway away oundmay aisedray, eythay observedway atthay away
owertay alsoway asway eingbay uiltbay atway away istanceday, eythay atway irstfay eganbay otay ockmay
ethay Omansray omfray eirthay allway, andway otay aunttay emthay ithway ethay ollowingfay
eechesspay. Orfay atwhay urposepay asway osay astvay away achinemay onstructedcay atway osay
eatgray away istanceday? Ithway atwhay andshay, orway ithway atwhay engthstray idday eythay,
especiallyway asway eythay ereway enmay ofway uchsay eryvay allsmay aturestay orfay ourway
ortnessshay ofway aturestay, inway omparisoncay ithway ethay eatgray izesay ofway eirthay odiesbay,
isway enerallygay away ubjectsay ofway uchmay ontemptcay otay ethay enmay ofway Aulgay, usttray otay
aceplay againstway eirthay allsway away owertay ofway uchsay eatgray eightway.

Ixxxay.Utbay enwhay eythay awsay atthay itway asway eingbay ovedmay, andway asway approachingway
eirthay allsway, artledstay ybay ethay ewnay andway unaccustomedway ightsay, eythay entsay
ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay otay eattray aboutway eacepay; owhay okespay inway ethay ollowingfay
annermay Atthay eythay idday otnay elievebay ethay Omansray agedway arway ithoutway ivineday
aidway, incesay eythay ereway ableway otay ovemay orwardfay achinesmay ofway uchsay away eighthay ithway
osay eatgray eedspay, andway usthay ightfay omfray oseclay uartersqay atthay eythay esignedray
emselvesthay andway allway eirthay ossessionspay otay Aesar'scay isposalday atthay eythay
eggedbay andway earnestlyway entreatedway oneway ingthay, izvay., atthay ifway erchancepay,
agreeablyway otay ishay emencyclay andway umanityhay, ichwhay eythay adhay eardhay ofway omfray
othersway, ehay ouldshay esolveray atthay ethay Aduatuciway ereway otay ebay aredspay, ehay ouldway
otnay epriveday emthay ofway eirthay armsway; atthay allway eirthay eighboursnay ereway enemiesway
otay emthay andway enviedway eirthay ouragecay, omfray omwhay eythay ouldcay otnay efendday
emselvesthay ifway eirthay armsway ereway eliveredday upway atthay itway asway etterbay orfay emthay,
ifway eythay ouldshay ebay educedray otay atthay atestay, otay uffersay anyway atefay omfray ethay
Omanray eoplepay, anthay otay ebay orturedtay otay eathday ybay osethay amongway omwhay eythay adhay
eenbay accustomedway otay uleray.

Iixxxay.Otay esethay ingsthay Aesarcay epliedray, Atthay ehay, inway accordanceway ithway ishay
ustomcay, atherray anthay owingway otay eirthay esertday, ouldshay arespay ethay atestay, ifway
eythay ouldshay urrendersay emselvesthay eforebay ethay atteringbayamray ouldshay ouchtay
ethay allway; utbay atthay erethay asway onay onditioncay ofway urrendersay, exceptway uponway
eirthay armsway eingbay eliveredday upway; atthay ehay ouldshay oday otay emthay atthay ichwhay ehay
adhay oneday inway ethay asecay ofway ethay Erviinay, andway ouldway ommandcay eirthay eighboursnay
otnay otay offerway anyway injuryway otay osethay owhay adhay urrenderedsay otay ethay Omanray
eoplepay. Ethay attermay eingbay eportedray otay eirthay ountrymencay, eythay aidsay atthay
eythay ouldway executeway ishay ommandscay. Avinghay astcay away eryvay argelay uantityqay ofway
eirthay armsway omfray ethay allway intoway ethay enchtray ichwhay asway eforebay ethay owntay, osay
atthay ethay eapshay ofway armsway almostway equalledway ethay optay ofway ethay allway andway ethay
ampartray, andway everthelessnay avinghay etainedray andway oncealedcay, asway eway
afterwardsway iscoveredday, aboutway away irdthay artpay inway ethay owntay, ethay atesgay ereway
openedway, andway eythay enjoyedway eacepay orfay atthay ayday.

Iiixxxay.Owardstay eveningway Aesarcay orderedway ethay atesgay otay ebay utshay, andway ethay
oldierssay otay ogay outway ofway ethay owntay, estlay ethay ownspeopletay ouldshay eceiveray anyway
injuryway omfray emthay ybay ightnay. Eythay ethay Aduatuciway, ybay away esignday eforebay
enteredway intoway, asway eway afterwardsway understoodway, ecausebay eythay elievedbay atthay,
asway away urrendersay adhay eenbay ademay, ourway enmay ouldway ismissday eirthay uardsgay, orway atway
eastlay ouldway eepkay atchway esslay arefullycay, artlypay ithway osethay armsway ichwhay eythay
adhay etainedray andway oncealedcay, artlypay ithway ieldsshay ademay ofway arkbay orway
interwovenway ickersway, ichwhay eythay adhay astilyhay overedcay overway ithway insskay asway
ethay ortnessshay ofway imetay equiredray inway ethay irdthay atchway, uddenlysay ademay away
allysay omfray ethay owntay ithway allway eirthay orcesfay inway atthay irectionday inway ichwhay
ethay ascentway otay ourway ortificationsfay eemedsay ethay eastlay ifficultday. Ethay ignalsay
avinghay eenbay immediatelyway ivengay ybay iresfay, asway Aesarcay adhay eviouslypray
ommandedcay, away ushray asway ademay itherthay _i.eway._ ybay ethay Omanray oldierssay omfray
ethay earestnay ortfay; andway ethay attlebay asway oughtfay ybay ethay enemyway asway igorouslyvay
asway itway oughtway otay ebay oughtfay ybay avebray enmay, inway ethay astlay opehay ofway afetysay, inway away
isadvantageousday aceplay, andway againstway osethay owhay ereway owingthray eirthay eaponsway
omfray away ampartray andway omfray owerstay; incesay allway opehay ofway afetysay ependedday onway
eirthay ouragecay aloneway. Aboutway 4000 ofway ethay enmay avinghay eenbay ainslay, ethay estray
ereway orcedfay ackbay intoway ethay owntay. Ethay ayday afterway, Aesarcay, afterway eakingbray
openway ethay atesgay, ichwhay erethay asway onay oneway enthay otay efendday, andway endingsay inway
ourway oldierssay, oldsay ethay olewhay oilspay ofway atthay owntay. Ethay umbernay ofway 53,000
ersonspay asway eportedray otay imhay ybay osethay owhay adhay oughtbay emthay.

Ivxxxay.Atway ethay amesay imetay ehay asway informedway ybay . Assuscray, omwhay ehay adhay entsay
ithway oneway egionlay againstway ethay Enetivay, ethay Unelliway, ethay Osismiiway, ethay
Uriosolitaecay, ethay Esuviisay, ethay Aulerciway, andway ethay Edonesrhay, ichwhay areway
aritimemay atesstay, andway ouchtay uponway ethay Atlanticway oceanway, atthay allway esethay
ationsnay ereway oughtbray underway ethay ominionday andway owerpay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay.

Vxxxay.Esethay ingsthay eingbay achievedway, andway allway Aulgay eingbay ubduedsay, osay
ighhay anway opinionway ofway isthay arway asway eadspray amongway ethay arbariansbay, atthay
ambassadorsway ereway entsay otay Aesarcay ybay osethay ationsnay owhay eltdway eyondbay ethay
Inerhay, otay omisepray atthay eythay ouldway ivegay ostageshay andway executeway ishay
ommandscay. Ichwhay embassiesway Aesarcay, ecausebay ehay asway asteninghay intoway Italyway
andway Illyricumway, orderedway otay eturnray otay imhay atway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay
ollowingfay ummersay. Ehay imselfhay, avinghay edlay ishay egionslay intoway interwayuartersqay
amongway ethay Arnutescay, ethay Andesway, andway ethay Uronestay, ichwhay atesstay
ereway oseclay otay osethay egionsray inway ichwhay ehay adhay agedway arway, etsay outway orfay
Italyway; andway away anksgivingthay ofway ifteenfay aysday asway ecreedday orfay osethay
achievementsway, uponway eceivingray Aesar'scay etterlay; anway onourhay ichwhay eforebay
atthay imetay adhay eenbay onferredcay onway onenay.



Ookbay Iiiway

Iway.Enwhay Aesarcay asway ettingsay outway orfay Italyway, ehay entsay Erviussay Albagay ithway
ethay elfthtway egionlay andway artpay ofway ethay avalrycay againstway ethay Antuatesnay, ethay
Eragrivay, andway Edunisay, owhay extendway omfray ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Allobrogesway,
andway ethay akelay ofway Enevagay, andway ethay iverray Onerhay otay ethay optay ofway ethay Alpsway. Ethay
easonray orfay endingsay imhay asway, atthay ehay esiredday atthay ethay asspay alongway ethay
Alpsway, oughthray ichwhay ethay Omanray erchantsmay adhay eenbay accustomedway otay aveltray
ithway eatgray angerday, andway underway eatgray impostsway, ouldshay ebay openedway. Ehay
ermittedpay imhay, ifway ehay oughtthay itway ecessarynay, otay ationstay ethay egionlay inway
esethay acesplay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway interingway. Albagay avinghay oughtfay omesay
uccessfulsay attlesbay, andway ormedstay everalsay ofway eirthay ortsfay, uponway ambassadorsway
eingbay entsay otay imhay omfray allway artspay andway ostageshay ivengay andway away eacepay
oncludedcay, eterminedday otay ationstay otway ohortscay amongway ethay Antuatesnay, andway otay
interway inway ersonpay ithway ethay otherway ohortscay ofway atthay egionlay inway away illagevay ofway
ethay Eragrivay, ichwhay isway alledcay Octodurusway; andway isthay illagevay eingbay ituatedsay
inway away alleyvay, ithway away allsmay ainplay annexedway otay itway, isway oundedbay onway allway idessay
ybay eryvay ighhay ountainsmay. Asway isthay illagevay asway ividedday intoway otway artspay ybay away
iverray, ehay antedgray oneway artpay ofway itway otay ethay Aulsgay, andway assignedway ethay otherway,
ichwhay adhay eenbay eftlay ybay emthay unoccupiedway, otay ethay ohortscay otay interway inway. Ehay
ortifiedfay isthay atterlay artpay ithway away ampartray andway away itchday.

Iiway.Enwhay everalsay aysday adhay elapsedway inway interway uartersqay, andway ehay adhay
orderedway orncay otay ebay oughtbray inway, ehay asway uddenlysay informedway ybay ishay outsscay
atthay allway ethay eoplepay adhay onegay offway inway ethay ightnay omfray atthay artpay ofway ethay owntay
ichwhay ehay adhay ivengay upway otay ethay Aulsgay, andway atthay ethay ountainsmay ichwhay unghay
overway itway ereway occupiedway ybay away eryvay argelay orcefay ofway ethay Edanisay andway Eragrivay.
Itway adhay appenedhay orfay everalsay easonsray atthay ethay Aulsgay uddenlysay ormedfay ethay
esignday ofway enewingray ethay arway andway uttingcay offway atthay egionlay. Irstfay, ecausebay
eythay espisedday away inglesay egionlay, onway accountway ofway itsway allsmay umbernay, andway atthay
otnay uiteqay ullfay otway ohortscay avinghay eenbay etachedday, andway everalsay
individualsway eingbay absentway, owhay adhay eenbay espatchedday orfay ethay urposepay ofway
eekingsay ovisionpray; enthay, ikewiselay, ecausebay eythay oughtthay atthay onway accountway
ofway ethay isadvantageousday aracterchay ofway ethay ituationsay, evenway eirthay irstfay
attackway ouldcay otnay ebay ustainedsay ybay usway enwhay eythay ouldway ushray omfray ethay
ountainsmay intoway ethay alleyvay, andway ischargeday eirthay eaponsway uponway usway. Otay isthay
asway addedway, atthay eythay ereway indignantway atthay eirthay ildrenchay ereway orntay omfray
emthay underway ethay itletay ofway ostageshay, andway eythay ereway ersuadedpay atthay ethay
Omansray esignedday otay eizesay uponway ethay ummitssay ofway ethay Alpsway, andway uniteway osethay
artspay otay ethay eighbouringnay ovincepray ofway Aulgay, otnay onlyway otay ecuresay ethay
assespay, utbay alsoway asway away onstantcay ossessionpay.

Iiiway.Avinghay eceivedray esethay idingstay, Albagay, incesay ethay orksway ofway ethay
interway uartersqay andway ethay ortificationsfay ereway otnay ullyfay ompletedcay, ornay asway
ufficientsay eparationpray ademay ithway egardray otay orncay andway otherway ovisionspray
incesay, asway away urrendersay adhay eenbay ademay, andway ostageshay eceivedray, ehay adhay
oughtthay ehay eednay entertainway onay apprehensionway ofway away arway, eedilyspay ummoningsay
away ouncilcay, eganbay otay anxiouslyway inquireway eirthay opinionsway. Inway ichwhay ouncilcay,
incesay osay uchmay uddensay angerday adhay appenedhay ontrarycay otay ethay eneralgay
expectationway, andway almostway allway ethay igherhay acesplay ereway eensay alreadyway overedcay
ithway away ultitudemay ofway armedway enmay, ornay ouldcay eitherway oopstray omecay otay eirthay
eliefray, orway ovisionspray ebay oughtbray inway, asway ethay assespay ereway ockedblay upway ybay
ethay enemyway; afetysay eingbay ownay earlynay espairedday ofway, omesay opinionsway ofway isthay
ortsay ereway eliveredday; atthay, eavinglay eirthay aggagebay, andway akingmay away allysay,
eythay ouldshay astenhay awayway orfay afetysay ybay ethay amesay outesray ybay ichwhay eythay adhay
omecay itherthay. Otay ethay eatergray artpay, oweverhay, itway eemedsay estbay, eservingray
atthay easuremay otay ethay astlay, otay awaitway ethay issueway ofway ethay attermay, andway otay
efendday ethay ampcay.

Ivway.Away ortshay imetay onlyway avinghay elapsedway, osay atthay imetay asway arcelyscay ivengay
orfay arrangingway andway executingway osethay ingsthay ichwhay eythay adhay eterminedday onway,
ethay enemyway, uponway ethay ignalsay eingbay ivengay, ushedray ownday uponway ourway enmay omfray
allway artspay, andway ischargedday onesstay andway artsday uponway ourway ampartray. Ourway enmay atway
irstfay, ilewhay eirthay engthstray asway eshfray, esistedray avelybray, ornay idday eythay
astcay anyway eaponway ineffectuallyway omfray eirthay igherhay ationstay. Asway oonsay asway anyway
artpay ofway ethay ampcay, eingbay estituteday ofway efendersday, eemedsay otay ebay ardhay
essedpray, itherthay eythay anray, andway oughtbray assistanceway. Utbay eythay ereway
overwayatchedmay inway isthay, atthay ethay enemyway enwhay eariedway ybay ethay onglay ontinuancecay
ofway ethay attlebay, entway outway ofway ethay actionway, andway othersway ithway eshfray engthstray
amecay inway eirthay aceplay; onenay ofway ichwhay ingsthay ouldcay ebay oneday ybay ourway enmay, owingway
otay ethay allnesssmay ofway eirthay umbernay; andway otnay onlyway asway ermissionpay otnay ivengay
otay ethay eariedway Omanray otay etireray omfray ethay ightfay, utbay otnay evenway otay ethay
oundedway asway ibertylay antedgray otay uitqay ethay ostpay erewhay ehay adhay eenbay
ationedstay, andway ecoverray.

.Enwhay eythay adhay ownay eenbay ightingfay orfay oremay anthay ixsay ourshay, ithoutway
essationcay, andway otnay onlyway engthstray, utbay evenway eaponsway ereway ailingfay ourway enmay,
andway ethay enemyway ereway essingpray onway oremay igorouslyray, andway adhay egunbay otay
emolishday ethay ampartray andway otay illfay upway ethay enchtray, ilewhay ourway enmay ereway
ecomingbay exhaustedway, andway ethay attermay asway ownay oughtbray otay ethay astlay
extremityway, . Extiussay Aculusbay, away enturioncay ofway ethay irstfay ankray, omwhay eway
avehay elatedray otay avehay eenbay isabledday ybay everesay oundsway inway ethay engagementway
ithway ethay Erviinay, andway alsoway . Olusenusvay, away ibunetray ofway ethay oldierssay, away anmay
ofway eatgray illskay andway alourvay, astenhay otay Albagay, andway assureway imhay atthay ethay onlyway
opehay ofway afetysay aylay inway akingmay away allysay, andway ingtryay ethay astlay esourceray.
Ereuponwhay, assemblingway ethay enturionscay, ehay uicklyqay ivesgay ordersway otay ethay
oldierssay otay iscontinueday ethay ightfay away ortshay imetay, andway onlyway ollectcay ethay
eaponsway ungflay atway emthay, andway ecruitray emselvesthay afterway eirthay atiguefay, andway
afterwardsway, uponway ethay ignalsay eingbay ivengay, allysay orthfay omfray ethay ampcay, andway
aceplay inway eirthay alourvay allway eirthay opehay ofway afetysay.

Ivay.Eythay oday atwhay eythay ereway orderedway; andway, akingmay away uddensay allysay omfray allway
ethay atesgay ofway ethay ampcay, eavelay ethay enemyway ethay eansmay eithernay ofway owingknay
atwhay asway akingtay aceplay, ornay ofway ollectingcay emselvesthay. Ortunefay usthay akingtay
away urntay, ourway enmay urroundsay onway everyway idesay, andway ayslay osethay owhay adhay
entertainedway ethay opehay ofway aininggay ethay ampcay, andway avinghay illedkay oremay anthay
ethay irdthay artpay ofway anway armyway ofway oremay anthay 30,000 enmay ichwhay umbernay ofway ethay
arbariansbay itway appearedway ertaincay adhay omecay upway otay ourway ampcay, utpay otay ightflay
ethay estray enwhay anicpayickenstray, andway oday otnay uffersay emthay otay althay evenway uponway
ethay igherhay oundsgray. Allway ethay orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway eingbay usthay outedray, andway
ippedstray ofway eirthay armsway, ourway enmay etakebay emselvesthay otay eirthay ampcay andway
ortificationsfay. Ichwhay attlebay eingbay inishedfay, inasmuchway asway Albagay asway
unwillingway otay empttay ortunefay againway, andway ememberedray atthay ehay adhay omecay intoway
interway uartersqay ithway oneway esignday, andway awsay atthay ehay adhay etmay ithway away
ifferentday atestay ofway affairsway; ieflychay oweverhay urgedway ybay ethay antway ofway orncay
andway ovisionpray, avinghay ethay extnay ayday urnedbay allway ethay uildingsbay ofway atthay
illagevay, ehay astenshay otay eturnray intoway ethay ovincepray; andway asway onay enemyway opposedway
orway inderedhay ishay archmay, ehay oughtbray ethay egionlay afesay intoway ethay ountrycay ofway
ethay Antuatesnay, encethay intoway atthay ofway ethay Allobrogesway, andway erethay
interedway.

Iivay.Esethay ingsthay eingbay achievedway, ilewhay Aesarcay adhay everyway easonray otay
upposesay atthay Aulgay asway educedray otay away atestay ofway anquillitytray, ethay Elgaebay
eingbay overcomeway, ethay Ermansgay expelledway, ethay Edunisay amongway ethay Alpsway
efeatedday, andway enwhay ehay adhay, ereforethay, inway ethay eginningbay ofway interway, etsay
outway orfay Illyricumway, asway ehay ishedway otay isitvay osethay ationsnay, andway acquireway away
owledgeknay ofway eirthay ountriescay, away uddensay arway angspray upway inway Aulgay. Ethay
occasionway ofway atthay arway asway isthay . Assuscray, away oungyay anmay, adhay akentay upway ishay
interway uartersqay ithway ethay eventhsay egionlay amongway ethay Andesway, owhay orderbay uponway
ethay Atlanticway oceanway. Ehay, asway erethay asway away arcityscay ofway orncay inway osethay
artspay, entsay outway omesay officersway ofway avalrycay andway everalsay ilitarymay ibunestray
amongstway ethay eighbouringnay atesstay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway ocuringpray orncay andway
ovisionpray; inway ichwhay umbernay . Errasidiustay asway entsay amongstway ethay Esubiiway;
. Ebiustray Allusgay amongstway ethay Uriosolitaecay; . Elaniusvay, ithway . Iliussay,
amongstway ethay Enetivay.

Iiivay.Ethay influenceway ofway isthay atestay isway ybay arfay ethay ostmay onsiderablecay ofway
anyway ofway ethay ountriescay onway ethay olewhay easay oastcay, ecausebay ethay Enetivay othbay
avehay away eryvay eatgray umbernay ofway ipsshay, ithway ichwhay eythay avehay eenbay accustomedway
otay ailsay otay Itainbray, andway usthay excelway ethay estray inway eirthay owledgeknay andway
experienceway ofway auticalnay affairsway; andway asway onlyway away ewfay ortspay ielay atteredscay
alongway atthay ormystay andway openway easay, ofway ichwhay eythay areway inway ossessionpay, eythay
oldhay asway ibutariestray almostway allway osethay owhay areway accustomedway otay affictray inway
atthay easay. Ithway emthay aroseway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay evoltray ybay eirthay
etainingday Iliussay andway Elaniusvay; orfay eythay oughtthay atthay eythay ouldshay ecoverray
ybay eirthay eansmay ethay ostageshay ichwhay eythay adhay ivengay otay Assuscray. Ethay
eighbouringnay eoplepay, edlay onway ybay eirthay influenceway asway ethay easuresmay ofway ethay
Aulsgay areway uddensay andway astyhay, etainday Ebiustray andway Errasidiustay orfay ethay amesay
otivemay; andway uicklyqay endingsay ambassadorsway, ybay eansmay ofway eirthay eadinglay enmay,
eythay enterway intoway away utualmay ompactcay otay oday othingnay exceptway ybay eneralgay
onsentcay, andway abideway ethay amesay issueway ofway ortunefay; andway eythay olicitsay ethay otherway
atesstay otay oosechay atherray otay ontinuecay inway atthay ibertylay ichwhay eythay adhay
eceivedray omfray eirthay ancestorsway, anthay endureway averyslay underway ethay Omansray. Allway
ethay easay oastcay eingbay uicklyqay oughtbray overway otay eirthay entimentssay, eythay endsay
away ommoncay embassyway otay . Assuscray otay aysay, Ifway ehay ishedway otay eceiveray ackbay
ishay officersway, etlay imhay endsay ackbay otay emthay eirthay ostageshay.

Ixway.Aesarcay, eingbay informedway ofway esethay ingsthay ybay Assuscray, incesay ehay asway osay
arfay istantday imselfhay, ordersway ipsshay ofway arway otay ebay uiltbay inway ethay eantimemay onway
ethay iverray Oirelay, ichwhay owsflay intoway ethay oceanway; owersray otay ebay aisedray omfray
ethay ovincepray; ailorssay andway ilotspay otay ebay ovidedpray. Esethay attersmay eingbay
uicklyqay executedway, ehay imselfhay, asway oonsay asway ethay easonsay ofway ethay earyay ermitspay,
astenshay otay ethay armyway. Ethay Enetivay, andway ethay otherway atesstay alsoway, eingbay
informedway ofway Aesar'scay arrivalway, enwhay eythay eflectedray owhay eatgray away imecray eythay
adhay ommittedcay, inway atthay ethay ambassadorsway away aracterchay ichwhay adhay amongstway
allway ationsnay everway eenbay acredsay andway inviolableway adhay ybay emthay eenbay etainedday
andway ownthray intoway isonpray, esolveray otay eparepray orfay away arway inway oportionpray otay
ethay eatnessgray ofway eirthay angerday, andway especiallyway otay ovidepray osethay ingsthay
ichwhay appertainway otay ethay ervicesay ofway away avynay; ithway ethay eatergray onfidencecay,
inasmuchway asway eythay eatlygray eliedray onway ethay aturenay ofway eirthay ituationsay. Eythay
ewknay atthay ethay assespay ybay andlay ereway utcay offway ybay estuariesway, atthay ethay
approachway ybay easay asway ostmay ifficultday, ybay easonray ofway ourway ignoranceway ofway ethay
ocalitieslay, andway ethay allsmay umbernay ofway ethay arbourshay, andway eythay ustedtray
atthay ourway armyway ouldway otnay ebay ableway otay aystay eryvay onglay amongway emthay, onway accountway
ofway ethay insufficiencyway ofway orncay; andway againway, evenway ifway allway esethay ingsthay ouldshay
urntay outway ontrarycay otay eirthay expectationway, etyay eythay ereway eryvay owerfulpay inway
eirthay avynay. Eythay, ellway understoodway atthay ethay Omansray eithernay adhay anyway umbernay
ofway ipsshay, ornay ereway acquaintedway ithway ethay allowsshay, ethay arbourshay, orway ethay
islandsway ofway osethay artspay erewhay eythay ouldway avehay otay arrycay onway ethay arway; andway
atthay avigationnay asway eryvay ifferentday inway away arrownay easay omfray atwhay itway asway inway
ethay astvay andway openway oceanway. Avinghay omecay otay isthay esolutionray, eythay ortifyfay
eirthay ownstay, onveycay orncay intoway emthay omfray ethay ountrycay artspay, ingbray
ogethertay asway anymay ipsshay asway ossiblepay otay Enetiavay, erewhay itway appearedway Aesarcay
ouldway atway irstfay arrycay onway ethay arway. Eythay uniteway otay emselvesthay asway alliesway orfay
atthay arway, ethay Osismiiway, ethay Exoviilay, ethay Annetesnay, ethay Ambiliatiway, ethay
Orinimay, ethay Iablintesday, andway ethay Enapiimay; andway endsay orfay auxiliariesway omfray
Itainbray, ichwhay isway ituatedsay overway againstway osethay egionsray.

.Erethay ereway esethay ifficultiesday ichwhay eway avehay entionedmay aboveway, inway
arryingcay onway ethay arway, utbay anymay ingsthay, everthelessnay, urgedway Aesarcay otay atthay
arway; ethay openway insultway offeredway otay ethay atestay inway ethay etentionday ofway ethay Omanray
ightsknay, ethay ebellionray aisedray afterway urrenderingsay, ethay evoltray afterway
ostageshay ereway ivengay, ethay onfederacycay ofway osay anymay atesstay, utbay incipallypray,
estlay ifway ethay onductcay ofway isthay artpay asway overlookedway, ethay otherway ationsnay
ouldshay inkthay atthay ethay amesay ingthay asway ermittedpay emthay. Ereforewhay, incesay ehay
eflectedray atthay almostway allway ethay Aulsgay ereway ondfay ofway evolutionray, andway easilyway
andway uicklyqay excitedway otay arway; atthay allway enmay ikewiselay, ybay aturenay, ovelay
ibertylay andway atehay ethay onditioncay ofway averyslay, ehay oughtthay ehay oughtway otay ivideday
andway oremay idelyway istributeday ishay armyway, eforebay oremay atesstay ouldshay oinjay ethay
onfederationcay.

Ixay.Ehay ereforethay endssay . Abienuslay, ishay ieutenantlay, ithway ethay avalrycay otay
ethay Eviritray, owhay areway earestnay otay ethay iverray Inerhay. Ehay argeschay imhay otay isitvay
ethay Emiray andway ethay otherway Elgiansbay, andway otay eepkay emthay inway eirthay allegianceway
andway epelray ethay Ermansgay owhay ereway aidsay otay avehay eenbay ummonedsay ybay ethay Elgaebay
otay eirthay aidway ifway eythay attemptedway otay osscray ethay iverray ybay orcefay inway eirthay
ipsshay. Ehay ordersway . Assuscray otay oceedpray intoway Aquitaniaway ithway elvetway
egionarylay ohortscay andway away eatgray umbernay ofway ethay avalrycay, estlay auxiliariesway
ouldshay ebay entsay intoway Aulgay ybay esethay atesstay, andway uchsay eatgray ationsnay ebay
unitedway. Ehay endssay . Ituriustay Abinussay, ishay ieutenantlay, ithway eethray
egionslay, amongway ethay Unelliway, ethay Uriosolitaecay, andway ethay Exoviilay, otay aketay
arecay atthay eirthay orcesfay ouldshay ebay eptkay eparatesay omfray ethay estray. Ehay
appointsway . Utusbray, away oungyay anmay, overway ethay eetflay andway osethay Allicgay esselsvay
ichwhay ehay adhay orderedway otay ebay urnishedfay ybay ethay Ictonespay andway ethay Antonisay,
andway ethay otherway ovincespray ichwhay emainedray atway eacepay; andway ommandscay imhay otay
oceedpray owardstay ethay Enetivay, asway oonsay asway ehay ouldcay. Ehay imselfhay astenshay
itherthay ithway ethay andlay orcesfay.

Iixay.Ethay itessay ofway eirthay ownstay ereway enerallygay uchsay atthay, eingbay acedplay onway
extremeway ointspay ofway andlay andway onway omontoriespray, eythay eithernay adhay anway
approachway ybay andlay enwhay ethay idetay adhay ushedray inway omfray ethay ainmay oceanway, ichwhay
alwaysway appenshay icetway inway ethay acespay ofway elvetway ourshay; ornay ybay ipsshay,
ecausebay, uponway ethay idetay ebbingway againway, ethay ipsshay ereway ikelylay otay ebay ashedday
uponway ethay oalsshay. Usthay, ybay eitherway ircumstancecay, asway ethay ormingstay ofway eirthay
ownstay enderedray ifficultday; andway ifway atway anyway imetay erchancepay ethay Enetivay,
overpoweredway ybay ethay eatnessgray ofway ourway orksway ethay easay avinghay eenbay excludedway
ybay away oundmay andway argelay amsday, andway ethay atterlay eingbay ademay almostway equalway inway
eighthay otay ethay allsway ofway ethay owntay, adhay egunbay otay espairday ofway eirthay
ortunesfay, ingingbray upway away argelay umbernay ofway ipsshay, ofway ichwhay eythay adhay away eryvay
eatgray uantityqay, eythay arriedcay offway allway eirthay opertypray andway etookbay
emselvesthay otay ethay earestnay ownstay; erethay eythay againway efendedday emselvesthay ybay
ethay amesay advantagesway ofway ituationsay. Eythay idday isthay ethay oremay easilyway uringday away
eatgray artpay ofway ethay ummersay, ecausebay ourway ipsshay ereway eptkay ackbay ybay ormsstay,
andway ethay ifficultyday ofway ailingsay asway eryvay eatgray inway atthay astvay andway openway easay,
ithway itsway ongstray idestay andway itsway arbourshay arfay apartway andway exceedinglyway ewfay inway
umbernay.

Iiixay.Orfay eirthay ipsshay ereway uiltbay andway equippedway afterway isthay annermay. Ethay
eelskay ereway omewhatsay atterflay anthay osethay ofway ourway ipsshay, erebywhay eythay ouldcay
oremay easilyway encounterway ethay allowsshay andway ethay ebbingway ofway ethay idetay ethay owspray
ereway aisedray eryvay ighhay, andway inway ikelay annermay ethay ernsstay ereway adaptedway otay ethay
orcefay ofway ethay avesway andway ormsstay ichwhay eythay ereway ormedfay otay ustainsay. Ethay
ipsshay ereway uiltbay ollywhay ofway oakway, andway esignedday otay endureway anyway orcefay andway
iolencevay ateverwhay; ethay enchesbay, ichwhay ereway ademay ofway anksplay away ootfay inway
eadthbray, ereway astenedfay ybay ironway ikesspay ofway ethay icknessthay ofway away an'smay umbthay;
ethay anchorsway ereway ecuredsay astfay ybay ironway ainschay insteadway ofway ablescay, andway orfay
ailssay eythay usedway insskay andway inthay esseddray eatherlay. Esethay ereway usedway eitherway
oughthray eirthay antway ofway anvascay andway eirthay ignoranceway ofway itsway applicationway, orway
orfay isthay easonray, ichwhay isway oremay obablepray, atthay eythay oughtthay atthay uchsay
ormsstay ofway ethay oceanway, andway uchsay iolentvay alesgay ofway indway ouldcay otnay ebay
esistedray ybay ailssay, ornay ipsshay ofway uchsay eatgray urdenbay ebay onvenientlycay enoughway
anagedmay ybay emthay. Ethay encounterway ofway ourway eetflay ithway esethay ipsshay asway ofway uchsay
away aturenay atthay ourway eetflay excelledway inway eedspay aloneway, andway ethay ingplyay ofway ethay
oarsway; otherway ingsthay, onsideringcay ethay aturenay ofway ethay aceplay andway ethay
iolencevay ofway ethay ormsstay, ereway oremay uitablesay andway etterbay adaptedway onway eirthay
idesay; orfay eithernay ouldcay ourway ipsshay injureway eirsthay ithway eirthay eaksbay osay
eatgray asway eirthay engthstray, ornay onway accountway ofway eirthay eighthay asway away eaponway
easilyway astcay upway otay emthay; andway orfay ethay amesay easonray eythay ereway esslay eadilyray
ockedlay inway ybay ocksray. Otay isthay asway addedway, atthay eneverwhay away ormstay eganbay otay
ageray andway eythay anray eforebay ethay indway, eythay othbay ouldcay eatherway ethay ormstay
oremay easilyway andway eavehay otay ecurelysay inway ethay allowsshay, andway enwhay eftlay ybay ethay
idetay earedfay othingnay omfray ocksray andway elvesshay ethay iskray ofway allway ichwhay ingsthay
asway uchmay otay ebay eadeddray ybay ourway ipsshay.

Ivxay.Aesarcay, afterway akingtay anymay ofway eirthay ownstay, erceivingpay atthay osay uchmay
abourlay asway entspay inway ainvay andway atthay ethay ightflay ofway ethay enemyway ouldcay otnay ebay
eventedpray onway ethay apturecay ofway eirthay ownstay, andway atthay injuryway ouldcay otnay ebay
oneday emthay, ehay eterminedday otay aitway orfay ishay eetflay. Asway oonsay asway itway amecay upway
andway asway irstfay eensay ybay ethay enemyway, aboutway 220 ofway eirthay ipsshay, ullyfay
