equippedway andway appointedway ithway everyway indkay ofway avalnay implementway, ailedsay
orthfay omfray ethay arbourhay, andway ewdray upway oppositeway otay oursway; ornay idday itway appearway
earclay otay Utusbray, owhay ommandedcay ethay eetflay, orway otay ethay ibunestray ofway ethay
oldierssay andway ethay enturionscay, otay omwhay ethay everalsay ipsshay ereway assignedway,
atwhay otay oday, orway atwhay temsysay ofway acticstay otay adoptway; orfay eythay ewknay atthay
amageday ouldcay otnay ebay oneday ybay eirthay eaksbay; andway atthay, althoughway urretstay ereway
uiltbay onway eirthay ecksday, etyay ethay eighthay ofway ethay emsstay ofway ethay arbarianbay
ipsshay exceededway esethay; osay atthay eaponsway ouldcay otnay ebay astcay upway omfray ourway
owerlay ositionpay ithway ufficientsay effectway, andway osethay astcay ybay ethay Aulsgay ellfay
ethay oremay orciblyfay uponway usway. Oneway ingthay ovidedpray ybay ourway enmay asway ofway eatgray
ervicesay, izvay. arpshay ookshay insertedway intoway andway astenedfay uponway olespay, ofway away
ormfay otnay unlikeway ethay ookshay usedway inway attackingway owntay allsway. Enwhay ethay opesray
ichwhay astenedfay ethay ailsayardsyay otay ethay astsmay ereway aughtcay ybay emthay andway
ulledpay, andway ourway esselvay igorouslyvay impelledway ithway ethay oarsway, eythay ethay
opesray ereway everedsay; andway enwhay eythay ereway utcay awayway, ethay ardsyay ecessarilynay
ellfay ownday; osay atthay asway allway ethay opehay ofway ethay Allicgay esselsvay ependedday onway
eirthay ailssay andway iggingray, uponway esethay eingbay utcay awayway, ethay entireway
anagementmay ofway ethay ipsshay asway akentay omfray emthay atway ethay amesay imetay. Ethay estray
ofway ethay ontestcay ependedday onway ouragecay; inway ichwhay ourway enmay ecidedlyday adhay ethay
advantageway; andway ethay oremay osay ecausebay ethay olewhay actionway asway arriedcay onway inway
ethay ightsay ofway Aesarcay andway ethay entireway armyway; osay atthay onay actway, away ittlelay oremay
aliantvay anthay ordinaryway, ouldcay asspay unobservedway, orfay allway ethay illshay andway
igherhay oundsgray, omfray ichwhay erethay asway away earnay ospectpray ofway ethay easay, ereway
occupiedway ybay ourway armyway.

Vxay.Ethay ailsayardsyay ofway ethay enemyway, asway eway avehay aidsay, eingbay oughtbray ownday,
althoughway otway andway inway omesay asescay eethray ipsshay ofway eirsthay urroundedsay eachway
oneway ofway oursway, ethay oldierssay ovestray ithway ethay eatestgray energyway otay oardbay ethay
ipsshay ofway ethay enemyway andway, afterway ethay arbariansbay observedway isthay akingtay
aceplay, asway away eatgray anymay ofway eirthay ipsshay ereway eatenbay, andway asway onay eliefray orfay
atthay evilway ouldcay ebay iscoveredday, eythay astenedhay otay eeksay afetysay inway ightflay.
Andway, avinghay ownay urnedtay eirthay esselsvay otay atthay uarterqay inway ichwhay ethay indway
ewblay, osay eatgray away almcay andway ulllay uddenlysay aroseway, atthay eythay ouldcay otnay ovemay
outway ofway eirthay aceplay, ichwhay ircumstancecay, ulytray, asway exceedinglyway opportuneway
orfay inishingfay ethay usinessbay; orfay ourway enmay avegay asechay andway ooktay emthay oneway ybay
oneway, osay atthay eryvay ewfay outway ofway allway ethay umbernay, andway osethay ybay ethay
interventionway ofway ightnay, arrivedway atway ethay andlay, afterway ethay attlebay adhay astedlay
almostway omfray ethay ourthfay ourhay illtay unsetsay.

Ixvay.Ybay isthay attlebay ethay arway ithway ethay Enetivay andway ethay olewhay ofway ethay easay
oastcay asway inishedfay; orfay othbay allway ethay outhyay, andway allway, ootay, ofway oremay
advancedway ageway, inway omwhay erethay asway anyway iscretionday orway ankray, adhay assembledway inway
atthay attlebay; andway eythay adhay ollectedcay inway atthay oneway aceplay ateverwhay avalnay
orcesfay eythay adhay anywhereway; andway enwhay esethay ereway ostlay, ethay urvivorssay adhay onay
aceplay otay etreatray otay, ornay eansmay ofway efendingday eirthay ownstay. Eythay
accordinglyway urrenderedsay emselvesthay andway allway eirthay ossessionspay otay Aesarcay,
onway omwhay Aesarcay oughtthay atthay unishmentpay ouldshay ebay inflictedway ethay oremay
everelysay, inway orderway atthay orfay ethay uturefay ethay ightsray ofway ambassadorsway ightmay
ebay oremay arefullycay espectedray, ybay arbariansbay avinghay, ereforethay, utpay otay
eathday allway eirthay enatesay, ehay oldsay ethay estray orfay avesslay.

Iixvay.Ilewhay esethay ingsthay areway oinggay onway amongstway ethay Enetivay, . Ituriustay
Abinussay ithway osethay oopstray ichwhay ehay adhay eceivedray omfray Aesarcay, arrivesway inway
ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Unelliway. Overway esethay eoplepay Iridovixvay uledray, andway
eldhay ethay iefchay ommandcay ofway allway osethay atesstay ichwhay adhay evoltedray omfray
ichwhay ehay adhay ollectedcay away argelay andway owerfulpay armyway. Andway inway osethay ewfay aysday,
ethay Aulerciway andway ethay Exoviisay, avinghay ainslay eirthay enatesay ecausebay eythay
ouldway otnay onsentcay otay ebay omoterspray ofway ethay arway, utshay eirthay atesgay againstway
usway andway unitedway emselvesthay otay Iridovixvay; away eatgray ultitudemay esidesbay ofway
esperateday enmay andway obbersray assembledway outway ofway Aulgay omfray allway uartersqay, omwhay
ethay opehay ofway underingplay andway ethay ovelay ofway ightingfay adhay alledcay awayway omfray
usbandryhay andway eirthay ailyday abourlay. Abinussay eptkay imselfhay ithinway ishay ampcay,
ichwhay asway inway away ositionpay onvenientcay orfay everythingway; ilewhay Iridovixvay
encampedway overway againstway imhay atway away istanceday ofway otway ilesmay, andway ailyday ingingbray
outway ishay orcesfay, avegay imhay anway opportunityway ofway ightingfay; osay atthay Abinussay adhay
ownay otnay onlyway omecay intoway ontemptcay ithway ethay enemyway, utbay alsoway asway omewhatsay
auntedtay ybay ethay eechesspay ofway ourway oldierssay; andway urnishedfay osay eatgray away
uspicionsay ofway ishay owardicecay atthay ethay enemyway esumedpray otay approachway evenway otay
ethay eryvay ampartray ofway ourway ampcay. Ehay adoptedway isthay onductcay orfay ethay ollowingfay
easonray ecausebay ehay idday otnay inkthay atthay away ieutenantlay oughtway otay engageway inway
attlebay ithway osay eatgray away orcefay, especiallyway ilewhay ehay owhay eldhay ethay iefchay
ommandcay asway absentway, exceptway onway advantageousway oundgray orway omesay avourablefay
ircumstancecay esentedpray itselfway.

Iiixvay.Afterway avinghay establishedway isthay uspicionsay ofway ishay owardicecay, ehay
electedsay away ertaincay uitablesay andway aftycray Aulgay, owhay asway oneway ofway osethay omwhay
ehay adhay ithway imhay asway auxiliariesway. Ehay inducesway imhay ybay eatgray iftsgay andway
omisespray otay ogay overway otay ethay enemyway; andway informsway imhay ofway atwhay ehay ishedway otay
ebay oneday. Owhay, enwhay ehay arrivesway amongstway emthay asway away eserterday, ayslay eforebay
emthay ethay earsfay ofway ethay Omansray; andway informsway emthay ybay atwhay ifficultiesday
Aesarcay imselfhay asway arassedhay, andway atthay ethay attermay asway otnay arfay emovedray
omfray isthayatthay Abinussay ouldway ethay extnay ightnay ivatelypray awdray offway ishay armyway
outway ofway ethay ampcay andway etsay orthfay otay Aesarcay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway arryingcay
imhay assistanceway, ichwhay, enwhay eythay eardhay, eythay allway cryay outway ogethertay atthay
anway opportunityway ofway uccessfullysay onductingcay eirthay enterpriseway oughtway otnay otay
ebay ownthray awayway; atthay eythay oughtway otay ogay otay ethay Omanray ampcay. Anymay ingsthay
ersuadedpay ethay Aulsgay otay isthay easuremay; ethay elayday ofway Abinussay uringday ethay
eviouspray aysday; ethay ositivepay assertionway ofway ethay etendedpray eserterday; antway
ofway ovisionspray, orfay away upplysay ofway ichwhay eythay adhay otnay akentay ethay equisiteray
ecautionspray; ethay opehay ingingspray omfray ethay Eneticvay arway; andway alsoway ecausebay
inway ostmay asescay enmay illinglyway elievebay atwhay eythay ishway. Influencedway ybay esethay
ingsthay, eythay oday otnay ischargeday Iridovixvay andway ethay otherway eaderslay omfray ethay
ouncilcay, eforebay eythay ainedgay ermissionpay omfray emthay otay aketay upway armsway andway
astenhay otay ourway ampcay; ichwhay eingbay antedgray, ejoicingray asway ifway ictoryvay ereway
ullyfay ertaincay, eythay ollectedcay aggotsfay andway ushwoodbray, ithway ichwhay otay illfay
upway ethay Omanray enchestray, andway astenhay otay ethay ampcay.

Ixxay.Ethay ituationsay ofway ethay ampcay asway away isingray oundgray, entlygay opingslay omfray
ethay ottombay orfay aboutway away ilemay. Itherthay eythay oceededpray ithway eatgray eedspay inway
orderway atthay asway ittlelay imetay asway ossiblepay ightmay ebay ivengay otay ethay Omansray otay
ollectcay andway armway emselvesthay, andway arrivedway uiteqay outway ofway eathbray. Abinussay
avinghay encouragedway ishay enmay, ivesgay emthay ethay ignalsay, ichwhay eythay earnestlyway
esiredday. Ilewhay ethay enemyway ereway encumberedway ybay easonray ofway ethay urdensbay ichwhay
eythay ereway arryingcay, ehay ordersway away allysay otay ebay uddenlysay ademay omfray otway atesgay
ofway ethay ampcay. Itway appenedhay, ybay ethay advantageway ofway ituationsay, ybay ethay
unskilfulnessway andway ethay atiguefay ofway ethay enemyway, ybay ethay alourvay ofway ourway
oldierssay, andway eirthay experienceway inway ormerfay attlesbay, atthay eythay ouldcay otnay
andstay oneway attackway ofway ourway enmay, andway immediatelyway urnedtay eirthay acksbay andway ourway
enmay ithway ullfay igourvay ollowedfay emthay ilewhay isorderedday, andway ewslay away eatgray
umbernay ofway emthay; ethay orsehay ursuingpay ethay estray, eftlay utbay ewfay, owhay escapedway
ybay ightflay. Usthay atway ethay amesay imetay, Abinussay asway informedway ofway ethay avalnay
attlebay andway Aesarcay ofway ictoryvay ainedgay ybay Abinussay; andway allway ethay atesstay
immediatelyway urrenderedsay emselvesthay otay Ituriustay orfay asway ethay empertay ofway ethay
Aulsgay isway impetuousway andway eadyray otay undertakeway arsway, osay eirthay indmay isway eakway,
andway ybay onay eansmay esoluteray inway enduringway alamitiescay.

Xxay.Aboutway ethay amesay imetay, . Assuscray, enwhay ehay adhay arrivedway inway Aquitaniaway
ichwhay, asway ashay eenbay eforebay aidsay, othbay omfray itsway extentway ofway erritorytay andway
ethay eatgray umbernay ofway itsway eoplepay, isway otay ebay eckonedray away irdthay artpay ofway Aulgay,
understandingway atthay ehay asway otay ageway arway inway esethay artspay, erewhay away ewfay earsyay
eforebay . Aleriusvay Aeconinuspray, ethay ieutenantlay, adhay eenbay illedkay, andway ishay
armyway outedray, andway omfray ichwhay . Aniliusmay, ethay oconsulpray, adhay edflay ithway
ethay osslay ofway ishay aggagebay, ehay erceivedpay atthay onay ordinaryway arecay ustmay ebay usedway
ybay imhay. Ereforewhay, avinghay ovidedpray orncay, ocuredpray auxiliariesway andway
avalrycay, andway avinghay ummonedsay ybay amenay anymay aliantvay enmay omfray Olosatay,
Arcasocay, andway Arbonay, ichwhay areway ethay atesstay ofway ethay ovincepray ofway Aulgay, atthay
orderbay onway esethay egionsray Aquitaniaway, ehay edlay ishay armyway intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Otiatessay. Onway ishay arrivalway eingbay ownknay, ethay Otiatessay
avinghay oughtbray ogethertay eatgray orcesfay andway uchmay avalrycay, inway ichwhay eirthay
engthstray incipallypray aylay, andway assailingway ourway armyway onway ethay archmay, engagedway
irstfay inway away avalrycay actionway, enthay enwhay eirthay avalrycay asway outedray, andway ourway
enmay ursuingpay, eythay uddenlysay isplayday eirthay infantryway orcesfay, ichwhay eythay
adhay acedplay inway ambuscadeway inway away alleyvay. Esethay attackedway ourway enmay ilewhay
isorderedday, andway enewedray ethay ightfay.

Ixxay.Ethay attlebay asway onglay andway igorouslyvay ontestedcay, incesay ethay Otiatessay,
elyingray onway eirthay ormerfay ictoriesvay, imaginedway atthay ethay afetysay ofway ethay olewhay
ofway Aquitaniaway estedray onway eirthay alourvay; andway ourway enmay, onway ethay otherway andhay,
esiredday itway ightmay ebay eensay atwhay eythay ouldcay accomplishway ithoutway eirthay
eneralgay andway ithoutway ethay otherway egionslay, underway away eryvay oungyay ommandercay; atway
engthlay ethay enemyway, ornway outway ithway oundsway, eganbay otay urntay eirthay acksbay, andway away
eatgray umbernay ofway emthay eingbay ainslay, Assuscray eganbay otay esiegebay ethay
incipalpray owntay ofway ethay Otiatessay onway ishay archmay. Uponway eirthay aliantlyvay
esistingray, ehay aisedray ineaevay andway urretstay. Eythay atway oneway imetay attemptingway away
allysay, atway anotherway ormingfay inesmay otay ourway ampartray andway ineaevay atway ichwhay ethay
Aquitaniway areway eminentlyway illedskay, ecausebay inway anymay acesplay amongstway emthay
erethay areway oppercay inesmay; enwhay eythay erceivedpay atthay othingnay ouldcay ebay
ainedgay ybay esethay operationsway oughthray ethay erseverancepay ofway ourway enmay, eythay
endsay ambassadorsway otay Assuscray, andway entreatway imhay otay admitway emthay otay away
urrendersay. Avinghay obtainedway itway, eythay, eingbay orderedway otay eliverday upway eirthay
armsway, omplycay.

Iixxay.Andway ilewhay ethay attentionway ofway ourway enmay isway engagedway inway atthay attermay, inway
anotherway artpay Adcantuannusway, owhay eldhay ethay iefchay ommandcay, ithway 600 evotedday
ollowersfay, omwhay eythay allcay olduriisay ethay onditionscay ofway osewhay associationway
areway esethay,atthay eythay enjoyway allway ethay onveniencescay ofway ifelay ithway osethay otay
osewhay iendshipfray eythay avehay evotedday emselvesthay ifway anythingway alamitouscay
appenhay otay emthay, eitherway eythay endureway ethay amesay estinyday ogethertay ithway emthay,
orway ommitcay uicidesay ornay ithertohay, inway ethay emorymay ofway enmay, ashay erethay eenbay
oundfay anyway oneway owhay, uponway ishay eingbay ainslay otay osewhay iendshipfray ehay adhay
evotedday imselfhay, efusedray otay ieday; Adcantuannusway, Iway aysay endeavouringway otay
akemay away allysay ithway esethay, enwhay ourway oldierssay adhay ushedray ogethertay otay armsway,
uponway away outshay eingbay aisedray atway atthay artpay ofway ethay ortificationfay, andway away
iercefay attlebay adhay eenbay oughtfay erethay, asway ivendray ackbay intoway ethay owntay, etyay
ehay obtainedway omfray Assuscray ethay indulgenceway atthay ehay ouldshay enjoyway ethay amesay
ermstay ofway urrendersay asway ethay otherway inhabitantsway.

Iiixxay.Assuscray, avinghay eceivedray eirthay armsway andway ostageshay, archedmay intoway
ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Ocatesvay andway ethay Arusatestay. Utbay enthay, ethay
arbariansbay eingbay alarmedway, ecausebay eythay adhay eardhay atthay away owntay ortifiedfay
ybay ethay aturenay ofway ethay aceplay andway ybay artway adhay eenbay akentay ybay usway inway away ewfay aysday
afterway ourway arrivalway erethay, eganbay otay endsay ambassadorsway intoway allway uartersqay, otay
ombinecay, otay ivegay ostageshay oneway otay anotherway, otay aiseray oopstray. Ambassadorsway
alsoway areway entsay otay osethay atesstay ofway Itherhay Ainspay ichwhay areway earestnay otay
Aquitaniaway, andway auxiliariesway andway eaderslay areway ummonedsay omfray emthay; onway osewhay
arrivalway eythay oceedpray otay arrycay onway ethay arway ithway eatgray onfidencecay, andway ithway
away eatgray osthay ofway enmay. Eythay owhay adhay eenbay ithway . Ertoriussay ethay olewhay
eriodpay ofway ishay arway inway Ainspay andway ereway upposedsay otay avehay eryvay eatgray illskay
inway ilitarymay attersmay, areway osenchay eaderslay. Esethay, adoptingway ethay acticepray ofway
ethay Omanray eoplepay, eginbay otay electsay advantageousway acesplay, otay ortifyfay
eirthay ampcay, otay utcay offway ourway enmay omfray ovisionspray, ichwhay, enwhay Assuscray
observesway, andway ikewiselay atthay ishay orcesfay, onway accountway ofway eirthay allsmay
umbernay, ouldcay otnay afelysay ebay eparatedsay; atthay ethay enemyway othbay ademay
excursionsway andway esetbay ethay assespay, andway etyay eftlay ufficientsay uardgay orfay
eirthay ampcay; atthay onway atthay accountway, orncay andway ovisionpray ouldcay otnay eryvay
onvenientlycay ebay oughtbray upway otay imhay, andway atthay ethay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway asway
ailyday increasedway, ehay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway otnay otay elayday inway ivinggay attlebay.
Isthay attermay eingbay oughtbray otay away ouncilcay, enwhay ehay iscoveredday atthay allway
oughtthay ethay amesay ingthay, ehay appointedway ethay extnay ayday orfay ethay ightfay.

Ivxxay.Avinghay awndray outway allway ishay orcesfay atway ethay eakbray ofway ayday, andway
arshalledmay emthay inway away oubleday inelay, ehay ostedpay ethay auxiliariesway inway ethay
entrecay, andway aitedway otay eesay atwhay easuresmay ethay enemyway ouldway aketay. Eythay,
althoughway onway accountway ofway eirthay eatgray umbernay andway eirthay ancientway enownray inway
arway, andway ethay allsmay umbernay ofway ourway enmay, eythay upposedsay eythay ightmay afelysay
ightfay, everthelessnay onsideredcay itway afersay otay aingay ethay ictoryvay ithoutway anyway
oundway, ybay esettingbay ethay assespay andway uttingcay offway ethay ovisionspray andway ifway
ethay Omansray, onway accountway ofway ethay antway ofway orncay, ouldshay eginbay otay etreatray,
eythay intendedway otay attackway emthay ilewhay encumberedway inway eirthay archmay andway
epressedday inway iritspay asway eingbay assailedway ilewhay underway aggagebay. Isthay
easuremay eingbay approvedway ofway ybay ethay eaderslay andway ethay orcesfay ofway ethay Omansray
awndray outway, ethay enemyway illstay eptkay emselvesthay inway eirthay ampcay. Assuscray
avinghay emarkedray isthay ircumstancecay, incesay ethay enemyway, intimidatedway ybay eirthay
ownway elayday, andway ybay ethay eputationray _i.eway._ orfay owardicecay arisingway encethay
adhay enderedray ourway oldierssay oremay eagerway orfay ightingfay, andway ethay emarksray ofway
allway ereway eardhay eclaringday atthay onay ongerlay oughtway elayday otay ebay ademay inway
oinggay otay ethay ampcay, afterway encouragingway ishay enmay, ehay archesmay otay ethay ampcay ofway
ethay enemyway, otay ethay eatgray atificationgray ofway ishay ownway oopstray.

Xxvay.Erethay, ilewhay omesay ereway illingfay upway ethay itchday, andway othersway, ybay
owingthray away argelay umbernay ofway artsday, ereway ivingdray ethay efendersday omfray ethay
ampartray andway ortificationsfay, andway ethay auxiliariesway, onway omwhay Assuscray idday otnay
uchmay elyray inway ethay attlebay, ybay upplyingsay onesstay andway eaponsway otay ethay
oldierssay, andway ybay onveyingcay urftay otay ethay oundmay, esentedpray ethay appearanceway
andway aracterchay ofway enmay engagedway inway ightingfay; ilewhay alsoway ethay enemyway ereway
ightingfay esolutelyray andway oldlybay, andway eirthay eaponsway, ischargedday omfray eirthay
igherhay ositionpay, ellfay ithway eatgray effectway; ethay orsehay, avinghay onegay oundray
ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway, eportedray otay Assuscray atthay ethay ampcay asway otnay
ortifiedfay ithway equalway arecay onway ethay idesay ofway ethay Ecumanday ategay, andway adhay anway
easyway approachway.

Ixxvay.Assuscray, avinghay exhortedway ethay ommanderscay ofway ethay orsehay otay animateway
eirthay enmay ybay eatgray ewardsray andway omisespray, ointspay outway otay emthay atwhay ehay
ishedway otay avehay oneday. Eythay, asway eythay adhay eenbay ommandedcay, avinghay oughtbray
outway ethay ourfay ohortscay, ichwhay, asway eythay adhay eenbay eftlay asway away uardgay orfay ethay
ampcay, ereway otnay atiguedfay ybay exertionway, andway avinghay edlay emthay oundray ybay away
omewhatsay ongerlay ayway, estlay eythay ouldcay ebay eensay omfray ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway,
enwhay ethay eyesway andway indsmay ofway allway ereway intentway uponway ethay attlebay, uicklyqay
arrivedway atway osethay ortificationsfay ichwhay eway avehay okenspay ofway, andway, avinghay
emolishedday esethay, oodstay inway ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway eforebay eythay ereway eensay
ybay emthay, orway itway asway ownknay atwhay asway oinggay onway. Andway enthay, away outshay eingbay
eardhay inway atthay uarterqay, ourway enmay, eirthay engthstray avinghay eenbay ecruitedray
ichwhay usuallyway occursway onway ethay opehay ofway ictoryvay, eganbay otay ightfay oremay
igorouslyvay. Ethay enemyway, urroundedsay onway allway idessay, andway allway eirthay affairsway
eingbay espairedday ofway, ademay eatgray attemptsway otay astcay emselvesthay ownday overway ethay
ampartsray andway otay eeksay afetysay inway ightflay. Esethay ethay avalrycay ursuedpay overway
ethay eryvay openway ainsplay, andway afterway eavinglay arcelyscay away ourthfay artpay outway ofway
ethay umbernay ofway 50,000, ichwhay itway asway ertaincay adhay assembledway outway ofway
Aquitaniaway andway omfray ethay Antabricay, eturnedray atelay atway ightnay otay ethay ampcay.

Iixxvay.Avinghay eardhay ofway isthay attlebay, ethay eatestgray artpay ofway Aquitaniaway
urrenderedsay itselfway otay Assuscray, andway ofway itsway ownway accordway entsay ostageshay, inway
ichwhay umbernay ereway ethay Arbellitay, ethay Igerrionesbay, ethay Ecianipray, ethay
Ocasatesvay, ethay Arusatestay, ethay Eluratesway, ethay Aritesgay, ethay Ausciway, ethay
Arumnigay, ethay Ibuzatessay, ethay Ocosatescay. Away ewfay andway osethay ostmay emoteray
ationsnay, elyingray onway ethay imetay ofway ethay earyay, ecausebay interway asway atway andhay,
eglectednay otay oday isthay.

Iiixxvay.Aboutway ethay amesay imetay Aesarcay, althoughway ethay ummersay asway earlynay
astpay, etyay incesay, allway Aulgay eingbay educedray, ethay Orinimay andway ethay Enapiimay
aloneway emainedray inway armsway, andway adhay evernay entsay ambassadorsway otay imhay otay akemay away
eatytray ofway eacepay, eedilyspay edlay ishay armyway itherthay, inkingthay atthay atthay arway
ightmay oonsay ebay erminatedtay. Eythay esolvedray otay onductcay ethay arway onway away eryvay
ifferentday ethodmay omfray ethay estray ofway ethay Aulsgay; orfay asway eythay erceivedpay atthay
ethay eatestgray ationsnay ofway Aulgay owhay adhay engagedway inway arway, adhay eenbay outedray
andway overcomeway, andway asway eythay ossessedpay ontinuouscay angesray ofway orestsfay andway
orassesmay, eythay emovedray emselvesthay andway allway eirthay opertypray itherthay. Enwhay
Aesarcay adhay arrivedway atway ethay openingway ofway esethay orestsfay, andway adhay egunbay otay
ortifyfay ishay ampcay, andway onay enemyway asway inway ethay eantimemay eensay, ilewhay ourway enmay
ereway ispersedday onway eirthay espectiveray utiesday, eythay uddenlysay ushedray outway omfray
allway artspay ofway ethay orestfay, andway ademay anway attackway onway ourway enmay. Ethay atterlay
uicklyqay ooktay upway armsway andway ovedray emthay ackbay againway otay eirthay orestsfay; andway
avinghay illedkay away eatgray anymay, ostlay away ewfay ofway eirthay ownway enmay ilewhay ursuingpay
emthay ootay arfay oughthray osethay intricateway acesplay.

Ixxxay.Uringday ethay emainingray aysday afterway isthay, Aesarcay eganbay otay utcay ownday
ethay orestsfay; andway atthay onay attackway ightmay ebay ademay onway ethay ankflay ofway ethay
oldierssay, ilewhay unarmedway andway otnay oreseeingfay itway, ehay acedplay ogethertay
oppositeway otay ethay enemyway allway atthay imbertay ichwhay asway utcay ownday, andway iledpay itway
upway asway away ampartray onway eitherway ankflay. Enwhay away eatgray acespay adhay eenbay, ithway
incredibleway eedspay, earedclay inway away ewfay aysday, enwhay ethay attlecay ofway ethay enemyway
andway ethay earray ofway eirthay aggagebayaintray ereway alreadyway eizedsay ybay ourway enmay, andway
eythay emselvesthay ereway eekingsay orfay ethay ickestthay artspay ofway ethay orestsfay,
ormsstay ofway uchsay away indkay amecay onway atthay ethay orkway asway ecessarilynay uspendedsay,
andway, oughthray ethay ontinuancecay ofway ethay ainsray, ethay oldierssay ouldcay otnay anyway
ongerlay emainray inway eirthay entstay. Ereforethay, avinghay aidlay asteway allway eirthay
ountrycay, andway avinghay urntbay eirthay illagesvay andway ouseshay, Aesarcay edlay ackbay
ishay armyway andway ationedstay emthay inway interwayuartersqay amongway ethay Aulerciway andway
Exoviilay, andway ethay otherway atesstay ichwhay adhay ademay arway uponway imhay astlay.



Ookbay Ivway

Iway.Ethay ollowingfay interway isthay asway ethay earyay inway ichwhay Ncay. Ompeypay andway .
Assuscray ereway onsulscay, osethay Ermansgay alledcay ethay Usipetesway, andway ikewiselay
ethay Enchtheritay, ithway away eatgray umbernay ofway enmay, ossedcray ethay Inerhay, otnay arfay
omfray ethay aceplay atway ichwhay atthay iverray ischargesday itselfway intoway ethay easay. Ethay
otivemay orfay ossingcray atthay iverray asway atthay, avinghay eenbay orfay everalsay earsyay
arassedhay ybay ethay Uevisay, eythay ereway onstantlycay engagedway inway arway, andway inderedhay
omfray ethay ursuitspay ofway agricultureway. Ethay ationnay ofway ethay Uevisay isway ybay arfay ethay
argestlay andway ethay ostmay arlikeway ationnay ofway allway ethay Ermansgay. Eythay areway aidsay otay
ossesspay away undredhay antonscay, omfray eachway ofway ichwhay eythay earlyyay endsay omfray
eirthay erritoriestay orfay ethay urposepay ofway arway away ousandthay armedway enmay ethay
othersway owhay emainray atway omehay, aintainmay othbay emselvesthay andway osethay engagedway
inway ethay expeditionway. Ethay atterlay againway, inway eirthay urntay, areway inway armsway ethay earyay
afterway ethay ormerfay emainray atway omehay. Usthay eithernay usbandryhay ornay ethay artway andway
acticepray ofway arway areway eglectednay. Utbay amongway emthay erethay existsway onay ivatepray
andway eparatesay andlay; ornay areway eythay ermittedpay otay emainray oremay anthay oneway earyay
inway oneway aceplay orfay ethay urposepay ofway esidenceray. Eythay oday otnay ivelay uchmay onway
orncay, utbay ubsistsay orfay ethay ostmay artpay onway ilkmay andway eshflay, andway areway uchmay
engagedway inway untinghay; ichwhay ircumstancecay ustmay, ybay ethay aturenay ofway eirthay
oodfay, andway ybay eirthay ailyday exerciseway andway ethay eedomfray ofway eirthay ifelay orfay
avinghay omfray oyhoodbay eenbay accustomedway otay onay employmentway, orway isciplineday,
eythay oday othingnay atway allway ontrarycay otay eirthay inclinationway, othbay omotepray
eirthay engthstray andway enderray emthay enmay ofway astvay aturestay ofway odybay. Andway otay uchsay
away abithay avehay eythay oughtbray emselvesthay, atthay evenway inway ethay oldestcay artspay
eythay earway onay othingclay ateverwhay exceptway insskay, ybay easonray ofway ethay antinessscay
ofway ichwhay away eatgray ortionpay ofway eirthay odybay isway arebay, andway esidesbay eythay athebay
inway openway iversray.

Iiway.Erchantsmay avehay accessway otay emthay atherray atthay eythay aymay avehay ersonspay otay
omwhay eythay aymay ellsay osethay ingsthay ichwhay eythay avehay akentay inway arway, anthay
ecausebay eythay eednay anyway ommoditycay otay ebay importedway otay emthay. Oreovermay, evenway
asway otay abouringlay attlecay, inway ichwhay ethay Aulsgay aketay ethay eatestgray easureplay,
andway ichwhay eythay ocurepray atway away eatgray icepray, ethay Ermansgay oday otnay employway uchsay
asway areway importedway, utbay osethay oorpay andway illwayapedshay animalsway ichwhay elongbay otay
eirthay ountrycay; esethay, oweverhay, eythay enderray apablecay ofway ethay eatestgray
abourlay ybay ailyday exerciseway. Inway avalrycay actionsway eythay equentlyfray eaplay omfray
eirthay orseshay andway ightfay onway ootfay; andway aintray eirthay orseshay otay andstay illstay inway
ethay eryvay otspay onway ichwhay eythay eavelay emthay, otay ichwhay eythay etreatray ithway eatgray
activityway enwhay erethay isway occasionway; ornay, accordingway otay eirthay acticepray, isway
anythingway egardedray asway oremay unseemlyway, orway oremay unmanlyway, anthay otay useway
ousingshay. Accordinglyway, eythay avehay ethay ouragecay, oughthay eythay ebay emselvesthay
utbay ewfay, otay advanceway againstway anyway umbernay ateverwhay ofway orsehay ountedmay ithway
ousingshay. Eythay onway onay accountway ermitpay ineway otay ebay importedway otay emthay, ecausebay
eythay onsidercay atthay enmay egenerateday inway eirthay owerspay ofway enduringway atiguefay,
andway areway enderedray effeminateway ybay atthay ommoditycay.

Iiiway.Eythay esteemway itway eirthay eatestgray aisepray asway away ationnay atthay ethay andslay
aboutway eirthay erritoriestay ielay unoccupiedway otay away eryvay eatgray extentway, inasmuchway
asway eythay inkthay atthay ybay isthay ircumstancecay isway indicatedway atthay away eatgray
umbernay ofway ationsnay annotcay, ithstandway eirthay owerpay; andway usthay onway oneway idesay ofway
ethay Uevisay ethay andslay areway aidsay otay ielay esolateday orfay aboutway ixsay undredhay
ilesmay. Onway ethay otherway idesay eythay orderbay onway ethay Ubiiway, osewhay atestay asway argelay
andway ourishingflay, onsideringcay ethay onditioncay ofway ethay Ermansgay, andway owhay areway
omewhatsay oremay efinedray anthay osethay ofway ethay amesay aceray andway ethay estray ofway ethay
Ermansgay, andway atthay ecausebay eythay orderbay onway ethay Inerhay, andway areway uchmay
esortedray otay ybay erchantsmay, andway areway accustomedway otay ethay annersmay ofway ethay
Aulsgay, ybay easonray ofway eirthay approximityway otay emthay. Oughthay ethay Uevisay, afterway
akingmay ethay attemptway equentlyfray andway inway everalsay arsway, ouldcay otnay expelway isthay
ationnay omfray eirthay erritoriestay, onway accountway ofway ethay extentway andway opulationpay
ofway eirthay atestay, etyay eythay ademay emthay ibutariestray, andway enderedray emthay esslay
istinguishedday andway owerfulpay anthay eythay adhay everway eenbay.

Ivway.Inway ethay amesay onditioncay ereway ethay Usipetesway andway ethay Enchtheritay omwhay eway
avehay entionedmay aboveway, owhay orfay anymay earsyay esistedray ethay owerpay ofway ethay
Uevisay, utbay eingbay atway astlay ivendray omfray eirthay ossessionspay, andway avinghay
anderedway oughthray anymay artspay ofway Ermanygay, amecay otay ethay Inerhay, otay istrictsday
ichwhay ethay Enapiimay inhabitedway, andway erewhay eythay adhay andslay, ouseshay, andway
illagesvay onway eitherway idesay ofway ethay iverray. Ethay atterlay eoplepay, alarmedway ybay ethay
arrivalway ofway osay eatgray away ultitudemay, emovedray omfray osethay ouseshay ichwhay eythay
adhay onway ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay iverray, andway avinghay acedplay uardsgay onway isthay
idesay ethay Inerhay, oceededpray otay inderhay ethay Ermansgay omfray ossingcray. Eythay,
indingfay emselvesthay, afterway eythay adhay iedtray allway eansmay, unableway eitherway otay
orcefay away assagepay onway accountway ofway eirthay eficiencyday inway ippingshay, orway osscray ybay
ealthstay onway accountway ofway ethay uardsgay ofway ethay Enapiimay, etendedpray otay eturnray otay
eirthay ownway ettlementssay andway istrictsday; andway, afterway avinghay oceededpray eethray
ays'day archmay, eturnedray; andway eirthay avalrycay avinghay erformedpay ethay olewhay ofway
isthay ourneyjay inway oneway ightnay, utcay offway ethay Enapiimay, owhay ereway ignorantway ofway,
andway idday otnay expectway eirthay approachway, andway owhay, avinghay oreovermay eenbay
informedway ofway ethay epartureday ofway ethay Ermansgay ybay eirthay outsscay, adhay ithoutway
apprehensionway eturnedray otay eirthay illagesvay eyondbay ethay Inerhay. Avinghay ainslay
esethay, andway eizedsay eirthay ipsshay, eythay ossedcray ethay iverray eforebay atthay artpay
ofway ethay Enapiimay, owhay ereway atway eacepay inway eirthay ettlementssay overway ethay Inerhay,
ereway apprisedway ofway eirthay intentionway; andway eizingsay allway eirthay ouseshay,
aintainedmay emselvesthay uponway eirthay ovisionspray uringday ethay estray ofway ethay
interway.

.Aesarcay, enwhay informedway ofway esethay attersmay, earingfay ethay icklefay
ispositionday ofway ethay Aulsgay, owhay areway easilyway omptedpray otay aketay upway
esolutionsray, andway uchmay addictedway otay angechay, onsideredcay atthay othingnay asway otay
ebay entrustedway otay emthay; orfay itway isway ethay ustomcay ofway atthay eoplepay otay ompelcay
avellerstray otay opstay, evenway againstway eirthay inclinationway, andway inquireway atwhay
eythay aymay avehay eardhay, orway aymay owknay, espectingray anyway attermay; andway inway ownstay
ethay ommoncay eoplepay ongthray aroundway erchantsmay andway orcefay emthay otay atestay omfray
atwhay ountriescay eythay omecay, andway atwhay affairsway eythay owknay ofway erethay. Eythay
oftenway engageway inway esolutionsray oncerningcay ethay ostmay importantway attersmay,
inducedway ybay esethay eportsray andway oriesstay aloneway; ofway ichwhay eythay ustmay
ecessarilynay instantlyway epentray, incesay eythay ieldyay otay eremay unauthorisedway
eportsray; andway incesay ostmay eoplepay ivegay otay eirthay uestionsqay answersway amedfray
agreeablyway otay eirthay ishesway.

Ivay.Aesarcay, eingbay awareway ofway eirthay ustomcay, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay
encounterway away oremay ormidablefay arway, etssay orwardfay otay ethay armyway earlierway inway ethay
earyay anthay ehay asway accustomedway otay oday. Enwhay ehay adhay arrivedway erethay, ehay
iscoveredday atthay osethay ingsthay, ichwhay ehay adhay uspectedsay ouldway occurway, adhay
akentay aceplay; atthay embassiesway adhay eenbay entsay otay ethay Ermansgay ybay omesay ofway ethay
atesstay, andway atthay eythay adhay eenbay entreatedway otay eavelay ethay Inerhay, andway adhay
eenbay omisedpray atthay allway ingsthay ichwhay eythay esiredday ouldshay ebay ovidedpray ybay
ethay Aulsgay. Alluredway ybay isthay opehay, ethay Ermansgay ereway enthay akingmay excursionsway
otay eatergray istancesday, andway adhay advancedway otay ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Eburonesway andway ethay Ondrusicay, owhay areway underway ethay otectionpray ofway ethay Eviritray.
Afterway ummoningsay ethay iefschay ofway Aulgay, Aesarcay oughtthay operpray otay etendpray
ignoranceway ofway ethay ingsthay ichwhay ehay adhay iscoveredday; andway avinghay onciliatedcay
andway onfirmedcay eirthay indsmay, andway orderedway omesay avalrycay otay ebay aisedray,
esolvedray otay akemay arway againstway ethay Ermansgay.

Iivay.Avinghay ovidedpray orncay andway electedsay ishay avalrycay, ehay eganbay otay irectday
ishay archmay owardstay osethay artspay inway ichwhay ehay eardhay ethay Ermansgay ereway. Enwhay
ehay asway istantday omfray emthay onlyway away ewfay ays'day archmay, ambassadorsway omecay otay imhay
omfray eirthay atestay; osewhay eechspay asway asway ollowsfayAtthay ethay Ermansgay
eithernay akemay arway uponway ethay Omanray eoplepay irstfay, ornay oday eythay eclineday, ifway
eythay areway ovokedpray, otay engageway ithway emthay inway armsway; orfay atthay isthay asway ethay
ustomcay ofway ethay Ermansgay andedhay ownday otay emthay omfray eirthay orefathersfay, otay
esistray atsoeverwhay eoplepay akemay arway uponway emthay andway otnay otay avertway itway ybay
entreatyway; isthay, oweverhay, eythay onfessedcay,atthay eythay adhay omecay itherhay
eluctantlyray, avinghay eenbay expelledway omfray eirthay ountrycay. Ifway ethay Omansray ereway
isposedday otay acceptway eirthay iendshipfray, eythay ightmay ebay erviceablesay alliesway otay
emthay; andway etlay emthay eitherway assignway emthay andslay, orway ermitpay emthay otay etainray
osethay ichwhay eythay adhay acquiredway ybay eirthay armsway; atthay eythay areway inferiorway otay
ethay Uevisay aloneway, otay omwhay otnay evenway ethay immortalway odsgay ancay owshay emselvesthay
equalway; atthay erethay asway onenay atway allway esidesbay onway earthway omwhay eythay ouldcay otnay
onquercay.

Iiivay.Otay esethay emarksray Aesarcay epliedray inway uchsay ermstay asway ehay oughtthay
operpray; utbay ethay onclusioncay ofway ishay eechspay asway, Atthay ehay ouldcay akemay onay
allianceway ithway emthay, ifway eythay ontinuedcay inway Aulgay; atthay itway asway otnay obablepray
atthay eythay owhay ereway otnay ableway otay efendday eirthay ownway erritoriestay, ouldshay etgay
ossessionpay ofway osethay ofway othersway, ornay ereway erethay anyway andslay inglyay asteway inway
Aulgay ichwhay ouldcay ebay ivengay awayway, especiallyway otay osay eatgray away umbernay ofway enmay,
ithoutway oingday ongwray otay othersway; utbay eythay ightmay, ifway eythay ereway esirousday,
ettlesay inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Ubiiway; osewhay ambassadorsway ereway enthay ithway
imhay, andway ereway omplainingcay ofway ethay aggressionsway ofway ethay Uevisay, andway
equestingray assistanceway omfray imhay; andway atthay ehay ouldway obtainway isthay equestray
omfray emthay.

Ixway.Ethay ambassadorsway aidsay atthay eythay ouldway eportray esethay ingsthay otay eirthay
ountrymencay; andway, afterway avinghay eliberatedday onway ethay attermay, ouldway eturnray otay
Aesarcay afterway ethay irdthay ayday, eythay eggedbay atthay ehay ouldway otnay inway ethay
eantimemay advanceway ishay ampcay earernay otay emthay. Aesarcay aidsay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay
antgray emthay evenway atthay; orfay ehay adhay earnedlay atthay eythay adhay entsay away eatgray artpay
ofway eirthay avalrycay overway ethay Eusemay otay ethay Ambivaritiway, omesay aysday eforebay, orfay
ethay urposepay ofway underingplay andway ocuringpray oragefay. Ehay upposedsay atthay eythay
ereway enthay aitingway orfay esethay orsehay, andway atthay ethay elayday asway ausedcay onway isthay
accountway.

.Ethay Eusemay isesray omfray ountmay Elay Osgevay, ichwhay isway inway ethay erritoriestay ofway
ethay Ingoneslay; andway, avinghay eceivedray away anchbray ofway ethay Inerhay, ichwhay isway
alledcay ethay Aalway, ormsfay ethay islandway ofway ethay Atavibay, andway otnay oremay anthay
eightyway ilesmay omfray itway itway allsfay intoway ethay oceanway. Utbay ethay Inerhay akestay itsway
oursecay amongway ethay Epontiilay, owhay inhabitway ethay Alpsway, andway isway arriedcay ithway away
apidray urrentcay orfay away onglay istanceday oughthray ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Arunatessay, Elvetiihay, Equanisay, Ediomatricimay, Ibucitray, andway Eviritray, andway
enwhay itway approachesway ethay oceanway, ividesday intoway everalsay anchesbray; andway, avinghay
ormedfay anymay andway extensiveway islandsway, away eatgray artpay ofway ichwhay areway inhabitedway
ybay avagesay andway arbarousbay ationsnay ofway omwhay erethay areway omesay owhay areway upposedsay
otay ivelay onway ishfay andway ethay eggsway ofway easayowlfay, owsflay intoway ethay oceanway ybay
everalsay outhsmay.

Ixay.Enwhay Aesarcay asway otnay oremay anthay elvetway ilesmay istantday omfray ethay enemyway,
ethay ambassadorsway eturnray otay imhay, asway adhay eenbay arrangedway; owhay eetingmay imhay onway
ethay archmay, earnestlyway entreatedway imhay otnay otay advanceway anyway artherfay. Enwhay eythay
ouldcay otnay obtainway isthay, eythay eggedbay imhay otay endsay onway away espatchday otay osethay
owhay adhay archedmay inway advanceway ofway ethay ainmay armyway, andway orbidfay emthay otay engageway;
andway antgray emthay ermissionpay otay endsay ambassadorsway otay ethay Ubiiway, andway ifway ethay
incespray andway enatesay ofway ethay atterlay ouldway ivegay emthay ecuritysay ybay oathway, eythay
assuredway Aesarcay atthay eythay ouldway acceptway uchsay onditionscay asway ightmay ebay
oposedpray ybay imhay; andway equestedray atthay ehay ouldway ivegay emthay ethay acespay ofway
eethray aysday orfay egotiatingnay esethay affairsway. Aesarcay oughtthay atthay esethay
ingsthay endedtay otay ethay elfsayamesay ointpay asway eirthay otherway oposalpray; amelynay
atthay, inway onsequencecay ofway away elayday ofway eethray aysday interveningway, eirthay orsehay
ichwhay ereway atway away istanceday ightmay eturnray; oweverhay, ehay aidsay, atthay ehay ouldway
otnay atthay ayday advanceway artherfay anthay ourfay ilesmay orfay ethay urposepay ofway
ocuringpray aterway; ehay orderedway atthay eythay ouldshay assembleway atway atthay aceplay inway
asway argelay away umbernay asway ossiblepay ethay ollowingfay ayday, atthay ehay ightmay inquireway
intoway eirthay emandsday. Inway ethay eantimemay ehay endssay essengersmay otay ethay officersway
owhay adhay archedmay inway advanceway ithway allway ethay avalrycay otay orderway emthay otnay otay
ovokepray ethay enemyway otay anway engagementway, andway ifway eythay emselvesthay ereway
assailedway, otay ustainsay ethay attackway untilway ehay amecay upway ithway ethay armyway.

Iixay.Utbay ethay enemyway, asway oonsay asway eythay awsay ourway orsehay, ethay umbernay ofway ichwhay
asway 5000, ereaswhay eythay emselvesthay adhay otnay oremay anthay 800 orsehay, ecausebay
osethay ichwhay adhay onegay overway ethay Eusemay orfay ethay urposepay ofway oragingfay adhay otnay
eturnedray, ilewhay ourway enmay adhay onay apprehensionsway, ecausebay eirthay ambassadorsway
adhay onegay awayway omfray Aesarcay away ittlelay eforebay, andway atthay ayday adhay eenbay
equestedray ybay emthay asway away eriodpay ofway ucetray, ademay anway onsetway onway ourway enmay, andway
oonsay ewthray emthay intoway isorderday. Enwhay ourway enmay, inway eirthay urntay, ademay away
andstay, eythay, accordingway otay eirthay acticepray, eapedlay omfray eirthay orseshay otay
eirthay eetfay, andway abbingstay ourway orseshay inway ethay ellybay andway overthrowingway away
eatgray anymay ofway ourway enmay, utpay ethay estray otay ightflay, andway ovedray emthay orwardfay osay
uchmay alarmedway atthay eythay idday otnay esistday omfray eirthay etreatray illtay eythay adhay
omecay inway ightsay ofway ourway armyway. Inway atthay encounterway eventysayourfay ofway ourway orsehay
ereway ainslay; amongway emthay, Isopay, anway Aquitanianway, away ostmay aliantvay anmay, andway
escendedday omfray away eryvay illustriousway amilyfay; osewhay andfathergray adhay eldhay ethay
overeigntysay ofway ishay atestay, andway adhay eenbay ledstyay iendfray ybay ourway enatesay. Ehay,
ilewhay ehay asway endeavouringway otay enderray assistanceway otay ishay otherbray owhay asway
urroundedsay ybay ethay enemyway, andway omwhay ehay escuedray omfray angerday, asway imselfhay
ownthray omfray ishay orsehay, ichwhay asway oundedway underway imhay, utbay illstay opposedway
ishay antagonistsway ithway ethay eatestgray intrepidityway, asway onglay asway ehay asway ableway
otay aintainmay ethay onflictcay. Enwhay atway engthlay ehay ellfay, urroundedsay onway allway
idessay andway afterway eceivingray anymay oundsway, andway ishay otherbray, owhay adhay enthay
etiredray omfray ethay ightfay, observedway itway omfray away istanceday, ehay urredspay onway ishay
orsehay, ewthray imselfhay uponway ethay enemyway, andway asway illedkay.

Iiixay.Afterway isthay engagementway, Aesarcay onsideredcay atthay eithernay oughtway
ambassadorsway otay ebay eceivedray otay audienceway, ornay onditionscay ebay acceptedway ybay
imhay omfray osethay owhay, afterway avinghay uedsay orfay eacepay ybay ayway ofway atagemstray andway
eacherytray, adhay ademay arway ithoutway ovocationpray. Andway otay aitway illtay ethay
enemy'sway orcesfay ereway augmentedway andway eirthay avalrycay adhay eturnedray, ehay
oncludedcay, ouldway ebay ethay eatestgray adnessmay; andway owingknay ethay icklenessfay ofway
ethay Aulsgay, ehay eltfay owhay uchmay influenceway ethay enemyway adhay alreadyway acquiredway
amongway emthay ybay isthay oneway irmishskay. Ehay ereforethay eemedday atthay onay imetay orfay
onvertingcay easuresmay oughtway otay ebay affordedway emthay. Afterway avinghay esolvedray onway
esethay ingsthay andway ommunicatedcay ishay ansplay otay ishay ieutenantslay andway uaestorqay
inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay uffersay anyway opportunityway orfay engagingway otay escapeway
imhay, away eryvay easonablesay eventway occurredway, amelynay, atthay onway ethay orningmay ofway
ethay extnay ayday, away argelay odybay ofway Ermansgay, onsistingcay ofway eirthay incespray andway
oldway enmay, amecay otay ethay ampcay otay imhay otay actisepray ethay amesay eacherytray andway
issimulationday; utbay, asway eythay assertedway, orfay ethay urposepay ofway acquittingway
emselvesthay orfay avinghay engagedway inway away irmishskay ethay ayday eforebay, ontrarycay otay
atwhay adhay eenbay agreedway andway otay atwhay, indeedway, eythay emselvesthay adhay equestedray;
andway alsoway ifway eythay ouldcay ybay anyway eansmay obtainway away ucetray ybay eceivingday imhay.
Aesarcay, ejoicingray atthay eythay adhay allenfay intoway ishay owerpay, orderedway emthay otay
ebay etainedday. Ehay enthay ewdray allway ishay orcesfay outway ofway ethay ampcay, andway ommandedcay
ethay avalrycay, ecausebay ehay oughtthay eythay ereway intimidatedway ybay ethay atelay
irmishskay, otay ollowfay inway ethay earray.

Ivxay.Avinghay arshalledmay ishay armyway inway eethray ineslay, andway inway away ortshay imetay
erformedpay away archmay ofway eightway ilesmay, ehay arrivedway atway ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway
eforebay ethay Ermansgay ouldcay erceivepay atwhay asway oinggay onway; owhay eingbay uddenlysay
alarmedway ybay allway ethay ircumstancescay, othbay ybay ethay eedinessspay ofway ourway arrivalway
andway ethay absenceway ofway eirthay ownway officersway, asway imetay asway affordedway eithernay orfay
oncertingcay easuresmay ornay orfay eizingsay eirthay armsway, areway erplexedpay asway otay
etherwhay itway ouldway ebay etterbay otay eadlay outway eirthay orcesfay againstway ethay enemyway,
orway otay efendday eirthay ampcay, orway eeksay eirthay afetysay ybay ightflay. Eirthay
onsternationcay eingbay ademay apparentway ybay eirthay oisenay andway umulttay, ourway
oldierssay, excitedway ybay ethay eacherytray ofway ethay ecedingpray ayday, ushedray intoway ethay
ampcay uchsay ofway emthay asway ouldcay eadilyray etgay eirthay armsway orfay away ortshay imetay
ithstoodway ourway enmay, andway avegay attlebay amongway eirthay artscay andway aggagebayaggonsway;
utbay ethay estray ofway ethay eoplepay, onsistingcay ofway oysbay andway omenway orfay eythay adhay
eftlay eirthay ountrycay andway ossedcray ethay Inerhay ithway allway eirthay amiliesfay, eganbay
otay flyay inway allway irectionsday; inway ursuitpay ofway omwhay Aesarcay entsay ethay avalrycay.

Vxay.Ethay Ermansgay enwhay, uponway earinghay away oisenay ehindbay emthay, eythay ookedlay
andway awsay atthay eirthay amiliesfay ereway eingbay ainslay, owingthray awayway eirthay armsway
andway abandoningway eirthay andardsstay, edflay outway ofway ethay ampcay, andway enwhay eythay adhay
arrivedway atway ethay onfluencecay ofway ethay Eusemay andway ethay Inerhay, ethay urvivorssay
espairingday ofway artherfay escapeway, asway away eatgray umbernay ofway eirthay ountrymencay adhay
eenbay illedkay, ewthray emselvesthay intoway ethay iverray andway erethay erishedpay,
overcomeway ybay earfay, atiguefay, andway ethay iolencevay ofway ethay eamstray. Ourway oldierssay,
afterway ethay alarmway ofway osay eatgray away arway, orfay ethay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway amountedway
otay 430,000, eturnedray otay eirthay ampcay, allway afesay otay away anmay, eryvay ewfay eingbay
evenway oundedway. Aesarcay antedgray osethay omwhay ehay adhay etainedday inway ethay ampcay
ibertylay ofway epartingday. Eythay oweverhay, eadingdray evengeray andway orturetay omfray
ethay Aulsgay, osewhay andslay eythay adhay arassedhay, aidsay atthay eythay esiredday otay
emainray ithway imhay. Aesarcay antedgray emthay ermissionpay.

Ixvay.Ethay Ermangay arway eingbay inishedfay, Aesarcay oughtthay itway expedientway orfay imhay
otay osscray ethay Inerhay, orfay anymay easonsray; ofway ichwhay isthay asway ethay ostmay
eightyway, atthay, incesay ehay awsay ethay Ermansgay ereway osay easilyway urgedway otay ogay intoway
Aulgay, ehay esiredday eythay ouldshay avehay eirthay earsfay orfay eirthay ownway erritoriestay
enwhay eythay iscoveredday atthay ethay armyway ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay othbay ouldcay andway
aredday asspay ethay Inerhay. Erethay asway addedway alsoway, atthay atthay ortionpay ofway ethay
avalrycay ofway ethay Usipetesway andway ethay Enchtheritay, ichwhay Iway avehay aboveway elatedray
otay avehay ossedcray ethay Eusemay orfay ethay urposepay ofway underingplay andway ocuringpray
oragefay, andway asway otnay esentpray atway ethay engagementway, adhay etakenbay emselvesthay,
afterway ethay etreatray ofway eirthay ountrymencay, acrossway ethay Inerhay intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Igambrisay, andway unitedway emselvesthay otay emthay. Enwhay Aesarcay
entsay ambassadorsway otay emthay, otay emandday atthay eythay ouldshay ivegay upway otay imhay
osethay owhay adhay ademay arway againstway imhay andway againstway Aulgay, eythay epliedray, Atthay
ethay Inerhay oundedbay ethay empireway ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay; ifway ehay idday otnay inkthay itway
ustjay orfay ethay Ermansgay otay asspay overway intoway Aulgay againstway ishay onsentcay, whyay idday
ehay aimclay atthay anythingway eyondbay ethay Inerhay ouldshay ebay ubjectsay otay ishay
ominionday orway owerpay? Ethay Ubiiway alsoway, owhay aloneway, outway ofway allway ethay ationsnay
inglyay eyondbay ethay Inerhay, adhay entsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay, andway ormedfay anway
allianceway andway ivengay ostageshay, earnestlyway entreatedway atthay ehay ouldway ingbray
emthay assistanceway, ecausebay eythay ereway ievouslygray oppressedway ybay ethay Uevisay;
orway, ifway ehay asway eventedpray omfray oingday osay ybay ethay usinessbay ofway ethay
ommonwealthcay, ehay ouldway atway eastlay ansporttray ishay armyway overway ethay Inerhay; atthay
atthay ouldway ebay ufficientsay orfay eirthay esentpray assistanceway andway eirthay opehay orfay
ethay uturefay; atthay osay eatgray asway ethay amenay andway ethay eputationray ofway ishay armyway,
evenway amongway ethay ostmay emoteray ationsnay ofway ethay Ermansgay, arisingway omfray ethay
efeatday ofway Ariovistusway andway isthay astlay attlebay ichwhay asway oughtfay, atthay eythay
ightmay ebay afesay underway ethay amefay andway iendshipfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay. Eythay
omisedpray away argelay umbernay ofway ipsshay orfay ansportingtray ethay armyway.

Iixvay.Aesarcay, orfay osethay easonsray ichwhay Iway avehay entionedmay, adhay esolvedray otay
osscray ethay Inerhay; utbay otay osscray ybay ipsshay ehay eithernay eemedday otay ebay
ufficientlysay afesay, ornay onsideredcay onsistentcay ithway ishay ownway ignityday orway
atthay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay. Ereforethay, althoughway ethay eatestgray ifficultyday inway
ormingfay away idgebray asway esentedpray otay imhay, onway accountway ofway ethay eadthbray,
apidityray, andway epthday ofway ethay iverray, ehay everthelessnay onsideredcay atthay itway
oughtway otay ebay attemptedway ybay imhay, orway atthay ishay armyway oughtway otnay otherwiseway otay ebay
edlay overway. Ehay evisedday isthay anplay ofway away idgebray. Ehay oinedjay ogethertay atway ethay
istanceday ofway otway eetfay, otway ilespay, eachway away ootfay andway away alfhay ickthay, arpenedshay
away ittlelay atway ethay owerlay endway, andway oportionedpray inway engthlay otay ethay epthday ofway
ethay iverray. Afterway ehay adhay, ybay eansmay ofway enginesway, unksay esethay intoway ethay iverray,
andway ixedfay emthay atway ethay ottombay, andway enthay ivendray emthay inway ithway ammersray, otnay
uiteqay erpendicularlypay, ikelay away akestay, utbay endingbay orwardfay andway opingslay, osay
asway otay inclineway inway ethay irectionday ofway ethay urrentcay ofway ethay iverray; ehay alsoway
acedplay otway otherway ilespay oppositeway otay esethay, atway ethay istanceday ofway ortyfay
eetfay owerlay ownday, astenedfay ogethertay inway ethay amesay annermay, utbay irectedday
againstway ethay orcefay andway urrentcay ofway ethay iverray. Othbay esethay, oreovermay, ereway
eptkay irmlyfay apartway ybay eamsbay otway eetfay ickthay ethay acespay ichwhay ethay indingbay
ofway ethay ilespay occupiedway, aidlay inway atway eirthay extremitiesway etweenbay otway acesbray
onway eachway idesay; andway inway onsequencecay ofway esethay eingbay inway ifferentday irectionsday
andway astenedfay onway idessay ethay oneway oppositeway otay ethay otherway, osay eatgray asway ethay
engthstray ofway ethay orkway, andway uchsay ethay arrangementway ofway ethay aterialsmay, atthay inway
oportionpray asway ethay eatergray odybay ofway aterway ashedday againstway ethay idgebray, osay
uchmay ethay oserclay ereway itsway artspay eldhay astenedfay ogethertay. Esethay eamsbay ereway
oundbay ogethertay ybay imbertay aidlay overway emthay inway ethay irectionday ofway ethay engthlay
ofway ethay idgebray, andway ereway enthay overedcay overway ithway athslay andway urdleshay; andway
inway additionway otay isthay, ilespay ereway ivendray intoway ethay aterway obliquelyway, atway ethay
owerlay idesay ofway ethay idgebray, andway esethay ervingsay asway uttressesbay, andway eingbay
onnectedcay ithway everyway ortionpay ofway ethay orkway, ustainedsay ethay orcefay ofway ethay
eamstray andway erethay ereway othersway alsoway aboveway ethay idgebray, atway away oderatemay
istanceday; atthay ifway unkstray ofway eestray orway esselsvay ereway oatedflay ownday ethay iverray
ybay ethay arbariansbay orfay ethay urposepay ofway estroyingday ethay orkway, ethay iolencevay
ofway uchsay ingsthay ightmay ebay iminishedday ybay esethay efencesday, andway ightmay otnay
injureway ethay idgebray.

Iiixvay.Ithinway entay aysday afterway ethay imbertay eganbay otay ebay ollectedcay, ethay
olewhay orkway asway ompletedcay, andway ethay olewhay armyway edlay overway. Aesarcay, eavinglay away
ongstray uardgay atway eachway endway ofway ethay idgebray, astenshay intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway
ethay Igambrisay. Inway ethay eantimemay ambassadorsway omfray everalsay ationsnay omecay otay
imhay, omwhay, onway eirthay uingsay orfay eacepay andway allianceway, ehay answersway inway away
ourteouscay annermay, andway ordersway ostageshay otay ebay oughtbray otay imhay. Utbay ethay
Igambrisay, atway ethay eryvay imetay ethay idgebray asway egunbay otay ebay uiltbay, ademay
eparationspray orfay away ightflay ybay ethay adviceway ofway uchsay ofway ethay Enchtheritay andway
Usipetesway asway eythay adhay amongstway emthay, andway uittedqay eirthay erritoriestay andway
onveyedcay awayway allway eirthay ossessionspay, andway oncealedcay emselvesthay inway esertsday
andway oodsway.

Ixxay.Aesarcay, avinghay emainedray inway eirthay erritoriestay away ewfay aysday, andway urntbay
allway eirthay illagesvay andway ouseshay, andway utcay ownday eirthay orncay, oceededpray intoway
ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Ubiiway; andway avinghay omisedpray emthay ishay assistanceway, ifway
eythay ereway everway arassedhay ybay ethay Uevisay, ehay earnedlay omfray emthay esethay
articularspay atthay ethay Uevisay, afterway eythay adhay ybay eansmay ofway eirthay outsscay
oundfay atthay ethay idgebray asway eingbay uiltbay, adhay alledcay away ouncilcay, accordingway
otay eirthay ustomcay, andway entsay ordersway otay allway artspay ofway eirthay atestay otay emoveray
omfray ethay ownstay andway onveycay eirthay ildrenchay, ivesway, andway allway eirthay
ossessionspay intoway ethay oodsway, andway atthay allway owhay ouldcay earbay armsway ouldshay
assembleway inway oneway aceplay; atthay ethay aceplay usthay osenchay asway earlynay ethay entrecay
ofway osethay egionsray ichwhay ethay Uevisay ossessedpay; atthay inway isthay otspay eythay adhay
esolvedray otay awaitway ethay arrivalway ofway ethay Omansray, andway ivegay emthay attlebay erethay.
Enwhay Aesarcay iscoveredday isthay, avinghay alreadyway accomplishedway allway osethay
ingsthay onway accountway ofway ichwhay ehay adhay esolvedray otay eadlay ishay armyway overway,
amelynay, otay ikestray earfay intoway ethay Ermansgay, aketay engeancevay onway ethay Igambrisay,
andway eefray ethay Ubiiway omfray ethay invasionway ofway ethay Uevisay, avinghay entspay
altogetherway eighteenway aysday eyondbay ethay Inerhay, andway inkingthay ehay adhay advancedway
arfay enoughway otay ervesay othbay onourhay andway interestway, ehay eturnedray intoway Aulgay, andway
utcay ownday ethay idgebray.

Xxay.Uringday ethay ortshay artpay ofway ummersay ichwhay emainedray, Aesarcay, althoughway inway
esethay ountriescay, asway allway Aulgay ieslay owardstay ethay orthnay, ethay intersway areway
earlyway, everthelessnay esolvedray otay oceedpray intoway Itainbray, ecausebay ehay
iscoveredday atthay inway almostway allway ethay arsway ithway ethay Aulsgay uccourssay adhay eenbay
urnishedfay otay ourway enemyway omfray atthay ountrycay; andway evenway ifway ethay imetay ofway earyay
ouldshay ebay insufficientway orfay arryingcay onway ethay arway, etyay ehay oughtthay itway ouldway
ebay ofway eatgray ervicesay otay imhay ifway ehay onlyway enteredway ethay islandway, andway awsay intoway
ethay aracterchay ofway ethay eoplepay, andway otgay owledgeknay ofway eirthay ocalitieslay,
arbourshay, andway andinglayacesplay, allway ichwhay ereway orfay ethay ostmay artpay unknownway
otay ethay Aulsgay. Orfay eithernay oesday anyway oneway exceptway erchantsmay enerallygay ogay
itherthay, ornay evenway otay emthay asway anyway ortionpay ofway itway ownknay, exceptway ethay
easayoastcay andway osethay artspay ichwhay areway oppositeway otay Aulgay. Ereforethay, afterway
avinghay alledcay upway otay imhay ethay erchantsmay omfray allway artspay, ehay ouldcay earnlay
eithernay atwhay asway ethay izesay ofway ethay islandway, ornay atwhay orway owhay umerousnay ereway
ethay ationsnay ichwhay inhabitedway itway, ornay atwhay temsysay ofway arway eythay ollowedfay,
ornay atwhay ustomscay eythay usedway, ornay atwhay arbourshay ereway onvenientcay orfay away
eatgray umbernay ofway argelay ipsshay.

Ixxay.Ehay endssay eforebay imhay Aiuscay Olusenusvay ithway away ipshay ofway arway, otay acquireway
away owledgeknay ofway esethay articularspay eforebay ehay inway ersonpay ouldshay akemay away
escentday intoway ethay islandway, asway ehay asway onvincedcay atthay isthay asway away udiciousjay
easuremay. Ehay ommissionedcay imhay otay oroughlythay examineway intoway allway attersmay, andway
enthay eturnray otay imhay asway oonsay asway ossiblepay. Ehay imselfhay oceedspray otay ethay
Orinimay ithway allway ishay orcesfay. Ehay ordersway ipsshay omfray allway artspay ofway ethay
eighbouringnay ountriescay, andway ethay eetflay ichwhay ethay ecedingpray ummersay ehay adhay
uiltbay orfay ethay arway ithway ethay Enetivay, otay assembleway inway isthay aceplay. Inway ethay
eantimemay, ishay urposepay avinghay eenbay iscoveredday, andway eportedray otay ethay
Itonsbray ybay erchantsmay, ambassadorsway omecay otay imhay omfray everalsay atesstay ofway ethay
islandway, otay omisepray atthay eythay illway ivegay ostageshay, andway ubmitsay otay ethay
overnmentgay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay. Avinghay ivengay emthay anway audienceway, ehay afterway
omisingpray iberallylay, andway exhortingway emthay otay ontinuecay inway atthay urposepay,
endssay emthay ackbay otay eirthay ownway ountrycay, andway espatchesday ithway emthay
Ommiuscay, omwhay, uponway ubduingsay ethay Atrebatesway, ehay adhay eatedcray ingkay erethay, away
anmay osewhay ouragecay andway onductcay ehay esteemedway, andway owhay ehay oughtthay ouldway ebay
aithfulfay otay imhay, andway osewhay influenceway ankedray ighlyhay inway osethay ountriescay.
Ehay ordersway imhay otay isitvay asway anymay atesstay asway ehay ouldcay, andway ersuadepay emthay otay
embraceway ethay otectionpray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway appriseway emthay atthay ehay
ouldway ortlyshay omecay itherthay. Olusenusvay, avinghay iewedvay ethay ocalitieslay asway
arfay asway eansmay ouldcay ebay affordedway oneway owhay aredday otnay eavelay ishay ipshay andway
usttray imselfhay otay arbariansbay, eturnsray otay Aesarcay onway ethay ifthfay ayday, andway
eportsray atwhay ehay adhay erethay observedway.

Iixxay.Ilewhay Aesarcay emainsray inway esethay artspay orfay ethay urposepay ofway ocuringpray
ipsshay, ambassadorsway omecay otay imhay omfray away eatgray ortionpay ofway ethay Orinimay, otay
eadplay eirthay excuseway espectingray eirthay onductcay onway ethay atelay occasionway;
allegingway atthay itway asway asway enmay uncivilisedway, andway asway osethay owhay ereway
unacquaintedway ithway ourway ustomcay, atthay eythay adhay ademay arway uponway ethay Omanray
eoplepay, andway omisingpray otay erformpay atwhay ehay ouldshay ommandcay. Aesarcay,
inkingthay atthay isthay adhay appenedhay ortunatelyfay enoughway orfay imhay, ecausebay ehay
eithernay ishedway otay eavelay anway enemyway ehindbay imhay, ornay adhay anway opportunityway orfay
arryingcay onway away arway, ybay easonray ofway ethay imetay ofway earyay, ornay onsideredcay atthay
employmentway inway uchsay iflingtray attersmay asway otay ebay eferredpray otay ishay
enterpriseway onway Itainbray, imposesway away argelay umbernay ofway ostageshay; andway enwhay
esethay ereway oughtbray, ehay eceivedray emthay otay ishay otectionpray. Avinghay ollectedcay
ogethertay andway ovidedpray aboutway eightyway ansporttray ipsshay, asway anymay asway ehay
oughtthay ecessarynay orfay onveyingcay overway otway egionslay, ehay assignedway uchsay
ipsshay ofway arway asway ehay adhay esidesbay otay ethay uaestorqay, ishay ieutenantslay, andway
officersway ofway avalrycay. Erethay ereway inway additionway otay esethay eighteenway ipsshay ofway
urdenbay ichwhay ereway eventedpray, eightway ilesmay omfray atthay aceplay, ybay indsway, omfray
eingbay ableway otay eachray ethay amesay ortpay. Esethay ehay istributedday amongstway ethay
orsehay; ethay estray ofway ethay armyway ehay eliveredday otay . Ituriustay Abinussay andway .
Aurunculeiusway Ottacay, ishay ieutenantslay, otay eadlay intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Enapiimay andway osethay antonscay ofway ethay Orinimay omfray ichwhay ambassadorsway adhay otnay
omecay otay imhay. Ehay orderedway . Ulpiciussay Ufusray, ishay ieutenantlay, otay oldhay
ossessionpay ofway ethay arbourhay, ithway uchsay away arrisongay asway ehay oughtthay
ufficientsay.

Iiixxay.Esethay attersmay eingbay arrangedway, indingfay ethay eatherway avourablefay orfay
ishay oyagevay, ehay etsay ailsay aboutway ethay irdthay atchway, andway orderedway ethay orsehay otay
archmay orwardfay otay ethay artherfay ortpay, andway erethay embarkway andway ollowfay imhay. Asway
isthay asway erformedpay atherray ardilytay ybay emthay, ehay imselfhay eachedray Itainbray
ithway ethay irstfay uadronsqay ofway ipsshay, aboutway ethay ourthfay ourhay ofway ethay ayday, andway
erethay awsay ethay orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway awndray upway inway armsway onway allway ethay illshay. Ethay
aturenay ofway ethay aceplay asway isthay ethay easay asway onfinedcay ybay ountainsmay osay oseclay
otay itway atthay away artday ouldcay ebay ownthray omfray eirthay ummitsay uponway ethay oreshay.
Onsideringcay isthay ybay onay eansmay away itfay aceplay orfay isembarkingday, ehay emainedray
atway anchorway illtay ethay inthnay ourhay, orfay ethay otherway ipsshay otay arriveway erethay.
Avinghay inway ethay eantimemay assembledway ethay ieutenantslay andway ilitarymay ibunestray,
ehay oldtay emthay othbay atwhay ehay adhay earntlay omfray Olusenusvay, andway atwhay ehay ishedway
otay ebay oneday; andway enjoinedway emthay asway ethay inciplepray ofway ilitarymay attersmay, andway
especiallyway asway aritimemay affairsway, ichwhay avehay away ecipitatepray andway uncertainway
actionway, equiredray atthay allway ingsthay ouldshay ebay erformedpay ybay emthay atway away odnay
andway atway ethay instantway. Avinghay ismissedday emthay, eetingmay othbay ithway indway andway
idetay avourablefay atway ethay amesay imetay, ethay ignalsay eingbay ivengay andway ethay anchorway
eighedway, ehay advancedway aboutway evensay ilesmay omfray atthay aceplay, andway ationedstay
ishay eetflay overway againstway anway openway andway evellay oreshay.

Ivxxay.Utbay ethay arbariansbay, uponway erceivingpay ethay esignday ofway ethay Omansray,
entsay orwardfay eirthay avalrycay andway arioteerschay, away assclay ofway arriorsway ofway omwhay
itway isway eirthay acticepray otay akemay eatgray useway inway eirthay attlesbay, andway ollowingfay
ithway ethay estray ofway eirthay orcesfay, endeavouredway otay eventpray ourway enmay andinglay.
Inway isthay asway ethay eatestgray ifficultyday, orfay ethay ollowingfay easonsray, amelynay,
ecausebay ourway ipsshay, onway accountway ofway eirthay eatgray izesay, ouldcay ebay ationedstay
onlyway inway eepday aterway; andway ourway oldierssay, inway acesplay unknownway otay emthay, ithway
eirthay andshay embarrassedway, oppressedway ithway away argelay andway eavyhay eightway ofway
armourway, adhay atway ethay amesay imetay otay eaplay omfray ethay ipsshay, andstay amidstway ethay
avesway, andway encounterway ethay enemyway; ereaswhay eythay, eitherway onway dryay oundgray, orway
advancingway away ittlelay ayway intoway ethay aterway, eefray inway allway eirthay imbslay, inway
acesplay oroughlythay ownknay otay emthay, ouldcay onfidentlycay owthray eirthay eaponsway
andway urspay onway eirthay orseshay, ichwhay ereway accustomedway otay isthay indkay ofway ervicesay.
Ismayedday ybay esethay ircumstancescay andway altogetherway untrainedway inway isthay odemay ofway
attlebay, ourway enmay idday otnay allway exertway ethay amesay igourvay andway eagernessway ichwhay
eythay adhay eenbay ontway otay exertway inway engagementsway onway dryay oundgray.

Xxvay.Enwhay Aesarcay observedway isthay, ehay orderedway ethay ipsshay ofway arway, ethay
appearanceway ofway ichwhay asway omewhatsay angestray otay ethay arbariansbay andway ethay
otionmay oremay eadyray orfay ervicesay, otay ebay ithdrawnway away ittlelay omfray ethay
ansporttray esselsvay, andway otay ebay opelledpray ybay eirthay oarsway, andway ebay ationedstay
owardstay ethay openway ankflay ofway ethay enemyway, andway ethay enemyway otay ebay eatenbay offway andway
ivendray awayway ithway ingsslay, arrowsway, andway enginesway ichwhay anplay asway ofway eatgray
ervicesay otay ourway enmay; orfay ethay arbariansbay eingbay artledstay ybay ethay ormfay ofway ourway
ipsshay andway ethay otionsmay ofway ourway oarsway andway ethay aturenay ofway ourway enginesway, ichwhay
asway angestray otay emthay, oppedstay, andway ortlyshay afterway etreatedray away ittlelay. Andway
ilewhay ourway enmay ereway esitatinghay etherwhay eythay ouldshay advanceway otay ethay
oreshay, ieflychay onway accountway ofway ethay epthday ofway ethay easay, ehay owhay arriedcay ethay
eagleway ofway ethay enthtay egionlay, afterway upplicatingsay ethay odsgay atthay ethay attermay
ightmay urntay outway avourablyfay otay ethay egionlay, exclaimedway, Eaplay, ellowfay
oldierssay, unlessway ouyay ishway otay etraybay ouryay eagleway otay ethay enemyway. Iway, orfay ymay
artpay, illway erformpay ymay utyday otay ethay ommonwealthcay andway ymay eneralgay. Enwhay ehay
adhay aidsay isthay ithway away oudlay oicevay, ehay eapedlay omfray ethay ipshay andway oceededpray
otay earbay ethay eagleway owardtay ethay enemyway. Enthay ourway enmay, exhortingway oneway anotherway
atthay osay eatgray away isgraceday ouldshay otnay ebay incurredway, allway eapedlay omfray ethay
ipshay. Enwhay osethay inway ethay earestnay esselsvay awsay emthay, eythay eedilyspay ollowedfay
andway approachedway ethay enemyway.

Ixxvay.Ethay attlebay asway aintainedmay igorouslyvay onway othbay idessay. Ourway enmay,
oweverhay, asway eythay ouldcay eithernay eepkay eirthay anksray, ornay etgay irmfay ootingfay,
ornay ollowfay eirthay andardsstay, andway asway oneway omfray oneway ipshay andway anotherway omfray
anotherway assembledway aroundway ateverwhay andardsstay eythay etmay, ereway ownthray intoway
eatgray onfusioncay. Utbay ethay enemyway, owhay ereway acquaintedway ithway allway ethay
allowsshay, enwhay omfray ethay oreshay eythay awsay anyway omingcay omfray away ipshay oneway ybay
oneway, urredspay onway eirthay orseshay, andway attackedway emthay ilewhay embarrassedway; anymay
urroundedsay away ewfay, othersway ewthray eirthay eaponsway uponway ourway ollectedcay orcesfay
onway eirthay exposedway ankflay. Enwhay Aesarcay observedway isthay, ehay orderedway ethay oatsbay
ofway ethay ipsshay ofway arway andway ethay spyay oopsslay otay ebay illedfay ithway oldierssay, andway
entsay emthay upway otay ethay uccoursay ofway osethay omwhay ehay adhay observedway inway istressday.
Ourway enmay, asway oonsay asway eythay ademay oodgay eirthay ootingfay onway dryay oundgray, andway allway
eirthay omradescay adhay oinedjay emthay, ademay anway attackway uponway ethay enemyway, andway utpay
emthay otay ightflay, utbay ouldcay otnay ursuepay emthay eryvay arfay, ecausebay ethay orsehay
adhay otnay eenbay ableway otay aintainmay eirthay oursecay atway easay andway eachray ethay islandway.
Isthay aloneway asway antingway otay Aesar'scay accustomedway uccesssay.

Iixxvay.Ethay enemyway eingbay usthay anquishedvay inway attlebay, asway oonsay asway eythay
ecoveredray afterway eirthay ightflay, instantlyway entsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay otay
egotiatenay aboutway eacepay. Eythay omisedpray otay ivegay ostageshay andway erformpay atwhay
ehay ouldshay ommandcay. Ogethertay ithway esethay ambassadorsway amecay Ommiuscay ethay
Atrebatianway, owhay, asway Iway avehay aboveway aidsay, adhay eenbay entsay ybay Aesarcay intoway
Itainbray. Imhay eythay adhay eizedsay uponway enwhay eavinglay ishay ipshay, althoughway inway ethay
aracterchay ofway ambassadorway ehay orebay ethay eneral'sgay ommissioncay otay emthay, andway
ownthray intoway ainschay enthay afterway ethay attlebay asway oughtfay, eythay entsay imhay
ackbay, andway inway uingsay orfay eacepay astcay ethay ameblay ofway atthay actway uponway ethay ommoncay
eoplepay, andway entreatedway atthay itway ightmay ebay ardonedpay onway accountway ofway eirthay
indiscretionway. Aesarcay, omplainingcay atthay afterway eythay adhay uedsay orfay eacepay,
andway adhay oluntarilyvay entsay ambassadorsway intoway ethay ontinentcay orfay atthay
urposepay, eythay adhay ademay arway ithoutway away easonray, aidsay atthay ehay ouldway ardonpay
eirthay indiscretionway, andway imposedway ostageshay, away artpay ofway omwhay eythay avegay
immediatelyway; ethay estray eythay aidsay eythay ouldway ivegay inway away ewfay aysday, incesay
eythay ereway entsay orfay omfray emoteray acesplay. Inway ethay eantimemay eythay orderedway
eirthay eoplepay otay eturnray otay ethay ountrycay artspay, andway ethay iefschay assembledway
omfray allway uartersqay, andway oceededpray otay urrendersay emselvesthay andway eirthay
atesstay otay Aesarcay.

Iiixxvay.Away eacepay eingbay establishedway ybay esethay oceedingspray ourfay aysday afterway
eway adhay omecay intoway Itainbray, ethay eighteenway ipsshay, otay ichwhay eferenceray ashay
eenbay ademay aboveway, andway ichwhay onveyedcay ethay avalrycay, etsay ailsay omfray ethay upperway
ortpay ithway away entlegay alegay; enwhay, oweverhay, eythay ereway approachingway Itainbray
andway ereway eensay omfray ethay ampcay, osay eatgray away ormstay uddenlysay aroseway atthay onenay
ofway emthay ouldcay aintainmay eirthay oursecay atway easay; andway omesay ereway akentay ackbay otay
ethay amesay ortpay omfray ichwhay eythay adhay artedstay;othersway, otay eirthay eatgray
angerday, ereway ivendray otay ethay owerlay artpay ofway ethay islandway, earernay otay ethay estway;
ichwhay, oweverhay, afterway avinghay astcay anchorway, asway eythay ereway ettinggay illedfay
ithway aterway, utpay outway otay easay oughthray ecessitynay inway away ormystay ightnay, andway ademay
orfay ethay ontinentcay.

Ixxxay.Itway appenedhay atthay ightnay otay ebay ullfay oonmay, ichwhay usuallyway occasionsway
eryvay ighhay idestay inway atthay oceanway; andway atthay ircumstancecay asway unknownway otay ourway
enmay. Usthay, atway ethay amesay imetay, ethay idetay eganbay otay illfay ethay ipsshay ofway arway
ichwhay Aesarcay adhay ovidedpray otay onveycay overway ishay armyway, andway ichwhay ehay adhay
awndray upway onway ethay andstray; andway ethay ormstay eganbay otay ashday ethay ipsshay ofway urdenbay
ichwhay ereway idingray atway anchorway againstway eachway otherway; ornay asway anyway eansmay
affordedway ourway enmay ofway eitherway anagingmay emthay orway ofway enderingray anyway ervicesay. Away
eatgray anymay ipsshay avinghay eenbay eckedwray, inasmuchway asway ethay estray, avinghay ostlay
eirthay ablescay, anchorsway, andway otherway acklingtay, ereway unfitway orfay ailingsay, away
eatgray onfusioncay, asway ouldway ecessarilynay appenhay, aroseway oughoutthray ethay armyway;
orfay erethay ereway onay otherway ipsshay inway ichwhay eythay ouldcay ebay onveyedcay ackbay, andway
allway ingsthay ichwhay areway ofway ervicesay inway epairingray esselsvay ereway antingway, andway
orncay orfay ethay interway adhay otnay eenbay ovidedpray inway osethay acesplay, ecausebay itway
asway understoodway ybay allway atthay eythay ouldway ertainlycay interway inway Aulgay.

Xxxay.Onway iscoveringday esethay ingsthay ethay iefschay ofway Itainbray, owhay adhay omecay upway
afterway ethay attlebay asway oughtfay otay erformpay osethay onditionscay ichwhay Aesarcay adhay
imposedway, eldhay away onferencecay, enwhay eythay erceivedpay atthay avalrycay, andway ipsshay,
andway orncay ereway antingway otay ethay Omansray, andway iscoveredday ethay allsmay umbernay ofway
ourway oldierssay omfray ethay allsmay extentway ofway ethay ampcay ichwhay, ootay, asway onway isthay
accountway oremay imitedlay anthay ordinaryway ecausebay Aesarcay adhay onveyedcay overway ishay
egionslay ithoutway aggagebay, andway oughtthay atthay ethay estbay anplay asway otay enewray
ethay arway, andway utcay offway ourway enmay omfray orncay andway ovisionspray andway otractpray ethay
affairway illtay interway; ecausebay eythay eltfay onfidentcay atthay, ifway eythay ereway
anquishedvay orway utcay offway omfray away eturnray, onay oneway ouldway afterwardsway asspay overway
intoway Itainbray orfay ethay urposepay ofway akingmay arway. Ereforethay, againway enteringway
intoway away onspiracycay, eythay eganbay otay epartday omfray ethay ampcay ybay egreesday andway
ecretlysay ingbray upway eirthay eoplepay omfray ethay ountrycay artspay.

Ixxxay.Utbay Aesarcay, althoughway ehay adhay otnay asway etyay iscoveredday eirthay easuresmay,
etyay, othbay omfray atwhay adhay occurredway otay ishay ipsshay, andway omfray ethay ircumstancecay
atthay eythay adhay eglectednay otay ivegay ethay omisedpray ostageshay, uspectedsay atthay
ethay ingthay ouldway omecay otay asspay ichwhay eallyray idday appenhay. Ehay ereforethay
ovidedpray emediesray againstway allway ontingenciescay; orfay ehay ailyday onveyedcay orncay
omfray ethay ountrycay artspay intoway ethay ampcay, usedway ethay imbertay andway assbray ofway uchsay
ipsshay asway ereway ostmay eriouslysay amagedday orfay epairingray ethay estray, andway orderedway
ateverwhay ingsthay esidesbay ereway ecessarynay orfay isthay objectway otay ebay oughtbray otay
imhay omfray ethay ontinentcay. Andway usthay, incesay atthay usinessbay asway executedway ybay
ethay oldierssay ithway ethay eatestgray energyway, ehay effectedway atthay, afterway ethay osslay
ofway elvetway ipsshay, away oyagevay ouldcay ebay ademay ellway enoughway inway ethay estray.

Iixxxay.Ilewhay esethay ingsthay areway eingbay ansactedtray, oneway egionlay adhay eenbay
entsay otay oragefay, accordingway otay ustomcay, andway onay uspicionsay ofway arway adhay arisenway
asway etyay, andway omesay ofway ethay eoplepay emainedray inway ethay ountrycay artspay, othersway
entway ackwardsbay andway orwardsfay otay ethay ampcay, eythay owhay ereway onway utyday atway ethay
atesgay ofway ethay ampcay eportedray otay Aesarcay atthay away eatergray ustday anthay asway usualway
asway eensay inway atthay irectionday inway ichwhay ethay egionlay adhay archedmay. Aesarcay,
uspectingsay atthay ichwhay asway eallyray ethay asecay,atthay omesay ewnay enterpriseway
asway undertakenway ybay ethay arbariansbay, orderedway ethay otway ohortscay ichwhay ereway onway
utyday otay archmay intoway atthay uarterqay ithway imhay, andway otway otherway ohortscay otay
elieveray emthay onway utyday; ethay estray otay ebay armedway andway ollowfay imhay immediatelyway.
Enwhay ehay adhay advancedway omesay ittlelay ayway omfray ethay ampcay, ehay awsay atthay ishay enmay
ereway overpoweredway ybay ethay enemyway andway arcelyscay ableway otay andstay eirthay oundgray,
andway atthay, ethay egionlay eingbay owdedcray ogethertay, eaponsway ereway eingbay astcay onway
emthay omfray allway idessay. Orfay asway allway ethay orncay asway eapedray inway everyway artpay ithway
ethay exceptionway ofway oneway, ethay enemyway, uspectingsay atthay ourway enmay ouldway epairray otay
atthay, adhay oncealedcay emselvesthay inway ethay oodsway uringday ethay ightnay. Enthay
attackingway emthay uddenlysay, atteredscay asway eythay ereway, andway enwhay eythay adhay aidlay
asideway eirthay armsway, andway ereway engagedway inway eapingray, eythay illedkay away allsmay
umbernay, ewthray ethay estray intoway onfusioncay, andway urroundedsay emthay ithway eirthay
avalrycay andway ariotschay.

Iiixxxay.Eirthay odemay ofway ightingfay ithway eirthay ariotschay isway isthay irstlyfay,
eythay ivedray aboutway inway allway irectionsday andway owthray eirthay eaponsway andway enerallygay
eakbray ethay anksray ofway ethay enemyway ithway ethay eryvay eaddray ofway eirthay orseshay andway ethay
oisenay ofway eirthay eelswhay; andway enwhay eythay avehay orkedway emselvesthay inway etweenbay
ethay oopstray ofway orsehay, eaplay omfray eirthay ariotschay andway engageway onway ootfay. Ethay
arioteerschay inway ethay eantimemay ithdrawway omesay ittlelay istanceday omfray ethay
