attlebay, andway osay aceplay emselvesthay ithway ethay ariotschay atthay, ifway eirthay astersmay
areway overpoweredway ybay ethay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway, eythay aymay avehay away eadyray
etreatray otay eirthay ownway oopstray. Usthay eythay isplayday inway attlebay ethay eedspay ofway
orsehay, ogethertay ithway ethay irmnessfay ofway infantryway; andway ybay ailyday acticepray
andway exerciseway attainway otay uchsay expertnessway atthay eythay areway accustomedway, evenway onway
away ecliningday andway eepstay aceplay, otay eckchay eirthay orseshay atway ullfay eedspay, andway
anagemay andway urntay emthay inway anway instantway andway unray alongway ethay olepay, andway andstay onway
ethay okeyay, andway encethay etakebay emselvesthay ithway ethay eatestgray eleritycay otay
eirthay ariotschay againway.

Ivxxxay.Underway esethay ircumstancescay, ourway enmay eingbay ismayedday ybay ethay oveltynay
ofway isthay odemay ofway attlebay, Aesarcay ostmay easonablysay oughtbray assistanceway; orfay
uponway ishay arrivalway ethay enemyway ausedpay, andway ourway enmay ecoveredray omfray eirthay
earfay; uponway ichwhay, inkingthay ethay imetay unfavourableway orfay ovokingpray ethay enemyway
andway omingcay otay anway actionway, ehay eptkay imselfhay inway ishay ownway uarterqay, andway, away
ortshay imetay avinghay intervenedway, ewdray ackbay ethay egionslay intoway ethay ampcay. Ilewhay
esethay ingsthay ereway oinggay onway, andway allway ourway enmay engagedway, ethay estray ofway ethay
Itonsbray, owhay ereway inway ethay ieldsfay, epartedday. Ormsstay enthay etsay inway orfay
everalsay uccessivesay aysday, ichwhay othbay onfinedcay ourway enmay otay ampcay andway
inderedhay ethay enemyway omfray attackingway usway. Inway ethay eantimemay ethay arbariansbay
espatchedday essengersmay otay allway artspay andway eportedray otay eirthay eoplepay ethay
allsmay umbernay ofway ourway oldierssay, andway owhay oodgay anway opportunityway asway ivengay orfay
obtainingway oilspay andway orfay iberatinglay emselvesthay orfay everway, ifway eythay ouldshay
onlyway ivedray ethay Omansray omfray eirthay ampcay. Avinghay ybay esethay eansmay eedilyspay
otgay ogethertay away argelay orcefay ofway infantryway andway ofway avalrycay, eythay amecay upway otay
ethay ampcay.

Vxxxay.Althoughway Aesarcay anticipatedway atthay ethay amesay ingthay ichwhay adhay
appenedhay onway ormerfay occasionsway ouldway enthay occurwayatthay, ifway ethay enemyway ereway
outedray, eythay ouldway escapeway omfray angerday ybay eirthay eedspay; illstay, avinghay otgay
aboutway irtythay orsehay, ichwhay Ommiuscay ethay Atrebatianway, ofway omwhay entionmay ashay
eenbay ademay, adhay oughtbray overway ithway imhay omfray Aulgay, ehay ewdray upway ethay egionslay
inway orderway ofway attlebay eforebay ethay ampcay. Enwhay ethay actionway ommencedcay, ethay enemyway
ereway unableway otay ustainsay ethay attackway ofway ourway enmay onglay, andway urnedtay eirthay
acksbay; ourway enmay ursuedpay emthay asway arfay asway eirthay eedspay andway engthstray
ermittedpay, andway ewslay away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay; enthay, avinghay estroyedday andway
urntbay everythingway arfay andway ideway, eythay etreatedray otay eirthay ampcay.

Vixxxay.Ethay amesay ayday, ambassadorsway entsay ybay ethay enemyway amecay otay Aesarcay otay
egotiatenay away eacepay. Aesarcay oubledday ethay umbernay ofway ostageshay ichwhay ehay adhay
eforebay emandedday; andway orderedway atthay eythay ouldshay ebay oughtbray overway otay ethay
ontinentcay, ecausebay, incesay ethay imetay ofway ethay equinoxway asway earnay, ehay idday otnay
onsidercay atthay, ithway ishay ipsshay outway ofway epairray, ethay oyagevay oughtway otay ebay
eferredday illtay interway. Avinghay etmay ithway avourablefay eatherway ehay etsay ailsay away
ittlelay afterway idnightmay, andway allway ishay eetflay arrivedway afesay atway ethay ontinentcay,
exceptway otway ofway ethay ipsshay ofway urdenbay ichwhay ouldcay otnay akemay ethay amesay ortpay
ichwhay ethay otherway ipsshay idday, andway ereway arriedcay away ittlelay owerlay ownday.

Viixxxay.Enwhay ourway oldierssay, aboutway 300 inway umbernay, adhay eenbay awndray outway ofway
esethay otway ipsshay, andway ereway archingmay otay ethay ampcay, ethay Orinimay, omwhay Aesarcay,
enwhay ettingsay orthfay orfay Itainbray, adhay eftlay inway away atestay ofway eacepay, excitedway ybay
ethay opehay ofway oilspay, atway irstfay urroundedsay emthay ithway away allsmay umbernay ofway enmay,
andway orderedway emthay otay aylay ownday eirthay armsway, ifway eythay idday otnay ishway otay ebay
ainslay; afterwardsway oweverhay, enwhay eythay, ormingfay away irclecay, oodstay onway eirthay
efenceday, away outshay asway aisedray andway aboutway 6000 ofway ethay enemyway oonsay assembledway;
ichwhay eingbay eportedray, Aesarcay entsay allway ethay avalrycay inway ethay ampcay asway away
eliefray otay ishay enmay. Inway ethay eantimemay ourway oldierssay ustainedsay ethay attackway ofway
ethay enemyway, andway oughtfay ostmay aliantlyvay orfay oremay anthay ourfay ourshay, andway,
eceivingray utbay ewfay oundsway emselvesthay, ewslay everalsay ofway emthay. Utbay afterway ourway
avalrycay amecay inway ightsay, ethay enemyway, owingthray awayway eirthay armsway, urnedtay eirthay
acksbay, andway away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay ereway illedkay.

Viiixxxay.Ethay ayday ollowingfay Aesarcay entsay Abienuslay, ishay ieutenantlay, ithway
osethay egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay oughtbray ackbay omfray Itainbray, againstway ethay
Orinimay, owhay adhay evoltedray; owhay, asway eythay adhay onay aceplay otay ichwhay eythay ightmay
etreatray, onway accountway ofway ethay ingdryay upway ofway eirthay arshesmay ichwhay eythay adhay
availedway emselvesthay ofway asway away aceplay ofway efugeray ethay ecedingpray earyay, almostway
allway ellfay intoway ethay owerpay ofway Abienuslay. Inway ethay eantimemay Aesar'scay
ieutenantslay, . Ituriustay andway . Ottacay, owhay adhay edlay ethay egionslay intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Enapiimay, avinghay aidlay asteway allway eirthay andslay, utcay ownday
eirthay orncay andway urntbay eirthay ouseshay, eturnedray otay Aesarcay ecausebay ethay
Enapiimay adhay allway oncealedcay emselvesthay inway eirthay ickestthay oodsway. Aesarcay
ixedfay ethay interway uartersqay ofway allway ethay egionslay amongstway ethay Elgaebay. Itherthay
onlyway otway Itishbray atesstay entsay ostageshay; ethay estray omittedway otay oday osay. Orfay
esethay uccessessay, away anksgivingthay ofway entytway aysday asway ecreedday ybay ethay enatesay
uponway eceivingray Aesar'scay etterlay.



Ookbay 

Iway.Uciuslay Omitiusday andway Appiusway Audiusclay eingbay onsulscay, Aesarcay enwhay
epartingday omfray ishay interway uartersqay intoway Italyway, asway ehay adhay eenbay accustomedway
otay oday earlyyay, ommandscay ethay ieutenantslay omwhay ehay appointedway overway ethay
egionslay otay aketay arecay atthay uringday ethay interway asway anymay ipsshay asway ossiblepay
ouldshay ebay uiltbay, andway ethay oldway epairedray. Ehay ansplay ethay izesay andway apeshay ofway
emthay. Orfay espatchday ofway adinglay, andway orfay awingdray emthay onway oreshay, ehay akesmay
emthay away ittlelay owerlay anthay osethay ichwhay eway avehay eenbay accustomedway otay useway inway
ourway easay; andway atthay osay uchmay ethay oremay, ecausebay ehay ewknay atthay, onway accountway ofway
ethay equentfray angeschay ofway ethay idetay, esslay ellssway occurredway erethay; orfay ethay
urposepay ofway ansportingtray ittlelay andway away eatgray umbernay ofway orseshay, ehay akesmay
emthay away ittlelay oaderbray anthay osethay ichwhay eway useway inway otherway eassay. Allway esethay
ehay ordersway otay ebay onstructedcay orfay ightnesslay andway expeditionway, otay ichwhay
objectway eirthay ownesslay ontributescay eatlygray. Ehay ordersway osethay ingsthay ichwhay
areway ecessarynay orfay equippingway ipsshay otay ebay oughtbray itherthay omfray Ainspay. Ehay
imselfhay, onway ethay assizesway ofway Itherhay Aulgay eingbay oncludedcay, oceedspray intoway
Illyricumway, ecausebay ehay eardhay atthay ethay artpay ofway ethay ovincepray earestnay emthay
asway eingbay aidlay asteway ybay ethay incursionsway ofway ethay Irustaepay. Enwhay ehay adhay
arrivedway erethay, ehay evieslay oldierssay uponway ethay atesstay, andway ordersway emthay otay
assembleway atway anway appointedway aceplay. Ichwhay ircumstancecay avinghay eenbay eportedray
otay emthay, ethay Irustaepay endsay ambassadorsway otay imhay otay informway imhay atthay onay
artpay ofway osethay oceedingspray asway oneday ybay ublicpay eliberationday, andway assertway
atthay eythay ereway eadyray otay akemay ompensationcay ybay allway eansmay orfay ethay injuriesway
inflictedway. Aesarcay, acceptingway eirthay efenceday, emandsday ostageshay, andway
ordersway emthay otay ebay oughtbray otay imhay onway away ecifiedspay ayday, andway assuresway emthay
atthay unlessway eythay idday osay ehay ouldway isitvay eirthay atestay ithway arway. Esethay eingbay
oughtbray otay imhay onway ethay ayday ichwhay ehay adhay orderedway, ehay appointsway arbitratorsway
etweenbay ethay atesstay, owhay ouldshay estimateway ethay amagesday andway etermineday ethay
eparationray.

Iiway.Esethay ingsthay eingbay inishedfay, andway ethay assizesway eingbay oncludedcay, ehay
eturnsray intoway Itherhay Aulgay, andway oceedspray encethay otay ethay armyway. Enwhay ehay adhay
arrivedway erethay, avinghay ademay away urveysay ofway ethay interway uarterqay, ehay indsfay
atthay, ybay ethay extraordinaryway ardourway ofway ethay oldierssay, amidstway ethay utmostway
arcityscay ofway allway aterialsmay, aboutway ixsay undredhay ipsshay ofway atthay indkay ichwhay eway
avehay escribedday aboveway, andway entytwayeightway ipsshay ofway arway, adhay eenbay uiltbay, andway
ereway otnay arfay omfray atthay atestay atthay eythay ightmay ebay aunchedlay inway away ewfay aysday.
Avinghay ommendedcay ethay oldierssay andway osethay owhay adhay esidedpray overway ethay orkway,
ehay informsway emthay atwhay ehay ishesway otay ebay oneday, andway ordersway allway ethay ipsshay otay
assembleway atway ortpay Itiusway, omfray ichwhay ortpay ehay adhay earnedlay atthay ethay assagepay
intoway Itainbray asway ortestshay, eingbay onlyway aboutway irtythay ilesmay omfray ethay
ontinentcay. Ehay eftlay atwhay eemedsay away ufficientsay umbernay ofway oldierssay orfay atthay
esignday; ehay imselfhay oceedspray intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Eviritray ithway
ourfay egionslay ithoutway aggagebay, andway 800 orsehay, ecausebay eythay eithernay amecay
otay ethay eneralgay ietsday ofway Aulgay, ornay obeyedway ishay ommandscay, andway ereway,
oreovermay, aidsay otay ebay amperingtay ithway ethay Ermansgay eyondbay ethay Inerhay.

Iiiway.Isthay atestay isway ybay arfay ethay ostmay owerfulpay ofway allway Aulgay inway avalrycay, andway
ashay eatgray orcesfay ofway infantryway, andway asway eway avehay emarkedray aboveway, ordersbay onway
ethay Inerhay. Inway atthay atestay, otway ersonspay, Indutiomarusway andway Ingetorixcay, ereway
enthay ontendingcay ithway eachway otherway orfay ethay upremesay owerpay; oneway ofway omwhay, asway
oonsay asway ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay andway ishay egionslay asway ownknay, amecay otay imhay;
assuresway imhay atthay ehay andway allway ishay artypay ouldway ontinuecay inway eirthay
allegianceway, andway otnay evoltray omfray ethay allianceway ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway
informsway imhay ofway ethay ingsthay ichwhay ereway oinggay onway amongstway ethay Eviritray. Utbay
Indutiomarusway eganbay otay ollectcay avalrycay andway infantryway, andway akemay
eparationspray orfay arway, avinghay oncealedcay osethay owhay ybay easonray ofway eirthay ageway
ouldcay otnay ebay underway armsway inway ethay orestfay Arduennaway, ichwhay isway ofway immenseway
izesay, andway extendsway omfray ethay Inerhay acrossway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Eviritray otay
ethay ontiersfray ofway ethay Emiray. Utbay afterway atthay, omesay ofway ethay iefchay ersonspay ofway
ethay atestay, othbay influencedway ybay eirthay iendshipfray orfay Ingetorixcay, andway
alarmedway atway ethay arrivalway ofway ourway armyway, amecay otay Aesarcay andway eganbay otay olicitsay
imhay ivatelypray aboutway eirthay ownway interestsway, incesay eythay ouldcay otnay ovidepray
orfay ethay afetysay ofway ethay atestay; Indutiomarusway, eadingdray estlay ehay ouldshay ebay
abandonedway ybay allway, endssay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay, otay eclareday atthay ehay
absentedway imselfhay omfray ishay ountrymencay, andway efrainedray omfray omingcay otay imhay
onway isthay accountway, atthay ehay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway eepkay ethay atestay inway itsway
allegianceway, estlay onway ethay epartureday ofway allway ethay obilitynay ethay ommonaltycay
ouldshay, inway eirthay indiscretionway, evoltray. Andway usthay ethay olewhay atestay asway atway
ishay ontrolcay; andway atthay ehay, ifway Aesarcay ouldway ermitpay, ouldway omecay otay ethay ampcay
otay imhay, andway ouldway ommitcay ishay ownway ortunesfay andway osethay ofway ethay atestay otay ishay
oodgay aithfay.

Ivway.Aesarcay, oughthay ehay iscernedday omfray atwhay otivemay esethay ingsthay ereway
aidsay, andway atwhay ircumstancecay eterredday imhay omfray ishay editatedmay anplay, illstay,
inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay ebay ompelledcay otay asteway ethay ummersay amongway ethay
Eviritray, ilewhay allway ingsthay ereway eparedpray orfay ethay arway ithway Itainbray,
orderedway Indutiomarusway otay omecay otay imhay ithway 200 ostageshay. Enwhay esethay ereway
oughtbray, andway amongway emthay ishay onsay andway earnay elationsray omwhay ehay adhay
emandedday ybay amenay, ehay onsoledcay Indutiomarusway, andway enjoinedway imhay otay ontinuecay
inway ishay allegianceway; etyay, everthelessnay, ummoningsay otay imhay ethay iefchay enmay ofway
ethay Eviritray, ehay econciledray emthay individuallyway otay Ingetorixcay isthay ehay othbay
oughtthay ouldshay ebay oneday ybay imhay inway usticejay otay ethay eritsmay ofway ethay atterlay,
andway alsoway udgedjay atthay itway asway ofway eatgray importanceway atthay ethay influenceway ofway
oneway osewhay ingularsay attachmentway owardstay imhay ehay adhay ullyfay eensay, ouldshay
evailpray asway uchmay asway ossiblepay amongway ishay eoplepay. Indutiomarusway asway eryvay uchmay
offendedway atway isthay actway, eeingsay atthay ishay influenceway asway iminishedday amongway
ishay ountrymencay; andway ehay, owhay alreadyway eforebay adhay ornebay away ostilehay indmay
owardstay usway, asway uchmay oremay iolentlyvay inflamedway againstway usway oughthray
esentmentray atway isthay.

.Esethay attersmay eingbay ettledsay, Aesarcay entway otay ortpay Itiusway ithway ethay
egionslay. Erethay ehay iscoversday atthay ortyfay ipsshay ichwhay adhay eenbay uiltbay inway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Eldimay, avinghay eenbay ivendray ackbay ybay away ormstay, adhay eenbay
unableway otay aintainmay eirthay oursecay, andway adhay eturnedray otay ethay amesay ortpay omfray
ichwhay eythay adhay etsay outway; ehay indsfay ethay estray eadyray orfay ailingsay, andway
urnishedfay ithway everythingway. Inway ethay amesay aceplay, ethay avalrycay ofway ethay olewhay
ofway Aulgay, inway umbernay 4000, assemblesway, andway alsoway ethay iefchay ersonspay ofway allway
ethay atesstay; ehay adhay eterminedday otay eavelay inway Aulgay away eryvay ewfay ofway emthay, osewhay
idelityfay owardstay imhay ehay adhay earlyclay iscernedday, andway aketay ethay estray ithway
imhay asway ostageshay; ecausebay ehay earedfay away ommotioncay inway Aulgay enwhay ehay ouldshay ebay
absentway.

Ivay.Erethay asway ogethertay ithway ethay othersway, Umnorixday, ethay Aeduanway, ofway omwhay
eway avehay ademay eviouspray entionmay. Imhay inway articularpay ehay adhay esolvedray otay avehay
ithway imhay, ecausebay ehay adhay iscoveredday imhay otay ebay ondfay ofway angechay, ondfay ofway
owerpay, ossessingpay eatgray esolutionray, andway eatgray influenceway amongway ethay Aulsgay.
Otay isthay asway addedway atthay Umnorixday adhay eforebay aidsay inway anway assemblyway ofway
Aeduansway, atthay ethay overeigntysay ofway ethay atestay adhay eenbay ademay overway otay imhay ybay
Aesarcay; ichwhay eechspay ethay Aeduiway orebay ithway impatienceway andway etyay aredday otnay
endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay orfay ethay urposepay ofway eitherway ejectingray orway
eprecatingday atthay appointmentway. Atthay actfay Aesarcay adhay earnedlay omfray ishay
ownway ersonalpay iendsfray. Ehay atway irstfay ovestray otay obtainway ybay everyway entreatyway
atthay ehay ouldshay ebay eftlay inway Aulgay; artlypay, ecausebay, eingbay unaccustomedway otay
ailingsay, ehay earedfay ethay easay; artlypay, ecausebay ehay aidsay ehay asway eventedpray ybay
ivineday admonitionsway. Afterway ehay awsay atthay isthay equestray asway irmlyfay efusedray
imhay, allway opehay ofway uccesssay eingbay ostlay, ehay eganbay otay ampertay ithway ethay iefchay
ersonspay ofway ethay Aulsgay, otay allcay emthay apartway inglysay andway exhortway emthay otay
emainray onway ethay ontinentcay; otay agitateway emthay ithway ethay earfay atthay itway asway otnay
ithoutway easonray atthay Aulgay ouldshay ebay iptstray ofway allway erhay obilitynay; atthay itway
asway Aesar'scay esignday otay ingbray overway otay Itainbray andway utpay otay eathday allway osethay
omwhay ehay earedfay otay ayslay inway ethay ightsay ofway Aulgay, otay edgeplay ishay onourhay otay ethay
estray, otay askway orfay eirthay oathway atthay eythay ouldway ybay ommoncay eliberationday
executeway atwhay eythay ouldshay erceivepay otay ebay ecessarynay orfay Aulgay. Esethay ingsthay
ereway eportedray otay Aesarcay ybay everalsay ersonspay.

Iivay.Avinghay earnedlay isthay actfay, Aesarcay, ecausebay ehay adhay onferredcay osay uchmay
onourhay uponway ethay Aeduanway atestay, eterminedday atthay Umnorixday ouldshay ebay
estrainedray andway eterredday ybay ateverwhay eansmay ehay ouldcay; andway atthay, ecausebay ehay
erceivedpay ishay insaneway esignsday otay ebay oceedingpray artherfay andway artherfay, arecay
ouldshay ebay akentay estlay ehay ightmay ebay ableway otay injureway imhay andway ethay
ommonwealthcay. Ereforethay, avinghay ayedstay aboutway entytwayivefay aysday inway atthay
aceplay, ecausebay ethay orthnay indway, ichwhay usuallyway owsblay away eatgray artpay ofway everyway
easonsay, eventedpray ethay oyagevay, ehay exertedway imselfhay otay eepkay Umnorixday inway ishay
allegianceway andway everthelessnay earnlay allway ishay easuresmay avinghay atway engthlay
etmay ithway avourablefay eatherway, ehay ordersway ethay ootfay oldierssay andway ethay orsehay
otay embarkway inway ethay ipsshay. Utbay, ilewhay ethay indsmay ofway allway ereway occupiedway,
Umnorixday eganbay otay aketay ishay epartureday omfray ethay ampcay omewardshay ithway ethay
avalrycay ofway ethay Aeduiway, Aesarcay eingbay ignorantway ofway itway. Aesarcay, onway isthay
attermay eingbay eportedray otay imhay, easingcay omfray ishay expeditionway andway eferringday
allway otherway affairsway, endssay away eatgray artpay ofway ethay avalrycay otay ursuepay imhay, andway
ommandscay atthay ehay ebay oughtbray ackbay; ehay ordersway atthay ifway ehay useway iolencevay andway
oday otnay ubmitsay, atthay ehay ebay ainslay onsideringcay atthay Umnorixday ouldway oday
othingnay asway away ationalray anmay ilewhay ehay imselfhay asway absentway, incesay ehay adhay
isregardedday ishay ommandcay evenway enwhay esentpray. Ehay, oweverhay, enwhay ecalledray,
eganbay otay esistray andway efendday imselfhay ithway ishay andhay, andway imploreway ethay
upportsay ofway ishay eoplepay, oftenway exclaimingway atthay ehay asway eefray andway ethay
ubjectsay ofway away eefray atestay. Eythay urroundsay andway illkay ethay anmay asway eythay adhay
eenbay ommandedcay; utbay ethay Aeduanway orsemenhay allway eturnray otay Aesarcay.

Iiivay.Enwhay esethay ingsthay ereway oneday andway Abienuslay, eftlay onway ethay ontinentcay
ithway eethray egionslay andway 2000 orsehay, otay efendday ethay arbourshay andway ovidepray
orncay, andway iscoverday atwhay asway oinggay onway inway Aulgay, andway aketay easuresmay
accordingway otay ethay occasionway andway accordingway otay ethay ircumstancecay; ehay imselfhay,
ithway ivefay egionslay andway away umbernay ofway orsehay, equalway otay atthay ichwhay ehay asway
eavinglay onway ethay ontinentcay, etsay ailsay atway unsetsay andway oughthay orfay away imetay
ornebay orwardfay ybay away entlegay outhsayestway indway, ehay idday otnay aintainmay ishay
oursecay, inway onsequencecay ofway ethay indway ingdyay awayway aboutway idnightmay, andway eingbay
arriedcay onway ootay arfay ybay ethay idetay, enwhay ethay unsay oseray, espiedway Itainbray assedpay
onway ishay eftlay. Enthay, againway, ollowingfay ethay angechay ofway idetay, ehay urgedway onway ithway
ethay oarsway atthay ehay ightmay akemay atthay ortpay ofway ethay islandway inway ichwhay ehay adhay
iscoveredday ethay ecedingpray ummersay atthay erethay asway ethay estbay andinglayaceplay,
andway inway isthay affairway ethay iritspay ofway ourway oldierssay asway eryvay uchmay otay ebay
extolledway; orfay eythay ithway ethay ansportstray andway eavyhay ipsshay, ethay abourlay ofway
owingray otnay eingbay orfay away omentmay iscontinuedday, equalledway ethay eedspay ofway ethay
ipsshay ofway arway. Allway ethay ipsshay eachedray Itainbray earlynay atway idmayayday; ornay asway
erethay eensay away inglesay enemyway inway atthay aceplay, utbay, asway Aesarcay afterwardsway
oundfay omfray omesay isonerspray, oughthay argelay odiesbay ofway oopstray adhay assembledway
erethay, etyay eingbay alarmedway ybay ethay eatgray umbernay ofway ourway ipsshay, oremay anthay
eightway undredhay ofway ichwhay, includingway ethay ipsshay ofway ethay ecedingpray earyay, andway
osethay ivatepray esselsvay ichwhay eachway adhay uiltbay orfay ishay ownway onveniencecay, adhay
appearedway atway oneway imetay, eythay adhay uittedqay ethay oastcay andway oncealedcay
emselvesthay amongway ethay igherhay ointspay.

Ixway.Aesarcay, avinghay isembarkedday ishay armyway andway osenchay away onvenientcay aceplay
orfay ethay ampcay, enwhay ehay iscoveredday omfray ethay isonerspray inway atwhay artpay ethay
orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway adhay odgedlay emselvesthay, avinghay eftlay entay ohortscay andway
300 orsehay atway ethay easay, otay ebay away uardgay otay ethay ipsshay, astenshay otay ethay enemyway,
atway ethay irdthay atchway, earingfay ethay esslay orfay ethay ipsshay orfay isthay easonray,
ecausebay ehay asway eavinglay emthay astenedfay atway anchorway uponway anway evenway andway openway
oreshay; andway ehay acedplay . Atriusway overway ethay uardgay ofway ethay ipsshay. Ehay imselfhay,
avinghay advancedway ybay ightnay aboutway elvetway ilesmay, espiedway ethay orcesfay ofway ethay
enemyway. Eythay, advancingway otay ethay iverray ithway eirthay avalrycay andway ariotschay omfray
ethay igherhay oundgray, eganbay otay annoyway ourway enmay andway ivegay attlebay. Eingbay
epulsedray ybay ourway avalrycay, eythay oncealedcay emselvesthay inway oodsway, asway eythay adhay
ecuredsay away aceplay admirablyway ortifiedfay ybay aturenay andway ybay artway, ichwhay, asway itway
eemedsay, eythay adhay eforebay eparedpray onway accountway ofway away ivilcay arway; orfay allway
entrancesway otay itway ereway utshay upway ybay away eatgray umbernay ofway elledfay eestray. Eythay
emselvesthay ushedray outway ofway ethay oodsway otay ightfay erehay andway erethay, andway
eventedpray ourway enmay omfray enteringway eirthay ortificationsfay. Utbay ethay oldierssay
ofway ethay eventhsay egionlay, avinghay ormedfay away estudotay andway ownthray upway away ampartray
againstway ethay ortificationfay, ooktay ethay aceplay andway ovedray emthay outway ofway ethay
oodsway, eceivingray onlyway away ewfay oundsway. Utbay Aesarcay orbadefay ishay enmay otay ursuepay
emthay inway eirthay ightflay anyway eatgray istanceday; othbay ecausebay ehay asway ignorantway ofway
ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray, andway ecausebay, asway away eatgray artpay ofway ethay ayday asway
entspay, ehay ishedway imetay otay ebay eftlay orfay ethay ortificationfay ofway ethay ampcay.

.Ethay extnay ayday, earlyway inway ethay orningmay, ehay entsay othbay ootfayoldierssay andway
orsehay inway eethray ivisionsday onway anway expeditionway otay ursuepay osethay owhay adhay edflay.
Esethay avinghay advancedway away ittlelay ayway, enwhay alreadyway ethay earray ofway ethay enemyway
asway inway ightsay, omesay orsehay amecay otay Aesarcay omfray Uintusqay Atriusway, otay eportray
atthay ethay ecedingpray ightnay, away eryvay eatgray ormstay avinghay arisenway, almostway allway
ethay ipsshay ereway ashedday otay iecespay andway astcay uponway ethay oreshay, ecausebay eithernay
ethay anchorsway andway ablescay ouldcay esistray, ornay ouldcay ethay ailorssay andway ilotspay
ustainsay ethay iolencevay ofway ethay ormstay; andway usthay eatgray amageday asway eceivedray ybay
atthay ollisioncay ofway ethay ipsshay.

Ixay.Esethay ingsthay eingbay ownknay otay imhay, Aesarcay ordersway ethay egionslay andway
avalrycay otay ebay ecalledray andway otay easecay omfray eirthay archmay; ehay imselfhay eturnsray
otay ethay ipsshay ehay eessay earlyclay eforebay imhay almostway ethay amesay ingsthay ichwhay ehay
adhay eardhay ofway omfray ethay essengersmay andway ybay etterlay, osay atthay, aboutway ortyfay
ipsshay eingbay ostlay, ethay emainderray eemedsay apablecay ofway eingbay epairedray ithway
uchmay abourlay. Ereforethay ehay electssay orkmenway omfray ethay egionslay, andway ordersway
othersway otay ebay entsay orfay omfray ethay ontinentcay; ehay iteswray otay Abienuslay otay uildbay
asway anymay ipsshay asway ehay ouldcay ithway osethay egionslay ichwhay ereway ithway imhay. Ehay
imselfhay, oughthay ethay attermay asway oneway ofway eatgray ifficultyday andway abourlay, etyay
oughtthay itway otay ebay ostmay expedientway orfay allway ethay ipsshay otay ebay oughtbray upway onway
oreshay andway oinedjay ithway ethay ampcay ybay oneway ortificationfay. Inway esethay attersmay ehay
employedway aboutway entay aysday, ethay abourlay ofway ethay oldierssay eingbay unremittingway
evenway uringday ethay ourshay ofway ightnay. Ethay ipsshay avinghay eenbay oughtbray upway onway
oreshay andway ethay ampcay onglystray ortifiedfay, ehay eftlay ethay amesay orcesfay ichwhay ehay
idday eforebay asway away uardgay orfay ethay ipsshay; ehay etssay outway inway ersonpay orfay ethay amesay
aceplay atthay ehay adhay eturnedray omfray. Enwhay ehay adhay omecay itherthay, eatergray
orcesfay ofway ethay Itonsbray adhay alreadyway assembledway atway atthay aceplay, ethay iefchay
ommandcay andway anagementmay ofway ethay arway avinghay eenbay entrustedway otay
Assivellaunuscay, osewhay erritoriestay away iverray, ichwhay isway alledcay ethay Amesthay,
eparatessay omfray ethay aritimemay atesstay atway aboutway eightyway ilesmay omfray ethay easay.
Atway anway earlierway eriodpay erpetualpay arsway adhay akentay aceplay etweenbay imhay andway ethay
otherway atesstay; utbay, eatlygray alarmedway ybay ourway arrivalway, ethay Itonsbray adhay
acedplay imhay overway ethay olewhay arway andway ethay onductcay ofway itway.

Iixay.Ethay interiorway ortionpay ofway Itainbray isway inhabitedway ybay osethay ofway omwhay eythay
aysay atthay itway isway andedhay ownday ybay aditiontray atthay eythay ereway ornbay inway ethay
islandway itselfway ethay aritimemay ortionpay ybay osethay owhay adhay assedpay overway omfray
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Elgaebay orfay ethay urposepay ofway underplay andway akingmay arway;
almostway allway ofway omwhay areway alledcay ybay ethay amesnay ofway osethay atesstay omfray ichwhay
eingbay ungspray eythay entway itherthay, andway avinghay agedway arway, ontinuedcay erethay
andway eganbay otay ultivatecay ethay andslay. Ethay umbernay ofway ethay eoplepay isway ountlesscay,
andway eirthay uildingsbay exceedinglyway umerousnay, orfay ethay ostmay artpay eryvay ikelay
osethay ofway ethay Aulsgay ethay umbernay ofway attlecay isway eatgray. Eythay useway eitherway assbray
orway ironway ingsray, eterminedday atway away ertaincay eightway, asway eirthay oneymay. Intay isway
oducedpray inway ethay idlandmay egionsray; inway ethay aritimemay, ironway; utbay ethay uantityqay
ofway itway isway allsmay eythay employway assbray, ichwhay isway importedway. Erethay, asway inway Aulgay,
isway imbertay ofway everyway escriptionday, exceptway eechbay andway irfay. Eythay oday otnay egardray
itway awfullay otay eatway ethay arehay, andway ethay ockcay, andway ethay oosegay; eythay, oweverhay,
eedbray emthay orfay amusementway andway easureplay. Ethay imateclay isway oremay emperatetay
anthay inway Aulgay, ethay oldscay eingbay esslay everesay.

Iiixay.Ethay islandway isway iangulartray inway itsway ormfay, andway oneway ofway itsway idessay isway
oppositeway otay Aulgay. Oneway angleway ofway isthay idesay, ichwhay isway inway Entkay, itherwhay
almostway allway ipsshay omfray Aulgay areway irectedday, ookslay otay ethay eastway; ethay owerlay
ookslay otay ethay outhsay. Isthay idesay extendsway aboutway 500 ilesmay. Anotherway idesay ieslay
owardstay Ainspay andway ethay estway, onway ichwhay artpay isway Irelandway, esslay, asway isway
eckonedray, anthay Itainbray ybay onewayalfhay; utbay ethay assagepay omfray itway intoway
Itainbray isway ofway equalway istanceday ithway atthay omfray Aulgay. Inway ethay iddlemay ofway isthay
oyagevay isway anway islandway, ichwhay isway alledcay Onamay; anymay allersmay islandsway esidesbay
areway upposedsay otay ielay erethay, ofway ichwhay islandsway omesay avehay ittenwray atthay atway
ethay imetay ofway ethay interway olsticesay itway isway ightnay erethay orfay irtythay onsecutivecay
aysday. Eway, inway ourway inquiriesway aboutway atthay attermay, ascertainedway othingnay,
exceptway atthay, ybay accurateway easurementsmay ithway aterway, eway erceivedpay ethay
ightsnay otay ebay ortershay erethay anthay onway ethay ontinentcay. Ethay engthlay ofway isthay
idesay, asway eirthay accountway atesstay, isway 700 ilesmay. Ethay irdthay idesay isway owardstay
ethay orthnay, otay ichwhay ortionpay ofway ethay islandway onay andlay isway oppositeway; utbay anway
angleway ofway atthay idesay ookslay incipallypray owardstay Ermanygay. Isthay idesay isway
onsideredcay otay ebay 800 ilesmay inway engthlay. Usthay ethay olewhay islandway isway aboutway
2000 ilesmay inway ircumferencecay.

Ivxay.Ethay ostmay ivilisedcay ofway allway esethay ationsnay areway eythay owhay inhabitway Entkay,
ichwhay isway entirelyway away aritimemay istrictday, ornay oday eythay ifferday uchmay omfray ethay
Allicgay ustomscay. Ostmay ofway ethay inlandway inhabitantsway oday otnay owsay orncay, utbay ivelay
onway ilkmay andway eshflay, andway areway adclay ithway insskay. Allway ethay Itonsbray, indeedway, edyay
emselvesthay ithway oodway, ichwhay occasionsway away uishblay olourcay, andway erebythay avehay
away oremay erribletay appearanceway inway ightfay. Eythay earway eirthay airhay onglay, andway avehay
everyway artpay ofway eirthay odybay avedshay exceptway eirthay eadhay andway upperway iplay. Entay andway
evenway elvetway avehay ivesway ommoncay otay emthay, andway articularlypay othersbray amongway
othersbray, andway arentspay amongway eirthay ildrenchay; utbay ifway erethay ebay anyway issueway ybay
esethay ivesway, eythay areway eputedray otay ebay ethay ildrenchay ofway osethay ybay omwhay
espectivelyray eachway asway irstfay espousedway enwhay away irginvay.

Vxay.Ethay orsehay andway arioteerschay ofway ethay enemyway ontendedcay igorouslyvay inway away
irmishskay ithway ourway avalrycay onway ethay archmay; etyay osay atthay ourway enmay ereway
onquerorscay inway allway artspay, andway ovedray emthay otay eirthay oodsway andway illshay; utbay,
avinghay ainslay away eatgray anymay, eythay ursuedpay ootay eagerlyway, andway ostlay omesay ofway
eirthay enmay. Utbay ethay enemyway, afterway omesay imetay adhay elapsedway, enwhay ourway enmay ereway
offway eirthay uardgay, andway occupiedway inway ethay ortificationfay ofway ethay ampcay, ushedray
outway ofway ethay oodsway, andway akingmay anway attackway uponway osethay owhay ereway acedplay onway
utyday eforebay ethay ampcay, oughtfay inway away eterminedday annermay; andway otway ohortscay
eingbay entsay ybay Aesarcay otay eirthay eliefray, andway esethay everallysay ethay irstfay ofway
otway egionslay, enwhay esethay adhay akentay upway eirthay ositionpay atway away eryvay allsmay
istanceday omfray eachway otherway, asway ourway enmay ereway isconcertedday ybay ethay unusualway
odemay ofway attlebay, ethay enemyway okebray oughthray ethay iddlemay ofway emthay ostmay
ourageouslycay, andway etreatedray encethay inway afetysay. Atthay ayday, . Aberiuslay
Urusday, away ibunetray ofway ethay oldierssay, asway ainslay. Ethay enemyway, incesay oremay
ohortscay ereway entsay againstway emthay, ereway epulsedray.

Ixvay.Inway ethay olewhay ofway isthay ethodmay ofway ightingfay incesay ethay engagementway ooktay
aceplay underway ethay eyesway ofway allway andway eforebay ethay ampcay, itway asway erceivedpay atthay
ourway enmay, onway accountway ofway ethay eightway ofway eirthay armsway, inasmuchway asway eythay ouldcay
eithernay ursuepay ethay enemyway enwhay etreatingray, ornay areday uitqay eirthay
andardsstay, ereway ittlelay uitedsay otay isthay indkay ofway enemyway; atthay ethay orsehay alsoway
oughtfay ithway eatgray angerday, ecausebay eythay ethay Itonsbray enerallygay etreatedray
evenway esignedlyday, andway, enwhay eythay adhay awndray offway ourway enmay away ortshay istanceday
omfray ethay egionslay, eapedlay omfray eirthay ariotschay andway oughtfay onway ootfay inway
unequalway andway otay emthay advantageousway attlebay. Utbay ethay temsysay ofway avalrycay
engagementway isway ontway otay oducepray equalway angerday, andway indeedway ethay amesay, othbay otay
osethay owhay etreatray andway osethay owhay ursuepay. Otay isthay asway addedway, atthay eythay
evernay oughtfay inway oseclay orderway, utbay inway allsmay artiespay andway atway eatgray
istancesday, andway adhay etachmentsday acedplay inway ifferentday artspay, andway enthay ethay
oneway elievedray ethay otherway, andway ethay igorousvay andway eshfray ucceededsay ethay
eariedway.

Iixvay.Ethay ollowingfay ayday ethay enemyway altedhay onway ethay illshay, away istanceday omfray
ourway ampcay, andway esentedpray emselvesthay inway allsmay artiespay, andway eganbay otay
allengechay ourway orsehay otay attlebay ithway esslay iritspay anthay ethay ayday eforebay. Utbay
atway oonnay, enwhay Aesarcay adhay entsay eethray egionslay, andway allway ethay avalrycay ithway .
Eboniustray, ethay ieutenantlay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway oragingfay, eythay ewflay uponway
ethay oragersfay uddenlysay omfray allway uartersqay, osay atthay eythay idday otnay eepkay offway
evenway omfray ethay andardsstay andway ethay egionslay. Ourway enmay akingmay anway attackway onway
emthay igorouslyvay, epulsedray emthay; ornay idday eythay easecay otay ursuepay emthay untilway
ethay orsehay, elyingray onway eliefray, asway eythay awsay ethay egionslay ehindbay emthay, ovedray
ethay enemyway ecipitatelypray eforebay emthay, andway, ayingslay away eatgray umbernay ofway
emthay, idday otnay ivegay emthay ethay opportunityway eitherway ofway allyingray orway altinghay,
orway eapinglay omfray eirthay ariotschay. Immediatelyway afterway isthay etreatray, ethay
auxiliariesway owhay adhay assembledway omfray allway idessay, epartedday; ornay afterway atthay
imetay idday ethay enemyway everway engageway ithway usway inway eryvay argelay umbersnay.

Iiixvay.Aesarcay, iscoveringday eirthay esignday, eadslay ishay armyway intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway Assivellaunuscay otay ethay iverray Amesthay; ichwhay iverray ancay ebay
ordedfay inway oneway aceplay onlyway, andway atthay ithway ifficultyday. Enwhay ehay adhay arrivedway
erethay, ehay erceivespay atthay umerousnay orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway ereway arshalledmay onway
ethay otherway ankbay ofway ethay iverray; ethay ankbay alsoway asway efendedday ybay arpshay akesstay
ixedfay inway ontfray, andway akesstay ofway ethay amesay indkay ixedfay underway ethay aterway ereway
overedcay ybay ethay iverray. Esethay ingsthay eingbay iscoveredday omfray omesay
isonerspray andway esertersday, Aesarcay, endingsay orwardfay ethay avalrycay, orderedway
ethay egionslay otay ollowfay emthay immediatelyway. Utbay ethay oldierssay advancedway ithway
uchsay eedspay andway uchsay ardourway, oughthay eythay oodstay aboveway ethay aterway ybay eirthay
eadshay onlyway, atthay ethay enemyway ouldcay otnay ustainsay ethay attackway ofway ethay egionslay
andway ofway ethay orsehay, andway uittedqay ethay anksbay, andway ommittedcay emselvesthay otay
ightflay.

Ixxay.Assivellaunuscay, asway eway avehay atedstay aboveway, allway opehay isingray outway ofway
attlebay eingbay aidlay asideway, ethay eatergray artpay ofway ishay orcesfay eingbay ismissedday,
andway aboutway 4000 arioteerschay onlyway eingbay eftlay, usedway otay observeway ourway archesmay
andway etireray away ittlelay omfray ethay oadray, andway oncealcay imselfhay inway intricateway andway
oodyway acesplay, andway inway osethay eighbourhoodsnay inway ichwhay ehay adhay iscoveredday eway
ereway aboutway otay archmay, ehay usedway otay ivedray ethay attlecay andway ethay inhabitantsway
omfray ethay ieldsfay intoway ethay oodsway; andway, enwhay ourway avalrycay, orfay ethay akesay ofway
underingplay andway avagingray ethay oremay eelyfray, atteredscay emselvesthay amongway ethay
ieldsfay, ehay usedway otay endsay outway arioteerschay omfray ethay oodsway ybay allway ethay
ellwayownknay oadsray andway athspay, andway, otay ethay eatgray angerday ofway ourway orsehay, engageway
ithway emthay; andway isthay ourcesay ofway earfay inderedhay emthay omfray agglingstray eryvay
extensivelyway. Ethay esultray asway atthay Aesarcay idday otnay allowway excursionsway otay ebay
ademay otay away eatgray istanceday omfray ethay ainmay odybay ofway ethay egionslay, andway orderedway
atthay amageday ouldshay ebay oneday otay ethay enemyway inway avagingray eirthay andslay andway
indlingkay iresfay onlyway osay arfay asway ethay egionarylay oldierssay ouldcay, ybay eirthay ownway
exertionway andway archingmay, accomplishway itway.

Xxay.Inway ethay eantimemay, ethay Inobantestray, almostway ethay ostmay owerfulpay atestay ofway
osethay artspay, omfray ichwhay ethay oungyay anmay Andubratiusmay embracingway ethay
otectionpray ofway Aesarcay adhay omecay otay ethay ontinentcay ofway Aulgay otay eetmay imhay
osewhay atherfay, Imanuentiusway, adhay ossessedpay ethay overeigntysay inway atthay atestay,
andway adhay eenbay illedkay ybay Assivellaunuscay; ehay imselfhay adhay escapedway eathday ybay
ightflay, endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay, andway omisepray atthay eythay illway
urrendersay emselvesthay otay imhay andway erformpay ishay ommandscay; eythay entreatway imhay
otay otectpray Andubratiusmay omfray ethay iolencevay ofway Assivellaunuscay, andway endsay otay
eirthay atestay omesay oneway otay esidepray overway itway, andway ossesspay ethay overnmentgay.
Aesarcay emandsday ortyfay ostageshay omfray emthay, andway orncay orfay ishay armyway, andway
endssay Andubratiusmay otay emthay. Eythay eedilyspay erformedpay ethay ingsthay emandedday,
andway entsay ostageshay otay ethay umbernay appointedway, andway ethay orncay.

Ixxay.Ethay Inobantestray eingbay otectedpray andway ecuredsay omfray anyway iolencevay ofway
ethay oldierssay, ethay Enimagnicay, ethay Egontiacisay, ethay Ancalitesway, ethay Ibrocibay,
andway ethay Assicay, endingsay embassiesway, urrendersay emselvesthay otay Aesarcay. Omfray
emthay ehay earnslay atthay ethay apitalcay owntay ofway Assivellaunuscay asway otnay arfay omfray
atthay aceplay, andway asway efendedday ybay oodsway andway orassesmay, andway away eryvay argelay
umbernay ofway enmay andway ofway attlecay adhay eenbay ollectedcay inway itway. Ownay ethay Itonsbray,
enwhay eythay avehay ortifiedfay ethay intricateway oodsway, inway ichwhay eythay areway ontway otay
assembleway orfay ethay urposepay ofway avoidingway ethay incursionway ofway anway enemyway, ithway anway
entrenchmentway andway away ampartray, allcay emthay away owntay. Itherthay ehay oceedspray ithway
ishay egionslay ehay indsfay ethay aceplay admirablyway ortifiedfay ybay aturenay andway artway;
ehay, oweverhay, undertakesway otay attackway itway inway otway irectionsday. Ethay enemyway,
avinghay emainedray onlyway away ortshay imetay, idday otnay ustainsay ethay attackway ofway ourway
oldierssay, andway urriedhay awayway onway ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay owntay. Away eatgray amountway
ofway attlecay asway oundfay erethay, andway anymay ofway ethay enemyway ereway akentay andway ainslay inway
eirthay ightflay.

Iixxay.Ilewhay esethay ingsthay areway oinggay orwardfay inway osethay acesplay,
Assivellaunuscay endssay essengersmay intoway Entkay, ichwhay, eway avehay observedway
aboveway, isway onway ethay easay, overway ichwhay istrictsday ourfay everalsay ingskay eignedray,
Ingetorixcay, Arviliuscay, Aximagulustay, andway Egonaxsay, andway ommandscay emthay otay
ollectcay allway eirthay orcesfay, andway unexpectedlyway assailway andway ormstay ethay avalnay
ampcay. Enwhay eythay adhay omecay otay ethay ampcay, ourway enmay, afterway akingmay away allysay,
ayingslay anymay ofway eirthay enmay, andway alsoway apturingcay away istinguishedday eaderlay
amednay Ugotorixlay, oughtbray ackbay eirthay ownway enmay inway afetysay. Assivellaunuscay,
enwhay isthay attlebay asway eportedray otay imhay, asway osay anymay osseslay adhay eenbay
ustainedsay, andway ishay erritoriestay aidlay asteway, eingbay alarmedway ostmay ofway allway ybay
ethay esertionday ofway ethay atesstay, endssay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay otay eattray
aboutway away urrendersay oughthray ethay ediationmay ofway Ommiuscay ethay Atrebatianway.
Aesarcay, incesay ehay adhay eterminedday otay asspay ethay interway onway ethay ontinentcay, onway
accountway ofway ethay uddensay evoltsray ofway Aulgay, andway asway uchmay ofway ethay ummersay idday otnay
emainray, andway ehay erceivedpay atthay evenway atthay ouldcay ebay easilyway otractedpray,
emandsday ostageshay, andway escribespray atwhay ibutetray Itainbray ouldshay aypay eachway
earyay otay ethay Omanray eoplepay; ehay orbidsfay andway ommandscay Assivellaunuscay atthay ehay
ageway otnay arway againstway Andubratiusmay orway ethay Inobantestray.

Iiixxay.Enwhay ehay adhay eceivedray ethay ostageshay, ehay eadslay ackbay ethay armyway otay ethay
easay, andway indsfay ethay ipsshay epairedray. Afterway aunchinglay esethay, ecausebay ehay adhay
away argelay umbernay ofway isonerspray, andway omesay ofway ethay ipsshay adhay eenbay ostlay inway ethay
ormstay, ehay eterminesday otay onveycay ackbay ishay armyway atway otway embarkationsway. Andway itway
osay appenedhay, atthay outway ofway osay argelay away umbernay ofway ipsshay, inway osay anymay oyagesvay,
eithernay inway isthay ornay inway ethay eviouspray earyay asway anyway ipshay issingmay ichwhay
onveyedcay oldierssay; utbay eryvay ewfay outway ofway osethay ichwhay ereway entsay ackbay otay imhay
omfray ethay ontinentcay emptyway, asway ethay oldierssay ofway ethay ormerfay onvoycay adhay eenbay
isembarkedday, andway outway ofway osethay ixtysay inway umbernay ichwhay Abienuslay adhay akentay
arecay otay avehay uiltbay, eachedray eirthay estinationday; almostway allway ethay estray ereway
ivendray ackbay, andway enwhay Aesarcay adhay aitedway orfay emthay orfay omesay imetay inway ainvay,
estlay ehay ouldshay ebay ebarredday omfray away oyagevay ybay ethay easonsay ofway ethay earyay,
inasmuchway asway ethay equinoxway asway atway andhay, ehay ofway ecessitynay owedstay ishay oldierssay
ethay oremay oselyclay, andway, away eryvay eatgray almcay omingcay onway, afterway ehay adhay eighedway
anchorway atway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay econdsay atchway, ehay eachedray andlay atway eakbray ofway
ayday andway oughtbray inway allway ethay ipsshay inway afetysay.

Ivxxay.Ethay ipsshay avinghay eenbay awndray upway andway away eneralgay assemblyway ofway ethay
Aulsgay eldhay atway Amarobrivasay, ecausebay ethay orncay atthay earyay adhay otnay osperedpray
inway Aulgay ybay easonray ofway ethay oughtsdray, ehay asway ompelledcay otay ationstay ishay armyway
inway itsway interwayuartersqay, ifferentlyday omfray ethay ormerfay earsyay, andway otay
istributeday ethay egionslay amongway everalsay atesstay oneway ofway emthay ehay avegay otay .
Abiusfay, ishay ieutenantlay, otay ebay archedmay intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Orinimay; away econdsay otay . Icerocay, intoway osethay ofway ethay Erviinay; away irdthay otay .
Osciusray, intoway osethay ofway ethay Essuiway; away ourthfay ehay orderedway otay interway ithway .
Abienuslay amongway ethay Emiray inway ethay onfinescay ofway ethay Eviritray; ehay ationedstay
eethray inway Elgiumbay; overway esethay ehay appointedway . Assuscray, ishay uestorqay, andway
. Unatiusmay Ancusplay andway . Eboniustray, ishay ieutenantslay. Oneway egionlay ichwhay
ehay adhay aisedray astlay onway ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay Opay, andway ivefay ohortscay, ehay
entsay amongstway ethay Eburonesway, ethay eatestgray ortionpay ofway omwhay ielay etweenbay ethay
Eusemay andway ethay Inerhay, andway owhay ereway underway ethay overnmentgay ofway Ambiorixway andway
Ativolcuscay. Ehay orderedway . Ituriustay Abinussay andway . Aurunculeiusway Ottacay,
ishay ieutenantslay, otay aketay ethay ommandcay ofway esethay oldierssay. Ethay egionslay
eingbay istributedday inway isthay annermay, ehay oughtthay ehay ouldcay ostmay easilyway emedyray
ethay arcityscay ofway orncay; andway etyay ethay interwayuartersqay ofway allway esethay egionslay
exceptway atthay ichwhay ehay adhay ivengay otay . Osciusray otay ebay edlay intoway ethay ostmay
eacefulpay andway anquiltray eighbourhoodnay ereway omprehendedcay ithinway aboutway
100 ilesmay. Ehay imselfhay inway ethay eanwhilemay, untilway ehay adhay ationedstay ethay
egionslay andway ewknay atthay ethay everalsay interwayuartersqay ereway ortifiedfay,
eterminedday otay aystay inway Aulgay.

Xxvay.Erethay asway amongway ethay Arnutescay away anmay amednay Asgetiustay, ornbay ofway eryvay
ighhay ankray, osewhay ancestorsway adhay eldhay ethay overeigntysay inway ishay atestay. Otay imhay
Aesarcay adhay estoredray ethay ositionpay ofway ishay ancestorsway, inway onsiderationcay ofway
ishay owesspray andway attachmentway owardstay imhay, ecausebay inway allway ishay arsway ehay adhay
availedway imselfhay ofway ishay aluablevay ervicessay. Ishay ersonalpay enemiesway adhay
illedkay imhay enwhay inway ethay irdthay earyay ofway ishay eignray, anymay evenway ofway ishay ownway
atestay eingbay openlyway omoterspray ofway atthay actway. Isthay eventway isway elatedray otay
Aesarcay. Ehay earingfay, ecausebay everalsay ereway involvedway inway ethay actway, atthay ethay
atestay ightmay evoltray atway eirthay instigationway, ordersway Uciuslay Ancusplay, ithway away
egionlay, otay oceedpray uicklyqay omfray Elgiumbay otay ethay Arnutescay, andway interway
erethay, andway arrestway andway endsay otay imhay ethay ersonspay ybay osewhay instrumentalityway
ehay ouldshay iscoverday atthay Asgetiustay asway ainslay. Inway ethay eantimemay, ehay asway
apprisedway ybay allway ethay ieutenantslay andway uestorsqay otay omwhay ehay adhay assignedway ethay
egionslay, atthay eythay adhay arrivedway inway interwayuartersqay, andway atthay ethay aceplay
orfay ethay uartersqay asway ortifiedfay.

Ixxvay.Aboutway ifteenfay aysday afterway eythay adhay omecay intoway interwayuartersqay, ethay
eginningbay ofway away uddensay insurrectionway andway evoltray aroseway omfray Ambiorixway andway
Ativolcuscay, owhay, oughthay eythay adhay etmay ithway Abinussay andway Ottacay atway ethay
ordersbay ofway eirthay ingdomkay, andway adhay onveyedcay orncay intoway ourway interwayuartersqay,
inducedway ybay ethay essagesmay ofway Indutiomarusway, oneway ofway ethay Eviritray,
excitedway eirthay eoplepay, andway afterway avinghay uddenlysay assailedway ethay oldierssay,
engagedway inway ocuringpray oodway, amecay ithway away argelay odybay otay attackway ethay ampcay.
Enwhay ourway enmay adhay eedilyspay akentay upway armsway andway adhay ascendedway ethay ampartray,
andway endingsay outway omesay Anishspay orsehay onway oneway idesay, adhay ovedpray onquerorscay inway
away avalrycay actionway, ethay enemyway, espairingday ofway uccesssay, ewdray offway eirthay
oopstray omfray ethay assaultway. Enthay eythay outedshay, accordingway otay eirthay ustomcay,
atthay omesay ofway ourway enmay ouldshay ogay orwardfay otay away onferencecay, allegingway atthay
eythay adhay omesay ingsthay ichwhay eythay esiredday otay aysay espectingray ethay ommoncay
interestway, ybay ichwhay eythay ustedtray eirthay isputesday ouldcay ebay emovedray.

Iixxvay.. Arpineiusway, away Omanray ightknay, ethay intimateway iendfray ofway .
Ituriustay, andway ithway imhay . Uniusjay, away ertaincay ersonpay omfray Ainspay, owhay
alreadyway onway eviouspray occasionsway adhay eenbay accustomedway otay ogay otay Ambiorixway, atway
Aesar'scay issionmay, isway entsay otay emthay orfay ethay urposepay ofway away onferencecay
eforebay emthay Ambiorixway okespay otay isthay effectway Atthay ehay onfessedcay atthay orfay
Aesar'scay indnesskay owardstay imhay ehay asway eryvay uchmay indebtedway otay imhay, inasmuchway
asway ybay ishay aidway ehay adhay eenbay eedfray omfray away ibutetray ichwhay ehay adhay eenbay
accustomedway otay aypay otay ethay Aduatuciway, ishay eighboursnay; andway ecausebay ishay ownway
onsay andway ethay onsay ofway ishay otherbray adhay eenbay entsay ackbay otay imhay, omwhay, enwhay
entsay inway ethay umbernay ofway ostageshay, ethay Aduatuciway adhay etainedday amongway emthay inway
averyslay andway inway ainschay; andway atthay ehay adhay otnay oneday atthay ichwhay ehay adhay oneday
inway egardray otay ethay attackingway ofway ethay ampcay, eitherway ybay ishay ownway udgmentjay orway
esireday, utbay ybay ethay ompulsioncay ofway ishay atestay; andway atthay ishay overnmentgay asway
ofway atthay aturenay, atthay ethay eoplepay adhay asway uchmay ofway authorityway overway imhay asway ehay
overway ethay eoplepay. Otay ethay atestay oreovermay ethay occasionway ofway ethay arway asway isthay
atthay itway ouldcay otnay ithstandway ethay uddensay ombinationcay ofway ethay Aulsgay; atthay
ehay ouldcay easilyway ovepray isthay omfray ishay ownway eaknessway, incesay ehay asway otnay osay
ittlelay ersedvay inway affairsway asway otay esumepray atthay ithway ishay orcesfay ehay ouldcay
onquercay ethay Omanray eoplepay; utbay atthay itway asway ethay ommoncay esolutionray ofway Aulgay;
atthay atthay ayday asway appointedway orfay ethay ormingstay ofway allway Aesar'scay
interwayuartersqay, inway orderway atthay onay egionlay ouldshay ebay ableway otay omecay otay ethay
eliefray ofway anotherway egionlay, atthay Aulsgay ouldcay otnay easilyway enyday Aulsgay,
especiallyway enwhay away easuremay eemedsay enteredway intoway orfay ecoveringray eirthay ommoncay
eedomfray. Incesay ehay adhay erformedpay ishay utyday otay emthay onway ethay orescay ofway atriotismpay
ehay aidsay, ehay ashay ownay egardray otay atitudegray orfay ethay indnesskay ofway Aesarcay; atthay
ehay arnedway, atthay ehay ayedpray Ituriustay ybay ethay aimsclay ofway ospitalityhay, otay
onsultcay orfay ishay andway ishay oldiers'say afetysay; atthay away argelay orcefay ofway ethay
Ermansgay adhay eenbay iredhay andway adhay assedpay ethay Inerhay; atthay itway ouldway arriveway inway
otway aysday; atthay itway asway orfay emthay otay onsidercay etherwhay eythay oughtthay itfay,
eforebay ethay earestnay eoplepay erceivedpay itway, otay eadlay offway eirthay oldierssay enwhay
awndray outway ofway interwayuartersqay, eitherway otay Icerocay orway otay Abienuslay; oneway ofway
omwhay asway aboutway iftyfay ilesmay istantday omfray emthay, ethay otherway atherray oremay;
atthay isthay ehay omisedpray andway onfirmedcay ybay oathway, atthay ehay ouldway ivegay emthay away
afesay assagepay oughthray ishay erritoriestay; andway enwhay ehay idday atthay, ehay asway othbay
onsultingcay orfay ishay ownway atestay, ecausebay itway ouldway ebay elievedray omfray ethay
interwayuartersqay, andway alsoway akingmay away equitalray otay Aesarcay orfay ishay
obligationsway.

Iiixxvay.Arpineiusway andway Uniusjay elateray otay ethay ieutenantslay atwhay eythay adhay
eardhay. Eythay, eatlygray alarmedway ybay ethay unexpectedway affairway, oughthay osethay
ingsthay ereway okenspay ybay anway enemyway, illstay oughtthay eythay ereway otnay otay ebay
isregardedday; andway eythay ereway especiallyway influencedway ybay isthay onsiderationcay,
atthay itway asway arcelyscay ediblecray atthay ethay obscureway andway umblehay atestay ofway ethay
Eburonesway adhay aredday otay akemay arway uponway ethay Omanray eoplepay ofway eirthay ownway
accordway. Accordinglyway, eythay eferray ethay attermay otay away ouncilcay, andway away, eatgray
ontroversycay arisesway amongway emthay. . Aurunculeiusway, andway everalsay ibunestray ofway
ethay oldierssay andway ethay enturionscay ofway ethay irstfay ankray, ereway ofway opinionway atthay
othingnay ouldshay ebay oneday astilyhay, andway atthay eythay ouldshay otnay epartday omfray ethay
ampcay ithoutway Aesar'scay ordersway; eythay eclaredday, atthay anyway orcesfay ofway ethay
Ermansgay, oweverhay eatgray, ightmay ebay encounteredway ybay ortifiedfay interwayuartersqay;
atthay isthay actfay asway away oofpray ofway itway; atthay eythay adhay ustainedsay ethay irstfay
assaultway ofway ethay Ermansgay ostmay aliantlyvay, inflictingway anymay oundsway uponway emthay;
atthay eythay ereway otnay istressedday orfay orncay; atthay inway ethay eantimemay eliefray
ouldway omecay othbay omfray ethay earestnay interwayuartersqay andway omfray Aesarcay; astlylay,
eythay utpay ethay ueryqay, atwhay ouldcay ebay oremay undeterminedway, oremay undignifiedway,
anthay otay adoptway easuresmay espectingray ethay ostmay importantway affairsway onway ethay
authorityway ofway anway enemyway?

Ixxxay.Inway oppositionway otay osethay ingsthay Ituriustay exclaimedway, Atthay eythay
ouldway oday isthay ootay atelay, enwhay eatergray orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway, afterway away
unctionjay ithway ethay Ermansgay, ouldshay avehay assembledway; orway enwhay omesay isasterday
adhay eenbay eceivedray inway ethay eighbouringnay interwayuartersqay; atthay ethay
opportunityway orfay eliberatingday asway ortshay; atthay ehay elievedbay atthay Aesarcay adhay
etsay orthfay intoway Italyway, asway ethay Arnutescay ouldway otnay otherwiseway avehay akentay ethay
easuremay ofway ayingslay Asgetiustay, ornay ouldway ethay Eburonesway, ifway ehay adhay eenbay
esentpray, avehay omecay otay ethay ampcay ithway osay eatgray efianceday ofway usway; atthay ehay idday
otnay egardray ethay enemyway, utbay ethay actfay, asway ethay authorityway; atthay ethay Inerhay asway
earnay; atthay ethay eathday ofway Ariovistusway andway ourway eviouspray ictoriesvay ereway
ubjectssay ofway eatgray indignationway otay ethay Ermansgay; atthay Aulgay asway inflamedway,
atthay afterway avinghay eceivedray osay anymay efeatsday eshay asway educedray underway ethay
aysway ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, erhay istinepray oryglay inway ilitarymay attersmay eingbay
extinguishedway. Astlylay, owhay ouldway ersuadepay imselfhay ofway isthay, atthay
Ambiorixway adhay esortedray otay away esignday ofway atthay aturenay ithoutway uresay oundsgray?
Atthay ishay ownway opinionway asway afesay onway eitherway idesay; ifway erethay ebay othingnay eryvay
ormidablefay, eythay ouldway ogay ithoutway angerday otay ethay earestnay egionlay; ifway allway
Aulgay onspiredcay ithway ethay Ermansgay, eirthay onlyway afetysay aylay inway espatchday. Atwhay
issueway ouldway ethay adviceway ofway Ottacay andway ofway osethay owhay ifferedday omfray imhay,
avehay? omfray ichwhay, ifway immediateway angerday asway otnay otay ebay eadeddray, etyay
ertainlycay aminefay, ybay away otractedpray iegesay, asway.

Xxxay.Isthay iscussionday avinghay eenbay eldhay onway ethay otway idessay, enwhay oppositionway
asway offeredway enuouslystray ybay Ottacay andway ethay incipalpray officersway, Evailpray,
aidsay Abinussay, ifway osay ouyay ishway itway; andway ehay aidsay itway ithway away ouderlay oicevay,
atthay away eatgray ortionpay ofway ethay oldierssay ightmay earhay imhay; ornay amway Iway ethay
ersonpay amongway ouyay, ehay aidsay, owhay isway ostmay owerfullypay alarmedway ybay ethay
angerday ofway eathday; esethay illway ebay awareway ofway itway, andway enthay, ifway anyway ingthay
isastrousday allshay avehay occurredway, eythay illway emandday away eckoningray atway ouryay
andshay; esethay, owhay, ifway itway ereway ermittedpay ybay ouyay, unitedway eethray aysday encehay
ithway ethay earestnay interwayuartersqay, aymay encounterway ethay ommoncay onditioncay ofway
arway ithway ethay estray, andway otnay, asway ifway orcedfay awayway andway eparatedsay arfay omfray ethay
estray, erishpay eitherway ybay ethay ordsway orway ybay aminefay.

Ixxxay.Eythay iseray omfray ethay ouncilcay, etainday othbay, andway entreatway, atthay eythay
oday otnay ingbray ethay attermay intoway ethay eatestgray eopardyjay ybay eirthay issensionday
andway obstinacyway; ethay affairway asway anway easyway oneway, ifway onlyway eythay allway oughtthay andway
approvedway ofway ethay amesay ingthay, etherwhay eythay emainray orway epartday; onway ethay otherway
andhay, eythay awsay onay ecuritysay inway issensionday. Ethay attermay isway olongedpray ybay
ebateday illtay idnightmay. Atway astlay Ottacay, eingbay overruledway, ieldsyay ishay assentway;
ethay opinionway ofway Abinussay evailspray. Itway isway oclaimedpray atthay eythay illway archmay
atway aydayeakbray; ethay emainderray ofway ethay ightnay isway entspay ithoutway eepslay, incesay
everyway oldiersay asway inspectingway ishay opertypray, otay eesay atwhay ehay ouldcay arrycay
ithway imhay, andway atwhay, outway ofway ethay appurtenancesway ofway ethay interwayuartersqay, ehay
ouldway ebay ompelledcay otay eavelay; everyway easonray isway uggestedsay otay owshay whyay eythay
ouldcay otnay aystay ithoutway angerday, andway owhay atthay angerday ouldway ebay increasedway ybay
ethay atiguefay ofway ethay oldierssay andway eirthay antway ofway eepslay. Atway eakbray ofway ayday
eythay uitqay ethay ampcay, inway away eryvay extendedway inelay andway ithway away eryvay argelay amountway
ofway aggagebay, inway uchsay away annermay asway enmay owhay ereway onvincedcay atthay ethay adviceway
asway ivengay ybay Ambiorixway, otnay asway anway enemyway, utbay asway ostmay iendlyfray owardstay
emthay.

Iixxxay.Utbay ethay enemyway, afterway eythay adhay ademay ethay iscoveryday ofway eirthay
intendedway epartureday ybay ethay oisenay uringday ethay ightnay andway eirthay otnay etiringray
otay estray, avinghay acedplay anway ambuscadeway inway otway ivisionsday inway ethay oodsway, inway away
uitablesay andway oncealedcay aceplay, otway ilesmay omfray ethay ampcay, aitedway orfay ethay
arrivalway ofway ethay Omansray; andway enwhay ethay eatergray artpay ofway ethay inelay ofway archmay
adhay escendedday intoway away onsiderablecay alleyvay, eythay uddenlysay esentedpray
emselvesthay onway eitherway idesay ofway atthay alleyvay, andway eganbay othbay otay arasshay ethay
earray andway inderhay ethay anvay omfray ascendingway, andway otay ivegay attlebay inway away aceplay
exceedinglyway isadvantageousday otay ourway enmay.

Iiixxxay.Enthay atway engthlay Ituriustay, asway oneway owhay adhay ovidedpray othingnay
eforehandbay, asway onfusedcay, anray otay andway ofray, andway etsay aboutway arrangingway ishay
oopstray; esethay eryvay ingsthay, oweverhay, ehay idday imidlytay andway inway uchsay away annermay
atthay allway esourcesray eemedsay otay ailfay imhay ichwhay enerallygay appenshay otay osethay
owhay areway ompelledcay otay aketay ouncilcay inway ethay actionway itselfway. Utbay Ottacay, owhay
adhay eflectedray atthay esethay ingsthay ightmay occurway onway ethay archmay, andway onway atthay
accountway adhay otnay eenbay anway adviserway ofway ethay epartureday, asway antingway otay ethay
ommoncay afetysay inway onay espectray; othbay inway addressingway andway encouragingway ethay
oldierssay, ehay erformedpay ethay utiesday ofway away eneralgay, andway inway ethay attlebay osethay
ofway away oldiersay. Andway incesay eythay Ituriustay andway Ottacay ouldcay esslay easilyway
erformpay everythingway ybay emselvesthay, andway ovidepray atwhay asway otay ebay oneday inway
eachway aceplay, ybay easonray ofway ethay engthlay ofway ethay inelay ofway archmay, eythay orderedway
ethay officersway otay ivegay ethay ommandcay atthay eythay ouldshay eavelay ethay aggagebay
andway ormfay emselvesthay intoway anway orbway, ichwhay easuremay, oughthay inway away ontingencycay
ofway atthay aturenay itway asway otnay otay ebay ondemnedcay, illstay urnedtay outway
unfortunatelyway; orfay itway othbay iminishedday ethay opehay ofway ourway oldierssay andway
enderedray ethay enemyway oremay eagerway orfay ethay ightfay, ecausebay itway appearedway atthay
isthay asway otnay oneday ithoutway ethay eatestgray earfay andway espairday. Esidesbay atthay
appenedhay, ichwhay ouldway ecessarilynay ebay ethay asecay, atthay ethay oldierssay orfay ethay
ostmay artpay uittedqay eirthay ensignsway andway urriedhay otay eeksay andway arrycay offway omfray
ethay aggagebay ateverwhay eachway oughtthay aluablevay, andway allway artspay ereway illedfay
ithway uproarway andway amentationlay.

Ivxxxay.Utbay udgmentjay asway otnay antingway otay ethay arbariansbay; orfay eirthay
eaderslay orderedway ethay officersway otay oclaimpray oughthray ethay anksray atthay onay
anmay ouldshay uitqay ishay aceplay; atthay ethay ootybay asway eirsthay, andway orfay emthay asway
eservedray ateverwhay ethay Omansray ouldshay eavelay; ereforethay etlay emthay onsidercay
atthay allway ingsthay ependedday onway eirthay ictoryvay. Ourway enmay ereway equalway otay emthay
inway ightingfay, othbay inway ouragecay andway inway umbernay, andway oughthay eythay ereway
esertedday ybay eirthay eaderlay andway ybay ortunefay, etyay eythay illstay acedplay allway opehay
ofway afetysay inway eirthay alourvay, andway asway oftenway asway anyway ohortcay alliedsay orthfay onway
atthay idesay, away eatgray umbernay ofway ethay enemyway usuallyway ellfay. Ambiorixway, enwhay ehay
observedway isthay, ordersway ethay ommandcay otay ebay issuedway atthay eythay owthray eirthay
eaponsway omfray away istanceday andway oday otnay approachway ootay earnay, andway inway ateverwhay
irectionday ethay Omansray ouldshay akemay anway attackway, erethay ivegay ayway omfray ethay
ightnesslay ofway eirthay appointmentsway andway omfray eirthay ailyday acticepray onay amageday
ouldcay ebay oneday emthay; utbay ursuepay emthay enwhay etakingbay emselvesthay otay eirthay
andardsstay againway.

Vxxxay.Ichwhay ommandcay avinghay eenbay ostmay arefullycay obeyedway, enwhay anyway ohortcay
adhay uittedqay ethay irclecay andway ademay away argechay, ethay enemyway edflay eryvay
ecipitatelypray. Inway ethay eantimemay, atthay artpay ofway ethay Omanray armyway, ofway
ecessitynay, asway eftlay unprotectedway, andway ethay eaponsway eceivedray onway eirthay openway
ankflay. Againway, enwhay eythay adhay egunbay otay eturnray otay atthay aceplay omfray ichwhay
eythay adhay advancedway, eythay ereway urroundedsay othbay ybay osethay owhay adhay etreatedray
andway ybay osethay owhay oodstay extnay emthay; utbay ifway, onway ethay otherway andhay, eythay ishedway
otay eepkay eirthay aceplay, eithernay asway anway opportunityway eftlay orfay alourvay, ornay
ouldcay eythay, eingbay owdedcray ogethertay, escapeway ethay eaponsway astcay ybay osay argelay
away odybay ofway enmay. Etyay, oughthay assailedway ybay osay anymay isadvantagesday, andway
avinghay eceivedray anymay oundsway, eythay ithstoodway ethay enemyway, andway, away eatgray
ortionpay ofway ethay ayday eingbay entspay, oughthay eythay oughtfay omfray aydayeakbray illtay
ethay eighthway ourhay, eythay idday othingnay ichwhay asway unworthyway ofway emthay. Atway engthlay,
eachway ighthay ofway . Alventiusbay, owhay ethay earyay eforebay adhay eenbay iefchay
enturioncay, away avebray anmay andway oneway ofway eatgray authorityway, isway iercedpay ithway away
avelinjay; . Ucaniuslay, ofway ethay amesay ankray, ightingfay ostmay aliantlyvay, isway
ainslay ilewhay ehay assistsway ishay onsay enwhay urroundedsay ybay ethay enemyway; . Ottacay,
ethay ieutenantlay, enwhay encouragingway allway ethay ohortscay andway ompaniescay, isway
oundedway ullfay inway ethay outhmay ybay away ingslay.

Vixxxay.Uchmay oubledtray ybay esethay eventsway, . Ituriustay, enwhay ehay adhay
erceivedpay Ambiorixway inway ethay istanceday encouragingway ishay enmay, endssay otay imhay ishay
interpreterway, Ncay. Ompeypay, otay egbay atthay ehay ouldway arespay imhay andway ishay
oldierssay. Ehay, enwhay addressedway, epliedray, Ifway ehay ishedway otay onfercay ithway imhay,
itway asway ermittedpay; atthay ehay opedhay atwhay ertainedpay otay ethay afetysay ofway ethay
oldierssay ouldcay ebay obtainedway omfray ethay eoplepay; atthay otay imhay oweverhay
ertainlycay onay injuryway ouldway ebay oneday, andway atthay ehay edgedplay ishay aithfay otay atthay
effectway. Ehay onsultscay ithway Ottacay, owhay adhay eenbay oundedway, etherwhay itway ouldway
appearway ightray otay etireray omfray attlebay, andway onfercay ithway Ambiorixway; ayingsay
atthay ehay opedhay otay ebay ableway otay ucceedsay espectingray ishay ownway andway ethay oldiers'say
afetysay. Ottacay ayssay ehay illway otnay ogay otay anway armedway enemyway, andway inway atthay
erseverespay.

Viixxxay.Abinussay ordersway osethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay omwhay ehay adhay atway
ethay imetay aroundway imhay, andway ethay enturionscay ofway ethay irstfay anksray, otay ollowfay
imhay, andway enwhay ehay adhay approachedway earnay otay Ambiorixway, eingbay orderedway otay owthray
ownday ishay armsway, ehay obeysway ethay orderway andway ommandscay ishay enmay otay oday ethay amesay.
Inway ethay eantimemay, ilewhay eythay eattray uponway ethay ermstay, andway away ongerlay ebateday
anthay ecessarynay isway esignedlyday enteredway intoway ybay Ambiorixway, eingbay urroundedsay
ybay egreesday, ehay isway ainslay. Enthay eythay accordingway otay eirthay ustomcay outshay outway
Ictoryvay, andway aiseray eirthay arwaycryay, andway, akingmay anway attackway onway ourway enmay,
eakbray eirthay anksray. Erethay . Ottacay, ilewhay ightingfay, isway ainslay, ogethertay
ithway ethay eatergray artpay ofway ethay oldierssay; ethay estray etakebay emselvesthay otay ethay
ampcay omfray ichwhay eythay adhay archedmay orthfay, andway oneway ofway emthay, . Etrosidiuspay,
ethay andardstay earerbay, enwhay ehay asway overpoweredway ybay ethay eatgray umbernay ofway ethay
enemyway, ewthray ethay eagleway ithinway ethay entrenchmentsway andway isway imselfhay ainslay
ilewhay ightingfay ithway ethay eatestgray ouragecay eforebay ethay ampcay. Eythay ithway
ifficultyday ustainsay ethay attackway illtay ightnay; espairingday ofway afetysay, eythay allway
otay away anmay estroyday emselvesthay inway ethay ightnay. Away ewfay escapingway omfray ethay
attlebay, akemay eirthay ayway otay Abienuslay atway interwayuartersqay, afterway anderingway
atway andomray oughthray ethay oodsway, andway informway imhay ofway esethay eventsway.

Viiixxxay.Elatedway ybay isthay ictoryvay, Ambiorixway archesmay immediatelyway ithway ishay
avalrycay otay ethay Aduatuciway, owhay orderedbay onway ishay ingdomkay; ehay altshay eithernay
ayday ornay ightnay, andway ordersway ethay infantryway otay ollowfay imhay oselyclay. Avinghay
elatedray ethay exploitway andway ousedray ethay Aduatuciway, ethay extnay ayday ehay arrivedway
amongway ethay Erviinay, andway entreatsway atthay eythay ouldshay otnay owthray awayway ethay
opportunityway ofway iberatinglay emselvesthay orfay everway andway ofway unishingpay ethay
Omansray orfay osethay ongswray ichwhay eythay adhay eceivedray omfray emthay; ehay ellstay
emthay atthay otway ieutenantslay avehay eenbay ainslay, andway atthay away argelay ortionpay ofway
ethay armyway ashay erishedpay; atthay itway asway otnay away attermay ofway ifficultyday orfay ethay
egionlay ichwhay asway interingway ithway Icerocay otay ebay utcay offway, enwhay uddenlysay
assaultedway; ehay eclaresday imselfhay eadyray otay ocayoperateway inway atthay esignday. Ehay
easilyway ainsgay overway ethay Erviinay ybay isthay eechspay.

Ixxxxay.Accordinglyway, essengersmay avinghay eenbay orthwithfay espatchedday otay ethay
Entronescay, ethay Udiigray, ethay Evacilay, ethay Eumoxiiplay, andway ethay Eidunigay, allway
ofway omwhay areway underway eirthay overnmentgay, eythay assembleway asway argelay odiesbay asway
eythay ancay, andway ushray unexpectedlyway otay ethay interwayuartersqay ofway Icerocay, ethay
eportray ofway ethay eathday ofway Ituriustay otnay avinghay asway etyay eenbay onveyedcay otay imhay.
Atthay alsoway occurredway otay imhay ichwhay asway ethay onsequencecay ofway away ecessarynay
orkway,atthay omesay oldierssay owhay adhay onegay offway intoway ethay oodsway orfay ethay
urposepay ofway ocuringpray imbertay andway erewiththay onstructingcay ortificationsfay,
ereway interceptedway ybay ethay uddensay arrivalway ofway ethay enemy'sway orsehay. Esethay
avinghay eenbay entrappedway, ethay Eburonesway, ethay Erviinay, andway ethay Aduatuciway andway
allway eirthay alliesway andway ependantsday, eginbay otay attackway ethay egionlay ourway enmay
uicklyqay unray ogethertay otay armsway andway ountmay ethay ampartray eythay ustainedsay ethay
attackway atthay ayday ithway eatgray ifficultyday, incesay ethay enemyway acedplay allway eirthay
opehay inway espatchday, andway eltfay assuredway atthay, ifway eythay obtainedway isthay ictoryvay,
eythay ouldway ebay onquerorscay orfay everway.

Lxay.Etterslay areway immediatelyway entsay otay Aesarcay ybay Icerocay, eatgray ewardsray
eingbay offeredway otay ethay essengersmay ifway eythay arriedcay emthay oughthray. Allway ethay
assespay avinghay eenbay esetbay, osethay owhay ereway entsay areway interceptedway. Uringday
ethay ightnay asway anymay asway 120 owerstay areway aisedray ithway incredibleway espatchday outway
ofway ethay imbertay ichwhay eythay adhay ollectedcay orfay ethay urposepay ofway ortificationfay
ethay ingsthay ichwhay eemedsay ecessarynay otay ethay orkway areway ompletedcay. Ethay
ollowingfay ayday ethay enemyway, avinghay ollectedcay arfay eatergray orcesfay, attackway ethay
ampcay andway illfay upway ethay itchday. Esistanceray isway ademay ybay ourway enmay inway ethay amesay
annermay asway ethay ayday eforebay isthay amesay ingthay isway oneday afterwardsway uringday ethay
emainingray aysday. Ethay orkway isway arriedcay onway incessantlyway inway ethay ightnay otnay
evenway otay ethay icksay, orway oundedway, isway opportunityway ivengay orfay estray ateverwhay
ingsthay areway equiredray orfay esistingray ethay assaultway ofway ethay extnay ayday areway
ovidedpray uringday ethay ightnay anymay akesstay urntbay atway ethay endway, andway away argelay
umbernay ofway uralmay ikespay areway ocuredpray owerstay areway uiltbay upway, attlementsbay andway
arapetspay areway ormedfay ofway interwovenway urdleshay. Icerocay imselfhay, oughthay ehay asway
inway eryvay eakway ealthhay, idday otnay eavelay imselfhay ethay ightnayimetay orfay eposeray, osay
atthay ehay asway orcedfay otay arespay imselfhay ybay ethay ontaneousspay ovementmay andway
entreatiesway ofway ethay oldierssay.

Ixlay.Enthay esethay eaderslay andway iefschay ofway ethay Erviinay, owhay adhay anyway intimacyway
andway oundsgray ofway iendshipfray ithway Icerocay, aysay eythay esireday otay onfercay ithway
imhay. Enwhay ermissionpay asway antedgray, eythay ecountray ethay amesay ingsthay ichwhay
Ambiorixway adhay elatedray otay Ituriustay, amelynay, atthay allway Aulgay asway inway armsway,
atthay ethay Ermansgay adhay assedpay ethay Inerhay, atthay ethay interwayuartersqay ofway
Aesarcay andway ofway ethay othersway ereway attackedway. Eythay eportray inway additionway alsoway,
aboutway ethay eathday ofway Abinussay. Eythay ointpay otay Ambiorixway orfay ethay urposepay ofway
obtainingway edencecray; eythay areway istakenmay, aysay eythay, ifway eythay opedhay orfay
anyway eliefray omfray osethay owhay istrustday eirthay ownway affairsway; atthay eythay earbay
uchsay eelingsfay owardstay Icerocay andway ethay Omanray eoplepay atthay eythay enyday emthay
othingnay utbay interwayuartersqay andway areway unwillingway atthay isthay acticepray ouldshay
ecomebay onstantcay; atthay oughthray eirthay ethay Ervii'snay eansmay itway isway ossiblepay
orfay emthay ethay Omansray otay epartday omfray eirthay interwayuartersqay afelysay andway otay
oceedpray ithoutway earfay intoway ateverwhay artspay eythay esireday. Otay esethay Icerocay
ademay onlyway oneway eplyray atthay itway isway otnay ethay ustomcay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay otay
acceptway anyway onditioncay omfray anway armedway enemyway ifway eythay areway illingway otay aylay
ownday eirthay armsway, eythay aymay employway imhay asway eirthay advocateway andway endsay
ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay atthay ehay elievedbay, omfray ishay Aesar'scay usticejay,
eythay ouldway obtainway ethay ingsthay ichwhay eythay ightmay equestray.

Iixlay.Isappointedday inway isthay opehay, ethay Erviinay urroundsay ethay interwayuartersqay
ithway away ampartray elevenway eetfay ighhay, andway away itchday irteenthay eetfay inway
epthday. Esethay ilitarymay orksway eythay adhay earntlay omfray ourway enmay inway ethay
intercourseway ofway ormerfay earsyay, andway, avinghay akentay omesay ofway ourway armyway
isonerspray, ereway instructedway ybay emthay utbay, asway eythay adhay onay upplysay ofway ironway
oolstay ichwhay areway equisiteray orfay isthay ervicesay, eythay ereway orcedfay otay utcay ethay
urftay ithway eirthay ordssway, andway otay emptyway outway ethay earthway ithway eirthay andshay andway
oaksclay, omfray ichwhay ircumstancecay ethay astvay umbernay ofway ethay enmay ouldcay ebay
inferredway; orfay inway esslay anthay eethray ourshay eythay ompletedcay away ortificationfay ofway
entay ilesmay inway ircumferencecay; andway uringday ethay estray ofway ethay aysday eythay eganbay
otay eparepray andway onstructcay owerstay ofway ethay eighthay ofway ethay ampartsray, andway
applinggray ironsway, andway antletsmay, ichwhay ethay amesay isonerspray adhay aughttay emthay.

Iiixlay.Onway ethay eventhsay ayday ofway ethay attackway, away eryvay ighhay indway avinghay ungspray
upway, eythay eganbay otay ischargeday ybay eirthay ingsslay othay allsbay ademay ofway urntbay orway
ardenedhay ayclay, andway eatedhay avelinsjay, uponway ethay utshay, ichwhay, afterway ethay
Allicgay ustomcay, ereway atchedthay ithway awstray. Esethay uicklyqay ooktay irefay, andway ybay
ethay iolencevay ofway ethay indway, atteredscay eirthay amesflay inway everyway artpay ofway ethay
ampcay. Ethay enemyway ollowingfay upway eirthay uccesssay ithway away eryvay oudlay outshay, asway ifway
ictoryvay ereway alreadyway obtainedway andway ecuredsay, eganbay otay advanceway eirthay owerstay
andway antletsmay, andway imbclay ethay ampartray ithway adderslay. Utbay osay eatgray asway ethay
ouragecay ofway ourway oldierssay, andway uchsay eirthay esencepray ofway indmay, atthay oughthay
eythay ereway orchedscay onway allway idessay, andway arassedhay ybay away astvay umbernay ofway
eaponsway, andway ereway awareway atthay eirthay aggagebay andway eirthay ossessionspay ereway
urningbay, otnay onlyway idday onay oneway uitqay ethay ampartray orfay ethay urposepay ofway
ithdrawingway omfray ethay enescay, utbay arcelyscay idday anyway oneway evenway enthay ooklay
ehindbay; andway eythay allway oughtfay ostmay igorouslyvay andway ostmay aliantlyvay. Isthay ayday
asway ybay arfay ethay ostmay alamitouscay otay ourway enmay; itway adhay isthay esultray, oweverhay,
atthay onway atthay ayday ethay argestlay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway asway oundedway andway ainslay,
incesay eythay adhay owdedcray eneathbay ethay eryvay ampartray, andway ethay indmosthay idday
otnay affordway ethay oremostfay away etreatray. Ethay ameflay avinghay abatedway away ittlelay, andway
away owertay avinghay eenbay oughtbray upway inway away articularpay aceplay andway ouchingtay ethay
ampartray, ethay enturionscay ofway ethay irdthay ohortcay etiredray omfray ethay aceplay inway
ichwhay eythay ereway andingstay, andway ewdray offway allway eirthay enmay eythay eganbay otay allcay
onway ethay enemyway ybay esturesgay andway ybay ordsway, otay enterway ifway eythay ishedway; utbay onenay
ofway emthay aredday otay advanceway. Enthay onesstay avinghay eenbay astcay omfray everyway
uarterqay, ethay enemyway ereway islodgedday, andway eirthay owertay etsay onway irefay.

Ivxlay.Inway atthay egionlay erethay ereway otway eryvay avebray enmay, enturionscay, owhay
ereway ownay approachingway ethay irstfay anksray, . Ulfiopay, andway . Arenusvay. Esethay
usedway otay avehay ontinualcay isputesday etweenbay emthay ichwhay ofway emthay ouldshay ebay
eferredpray, andway everyway earyay usedway otay ontendcay orfay omotionpray ithway ethay utmostway
animosityway. Enwhay ethay ightfay asway oinggay onway ostmay igorouslyvay eforebay ethay
ortificationsfay, Ulfiopay, oneway ofway emthay, ayssay, Whyay oday ouyay esitatehay,
Arenusvay? orway atwhay etterbay opportunityway ofway ignalisingsay ouryay alourvay oday ouyay
eeksay? Isthay eryvay ayday allshay ecideday ourway isputesday. Enwhay ehay adhay utteredway
esethay ordsway, ehay oceedspray eyondbay ethay ortificationsfay, andway ushesray onway atthay
artpay ofway ethay enemyway ichwhay appearedway ethay ickestthay. Ornay oesday Arenusvay emainray
ithinway ethay ampartray, utbay espectingray ethay ighhay opinionway ofway allway, ollowsfay
oseclay afterway. Enthay, enwhay anway inconsiderableway acespay intervenedway, Ulfiopay
owsthray ishay avelinjay atway ethay enemyway, andway iercespay oneway ofway ethay ultitudemay owhay
