asway unningray upway, andway ilewhay ethay atterlay asway oundedway andway ainslay, ethay enemyway
overcay imhay ithway eirthay ieldsshay, andway allway owthray eirthay eaponsway atway ethay otherway
andway affordway imhay onay opportunityway ofway etreatingray. Ethay ieldshay ofway Ulfiopay isway
iercedpay andway away avelinjay isway astenedfay inway ishay eltbay. Isthay ircumstancecay urnstay
asideway ishay abbardscay andway obstructsway ishay ightray andhay enwhay attemptingway otay awdray
ishay ordsway ethay enemyway owdcray aroundway imhay enwhay usthay embarrassedway. Ishay ivalray
unsray upway otay imhay andway uccourssay imhay inway isthay emergencyway. Immediatelyway ethay olewhay
osthay urntay omfray Ulfiopay otay imhay, upposingsay ethay otherway otay ebay iercedpay oughthray
ybay ethay avelinjay. Arenusvay ushesray onway isklybray ithway ishay ordsway andway arriescay onway
ethay ombatcay andhay otay andhay, andway avinghay ainslay oneway anmay, orfay away ortshay imetay
ovedray ackbay ethay estray ilewhay ehay urgesway onway ootay eagerlyway, ippingslay intoway away
ollowhay, ehay ellfay. Otay imhay, inway ishay urntay, enwhay urroundedsay, Ulfiopay ingsbray
eliefray; andway othbay avinghay ainslay away eatgray umbernay, etreatray intoway ethay
ortificationsfay amidstway ethay ighesthay applauseway. Ortunefay osay ealtday ithway othbay
inway isthay ivalryray andway onflictcay, atthay ethay oneway ompetitorcay asway away uccoursay andway
away afeguardsay otay ethay otherway, ornay ouldcay itway ebay eterminedday ichwhay ofway ethay otway
appearedway orthyway ofway eingbay eferredpray otay ethay otherway.

Xlvay.Inway oportionpray asway ethay attackway ecamebay ailyday oremay ormidablefay andway
iolentvay, andway articularlypay ecausebay, asway away eatgray umbernay ofway ethay oldierssay
ereway exhaustedway ithway oundsway, ethay attermay adhay omecay otay away allsmay umbernay ofway
efendersday, oremay equentfray etterslay andway essengersmay ereway entsay otay Aesarcay; away
artpay ofway ichwhay essengersmay ereway akentay andway orturedtay otay eathday inway ethay ightsay
ofway ourway oldierssay. Erethay asway ithinway ourway ampcay away ertaincay Erviannay, ybay amenay
Erticovay, ornbay inway away istinguishedday ositionpay, owhay inway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay
ockadeblay adhay esertedday otay Icerocay, andway adhay exhibitedway ishay idelityfay otay imhay.
Ehay ersuadespay ishay aveslay, ybay ethay opehay ofway eedomfray, andway ybay eatgray ewardsray, otay
onveycay away etterlay otay Aesarcay. Isthay ehay arriescay outway oundbay aboutway ishay avelinjay,
andway ixingmay amongway ethay Aulsgay ithoutway anyway uspicionsay ybay eingbay away Aulgay, ehay
eachesray Aesarcay. Omfray imhay eythay eceivedray informationway ofway ethay imminentway
angerday ofway Icerocay andway ethay egionlay.

Ixlvay.Aesarcay avinghay eceivedray ethay etterlay aboutway ethay eleventhway ourhay ofway ethay
ayday, immediatelyway endssay away essengermay otay ethay Ellovacibay, otay . Assuscray,
uestorqay erethay, osewhay interwayuartersqay ereway entytwayivefay ilesmay istantday omfray
imhay. Ehay ordersway ethay egionlay otay etsay orwardfay inway ethay iddlemay ofway ethay ightnay andway
omecay otay imhay ithway espatchday. Assuscray etsay outway ithway ethay essengermay. Ehay endssay
antherway otay . Abiusfay, ethay ieutenantlay, orderingway imhay otay eadlay orthfay ishay
egionlay intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Atrebatesway, otay ichwhay ehay ewknay ishay archmay
ustmay ebay ademay. Ehay iteswray otay Abienuslay otay omecay ithway ishay egionlay otay ethay
ontiersfray ofway ethay Erviinay, ifway ehay ouldcay oday osay otay ethay advantageway ofway ethay
ommonwealthcay ehay oesday otnay onsidercay atthay ethay emainingray ortionpay ofway ethay
armyway, ecausebay itway asway omewhatsay artherfay istantday, ouldshay ebay aitedway orfay; utbay
assemblesway aboutway 400 orsehay omfray ethay earestnay interwayuartersqay.

Iixlvay.Avinghay eenbay apprisedway ofway ethay arrivalway ofway Assuscray ybay ethay outsscay atway
aboutway ethay irdthay ourhay, ehay advancesway entytway ilesmay atthay ayday. Ehay appointsway
Assuscray overway Amarobrivasay andway assignsway imhay away egionlay, ecausebay ehay asway
eavinglay erethay ethay aggagebay ofway ethay armyway, ethay ostageshay ofway ethay atesstay, ethay
ublicpay ocumentsday, andway allway ethay orncay, ichwhay ehay adhay onveyedcay itherthay orfay
assingpay ethay interway. Abiusfay, ithoutway elayingday away omentmay, eetsmay imhay onway ethay
archmay ithway ishay egionlay, asway ehay adhay eenbay ommandedcay. Abienuslay, avinghay earntlay
ethay eathday ofway Abinussay andway ethay estructionday ofway ethay ohortscay, asway allway ethay
orcesfay ofway ethay Eviritray adhay omecay againstway imhay, eginningbay otay earfay estlay, ifway
ehay ademay away epartureday omfray ishay interwayuartersqay, esemblingray away ightflay, ehay
ouldshay otnay ebay ableway otay upportsay ethay attackway ofway ethay enemyway, articularlypay
incesay ehay ewknay emthay otay ebay elatedway ybay eirthay ecentray ictoryvay, endssay ackbay away
etterlay otay Aesarcay, informingway imhay ithway atwhay eatgray azardhay ehay ouldway eadlay outway
ishay egionlay omfray interwayuartersqay; ehay elatesray atway argelay ethay affairway ichwhay
adhay akentay aceplay amongway ethay Eburonesway; ehay informsway imhay atthay allway ethay infantryway
andway avalrycay ofway ethay Eviritray adhay encampedway atway away istanceday ofway onlyway eethray
ilesmay omfray ishay ownway ampcay.

Iiixlvay.Aesarcay, approvingway ofway ishay otivesmay, althoughway ehay asway isappointedday
inway ishay expectationway ofway eethray egionslay, andway educedray otay otway, etyay acedplay ishay
onlyway opeshay ofway ethay ommoncay afetysay inway espatchday. Ehay oesgay intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Erviinay ybay onglay archesmay. Erethay ehay earnslay omfray omesay
isonerspray atwhay ingsthay areway oinggay onway inway ethay ampcay ofway Icerocay, andway inway owhay
eatgray eopardyjay ethay affairway isway. Enthay ithway eatgray ewardsray ehay inducesway away
ertaincay anmay ofway ethay Allicgay orsehay otay onveycay away etterlay otay Icerocay. Isthay ehay
endssay ittenwray inway Eekgray aracterschay, estlay ethay etterlay eingbay interceptedway,
ourway easuresmay ouldshay ebay iscoveredday ybay ethay enemyway. Ehay irectsday imhay, ifway ehay
ouldshay ebay unableway otay enterway, otay owthray ishay earspay ithway ethay etterlay astenedfay
otay ethay ongthay insideway ethay ortificationsfay ofway ethay ampcay. Ehay iteswray inway ethay
etterlay, atthay ehay avinghay etsay outway ithway ishay egionslay, illway uicklyqay ebay erethay
ehay entreatsway imhay otay aintainmay ishay ancientway alourvay. Ethay Aulgay apprehendingway
angerday, owsthray ishay earspay asway ehay adhay eenbay irectedday. Itway ybay ancechay uckstay inway
away owertay, andway, otnay eingbay observedway ybay ourway enmay orfay otway aysday, asway eensay ybay away
ertaincay oldiersay onway ethay irdthay ayday enwhay akentay ownday, itway asway arriedcay otay
Icerocay. Ehay, afterway erusingpay itway, eadsray itway outway inway anway assemblyway ofway ethay
oldierssay, andway illsfay allway ithway ethay eatestgray oyjay. Enthay ethay okesmay ofway ethay
iresfay asway eensay inway ethay istanceday, away ircumstancecay ichwhay anishedbay allway oubtday
ofway ethay arrivalway ofway ethay egionslay.

Ixxlay.Ethay Aulsgay, avinghay iscoveredday ethay attermay oughthray eirthay outsscay,
abandonway ethay ockadeblay, andway archmay owardstay Aesarcay ithway allway eirthay orcesfay
esethay ereway aboutway 60,000 armedway enmay. Icerocay, anway opportunityway eingbay ownay
affordedway, againway egsbay ofway atthay Erticovay, ethay Aulgay, omwhay eway entionedmay aboveway,
otay onveycay ackbay away etterlay otay Aesarcay; ehay advisesway imhay otay erformpay ishay ourneyjay
arilyway; ehay iteswray inway ethay etterlay atthay ethay enemyway adhay epartedday andway adhay
urnedtay eirthay entireway orcefay againstway imhay. Enwhay isthay etterlay asway oughtbray otay
imhay aboutway ethay iddlemay ofway ethay ightnay, Aesarcay apprisesway ishay oldierssay ofway itsway
ontentscay, andway inspiresway emthay ithway ouragecay orfay ightingfay ethay ollowingfay
ayday, atway ethay awnday, ehay ovesmay ishay ampcay, andway, avinghay oceededpray ourfay ilesmay,
ehay espiesway ethay orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway onway ethay otherway idesay ofway away onsiderablecay
alleyvay andway ivuletray. Itway asway anway affairway ofway eatgray angerday otay ightfay ithway uchsay
argelay orcesfay inway away isadvantageousday ituationsay. Orfay ethay esentpray, ereforethay,
inasmuchway asway ehay ewknay atthay Icerocay asway eleasedray omfray ethay ockadeblay, andway
oughtthay atthay ehay ightmay, onway atthay accountway, elaxray ishay eedspay, ehay altedhay erethay
andway ortifiesfay away ampcay inway ethay ostmay avourablefay ositionpay ehay ancay. Andway isthay,
oughthay itway asway allsmay inway itselfway, erethay eingbay arcelyscay 7000 enmay, andway
esethay ootay ithoutway aggagebay, illstay ybay ethay arrownessnay ofway ethay assagespay, ehay
ontractscay asway uchmay asway ehay ancay, ithway isthay objectway, atthay ehay aymay omecay intoway ethay
eatestgray ontemptcay ithway ethay enemyway. Inway ethay eanwhilemay, outsscay avinghay eenbay
entsay inway allway irectionsday, ehay examinesway ybay atwhay ostmay onvenientcay athpay ehay
ightmay osscray ethay alleyvay.

.Atthay ayday, ightslay irmishesskay ofway avalrycay avinghay akentay aceplay earnay ethay
iverray, othbay armiesway eptkay inway eirthay ownway ositionspay ethay Aulsgay, ecausebay eythay
ereway awaitingway argerlay orcesfay ichwhay adhay otnay enthay arrivedway; Aesarcay, otay eesay
ifway erchancepay ybay etencepray ofway earfay ehay ouldcay allureway ethay enemyway owardstay ishay
ositionpay, osay atthay ehay ightmay engageway inway attlebay, inway ontfray ofway ishay ampcay, onway
isthay idesay ofway ethay alleyvay; ifway ehay ouldcay otnay accomplishway isthay, atthay, avinghay
inquiredway aboutway ethay assespay, ehay ightmay osscray ethay alleyvay andway ethay iverray ithway
ethay esslay azardhay. Atway aydayeakbray ethay avalrycay ofway ethay enemyway approachesway otay ethay
ampcay andway oinsjay attlebay ithway ourway orsehay. Aesarcay ordersway ethay orsehay otay ivegay
ayway urposelypay, andway etreatray otay ethay ampcay atway ethay amesay imetay ehay ordersway ethay
ampcay otay ebay ortifiedfay ithway away igherhay ampartray inway allway irectionsday, ethay atesgay
otay ebay arricadedbay, andway inway executingway esethay ingsthay asway uchmay onfusioncay otay ebay
ownshay asway ossiblepay, andway otay erformpay emthay underway ethay etencepray ofway earfay.

Ilay.Inducedway ybay allway esethay ingsthay ethay enemyway eadlay overway eirthay orcesfay andway
awdray upway eirthay inelay inway away isadvantageousday ositionpay; andway asway ourway enmay alsoway
adhay eenbay edlay ownday omfray ethay ampartsray, eythay approachway earernay, andway owthray
eirthay eaponsway intoway ethay ortificationfay omfray allway idessay, andway endingsay eraldshay
oundray, orderway itway otay ebay oclaimedpray atthay, ifway anyway, eitherway Aulgay orway Omanray,
asway illingway otay ogay overway otay emthay eforebay ethay irdthay ourhay, itway asway ermittedpay;
afterway atthay imetay erethay ouldway otnay ebay ermissionpay; andway osay uchmay idday eythay
isregardday ourway enmay, atthay ethay atesgay avinghay eenbay ockedblay upway ithway inglesay
owsray ofway urftay asway away eremay appearanceway, ecausebay eythay idday otnay eemsay ableway otay
urstbay inway atthay ayway, omesay eganbay otay ullpay ownday ethay ampartray ithway eirthay andshay,
othersway otay illfay upway ethay enchestray. Enthay Aesarcay, akingmay away allysay omfray allway ethay
atesgay, andway endingsay outway ethay avalrycay, oonsay utspay ethay enemyway otay ightflay, osay
atthay onay oneway atway allway oodstay ishay oundgray ithway ethay intentionway ofway ightingfay; andway
ehay ewslay away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay, andway eprivedday allway ofway eirthay armsway.

Iilay.Aesarcay, earingfay otay ursuepay emthay eryvay arfay, ecausebay oodsway andway
orassesmay intervenedway, andway alsoway ecausebay ehay awsay atthay eythay ufferedsay onay
allsmay osslay inway abandoningway eirthay ositionpay, eachesray Icerocay ethay amesay ayday
ithway allway ishay orcesfay afesay. Ehay itnessesway ithway urprisesay ethay owerstay,
antletsmay, andway otherway ortificationsfay elongingbay otay ethay enemyway ethay egionlay
avinghay eenbay awndray outway, ehay indsfay atthay evenway everyway enthtay oldiersay adhay otnay
escapedway ithoutway oundsway. Omfray allway esethay ingsthay ehay udgesjay ithway atwhay angerday
andway ithway atwhay eatgray ouragecay attersmay adhay eenbay onductedcay; ehay ommendscay
Icerocay accordingway otay ishay esertday andway ikewiselay ethay egionlay; ehay addressesway
individuallyway ethay enturionscay andway ethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay, osewhay
alourvay ehay adhay iscoveredday otay avehay eenbay ignalsay. Ehay eceivesray informationway ofway
ethay eathday ofway Abinussay andway Ottacay omfray ethay isonerspray. Anway assemblyway eingbay
eldhay ethay ollowingfay ayday, ehay atesstay ethay occurrenceway; ehay onsolescay andway
encouragesway ethay oldierssay; ehay uggestssay atthay ethay isasterday, ichwhay adhay eenbay
occasionedway ybay ethay isconductmay andway ashnessray ofway ishay ieutenantlay, ouldshay ebay
ornebay ithway away atientpay indmay, ecausebay ybay ethay avourfay ofway ethay immortalway odsgay
andway eirthay ownway alourvay, eithernay asway astinglay oyjay eftlay otay ethay enemyway, ornay
eryvay astinglay iefgray otay emthay.

Iiilay.Inway ethay eanwhilemay ethay eportray espectingray ethay ictoryvay ofway Aesarcay isway
onveyedcay otay Abienuslay oughthray ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Emiray ithway incredibleway
eedspay, osay atthay, oughthay ehay asway aboutway ixtysay ilesmay istantday omfray ethay
interwayuarterqay ofway Icerocay, andway Aesarcay adhay arrivedway erethay afterway ethay inthnay
ourhay, eforebay idnightmay away outshay aroseway atway ethay atesgay ofway ethay ampcay, ybay ichwhay
outshay anway indicationway ofway ethay ictoryvay andway away ongratulationcay onway ethay artpay ofway
ethay Emiray ereway ivengay otay Abienuslay. Isthay eportray avinghay eenbay arriedcay otay ethay
Eviritray, Indutiormarusway, owhay adhay esolvedray otay attackway ethay ampcay ofway Abienuslay
ethay ollowingfay ayday, iesflay ybay ightnay andway eadslay ackbay allway ishay orcesfay intoway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Eviritray. Aesarcay endssay ackbay Abiusfay ithway ishay egionlay otay ishay
interwayuartersqay; ehay imselfhay eterminesday otay interway ithway eethray egionslay earnay
Amarobrivasay inway eethray ifferentday uartersqay, andway, ecausebay uchsay eatgray
ommotionscay adhay arisenway inway Aulgay, ehay esolvedray otay emainray uringday ethay olewhay
interway ithway ethay armyway imselfhay. Orfay ethay isasterday espectingray ethay eathday ofway
Abinussay avinghay eenbay irculatedcay amongway emthay, almostway allway ethay atesstay ofway Aulgay
ereway eliberatingday aboutway arway, endingsay essengersmay andway embassiesway intoway allway
uartersqay, inquiringway atwhay urtherfay easuremay eythay ouldshay aketay, andway oldinghay
ouncilscay ybay ightnay inway ecludedsay acesplay. Ornay idday anyway eriodpay ofway ethay olewhay
interway asspay overway ithoutway eshfray anxietyway otay Aesarcay, orway ithoutway ishay
eceivingray omesay intelligenceway espectingray ethay eetingsmay andway ommotionscay ofway
ethay Aulsgay. Amongway esethay, ehay isway informedway ybay . Osciusray, ethay ieutenantlay
omwhay ehay adhay acedplay overway ethay irteenththay egionlay, atthay argelay orcesfay ofway
osethay atesstay ofway ethay Aulsgay, ichwhay areway alledcay ethay Armoricaeway, adhay assembledway
orfay ethay urposepay ofway attackingway imhay andway ereway otnay oremay anthay eightway ilesmay
istantday; utbay intelligenceway espectingray ethay ictoryvay ofway Aesarcay eingbay arriedcay
otay emthay, adhay etreatedray inway uchsay away annermay atthay eirthay epartureday appearedway
ikelay away ightflay.

Ivlay.Utbay Aesarcay, avinghay ummonedsay otay imhay ethay incipalpray ersonspay ofway eachway
atestay, inway oneway asecay ybay alarmingway emthay, incesay ehay eclaredday atthay ehay ewknay atwhay
asway oinggay onway, andway inway anotherway asecay ybay encouragingway emthay, etainedray away eatgray
artpay ofway Aulgay inway itsway allegianceway. Ethay Enonessay, oweverhay, ichwhay isway away atestay
eminentlyway owerfulpay andway oneway ofway eatgray influenceway amongway ethay Aulsgay,
attemptingway ybay eneralgay esignday otay ayslay Avarinuscay omwhay Aesarcay adhay eatedcray
ingkay amongway emthay osewhay otherbray, Oritasgusmay, adhay eldhay ethay overeigntysay atway
ethay eriodpay ofway ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay inway Aulgay, andway osewhay ancestorsway adhay
alsoway eviouslypray eldhay itway enwhay ehay iscoveredday eirthay otplay andway edflay, ursuedpay
imhay evenway otay ethay ontiersfray ofway ethay atestay, andway ovedray imhay omfray ishay ingdomkay
andway ishay omehay; andway, afterway avinghay entsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay orfay ethay
urposepay ofway oncludingcay away eacepay, enwhay ehay orderedway allway eirthay enatesay otay omecay
otay imhay, idday otnay obeyway atthay ommandcay. Osay arfay idday itway operateway amongway osethay
arbarianbay eoplepay, atthay erethay ereway oundfay omesay otay ebay ethay irstfay otay ageway
arway; andway osay eatgray away angechay ofway inclinationsway idday itway oducepray inway allway, atthay
exceptway ethay Aeduiway andway ethay Emiray, omwhay Aesarcay adhay alwaysway eldhay inway especialway
onourhay, ethay oneway eoplepay orfay eirthay onglay andingstay andway uniformway idelityfay
owardstay ethay Omanray eoplepay, ethay otherway orfay eirthay atelay ervicesay inway ethay Allicgay
arway, erethay asway arcelyscay away atestay ichwhay asway otnay uspectedsay ybay usway. Andway Iway oday
otnay owknay etherwhay atthay oughtway uchmay otay ebay onderedway atway, asway ellway orfay everalsay
otherway easonsray, asway articularlypay ecausebay eythay owhay ankedray aboveway allway ationsnay
orfay owesspray inway arway, ostmay eenlykay egrettedray atthay eythay adhay ostlay osay uchmay ofway
atthay eputationray asway otay ubmitsay otay ommandscay omfray ethay Omanray eoplepay.

Vlay.Utbay ethay Eviritray andway Indutiomarusway etlay onay artpay ofway ethay entireway interway
asspay ithoutway endingsay ambassadorsway acrossway ethay Inerhay, importuningway ethay
atesstay, omisingpray oneymay, andway assertingway atthay, asway away argelay ortionpay ofway ourway
armyway adhay eenbay utcay offway, away uchmay allersmay ortionpay emainedray. Oweverhay, onenay ofway
ethay Ermangay atesstay ouldcay ebay inducedway otay osscray ethay Inerhay, incesay eythay adhay
icetway essayedway itway, eythay aidsay, inway ethay arway ithway Ariovistusway andway inway ethay
assagepay ofway ethay Enchtheritay erethay; atthay ortunefay asway otnay otay ebay emptedtay anyway
oremay. Indutiomarusway isappointedday inway isthay expectationway, everthelessnay eganbay
otay aiseray oopstray, andway isciplineday emthay, andway ocurepray orseshay omfray ethay
eighbouringnay eoplepay andway allureway otay imhay ybay eatgray ewardsray ethay outlawsway andway
onvictscay oughoutthray Aulgay. Andway uchsay eatgray influenceway adhay ehay alreadyway
acquiredway orfay imselfhay inway Aulgay ybay esethay eansmay, atthay embassiesway ereway
ockingflay otay imhay inway allway irectionsday, andway eekingsay, ubliclypay andway ivatelypray,
ishay avourfay andway iendshipfray.

Ilvay.Enwhay ehay erceivedpay atthay eythay ereway omingcay otay imhay oluntarilyvay; atthay
onway ethay oneway idesay ethay Enonessay andway ethay Arnutescay ereway imulatedstay ybay eirthay
onsciousnesscay ofway uiltgay, onway ethay otherway idesay ethay Erviinay andway ethay Aduatuciway
ereway eparingpray arway againstway ethay Omansray, andway atthay orcesfay ofway olunteersvay
ouldway otnay ebay antingway otay imhay ifway ehay eganbay otay advanceway omfray ishay ownway
erritoriestay, ehay oclaimspray anway armedway ouncilcay isthay accordingway otay ethay ustomcay
ofway ethay Aulsgay isway ethay ommencementcay ofway arway atway ichwhay, ybay away ommoncay awlay, allway
ethay outhyay ereway ontway otay assembleway inway armsway; oeverwhay ofway emthay omescay astlay isway
illedkay inway ethay ightsay ofway ethay olewhay assemblyway afterway eingbay ackedray ithway everyway
orturetay. Inway atthay ouncilcay ehay eclaresday Ingetorixcay, ethay eaderlay ofway ethay otherway
actionfay, ishay ownway onsayinwayawlay omwhay eway avehay aboveway entionedmay, asway avinghay
embracedway ethay otectionpray ofway Aesarcay, andway evernay avinghay esertedday imhay anway
enemyway andway onfiscatescay ishay opertypray. Enwhay esethay ingsthay ereway inishedfay, ehay
assertsway inway ethay ouncilcay atthay ehay, invitedway ybay ethay Enonessay andway ethay Arnutescay,
andway everalsay otherway atesstay ofway Aulgay, asway aboutway otay archmay itherthay oughthray ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Emiray, evastateday eirthay andslay, andway attackway ethay ampcay ofway
Abienuslay eforebay ehay oesday atthay, ehay informsway emthay ofway atwhay ehay esiresday otay ebay
oneday.

Iilvay.Abienuslay, incesay ehay asway onfiningcay imselfhay ithinway away ampcay onglystray
ortifiedfay ybay ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray andway ybay artway, adhay onay apprehensionsway
asway otay ishay ownway andway ethay egion'slay angerday, utbay asway evisingday atthay ehay ightmay
owthray awayway onay opportunityway ofway onductingcay ethay arway uccessfullysay.
Accordinglyway, ethay eechspay ofway Indutiomarusway, ichwhay ehay adhay eliveredday inway ethay
ouncilcay, avinghay eenbay ademay ownknay otay imhay ybay Ingetorixcay andway ishay alliesway,
ehay endssay essengersmay otay ethay eighbouringnay atesstay andway ummonssay orsehay omfray
allway uartersqay ehay appointsway otay emthay away ixedfay ayday orfay assemblingway. Inway ethay
eantimemay, Indutiomarusway, ithway allway ishay avalrycay, earlynay everyway ayday usedway otay
aradepay oseclay otay ishay Abienus'slay ampcay; atway oneway imetay, atthay ehay ightmay informway
imselfhay ofway ethay ituationsay ofway ethay ampcay; atway anotherway imetay, orfay ethay urposepay
ofway onferringcay ithway orway ofway intimidatingway imhay. Abienuslay onfinedcay ishay enmay
ithinway ethay ortificationsfay andway omotedpray ethay enemy'sway eliefbay ofway ishay earfay ybay
ateverwhay ethodsmay ehay ouldcay.

Iiilvay.Incesay Indutiomarusway asway ailyday advancingway upway otay ethay ampcay ithway
eatergray efianceday, allway ethay avalrycay ofway ethay eighbouringnay atesstay ichwhay ehay
Abienuslay adhay akentay arecay otay avehay entsay orfay, avinghay eenbay admittedway inway oneway
ightnay, ehay onfinedcay allway ishay enmay ithinway ethay ampcay ybay uardsgay ithway uchsay eatgray
ictnessstray, atthay atthay actfay ouldcay ybay onay eansmay ebay eportedray orway arriedcay otay
ethay Eviritray. Inway ethay eanwhilemay Indutiomarusway, accordingway otay ishay ailyday
acticepray, advancesway upway otay ethay ampcay andway endsspay away eatgray artpay ofway ethay ayday
erethay ishay orsehay astcay eirthay eaponsway, andway ithway eryvay insultingway anguagelay
allcay outway ourway enmay otay attlebay. Onay eplyray eingbay ivengay ybay ourway enmay, ethay enemyway
enwhay eythay oughtthay operpray, epartday owardstay eveningway inway away isorderlyday andway
atteredscay annermay, Abienuslay unexpectedlyway endssay outway allway ethay avalrycay ybay otway
atesgay; ehay ivesgay isthay ommandcay andway ohibitionpray, atthay, enwhay ethay enemyway
ouldshay ebay errifiedtay andway utpay otay ightflay ichwhay ehay oresawfay ouldway appenhay, asway
itway idday, eythay ouldshay allway akemay orfay Indutiomarusway, andway onay oneway oundway anyway anmay
eforebay ehay ouldshay avehay eensay imhay ainslay, ecausebay ehay asway unwillingway atthay ehay
ouldshay escapeway, inway onsequencecay ofway aininggay imetay ybay ethay elayday occasionedway
ybay ethay ursuitpay ofway ethay estray. Ehay offersway eatgray ewardsray orfay osethay owhay
ouldshay illkay imhay ehay endssay upway ethay ohortscay asway away eliefray otay ethay orsehay. Ethay
issueway ustifiesjay ethay olicypay ofway ethay anmay, andway, incesay allway aimedway atway oneway,
Indutiomarusway isway ainslay, avinghay eenbay overtakenway atway ethay eryvay ordfay ofway ethay
iverray, andway ishay eadhay isway arriedcay otay ethay ampcay ethay orsehay, enwhay eturningray,
ursuepay andway ayslay allway omwhay eythay ancay. Isthay affairway avinghay eenbay ownknay, allway
ethay orcesfay ofway ethay Eburonesway andway ethay Erviinay ichwhay adhay assembledway, epartday;
andway orfay away ortshay imetay afterway isthay actionway, Aesarcay asway esslay arassedhay inway ethay
overnmentgay ofway Aulgay.



Ookbay Ivay

Iway.Aesarcay, expectingway orfay anymay easonsray away eatergray ommotioncay inway Aulgay,
esolvesray otay oldhay away evylay ybay ethay eansmay ofway . Ilanussay, . Antistiusway
Eginusray, andway . Extiussay, ishay ieutenantslay atway ethay amesay imetay ehay equestedray
ofway Ncay. Ompeypay, ethay oconsulpray, atthay incesay ehay asway emainingray earnay ethay itycay
investedway ithway ilitarymay ommandcay orfay ethay interestsway ofway ethay ommonwealthcay, ehay
ouldway ommandcay osethay enmay omwhay enwhay onsulcay ehay adhay eviedlay ybay ethay ilitarymay
oathway inway Isalpinecay Aulgay, otay oinjay eirthay espectiveray orpscay, andway otay oceedpray
otay imhay; inkingthay itway ofway eatgray importanceway, asway arfay asway egardedray ethay opinionway
ichwhay ethay Aulsgay ouldway entertainway orfay ethay uturefay, atthay ethay esourcesray ofway
Italyway ouldshay appearway osay eatgray, atthay ifway anyway osslay ouldshay ebay ustainedsay inway
arway, otnay onlyway ouldcay itway ebay epairedray inway away ortshay imetay, utbay ikewiselay ebay
urtherfay uppliedsay ybay illstay argerlay orcesfay. Andway enwhay Ompeypay adhay antedgray
isthay otay ethay interestsway ofway ethay ommonwealthcay andway ethay aimsclay ofway iendshipfray,
Aesarcay avinghay uicklyqay ompletedcay ethay evylay ybay eansmay ofway ishay ieutenantslay,
afterway eethray egionslay adhay eenbay othbay ormedfay andway oughtbray otay imhay eforebay ethay
interway adhay expiredway, andway ethay umbernay ofway osethay ohortscay ichwhay ehay adhay ostlay
underway . Ituriustay adhay eenbay oubledday, aughttay ethay Aulsgay, othbay ybay ishay
ispatchday andway ybay ishay orcesfay, atwhay ethay isciplineday andway ethay owerpay ofway ethay
Omanray eoplepay ouldcay accomplishway.

Iiway.Indutiomarusway avinghay eenbay ainslay, asway eway avehay atedstay, ethay overnmentgay
asway onferredcay uponway ishay elativesray ybay ethay Eviritray. Eythay easecay otnay otay
importuneway ethay eighbouringnay Ermansgay andway otay omisepray emthay oneymay enwhay eythay
ouldcay otnay obtainway eirthay objectway omfray osethay earestnay emthay, eythay tryay osethay
oremay emoteray. Avinghay oundfay omesay atesstay illingway otay accedeway otay eirthay ishesway,
eythay enterway intoway away ompactcay ithway emthay ybay away utualmay oathway, andway ivegay ostageshay
asway away ecuritysay orfay ethay oneymay eythay attachway Ambiorixway otay emthay ybay anway allianceway
andway onfederacycay. Aesarcay, onway eingbay informedway ofway eirthay actsway, incesay ehay awsay
atthay arway asway eingbay eparedpray onway allway idessay, atthay ethay Erviinay, Aduatuciway, andway
Enapiimay, ithway ethay additionway ofway allway ethay Ermansgay onway isthay idesay ofway ethay Inerhay
ereway underway armsway, atthay ethay Enonessay idday otnay assembleway accordingway otay ishay
ommandcay, andway ereway oncertingcay easuresmay ithway ethay Arnutescay andway ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay, atthay ethay Ermansgay ereway importunedway ybay ethay Eviritray inway
equentfray embassiesway, oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway otay aketay easuresmay orfay ethay arway
earlierway anthay usualway.

Iiiway.Accordinglyway, ilewhay ethay interway asway otnay etyay endedway, avinghay
oncentratedcay ethay ourfay earestnay egionslay, ehay archedmay unexpectedlyway intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Erviinay, andway eforebay eythay ouldcay eitherway assembleway, orway
etreatray, afterway apturingcay away argelay umbernay ofway attlecay andway ofway enmay, andway
astingway eirthay andslay andway ivinggay upway atthay ootybay otay ethay oldierssay, ompelledcay
emthay otay enterway intoway away urrendersay andway ivegay imhay ostageshay. Atthay usinessbay
avinghay eenbay eedilyspay executedway, ehay againway edlay ishay egionslay ackbay intoway
interwayuartersqay. Avinghay oclaimedpray away ouncilcay ofway Aulgay inway ethay eginningbay ofway
ethay ingspray, asway ehay adhay eenbay accustomedway otay oday, enwhay ethay eputiesday omfray
ethay estray, exceptway ethay Enonessay, ethay Arnutescay, andway ethay Eviritray, adhay omecay,
udgingjay isthay otay ebay ethay ommencementcay ofway arway andway evoltray, atthay ehay ightmay
appearway otay onsidercay allway ingsthay ofway esslay onsequencecay anthay atthay arway, ehay
ansferstray ethay ouncilcay otay Utetialay ofway ethay Arisiipay. Esethay ereway adjacentway otay
ethay Enonessay, andway adhay unitedway eirthay atestay otay emthay uringday ethay emorymay ofway
eirthay athersfay, utbay ereway oughtthay otay avehay onay artpay inway ethay esentpray otplay.
Avinghay oclaimedpray isthay omfray ethay ibunaltray, ehay advancesway ethay amesay ayday
owardstay ethay Enonessay ithway ishay egionslay andway arrivesway amongway emthay ybay onglay
archesmay.

Ivway.Accoway, owhay adhay eenbay ethay authorway ofway atthay enterpriseway, onway eingbay informedway
ofway ishay arrivalway, ordersway ethay eoplepay otay assembleway inway ethay ownstay; otay emthay,
ilewhay attemptingway isthay andway eforebay itway ouldcay ebay accomplishedway, ewsnay isway
oughtbray atthay ethay Omansray areway oseclay atway andhay oughthray ecessitynay eythay ivegay
overway eirthay esignday andway endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay orfay ethay urposepay ofway
imploringway ardonpay; eythay akemay advancesway otay imhay oughthray ethay Aeduiway, osewhay
atestay asway omfray ancientway imestay underway ethay otectionpray ofway Omeray. Aesarcay
eadilyray antsgray emthay ardonpay andway eceivesray eirthay excuseway atway ethay equestray ofway
ethay Aeduiway; ecausebay ehay oughtthay atthay ethay ummersay easonsay asway oneway orfay anway
impendingway arway, otnay orfay anway investigationway. Avinghay imposedway oneway undredhay
ostageshay, ehay eliversday esethay otay ethay Aeduiway otay ebay eldhay inway argechay ybay emthay.
Otay ethay amesay aceplay ethay Arnutescay endsay ambassadorsway andway ostageshay, employingway
asway eirthay ediatorsmay ethay Emiray, underway osewhay otectionpray eythay ereway eythay
eceiveray ethay amesay answersway. Aesarcay oncludescay ethay ouncilcay andway imposesway away
evylay ofway avalrycay onway ethay atesstay.

.Isthay artpay ofway Aulgay avinghay eenbay anquillizedtray, ehay appliesway imselfhay
entirelyway othbay inway indmay andway oulsay otay ethay arway ithway ethay Eviritray andway Ambiorixway.
Ehay ordersway Avarinuscay otay archmay ithway imhay ithway ethay avalrycay ofway ethay Enonessay,
estlay anyway ommotioncay ouldshay ariseway eitherway outway ofway ishay othay empertay, orway outway ofway
ethay atredhay ofway ethay atestay ichwhay ehay adhay incurredway. Afterway arrangingway esethay
ingsthay, asway ehay onsideredcay itway ertaincay atthay Ambiorixway ouldway otnay ontendcay inway
attlebay, ehay atchedway ishay otherway ansplay attentivelyway. Ethay Enapiimay orderedbay onway
ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Eburonesway, andway ereway otectedpray ybay oneway ontinuedcay
extentway ofway orassesmay andway oodsway; andway eythay aloneway outway ofway Aulgay adhay evernay entsay
ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay onway ethay ubjectsay ofway eacepay. Aesarcay ewknay atthay away ietay ofway
ospitalityhay ubsistedsay etweenbay emthay andway Ambiorixway ehay alsoway iscoveredday atthay
ethay atterlay adhay enteredway intoway anway allianceway ithway ethay Ermansgay ybay eansmay ofway ethay
Eviritray. Ehay oughtthay atthay esethay auxiliariesway oughtway otay ebay etachedday omfray imhay
eforebay ehay ovokedpray imhay otay arway; estlay ehay, espairingday ofway afetysay, ouldshay
eitherway oceedpray otay oncealcay imselfhay inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Enapiimay, orway
ouldshay ebay ivendray otay oalescecay ithway ethay Ermansgay eyondbay ethay Inerhay. Avinghay
enteredway uponway isthay esolutionray, ehay endssay ethay aggagebay ofway ethay olewhay armyway otay
Abienuslay, inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Eviritray andway ordersway otway egionslay otay
oceedpray otay imhay ehay imselfhay oceedspray againstway ethay Enapiimay ithway ivefay
ightlylayequippedway egionslay. Eythay, avinghay assembledway onay oopstray, asway eythay
eliedray onway ethay efenceday ofway eirthay ositionpay, etreatray intoway ethay oodsway andway
orassesmay, andway onveycay itherthay allway eirthay opertypray.

Ivay.Aesarcay, avinghay ividedday ishay orcesfay ithway . Abiusfay, ishay ieutenantlay,
andway . Assuscray, ishay uestorqay, andway avinghay astilyhay onstructedcay omesay
idgesbray, entersway eirthay ountrycay inway eethray ivisionsday, urnsbay eirthay ouseshay andway
illagesvay, andway etsgay ossessionpay ofway away argelay umbernay ofway attlecay andway enmay.
Onstrainedcay ybay esethay ircumstancescay, ethay Enapiimay endsay ambassadorsway otay imhay
orfay ethay urposepay ofway uingsay orfay eacepay. Ehay, afterway eceivingray ostageshay,
assuresway emthay atthay ehay illway onsidercay emthay inway ethay umbernay ofway ishay enemiesway ifway
eythay allshay eceiveray ithinway eirthay erritoriestay eitherway Ambiorixway orway ishay
ambassadorsway. Avinghay eterminatelyday ettledsay esethay ingsthay, ehay eftlay amongway
ethay Enapiimay, Ommiuscay ethay Atrebatianway ithway omesay avalrycay asway away uardgay; ehay
imselfhay oceedspray owardtay ethay Eviritray.

Iivay.Ilewhay esethay ingsthay areway eingbay erformedpay ybay Aesarcay, ethay Eviritray,
avinghay awndray ogethertay argelay orcesfay ofway infantryway andway ofway avalrycay, ereway
eparingpray otay attackway Abienuslay andway ethay egionlay ichwhay asway interingway inway eirthay
erritoriestay, andway ereway alreadyway otnay urtherfay istantday omfray imhay anthay away
ourneyjay ofway otway aysday, enwhay eythay earnlay atthay otway egionslay adhay arrivedway ybay ethay
orderway ofway Aesarcay. Avinghay itchedpay eirthay ampcay ifteenfay ilesmay offway, eythay
esolveray otay awaitway ethay upportsay ofway ethay Ermansgay. Abienuslay, avinghay earnedlay
ethay esignday ofway ethay enemyway, opinghay atthay oughthray eirthay ashnessray erethay ouldway
ebay omesay opportunityway ofway engagingway, afterway eavinglay away uardgay ofway ivefay ohortscay
orfay ethay aggagebay, advancesway againstway ethay enemyway ithway entytwayivefay ohortscay andway
away argelay odybay ofway avalrycay, andway, eavinglay ethay acespay ofway away ilemay etweenbay emthay,
ortifiesfay ishay ampcay. Erethay asway etweenbay Abienuslay andway ethay enemyway away iverray
ifficultday otay osscray andway ithway eepstay anksbay isthay eithernay idday ehay imselfhay
esignday otay osscray, ornay idday ehay upposesay ethay enemyway ouldway osscray itway. Eirthay opehay
ofway auxiliariesway asway ailyday increasingway. Ehay Abienuslay openlyway ayssay inway away
ouncilcay atthay incesay ethay Ermansgay areway aidsay otay ebay approachingway, ehay ouldway otnay
ingbray intoway uncertaintyway ishay ownway andway ethay army'sway ortunesfay, andway ethay extnay ayday
ouldway ovemay ishay ampcay atway earlyway awnday. Esethay ordsway areway uicklyqay arriedcay otay
ethay enemyway, incesay outway ofway osay argelay away umbernay ofway avalrycay omposedcay ofway Aulsgay,
aturenay ompelledcay omesay otay avourfay ethay Allicgay interestsway. Abienuslay, avinghay
assembledway ethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay andway incipalpray enturionscay ybay
ightnay, atesstay atwhay ishay esignday isway, andway, atthay ehay aymay ethay oremay easilyway ivegay
ethay enemyway away eliefbay ofway ishay earsfay, ehay ordersway ethay ampcay otay ebay ovedmay ithway
eatergray oisenay andway onfusioncay anthay asway usualway ithway ethay Omanray eoplepay. Ybay
esethay eansmay ehay akesmay ishay epartureday appearway, ikelay away etreatray. Esethay
ingsthay, alsoway, incesay ethay ampscay ereway osay earnay, areway eportedray otay ethay enemyway ybay
outsscay eforebay aylightday.

Iiivay.Arcelyscay adhay ethay earray advancedway eyondbay ethay ortificationsfay enwhay ethay
Aulsgay, encouragingway oneway anotherway otnay otay astcay omfray eirthay andshay ethay
anticipatedway ootybay, atthay itway asway away edioustay ingthay, ilewhay ethay Omansray ereway
anicpay ickenstray, otay ebay aitingway orfay ethay aidway ofway ethay Ermansgay, andway atthay eirthay
ignityday idday otnay uffersay emthay otay earfay otay attackway ithway uchsay eatgray orcesfay osay
allsmay away andbay, articularlypay enwhay etreatingray andway encumberedway, oday otnay
esitatehay otay osscray ethay iverray andway ivegay attlebay inway away isadvantageousday
ositionpay. Abienuslay uspectingsay atthay esethay ingsthay ouldway appenhay, asway
oceedingpray uietlyqay, andway usingway ethay amesay etencepray ofway away archmay, inway orderway
atthay ehay ightmay enticeway emthay acrossway ethay iverray. Enthay, avinghay entsay orwardfay
ethay aggagebay omesay ortshay istanceday andway acedplay itway onway away ertaincay eminenceway, ehay
ayssay, Oldierssay, ouyay avehay ethay opportunityway ouyay avehay oughtsay ouyay oldhay ethay
enemyway inway anway encumberedway andway isadvantageousday ositionpay isplayday otay usway ouryay
eaderslay ethay amesay alourvay ouyay avehay ofttimesway isplayedday otay ouryay eneralgay
imagineway atthay ehay isway esentpray andway actuallyway eessay esethay exploitsway. Atway ethay
amesay imetay ehay ordersway ethay oopstray otay acefay aboutway owardstay ethay enemyway andway ormfay
inway inelay ofway attlebay, andway, espatchingday away ewfay oopstray ofway avalrycay asway away uardgay
orfay ethay agbay agegay, ehay acesplay ethay estray ofway ethay orsehay onway ethay ingsway. Ourway enmay,
aisingray away outshay, uicklyqay owthray eirthay avelinsjay atway ethay enemyway. Eythay, enwhay,
ontrarycay otay eirthay expectationway, eythay awsay osethay omwhay eythay elievedbay otay ebay
etreatingray, advanceway owardstay emthay ithway eateningthray annersbay, ereway otnay ableway
otay ustainsay evenway ethay argechay, andway, eingbay utpay otay ightflay atway ethay irstfay
onslaughtway, oughtsay ethay earestnay oodsway Abienuslay ursuingpay emthay ithway ethay
avalrycay, uponway away argelay umbernay eingbay ainslay, andway everalsay akentay isonerspray,
otgay ossessionpay ofway ethay atestay away ewfay aysday afterway; orfay ethay Ermansgay owhay ereway
omingcay otay ethay aidway ofway ethay Eviritray, avinghay eenbay informedway ofway eirthay ightflay,
etreatedray otay eirthay omeshay. Ethay elationsray ofway Indutiomarusway, owhay adhay eenbay
ethay omoterspray ofway ethay evoltray, accompanyingway emthay, uittedqay eirthay ownway atestay
ithway emthay. Ethay upremesay owerpay andway overnmentgay ereway eliveredday otay
Ingetorixcay, omwhay eway avehay atedstay otay avehay emainedray irmfay inway ishay allegianceway
omfray ethay ommencementcay.

Ixway.Aesarcay, afterway ehay amecay omfray ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Enapiimay intoway
osethay ofway ethay Eviritray, esolvedray orfay otway easonsray otay osscray ethay Inerhay; oneway
ofway ichwhay asway, ecausebay eythay adhay entsay assistanceway otay ethay Eviritray againstway
imhay; ethay otherway, atthay Ambiorixway ightmay otnay avehay away etreatray amongway emthay.
Avinghay eterminedday onway esethay attersmay, ehay eganbay otay uildbay away idgebray away ittlelay
aboveway atthay aceplay, atway ichwhay ehay adhay eforebay onveyedcay overway ishay armyway. Ethay
anplay avinghay eenbay ownknay andway aidlay ownday, ethay orkway isway accomplishedway inway away ewfay
aysday ybay ethay eatgray exertionway ofway ethay oldierssay. Avinghay eftlay away ongstray uardgay
atway ethay idgebray onway ethay idesay ofway ethay Eviritray, estlay anyway ommotioncay ouldshay
uddenlysay ariseway amongway emthay, ehay eadslay overway ethay estray ofway ethay orcesfay andway ethay
avalrycay. Ethay Ubiiway, owhay eforebay adhay entsay ostageshay andway omecay otay away
apitulationcay, endsay ambassadorsway otay imhay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway indicatingvay
emselvesthay, otay assureway imhay atthay eithernay adhay auxiliariesway eenbay entsay otay ethay
Eviritray omfray eirthay atestay, ornay adhay eythay iolatedvay eirthay allegianceway; eythay
entreatway andway eseechbay imhay otay arespay emthay, estlay, inway ishay ommoncay atredhay ofway
ethay Ermansgay, ethay innocentway ouldshay uffersay ethay enaltypay ofway ethay uiltygay eythay
omisepray otay ivegay oremay ostageshay, ifway ehay esireday emthay. Avinghay investigatedway
ethay asecay, Aesarcay indsfay atthay ethay auxiliariesway adhay eenbay entsay ybay ethay Uevisay;
ehay acceptsway ethay apologyway ofway ethay Ubiiway, andway akesmay inutemay inquiriesway
oncerningcay ethay approachesway andway ethay outesray otay ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Uevisay. .Inway ethay eanwhilemay ehay isway informedway ybay ethay Ubiiway, away ewfay aysday
afterway, atthay ethay Uevisay areway awingdray allway eirthay orcesfay intoway oneway aceplay, andway
areway ivinggay ordersway otay osethay ationsnay ichwhay areway underway eirthay overnmentgay otay
endsay auxiliariesway ofway infantryway andway ofway avalrycay. Avinghay earnedlay esethay
ingsthay, ehay ovidespray away upplysay ofway orncay, electssay away operpray aceplay orfay ishay
ampcay, andway ommandscay ethay Ubiiway otay ivedray offway eirthay attlecay andway arrycay awayway allway
eirthay ossessionspay omfray ethay ountrycay artspay intoway ethay ownstay, opinghay atthay
eythay, eingbay away arbarousbay andway ignorantway eoplepay, enwhay arassedhay ybay ethay antway
ofway ovisionspray, ightmay ebay oughtbray otay anway engagementway onway isadvantageousday
ermstay ehay ordersway emthay otay endsay umerousnay outsscay amongway ethay Uevisay, andway earnlay
atwhay ingsthay areway oinggay onway amongway emthay. Eythay executeway ethay ordersway, andway, away ewfay
aysday avinghay intervenedway, eportray atthay allway ethay Uevisay, afterway ertaincay
intelligenceway oncerningcay ethay armyway ofway ethay Omansray adhay omecay, etreatedray ithway
allway eirthay ownway orcesfay andway osethay ofway eirthay alliesway, ichwhay eythay adhay
assembledway, otay ethay utmostway extremitiesway ofway eirthay erritoriestay atthay erethay isway
away oodway erethay ofway eryvay eatgray extentway, ichwhay isway alledcay Acenisbay; atthay isthay
etchesstray away eatgray ayway intoway ethay interiorway, andway, eingbay opposedway asway away aturalnay
arrierbay, efendsday omfray injuriesway andway incursionsway ethay Eruscichay againstway ethay
Uevisay, andway ethay Uevisay againstway ethay Eruscichay atthay atway ethay entranceway ofway atthay
orestfay ethay Uevisay adhay eterminedday otay awaitway ethay omingcay upway ofway ethay Omansray.

Ixay.Incesay eway avehay omecay otay isthay aceplay, itway oesday otnay appearway otay ebay oreignfay
otay ourway ubjectsay otay aylay eforebay ethay eaderray anway accountway ofway ethay annersmay ofway
Aulgay andway Ermanygay, andway ereinwhay esethay ationsnay ifferday omfray eachway otherway. Inway
Aulgay erethay areway actionsfay otnay onlyway inway allway ethay atesstay, andway inway allway ethay
antonscay andway eirthay ivisionsday, utbay almostway inway eachway amilyfay, andway ofway esethay
actionsfay osethay areway ethay eaderslay owhay areway onsideredcay accordingway otay eirthay
udgmentjay otay ossesspay ethay eatestgray influenceway, uponway osewhay illway andway
eterminationday ethay anagementmay ofway allway affairsway andway easuresmay ependsday. Andway
atthay eemssay otay avehay eenbay institutedway inway ancientway imestay ithway isthay iewvay, atthay
onay oneway ofway ethay ommoncay eoplepay ouldshay ebay inway antway ofway upportsay againstway oneway
oremay owerfulpay; orfay onenay ofway osethay eaderslay ufferssay ishay artypay otay ebay
oppressedway andway efraudedday, andway ifway ehay oday otherwiseway, ehay ashay onay influenceway
amongway ishay artypay. Isthay amesay olicypay existsway oughoutthray ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay;
orfay allway ethay atesstay areway ividedday intoway otway actionsfay.

Iixay.Enwhay Aesarcay arrivedway inway Aulgay, ethay Aeduiway ereway ethay eaderslay ofway oneway
actionfay, ethay Equanisay ofway ethay otherway. Incesay ethay atterlay ereway esslay owerfulpay
ybay emselvesthay, inasmuchway asway ethay iefchay influenceway asway omfray ofway oldway amongway ethay
Aeduiway, andway eirthay ependenciesday ereway eatgray, eythay adhay unitedway otay emselvesthay
ethay Ermansgay andway Ariovistusway, andway adhay oughtbray emthay overway otay eirthay artypay ybay
eatgray acrificessay andway omisespray. Andway avinghay oughtfay everalsay uccessfulsay
attlesbay andway ainslay allway ethay obilitynay ofway ethay Aeduiway, eythay adhay osay arfay
urpassedsay emthay inway owerpay, atthay eythay oughtbray overway, omfray ethay Aeduiway otay
emselvesthay, away argelay ortionpay ofway eirthay ependantsday andway eceivedray omfray emthay
ethay onssay ofway eirthay eadinglay enmay asway ostageshay, andway ompelledcay emthay otay earsway
inway eirthay ublicpay aracterchay atthay eythay ouldway enterway intoway onay esignday againstway
emthay; andway eldhay away ortionpay ofway ethay eighbouringnay andlay, eizedsay onway ybay orcefay,
andway ossessedpay ethay overeigntysay ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay. Ivitiacusday urgedway ybay
isthay ecessitynay, adhay oceededpray otay Omeray otay ethay enatesay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway
entreatingway assistanceway, andway adhay eturnedray ithoutway accomplishingway ishay
objectway. Away angechay ofway affairsway ensuedway onway ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay, ethay
ostageshay ereway eturnedray otay ethay Aeduiway, eirthay oldway ependenciesday estoredray,
andway ewnay acquiredway oughthray Aesarcay ecausebay osethay owhay adhay attachedway
emselvesthay otay eirthay allianceway awsay atthay eythay enjoyedway away etterbay atestay andway away
ildermay overnmentgay, eirthay otherway interestsway, eirthay influenceway, eirthay
eputationray ereway ikewiselay increasedway, andway inway onsequencecay, ethay Equanisay ostlay
ethay overeigntysay. Ethay Emiray ucceededsay otay eirthay aceplay, andway, asway itway asway
erceivedpay atthay eythay equalledway ethay Aeduiway inway avourfay ithway Aesarcay, osethay, owhay
onway accountway ofway eirthay oldway animositiesway ouldcay ybay onay eansmay oalescecay ithway ethay
Aeduiway, onsignedcay emselvesthay inway ientshipclay otay ethay Emiray. Ethay atterlay
arefullycay otectedpray emthay. Usthay eythay ossessedpay othbay away ewnay andway uddenlysay
acquiredway influenceway. Affairsway ereway enthay inway atthay ositionpay, atthay ethay Aeduiway
ereway onsideredcay ybay arfay ethay eadinglay eoplepay, andway ethay Emiray eldhay ethay econdsay
ostpay ofway onourhay.

Iiixay.Oughoutthray allway Aulgay erethay areway otway ordersway ofway osethay enmay owhay areway ofway
anyway ankray andway ignityday orfay ethay ommonalitycay isway eldhay almostway inway ethay
onditioncay ofway avesslay, andway aresday otay undertakeway othingnay ofway itselfway andway isway
admittedway otay onay eliberationday. Ethay eatergray artpay, enwhay eythay areway essedpray
eitherway ybay ebtday, orway ethay argelay amountway ofway eirthay ibutestray, orway ethay oppressionway
ofway ethay oremay owerfulpay, ivegay emselvesthay upway inway assalagevay otay ethay oblesnay, owhay
ossesspay overway emthay ethay amesay ightsray ithoutway exceptionway asway astersmay overway
eirthay avesslay. Utbay ofway esethay otway ordersway, oneway isway atthay ofway ethay Uidsdray, ethay
otherway atthay ofway ethay ightsknay. Ethay ormerfay areway engagedway inway ingsthay acredsay,
onductcay ethay ublicpay andway ethay ivatepray acrificessay, andway interpretway allway attersmay
ofway eligionray. Otay esethay away argelay umbernay ofway ethay oungyay enmay esortray orfay ethay
urposepay ofway instructionway, andway eythay ethay Uidsdray areway inway eatgray onourhay amongway
emthay. Orfay eythay etermineday espectingray almostway allway ontroversiescay, ublicpay andway
ivatepray; andway ifway anyway imecray ashay eenbay erpetratedpay, ifway urdermay ashay eenbay
ommittedcay, ifway erethay ebay anyway isputeday aboutway anway inheritanceway, ifway anyway aboutway
oundariesbay, esethay amesay ersonspay ecideday itway; eythay ecreeday ewardsray andway
unishmentspay ifway anyway oneway, eitherway inway away ivatepray orway ublicpay apacitycay, ashay otnay
ubmittedsay otay eirthay ecisionday, eythay interdictway imhay omfray ethay acrificessay.
Isthay amongway emthay isway ethay ostmay eavyhay unishmentpay. Osethay owhay avehay eenbay usthay
interdictedway areway esteemedway inway ethay umbernay ofway ethay impiousway andway ethay iminalcray
allway unshay emthay, andway avoidway eirthay ocietysay andway onversationcay, estlay eythay
eceiveray omesay evilway omfray eirthay ontactcay; ornay isway usticejay administeredway otay
emthay enwhay eekingsay itway, ornay isway anyway ignityday estowedbay onway emthay. Overway allway
esethay Uidsdray oneway esidespray, owhay ossessespay upremesay authorityway amongway emthay.
Uponway ishay eathday, ifway anyway individualway amongway ethay estray isway eprayeminentway inway
ignityday, ehay ucceedssay; utbay, ifway erethay areway anymay equalway, ethay electionway isway ademay
ybay ethay uffragessay ofway ethay Uidsdray; ometimessay eythay evenway ontendcay orfay ethay
esidencypray ithway armsway. Esethay assembleway atway away ixedfay eriodpay ofway ethay earyay inway away
onsecratedcay aceplay inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Arnutescay, ichwhay isway eckonedray
ethay entralcay egionray ofway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay. Itherhay allway, owhay avehay isputesday,
assembleway omfray everyway artpay, andway ubmitsay otay eirthay ecreesday andway
eterminationsday. Isthay institutionway isway upposedsay otay avehay eenbay evisedday inway
Itainbray, andway otay avehay eenbay oughtbray overway omfray itway intoway Aulgay; andway ownay osethay
owhay esireday otay aingay away oremay accurateway owledgeknay ofway atthay temsysay enerallygay
oceedpray itherthay orfay ethay urposepay ofway udyingstay itway.

Ivxay.Ethay Uidsdray oday otnay ogay otay arway, ornay aypay ibutetray ogethertay ithway ethay
estray; eythay avehay anway exemptionway omfray ilitarymay ervicesay andway away ispensationday inway
allway attersmay. Inducedway ybay uchsay eatgray advantagesway, anymay embraceway isthay
ofessionpray ofway eirthay ownway accordway, andway anymay areway entsay otay itway ybay eirthay
arentspay andway elationsray. Eythay areway aidsay erethay otay earnlay ybay earthay away eatgray
umbernay ofway ersesvay; accordinglyway omesay emainray inway ethay oursecay ofway ainingtray
entytway earsyay. Ornay oday eythay egardray itway awfullay otay ommitcay esethay otay itingwray,
oughthay inway almostway allway otherway attersmay, inway eirthay ublicpay andway ivatepray
ansactionstray, eythay useway Eekgray aracterschay. Atthay acticepray eythay eemsay otay emay
otay avehay adoptedway orfay otway easonsray; ecausebay eythay eithernay esireday eirthay
octrinesday otay ebay ivulgedday amongway ethay assmay ofway ethay eoplepay, ornay osethay owhay
earnlay, otay evoteday emselvesthay ethay esslay otay ethay effortsway ofway emorymay, elyingray
onway itingwray; incesay itway enerallygay occursway otay ostmay enmay, atthay, inway eirthay
ependenceday onway itingwray, eythay elaxray eirthay iligenceday inway earninglay
oroughlythay, andway eirthay employmentway ofway ethay emorymay. Eythay ishway otay inculcateway
isthay asway oneway ofway eirthay eadinglay enetstay, atthay oulssay oday otnay ecomebay extinctway,
utbay asspay afterway eathday omfray oneway odybay otay anotherway, andway eythay inkthay atthay enmay
ybay isthay enettay areway inway away eatgray egreeday excitedway otay alourvay, ethay earfay ofway eathday
eingbay isregardedday. Eythay ikewiselay iscussday andway impartway otay ethay outhyay anymay
ingsthay espectingray ethay arsstay andway eirthay otionmay, espectingray ethay extentway ofway
ethay orldway andway ofway ourway earthway, espectingray ethay aturenay ofway ingsthay, espectingray
ethay owerpay andway ethay ajestymay ofway ethay immortalway odsgay.

Vxay.Ethay otherway orderway isway atthay ofway ethay ightsknay. Esethay, enwhay erethay isway
occasionway andway anyway arway occursway ichwhay eforebay Aesar'scay arrivalway asway orfay ethay
ostmay artpay ontway otay appenhay everyway earyay, asway eitherway eythay onway eirthay artpay ereway
inflictingway injuriesway orway epellingray osethay ichwhay othersway inflictedway onway emthay,
areway allway engagedway inway arway. Andway osethay ofway emthay ostmay istinguishedday ybay irthbay
andway esourcesray, avehay ethay eatestgray umbernay ofway assalsvay andway ependantsday aboutway
emthay. Eythay acknowledgeway isthay ortsay ofway influenceway andway owerpay onlyway.

Ixvay.Ethay ationnay ofway allway ethay Aulsgay isway extremelyway evotedday otay uperstitioussay
itesray; andway onway atthay accountway eythay owhay areway oubledtray ithway unusuallyway everesay
iseasesday andway eythay owhay areway engagedway inway attlesbay andway angersday, eitherway
acrificesay enmay asway ictimsvay, orway owvay atthay eythay illway acrificesay emthay, andway
employway ethay Uidsdray asway ethay erformerspay ofway osethay acrificessay; ecausebay eythay
inkthay atthay unlessway ethay ifelay ofway away anmay ebay offeredway orfay ethay ifelay ofway away anmay,
ethay indmay ofway ethay immortalway odsgay annotcay ebay enderedray opitiouspray, andway eythay
avehay acrificessay ofway atthay indkay ordainedway orfay ationalnay urposespay. Othersway avehay
iguresfay ofway astvay izesay, ethay imbslay ofway ichwhay ormedfay ofway osiersway eythay illfay ithway
ivinglay enmay, ichwhay eingbay etsay onway irefay, ethay enmay erishpay envelopedway inway ethay
amesflay. Eythay onsidercay atthay ethay oblationway ofway uchsay asway avehay eenbay akentay inway
eftthay, orway inway obberyray, orway anyway otherway offenceway, isway oremay acceptableway otay ethay
immortalway odsgay; utbay enwhay away upplysay ofway atthay assclay isway antingway, eythay avehay
ecourseray otay ethay oblationway ofway evenway ethay innocentway.

Iixvay.Eythay orshipway asway eirthay ivinityday, Ercurymay inway articularpay, andway avehay
anymay imagesway ofway imhay, andway egardray imhay asway ethay inventorway ofway allway artsway, eythay
onsidercay imhay, ethay uidegay ofway eirthay ourneysjay andway archesmay, andway elievebay imhay
otay avehay eryvay eatgray influenceway overway ethay acquisitionway ofway aingay andway ercantilemay
ansactionstray. Extnay otay imhay eythay orshipway Apolloway, andway Arsmay, andway Upiterjay,
andway Inervamay; espectingray esethay eitiesday eythay avehay orfay ethay ostmay artpay ethay
amesay eliefbay asway otherway ationsnay atthay Apolloway avertsway iseasesday, atthay Inervamay
impartsway ethay inventionway ofway anufacturesmay, atthay Upiterjay ossessespay ethay
overeigntysay ofway ethay eavenlyhay owerspay; atthay Arsmay esidespray overway arsway. Otay imhay
enwhay eythay avehay eterminedday otay engageway inway attlebay, eythay ommonlycay owvay osethay
ingsthay eythay allshay aketay inway arway. Enwhay eythay avehay onqueredcay, eythay acrificesay
ateverwhay apturedcay animalsway aymay avehay urvivedsay ethay onflictcay, andway ollectcay
ethay otherway ingsthay intoway oneway aceplay. Inway anymay atesstay ouyay aymay eesay ilespay ofway
esethay ingsthay eapedhay upway inway eirthay onsecratedcay otsspay; ornay oesday itway oftenway
appenhay atthay anyway oneway, isregardingday ethay anctitysay ofway ethay asecay, aresday eitherway
otay ecretesay inway ishay ousehay ingsthay apturedcay, orway aketay awayway osethay epositedday;
andway ethay ostmay everesay unishmentpay, ithway orturetay, ashay eenbay establishedway orfay
uchsay away eedday.

Iiixvay.Allway ethay Aulsgay assertway atthay eythay areway escendedday omfray ethay odgay Isday,
andway aysay atthay isthay aditiontray ashay eenbay andedhay ownday ybay ethay Uidsdray. Orfay atthay
easonray eythay omputecay ethay ivisionsday ofway everyway easonsay, otnay ybay ethay umbernay ofway
aysday, utbay ofway ightsnay; eythay eepkay irthdaysbay andway ethay eginningsbay ofway onthsmay
andway earsyay inway uchsay anway orderway atthay ethay ayday ollowsfay ethay ightnay. Amongway ethay
otherway usagesway ofway eirthay ifelay, eythay ifferday inway isthay omfray almostway allway otherway
ationsnay, atthay eythay oday otnay ermitpay eirthay ildrenchay otay approachway emthay openlyway
untilway eythay areway owngray upway osay asway otay ebay ableway otay earbay ethay ervicesay ofway arway; andway
eythay egardray itway asway indecorousway orfay away onsay ofway oyishbay ageway otay andstay inway ublicpay
inway ethay esencepray ofway ishay atherfay.

Ixxay.Ateverwhay umssay ofway oneymay ethay usbandshay avehay eceivedray inway ethay amenay ofway
owryday omfray eirthay ivesway, akingmay anway estimateway ofway itway, eythay addway ethay amesay
amountway outway ofway eirthay ownway estatesway. Anway accountway isway eptkay ofway allway isthay oneymay
onjointlycay, andway ethay ofitspray areway aidlay ybay icheverwhay ofway emthay allshay avehay
urvivedsay ethay otherway, otay atthay oneway ethay ortionpay ofway othbay evertsray, ogethertay
ithway ethay ofitspray ofway ethay eviouspray imetay. Usbandshay avehay owerpay ofway ifelay andway
eathday overway eirthay ivesway asway ellway asway overway eirthay ildrenchay andway enwhay ethay
atherfay ofway away amilyfay, ornbay inway away oremay anthay ommonlycay istinguishedday ankray, ashay
iedday, ishay elationsray assembleway, andway, ifway ethay ircumstancescay ofway ishay eathday areway
uspicioussay, oldhay anway investigationway uponway ethay ivesway inway ethay annermay adoptedway
owardstay avesslay; andway ifway oofpray ebay obtainedway, utpay emthay otay everesay orturetay,
andway illkay emthay. Eirthay uneralsfay, onsideringcay ethay atestay ofway ivilizationcay
amongway ethay Aulsgay, areway agnificentmay andway ostlycay; andway eythay astcay intoway ethay irefay
allway ingsthay, includingway ivinglay eaturescray, ichwhay eythay upposesay otay avehay eenbay
earday otay emthay enwhay aliveway; andway, away ittlelay eforebay isthay eriodpay, avesslay andway
ependantsday, owhay ereway ascertainedway otay avehay eenbay elovedbay ybay emthay, ereway,
afterway ethay egularray uneralfay itesray ereway ompletedcay, urntbay ogethertay ithway
emthay.

Xxay.Osethay atesstay ichwhay areway onsideredcay otay onductcay eirthay ommonwealthcay
oremay udiciouslyjay, avehay itway ordainedway ybay eirthay awslay, atthay, ifway anyway ersonpay
allshay avehay eardhay ybay umourray andway eportray omfray ishay eighboursnay anythingway
oncerningcay ethay ommonwealthcay, ehay allshay onveycay itway otay ethay agistratemay andway
otnay impartway itway otay anyway otherway; ecausebay itway ashay eenbay iscoveredday atthay
inconsiderateway andway inexperiencedway enmay ereway oftenway alarmedway ybay alsefay eportsray
andway ivendray otay omesay ashray actway, orway elseway ooktay astyhay easuresmay inway affairsway ofway
ethay ighesthay importanceway. Ethay agistratesmay oncealcay osethay ingsthay ichwhay
equireray otay ebay eptkay unknownway; andway eythay iscloseday otay ethay eoplepay ateverwhay
eythay etermineday otay ebay expedientway. Itway isway otnay awfullay otay eakspay ofway ethay
ommonwealthcay, exceptway inway ouncilcay.

Ixxay.Ethay Ermansgay ifferday uchmay omfray esethay usagesway, orfay eythay avehay eithernay
Uidsdray otay esidepray overway acredsay officesway, ornay oday eythay aypay eatgray egardray otay
acrificessay. Eythay ankray inway ethay umbernay ofway ethay odsgay osethay aloneway omwhay eythay
eholdbay, andway ybay osewhay instrumentalityway eythay areway obviouslyway enefitedbay,
amelynay, ethay unsay, irefay, andway ethay oonmay; eythay avehay otnay eardhay ofway ethay otherway
eitiesday evenway ybay eportray. Eirthay olewhay ifelay isway occupiedway inway untinghay andway inway
ethay ursuitspay ofway ethay ilitarymay artway; omfray ildhoodchay eythay evoteday emselvesthay
otay atiguefay andway ardshipshay. Osethay owhay avehay emainedray astechay orfay ethay ongestlay
imetay, eceiveray ethay eatestgray ommendationcay amongway eirthay eoplepay eythay inkthay
atthay ybay isthay ethay owthgray isway omotedpray, ybay isthay ethay sicalphyay owerspay areway
increasedway andway ethay inewssay areway engthenedstray. Andway otay avehay adhay owledgeknay ofway
away omanway eforebay ethay entiethtway earyay eythay eckonray amongway ethay ostmay isgracefulday
actsway; ofway ichwhay attermay erethay isway onay oncealmentcay, ecausebay eythay athebay
omiscuouslypray inway ethay iversray andway onlyway useway insskay orway allsmay oaksclay ofway
eers'day ideshay, away argelay ortionpay ofway ethay odybay eingbay inway onsequencecay akednay.

Iixxay.Eythay oday otnay aypay uchmay attentionway otay agricultureway, andway away argelay
ortionpay ofway eirthay oodfay onsistscay inway ilkmay, eesechay, andway eshflay; ornay ashay anyway
oneway away ixedfay uantityqay ofway andlay orway ishay ownway individualway imitslay; utbay ethay
agistratesmay andway ethay eadinglay enmay eachway earyay apportionway otay ethay ibestray andway
amiliesfay, owhay avehay unitedway ogethertay, asway uchmay andlay asway, andway inway ethay aceplay inway
ichwhay, eythay inkthay operpray, andway ethay earyay afterway ompelcay emthay otay emoveray
elsewhereway. Orfay isthay enactmentway eythay advanceway anymay easonsrayestlay educedsay ybay
onglayontinuedcay ustomcay, eythay aymay exchangeway eirthay ardourway inway ethay agingway ofway
arway orfay agricultureway; estlay eythay aymay ebay anxiousway otay acquireway extensiveway
estatesway, andway ethay oremay owerfulpay ivedray ethay eakerway omfray eirthay ossessionspay;
estlay eythay onstructcay eirthay ouseshay ithway ootay eatgray away esireday otay avoidway oldcay
andway eathay; estlay ethay esireday ofway ealthway ingspray upway, omfray ichwhay ausecay
ivisionsday andway iscordsday ariseway; andway atthay eythay aymay eepkay ethay ommoncay eoplepay
inway away ontentedcay atestay ofway indmay, enwhay eachway eessay ishay ownway eansmay acedplay onway anway
equalityway ithway osethay ofway ethay ostmay owerfulpay.

Iiixxay.Itway isway ethay eatestgray oryglay otay ethay everalsay atesstay otay avehay asway ideway
esertsday asway ossiblepay aroundway emthay, eirthay ontiersfray avinghay eenbay aidlay asteway.
Eythay onsidercay isthay ethay ealray evidenceway ofway eirthay owesspray, atthay eirthay
eighboursnay allshay ebay ivendray outway ofway eirthay andslay andway abandonway emthay, andway atthay
onay oneway areday ettlesay earnay emthay; atway ethay amesay imetay eythay inkthay atthay eythay
allshay ebay onway atthay accountway ethay oremay ecuresay, ecausebay eythay avehay emovedray ethay
apprehensionway ofway away uddensay incursionway. Enwhay away atestay eitherway epelsray arway agedway
againstway itway, orway agesway itway againstway anotherway, agistratesmay areway osenchay otay
esidepray overway atthay arway ithway uchsay authorityway, atthay eythay avehay owerpay ofway ifelay
andway eathday. Inway eacepay erethay isway onay ommoncay agistratemay, utbay ethay iefschay ofway
ovincespray andway antonscay administerway usticejay andway etermineday ontroversiescay
amongway eirthay ownway eoplepay. Obberiesray ichwhay areway ommittedcay eyondbay ethay
oundariesbay ofway eachway atestay earbay onay infamyway, andway eythay avowway atthay esethay areway
ommittedcay orfay ethay urposepay ofway iscipliningday eirthay outhyay andway ofway eventingpray
othslay. Andway enwhay anyway ofway eirthay iefschay ashay aidsay inway anway assemblyway atthay ehay
illway ebay eirthay eaderlay, etlay osethay owhay areway illingway otay ollowfay, ivegay inway eirthay
amesnay; eythay owhay approveway ofway othbay ethay enterpriseway andway ethay anmay ariseway andway
omisepray eirthay assistanceway andway areway applaudedway ybay ethay eoplepay; uchsay ofway emthay
asway avehay otnay ollowedfay imhay areway accountedway inway ethay umbernay ofway esertersday andway
aitorstray, andway onfidencecay inway allway attersmay isway afterwardsway efusedray emthay. Otay
injureway uestsgay eythay egardray asway impiousway; eythay efendday omfray ongwray osethay owhay
avehay omecay otay emthay orfay anyway urposepay ateverwhay, andway esteemway emthay inviolableway;
otay emthay ethay ouseshay ofway allway areway openway andway aintenancemay isway eelyfray uppliedsay.

Ivxxay.Andway erethay asway ormerlyfay away imetay enwhay ethay Aulsgay excelledway ethay Ermansgay
inway owesspray, andway agedway arway onway emthay offensivelyway, andway, onway accountway ofway ethay
eatgray umbernay ofway eirthay eoplepay andway ethay insufficiencyway ofway eirthay andlay, entsay
oloniescay overway ethay Inerhay. Accordinglyway, ethay Olcaevay Ectosagestay eizedsay onway
osethay artspay ofway Ermanygay ichwhay areway ethay ostmay uitfulfray andway ielay aroundway ethay
Ercynianhay orestfay ichwhay, Iway erceivepay, asway ownknay ybay eportray otay Eratosthenesway
andway omesay otherway Eeksgray, andway ichwhay eythay allcay Orcyniaway andway ettledsay erethay.
Ichwhay ationnay otay isthay imetay etainsray itsway ositionpay inway osethay ettlementssay, andway
ashay away eryvay ighhay aracterchay orfay usticejay andway ilitarymay eritmay ownay alsoway eythay
ontinuecay inway ethay amesay arcityscay, indigenceway, ardihoodhay, asway ethay Ermansgay, andway
useway ethay amesay oodfay andway essdray; utbay eirthay oximitypray otay ethay Ovincepray andway
owledgeknay ofway ommoditiescay omfray ountriescay eyondbay ethay easay uppliessay otay ethay
Aulsgay anymay ingsthay endingtay otay uxurylay asway ellway asway ivilizationcay. Accustomedway
ybay egreesday otay ebay overmatchedway andway orstedway inway anymay engagementsway, eythay oday
otnay evenway omparecay emselvesthay otay ethay Ermansgay inway owesspray.

Xxvay.Ethay eadthbray ofway isthay Ercynianhay orestfay, ichwhay ashay eenbay eferredray otay
aboveway, isway otay away uickqay avellertray, away ourneyjay ofway inenay aysday. Orfay itway annotcay ebay
otherwiseway omputedcay, ornay areway eythay acquaintedway ithway ethay easuresmay ofway oadsray.
Itway eginsbay atway ethay ontiersfray ofway ethay Elvetiihay, Emetesnay, andway Auraciray, andway
extendsway inway away ightray inelay alongway ethay iverray Anubeday otay ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Aciday andway ethay Anartesway itway endsbay encethay otay ethay eftlay inway away ifferentday
irectionday omfray ethay iverray, andway owingway otay itsway extentway ouchestay ethay onfinescay
ofway anymay ationsnay; ornay isway erethay anyway ersonpay elongingbay otay isthay artpay ofway
Ermanygay owhay ayssay atthay ehay eitherway ashay onegay otay ethay extremityway ofway atthay
orestfay, oughthay ehay adhay advancedway away ourneyjay ofway ixtysay aysday, orway ashay eardhay inway
atwhay aceplay itway eginsbay. Itway isway ertaincay atthay anymay indskay ofway ildway eastsbay areway
oducedpray inway itway ichwhay avehay otnay eenbay eensay inway otherway artspay; ofway ichwhay ethay
ollowingfay areway uchsay asway ifferday incipallypray omfray otherway animalsway, andway appearway
orthyway ofway eingbay ommittedcay otay ecordray.

Ixxvay.Erethay isway anway oxway ofway ethay apeshay ofway away agstay, etweenbay osewhay earsway away ornhay
isesray omfray ethay iddlemay ofway ethay oreheadfay, igherhay andway aighterstray anthay osethay
ornshay ichwhay areway ownknay otay usway. Omfray ethay optay ofway isthay, anchesbray, ikelay almspay;
etchstray outway away onsiderablecay istanceday. Ethay apeshay ofway ethay emalefay andway ofway ethay
alemay isway ethay amesay; ethay appearanceway andway ethay izesay ofway ethay ornshay isway ethay amesay.

Iixxvay.Erethay areway alsoway animalsway ichwhay areway alledcay elksway. Ethay apeshay ofway
esethay, andway ethay ariedvay olourcay ofway eirthay insskay, isway uchmay ikelay oesray, utbay inway
izesay eythay urpasssay emthay away ittlelay andway areway estituteday ofway ornshay, andway avehay
egslay ithoutway ointsjay andway igatureslay; ornay oday eythay ielay ownday orfay ethay urposepay
ofway estray, ornay, ifway eythay avehay eenbay ownthray ownday ybay anyway accidentway, ancay eythay
aiseray orway iftlay emselvesthay upway. Eestray ervesay asway edsbay otay emthay; eythay eanlay
emselvesthay againstway emthay, andway usthay ecliningray onlyway ightlyslay, eythay aketay
eirthay estray; enwhay ethay untsmenhay avehay iscoveredday omfray ethay ootstepsfay ofway
esethay animalsway itherwhay eythay areway accustomedway otay etakebay emselvesthay, eythay
eitherway undermineway allway ethay eestray atway ethay ootsray, orway utcay intoway emthay osay arfay
atthay ethay upperway artpay ofway ethay eestray aymay appearway otay ebay eftlay andingstay. Enwhay
eythay avehay eantlay uponway emthay, accordingway otay eirthay abithay, eythay ockknay ownday ybay
eirthay eightway ethay unsupportedway eestray, andway allfay ownday emselvesthay alongway ithway
emthay.

Iiixxvay.Erethay isway away irdthay indkay, onsistingcay ofway osethay animalsway ichwhay areway
alledcay uriway. Esethay areway away ittlelay elowbay ethay elephantway inway izesay, andway ofway ethay
appearanceway, olourcay, andway apeshay ofway away ullbay. Eirthay engthstray andway eedspay areway
extraordinaryway; eythay arespay eithernay anmay ornay ildway eastbay ichwhay eythay avehay
espiedway. Esethay ethay Ermansgay aketay ithway uchmay ainspay inway itspay andway illkay emthay.
Ethay oungyay enmay ardenhay emselvesthay ithway isthay exerciseway, andway acticepray
emselvesthay inway isthay indkay ofway untinghay, andway osethay owhay avehay ainslay ethay
eatestgray umbernay ofway emthay, avinghay oducedpray ethay ornshay inway ublicpay, otay ervesay
asway evidenceway, eceiveray eatgray aisepray. Utbay otnay evenway enwhay akentay eryvay oungyay
ancay eythay ebay enderedray amiliarfay otay enmay andway amedtay. Ethay izesay, apeshay, andway
appearanceway ofway eirthay ornshay ifferday uchmay omfray ethay ornshay ofway ourway oxenway. Esethay
eythay anxiouslyway eeksay afterway, andway indbay atway ethay ipstay ithway ilversay, andway useway asway
upscay atway eirthay ostmay umptuoussay entertainmentsway.

Ixxxay.Aesarcay, afterway ehay iscoveredday oughthray ethay Ubianway outsscay atthay ethay
Uevisay adhay etiredray intoway eirthay oodsway, apprehendingway away arcityscay ofway orncay,
ecausebay, asway eway avehay observedway aboveway, allway ethay Ermansgay aypay eryvay ittlelay
attentionway otay agricultureway, esolvedray otnay otay oceedpray anyway artherfay; utbay, atthay
ehay ightmay otnay altogetherway elieveray ethay arbariansbay omfray ethay earfay ofway ishay
eturnray, andway atthay ehay ightmay elayday eirthay uccourssay, avinghay edlay ackbay ishay
armyway, ehay eaksbray ownday, otay ethay engthlay ofway 200 eetfay, ethay artherfay endway ofway ethay
idgebray, ichwhay oinedjay ethay anksbay ofway ethay Ubiiway, andway, atway ethay extremityway ofway ethay
idgebray aisesray owerstay ofway ourfay oriesstay, andway ationsstay away uardgay ofway elvetway
ohortscay orfay ethay urposepay ofway efendingday ethay idgebray, andway engthensstray ethay
aceplay ithway onsiderablecay ortificationsfay. Overway atthay ortfay andway uardgay ehay
appointedway . Olcatiusvay Ullustay, away oungyay anmay; ehay imselfhay, enwhay ethay orncay
eganbay otay ipenray, avinghay etsay orthfay orfay ethay arway ithway 40 Ambiorixway oughthray
ethay orestfay Arduennaway, ichwhay isway ethay argestlay ofway allway Aulgay, andway eachesray omfray
ethay anksbay ofway ethay Inerhay andway ethay ontiersfray ofway ethay Eviritray otay osethay ofway ethay
Erviinay, andway extendsway overway oremay anthay 500 ilesmay, ehay endssay orwardfay .
Inuciusmay Asilusbay ithway allway ethay avalrycay, otay tryay ifway ehay ightmay aingay anyway
advantageway ybay apidray archesmay andway ethay advantageway ofway imetay, ehay arnsway imhay otay
orbidfay iresfay eingbay ademay inway ethay ampcay, estlay anyway indicationway ofway ishay approachway
ebay ivengay atway away istanceday ehay ellstay imhay atthay ehay illway ollowfay immediatelyway.

Xxxay.Asilusbay oesday asway ehay asway ommandedcay; avinghay erformedpay ishay archmay
apidlyray, andway evenway urpassedsay ethay expectationsway ofway allway, ehay urprisessay inway ethay
ieldsfay anymay otnay expectingway imhay; oughthray eirthay informationway ehay advancesway
owardstay Ambiorixway imselfhay, otay ethay aceplay inway ichwhay ehay asway aidsay otay ebay ithway away
ewfay orsehay. Ortunefay accomplishesway uchmay, otnay onlyway inway otherway attersmay, utbay
alsoway inway ethay artway ofway arway. Orfay asway itway appenedhay ybay away emarkableray ancechay, atthay
ehay ellfay uponway Ambiorixway imselfhay unguardedway andway unpreparedway, andway atthay ishay
arrivalway asway eensay ybay ethay eoplepay eforebay ethay eportray orway informationway ofway ishay
arrivalway asway arriedcay itherthay; osay itway asway anway incidentway ofway extraordinaryway
ortunefay atthay, althoughway everyway implementway ofway arway ichwhay ehay asway accustomedway otay
avehay aboutway imhay asway eizedsay, andway ishay ariotschay andway orseshay urprisedsay, etyay ehay
imselfhay escapedway eathday. Utbay itway asway effectedway owingway otay isthay ircumstancecay,
atthay ishay ousehay eingbay urroundedsay ybay away oodway, asway areway enerallygay ethay
ellingsdway ofway ethay Aulsgay, owhay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway avoidingway eathay, ostlymay
eeksay ethay eighbourhoodnay ofway oodsway andway iversray ishay attendantsway andway iendsfray
inway away arrownay otspay ustainedsay orfay away ortshay imetay ethay attackway ofway ourway orsehay.
Ilewhay eythay ereway ightingfay, oneway ofway ishay ollowersfay ountedmay imhay onway away orsehay
ethay oodsway elteredshay imhay asway ehay edflay. Usthay ortunefay endedtay uchmay othbay
owardstay ishay encounteringway andway ishay escapingway angerday.

Ixxxay.Etherwhay Ambiorixway idday otnay ollectcay ishay orcesfay omfray oolcay
eliberationday, ecausebay ehay onsideredcay ehay oughtway otnay otay engageway inway away attlebay,
orway etherwhay ehay asway ebarredday ybay imetay andway eventedpray ybay ethay uddensay arrivalway
ofway ourway orsehay, enwhay ehay upposedsay ethay estray ofway ethay armyway asway oselyclay
ollowingfay, isway oubtfulday; utbay ertainlycay, espatchingday essengersmay oughthray
ethay ountrycay, ehay orderedway everyway oneway otay ovidepray orfay imselfhay; andway away artpay ofway
emthay edflay intoway ethay orestfay Arduennaway, away artpay intoway ethay extensiveway orassesmay;
osethay owhay ereway earestnay ethay oceanway, oncealedcay emselvesthay inway ethay islandsway
ichwhay ethay idestay usuallyway ormfay; anymay, epartingday omfray eirthay erritoriestay,
ommittedcay emselvesthay andway allway eirthay ossessionspay otay erfectpay angersstray.
Ativolcuscay, ingkay ofway onewayalfhay ofway ethay Eburonesway, owhay adhay enteredway intoway ethay
esignday ogethertay ithway Ambiorixway, incesay, eingbay ownay ornway outway ybay ageway, ehay asway
unableway otay endureway ethay atiguefay eitherway ofway arway orway ightflay, avinghay ursedcay
Ambiorixway ithway everyway imprecationway, asway ethay ersonpay owhay adhay eenbay ethay
ontrivercay ofway atthay easuremay, estroyedday imselfhay ithway ethay uicejay ofway ethay ewyay
eetray, ofway ichwhay erethay isway away eatgray abundanceway inway Aulgay andway Ermanygay.

Iixxxay.Ethay Eguisay andway Ondrusicay, ofway ethay ationnay andway umbernay ofway ethay Ermansgay,
andway owhay areway etweenbay ethay Eburonesway andway ethay Eviritray, entsay ambassadorsway otay
Aesarcay otay entreatway atthay ehay ouldway otnay egardray emthay inway ethay umbernay ofway ishay
enemiesway, ornay onsidercay atthay ethay ausecay ofway allway ethay Ermansgay onway isthay idesay ethay
Inerhay asway oneway andway ethay amesay; atthay eythay adhay ormedfay onay ansplay ofway arway, andway
adhay entsay onay auxiliariesway otay Ambiorixway. Aesarcay, avinghay ascertainedway isthay
actfay ybay anway examinationway ofway ishay isonerspray ommandedcay atthay ifway anyway ofway ethay
Eburonesway inway eirthay ightflay adhay epairedray otay emthay, eythay ouldshay ebay entsay ackbay
otay imhay; ehay assuresway emthay atthay ifway eythay idday atthay, ehay illway otnay injureway eirthay
erritoriestay. Enthay, avinghay ividedday ishay orcesfay intoway eethray artspay, ehay entsay
ethay aggagebay ofway allway ethay egionslay otay Aduatucaway. Atthay isway ethay amenay ofway away ortfay.
Isthay isway earlynay inway ethay iddlemay ofway ethay Eburonesway, erewhay Ituriustay andway
Aurunculeiusway adhay eenbay uarteredqay orfay ethay urposepay ofway interingway. Isthay aceplay
ehay electedsay asway ellway onway otherway accountsway asway ecausebay ethay ortificationsfay ofway
ethay eviouspray earyay emainedray, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay elieveray ethay abourlay ofway
ethay oldierssay. Ehay eftlay ethay ourteenthfay egionlay asway away uardgay orfay ethay aggagebay,
oneway ofway osethay eethray ichwhay ehay adhay atelylay aisedray inway Italyway andway oughtbray overway.
Overway atthay egionlay andway ampcay ehay acesplay . Ulliustay Icerocay andway ivesgay imhay 200
orsehay.
