Iiixxxay.Avinghay ividedday ethay armyway, ehay ordersway . Abienuslay otay oceedpray ithway
eethray egionslay owardstay ethay oceanway intoway osethay artspay ichwhay orderbay onway ethay
Enappiimay; ehay endssay . Eboniustray ithway away ikelay umbernay ofway egionslay otay aylay
asteway atthay istrictday ichwhay ieslay ontiguouscay otay ethay Aduatuciway; ehay imselfhay
eterminesday otay ogay ithway ethay emainingray eethray otay ethay iverray Ambresay, ichwhay
owsflay intoway ethay Eusemay, andway otay ethay ostmay emoteray artspay ofway Arduennaway, itherwhay
ehay eardhay atthay Ambiorixway adhay onegay ithway away ewfay orsehay. Enwhay epartingday, ehay
omisespray atthay ehay illway eturnray eforebay ethay endway ofway ethay eventhsay ayday, onway ichwhay
ayday ehay asway awareway orncay asway ueday otay atthay egionlay ichwhay asway eingbay eftlay inway
arrisongay. Ehay irectsday Abienuslay andway Eboniustray otay eturnray ybay ethay amesay ayday,
ifway eythay ancay oday osay agreeablyway otay ethay interestsway ofway ethay epublicray; osay atthay
eirthay easuresmay avinghay eenbay utuallymay impartedway, andway ethay ansplay ofway ethay enemyway
avinghay eenbay iscoveredday, eythay ightmay ebay ableway otay ommencecay away ifferentday inelay
ofway operationsway.

Ivxxxay.Erethay asway, asway eway avehay aboveway observedway, onay egularray armyway, ornay away
owntay, ornay away arrisongay ichwhay ouldcay efendday itselfway ybay armsway; utbay ethay eoplepay
ereway atteredscay inway allway irectionsday. Erewhay eitherway away iddenhay alleyvay, orway away
oodyway otspay, orway away ifficultday orassmay urnishedfay anyway opehay ofway otectionpray orway ofway
ecuritysay otay anyway oneway, erethay ehay adhay ixedfay imselfhay. Esethay acesplay ereway ownknay
otay osethay atthay eltdway inway ethay eighbourhoodnay, andway ethay attermay emandedday eatgray
attentionway, otnay osay uchmay inway otectingpray ethay ainmay odybay ofway ethay armyway orfay onay
erilpay ouldcay occurway otay emthay altogetherway omfray osethay alarmedway andway atteredscay
oopstray, asway inway eservingpray individualway oldierssay; ichwhay inway omesay easuremay
endedtay otay ethay afetysay ofway ethay armyway. Orfay othbay ethay esireday ofway ootybay asway
eadinglay anymay ootay arfay, andway ethay oodsway ithway eirthay unknownway andway iddenhay outesray
ouldway otnay allowway emthay otay ogay inway argelay odiesbay. Ifway ehay esiredday ethay usinessbay
otay ebay ompletedcay andway ethay aceray ofway osethay infamousway eoplepay otay ebay utcay offway,
oremay odiesbay ofway enmay ustmay ebay entsay inway everalsay irectionsday andway ethay oldierssay
ustmay ebay etachedday onway allway idessay; ifway ehay ereway isposedday otay eepkay ethay ompaniescay
atway eirthay andardsstay, asway ethay establishedway isciplineday andway acticepray ofway ethay
Omanray armyway equiredray, ethay ituationsay itselfway asway away afeguardsay otay ethay
arbariansbay, ornay asway erethay antingway otay individualsway ethay aringday otay aylay
ecretsay ambuscadesway andway esetbay atteredscay oldierssay. Utbay amidstway ifficultiesday
ofway isthay aturenay asway arfay asway ecautionspray ouldcay ebay akentay ybay igilancevay, uchsay
ecautionspray ereway akentay; osay atthay omesay opportunitiesway ofway injuringway ethay enemyway
ereway eglectednay, oughthay ethay indsmay ofway allway ereway urningbay otay aketay evengeray,
atherray anthay atthay injuryway ouldshay ebay effectedway ithway anyway osslay otay ourway
oldierssay. Aesarcay espatchesday essengersmay otay ethay eighbouringnay atesstay; ybay
ethay opehay ofway ootybay ehay invitesway allway otay imhay, orfay ethay urposepay ofway underingplay
ethay Eburonesway, inway orderway atthay ethay ifelay ofway ethay Aulsgay ightmay ebay azardedhay inway
ethay oodsway atherray anthay ethay egionarylay oldierssay; atway ethay amesay imetay, inway orderway
atthay away argelay orcefay eingbay awndray aroundway emthay, ethay aceray andway amenay ofway atthay
atestay aymay ebay annihilatedway orfay uchsay away imecray. Away argelay umbernay omfray allway
uartersqay eedilyspay assemblesway.

Vxxxay.Esethay ingsthay ereway oinggay onway inway allway artspay ofway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay
Eburonesway, andway ethay eventhsay ayday asway awingdray earnay, ybay ichwhay ayday Aesarcay adhay
urposedpay otay eturnray otay ethay aggagebay andway ethay egionlay. Erehay itway ightmay ebay
earnedlay owhay uchmay ortunefay achievesway inway arway, andway owhay eatgray asualtiescay eshay
oducespray. Ethay enemyway avinghay eenbay atteredscay andway alarmedway, asway eway elatedray
aboveway, erethay asway onay orcefay ichwhay ightmay oducepray evenway away ightslay occasionway ofway
earfay. Ethay eportray extendsway eyondbay ethay Inerhay otay ethay Ermansgay atthay ethay
Eburonesway areway eingbay illagedpay, andway atthay allway ereway ithoutway istinctionday
invitedway otay ethay underplay. Ethay Igambrisay, owhay areway earestnay otay ethay Inerhay, ybay
omwhay, eway avehay entionedmay aboveway, ethay Enchtheritay andway Usipetesway ereway eceivedray
afterway eirthay etreatray, ollectcay 2000 orsehay; eythay osscray ethay Inerhay inway ipsshay
andway arksbay irtythay ilesmay elowbay atthay aceplay erewhay ethay idgebray asway entireway andway
ethay arrisongay eftlay ybay Aesarcay; eythay arriveway atway ethay ontiersfray ofway ethay
Eburonesway, urprisesay anymay owhay ereway atteredscay inway ightflay, andway etgay ossessionpay
ofway away argelay amountway ofway attlecay, ofway ichwhay arbariansbay areway extremelyway ovetouscay.
Alluredway ybay ootybay, eythay advanceway artherfay; eithernay orassmay ornay orestfay
obstructsway esethay enmay, ornbay amidstway arway andway epredationsday; eythay inquireway ofway
eirthay isonerspray inway atwhay artspay Aesarcay isway; eythay indfay atthay ehay ashay advancedway
artherfay, andway earnlay atthay allway ethay armyway ashay emovedray. Ereonthay oneway ofway ethay
isonerspray ayssay, Whyay oday ouyay ursuepay uchsay etchedwray andway iflingtray oilspay;
ouyay, otay omwhay itway isway antedgray otay ecomebay evenway ownay ostmay ichlyray endowedway ybay
ortunefay? Inway eethray ourshay ouyay ancay eachray Aduatucaway; erethay ethay Omanray armyway ashay
epositedday allway itsway ortunesfay; erethay isway osay ittlelay ofway away arrisongay atthay otnay
evenway ethay allway ancay ebay annedmay, ornay areday anyway oneway ogay eyondbay ethay
ortificationsfay. Away opehay avinghay eenbay esentedpray emthay, ethay Ermansgay eavelay inway
oncealmentcay ethay underplay eythay adhay acquiredway; eythay emselvesthay astenhay otay
Aduatucaway, employingway asway eirthay uidegay ethay amesay anmay ybay osewhay informationway
eythay adhay ecomebay informedway ofway esethay ingsthay.

Vixxxay.Icerocay, owhay uringday allway ethay oregoingfay aysday adhay eptkay ishay oldierssay
inway ampcay ithway ethay eatestgray exactnessway, andway agreeablyway otay ethay injunctionsway ofway
Aesarcay, adhay otnay ermittedpay evenway anyway ofway ethay ampcayollowersfay otay ogay eyondbay
ethay ortificationfay, istrustingday onway ethay eventhsay ayday atthay Aesarcay ouldway eepkay
ishay omisepray asway otay ethay umbernay ofway aysday, ecausebay ehay eardhay atthay ehay adhay
oceededpray artherfay, andway onay eportray asway otay ishay eturnray asway oughtbray otay imhay,
andway eingbay urgedway atway ethay amesay imetay ybay ethay expressionsway ofway osethay owhay alledcay
ishay olerancetay almostway away iegesay, ifway, orsoothfay, itway asway otnay ermittedpay emthay otay
ogay outway ofway ethay ampcay, incesay ehay ightmay expectway onay isasterday, erebywhay ehay ouldcay
ebay injuredway, ithinway eethray ilesmay ofway ethay ampcay, ilewhay inenay egionslay andway allway
ethay avalrycay ereway underway armsway, andway ethay enemyway atteredscay andway almostway
annihilatedway, entsay ivefay ohortscay intoway ethay eighbouringnay ornlandscay, etweenbay
ichwhay andway ethay ampcay onlyway oneway illhay intervenedway, orfay ethay urposepay ofway
oragingfay. Anymay oldierssay ofway ethay egionslay adhay eenbay eftlay invalidedway inway ethay
ampcay, ofway omwhay osethay owhay adhay ecoveredray inway isthay acespay ofway imetay, eingbay aboutway
300, areway etsay ogethertay underway oneway andardstay; away argelay umbernay ofway oldiers'say
attendantsway esidesbay, ithway away eatgray umbernay ofway eastsbay ofway urdenbay, ichwhay adhay
emainedray inway ethay ampcay, ermissionpay eingbay antedgray, ollowfay emthay.

Viixxxay.Atway isthay eryvay imetay, ethay Ermangay orsehay ybay ancechay omecay upway, andway
immediatelyway, ithway ethay amesay eedspay ithway ichwhay eythay adhay advancedway, attemptway
otay orcefay ethay ampcay atway ethay Ecumanday ategay, ornay ereway eythay eensay, inway
onsequencecay ofway oodsway inglyay inway ethay ayway onway atthay idesay, eforebay eythay ereway
ustjay eachingray ethay ampcay osay uchmay osay, atthay ethay utlerssay owhay adhay eirthay
oothsbay underway ethay ampartray adhay otnay anway opportunityway ofway etreatingray ithinway ethay
ampcay. Ourway enmay, otnay anticipatingway itway, areway erplexedpay ybay ethay uddensay affairway,
andway ethay ohortcay onway ethay outpostway arcelyscay ustainssay ethay irstfay attackway. Ethay
enemyway eadspray emselvesthay onway ethay otherway idessay otay ascertainway ifway eythay ouldcay
indfay anyway accessway. Ourway enmay ithway ifficultyday efendday ethay atesgay; ethay eryvay
ositionpay ofway itselfway andway ethay ortificationfay ecuressay ethay otherway accessesway.
Erethay isway away anicpay inway ethay entireway ampcay, andway oneway inquiresway ofway anotherway ethay
ausecay ofway ethay onfusioncay, ornay oday eythay eadilyray etermineday itherwhay ethay
andardsstay ouldshay ebay ornebay, ornay intoway atwhay uarterqay eachway ouldshay etakebay
imselfhay. Oneway avowsway atthay ethay ampcay isway alreadyway akentay, anotherway aintainsmay
atthay, ethay enemyway avinghay estroyedday ethay armyway andway ommandercayinwayiefchay, areway
omecay itherthay asway onquerorscay; ostmay ormfay angestray uperstitioussay anciesfay omfray
ethay otspay, andway aceplay eforebay eirthay eyesway ethay atastrophecay ofway Ottacay andway
Ituriustay, owhay adhay allenfay inway ethay amesay ortfay. Allway eingbay eatlygray
isconcertedday ybay isthay alarmway, ethay eliefbay ofway ethay arbariansbay isway engthenedstray
atthay erethay isway onay arrisongay ithinway, asway eythay adhay eardhay omfray eirthay isonerpray.
Eythay endeavourway otay orcefay anway entranceway andway encourageway oneway anotherway otnay otay
astcay omfray eirthay andshay osay aluablevay away izepray.

Viiixxxay.. Extiussay Aculusbay, owhay adhay edlay away incipalpray enturycay underway
Aesarcay ofway omwhay eway avehay ademay entionmay inway eviouspray engagementsway, adhay eenbay
eftlay anway invalidway inway ethay arrisongay, andway adhay ownay eenbay ivefay aysday ithoutway
oodfay. Ehay, istrustingday ishay ownway afetysay andway atthay ofway allway, oesgay orthfay omfray
ishay enttay unarmedway; ehay eessay atthay ethay enemyway areway oseclay atway andhay andway atthay ethay
attermay isway inway ethay utmostway angerday; ehay atchessnay armsway omfray osethay earestnay, andway
ationsstay imselfhay atway ethay ategay. Ethay enturionscay ofway atthay ohortcay ichwhay asway onway
uardgay ollowfay imhay; orfay away ortshay imetay eythay ustainsay ethay ightfay ogethertay.
Extiussay aintsfay, afterway eceivingray anymay oundsway; ehay isway ithway ifficultyday
avedsay, awndray awayway ybay ethay andshay ofway ethay oldierssay. Isthay acespay avinghay
intervenedway, ethay othersway esumeray ouragecay, osay arfay asway otay enturevay otay aketay
eirthay aceplay onway ethay ortificationsfay andway esentpray ethay aspectway ofway efendersday.

Ixxxxay.Ethay oragingfay avinghay inway ethay eantimemay eenbay ompletedcay, ourway oldierssay
istinctlyday earhay ethay outshay; ethay orsehay astenhay onway eforebay andway iscoverday inway
atwhay angerday ethay affairway isway. Utbay erehay erethay isway onay ortificationfay otay eceiveray
emthay, inway eirthay alarmway osethay astlay enlistedway andway unskilledway inway ilitarymay
isciplineday urntay eirthay acesfay otay ethay ilitarymay ibunetray andway ethay enturionscay;
eythay aitway otay indfay atwhay ordersway aymay ebay ivengay ybay emthay. Onay oneway isway osay
ourageouscay asway otnay otay ebay isconcertedday ybay ethay uddennesssay ofway ethay affairway.
Ethay arbariansbay, espyingway ourway andardstay inway ethay istanceday, esistday omfray ethay
attackway; atway irstfay eythay upposesay atthay ethay egionslay, ichwhay eythay adhay earnedlay
omfray eirthay isonerspray adhay emovedray artherfay offway, adhay eturnedray; afterwardsway,
espisingday eirthay allsmay umbernay, eythay akemay anway attackway onway emthay atway allway idessay.

Lxay.Ethay ampcayollowersfay unray orwardfay otay ethay earestnay isingray oundgray; eingbay
eedilyspay ivendray omfray isthay eythay owthray emselvesthay amongway ethay andardsstay andway
ompaniescay eythay usthay osay uchmay ethay oremay alarmway ethay oldierssay alreadyway
affrightedway. Omesay oposepray atthay, ormingfay away edgeway, eythay uddenlysay eakbray
oughthray, incesay ethay ampcay asway osay earnay; andway ifway anyway artpay ouldshay ebay
urroundedsay andway ainslay, eythay ullyfay usttray atthay atway eastlay ethay estray aymay ebay
avedsay; othersway, atthay eythay aketay eirthay andstay onway anway eminenceway, andway allway
undergoway ethay amesay estinyday. Ethay eteranvay oldierssay, omwhay eway atedstay otay avehay
etsay outway ogethertay ithway ethay othersway underway away andardstay, oday otnay approveway ofway
isthay. Ereforethay encouragingway eachway otherway, underway ethay onductcay ofway Aiuscay
Eboniustray, away Omanray ightknay, owhay adhay eenbay appointedway overway emthay, eythay eakbray
oughthray ethay idstmay ofway ethay enemyway, andway arriveway inway ethay ampcay afesay otay away anmay.
Ethay ampcayattendantsway andway ethay orsehay ollowingfay oseclay uponway emthay ithway ethay
amesay impetuosityway, areway avedsay ybay ethay ouragecay ofway ethay oldierssay. Utbay osethay
owhay adhay akentay eirthay andstay uponway ethay eminenceway avinghay evenway ownay acquiredway onay
experienceway ofway ilitarymay attersmay, eithernay ouldcay erseverepay inway atthay
esolutionray ichwhay eythay approvedway ofway, amelynay, otay efendday emselvesthay omfray
eirthay igherhay ositionpay, ornay imitateway atthay igourvay andway eedspay ichwhay eythay adhay
observedway otay avehay availedway othersway; utbay, attemptingway otay eachray ethay ampcay, adhay
escendedday intoway anway unfavourableway ituationsay. Ethay Enturionscay, omesay ofway omwhay
adhay eenbay omotedpray orfay eirthay alourvay omfray ethay owerlay anksray ofway otherway egionslay
otay igherhay anksray inway isthay egionlay, inway orderway atthay eythay ightmay otnay orfeitfay
eirthay oryglay orfay ilitarymay exploitsway eviouslypray acquiredway, ellfay ogethertay
ightingfay ostmay aliantlyvay. Ethay enemyway avinghay eenbay islodgedday ybay eirthay
alourvay, away artpay ofway ethay oldierssay arrivedway afesay inway ampcay ontrarycay otay eirthay
expectationsway; away artpay erishedpay, urroundedsay ybay ethay arbariansbay.

Ixlay.Ethay Ermansgay, espairingday ofway akingtay ethay ampcay ybay ormstay, ecausebay eythay
awsay atthay ourway enmay adhay akentay upway eirthay ositionpay onway ethay ortificationsfay,
etreatedray eyondbay ethay Inerhay ithway atthay underplay ichwhay eythay adhay epositedday inway
ethay oodsway. Andway osay eatgray asway ethay alarmway, evenway afterway ethay epartureday ofway ethay
enemyway, atthay enwhay . Olusenusvay, owhay adhay eenbay entsay ithway ethay avalrycay,
arrivedway atthay ightnay, ehay ouldcay otnay aingay edencecray atthay Aesarcay asway oseclay atway
andhay ithway ishay armyway afesay. Earfay adhay osay eprayoccupiedway ethay indsmay ofway allway,
atthay, eirthay easonray eingbay almostway estrangedway, eythay aidsay atthay allway ethay otherway
orcesfay avinghay eenbay utcay offway, ethay avalrycay aloneway adhay arrivedway erethay ybay
ightflay, andway assertedway atthay, ifway ethay armyway ereway afesay, ethay Ermansgay ouldway otnay
avehay attackedway ethay ampcay ichwhay earfay ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay emovedray.

Iixlay.Ehay, onway ishay eturnray, eingbay ellway awareway ofway ethay asualtiescay ofway arway,
omplainedcay ofway oneway ingthay onlyway, amelynay, atthay ethay ohortscay adhay eenbay entsay
awayway omfray ethay outpostsway andway arrisongay utyday, andway ointedpay outway atthay oomray
oughtway otnay otay avehay eenbay eftlay orfay evenway ethay ostmay ivialtray asualtycay; atthay
ortunefay adhay exercisedway eatgray influenceway inway ethay uddensay arrivalway ofway eirthay
enemyway; uchmay eatergray, inway atthay eshay adhay urnedtay ethay arbariansbay awayway omfray ethay
eryvay ampartray andway atesgay ofway ethay ampcay. Ofway allway ichwhay eventsway, itway eemedsay ethay
ostmay urprisingsay atthay ethay Ermansgay, owhay adhay ossedcray ethay Inerhay ithway isthay
objectway, atthay eythay ightmay underplay ethay erritoriestay ofway Ambiorixway, eingbay edlay
otay ethay ampcay ofway ethay Omansray, enderedray Ambiorixway away ostmay acceptableway ervicesay.

Iiixlay.Aesarcay, avinghay againway archedmay otay arasshay ethay enemyway, afterway
ollectingcay away argelay umbernay ofway auxiliariesway omfray ethay eighbouringnay atesstay,
espatchesday emthay inway allway irectionsday. Allway ethay illagesvay andway allway ethay
uildingsbay, ichwhay eachway eheldbay, ereway onway irefay oilspay asway eingbay ivendray offway
omfray allway artspay; ethay orncay otnay onlyway asway eingbay onsumedcay ybay osay eatgray umbersnay
ofway attlecay andway enmay, utbay alsoway adhay allenfay otay ethay earthway, owingway otay ethay imetay
ofway ethay earyay andway ethay ormsstay; osay atthay ifway anyway adhay oncealedcay emselvesthay orfay
ethay esentpray, illstay, itway appearedway ikelylay atthay eythay ustmay erishpay oughthray
antway ofway allway ingsthay, enwhay ethay armyway ouldshay ebay awndray offway. Andway equentlyfray itway
amecay otay atthay ointpay, asway osay argelay away odybay ofway avalrycay adhay eenbay entsay abroadway
inway allway irectionsday, atthay ethay isonerspray eclaredday Ambiorixway adhay ustjay enthay
eenbay eensay ybay emthay inway ightflay, andway adhay otnay evenway assedpay outway ofway ightsay, osay
atthay ethay opehay ofway overtakingway imhay eingbay aisedray, andway unboundedway exertionsway
avinghay eenbay esortedray otay, osethay owhay oughtthay eythay ouldshay acquireway ethay
ighesthay avourfay ithway Aesarcay, earlynay overcameway aturenay ybay eirthay ardourway, andway
ontinuallycay away ittlelay onlyway eemedsay antingway otay ompletecay uccesssay; utbay ehay
escuedray imselfhay ybay eansmay ofway urkinglayacesplay andway orestsfay, andway, oncealedcay
ybay ethay ightnay, ademay orfay otherway istrictsday andway uartersqay, ithway onay eatergray
uardgay anthay atthay ofway ourfay orsemenhay, otay omwhay aloneway ehay enturedvay otay onfidecay
ishay ifelay.

Ivxlay.Avinghay evastatedday ethay ountrycay inway uchsay away annermay, Aesarcay eadslay ackbay
ishay armyway ithway ethay osslay ofway otway ohortscay otay Urocortorumday ofway ethay Emiray, andway,
avinghay ummonedsay away ouncilcay ofway Aulgay otay assembleway atway atthay aceplay, ehay esolvedray
otay oldhay anway investigationway espectingray ethay onspiracycay ofway ethay Enonessay andway
Arnutescay, andway avinghay onouncedpray away ostmay everesay entencesay uponway Accoway, owhay
adhay eenbay ethay ontrivercay ofway atthay otplay, ehay unishedpay imhay afterway ethay ustomcay ofway
ourway ancestorsway. Omesay earingfay away ialtray, edflay; enwhay ehay adhay orbiddenfay esethay
irefay andway aterway, ehay ationedstay inway interway uartersqay otway egionslay atway ethay
ontiersfray ofway ethay Eviritray, otway amongway ethay Ingoneslay, ethay emainingray ixsay atway
Agendicumway, inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Enonessay; andway, avinghay ovidedpray orncay
orfay ethay armyway, ehay etsay outway orfay Italyway, asway ehay adhay eterminedday, otay oldhay ethay
assizesway.



Ookbay Iivay

Iway.Aulgay eingbay anquiltray, Aesarcay, asway ehay adhay eterminedday, etssay outway orfay
Italyway otay oldhay ethay ovincialpray assizesway. Erethay ehay eceivesray intelligenceway ofway
ethay eathday ofway Odiusclay; andway, eingbay informedway ofway ethay ecreeday ofway ethay enatesay
otay ethay effectway atthay allway ethay outhyay ofway Italyway ouldshay aketay ethay ilitarymay
oathway, ehay eterminedday otay oldhay away evylay oughoutthray ethay entireway ovincepray.
Eportray ofway esethay eventsway isway apidlyray ornebay intoway Ansalpinetray Aulgay. Ethay Aulsgay
emselvesthay addway otay ethay eportray, andway inventway atwhay ethay asecay eemedsay otay
equireray, amelynay atthay Aesarcay asway etainedday ybay ommotionscay inway ethay itycay,
andway ouldcay otnay, amidstway osay iolentvay issensionsday, omecay otay ishay armyway. Animatedway
ybay isthay opportunityway, eythay owhay alreadyway, eviouslypray otay isthay occurrenceway,
ereway indignantway atthay eythay ereway educedray eneathbay ethay ominionday ofway Omeray,
eginbay otay organizeway eirthay ansplay orfay arway oremay openlyway andway aringlyday. Ethay
eadinglay enmay ofway Aulgay, avinghay onvenedcay ouncilscay amongway emselvesthay inway ethay
oodsway, andway etiredray acesplay, omplaincay ofway ethay eathday ofway Accoway eythay ointpay outway
atthay isthay atefay aymay allfay inway urntay onway emselvesthay eythay ewailbay ethay unhappyway
atefay ofway Aulgay; andway ybay everyway ortsay ofway omisespray andway ewardsray, eythay earnestlyway
olicitsay omesay otay eginbay ethay arway, andway assertway ethay eedomfray ofway Aulgay atway ethay
azardhay ofway eirthay iveslay. Eythay aysay atthay ecialspay arecay ouldshay ebay aidpay otay
isthay, atthay Aesarcay ouldshay ebay utcay offway omfray ishay armyway, eforebay eirthay ecretsay
ansplay ouldshay ebay ivulgedday. Atthay isthay asway easyway, ecausebay eithernay ouldway ethay
egionslay, inway ethay absenceway ofway eirthay eneralgay, areday otay eavelay eirthay interway
uartersqay, ornay ouldcay ethay eneralgay eachray ishay armyway ithoutway away uardgay inallyfay,
atthay itway asway etterbay otay ebay ainslay inway attlebay anthay otnay otay ecoverray eirthay
ancientway oryglay inway arway, andway atthay eedomfray ichwhay eythay adhay eceivedray omfray
eirthay orefathersfay.

Iiway.Ilstwhay esethay ingsthay areway inway agitationway, ethay Arnutescay eclareday atthay
eythay ouldway eclineday onay angerday orfay ethay akesay ofway ethay eneralgay afetysay, andway
omisepray atthay eythay ouldway ebay ethay irstfay ofway allway otay eginbay ethay arway; andway incesay
eythay annotcay atway esentpray aketay ecautionspray, ybay ivinggay andway eceivingray
ostageshay, atthay ethay affairway allshay otnay ebay ivulgedday eythay equireray atthay away
olemnsay assuranceway ebay ivengay emthay ybay oathway andway ightedplay onourhay, eirthay
ilitarymay andardsstay eingbay oughtbray ogethertay inway ichwhay annermay eirthay ostmay
acredsay obligationsway areway ademay indingbay, atthay eythay ouldshay otnay ebay esertedday
ybay ethay estray ofway ethay Aulsgay onway ommencingcay ethay arway.

Iiiway.Enwhay ethay appointedway ayday amecay, ethay Arnutescay, underway ethay ommandcay ofway
Otuatuscay andway Onetodunuscay, esperateday enmay, eetmay ogethertay atway Enabumgay, andway
ayslay ethay Omanray itizenscay owhay adhay ettledsay erethay orfay ethay urposepay ofway adingtray
amongway ethay estray, Aiuscay Usiusfay Itacay, away istinguishedday Omanray ightknay, owhay ybay
Aesar'scay ordersway adhay esidedpray overway ethay ovisionpray epartmentday, andway underplay
eirthay opertypray. Ethay eportray isway uicklyqay eadspray amongway allway ethay atesstay ofway
Aulgay; orfay, eneverwhay away oremay importantway andway emarkableray eventway akestay aceplay,
eythay ansmittray ethay intelligenceway oughthray eirthay andslay andway istrictsday ybay away
outshay; ethay othersway aketay itway upway inway uccessionsay, andway asspay itway otay eirthay
eighboursnay, asway appenedhay onway isthay occasionway; orfay ethay ingsthay ichwhay ereway oneday
atway Enabumgay atway unrisesay ereway eardhay inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Arverniway
eforebay ethay endway ofway ethay irstfay atchway, ichwhay isway anway extentway ofway oremay anthay away
undredhay andway ixtysay ilesmay.

Ivway.Erethay inway ikelay annermay, Ercingetorixvay ethay onsay ofway Eltilluscay ethay
Arvernianway, away oungyay anmay ofway ethay ighesthay owerpay osewhay atherfay adhay eldhay ethay
upremacysay ofway entireway Aulgay, andway adhay eenbay utpay otay eathday ybay ishay ellowfay
itizenscay, orfay isthay easonray, ecausebay ehay aimedway atway overeignsay owerpay,
ummonedsay ogethertay ishay ependentsday, andway easilyway excitedway emthay. Onway ishay esignday
eingbay ademay ownknay, eythay ushray otay armsway ehay isway expelledway omfray ethay owntay ofway
Ergoviagay ybay ishay uncleway Obanitiogay andway ethay estray ofway ethay oblesnay, owhay ereway ofway
opinionway, atthay uchsay anway enterpriseway oughtway otnay otay ebay azardedhay ehay idday otnay
oweverhay esistday, utbay eldhay inway ethay ountrycay away evylay ofway ethay eedynay andway
esperateday. Avinghay ollectedcay uchsay away odybay ofway oopstray, ehay ingsbray overway otay ishay
30 entimentssay uchsay ofway ishay ellowfay itizenscay asway ehay ashay accessway otay ehay
exhortsway emthay otay aketay upway armsway inway ehalfbay ofway ethay eneralgay eedomfray, andway
avinghay assembledway eatgray orcesfay ehay ivesdray omfray ethay atestay ishay opponentsway, ybay
omwhay ehay adhay eenbay expelledway away ortshay imetay eviouslypray. Ehay isway alutedsay ingkay ybay
ishay artisanspay; ehay endssay ambassadorsway inway everyway irectionday, ehay onjurescay emthay
otay adhereway irmlyfay otay eirthay omisepray. Ehay uicklyqay attachesway otay ishay interestsway
ethay Enonessay, Arisiipay, Ictonespay, Adurcicay, Uronestay, Aulerciway, Emovicelay, andway
allway ethay othersway owhay orderbay onway ethay oceanway; ethay upremesay ommandcay isway onferredcay
onway imhay ybay unanimousway onsentcay. Onway obtainingway isthay authorityway, ehay emandsday
ostageshay omfray allway esethay atesstay, ehay ordersway away ixedfay umbernay ofway oldierssay otay
ebay entsay otay imhay immediatelyway; ehay eterminesday atwhay uantityqay ofway armsway eachway
atestay allshay eparepray atway omehay, andway eforebay atwhay imetay; ehay ayspay articularpay
attentionway otay ethay avalrycay. Otay ethay utmostway igilancevay ehay addsway ethay utmostway
igourray ofway authorityway; andway ybay ethay everitysay ofway ishay unishmentspay ingsbray overway
ethay averingway orfay onway ethay ommissioncay ofway away eatergray imecray ehay utspay ethay
erpetratorspay otay eathday ybay irefay andway everyway ortsay ofway orturestay; orfay away ighterslay
ausecay, ehay endssay omehay ethay offendersway ithway eirthay earsway utcay offway, orway oneway ofway
eirthay eyesway utpay outway, atthay eythay aymay ebay anway exampleway otay ethay estray, andway
ightenfray othersway ybay ethay everitysay ofway eirthay unishmentpay.

.Avinghay uicklyqay ollectedcay anway armyway ybay eirthay unishmentspay, ehay endssay
Ucteriuslay, oneway ofway ethay Adurcicay, away anmay ofway ethay utmostway aringday, ithway artpay ofway
ishay orcesfay, intoway ethay erritorytay ofway ethay Uteniray; andway archesmay inway ersonpay intoway
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Iturigesbay. Onway ishay arrivalway, ethay Iturigesbay endsay
ambassadorsway otay ethay Aeduiway, underway osewhay otectionpray eythay ereway, otay olicitsay
aidway inway orderway atthay eythay ightmay oremay easilyway esistray ethay orcesfay ofway ethay enemyway.
Ethay Aeduiway, ybay ethay adviceway ofway ethay ieutenantslay omwhay Aesarcay adhay eftlay ithway
ethay armyway, endsay uppliessay ofway orsehay andway ootfay otay uccoursay ethay Iturigesbay. Enwhay
eythay amecay otay ethay iverray Oirelay, ichwhay eparatessay ethay Iturigesbay omfray ethay
Aeduiway, eythay elayedday away ewfay aysday erethay, andway, otnay aringday otay asspay ethay iverray,
eturnray omehay, andway endsay ackbay ordway otay ethay ieutenantslay atthay eythay adhay
eturnedray oughthray earfay ofway ethay eacherytray ofway ethay Iturigesbay, owhay, eythay
ascertainedway, adhay ormedfay isthay esignday, atthay ifway ethay Aeduiway ouldshay osscray ethay
iverray, ethay Iturigesbay onway ethay oneway idesay, andway ethay Arverniway onway ethay otherway,
ouldshay urroundsay emthay. Etherwhay eythay idday isthay orfay ethay easonray ichwhay eythay
allegedway otay ethay ieutenantslay, orway influencedway ybay eacherytray, eway inkthay atthay eway
oughtway otnay otay atestay asway ertaincay, ecausebay eway avehay onay oofpray. Onway eirthay
epartureday, ethay Iturigesbay immediatelyway uniteway emselvesthay otay ethay Arverniway.

Ivay.Esethay affairsway eingbay announcedway otay Aesarcay inway Italyway atway ethay imetay enwhay
ehay understoodway atthay attersmay inway ethay itycay adhay eenbay educedray otay away oremay
anquiltray atestay ybay ethay energyway ofway Eiuscnay Ompeypay, ehay etsay outway orfay
Ansalpinetray Aulgay. Afterway ehay adhay arrivedway erethay, ehay asway eatlygray atway away osslay
otay owknay ybay atwhay eansmay ehay ouldcay eachray ishay armyway. Orfay ifway ehay ouldshay ummonsay
ethay egionslay intoway ethay ovincepray, ehay asway awareway atthay onway eirthay archmay eythay
ouldway avehay otay ightfay inway ishay absenceway; ehay oresawfay ootay, atthay ifway ehay imselfhay
ouldshay endeavourway otay eachray ethay armyway, ehay ouldway actway injudiciouslyway, inway
ustingtray ishay afetysay evenway otay osethay owhay eemedsay otay ebay anquillizedtray.

Iivay.Inway ethay eantimemay Ucteriuslay ethay Adurcancay, avinghay eenbay entsay intoway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Uteniray, ainsgay overway atthay atestay otay ethay Arverniway. Avinghay
advancedway intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Itiobrigesnay, andway Abaligay, ehay eceivesray
ostageshay omfray othbay ationsnay, andway, assemblingway away umerousnay orcefay, archesmay otay
akemay away escentday onway ethay ovincepray inway ethay irectionday ofway Arbonay. Aesarcay, enwhay
isthay ircumstancecay asway announcedway otay imhay, oughtthay atthay ethay archmay otay Arbonay
oughtway otay aketay ethay ecedencepray ofway allway ishay otherway ansplay. Enwhay ehay arrivedway
erethay, ehay encouragesway ethay imidtay, andway ationsstay arrisonsgay amongway ethay Uteniray,
inway ethay ovincepray ofway ethay Olcaevay Arecomiciway, andway ethay ountrycay aroundway Arbonay
ichwhay asway inway ethay icinityvay ofway ethay enemyway; ehay ordersway away ortionpay ofway ethay
orcesfay omfray ethay ovincepray, andway ethay ecruitsray ichwhay ehay adhay oughtbray omfray
Italyway, otay endezvousray amongway ethay Elviihay owhay orderbay onway ethay erritoriestay ofway
ethay Arverniway.

Iiivay.Esethay attersmay eingbay arrangedway, andway Ucteriuslay ownay eckedchay andway
orcedfay otay etreatray, ecausebay ehay oughtthay itway angerousday otay enterway ethay inelay ofway
Omanray arrisonsgay, Aesarcay archesmay intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Elviihay; althoughway
ountmay Evennescay, ichwhay eparatessay ethay Arverniway omfray ethay Elviihay, ockedblay upway
ethay ayway ithway eryvay eepday owsnay, asway itway asway ethay everestsay easonsay ofway ethay earyay;
etyay avinghay earedclay awayway ethay owsnay otay ethay epthday ofway ixsay eetfay, andway avinghay
openedway ethay oadsray, ehay eachesray ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Arverniway, ithway
infiniteway abourlay otay ishay oldierssay. Isthay eoplepay eingbay urprisedsay, ecausebay
eythay onsideredcay emselvesthay efendedday ybay ethay Evennescay asway ybay away allway, andway
ethay athspay atway isthay easonsay ofway ethay earyay adhay evernay eforebay eenbay assablepay evenway
otay individualsway, ehay ordersway ethay avalrycay otay extendway emselvesthay asway arfay asway
eythay ouldcay, andway ikestray asway eatgray away anicpay asway ossiblepay intoway ethay enemyway.
Esethay oceedingspray areway eedilyspay announcedway otay Ercingetorixvay ybay umourray andway
ishay essengersmay. Aroundway imhay allway ethay Arverniway owdcray inway alarmway, andway olemnlysay
entreatway imhay otay otectpray eirthay opertypray, andway otnay otay uffersay emthay otay ebay
underedplay ybay ethay enemyway, especiallyway asway ehay awsay atthay allway ethay arway asway
ansferredtray intoway eirthay ountrycay. Eingbay evailedpray uponway ybay eirthay entreatiesway
ehay ovesmay ishay ampcay omfray ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Iturigesbay inway ethay irectionday ofway
ethay Arverniway.

Ixway.Aesarcay, avinghay elayedday otway aysday inway atthay aceplay, ecausebay ehay adhay
anticipatedway atthay, inway ethay aturalnay oursecay ofway eventsway, uchsay ouldway ebay ethay
onductcay ofway Ercingetorixvay, eaveslay ethay armyway underway etencepray ofway aisingray
ecruitsray andway avalrycay ehay acesplay Utusbray, away oungyay anmay, inway ommandcay ofway esethay
orcesfay; ehay ivesgay imhay instructionsway atthay ethay avalrycay ouldshay angeray asway
extensivelyway asway ossiblepay inway allway irectionsday; atthay ehay ouldway exertway imselfhay
otnay otay ebay absentway omfray ethay ampcay ongerlay anthay eethray aysday. Avinghay arrangedway
esethay attersmay, ehay archesmay otay Iennavay ybay asway onglay ourneysjay asway ehay ancay, enwhay
ishay ownway oldierssay idday otnay expectway imhay. Indingfay erethay away eshfray odybay ofway
avalrycay, ichwhay ehay adhay entsay onway otay atthay aceplay everalsay aysday eforebay,
archingmay incessantlyway ightnay andway ayday, ehay advancedway apidlyray oughthray ethay
erritorytay ofway ethay Aeduiway intoway atthay ofway ethay Ingoneslay, inway ichwhay otway egionslay
ereway interingway, atthay, ifway anyway anplay affectingway ishay ownway afetysay ouldshay avehay
eenbay organisedway ybay ethay Aeduiway, ehay ightmay efeatday itway ybay ethay apidityray ofway ishay
ovementsmay. Enwhay ehay arrivedway erethay, ehay endssay informationway otay ethay estray ofway
ethay egionslay, andway athersgay allway ishay armyway intoway oneway aceplay eforebay intelligenceway
ofway ishay arrivalway ouldcay ebay announcedway otay ethay Arverniway.

Ercingetorixvay, onway earinghay isthay ircumstancecay, eadslay ackbay ishay armyway intoway
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Iturigesbay; andway afterway archingmay omfray itway otay Ergoviagay, away
owntay ofway ethay Oiibay, omwhay Aesarcay adhay ettledsay erethay afterway efeatingday emthay inway
ethay Elvetianhay arway, andway adhay enderedray ibutarytray otay ethay Aeduiway, ehay
eterminedday otay attackway itway.

.Isthay actionway ausedcay eatgray erplexitypay otay Aesarcay inway ethay electionsay ofway
ishay ansplay; ehay earedfay estlay, ifway ehay ouldshay onfinecay ishay egionslay inway oneway
aceplay orfay ethay emainingray ortionpay ofway ethay interway, allway Aulgay ouldshay evoltray
enwhay ethay ibutariestray ofway ethay Aeduiway ereway ubduedsay, ecausebay itway ouldway appearway
atthay erethay asway inway imhay onay otectionpray orfay ishay iendsfray; utbay ifway ehay ouldshay
awdray emthay ootay oonsay outway ofway eirthay interway uartersqay, ehay ightmay ebay istressedday
ybay ethay antway ofway ovisionspray, inway onsequencecay ofway ethay ifficultyday ofway
onveyancecay. Itway eemedsay etterbay, oweverhay, otay endureway everyway ardshiphay anthay otay
alienateway ethay affectionsway ofway allway ishay alliesway, ybay ubmittingsay otay uchsay anway
insultway. Avinghay, ereforethay, impressedway onway ethay Aeduiway ethay ecessitynay ofway
upplyingsay imhay ithway ovisionspray, ehay endssay orwardfay essengersmay otay ethay Oiibay
otay informway emthay ofway ishay arrivalway, andway encourageway emthay otay emainray irmfay inway
eirthay allegianceway, andway esistray ethay attackway ofway ethay enemyway ithway eatgray
esolutionray. Avinghay eftlay otway egionslay andway ethay uggagelay ofway ethay entireway armyway
atway Agendicumway, ehay archesmay otay ethay Oiibay.

Ixay.Onway ethay econdsay ayday, enwhay ehay amecay otay Ellaunodunumvay, away owntay ofway ethay
Enonessay, ehay eterminedday otay attackway itway, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay eavelay anway
enemyway inway ishay earray, andway ightmay ethay oremay easilyway ocurepray uppliessay ofway
ovisionspray, andway ewdray away inelay ofway ircumvallationcay aroundway itway inway otway aysday onway
ethay irdthay ayday, ambassadorsway eingbay entsay omfray ethay owntay otay eattray ofway away
apitulationcay, ehay ordersway eirthay armsway otay ebay oughtbray ogethertay, eirthay attlecay
otay ebay oughtbray orthfay, andway ixsay undredhay ostageshay otay ebay ivengay. Ehay eaveslay
Aiuscay Eboniustray, ishay ieutenantlay, otay ompletecay esethay arrangementsway; ehay
imselfhay etssay outway ithway ethay intentionway ofway archingmay asway oonsay asway ossiblepay otay
Enabumgay, away owntay ofway ethay Arnutescay, owhay avinghay enthay orfay ethay irstfay imetay
eceivedray informationway ofway ethay iegesay ofway Ellaunodunumvay, asway eythay oughtthay atthay
itway ouldway ebay otractedpray otay away ongerlay imetay, ereway eparingpray away arrisongay otay
endsay otay Enabumgay orfay ethay efenceday ofway atthay owntay. Aesarcay arrivedway erehay inway otway
aysday; afterway itchingpay ishay ampcay eforebay ethay owntay, eingbay eventedpray ybay ethay
imetay ofway ethay ayday, ehay efersday ethay attackway otay ethay extnay ayday, andway ordersway ishay
oldierssay otay eparepray ateverwhay asway ecessarynay orfay atthay enterpriseway; andway asway away
idgebray overway ethay Oirelay onnectedcay ethay owntay ofway Enabumgay ithway ethay oppositeway
ankbay, earingfay estlay ethay inhabitantsway ouldshay escapeway ybay ightnay omfray ethay owntay,
ehay ordersway otway egionslay otay eepkay atchway underway armsway. Ethay eoplepay ofway Enabumgay
amecay orthfay ilentlysay omfray ethay itycay eforebay idnightmay, andway eganbay otay osscray
ethay iverray. Enwhay isthay ircumstancecay asway announcedway ybay outsscay, Aesarcay,
avinghay etsay irefay otay ethay atesgay, endssay inway ethay egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay orderedway
otay ebay eadyray, andway obtainsway ossessionpay ofway ethay owntay osay ompletelycay, atthay eryvay
ewfay ofway ethay olewhay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway escapedway eingbay akentay aliveway, ecausebay
ethay arrownessnay ofway ethay idgebray andway ethay oadsray eventedpray ethay ultitudemay omfray
escapingway. Ehay illagespay andway urnsbay ethay owntay, ivesgay ethay ootybay otay ethay
oldierssay, enthay eadslay ishay armyway overway ethay Oirelay, andway archesmay intoway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Iturigesbay.

Iixay.Ercingetorixvay, enwhay ehay ascertainedway ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay, esistedday
omfray ethay iegesay ofway Ergoviagay, andway archedmay otay eetmay Aesarcay. Ethay atterlay adhay
ommencedcay otay esiegebay Oviodunumnay; andway enwhay ambassadorsway amecay omfray isthay
owntay otay egbay atthay ehay ouldway ardonpay emthay andway arespay eirthay iveslay, inway orderway
atthay ehay ightmay executeway ethay estray ofway ishay esignsday ithway ethay apidityray ybay ichwhay
ehay adhay accomplishedway ostmay ofway emthay, ehay ordersway eirthay armsway otay ebay ollectedcay,
eirthay orseshay otay ebay oughtbray orthfay, andway ostageshay otay ebay ivengay. Away artpay ofway
ethay ostageshay eingbay ownay eliveredday upway, enwhay ethay estray ofway ethay ermstay ereway
eingbay erformedpay, away ewfay enturionscay andway oldierssay eingbay entsay intoway ethay owntay
otay ollectcay ethay armsway andway orseshay, ethay enemy'sway avalrycay, ichwhay adhay
outstrippedway ethay ainmay odybay ofway Ercingetorix'svay armyway, asway eensay atway away
istanceday; asway oonsay asway ethay ownsmentay eheldbay emthay, andway entertainedway opeshay ofway
assistanceway, aisingray away outshay, eythay eganbay otay aketay upway armsway, utshay ethay atesgay,
andway inelay ethay allsway. Enwhay ethay enturionscay inway ethay owntay understoodway omfray ethay
ignalsayakingmay ofway ethay Aulsgay atthay eythay ereway ormingfay omesay ewnay esignday, eythay
ewdray eirthay ordssway andway eizedsay ethay atesgay, andway ecoveredray allway eirthay enmay
afesay.

Iiixay.Aesarcay ordersway ethay orsehay otay ebay awndray outway ofway ethay ampcay, andway
ommencescay away avalrycay actionway. Ishay enmay eingbay ownay istressedday, Aesarcay endssay
otay eirthay aidway aboutway ourfay undredhay Ermangay orsehay, ichwhay ehay adhay eterminedday,
atway ethay eginningbay, otay eepkay ithway imselfhay. Ethay Aulsgay ouldcay otnay ithstandway
eirthay attackway, utbay ereway utpay otay ightflay, andway etreatedray otay eirthay ainmay odybay,
afterway osinglay away eatgray umbernay ofway enmay. Enwhay eythay ereway outedray, ethay ownsmentay,
againway intimidatedway, arrestedway osethay ersonspay ybay osewhay exertionsway eythay
oughtthay atthay ethay obmay adhay eenbay ousedray, andway oughtbray emthay otay Aesarcay, andway
urrenderedsay emselvesthay otay imhay. Enwhay esethay affairsway ereway accomplishedway,
Aesarcay archedmay otay ethay Avaricumway, ichwhay asway ethay argestlay andway estbay ortifiedfay
owntay inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Iturigesbay, andway ituatedsay inway away ostmay ertilefay
acttray ofway ountrycay; ecausebay ehay onfidentlycay expectedway atthay onway akingtay atthay
owntay, ehay ouldway educeray eneathbay ishay ominionday ethay atestay ofway ethay Iturigesbay.

Ivxay.Ercingetorixvay, afterway ustainingsay uchsay away eriessay ofway osseslay atway
Ellaunodunumvay, Enabumgay, andway Oviodunumnay, ummonssay ishay enmay otay away ouncilcay. Ehay
impressesway onway emthay atthay ethay arway ustmay ebay osecutedpray onway away eryvay ifferentday
temsysay omfray atthay ichwhay adhay eenbay eviouslypray adoptedway; utbay eythay ouldshay ybay
allway eansmay aimway atway isthay objectway, atthay ethay Omansray ouldshay ebay eventedpray omfray
oragingfay andway ocuringpray ovisionspray; atthay isthay asway easyway, ecausebay eythay
emselvesthay ereway ellway uppliedsay ithway avalrycay andway ereway ikewiselay assistedway ybay
ethay easonsay ofway ethay earyay; atthay oragefay ouldcay otnay ebay utcay; atthay ethay enemyway
ustmay ecessarilynay isperseday, andway ooklay orfay itway inway ethay ouseshay, atthay allway esethay
ightmay ebay ailyday estroyedday ybay ethay orsehay. Esidesbay atthay ethay interestsway ofway
ivatepray opertypray ustmay ebay eglectednay orfay ethay akesay ofway ethay eneralgay afetysay;
atthay ethay illagesvay andway ouseshay oughtway otay ebay iredfay, overway uchsay anway extentway ofway
ountrycay inway everyway irectionday omfray Oiabay, asway ethay Omansray appearedway apablecay ofway
ouringscay inway eirthay earchsay orfay oragefay. Atthay anway abundanceway ofway esethay
ecessariesnay ouldcay ebay uppliedsay otay emthay, ecausebay eythay ouldway ebay assistedway ybay
ethay esourcesray ofway osethay inway osewhay erritoriestay ethay arway ouldway ebay agedway atthay
ethay Omansray eitherway ouldway otnay earbay ethay ivationpray, orway elseway ouldway advanceway otay
anyway istanceday omfray ethay ampcay ithway onsiderablecay angerday; andway atthay itway ademay onay
ifferenceday etherwhay eythay ewslay emthay orway ippedstray emthay ofway eirthay aggagebay,
incesay, ifway itway asway ostlay, eythay ouldcay otnay arrycay onway ethay arway. Esidesbay atthay,
ethay ownstay oughtway otay ebay urntbay ichwhay ereway otnay ecuredsay againstway everyway angerday
ybay eirthay ortificationsfay orway aturalnay advantagesway; atthay erethay ouldshay otnay ebay
acesplay ofway etreatray orfay eirthay ownway ountrymencay orfay ecliningday ilitarymay
ervicesay, ornay ebay exposedway otay ethay Omansray asway inducementsway otay arrycay offway
abundanceway ofway ovisionspray andway underplay. Ifway esethay acrificessay ouldshay appearway
eavyhay orway allinggay, atthay eythay oughtway otay onsidercay itway uchmay oremay istressingday
atthay eirthay ivesway andway ildrenchay ouldshay ebay aggeddray offway otay averyslay, andway
emselvesthay ainslay; ethay evilsway ichwhay ustmay ecessarilynay efallbay ethay onqueredcay.

Vxay.Isthay opinionway avinghay eenbay approvedway ofway ybay unanimousway onsentcay, oremay
anthay entytway ownstay ofway ethay Iturigesbay areway urntbay inway oneway ayday. Onflagrationscay
areway eheldbay inway everyway uarterqay; andway althoughway allway orebay isthay ithway eatgray
egretray, etyay eythay aidlay eforebay emselvesthay isthay onsolationcay, atthay, asway ethay
ictoryvay asway ertaincay, eythay ouldcay uicklyqay ecoverray eirthay osseslay. Erethay isway away
ebateday oncerningcay Avaricumway inway ethay eneralgay ouncilcay, etherwhay eythay ouldshay
ecideday atthay itway ouldshay ebay urntbay orway efendedday. Ethay Iturigesbay ewthray
emselvesthay atway ethay eetfay ofway allway ethay Aulsgay, andway entreatway atthay eythay ouldshay
otnay ebay ompelledcay otay etsay irefay ithway eirthay ownway andshay otay ethay airestfay itycay ofway
almostway ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay, ichwhay asway othbay away otectionpray andway ornamentway otay
ethay atestay; eythay aysay atthay eythay ouldcay easilyway efendday itway, owingway otay ethay
aturenay ofway ethay oundgray, orfay, eingbay enclosedway almostway onway everyway idesay ybay away
iverray andway away arshmay, itway adhay onlyway oneway entranceway, andway atthay eryvay arrownay.
Ermissionpay eingbay antedgray otay emthay atway eirthay earnestway equestray, Ercingetorixvay
atway irstfay issuadesday emthay omfray itway, utbay afterwardsway oncedescay ethay ointpay,
owingway otay eirthay entreatiesway andway ethay ompassioncay ofway ethay oldierssay. Away operpray
arrisongay isway electedsay orfay ethay owntay.

Ixvay.Ercingetorixvay ollowsfay oselyclay uponway Aesarcay ybay ortershay archesmay, andway
electssay orfay ishay ampcay away aceplay efendedday ybay oodsway andway arshesmay, atway ethay
istanceday ofway ifteenfay ilesmay omfray Avaricumway. Erethay ehay eceivedray intelligenceway
ybay ustytray outsscay, everyway ourhay inway ethay ayday, ofway atwhay asway oinggay onway atway
Avaricumway, andway orderedway ateverwhay ehay ishedway otay ebay oneday; ehay oselyclay atchedway
allway ourway expeditionsway orfay orncay andway oragefay, andway eneverwhay eythay ereway
ompelledcay otay ogay otay away eatergray istanceday, ehay attackedway emthay enwhay ispersedday,
andway inflictedway everesay osslay uponway emthay; althoughway ethay evilway asway emediedray ybay
ourway enmay, asway arfay asway ecautionspray ouldcay ebay akentay, ybay oinggay orthfay atway
irregularway imestay, andway ybay ifferentday aysway.

Iixvay.Aesarcay itchingpay ishay ampcay atway atthay idesay ofway ethay owntay ichwhay asway otnay
efendedday ybay ethay iverray andway arshmay, andway adhay away eryvay arrownay approachway, asway eway
avehay entionedmay, eganbay otay aiseray ethay ineaevay andway erectway otway owerstay; orfay ethay
aturenay ofway ethay aceplay eventedpray imhay omfray awingdray away inelay ofway
ircumvallationcay. Ehay evernay easedcay otay importuneway ethay Oiibay andway Aeduiway orfay
uppliessay ofway orncay; ofway omwhay ethay oneway ethay Aeduiway, ecausebay eythay ereway actingway
ithway onay ealzay, idday otnay aidway imhay uchmay; ethay othersway ethay Oiibay, asway eirthay
esourcesray ereway otnay eatgray, uicklyqay onsumedcay atwhay eythay adhay. Althoughway ethay
armyway asway istressedday ybay ethay eatestgray antway ofway orncay, oughthray ethay overtypay ofway
ethay Oiibay, ethay apathyway ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway ethay urningbay ofway ethay ouseshay, otay
uchsay away egreeday, atthay orfay everalsay aysday ethay oldierssay ereway ithoutway orncay, andway
atisfiedsay eirthay extremeway ungerhay ithway attlecay ivendray omfray ethay emoteray
illagesvay; etyay onay anguagelay asway eardhay omfray emthay unworthyway ofway ethay ajestymay ofway
ethay Omanray eoplepay andway eirthay ormerfay ictoriesvay. Oreovermay, enwhay Aesarcay
addressedway ethay egionslay, oneway ybay oneway, enwhay atway orkway, andway aidsay atthay ehay ouldway
aiseray ethay iegesay, ifway eythay eltfay ethay arcityscay ootay everelysay, eythay
unanimouslyway eggedbay imhay otnay otay oday osay; atthay eythay adhay ervedsay orfay everalsay
earsyay underway ishay ommandcay inway uchsay away annermay, atthay eythay evernay ubmittedsay otay
insultway, andway evernay abandonedway anway enterpriseway ithoutway accomplishingway itway; atthay
eythay ouldshay onsidercay itway away isgraceday ifway eythay abandonedway ethay iegesay afterway
ommencingcay itway; atthay itway asway etterbay otay endureway everyway ardshiphay anthay otnay otay
avengeway ethay anesmay ofway ethay Omanray itizenscay owhay erishedpay atway Enabumgay ybay ethay
erfidypay ofway ethay Aulsgay. Eythay entrustedway ethay amesay eclarationsday otay ethay
enturionscay andway ilitarymay ibunestray, atthay oughthray emthay eythay ightmay ebay
ommunicatedcay otay Aesarcay.

Iiixvay.Enwhay ethay owerstay adhay ownay approachedway ethay allsway, Aesarcay ascertainedway
omfray ethay aptivescay atthay Ercingetorixvay, afterway estroyingday ethay oragefay, adhay
itchedpay ishay ampcay earernay Avaricumway, andway atthay ehay imselfhay ithway ethay avalrycay
andway ightlayarmedway infantryway, owhay enerallygay oughtfay amongway ethay orsehay, adhay onegay
otay aylay anway ambuscadeway inway atthay uarterqay otay ichwhay ehay oughtthay atthay ourway oopstray
ouldway omecay ethay extnay ayday otay oragefay. Onway earninglay esethay actsfay, ehay etsay outway
omfray ethay ampcay ecretlysay atway idnightmay, andway eachedray ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway
earlyway inway ethay orningmay. Eythay avinghay uicklyqay earnedlay ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay
ybay outsscay, idhay eirthay arscay andway aggagebay inway ethay ickestthay artspay ofway ethay
oodsway, andway ewdray upway allway eirthay orcesfay inway away oftylay andway openway acespay ichwhay
ircumstancecay eingbay announcedway, Aesarcay immediatelyway orderedway ethay aggagebay otay
ebay iledpay, andway ethay armsway otay ebay otgay eadyray.

Ixxay.Erethay asway away illhay ofway away entlegay ascentway omfray ethay ottombay; away angerousday
andway impassableway arshmay, otnay oremay anthay iftyfay eetfay oadbray, egirtbay itway onway
almostway everyway idesay. Ethay Aulsgay, avinghay okenbray ownday ethay idgesbray, ostedpay
emselvesthay onway isthay illhay, inway onfidencecay ofway eirthay ositionpay, andway eingbay
awndray upway inway ibestray accordingway otay eirthay espectiveray atesstay, eldhay allway ethay
ordsfay andway assagespay ofway atthay arshmay ithway ustytray uardsgay, usthay eterminedday
atthay ifway ethay Omansray ouldshay attemptway otay orcefay ethay arshmay, eythay ouldway
overpowerway emthay omfray ethay igherhay oundgray ilewhay ickingstay inway itway, osay atthay
oeverwhay awsay ethay earnessnay ofway ethay ositionpay, ouldway imagineway atthay ethay otway
armiesway ereway eparedpray otay ightfay onway almostway equalway ermstay; utbay oeverwhay ouldshay
iewvay accuratelyway ethay isadvantageday ofway ositionpay, ouldway iscoverday atthay eythay
ereway owingshay offway anway emptyway affectationway ofway ouragecay. Aesarcay earlyclay ointspay
outway otay ishay oldierssay, owhay ereway indignantway atthay ethay enemyway ouldcay earbay ethay
ightsay ofway emthay atway ethay istanceday ofway osay ortshay away acespay, andway ereway earnestlyway
emandingday ethay ignalsay orfay actionway, ithway owhay eatgray osslay andway ethay eathday ofway
owhay anymay allantgay enmay ethay ictoryvay ouldway ecessarilynay ebay urchasedpay andway
enwhay ehay awsay emthay osay eterminedday otay eclineday onay angerday orfay ishay enownray, atthay
ehay oughtway otay ebay onsideredcay uiltygay ofway ethay utmostway injusticeway ifway ehay idday otnay
oldhay eirthay ifelay earerday anthay ishay ownway ersonalpay afetysay. Avinghay usthay
onsoledcay ishay oldierssay, ehay eadslay emthay ackbay onway ethay amesay ayday otay ethay ampcay,
andway eterminedday otay eparepray ethay otherway ingsthay ichwhay ereway ecessarynay orfay ethay
iegesay ofway ethay owntay.

Xxay.Ercingetorixvay, enwhay ehay adhay eturnedray otay ishay enmay, asway accusedway ofway
easontray, inway atthay ehay adhay ovedmay ishay ampcay earernay ethay Omansray, inway atthay ehay adhay
onegay awayway ithway allway ethay avalrycay, inway atthay ehay adhay eftlay osay eatgray orcesfay
ithoutway away ommandercay, inway atthay, onway ishay epartureday, ethay Omansray adhay omecay atway
uchsay away avourablefay easonsay, andway ithway uchsay espatchday; atthay allway esethay
ircumstancescay ouldcay otnay avehay appenedhay accidentallyway orway ithoutway esignday;
atthay ehay eferredpray oldinghay ethay overeigntysay ofway Aulgay ybay ethay antgray ofway
Aesarcay, otay acquiringway itway ybay eirthay avourfay. Eingbay accusedway inway uchsay away annermay,
ehay ademay ethay ollowingfay eplyray otay esethay argeschayAtthay ishay ovingmay ishay ampcay
adhay eenbay ausedcay ybay antway ofway oragefay, andway adhay eenbay oneday evenway ybay eirthay
adviceway; atthay ishay approachingway earnay ethay Omansray adhay eenbay away easuremay ictatedday
ybay ethay avourablefay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray, ichwhay ouldway efendday imhay ybay itsway
aturalnay engthstray; atthay ethay ervicesay ofway ethay avalrycay ouldcay otnay avehay eenbay
equisiteray inway arshymay oundgray, andway asway usefulway inway atthay aceplay otay ichwhay eythay
adhay onegay; atthay ehay, onway ishay epartureday, adhay ivengay ethay upremesay ommandcay otay onay
oneway intentionallyway, estlay ehay ouldshay ebay inducedway ybay ethay eagernessway ofway ethay
ultitudemay otay azardhay anway engagementway, otay ichwhay ehay erceivedpay atthay allway ereway
inclinedway, owingway otay eirthay antway ofway energyway, ecausebay eythay ereway unableway otay
endureway atiguefay anyway ongerlay. Atthay, ifway ethay Omansray inway ethay eantimemay amecay upway
ybay ancechay, eythay ethay Aulsgay ouldshay eelfay atefulgray otay ortunefay; ifway invitedway
ybay ethay informationway ofway omesay oneway eythay ouldshay eelfay atefulgray otay imhay, ecausebay
eythay ereway enabledway otay eesay istinctlyday omfray ethay igherhay oundgray ethay allnesssmay
ofway ethay umbernay ofway eirthay enemyway, andway espiseday ethay ouragecay ofway osethay owhay, otnay
aringday otay ightfay, etreatedray isgracefullyday intoway eirthay ampcay. Atthay ehay
esiredday onay owerpay omfray Aesarcay ybay eacherytray, incesay ehay ouldcay avehay itway ybay
ictoryvay, ichwhay asway ownay assuredway otay imselfhay andway otay allway ethay Aulsgay; aynay,
atthay ehay ouldway evenway ivegay emthay ackbay ethay ommandcay, ifway eythay oughtthay atthay eythay
onferredcay onourhay onway imhay, atherray enthay eceivedray afetysay omfray imhay. Atthay ouyay
aymay ebay assuredway, aidsay ehay, atthay Iway eakspay esethay ordsway ithway uthtray;istenlay
otay esethay Omanray oldierssay! Ehay oducespray omesay ampcayollowersfay omwhay ehay adhay
urprisedsay onway away oragingfay expeditionway omesay aysday eforebay, andway adhay orturedtay ybay
aminefay andway onfinementcay. Eythay eingbay eviouslypray instructedway inway atwhay answersway
eythay ouldshay akemay enwhay examinedway, aysay, Atthay eythay ereway egionarylay oldierssay,
atthay, urgedway ybay aminefay andway antway, eythay adhay ecentlyray onegay orthfay omfray ethay
ampcay, otay eesay ifway eythay ouldcay indfay anyway orncay orway attlecay inway ethay ieldsfay; atthay
ethay olewhay armyway asway istressedday ybay away imilarsay arcityscay, ornay adhay anyway oneway ownay
ufficientsay engthstray, ornay ouldcay earbay ethay abourlay ofway ethay orkway; andway
ereforethay atthay ethay eneralgay asway eterminedday, ifway ehay ademay onay ogresspray inway ethay
iegesay, otay awdray offway ishay armyway inway eethray aysday. Esethay enefitsbay, ayssay
Ercingetorixvay, ouyay eceiveray omfray emay, omwhay ouyay accuseway ofway easontrayemay, ybay
osewhay exertionsway ouyay eesay osay owerfulpay andway ictoriousvay anway armyway almostway
estroyedday ybay aminefay, ithoutway eddingshay oneway opdray ofway ouryay oodblay; andway Iway avehay
akentay ecautionspray atthay onay atestay allshay admitway ithinway itsway erritoriestay isthay
armyway inway itsway ignominiousway ightflay omfray isthay aceplay.

Ixxay.Ethay olewhay ultitudemay aiseray away outshay andway ashclay eirthay armsway, accordingway
otay eirthay ustomcay, asway eythay usuallyway oday inway ethay asecay ofway imhay osewhay eechspay eythay
approveway; eythay exclaimway atthay Ercingetorixvay asway away onsummatecay eneralgay, andway
atthay eythay adhay onay oubtday ofway ishay onourhay; atthay ethay arway ouldcay otnay ebay
onductedcay ithway eatergray udencepray. Eythay etermineday atthay entay ousandthay enmay
ouldshay ebay ickedpay outway ofway ethay entireway armyway andway entsay intoway ethay owntay, andway
ecideday atthay ethay eneralgay afetysay ouldshay otnay ebay entrustedway otay ethay Iturigesbay
aloneway, ecausebay eythay ereway awareway atthay ethay oryglay ofway ethay ictoryvay ustmay estray
ithway ethay Iturigesbay, ifway eythay ademay oodgay ethay efenceday ofway ethay owntay.

Iixxay.Otay ethay extraordinaryway alourvay ofway ourway oldierssay, evicesday ofway everyway
ortsay ereway opposedway ybay ethay Aulsgay; incesay eythay areway away ationnay ofway onsummatecay
ingenuityway, andway ostmay ilfulskay inway imitatingway andway akingmay osethay ingsthay ichwhay
areway impartedway ybay anyway oneway; orfay eythay urnedtay asideway ethay ookshay ithway oosesnay,
andway enwhay eythay adhay aughtcay oldhay ofway emthay irmlyfay, ewdray emthay onway ybay eansmay ofway
enginesway, andway underminedway ethay oundmay ethay oremay ilfullyskay onway isthay accountway,
ecausebay erethay areway inway eirthay erritoriestay extensiveway ironway inesmay, andway
onsequentlycay everyway escriptionday ofway iningmay operationsway isway ownknay andway
actisedpray ybay emthay. Eythay adhay urnishedfay, oreovermay, ethay olewhay allway onway everyway
idesay ithway urretstay, andway adhay overedcay emthay ithway insskay. Esidesbay, inway eirthay
equentfray alliessay ybay ayday andway ightnay, eythay attemptedway eitherway otay etsay irefay otay
ethay oundmay, orway attackway ourway oldierssay enwhay engagedway inway ethay orksway; andway,
oreovermay, ybay icingsplay ethay uprightway imberstay ofway eirthay ownway owerstay, eythay
equalledway ethay eighthay ofway oursway, asway astfay asway ethay oundmay adhay ailyday aisedray emthay,
andway ounterminedcay ourway inesmay, andway impededway ethay orkingway ofway emthay ybay akesstay
entbay andway arpenedshay atway ethay endsway, andway oilingbay itchpay, andway onesstay ofway eryvay
eatgray eightway, andway eventedpray emthay omfray approachingway ethay allsway.

Iiixxay.Utbay isthay isway usuallyway ethay ormfay ofway allway ethay Allicgay allsway. Aightstray
eamsbay, onnectedcay engthwiselay andway otway eetfay istantday omfray eachway otherway atway
equalway intervalsway, areway acedplay ogethertay onway ethay oundgray; esethay areway ortisedmay
onway ethay insideway, andway overedcay ithway entyplay ofway earthway. Utbay ethay intervalsway ichwhay
eway avehay entionedmay, areway osedclay upway inway ontfray ybay argelay onesstay. Esethay eingbay
usthay aidlay andway ementedcay ogethertay, anotherway owray isway addedway aboveway, inway uchsay away
annermay atthay ethay amesay intervalway aymay ebay observedway, andway atthay ethay eamsbay aymay
otnay ouchtay oneway anotherway, utbay equalway acesspay interveningway, eachway owray ofway eamsbay
isway eptkay irmlyfay inway itsway aceplay ybay away owray ofway onesstay. Inway isthay annermay ethay olewhay
allway isway onsolidatedcay, untilway ethay egularray eighthay ofway ethay allway ebay ompletedcay.
Isthay orkway, ithway espectray otay appearanceway andway arietyvay, isway otnay unsightlyway,
owingway otay ethay alternateway owsray ofway eamsbay andway onesstay, ichwhay eservepray eirthay
orderway inway ightray ineslay; andway, esidesbay, itway ossessespay eatgray advantagesway asway
egardsray utilityway andway ethay efenceday ofway itiescay; orfay ethay onestay otectspray itway
omfray irefay, andway ethay oodway omfray ethay atteringbay amray, incesay itway ethay oodway
eingbay ortisedmay inway ethay insideway ithway owsray ofway eamsbay, enerallygay ortyfay eetfay
eachway inway engthlay, ancay eithernay ebay okenbray oughthray ornay orntay asunderway.

Ivxxay.Ethay iegesay avinghay eenbay impededway ybay osay anymay isadvantagesday, ethay
oldierssay, althoughway eythay ereway etardedray uringday ethay olewhay imetay, ybay ethay udmay,
oldcay, andway onstantcay owersshay, etyay ybay eirthay incessantway abourlay overcameway allway
esethay obstaclesway, andway inway entytwayivefay aysday aisedray away oundmay eethray undredhay
andway irtythay eetfay oadbray andway eightyway eetfay ighhay. Enwhay itway almostway ouchedtay ethay
enemy'sway allsway, andway Aesarcay, accordingway otay ishay usualway ustomcay, eptkay atchway atway
ethay orkway, andway encouragedway ethay oldierssay otnay otay iscontinueday ethay orkway orfay away
omentmay away ittlelay eforebay ethay irdthay atchway eythay iscoveredday atthay ethay oundmay
asway inkingsay, incesay ethay enemyway adhay etsay itway onway irefay ybay away inemay; andway atway ethay
amesay imetay away outshay asway aisedray alongway ethay entireway allway, andway away allysay asway ademay
omfray otway atesgay onway eachway idesay ofway ethay urretstay. Omesay atway away istanceday ereway
astingcay orchestay andway dryay oodway omfray ethay allway onway ethay oundmay, othersway ereway
ouringpay onway itway itchpay, andway otherway aterialsmay, ybay ichwhay ethay ameflay ightmay ebay
excitedway, osay atthay away anplay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay ormedfay, asway otay erewhay eythay ouldshay
irstfay unray otay ethay efenceday, orway otay atwhay artpay aidway ouldshay ebay oughtbray.
Oweverhay, asway otway egionslay alwaysway eptkay uardgay eforebay ethay ampcay ybay Aesar'scay
ordersway, andway everalsay ofway emthay ereway atway atedstay imestay atway ethay orkway, easuresmay
ereway omptlypray akentay, atthay omesay ouldshay opposeway ethay allyingsay artypay, othersway
awdray ackbay ethay owerstay andway akemay away utcay inway ethay ampartray; andway oreovermay, atthay
ethay olewhay armyway ouldshay astenhay omfray ethay ampcay otay extinguishway ethay amesflay.

Xxvay.Enwhay ethay attlebay asway oinggay onway inway everyway irectionday, ethay estray ofway ethay
ightnay eingbay ownay entspay, andway eshfray opeshay ofway ictoryvay alwaysway aroseway eforebay
ethay enemyway ethay oremay osay onway isthay accountway ecausebay eythay awsay ethay overingscay ofway
ourway owerstay urntbay awayway, andway erceivedpay atthay eway, eingbay exposedway, ouldcay otnay
easilyway ogay otay ivegay assistanceway, andway eythay emselvesthay ereway alwaysway elievingray
ethay earyway ithway eshfray enmay, andway onsideredcay atthay allway ethay afetysay ofway Aulgay
estedray onway isthay isiscray; erethay appenedhay inway ymay ownway iewvay away ircumstancecay
ichwhay, avinghay appearedway otay ebay orthyway ofway ecordray, eway oughtthay itway oughtway otnay
otay ebay omittedway. Away ertaincay Aulgay eforebay ethay ategay ofway ethay owntay, owhay asway
astingcay intoway ethay irefay oppositeway ethay urrettay allsbay ofway allowtay andway irefay ichwhay
ereway assedpay alongway otay imhay, asway iercedpay ithway away artday onway ethay ightray idesay andway
ellfay eadday. Oneway ofway osethay extnay imhay eppedstay overway imhay asway ehay aylay, andway
ischargedday ethay amesay officeway enwhay ethay econdsay anmay asway ainslay inway ethay amesay
annermay ybay away oundway omfray away osscrayowbay, away irdthay ucceededsay imhay, andway away ourthfay
ucceededsay ethay irdthay ornay asway isthay ostpay eftlay acantvay ybay ethay esiegedbay,
untilway, ethay irefay ofway ethay oundmay avinghay eenbay extinguishedway, andway ethay enemyway
epulsedray inway everyway irectionday, anway endway asway utpay otay ethay ightingfay.

Ixxvay.Ethay Aulsgay avinghay iedtray everyway expedientway, asway othingnay adhay ucceededsay,
adoptedway ethay esignday ofway eeingflay omfray ethay owntay ethay extnay ayday, ybay ethay adviceway
andway orderway ofway Ercingetorixvay. Eythay opedhay atthay, ybay attemptingway itway atway ethay
eadday ofway ightnay, eythay ouldway effectway itway ithoutway anyway eatgray osslay ofway enmay,
ecausebay ethay ampcay ofway Ercingetorixvay asway otnay arfay istantday omfray ethay owntay, andway
ethay extensiveway arshmay ichwhay intervenedway asway ikelylay otay etardray ethay Omansray inway
ethay ursuitpay. Andway eythay ereway ownay eparingpray otay executeway isthay ybay ightnay, enwhay
ethay atronsmay uddenlysay anray outway intoway ethay eetsstray, andway eepingway astcay
emselvesthay atway ethay eetfay ofway eirthay usbandshay, andway equestedray ofway emthay, ithway
everyway entreatyway, atthay eythay ouldshay otnay abandonway emselvesthay andway eirthay ommoncay
ildrenchay otay ethay enemyway orfay unishmentpay, ecausebay ethay eaknessway ofway eirthay
aturenay andway sicalphyay owerspay eventedpray emthay omfray akingtay otay ightflay. Enwhay
eythay awsay atthay eythay asway earfay oesday otnay enerallygay admitway ofway ercymay inway extremeway
angerday ersistedpay inway eirthay esolutionray, eythay eganbay otay outshay aloudway, andway
ivegay intelligenceway ofway eirthay ightflay otay ethay Omansray. Ethay Aulsgay eingbay
intimidatedway ybay earfay ofway isthay, estlay ethay assespay ouldshay ebay eprayoccupiedway ybay
ethay Omanray avalrycay, esistedday omfray eirthay esignday.

Iixxvay.Ethay extnay ayday Aesarcay, ethay owertay eingbay advancedway, andway ethay orksway
ichwhay ehay adhay eterminedday otay aiseray eingbay arrangedway, away iolentvay ormstay
arisingway, oughtthay isthay onay adbay imetay orfay executingway ishay esignsday, ecausebay ehay
observedway ethay uardsgay arrangedway onway ethay allsway away ittlelay ootay egligentlynay, andway
ereforethay orderedway ishay ownway enmay otay engageway inway eirthay orkway oremay emisslyray, andway
ointedpay outway atwhay ehay ishedway otay ebay oneday. Ehay ewdray upway ishay oldierssay inway away
ecretsay ositionpay ithinway ethay ineaevay, andway exhortsway emthay otay eapray, atway eastlay,
ethay arvesthay ofway ictoryvay oportionatepray otay eirthay exertionsway. Ehay oposedpray away
ewardray orfay osethay owhay ouldshay irstfay alescay ethay allsway, andway avegay ethay ignalsay
otay ethay oldierssay. Eythay uddenlysay ewflay outway omfray allway uartersqay andway uicklyqay
illedfay ethay allway.

Iiixxvay.Ethay enemyway eingbay alarmedway ybay ethay uddennesssay ofway ethay attackway, ereway
islodgedday omfray ethay allway andway owerstay, andway ewdray upway, inway ormfay ofway away edgeway, inway
ethay arketmayaceplay andway ethay openway eetsstray, ithway isthay intentionway atthay, ifway anway
attackway ouldshay ebay ademay onway anyway idesay, eythay ouldshay ightfay ithway eirthay inelay
awndray upway otay eceiveray itway. Enwhay eythay awsay onay oneway escendingday otay ethay evellay
oundgray, andway ethay enemyway extendingway emselvesthay alongway ethay entireway allway inway
everyway irectionday, earingfay estlay everyway opehay ofway ightflay ouldshay ebay utcay offway,
eythay astcay awayway eirthay armsway, andway oughtsay, ithoutway oppingstay, ethay ostmay emoteray
artspay ofway ethay owntay. Away artpay asway enthay ainslay ybay ethay infantryway enwhay eythay ereway
owdingcray uponway oneway anotherway inway ethay arrownay assagepay ofway ethay atesgay; andway away artpay
avinghay otgay ithoutway ethay atesgay, ereway utcay otay iecespay ybay ethay avalrycay ornay asway
erethay oneway owhay asway anxiousway orfay ethay underplay. Usthay, eingbay excitedway ybay ethay
assacremay atway Enabumgay andway ethay atiguefay ofway ethay iegesay, eythay aredspay eithernay
osethay ornway outway ithway earsyay, omenway, orway ildrenchay. Inallyfay, outway ofway allway atthay
umbernay, ichwhay amountedway otay aboutway ortyfay ousandthay, arcelyscay eightway undredhay,
owhay edflay omfray ethay owntay enwhay eythay eardhay ethay irstfay alarmway, eachedray
Ercingetorixvay inway afetysay andway ehay, ethay ightnay eingbay ownay arfay entspay, eceivedray
emthay inway ilencesay afterway eirthay ightflay earingfay atthay anyway editionsay ouldshay
ariseway inway ethay ampcay omfray eirthay entranceway inway away odybay andway ethay ompassioncay ofway
ethay oldierssay, osay atthay, avinghay arrangedway ishay iendsfray andway ethay iefschay ofway
ethay atesstay atway away istanceday onway ethay oadray, ehay ooktay ecautionspray atthay eythay
ouldshay ebay eparatedsay andway onductedcay otay eirthay ellowfay ountrymencay, otay
ateverwhay artpay ofway ethay ampcay adhay eenbay assignedway otay eachway atestay omfray ethay
eginningbay.

Ixxxay.Ercingetorixvay avinghay onvenedcay anway assemblyway onway ethay ollowingfay ayday,
onsoledcay andway encouragedway ishay oldierssay inway ethay ollowingfay ordswayAtthay eythay
ouldshay otnay ebay ootay uchmay epressedday inway iritspay, ornay alarmedway atway eirthay osslay;
atthay ethay Omansray idday otnay onquercay ybay alourvay ornay inway ethay ieldfay, utbay ybay away
indkay ofway artway andway illskay inway assaultway, ithway ichwhay eythay emselvesthay ereway
unacquaintedway; atthay oeverwhay expectedway everyway eventway inway ethay arway otay ebay
avourablefay, erredway; atthay itway evernay asway ishay opinionway atthay Avaricumway ouldshay ebay
efendedday, ofway ethay uthtray ofway ichwhay atementstay ehay adhay emselvesthay asway
itnessesway, utbay atthay itway asway owingway otay ethay imprudenceway ofway ethay Iturigesbay, andway
ethay ootay eadyray ompliancecay ofway ethay estray, atthay isthay osslay asway ustainedsay;
atthay, oweverhay, ehay ouldway oonsay ompensatecay itway ybay uperiorsay advantagesway; orfay
atthay ehay ouldway, ybay ishay exertionsway, ingbray overway osethay atesstay ichwhay everedsay
emselvesthay omfray ethay estray ofway ethay Aulsgay, andway ouldway eatecray away eneralgay
unanimityway oughoutthray ethay olewhay ofway Aulgay, ethay unionway ofway ichwhay otnay evenway ethay
olewhay earthway ouldcay ithstandway, andway atthay ehay adhay itway alreadyway almostway effectedway;
atthay inway ethay eantimemay itway asway easonableray atthay ehay ouldshay evailpray onway emthay,
orfay ethay akesay ofway ethay eneralgay afetysay, otay eginbay otay ortifyfay eirthay ampcay, inway
orderway atthay eythay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway ustainsay ethay uddensay attacksway ofway ethay
enemyway.

Xxxay.Isthay eechspay asway otnay isagreeableday otay ethay Aulsgay, incipallypray,
ecausebay ehay imselfhay asway otnay isheartenedday ybay eceivingray osay everesay away osslay,
andway adhay otnay oncealedcay imselfhay, ornay unnedshay ethay eyesway ofway ethay eoplepay andway
ehay asway elievedbay otay ossesspay eatergray oresightfay andway oundersay udgmentjay anthay
ethay estray, ecausebay, enwhay ethay affairway asway undecidedway, ehay adhay atway irstfay eenbay
ofway opinionway atthay Avaricumway ouldshay ebay urntbay, andway afterwardsway atthay itway ouldshay
ebay abandonedway. Accordinglyway, asway illway uccesssay eakensway ethay authorityway ofway otherway
eneralsgay, osay, onway ethay ontrarycay, ishay ignityday increasedway ailyday, althoughway away
osslay asway ustainedsay atway ethay amesay imetay eythay eganbay otay entertainway opeshay, onway
ishay assertionway, ofway unitingway ethay estray ofway ethay atesstay otay emselvesthay, andway onway
isthay occasionway, orfay ethay irstfay imetay, ethay Aulsgay eganbay otay ortifyfay eirthay
ampscay, andway ereway osay alarmedway atthay althoughway eythay ereway enmay unaccustomedway otay
oiltay, etyay eythay ereway ofway opinionway atthay eythay oughtway otay endureway andway uffersay
everythingway ichwhay ouldshay ebay imposedway uponway emthay.

Ixxxay.Ornay idday Ercingetorixvay useway esslay effortsway anthay ehay adhay omisedpray, otay
aingay overway ethay otherway atesstay, andway inway onsequencecay endeavouredway otay enticeway
eirthay eaderslay ybay iftsgay andway omisespray. Orfay isthay objectway ehay electedsay ittingfay
emissariesway ybay osewhay ubtlesay eadingplay orway ivatepray iendshipfray eachway ofway ethay
oblesnay ouldcay ebay ostmay easilyway influencedway. Ehay akestay arecay atthay osethay owhay
edflay otay imhay onway ethay ormingstay ofway Avaricumway ouldshay ebay ovidedpray ithway armsway andway
othesclay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, atthay ishay iminishedday orcesfay ouldshay ebay
ecruitedray, ehay evieslay away ixedfay uotaqay ofway oldierssay omfray eachway atestay, andway
efinesday ethay umbernay andway ayday eforebay ichwhay ehay ouldshay ishway emthay oughtbray otay
ethay ampcay, andway ordersway allway ethay archersway, ofway omwhay erethay asway away eryvay eatgray
umbernay inway Aulgay, otay ebay ollectedcay andway entsay otay imhay. Ybay esethay eansmay, ethay
oopstray ichwhay ereway ostlay atway Avaricumway areway eedilyspay eplacedray. Inway ethay
eantimemay, Eutomarustay, ethay onsay ofway Olloviconway, ethay ingkay ofway ethay Itiobrigesnay,
osewhay atherfay adhay eceivedray ethay appellationway ofway iendfray omfray ourway enatesay,
amecay otay imhay ithway away eatgray umbernay ofway ishay ownway orsehay andway osethay omwhay ehay adhay
iredhay omfray Aquitaniaway.

Iixxxay.Aesarcay, afterway elayingday everalsay aysday atway Avaricumway, andway indingfay
erethay ethay eatestgray entyplay ofway orncay andway otherway ovisionspray, efreshedray ishay
armyway afterway eirthay atiguefay andway ivationpray. Ethay interway eingbay almostway endedway,
enwhay ehay asway invitedway ybay ethay avourablefay easonsay ofway ethay earyay otay osecutepray
ethay arway andway archmay againstway ethay enemyway, andway tryay etherwhay ehay ouldcay awdray
emthay omfray ethay arshesmay andway oodsway, orway elseway esspray emthay ybay away ockadeblay; omesay
oblemennay ofway ethay Aeduiway amecay otay imhay asway ambassadorsway otay entreatway atthay inway anway
extremeway emergencyway ehay ouldshay uccoursay eirthay atestay; atthay eirthay affairsway ereway
inway ethay utmostway angerday, ecausebay, ereaswhay inglesay agistratesmay adhay eenbay
usuallyway appointedway inway ancientway imestay andway eldhay ethay owerpay ofway ingkay orfay away
inglesay earyay, otway ersonspay ownay exercisedway isthay officeway, andway eachway assertedway
atthay ehay asway appointedway accordingway otay eirthay awslay. Atthay oneway ofway emthay asway
Onvictolitaniscay, away owerfulpay andway illustriousway outhyay; ethay otherway Otuscay,
ungspray omfray away ostmay ancientway amilyfay, andway ersonallypay away anmay ofway eryvay eatgray
influenceway andway extensiveway onnectionscay. Ishay otherbray Aletiacusvay adhay ornebay
ethay amesay officeway uringday ethay astlay earyay atthay ethay olewhay atestay asway upway inway
armsway; ethay enatesay ividedday, ethay eoplepay ividedday; atthay eachway ofway emthay adhay ishay
ownway adherentsway; andway atthay, ifway ethay animosityway ouldway ebay omentedfay anyway ongerlay
ethay esultray ouldway ebay atthay oneway artpay ofway ethay atestay ouldway omecay otay away ollisioncay
ithway ethay otherway; atthay itway estedray ithway ishay activityway andway influenceway otay
eventpray itway.

Iiixxxay.Althoughway Aesarcay onsideredcay itway uinousray otay eavelay ethay arway andway ethay
enemyway, etyay, eingbay ellway awareway atwhay eatgray evilsway enerallygay ariseway omfray
internalway issensionsday, estlay away atestay osay owerfulpay andway osay oselyclay onnectedcay
ithway ethay Omanray eoplepay, ichwhay ehay imselfhay adhay alwaysway osteredfay andway onouredhay
inway everyway espectray, ouldshay avehay ecourseray otay iolencevay andway armsway, andway atthay
ethay artypay ichwhay adhay esslay onfidencecay inway itsway ownway owerpay ouldshay ummonsay aidway
omfray Ercingetorixvay, ehay eterminedday otay anticipateway isthay ovementmay; andway
ecausebay, ybay ethay awslay ofway ethay Aeduiway, itway asway otnay ermittedpay osethay owhay eldhay
ethay upremesay authorityway otay eavelay ethay ountrycay, ehay eterminedday otay ogay inway
ersonpay otay ethay Aeduiway, estlay ehay ouldshay appearway otay infringeway uponway eirthay
overnmentgay andway awslay, andway ummonedsay allway ethay enatesay, andway osethay etweenbay omwhay
ethay isputeday asway, otay eetmay imhay atway Ecetiaday. Enwhay almostway allway ethay atestay adhay
assembledway erethay, andway ehay asway informedway atthay oneway otherbray adhay eenbay eclaredday
agistratemay ybay ethay otherway, enwhay onlyway away ewfay ersonspay ereway ivatelypray ummonedsay
orfay ethay urposepay, atway away ifferentday imetay andway aceplay omfray atwhay ehay oughtway,
ereaswhay ethay awslay otnay onlyway orbadefay otway elongingbay otay oneway amilyfay otay ebay
electedway agistratesmay ilewhay eachway asway aliveway, utbay evenway eterredday emthay omfray
eingbay inway ethay enatesay, ehay ompelledcay Otuscay otay esignray ishay officeway; ehay orderedway
Onvictolitaniscay, owhay adhay eenbay electedway ybay ethay iestspray, accordingway otay ethay
usageway ofway ethay atestay, inway ethay esencepray ofway ethay agistratesmay, otay oldhay ethay
upremesay authorityway.

Ivxxxay.Avinghay onouncedpray isthay ecreeday etweenbay ethay ontendingcay artiespay,
ehay exhortedway ethay Aeduiway otay urybay inway oblivionway eirthay isputesday andway
issensionsday, andway, ayinglay asideway allway esethay ingsthay, evoteday emselvesthay otay
ethay arway, andway expectway omfray imhay, onway ethay onquestcay ofway Aulgay, osethay ewardsray
ichwhay eythay ouldshay avehay earnedway, andway endsay eedilyspay otay imhay allway eirthay
