avalrycay andway entay ousandthay infantryway, ichwhay ehay ightmay aceplay inway ifferentday
arrisonsgay otay otectpray ishay onvoyscay ofway ovisionspray, andway enthay ividedday ishay
armyway intoway otway artspay ehay avegay Abienuslay ourfay egionslay otay eadlay intoway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Enonessay andway Arisiipay; andway edlay inway ersonpay ixsay intoway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Arverniway, inway ethay irectionday ofway ethay owntay ofway Ergoviagay, alongway
ethay anksbay ofway ethay Allierway. Ehay avegay artpay ofway ethay avalrycay otay Abienuslay, andway
eptkay artpay otay imselfhay. Ercingetorixvay, onway earninglay isthay ircumstancecay,
okebray ownday allway ethay idgesbray overway ethay iverray andway eganbay otay archmay onway ethay
otherway ankbay ofway ethay Allierway.

Vxxxay.Enwhay eachway armyway asway inway ightsay ofway ethay otherway, andway asway itchingpay eirthay
ampcay almostway oppositeway atthay ofway ethay enemyway, outsscay eingbay istributedday inway
everyway uarterqay, estlay ethay Omansray ouldshay uildbay away idgebray andway ingbray overway
eirthay oopstray; itway asway otay Aesarcay away attermay attendedway ithway eatgray
ifficultiesday, estlay ehay ouldshay ebay inderedhay omfray assingpay ethay iverray uringday
ethay eatergray artpay ofway ethay ummersay, asway ethay Allierway annotcay enerallygay ebay ordedfay
eforebay ethay autumnway. Ereforethay, atthay isthay ightmay otnay appenhay, avinghay itchedpay
ishay ampcay inway away oodyway aceplay oppositeway otay oneway ofway osethay idgesbray ichwhay
Ercingetorixvay adhay akentay arecay ouldshay ebay okenbray ownday, ethay extnay ayday ehay
oppedstay ehindbay ithway otway egionslay inway away ecretsay aceplay ehay entsay onway ethay estray
ofway ethay orcesfay asway usualway, ithway allway ethay aggagebay, afterway avinghay electedsay omesay
ohortscay, atthay ethay umbernay ofway ethay egionslay ightmay appearway otay ebay ompletecay.
Avinghay orderedway esethay otay advanceway asway arfay asway eythay ouldcay, enwhay ownay, omfray ethay
imetay ofway ayday, ehay onjecturedcay eythay adhay omecay otay anway encampmentway, ehay eganbay otay
ebuildray ethay idgebray onway ethay amesay ilespay, ethay owerlay artpay ofway ichwhay emainedray
entireway. Avinghay uicklyqay inishedfay ethay orkway andway edlay ishay egionslay acrossway, ehay
electedsay away itfay aceplay orfay away ampcay, andway ecalledray ethay estray ofway ishay oopstray.
Ercingetorixvay, onway ascertainingway isthay actfay, entway eforebay imhay ybay orcedfay
archesmay, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay ebay ompelledcay otay omecay otay anway actionway
againstway ishay illway.

Vixxxay.Aesarcay, inway ivefay ays'day archmay, entway omfray atthay aceplay otay Ergoviagay,
andway afterway engagingway inway away ightslay avalrycay irmishskay atthay ayday, onway iewingvay ethay
ituationsay ofway ethay itycay, ichwhay, eingbay uiltbay onway away eryvay ighhay ountainmay, asway
eryvay ifficultday ofway accessway, ehay espairedday ofway akingtay itway ybay ormstay, andway
eterminedday otay aketay onay easuresmay ithway egardray otay esiegingbay itway eforebay ehay
ouldshay ecuresay away upplysay ofway ovisionspray. Utbay Ercingetorixvay, avinghay itchedpay
ishay ampcay onway ethay ountainmay earnay ethay owntay, acedplay ethay orcesfay ofway eachway atestay
eparatelysay andway atway allsmay intervalsway aroundway imselfhay, andway avinghay occupiedway
allway ethay illshay ofway atthay angeray asway arfay asway eythay ommandedcay away iewvay ofway ethay
Omanray encampmentway, ehay esentedpray away ormidablefay appearanceway; ehay orderedway ethay
ulersray ofway ethay atesstay, omwhay ehay adhay electedsay asway ishay ouncilcay ofway arway, otay
omecay otay imhay ailyday atway ethay awnday, etherwhay anyway easuremay eemedsay otay equireray
eliberationday orway executionway. Ornay idday ehay allowway almostway anyway ayday otay asspay
ithoutway estingtay inway away avalrycay actionway, ethay archersway eingbay intermixedway, atwhay
iritspay andway alourvay erethay asway inway eachway ofway ishay ownway enmay. Erethay asway away illhay
oppositeway ethay owntay, atway ethay eryvay ootfay ofway atthay ountainmay, onglystray ortifiedfay
andway ecipitouspray onway everyway idesay ichwhay ifway ourway enmay ouldcay aingay, eythay eemedsay
ikelylay otay excludeway ethay enemyway omfray away eatgray areshay ofway eirthay upplysay ofway aterway,
andway omfray eefray oragingfay; utbay isthay aceplay asway occupiedway ybay emthay ithway away eakway
arrisongay oweverhay, Aesarcay etsay outway omfray ethay ampcay inway ethay ilencesay ofway
ightnay, andway islodgingday ethay arrisongay eforebay uccoursay ouldcay omecay omfray ethay
owntay, ehay otgay ossessionpay ofway ethay aceplay andway ostedpay otway egionslay erethay, andway
ewdray omfray ethay eatergray ampcay otay ethay esslay away oubleday enchtray elvetway eetfay
oadbray, osay atthay ethay oldierssay ouldcay evenway inglysay asspay ecuresay omfray anyway
uddensay attackway ofway ethay enemyway.

Viixxxay.Ilstwhay esethay affairsway ereway oinggay onway atway Ergoviagay,
Onvictolitaniscay, ethay Aeduanway, otay omwhay eway avehay observedway ethay agistracymay asway
adjudgedway ybay Aesarcay, eingbay ibedbray ybay ethay Arverniway, oldshay away onferencecay ithway
ertaincay oungyay enmay, ethay iefchay ofway omwhay ereway Itavicuslay andway ishay othersbray,
owhay ereway ornbay ofway away ostmay oblenay amilyfay. Ehay aresshay ethay ibebray ithway emthay, andway
exhortsway emthay otay ememberray atthay eythay ereway eefray andway ornbay orfay empireway; atthay
ethay atestay ofway ethay Aeduiway asway ethay onlyway oneway ichwhay etardedray ethay ostmay ertaincay
ictoryvay ofway ethay Aulsgay; atthay ethay estray ereway eldhay inway eckchay ybay itsway authorityway;
andway, ifway itway asway oughtbray overway, ethay Omansray ouldway otnay avehay oomray otay andstay onway
inway Aulgay; atthay ehay adhay eceivedray omesay indnesskay omfray Aesarcay, onlyway osay arfay,
oweverhay, asway aininggay away ostmay ustjay ausecay ybay ishay ecisionday; utbay atthay ehay
assignedway oremay eightway otay ethay eneralgay eedomfray; orfay, whyay ouldshay ethay Aeduiway
ogay otay Aesarcay otay ecideday oncerningcay eirthay ightsray andway awslay, atherray anthay ethay
Omansray omecay otay ethay Aeduiway? Ethay oungyay enmay eingbay easilyway onway overway ybay ethay
eechspay ofway ethay agistratemay andway ethay ibebray, enwhay eythay eclaredday atthay eythay
ouldway evenway ebay eaderslay inway ethay otplay, away anplay orfay accomplishingway itway asway
onsideredcay, ecausebay eythay ereway onfidentcay eirthay atestay ouldcay otnay ebay inducedway
otay undertakeway ethay arway onway ightslay oundsgray. Itway asway esolvedray atthay Itavicuslay
ouldshay avehay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay entay ousandthay ichwhay ereway eingbay entsay otay
Aesarcay orfay ethay arway, andway ouldshay avehay argechay ofway emthay onway eirthay archmay, andway
atthay ishay othersbray ouldshay ogay eforebay imhay otay Aesarcay. Eythay arrangeway ethay otherway
easuresmay, andway ethay annermay inway ichwhay eythay ouldshay avehay emthay oneday.

Viiixxxay.Itavicuslay, avinghay eceivedray ethay ommandcay ofway ethay armyway, uddenlysay
onvenedcay ethay oldierssay, enwhay ehay asway aboutway irtythay ilesmay istantday omfray
Ergoviagay, andway, eepingway, aidsay, Oldierssay, itherwhay areway eway oinggay? Allway ourway
ightsknay andway allway ourway oblesnay avehay erishedpay. Eporedorixway andway Iridomarusvay,
ethay incipalpray enmay ofway ethay atestay, eingbay accusedway ofway easontray, avehay eenbay
ainslay ybay ethay Omansray ithoutway evenway ermissionpay otay eadplay eirthay ausecay. Earnlay
isthay intelligenceway omfray osethay owhay avehay escapedway omfray ethay assacremay; orfay Iway,
incesay ymay othersbray andway allway ymay elationsray avehay eenbay ainslay, amway eventedpray ybay
iefgray omfray eclaringday atwhay ashay akentay aceplay. Ersonspay areway oughtbray orwardfay
omwhay ehay adhay instructedway inway atwhay ehay ouldway avehay emthay aysay, andway akemay ethay amesay
atementsstay otay ethay oldierysay asway Itavicuslay adhay ademay atthay allway ethay ightsknay
ofway ethay Aeduiway ereway ainslay ecausebay eythay ereway aidsay otay avehay eldhay onferencescay
ithway ethay Arverniway; atthay eythay adhay oncealedcay emselvesthay amongway ethay ultitudemay
ofway oldierssay, andway adhay escapedway omfray ethay idstmay ofway ethay aughterslay. Ethay Aeduiway
outshay aloudway andway onjurecay Itavicuslay otay ovidepray orfay eirthay afetysay. Asway ifway,
aidsay ehay, itway ereway away attermay ofway eliberationday, andway otnay ofway ecessitynay, orfay usway
otay ogay otay Ergoviagay andway uniteway ourselvesway otay ethay Arverniway. Orway avehay eway anyway
easonsray otay oubtday atthay ethay Omansray, afterway erpetratingpay ethay atrociousway
imecray, areway ownay asteninghay otay ayslay usway? Ereforethay, ifway erethay ebay anyway iritspay
inway usway, etlay usway avengeway ethay eathday ofway osethay owhay avehay erishedpay inway away ostmay
unworthyway annermay, andway etlay usway ayslay esethay obbersray. Ehay ointspay otay ethay Omanray
itizenscay, owhay adhay accompaniedway emthay, inway elianceray onway ishay otectionpray. Ehay
immediatelyway eizessay away eatgray uantityqay ofway orncay andway ovisionspray, uellycray
orturestay emthay, andway enthay utspay emthay otay eathday, endssay essengersmay oughoutthray
ethay entireway atestay ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway ousesray emthay ompletelycay ybay ethay amesay
alsehoodfay oncerningcay ethay aughterslay ofway eirthay ightsknay andway oblesnay; ehay
earnestlyway advisesway emthay otay avengeway, inway ethay amesay annermay asway ehay idday, ethay
ongswray ichwhay eythay adhay eceivedray.

Ixxxxay.Eporedorixway, ethay Aeduanway, away oungyay anmay ornbay inway ethay ighesthay ankray andway
ossessingpay eryvay eatgray influenceway atway omehay, andway, alongway ithway Iridomarusvay, ofway
equalway ageway andway influenceway, utbay ofway inferiorway irthbay, omwhay Aesarcay adhay aisedray
omfray away umblehay ositionpay otay ethay ighesthay ankray, onway eingbay ecommendedray otay imhay
ybay Ivitiacusday, adhay omecay inway ethay umbernay ofway orsehay, eingbay ummonedsay ybay Aesarcay
ybay amenay. Esethay adhay away isputeday ithway eachway otherway orfay ecedencepray, andway inway ethay
ugglestray etweenbay ethay agistratesmay eythay adhay ontendedcay ithway eirthay utmostway
effortsway, ethay oneway orfay Onvictolitaniscay, ethay otherway orfay Otuscay. Ofway esethay
Eporedorixway, onway earninglay ethay esignday ofway Itavicuslay, ayslay ethay attermay eforebay
Aesarcay almostway atway idnightmay; ehay entreatsway atthay Aesarcay ouldshay otnay uffersay
eirthay atestay otay ervesway omfray ethay allianceway ithway ethay Omanray eoplepay, owingway otay
ethay epravedday ounselscay ofway away ewfay oungyay enmay, ichwhay ehay oresawfay ouldway ebay ethay
onsequencecay ifway osay anymay ousandthay enmay ouldshay uniteway emselvesthay otay ethay
enemyway, asway eirthay elationsray ouldcay otnay eglectnay eirthay afetysay, ornay ethay atestay
egardray itway asway away attermay ofway ightslay importanceway.

Lxay.Aesarcay eltfay eatgray anxietyway onway isthay intelligenceway, ecausebay ehay adhay
alwaysway especiallyway indulgedway ethay atestay ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway, ithoutway anyway
esitationhay, awsdray outway omfray ethay ampcay ourfay ightlayarmedway egionslay andway allway ethay
avalrycay ornay adhay ehay imetay, atway uchsay away isiscray, otay ontractcay ethay ampcay,
ecausebay ethay affairway eemedsay otay ependday uponway espatchday. Ehay eaveslay Aiuscay
Abiusfay, ishay ieutenantlay, ithway otway egionslay otay uardgay ethay ampcay. Enwhay ehay
orderedway ethay othersbray ofway Itavicuslay otay ebay arrestedway, ehay iscoversday atthay eythay
adhay edflay away ortshay imetay eforebay otay ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway. Ehay encouragedway ishay
oldierssay otnay otay ebay isheartenedday ybay ethay abourlay ofway ethay ourneyjay onway uchsay away
ecessarynay occasionway, andway, afterway advancingway entytwayivefay ilesmay, allway eingbay
ostmay eagerway, ehay amecay inway ightsay ofway ethay armyway ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway, ybay endingsay
onway ishay avalrycay, etardsray andway impedesway eirthay archmay; ehay enthay issuesway ictstray
ordersway otay allway ishay oldierssay otay illkay onay oneway. Ehay ommandscay Eporedorixway andway
Iridomarusvay, owhay eythay oughtthay ereway illedkay, otay ovemay amongway ethay avalrycay andway
addressway eirthay iendsfray. Enwhay eythay ereway ecognizedray andway ethay eacherytray ofway
Itavicuslay iscoveredday, ethay Aeduiway eganbay otay extendway eirthay andshay otay intimateway
ubmissionsay, andway, ayinglay ownday eirthay armsway, otay eprecateday eathday. Itavicuslay,
ithway ishay ansmenclay, owhay afterway ethay ustomcay ofway ethay Aulsgay onsidercay itway away imecray
otay esertday eirthay atronspay, evenway inway extremeway isfortunemay, eesflay orthfay otay
Ergoviagay.

Ixlay.Aesarcay, afterway endingsay essengersmay otay ethay atestay ofway ethay Aeduiway, otay
informway emthay atthay eythay omwhay ehay ouldcay avehay utpay otay eathday ybay ethay ightray ofway
arway ereway aredspay oughthray ishay indnesskay, andway afterway ivinggay eethray ourshay ofway
ethay ightnay otay ishay armyway orfay ishay eposeray, irectedday ishay archmay otay Ergoviagay.
Almostway inway ethay iddlemay ofway ethay ourneyjay, away artypay ofway orsehay atthay ereway entsay ybay
Abiusfay atedstay inway owhay eatgray angerday attersmay ereway; eythay informway imhay atthay ethay
ampcay asway attackedway ybay away eryvay owerfulpay armyway, ilewhay eshfray enmay ereway
equentlyfray elievingray ethay eariedway, andway exhaustingway ourway oldierssay ybay ethay
incessantway oiltay, incesay, onway accountway ofway ethay izesay ofway ethay ampcay, eythay adhay
onstantlycay otay emainray onway ethay ampartray; atthay anymay adhay eenbay oundedway ybay ethay
immenseway umbernay ofway arrowsway andway allway indskay ofway issilesmay; atthay ethay enginesway
ereway ofway eatgray ervicesay inway ithstandingway emthay; atthay Abiusfay, atway eirthay
epartureday, eavinglay onlyway otway atesgay openway, asway ockingblay upway ethay estray, andway
asway addingway eastbrayorksway otay ethay ampartsray, andway asway eparingpray imselfhay orfay away
imilarsay asualtycay onway ethay ollowingfay ayday. Aesarcay, afterway eceivingray isthay
informationway, eachedray ethay ampcay eforebay unrisesay owingway otay ethay eryvay eatgray
ealzay ofway ishay oldierssay.

Iixlay.Ilstwhay esethay ingsthay areway oinggay onway atway Ergoviagay, ethay Aeduiway, onway
eceivingray ethay irstfay announcementsway omfray Itavicuslay, eavelay emselvesthay onay
imetay otay ascertainway ethay uthtray ofway esethay atementsstay. Omesay areway imulatedstay ybay
avariceway, othersway ybay evengeray andway edulitycray, ichwhay isway anway innateway opensitypray
inway atthay aceray ofway enmay otay uchsay away egreeday atthay eythay onsidercay away ightslay umourray
asway anway ascertainedway actfay. Eythay underplay ethay opertypray ofway ethay Omanray itizenscay,
andway eitherway assacremay emthay orway agdray emthay awayway otay averyslay. Onvictolitaniscay
increasesway ethay evilway atestay ofway affairsway, andway oadsgay onway ethay eoplepay otay uryfay,
atthay ybay ethay ommissioncay ofway omesay outrageway eythay aymay ebay ashamedway otay eturnray otay
oprietypray. Eythay enticeway omfray ethay owntay ofway Abillonuscay, ybay away omisepray ofway
afetysay, Arcusmay Aristiusway, away ilitarymay ibunetray, owhay asway onway ishay archmay otay ishay
egionlay; eythay ompelcay osethay owhay adhay ettledsay erethay orfay ethay urposepay ofway
adingtray otay oday ethay amesay. Ybay onstantlycay attackingway emthay onway eirthay archmay eythay
ipstray emthay ofway allway eirthay aggagebay; eythay esiegebay ayday andway ightnay osethay atthay
esistedray; enwhay anymay ereway ainslay onway othbay idessay, eythay exciteway away eatergray
umbernay otay armsway.

Iiixlay.Inway ethay eantimemay, enwhay intelligenceway asway oughtbray atthay allway eirthay
oldierssay ereway inway Aesar'scay owerpay, eythay unray inway away odybay otay Aristiusway; eythay
assureway imhay atthay othingnay adhay eenbay oneday ybay ublicpay authorityway; eythay orderway anway
inquiryway otay ebay ademay aboutway ethay underedplay opertypray; eythay onfiscatecay ethay
opertypray ofway Itavicuslay andway ishay othersbray; eythay endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay
orfay ethay urposepay ofway earingclay emselvesthay. Eythay oday allway isthay ithway away iewvay otay
ecoverray eirthay oldierssay; utbay eingbay ontaminatedcay ybay uiltgay, andway armedchay ybay
ethay ainsgay arisingway omfray ethay underedplay opertypray, asway atthay actway asway aredshay inway
ybay anymay, andway eingbay emptedtay ybay ethay earfay ofway unishmentpay, eythay eganbay otay ormfay
ansplay ofway arway andway irstay upway ethay otherway atesstay ybay embassiesway. Althoughway Aesarcay
asway awareway ofway isthay oceedingpray, etyay ehay addressesway ethay ambassadorsway ithway asway
uchmay ildnessmay asway ehay ancay Atthay ehay idday otnay inkthay orseway ofway ethay atestay onway
accountway ofway ethay ignoranceway andway icklenessfay ofway ethay obmay, ornay ouldway iminishday
ishay egardray orfay ethay Aeduiway. Ehay imselfhay, earingfay away eatergray ommotioncay inway
Aulgay, inway orderway otay eventpray ishay eingbay urroundedsay ybay allway ethay atesstay, eganbay
otay ormfay ansplay asway otay ethay annermay inway ichwhay ehay ouldshay eturnray omfray Ergoviagay
andway againway oncentratecay ishay orcesfay, estlay away epartureday arisingway omfray ethay earfay
ofway away evoltray ouldshay eemsay ikelay away ightflay.

Ivxlay.Ilstwhay ehay asway onsideringcay esethay ingsthay anway opportunityway ofway actingway
uccessfullysay eemedsay otay offerway. Orfay, enwhay ehay adhay omecay intoway ethay allersmay
ampcay orfay ethay urposepay ofway ecuringsay ethay orksway, ehay oticednay atthay ethay illhay inway
ethay ossessionpay ofway ethay enemyway asway iptstray ofway enmay, althoughway, onway ethay ormerfay
aysday, itway ouldcay arcelyscay ebay eensay onway accountway ofway ethay umbersnay onway itway. Eingbay
astonishedway, ehay inquiresway ethay easonray ofway itway omfray ethay esertersday, away eatgray
umbernay ofway omwhay ockedflay otay imhay ailyday. Eythay allway oncurredcay inway assertingway,
atwhay Aesarcay imselfhay adhay alreadyway ascertainedway ybay ishay outsscay, atthay ethay ackbay
ofway atthay illhay asway almostway evellay; utbay ikewiselay oodyway andway arrownay, ybay ichwhay
erethay asway away asspay otay ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay owntay; atthay eythay adhay erioussay
apprehensionsway orfay isthay aceplay, andway adhay onay otherway ideaway, onway ethay occupationway
ofway oneway illhay ybay ethay Omansray, anthay atthay, ifway eythay ouldshay oselay ethay otherway,
eythay ouldway ebay almostway urroundedsay, andway utcay offway omfray allway egressway andway
oragingfay; atthay eythay ereway allway ummonedsay ybay Ercingetorixvay otay ortifyfay isthay
aceplay.

Xlvay.Aesarcay, onway eingbay informedway ofway isthay ircumstancecay, endssay everalsay
oopstray ofway orsehay otay ethay aceplay immediatelyway afterway idnightmay; ehay ordersway emthay
otay angeray inway everyway uarterqay ithway oremay umulttay anthay usualway. Atway awnday ehay ordersway
away argelay uantityqay ofway aggagebay otay ebay awndray outway ofway ethay ampcay, andway ethay
uleteersmay ithway elmetshay, inway ethay appearanceway andway uisegay ofway orsemenhay, otay ideray
oundray ethay illshay. Otay esethay ehay addsway away ewfay avalrycay, ithway instructionsway otay
angeray oremay idelyway otay akemay away owshay. Ehay ordersway emthay allway otay eeksay ethay amesay
uarterqay ybay away onglay ircuitcay; esethay oceedingspray ereway eensay atway away istanceday
omfray ethay owntay, asway Ergoviagay ommandedcay away iewvay ofway ethay ampcay, ornay ouldcay ethay
Aulsgay ascertainway atway osay eatgray away istanceday atwhay ertaintycay erethay asway inway ethay
anoeuvremay. Ehay endssay oneway egionlay otay ethay amesay illhay, andway afterway itway adhay
archedmay away ittlelay, ationsstay itway inway ethay owerlay oundgray, andway oncealscay itway inway
ethay oodsway. Ethay uspicionssay ofway ethay Aulsgay areway increasedway, andway allway eirthay
orcesfay areway archedmay otay atthay aceplay otay efendday itway. Aesarcay, avinghay erceivedpay
ethay ampcay ofway ethay enemyway esertedday, overscay ethay ilitarymay insigniaway ofway ishay enmay,
oncealscay ethay andardsstay, andway ansferstray ishay oldierssay inway allsmay odiesbay omfray
ethay eatergray otay ethay esslay ampcay, andway ointspay outway otay ethay ieutenantslay omwhay ehay
adhay acedplay inway ommandcay overway ethay espectiveray egionslay, atwhay ehay ouldshay ishway
otay ebay oneday; ehay articularlypay advisesway emthay otay estrainray eirthay enmay omfray
advancingway ootay arfay, oughthray eirthay esireday ofway ightingfay, orway eirthay opehay ofway
underplay; ehay etssay eforebay emthay atwhay isadvantagesday ethay unfavourableway aturenay
ofway ethay oundgray arriescay ithway itway; atthay eythay ouldcay ebay assistedway ybay espatchday
aloneway atthay uccesssay ependedday onway away urprisesay, andway otnay onway away attlebay. Afterway
atingstay esethay articularspay, ehay ivesgay ethay ignalsay orfay actionway, andway etachesday
ethay Aeduiway atway ethay amesay imetay ybay anotherway ascentway anway ethay ightray.

Ixlvay.Ethay owntay allway asway 1200 acespay istantday omfray ethay ainplay andway ootfay ofway
ethay ascentway, inway away aightstray inelay, ifway onay apgay intervenedway; ateverwhay ircuitcay
asway addedway otay isthay ascentway, otay akemay ethay illhay easyway, increasedway ethay engthlay ofway
ethay outeray. Utbay almostway inway ethay iddlemay ofway ethay illhay, ethay Aulsgay adhay
eviouslypray uiltbay away allway ixsay eetfay ighhay, ademay ofway argelay onesstay, andway
extendingway inway engthlay asway arfay asway ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray ermittedpay, asway away
arrierbay otay etardray ethay advanceway ofway ourway enmay; andway eavinglay allway ethay owerlay
acespay emptyway, eythay adhay illedfay ethay upperway artpay ofway ethay illhay, asway arfay asway ethay
allway ofway ethay owntay, ithway eirthay ampscay eryvay oseclay otay oneway anotherway. Ethay
oldierssay, onway ethay ignalsay eingbay ivengay, uicklyqay advanceway otay isthay
ortificationfay, andway assingpay overway itway, akemay emselvesthay astersmay ofway ethay
eparatesay ampscay. Andway osay eatgray asway eirthay activityway inway akingtay ethay ampscay,
atthay Eutomarustay, ethay ingkay ofway ethay Itiobrigesnay, eingbay uddenlysay urprisedsay
inway ishay enttay, asway ehay adhay onegay otay estray atway oonnay, ithway ifficultyday escapedway
omfray ethay andshay ofway ethay underersplay, ithway ethay upperway artpay ofway ishay ersonpay
akednay, andway ishay orsehay oundedway.

Iixlvay.Aesarcay, avinghay accomplishedway ethay objectway ichwhay ehay adhay inway iewvay,
orderedway ethay ignalsay otay ebay oundedsay orfay away etreatray; andway ethay oldierssay ofway ethay
enthtay egionlay, ybay ichwhay ehay asway enthay accompaniedway, altedhay. Utbay ethay oldierssay
ofway ethay otherway egionslay, otnay earinghay ethay oundsay ofway ethay umpettray, ecausebay
erethay asway away eryvay argelay alleyvay etweenbay emthay, ereway oweverhay eptkay ackbay ybay
ethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay andway ethay ieutenantslay, accordingway otay Aesar'scay
ordersway; utbay eingbay animatedway ybay ethay ospectpray ofway eedyspay ictoryvay, andway ethay
ightflay ofway ethay enemyway, andway ethay avourablefay attlesbay ofway ormerfay eriodspay, eythay
oughtthay othingnay osay ifficultday atthay eirthay averybray ouldcay otnay accomplishway itway;
ornay idday eythay utpay anway endway otay ethay ursuitpay, untilway eythay ewdray ighnay otay ethay allway
ofway ethay owntay andway ethay atesgay. Utbay enthay, enwhay away outshay aroseway inway everyway uarterqay
ofway ethay itycay, osethay owhay ereway atway away istanceday eingbay alarmedway ybay ethay uddensay
umulttay, edflay astilyhay omfray ethay owntay, incesay eythay oughtthay atthay ethay enemyway
ereway ithinway ethay atesgay. Ethay atronsmay eginbay otay astcay eirthay othesclay andway
ilversay overway ethay allway, andway endingbay overway asway arfay asway ethay owerlay artpay ofway ethay
osombay, ithway outstretchedway andshay eseechbay ethay Omansray otay arespay emthay, andway otnay
otay acrificesay otay eirthay esentmentray evenway omenway andway ildrenchay, asway eythay adhay
oneday atway Avaricumway. Omesay ofway emthay etlay emselvesthay ownday omfray ethay allsway ybay
eirthay andshay, andway urrenderedsay otay ourway oldierssay. Uciuslay Abiusfay, away enturioncay
ofway ethay eighthway egionlay, owhay, itway asway ascertainedway, adhay aidsay atthay ayday amongway
ishay ellowfay oldierssay atthay ehay asway excitedway ybay ethay underplay ofway Avaricumway, andway
ouldway otnay allowway anyway oneway otay ountmay ethay allway eforebay imhay, indingfay eethray enmay
ofway ishay ownway ompanycay, andway eingbay aisedray upway ybay emthay, aledscay ethay allway. Ehay
imselfhay, inway urntay, akingtay oldhay ofway emthay oneway ybay oneway, ewdray emthay upway otay ethay
allway.

Iiixlvay.Inway ethay eantimemay osethay owhay adhay onegay otay ethay otherway artpay ofway ethay
owntay otay efendday itway, asway eway avehay entionedmay aboveway, atway irstfay, arousedway ybay
earinghay ethay outsshay, andway, afterwardsway, ybay equentfray accountsway atthay ethay owntay
asway inway ossessionpay ofway ethay Omansray, entsay orwardfay eirthay avalrycay, andway
astenedhay inway argerlay umbersnay otay atthay uarterqay. Asway eachway irstfay amecay ehay oodstay
eneathbay ethay allway, andway increasedway ethay umbernay ofway ishay ountrymencay engagedway inway
actionway. Enwhay away eatgray ultitudemay ofway emthay adhay assembledway, ethay atronsmay, owhay away
ittlelay eforebay ereway etchingstray eirthay andshay omfray ethay allsway otay ethay Omansray,
eganbay otay eseechbay eirthay ountrymencay, andway afterway ethay Allicgay ashionfay otay owshay
eirthay ishevelledday airhay, andway ingbray eirthay ildrenchay intoway ublicpay iewvay.
Eithernay inway ositionpay ornay inway umbersnay asway ethay ontestcay anway equalway oneway otay ethay
Omansray; atway ethay amesay imetay, eingbay exhaustedway ybay unningray andway ethay onglay
ontinuationcay ofway ethay ightfay, eythay ouldcay otnay easilyway ithstandway eshfray andway
igorousvay oopstray.

Ixxlay.Aesarcay, enwhay ehay erceivedpay atthay ishay oldierssay ereway ightingfay onway
unfavourableway oundgray, andway atthay ethay enemy'sway orcesfay ereway increasingway, eingbay
alarmedway orfay ethay afetysay ofway ishay oopstray, entsay ordersway otay Itustay Extiussay, oneway
ofway ishay ieutenantslay, omwhay ehay adhay eftlay otay uardgay ethay allersmay ampcay, otay eadlay
outway ishay ohortscay uicklyqay omfray ethay ampcay, andway ostpay emthay atway ethay ootfay ofway ethay
illhay, onway ethay ightray ingway ofway ethay enemyway; atthay ifway ehay ouldshay eesay ourway enmay
ivendray omfray ethay oundgray, ehay ouldshay eterday ethay enemyway omfray ollowingfay ootay
oselyclay. Ehay imselfhay, advancingway ithway ethay egionlay away ittlelay omfray atthay aceplay
erewhay ehay adhay akentay ishay ostpay, awaitedway ethay issueway ofway ethay attlebay.

.Ilewhay ethay ightfay asway oinggay onway ostmay igorouslyvay, andhay otay andhay, andway ethay
enemyway ependedday onway eirthay ositionpay andway umbersnay, ourway enmay onway eirthay averybray,
ethay Aeduiway uddenlysay appearedway onway ourway exposedway ankflay, asway Aesarcay adhay entsay
emthay ybay anotherway ascentway onway ethay ightray, orfay ethay akesay ofway eatingcray away
iversionday. Esethay, omfray ethay imilaritysay ofway eirthay armsway, eatlygray errifiedtay
ourway enmay; andway althoughway eythay ereway iscoveredday otay avehay eirthay ightray ouldersshay
arebay, ichwhay asway usuallyway ethay ignsay ofway osethay educedray otay eacepay, etyay ethay
oldierssay uspectedsay atthay isthay eryvay ingthay asway oneday ybay ethay enemyway otay eceiveday
emthay. Atway ethay amesay imetay Uciuslay Abiusfay ethay enturioncay, andway osethay owhay adhay
aledscay ethay allway ithway imhay, eingbay urroundedsay andway ainslay, ereway astcay omfray ethay
allway. Arcusmay Etreiuspay, away enturioncay ofway ethay amesay egionlay, afterway attemptingway
otay ewhay ownday ethay atesgay, asway overpoweredway ybay umbersnay, andway, espairingday ofway
ishay afetysay, avinghay alreadyway eceivedray anymay oundsway, aidsay otay ethay oldierssay ofway
ishay ownway ompanycay owhay ollowedfay imhay Incesay Iway annotcay avesay ouyay asway ellway asway
elfmysay, Iway allshay atway eastlay ovidepray orfay ouryay afetysay, incesay Iway alluredway ybay ethay
ovelay ofway oryglay, edlay ouyay intoway isthay angerday, oday ouyay avesay ourselvesyay enwhay anway
opportunityway isway ivengay. Atway ethay amesay imetay ehay ushedray intoway ethay idstmay ofway ethay
enemyway, andway ayingslay otway ofway emthay, ovedray ackbay ethay estray away ittlelay omfray ethay
ategay. Enwhay ishay enmay attemptedway otay aidway imhay, Inway ainvay, ehay ayssay, ouyay
endeavourway otay ocurepray ymay afetysay incesay oodblay andway engthstray areway ownay ailingfay
emay, ereforethay eavelay isthay, ilewhay ouyay avehay ethay opportunityway, andway etreatray otay
ethay egionlay. Usthay ehay ellfay ightingfay away ewfay omentsmay afterway, andway avedsay ishay
enmay ybay ishay ownway eathday.

Ilay.Ourway oldierssay, eingbay ardhay essedpray onway everyway idesay, ereway islodgedday omfray
eirthay ositionpay, ithway ethay osslay ofway ortyfayixsay enturionscay; utbay ethay enthtay
egionlay, ichwhay adhay eenbay ostedpay inway eserveray onway oundgray away ittlelay oremay evellay,
eckedchay ethay Aulsgay inway eirthay eagerway ursuitpay. Itway asway upportedsay ybay ethay
ohortscay ofway ethay irteenththay egionlay, ichwhay, eingbay edlay omfray ethay allersmay
ampcay, adhay, underway ethay ommandcay ofway Itustay Extiussay, occupiedway ethay igherhay
oundgray. Ethay egionslay, asway oonsay asway eythay eachedray ethay ainplay, altedhay andway acedfay
ethay enemyway. Ercingetorixvay edlay ackbay ishay enmay omfray ethay artpay ofway ethay illhay
ithinway ethay ortificationsfay. Onway atthay ayday ittlelay esslay anthay evensay undredhay ofway
ethay oldierssay ereway issingmay.

Iilay.Onway ethay extnay ayday, Aesarcay, avinghay alledcay away eetingmay, ensuredcay ethay
ashnessray andway avariceway ofway ishay oldierssay, Inway atthay eythay adhay udgedjay orfay
emselvesthay owhay arfay eythay oughtway otay oceedpray, orway atwhay eythay oughtway otay oday, andway
ouldcay otnay ebay eptkay ackbay ybay ethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay andway ethay
ieutenantslay; andway atedstay, atwhay ethay isadvantageday ofway ethay oundgray ouldcay
effectway, atwhay opinionway ehay imselfhay adhay entertainedway atway Avaricumway, enwhay avinghay
urprisedsay ethay enemyway ithoutway eitherway eneralgay orway avalrycay, ehay adhay ivengay upway away
ertaincay ictoryvay, estlay evenway away iflingtray osslay ouldshay occurway inway ethay ontestcay
owingway otay ethay isadvantageday ofway ositionpay. Atthay asway uchmay asway ehay admiredway ethay
eatnessgray ofway eirthay ouragecay, incesay eithernay ethay ortificationsfay ofway ethay
ampcay, ornay ethay eighthay ofway ethay ountainmay, ornay ethay allway ofway ethay owntay ouldcay
etardray emthay; inway ethay amesay egreeday ehay ensuredcay eirthay icentiousnesslay andway
arroganceway, ecausebay eythay oughtthay atthay eythay ewknay oremay anthay eirthay eneralgay
oncerningcay ictoryvay, andway ethay issueway ofway actionsway andway atthay ehay equiredray inway
ishay oldierssay orbearancefay andway elfsayommandcay, otnay esslay anthay alourvay andway
agnanimitymay.

Iiilay.Avinghay eldhay isthay assemblyway, andway avinghay encouragedway ethay oldierssay atway
ethay onclusioncay ofway ishay eechspay, Atthay eythay ouldshay otnay ebay ispiritedday onway
isthay accountway, ornay attributeway otay ethay alourvay ofway ethay enemyway atwhay ethay
isadvantageday ofway ositionpay adhay ausedcay; entertainingway ethay amesay iewsvay ofway ishay
epartureday atthay ehay adhay eviouslypray adhay, ehay edlay orthfay ethay egionslay omfray ethay
ampcay, andway ewdray upway ishay armyway inway orderway ofway attlebay inway away uitablesay aceplay. Enwhay
Ercingetorixvay, everthelessnay, ouldway otnay escendday otay ethay evellay oundgray, away
ightslay avalrycay actionway, andway atthay away uccessfulsay oneway, avinghay akentay aceplay, ehay
edlay ackbay ishay armyway intoway ethay ampcay. Enwhay ehay adhay oneday isthay, ethay extnay ayday,
inkingthay atthay ehay adhay oneday enoughway otay owerlay ethay idepray ofway ethay Aulsgay, andway otay
encourageway ethay indsmay ofway ishay oldierssay, ehay ovedmay ishay ampcay inway ethay irectionday
ofway ethay Aeduiway. Ethay enemyway otnay evenway enthay ursuingpay usway, onway ethay irdthay ayday ehay
epairedray ethay idgebray overway ethay iverray Allierway, andway edlay overway ishay olewhay armyway.

Ivlay.Avinghay enthay eldhay anway interviewway ithway Iridomarusvay andway Eporedorixway ethay
Aeduansway, ehay earnslay atthay Itavicuslay adhay etsay outway ithway allway ethay avalrycay otay
aiseray ethay Aeduiway; atthay itway asway ecessarynay atthay eythay ootay ouldshay ogay eforebay
imhay otay onfirmcay ethay atestay inway eirthay allegianceway. Althoughway ehay ownay awsay
istinctlyday ethay eacherytray ofway ethay Aeduiway inway anymay ingsthay, andway asway ofway opinionway
atthay ethay evoltray ofway ethay entireway atestay ouldway ebay astenedhay ybay eirthay
epartureday; etyay ehay oughtthay atthay eythay ouldshay otnay ebay etainedday, estlay ehay
ouldshay appearway eitherway otay offerway anway insultway, orway etraybay omesay uspicionsay ofway
earfay. Ehay ieflybray atesstay otay emthay enwhay epartingday ishay ervicessay owardstay ethay
Aeduiway inway atwhay away atestay andway owhay umbledhay ehay adhay oundfay emthay, ivendray intoway
eirthay ownstay, eprivedday ofway eirthay andslay, ippedstray ofway allway eirthay orcesfay, away
ibutetray imposedway onway emthay, andway ostageshay estedwray omfray emthay ithway ethay utmostway
insultway; andway otay atwhay onditioncay andway otay atwhay eatnessgray ehay adhay aisedray emthay,
osay uchmay osay atthay eythay adhay otnay onlyway ecoveredray eirthay ormerfay ositionpay, utbay
eemedsay otay urpasssay ethay ignityday andway influenceway ofway allway ethay eviouspray erasway ofway
eirthay istoryhay. Afterway ivinggay esethay admonitionsway ehay ismissedday emthay.

Vlay.Oviodunumnay asway away owntay ofway ethay Aeduiway, advantageouslyway ituatedsay onway ethay
anksbay ofway ethay Oirelay. Aesarcay adhay onveyedcay itherhay allway ethay ostageshay ofway Aulgay,
ethay orncay, ublicpay oneymay, away eatgray artpay ofway ishay ownway aggagebay andway atthay ofway ishay
armyway; ehay adhay entsay itherhay away eatgray umbernay ofway orseshay, ichwhay ehay adhay
urchasedpay inway Italyway andway Ainspay onway accountway ofway isthay arway. Enwhay Eporedorixway andway
Iridomarusvay amecay otay isthay aceplay, andway eceivedray informationway ofway ethay
ispositionday ofway ethay atestay, atthay Itavicuslay adhay eenbay admittedway ybay ethay Aeduiway
intoway Ibractebay, ichwhay isway away owntay ofway ethay eatestgray importanceway amongway emthay,
atthay Onvictolitaniscay ethay iefchay agistratemay andway away eatgray artpay ofway ethay enatesay
adhay onegay otay eetmay imhay, atthay ambassadorsway adhay eenbay ubliclypay entsay otay
Ercingetorixvay otay egotiatenay away eacepay andway allianceway; eythay oughtthay atthay osay
eatgray anway opportunityway oughtway otnay otay ebay eglectednay. Ereforethay, avinghay utpay otay
ethay ordsway ethay arrisongay ofway Oviodunumnay andway osethay owhay adhay assembledway erethay
orfay ethay urposepay ofway adingtray orway ereway onway eirthay archmay, eythay ividedday ethay
oneymay andway orseshay amongway emselvesthay; eythay ooktay arecay atthay ethay ostageshay ofway
ethay ifferentday atesstay ouldshay ebay oughtbray otay Ibractebay, otay ethay iefchay
agistratemay; eythay urntbay ethay owntay otay eventpray itsway eingbay ofway anyway ervicesay otay
ethay Omansray, asway eythay ereway ofway opinionway atthay eythay ouldcay otnay oldhay itway; eythay
arriedcay awayway inway eirthay esselsvay ateverwhay orncay eythay ouldcay inway ethay urryhay;
eythay estroyedday ethay emainderray, ybay owingthray itway intoway ethay iverray orway ettingsay
itway onway irefay; eythay emselvesthay eganbay otay ollectcay orcesfay omfray ethay
eighbouringnay ountrycay, otay aceplay uardsgay andway arrisonsgay inway ifferentday
ositionspay alongway ethay anksbay ofway ethay Oirelay, andway otay isplayday ethay avalrycay onway
allway idessay otay ikestray errortay intoway ethay Omansray, otay tryay ifway eythay ouldcay utcay
emthay offway omfray away upplysay ofway ovisionspray. Inway ichwhay expectationway eythay ereway
uchmay aidedway, omfray ethay ircumstancecay atthay ethay Oirelay adhay ollensway otay uchsay away
egreeday omfray ethay eltingmay ofway ethay owssnay, atthay itway idday otnay eemsay apablecay ofway
eingbay ordedfay atway allway.

Ilvay.Aesarcay onway eingbay informedway ofway esethay ovementsmay asway ofway opinionway atthay ehay
oughtway otay akemay astehay, evenway ifway ehay ouldshay unray omesay iskray inway ompletingcay ethay
idgesbray, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay engageway eforebay eatergray orcesfay ofway ethay
enemyway ouldshay ebay ollectedcay inway atthay aceplay. Orfay onay oneway evenway enthay onsideredcay
itway anway absolutelyway ecessarynay actway, atthay angingchay ishay esignday ehay ouldshay
irectday ishay archmay intoway ethay Ovincepray, othbay ecausebay ethay infamyway andway isgraceday
ofway ethay ingthay, andway ethay interveningway ountmay Evennescay, andway ethay ifficultyday ofway
ethay oadsray eventedpray imhay; andway especiallyway ecausebay ehay adhay erioussay
apprehensionsway orfay ethay afetysay ofway Abienuslay omwhay ehay adhay etachedday, andway osethay
egionslay omwhay ehay adhay entsay ithway imhay. Ereforethay, avinghay ademay eryvay onglay
archesmay ybay ayday andway ightnay, ehay amecay otay ethay iverray Oirelay, ontrarycay otay ethay
expectationway ofway allway; andway avinghay ybay eansmay ofway ethay avalrycay oundfay outway away ordfay,
uitablesay enoughway onsideringcay ethay emergencyway, ofway uchsay epthday atthay eirthay armsway
andway ouldersshay ouldcay ebay aboveway aterway orfay upportingsay eirthay accoutrementsway,
ehay ispersedday ishay avalrycay inway uchsay away annermay asway otay eakbray ethay orcefay ofway ethay
urrentcay, andway avinghay onfoundedcay ethay enemyway atway ethay irstfay ightsay, edlay ishay
armyway acrossway ethay iverray inway afetysay; andway indingfay orncay andway attlecay inway ethay
ieldsfay, afterway efreshingray ishay armyway ithway emthay, ehay eterminedday otay archmay intoway
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Enonessay.

Iilvay.Ilstwhay esethay ingsthay areway eingbay oneday ybay Aesarcay, Abienuslay, eavinglay
atway Agendicumway ethay ecruitsray owhay adhay atelylay arrivedway omfray Italyway, otay uardgay
ethay aggagebay, archesmay ithway ourfay egionslay otay Utetialay ichwhay isway away owntay ofway
ethay Arisiipay, ituatedsay onway anway islandway ofway ethay iverray Einesay, osewhay arrivalway
eingbay iscoveredday ybay ethay enemyway, umerousnay orcesfay arrivedway omfray ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay. Ethay upremesay ommandcay isway entrustedway otay Amulogenuscay,
oneway ofway ethay Aulerciway, owhay, althoughway almostway ornway outway ithway ageway, asway alledcay
otay atthay onourhay onway accountway ofway ishay extraordinaryway owledgeknay ofway ilitarymay
acticstay. Ehay, enwhay ehay observedway atthay erethay asway away argelay arshmay ichwhay
ommunicatedcay ithway ethay Einesay, andway enderedray allway atthay ountrycay impassableway,
encampedway erethay, andway eterminedday otay eventpray ourway oopstray omfray assingpay itway.

Iiilvay.Abienuslay atway irstfay attemptedway otay aiseray ineaevay, illfay upway ethay arshmay
ithway urdleshay andway ayclay, andway ecuresay away oadray. Afterway ehay erceivedpay atthay isthay
asway ootay ifficultday otay accomplishway, ehay issuedway inway ilencesay omfray ishay ampcay atway
ethay irdthay atchway, andway eachedray Elodunummay ybay ethay amesay outeray ybay ichwhay ehay
amecay. Isthay isway away owntay ofway ethay Enonessay, ituatedsay onway anway islandway inway ethay Einesay,
asway eway avehay ustjay eforebay observedway ofway Utetialay. Avinghay eizedsay uponway aboutway
iftyfay ipsshay andway uicklyqay oinedjay emthay ogethertay, andway avinghay acedplay oldierssay
inway emthay, ehay intimidatedway ybay ishay unexpectedway arrivalway ethay inhabitantsway, ofway
omwhay away eatgray umbernay adhay eenbay alledcay outway otay ethay arway, andway obtainsway
ossessionpay ofway ethay owntay ithoutway away ontestcay. Avinghay epairedray ethay idgebray,
ichwhay ethay enemyway adhay okenbray ownday uringday ethay ecedingpray aysday, ehay edlay overway
ishay armyway, andway eganbay otay archmay alongway ethay anksbay ofway ethay iverray otay Utetialay.
Ethay enemyway, onway earninglay ethay ircumstancecay omfray osethay owhay adhay escapedway omfray
Elodunummay, etsay irefay otay Utetialay, andway orderway ethay idgesbray ofway atthay owntay otay ebay
okenbray ownday eythay emselvesthay etsay outway omfray ethay arshmay, andway aketay eirthay
ositionpay onway ethay anksbay ofway ethay Einesay, overway againstway Utetialay andway oppositeway
ethay ampcay ofway Abienuslay.

Ixlay.Aesarcay asway ownay eportedray otay avehay epartedday omfray Ergoviagay;
intelligenceway asway ikewiselay oughtbray otay emthay oncerningcay ethay evoltray ofway ethay
Aeduiway, andway away uccessfulsay isingray inway Aulgay; andway atthay Aesarcay, avinghay eenbay
eventedpray omfray osecutingpray ishay ourneyjay andway ossingcray ethay Oirelay, andway
avinghay eenbay ompelledcay ybay ethay antway ofway orncay, adhay archedmay astilyhay otay ethay
ovincepray. Utbay ethay Ellovacibay, owhay adhay eenbay eviouslypray isaffectedday ofway
emselvesthay, onway earninglay ethay evoltray ofway ethay Aeduiway, eganbay otay assembleway
orcesfay andway openlyway otay eparepray orfay arway; Enthay Abienuslay, asway ethay angechay inway
affairsway asway osay eatgray, oughtthay atthay ehay ustmay adoptway away eryvay ifferentday temsysay
omfray atwhay ehay adhay eviouslypray intendedway, andway ehay idday otnay ownay inkthay ofway akingmay
anyway ewnay acquisitionsway, orway ofway ovokingpray ethay enemyway otay anway actionway; utbay atthay
ehay ightmay ingbray ackbay ishay armyway afesay otay Agendicumway. Orfay, onway oneway idesay, ethay
Ellovacibay, away atestay ichwhay eldhay ethay ighesthay eputationray orfay owesspray inway
Aulgay, ereway essingpray onway imhay; andway Amulogenuscay, ithway away isciplinedday andway
ellwayequippedway armyway, eldhay ethay otherway idesay; oreovermay, away eryvay eatgray iverray
eparatedsay andway utcay offway ethay egionslay omfray ethay arrisongay andway aggagebay. Ehay awsay
atthay, inway onsequencecay ofway uchsay eatgray ifficultiesday eingbay ownthray inway ishay ayway,
ehay ustmay eeksay aidway omfray ishay ownway energyway ofway ispositionday.

Xlay.Avinghay, ereforethay, alledcay away ouncilcay ofway arway away ittlelay eforebay eveningway,
ehay exhortedway ishay oldierssay otay executeway ithway iligenceday andway energyway uchsay
ommandscay asway ehay ouldshay ivegay; ehay assignsway ethay ipsshay ichwhay ehay adhay oughtbray
omfray Elodunummay otay Omanray ightsknay, oneway otay eachway, andway ordersway emthay otay allfay
ownday ethay iverray ilentlysay orfay ourfay ilesmay, atway ethay endway ofway ethay ourthfay atchway,
andway erethay aitway orfay imhay. Ehay eaveslay ethay ivefay ohortscay, ichwhay ehay onsideredcay
otay ebay ethay ostmay eadystay inway actionway, otay uardgay ethay ampcay; ehay ordersway ethay ivefay
emainingray ohortscay ofway ethay amesay egionlay otay oceedpray away ittlelay afterway idnightmay
upway ethay iverray ithway allway eirthay aggagebay, inway away eatgray umulttay. Ehay ollectscay alsoway
omesay allsmay oatsbay; andway endssay emthay inway ethay amesay irectionday, ithway ordersway otay
akemay away oudlay oisenay inway owingray. Ehay imselfhay, away ittlelay afterway, archedmay outway inway
ilencesay, andway, atway ethay eadhay ofway eethray egionslay, eekssay atthay aceplay otay ichwhay ehay
adhay orderedway ethay ipsshay otay ebay oughtbray.

Ilxay.Enwhay ehay adhay arrivedway erethay, ethay enemy'sway outsscay, asway eythay ereway
ationedstay alongway everyway artpay ofway ethay iverray, otnay expectingway anway attackway,
ecausebay away eatgray ormstay adhay uddenlysay arisenway, ereway urprisedsay ybay ourway
oldierssay ethay infantryway andway avalrycay areway uicklyqay ansportedtray, underway ethay
uperintendencesay ofway ethay Omanray ightsknay, omwhay ehay adhay appointedway otay atthay
officeway. Almostway atway ethay amesay imetay, away ittlelay eforebay aylightday, intelligenceway
asway ivengay otay ethay enemyway atthay erethay asway anway unusualway umulttay inway ethay ampcay ofway
ethay Omansray, andway atthay away ongstray orcefay asway archingmay upway ethay iverray, andway atthay
ethay oundsay ofway oarsway asway istinctlyday eardhay inway ethay amesay uarterqay, andway atthay
oldierssay ereway eingbay onveyedcay acrossway inway ipsshay away ittlelay elowbay. Onway earinghay
esethay ingsthay, ecausebay eythay ereway ofway opinionway atthay ethay egionslay ereway assingpay
inway eethray ifferentday acesplay, andway atthay ethay entireway armyway, eingbay errifiedtay ybay
ethay evoltray ofway ethay Aeduiway, ereway eparingpray orfay ightflay, eythay ividedday eirthay
orcesfay alsoway intoway eethray ivisionsday. Orfay eavinglay away uardgay oppositeway otay ethay
ampcay andway endingsay away allsmay odybay inway ethay irectionday ofway Etiosedummay, ithway
ordersway otay advanceway asway arfay asway ethay ipsshay ouldway oceedpray, eythay edlay ethay estray
ofway eirthay oopstray againstway Abienuslay.

Iilxay.Ybay aydayeakbray allway ourway oldierssay ereway oughtbray acrossway andway ethay armyway ofway
ethay enemyway asway inway ightsay. Abienuslay, avinghay encouragedway ishay oldierssay otay
etainray ethay emorymay ofway eirthay ancientway alourvay, andway osay anymay ostmay uccessfulsay
actionsway, andway imagineway Aesarcay imselfhay, underway osewhay ommandcay eythay adhay osay
oftenway outedray ethay enemyway, otay ebay esentpray, ivesgay ethay ignalsay orfay actionway. Atway
ethay irstfay onsetway ethay enemyway areway eatenbay andway utpay otay ightflay inway ethay ightray
ingway, erewhay ethay eventhsay egionlay oodstay onway ethay eftlay ingway, ichwhay ositionpay
ethay elfthtway egionlay eldhay, althoughway ethay irstfay anksray ellfay ansfixedtray ybay ethay
avelinsjay ofway ethay Omansray, etyay ethay estray esistedray ostmay avelybray; ornay idday anyway
oneway ofway emthay owshay ethay ightestslay intentionway ofway ingflyay. Amulogenuscay, ethay
eneralgay ofway ethay enemyway, asway esentpray andway encouragedway ishay oopstray. Utbay enwhay
ethay issueway ofway ethay ictoryvay asway illstay uncertainway, andway ethay ircumstancescay
ichwhay ereway akingtay aceplay onway ethay eftlay ingway ereway announcedway otay ethay ibunestray
ofway ethay eventhsay egionlay, eythay acedfay aboutway eirthay egionlay otay ethay enemy'sway earray
andway attackedway itway otnay evenway enthay idday anyway oneway etreatray, utbay allway ereway
urroundedsay andway ainslay. Amulogenuscay etmay ethay amesay atefay. Utbay osethay owhay ereway
eftlay asway away uardgay oppositeway ethay ampcay ofway Abienuslay, enwhay eythay eardhay atthay ethay
attlebay asway ommencedcay, archedmay otay aidway eirthay ountrymencay andway aketay
ossessionpay ofway away illhay, utbay ereway unableway otay ithstandway ethay attackway ofway ethay
ictoriousvay oldierssay. Inway isthay annermay, ixedmay ithway eirthay ownway ugitivesfay,
uchsay asway ethay oodsway andway ountainsmay idday otnay eltershay ereway utcay otay iecespay ybay
ourway avalrycay. Enwhay isthay attlebay asway inishedfay, Abienuslay eturnsray otay
Agendicumway, erewhay ethay aggagebay ofway ethay olewhay armyway adhay eenbay eftlay omfray itway ehay
archedmay ithway allway ishay orcesfay otay Aesarcay.

Iiilxay.Ethay evoltray ofway ethay Aeduiway eingbay ownknay, ethay arway owsgray oremay
angerousday. Embassiesway areway entsay ybay emthay inway allway irectionsday asway arfay asway eythay
ancay evailpray ybay influenceway, authorityway, orway oneymay, eythay ivestray otay exciteway ethay
atestay otay evoltray. Avinghay otgay ossessionpay ofway ethay ostageshay omwhay Aesarcay adhay
epositedday ithway emthay, eythay errifytay ethay esitatinghay ybay uttingpay emthay otay
eathday. Ethay Aeduiway equestray Ercingetorixvay otay omecay otay emthay andway ommunicatecay
ishay ansplay ofway onductingcay ethay arway. Onway obtainingway isthay equestray eythay insistway
atthay ethay iefchay ommandcay ouldshay ebay assignedway otay emthay; andway enwhay ethay affairway
ecamebay away isputedday uestionqay, away ouncilcay ofway allway Aulgay isway ummonedsay otay
Ibractebay. Eythay omecay ogethertay inway eatgray umbersnay andway omfray everyway uarterqay otay
ethay amesay aceplay. Ethay ecisionday isway eftlay otay ethay otesvay ofway ethay assmay allway otay away
anmay approveway ofway Ercingetorixvay asway eirthay eneralgay. Ethay Emiray, Ingoneslay, andway
Eviritray ereway absentway omfray isthay eetingmay; ethay otway ormerfay ecausebay eythay
attachedway emselvesthay otay ethay allianceway ofway Omeray; ethay Eviritray ecausebay eythay
ereway eryvay emoteray andway ereway ardhay essedpray ybay ethay Ermansgay; ichwhay asway alsoway
ethay easonray ofway eirthay eingbay absentway uringday ethay olewhay arway, andway eirthay endingsay
auxiliariesway otay eithernay artypay. Ethay Aeduiway areway ighlyhay indignantway atway eingbay
eprivedday ofway ethay iefchay ommandcay; eythay amentlay ethay angechay ofway ortunefay, andway
issmay Aesar'scay indulgenceway owardstay emthay; oweverhay, afterway engagingway inway ethay
arway, eythay oday otnay areday otay ursuepay eirthay ownway easuresmay apartway omfray ethay estray.
Eporedorixway andway Iridomarusvay, outhsyay ofway ethay eatestgray omisepray, ubmitsay
eluctantlyray otay Ercingetorixvay.

Ivlxay.Ethay atterlay emandsday ostageshay omfray ethay emainingray atesstay aynay, oremay,
appointedway away ayday orfay isthay oceedingpray; ehay ordersway allway ethay avalrycay, ifteenfay
ousandthay inway umbernay, otay uicklyqay assembleway erehay; ehay ayssay atthay ehay illway ebay
ontentcay ithway ethay infantryway ichwhay ehay adhay eforebay, andway ouldway otnay empttay
ortunefay ornay omecay otay away egularray engagementway; utbay incesay ehay adhay abundanceway ofway
avalrycay, itway ouldway ebay eryvay easyway orfay imhay otay eventpray ethay Omansray omfray
obtainingway oragefay orway orncay, ovidedpray atthay eythay emselvesthay ouldshay
esolutelyray estroyday eirthay orncay andway etsay irefay otay eirthay ouseshay, ybay ichwhay
acrificesay ofway ivatepray opertypray eythay ouldway evidentlyway obtainway erpetualpay
ominionday andway eedomfray. Afterway arrangingway esethay attersmay ehay evieslay entay
ousandthay infantryway onway ethay Aeduiway andway Egusianisay, owhay orderbay onway ourway
ovincepray otay esethay ehay addsway eightway undredhay orsehay. Ehay etssay overway emthay ethay
otherbray ofway Eporedorixway, andway ordersway imhay otay ageway arway againstway ethay
Allobrogesway. Onway ethay otherway idesay ehay endssay ethay Abaligay andway ethay earestnay
antonscay ofway ethay Arverniway againstway ethay Elviihay; ehay ikewiselay endssay ethay Uteniray
andway Adurcicay otay aylay asteway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Olcaevay Arecomiciway.
Esidesbay, ybay ecretsay essagesmay andway embassiesway, ehay amperstay ithway ethay
Allobrogesway, osewhay indsmay, ehay opeshay, adhay otnay etyay ettledsay ownday afterway ethay
excitementway ofway ethay atelay arway. Otay eirthay oblesnay ehay omisespray oneymay, andway otay
eirthay atestay ethay ominionday ofway ethay olewhay ovincepray.

Lxvay.Ethay onlyway uardsgay ovidedpray againstway allway esethay ontingenciescay ereway
entytwayotway ohortscay, ichwhay ereway ollectedcay omfray ethay entireway ovincepray ybay
Uciuslay Aesarcay, ethay ieutenantlay, andway opposedway otay ethay enemyway inway everyway
uarterqay. Ethay Elviihay, oluntarilyvay engagingway inway attlebay ithway eirthay
eighboursnay, areway efeatedday, andway Aiuscay Aleriusvay Onotaurusday, ethay onsay ofway
Aburuscay, ethay incipalpray anmay ofway ethay atestay, andway everalsay othersway, eingbay
ainslay, eythay areway orcedfay otay etireray ithinway eirthay ownstay andway ortificationsfay.
Ethay Allobrogesway, acingplay uardsgay alongway ethay oursecay ofway ethay Inerhay, efendday
eirthay ontiersfray ithway eatgray igilancevay andway energyway. Aesarcay, asway ehay erceivedpay
atthay ethay enemyway ereway uperiorsay inway avalrycay, andway ehay imselfhay ouldcay eceiveray onay
aidway omfray ethay ovincepray orway Italyway, ilewhay allway ommunicationcay asway utcay offway,
endssay acrossway ethay Inerhay intoway Ermanygay otay osethay atesstay ichwhay ehay adhay ubduedsay
inway ethay ecedingpray ampaignscay, andway ummonssay omfray emthay avalrycay andway ethay
ightlayarmedway infantryway, owhay ereway accustomedway otay engageway amongway emthay. Onway eirthay
arrivalway, asway eythay ereway ountedmay onway unserviceableway orseshay, ehay akestay orseshay
omfray ethay ilitarymay ibunestray andway ethay estray, aynay, evenway omfray ethay Omanray
ightsknay andway eteransvay, andway istributesday emthay amongway ethay Ermansgay.

Ilxvay.Inway ethay eantimemay, ilstwhay esethay ingsthay areway oinggay onway, ethay orcesfay ofway
ethay enemyway omfray ethay Arverniway, andway ethay avalrycay ichwhay adhay eenbay emandedday omfray
allway Aulgay, eetmay ogethertay. Away eatgray umbernay ofway esethay avinghay eenbay ollectedcay,
enwhay Aesarcay asway archingmay intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Equanisay, oughthray ethay
onfinescay ofway ethay Ingoneslay, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway enderray
aidway otay ethay ovincepray, Ercingetorixvay encampedway inway eethray ampscay, aboutway entay
ilesmay omfray ethay Omansray andway avinghay ummonedsay ethay ommanderscay ofway ethay avalrycay
otay away ouncilcay, ehay owsshay atthay ethay imetay ofway ictoryvay asway omecay; atthay ethay
Omansray ereway eeingflay intoway ethay ovincepray andway eavinglay Aulgay; atthay isthay asway
ufficientsay orfay obtainingway immediateway eedomfray; utbay asway ofway ittlelay omentmay inway
acquiringway eacepay andway anquillitytray orfay ethay uturefay; orfay ethay Omansray ouldway
eturnray afterway assemblingway eatergray orcesfay, andway ouldway otnay utpay anway endway otay ethay
arway; Ereforethay eythay ouldshay attackway emthay onway eirthay archmay, enwhay encumberedway.
Ifway ethay infantryway ouldshay ebay obligedway otay elieveray eirthay avalrycay, andway ebay
etardedray ybay oingday osay, ethay archmay ouldcay otnay ebay accomplishedway ifway,
abandoningway eirthay aggagebay, eythay ouldshay ovidepray orfay eirthay afetysay away esultray
ichwhay, ehay ustedtray, asway oremay ikelylay otay ensueway, eythay ouldway oselay othbay
opertypray andway aracterchay. Orfay asway otay ethay enemy'sway orsehay, eythay oughtway otnay otay
entertainway away oubtday atthay onenay ofway emthay ouldway areday otay advanceway eyondbay ethay
ainmay odybay. Inway orderway atthay eythay ethay Aulsgay aymay oday osay ithway eatergray iritspay,
ehay ouldway arshalmay allway eirthay orcesfay eforebay ethay ampcay, andway intimidateway ethay
enemyway. Ethay avalrycay unanimouslyway outshay outway, Atthay eythay oughtway otay indbay
emselvesthay ybay away ostmay acredsay oathway, atthay ehay ouldshay otnay ebay eceivedray underway away
oofray, ornay avehay accessway otay ishay ildrenchay, arentspay, orway ifeway, owhay allshay otnay
icetway avehay iddenray oughthray ethay enemy'sway armyway.

Iilxvay.Isthay oposalpray eceivingray eneralgay approbationway, andway allway eingbay
orcedfay otay aketay ethay oathway, onway ethay extnay ayday ethay avalrycay ereway ividedday intoway
eethray artspay, andway otway ofway esethay ivisionsday ademay away emonstrationday onway ourway otway
anksflay; ilewhay oneway inway ontfray eganbay otay obstructway ourway archmay. Onway isthay
ircumstancecay eingbay announcedway, Aesarcay ordersway ishay avalrycay alsoway otay ormfay
eethray ivisionsday andway argechay ethay enemyway. Enthay ethay actionway ommencescay
imultaneouslysay inway everyway artpay ethay ainmay odybay altshay; ethay aggagebay isway
eceivedray ithinway ethay anksray ofway ethay egionslay. Ifway ourway enmay eemedsay otay ebay
istressedday, orway ardhay essedpray inway anyway uarterqay, Aesarcay usuallyway orderedway ethay
oopstray otay advanceway, andway ethay armyway otay eelwhay oundray inway atthay uarterqay; ichwhay
onductcay etardedray ethay enemyway inway ethay ursuitpay, andway encouragedway ourway enmay ybay ethay
opehay ofway upportsay. Atway engthlay ethay Ermansgay, onway ethay ightray ingway, avinghay ainedgay
ethay optay ofway ethay illhay, islodgeday ethay enemyway omfray eirthay ositionpay andway ursuepay
emthay evenway asway arfay asway ethay iverray atway ichwhay Ercingetorixvay ithway ethay infantryway
asway ationedstay, andway ayslay everalsay ofway emthay. Ethay estray, onway observingway isthay
actionway, earingfay estlay eythay ouldshay ebay urroundedsay, etakebay emselvesthay otay
ightflay. Away aughterslay ensuesway inway everyway irectionday, andway eethray ofway ethay oblestnay
ofway ethay Audiway areway akentay andway oughtbray otay Aesarcay Otuscay, ethay ommandercay ofway ethay
avalrycay, owhay adhay eenbay engagedway inway ethay ontestcay ithway Onvictolitaniscay ethay
astlay electionway, Avarilluscay, owhay adhay eldhay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay infantryway
afterway ethay evoltray ofway Itavicuslay, andway Eporedorixway, underway osewhay ommandcay ethay
Aeduiway adhay engagedway inway arway againstway ethay Equanisay, eforebay ethay arrivalway ofway
Aesarcay.

Iiilxvay.Allway ishay avalrycay eingbay outedray, Ercingetorixvay edlay ackbay ishay oopstray
inway ethay amesay orderway asway ehay adhay arrangedway emthay eforebay ethay ampcay, andway
immediatelyway eganbay otay archmay otay Alesiaway, ichwhay isway away owntay ofway ethay Andubiimay;
andway orderedway ethay aggagebay otay ebay eedilyspay oughtbray orthfay omfray ethay ampcay, andway
ollowfay imhay oselyclay. Aesarcay, avinghay onveyedcay ishay aggagebay otay ethay earestnay
illhay, andway avinghay eftlay otway egionslay otay uardgay itway, ursuedpay asway arfay asway ethay
imetay ofway ayday ouldway ermitpay, andway afterway ayingslay aboutway eethray ousandthay ofway ethay
earray ofway ethay enemyway, encampedway atway Alesiaway onway ethay extnay ayday. Onway econnoitringray
ethay ituationsay ofway ethay itycay, indingfay atthay ethay enemyway ereway anicpayickenstray,
ecausebay ethay avalrycay inway ichwhay eythay acedplay eirthay iefchay elianceray ereway
eatenbay, ehay encouragedway ishay enmay otay endureway ethay oiltay, andway eganbay otay awdray away
inelay ofway ircumvallationcay oundray Alesiaway.

Ixlxay.Ethay owntay itselfway asway ituatedsay onway ethay optay ofway away illhay, inway away eryvay
oftylay ositionpay, osay atthay itway idday otnay appearway ikelylay otay ebay akentay, exceptway ybay
away egularray iegesay. Otway iversray, onway otway ifferentday idessay, ashedway ethay ootfay ofway
ethay illhay. Eforebay ethay owntay aylay away ainplay ofway aboutway eethray ilesmay inway engthlay; onway
everyway otherway idesay illshay atway away oderatemay istanceday, andway ofway anway equalway egreeday ofway
eighthay, urroundedsay ethay owntay. Ethay armyway ofway ethay Aulsgay adhay illedfay allway ethay
acespay underway ethay allway, omprisingcay ethay artpay ofway ethay illhay ichwhay ookedlay otay
ethay isingray unsay, andway adhay awndray inway ontfray away enchtray andway away onestay allway ixsay
eetfay ighhay. Ethay ircuitcay ofway atthay ortificationfay, ichwhay asway ommencedcay ybay ethay
Omansray, omprisedcay elevenway ilesmay. Ethay ampcay asway itchedpay inway away ongstray
ositionpay, andway entytwayeethray edoubtsray ereway aisedray inway itway, inway ichwhay
entinelssay ereway acedplay ybay ayday, estlay anyway allysay ouldshay ebay ademay uddenlysay;
andway ybay ightnay ethay amesay ereway occupiedway ybay atchesway andway ongstray uardsgay.

Lxxay.Ethay orkway avinghay eenbay egunbay, away avalrycay actionway ensuesway inway atthay ainplay,
ichwhay eway avehay alreadyway escribedday asway okenbray ybay illshay, andway extendingway eethray
ilesmay inway engthlay. Ethay ontestcay isway aintainedmay onway othbay idessay ithway ethay utmostway
igourvay; Aesarcay endssay ethay Ermansgay otay aidway ourway oopstray enwhay istressedday, andway
awsdray upway ethay egionslay inway ontfray ofway ethay ampcay, estlay anyway allysay ouldshay ebay
uddenlysay ademay ybay ethay enemy'sway infantryway. Ethay ouragecay ofway ourway enmay isway
increasedway ybay ethay additionalway upportsay ofway ethay egionslay; ethay enemyway eingbay utpay
otay ightflay, inderhay oneway anotherway ybay eirthay umbersnay, andway asway onlyway ethay arrowernay
atesgay ereway eftlay openway, areway owdedcray ogethertay inway emthay; enthay ethay Ermansgay
ursuepay emthay ithway igourvay evenway otay ethay ortificationsfay. Away eatgray aughterslay
ensuesway; omesay eavelay eirthay orseshay, andway endeavourway otay osscray ethay itchday andway
imbclay ethay allway. Aesarcay ordersway ethay egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay awndray upway inway ontfray
ofway ethay ampartray otay advanceway away ittlelay. Ethay Aulsgay, owhay ereway ithinway ethay
ortificationsfay, ereway onay esslay anicpayickenstray, inkingthay atthay ethay enemyway
ereway omingcay atthay omentmay againstway emthay, andway unanimouslyway outshay otay armsway;
omesay inway eirthay alarmway ushray intoway ethay owntay; Ercingetorixvay ordersway ethay atesgay
otay ebay utshay, estlay ethay ampcay ouldshay ebay eftlay undefendedway. Ethay Ermansgay
etreatray, afterway ayingslay anymay andway akingtay everalsay orseshay.

Ilxxay.Ercingetorixvay adoptsway ethay esignday ofway endingsay awayway allway ishay avalrycay
ybay ightnay, eforebay ethay ortificationsfay ouldshay ebay ompletedcay ybay ethay Omansray.
Ehay argeschay emthay enwhay epartingday atthay eachway ofway emthay ouldshay ogay otay ishay
espectiveray atestay, andway esspray orfay ethay arway allway owhay ereway oldway enoughway otay earbay
armsway; ehay atesstay ishay ownway Eritsmay, andway onjurescay emthay otay onsidercay ishay
afetysay, andway otnay urrendersay imhay, owhay adhay eservedday osay ellway ofway ethay eneralgay
eedomfray, otay ethay enemyway orfay orturetay; ehay ointspay outway otay emthay atthay, ifway eythay
ouldshay ebay emissray, eightyway ousandthay osenchay enmay ouldway erishpay ithway imhay;
atthay, uponway akingmay away alculationcay, ehay adhay arelybay orncay orfay irtythay aysday, utbay
ouldcay oldhay outway away ittlelay ongerlay ybay economyway. Afterway ivinggay esethay
instructionsway ehay ilentlysay ismissesday ethay avalrycay inway ethay econdsay atchway, onway
atthay idesay erewhay ourway orksway ereway otnay ompletedcay; ehay ordersway allway ethay orncay otay
ebay oughtbray otay imselfhay; ehay ordainsway apitalcay unishmentpay otay uchsay asway ouldshay
otnay obeyway; ehay istributesday amongway emthay, anmay ybay anmay, ethay attlecay, eatgray
uantitiesqay ofway ichwhay adhay eenbay ivendray erethay ybay ethay Andubiimay; ehay eganbay otay
easuremay outway ethay orncay aringlyspay, andway ybay ittlelay andway ittlelay; ehay eceivesray
intoway ethay owntay allway ethay orcesfay ichwhay ehay adhay ostedpay inway ontfray ofway itway. Inway isthay
annermay ehay eparespray otay awaitway ethay uccourssay omfray Aulgay, andway arrycay onway ethay
arway.

Iilxxay.Aesarcay, onway earninglay esethay oceedingspray omfray ethay esertersday andway
aptivescay, adoptedway ethay ollowingfay temsysay ofway ortificationfay; ehay ugday away enchtray
entytway eetfay eepday, ithway erpendicularpay idessay, inway uchsay away annermay atthay ethay
asebay ofway isthay enchtray ouldshay extendway osay arfay asway ethay edgesway ereway apartway atway ethay
optay. Ehay aisedray allway ishay otherway orksway atway away istanceday ofway ourfay undredhay eetfay
omfray atthay itchday; ehay idday atthay ithway isthay intentionway, estlay incesay ehay
ecessarilynay embracedway osay extensiveway anway areaway, andway ethay olewhay orksway ouldcay otnay
ebay easilyway urroundedsay ybay away inelay ofway oldierssay away argelay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway
ouldshay uddenlysay, orway ybay ightnay, allysay againstway ethay ortificationsfay; orway estlay
eythay ouldshay ybay ayday astcay eaponsway againstway ourway enmay ilewhay occupiedway ithway ethay
orksway. Avinghay eftlay isthay intervalway, ehay ewdray otway enchestray ifteenfay eetfay
oadbray, andway ofway ethay amesay epthday; ethay innermostway ofway emthay, eingbay inway owlay andway
evellay oundgray, ehay illedfay ithway aterway onveyedcay omfray ethay iverray. Ehindbay esethay
ehay aisedray away ampartray andway allway elvetway eetfay ighhay otay isthay ehay addedway away
arapetpay andway attlementsbay, ithway argelay akesstay utcay ikelay ags'stay ornshay,
ojectingpray omfray ethay unctionjay ofway ethay arapetpay andway attlementsbay, otay eventpray
ethay enemyway omfray alingscay itway, andway urroundedsay ethay entireway orkway ithway urretstay,
ichwhay ereway eightyway eetfay istantday omfray oneway anotherway.

Iiilxxay.Itway asway ecessarynay, atway oneway andway ethay amesay imetay, otay ocurepray imbertay
orfay ethay ampartray, aylay inway uppliessay ofway orncay, andway aiseray alsoway extensiveway
ortificationsfay, andway ethay availableway oopstray ereway inway onsequencecay ofway isthay
educedray inway umbernay, incesay eythay usedway otay advanceway otay omesay istanceday omfray ethay
ampcay, andway ometimessay ethay Aulsgay endeavouredway otay attackway ourway orksway, andway otay
akemay away allysay omfray ethay owntay ybay everalsay atesgay andway inway eatgray orcefay. Onway ichwhay
Aesarcay oughtthay atthay urtherfay additionsway ouldshay ebay ademay otay esethay orksway, inway
orderway atthay ethay ortificationsfay ightmay ebay efensibleday ybay away allsmay umbernay ofway
oldierssay. Avinghay, ereforethay, utcay ownday ethay unkstray ofway eestray orway eryvay ickthay
anchesbray, andway avinghay ippedstray eirthay opstay ofway ethay arkbay, andway arpenedshay emthay
intoway away ointpay, ehay ewdray away ontinuedcay enchtray everywhereway ivefay eetfay eepday.
Esethay akesstay eingbay unksay intoway isthay enchtray, andway astenedfay irmlyfay atway ethay
ottombay, otay eventpray ethay ossibilitypay ofway eirthay eingbay orntay upway, adhay eirthay
anchesbray onlyway ojectingpray omfray ethay oundgray. Erethay ereway ivefay owsray inway
onnectioncay ithway, andway intersectingway eachway otherway; andway oeverwhay enteredway ithinway
emthay ereway ikelylay otay impaleway emselvesthay onway eryvay arpshay akesstay. Ethay oldierssay
alledcay esethay ippicay. Eforebay esethay, ichwhay ereway arrangedway inway obliqueway owsray
inway ethay ormfay ofway away uincunxqay, itspay eethray eetfay eepday ereway ugday, ichwhay
aduallygray iminishedday inway epthday otay ethay ottombay. Inway esethay itspay aperingtay
akesstay, ofway ethay icknessthay ofway away an'smay ighthay, arpenedshay atway ethay optay andway
ardenedhay inway ethay irefay, ereway unksay inway uchsay away annermay asway otay ojectpray omfray ethay
oundgray otnay oremay anthay ourfay inchesway; atway ethay amesay imetay orfay ethay urposepay ofway
ivinggay emthay engthstray andway abilitystay, eythay ereway eachway illedfay ithway ampledtray
ayclay otay ethay eighthay ofway oneway ootfay omfray ethay ottombay ethay estray ofway ethay itpay asway
overedcay overway ithway osiersway andway igstway, otay oncealcay ethay eceitday. Eightway owsray ofway
isthay indkay ereway ugday, andway ereway eethray eetfay istantday omfray eachway otherway. Eythay
alledcay isthay away ilylay omfray itsway esemblanceray otay atthay owerflay. Akesstay away ootfay
onglay, ithway ironway ookshay attachedway otay emthay, ereway entirelyway unksay inway ethay oundgray
eforebay esethay, andway ereway antedplay inway everyway aceplay atway allsmay intervalsway; esethay
eythay alledcay ursspay.

Ivlxxay.Afterway ompletingcay esethay orksway, avinghay electedsay asway evellay oundgray asway
ehay ouldcay, onsideringcay ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountrycay, andway avinghay enclosedway anway
areaway ofway ourteenfay ilesmay, ehay onstructedcay, againstway anway externalway enemyway,
ortificationsfay ofway ethay amesay indkay inway everyway espectray, andway eparatesay omfray
esethay, osay atthay ethay uardsgay ofway ethay ortificationsfay ouldcay otnay ebay urroundedsay
evenway ybay immenseway umbersnay, ifway uchsay away ircumstancecay ouldshay aketay aceplay owingway
otay ethay epartureday ofway ethay enemy'sway avalrycay; andway inway orderway atthay ethay Omanray
oldierssay ightmay otnay ebay ompelledcay otay ogay outway ofway ethay ampcay ithway eatgray iskray,
ehay ordersway allway otay ovidepray oragefay andway orncay orfay irtythay aysday.

Vlxxay.Ilstwhay osethay ingsthay areway arriedcay onway atway Alesiaway, ethay Aulsgay, avinghay
onvenedcay away ouncilcay ofway eirthay iefchay obilitynay, etermineday atthay allway owhay ouldcay
earbay armsway ouldshay otnay ebay alledcay outway, ichwhay asway ethay opinionway ofway
Ercingetorixvay, utbay atthay away ixedfay umbernay ouldshay ebay eviedlay omfray eachway atestay;
estlay, enwhay osay eatgray away ultitudemay assembledway ogethertay, eythay ouldcay eithernay
overngay ornay istinguishday eirthay enmay, ornay avehay ethay eansmay ofway upplyingsay emthay
ithway orncay. Eythay emandday irtythayivefay ousandthay enmay omfray ethay Aeduiway andway eirthay
ependentsday, ethay Egusianisay, Ambivaretiway, andway Aulerciway Annovicesbray; anway equalway
umbernay omfray ethay Arverniway inway onjunctioncay ithway ethay Eleutetiway Adurcicay,
Abaligay, andway Elaunivay, owhay ereway accustomedway otay ebay underway ethay ommandcay ofway ethay
Arverniway; elvetway ousandthay eachway omfray ethay Enonessay, Equanisay, Iturigesbay,
Antonessay, Uteniray, andway Arnutescay; entay ousandthay omfray ethay Ellovacibay; ethay
amesay umbernay omfray ethay Emovicilay; eightway ousandthay eachway omfray ethay Ictonespay,
andway Uronitay, andway Arisiipay, andway Elviihay; ivefay ousandthay eachway omfray ethay
Uessionessay, Ambianiway, Ediomatricimay, Etrocoriipay, Erviinay, Orinimay, andway
Itiobrigesnay; ethay amesay umbernay omfray ethay Aulerciway Enomanicay; ourfay ousandthay
omfray ethay Atrebatesway; eethray ousandthay eachway omfray ethay Ellocassibay, Exoviilay,
andway Aulerciway Eburovicesway; irtythay ousandthay omfray ethay Auraciray, andway Oiibay; ixsay
ousandthay, omfray allway ethay atesstay ogethertay ichwhay orderbay onway ethay Atlanticway, andway
ichwhay inway eirthay ialectday areway alledcay Armoricaeway inway ichwhay umbernay areway
omprehendedcay ethay Urisolitescay, Edonesrhay, Ambibariway, Altescay, Osismiiway,
Emoviceslay, Enetivay, andway Unelliway. Ofway esethay ethay Ellovacibay idday otnay
ontributecay eirthay umbernay, asway eythay aidsay atthay eythay ouldway ageway arway againstway
ethay Omansray onway eirthay ownway accountway, andway atway eirthay ownway iscretionday, andway ouldway
otnay obeyway ethay orderway ofway anyway oneway oweverhay, atway ethay equestray ofway Ommiuscay, eythay
entsay otway ousandthay, inway onsiderationcay ofway away ietay ofway ospitalityhay ichwhay
ubsistedsay etweenbay imhay andway emthay.

Vilxxay.Aesarcay adhay, asway eway avehay eviouslypray arratednay, availedway imselfhay ofway
ethay aithfulfay andway aluablevay ervicessay ofway isthay Ommiuscay, inway Itainbray, inway
ormerfay earsyay inway onsiderationcay ofway ichwhay eritsmay ehay adhay exemptedway omfray
axestay ishay Ommius'scay atestay, andway adhay onferredcay onway Ommiuscay imselfhay ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Orinimay. Etyay uchsay asway ethay unanimityway ofway ethay Aulsgay inway
assertingway eirthay eedomfray, andway ecoveringray eirthay ancientway enownray inway arway,
atthay eythay ereway influencedway eithernay ybay avoursfay, ornay ybay ethay ecollectionray ofway
ivatepray iendshipfray; andway allway earnestlyway irectedday eirthay energiesway andway
esourcesray otay atthay arway, andway ollectedcay eightway ousandthay avalrycay, andway aboutway
otway undredhay andway ortyfay ousandthay infantryway. Esethay ereway eviewedray inway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway away alculationcay asway ademay ofway eirthay umbersnay
ommanderscay ereway appointedway ethay upremesay ommandcay isway entrustedway otay Ommiuscay
ethay Atrebatianway, Iridomarusvay andway Eporedorixway ethay Aeduansway, andway
Ergasillaunusvay ethay Arvernianway, ethay ousincayermangay ofway Ercingetorixvay. Otay
emthay areway assignedway enmay electedsay omfray eachway atestay, ybay osewhay adviceway ethay arway
ouldshay ebay onductedcay. Allway archmay otay Alesiaway, anguinesay andway ullfay ofway
onfidencecay ornay asway erethay away inglesay individualway owhay imaginedway atthay ethay
Omansray ouldcay ithstandway ethay ightsay ofway uchsay anway immenseway osthay especiallyway inway
anway actionway arriedcay onway othbay inway ontfray andway earray, enwhay onway ethay insideway ethay
esiegedbay ouldway allysay omfray ethay owntay andway attackway ethay enemyway, andway onway ethay
outsideway osay eatgray orcesfay ofway avalrycay andway infantryway ouldway ebay eensay.

Viilxxay.Utbay osethay owhay ereway ockadedblay atway Alesiaway, ethay ayday eingbay astpay onway
ichwhay eythay adhay expectedway auxiliariesway omfray eirthay ountrymencay, andway allway eirthay
orncay eingbay onsumedcay, ignorantway ofway atwhay asway oinggay onway amongway ethay Aeduiway,
onvenedcay anway assemblyway andway eliberatedday onway ethay exigencyway ofway eirthay ituationsay.
Afterway ariousvay opinionsway adhay eenbay expressedway amongway emthay, omesay ofway ichwhay
oposedpray away urrendersay, othersway away allysay, ilstwhay eirthay engthstray ouldway
upportsay itway, ethay eechspay ofway Itognatuscray oughtway otnay otay ebay omittedway orfay itsway
ingularsay andway etestableday ueltycray. Ehay ungspray omfray ethay oblestnay amilyfay amongway
ethay Arverniway, andway ossessingpay eatgray influenceway, ayssay, Iway allshay aypay onay
attentionway otay ethay opinionway ofway osethay owhay allcay away ostmay isgracefulday urrendersay
ybay ethay amenay ofway away apitulationcay; ornay oday Iway inkthay atthay eythay oughtway otay ebay
onsideredcay asway itizenscay, orway ummonedsay otay ethay ouncilcay. Ymay usinessbay isway ithway
osethay owhay approveway ofway away allysay inway osewhay adviceway ethay emorymay ofway ourway ancientway
owesspray eemssay otay elldway inway ethay opinionway ofway ouyay allway. Otay ebay unableway otay earbay
ivationpray orfay away ortshay imetay isway isgracefulday owardicecay, otnay uetray alourvay.
Osethay owhay oluntarilyvay offerway emselvesthay otay eathday areway oremay easilyway oundfay
anthay osethay owhay ouldway almlycay endureway istressday. Andway Iway ouldway approveway ofway isthay
opinionway orfay onourhay isway away owerfulpay otivemay ithway emay, ouldcay Iway oreseefay onay
otherway osslay, avesay atthay ofway ifelay utbay etlay usway, inway adoptingway ourway esignday, ooklay
ackbay onway allway Aulgay, ichwhay eway avehay irredstay upway otay ourway aidway. Atwhay ouragecay oday
ouyay inkthay ouldway ourway elativesray andway iendsfray avehay, ifway eightyway ousandthay enmay
ereway utcheredbay inway oneway otspay, upposingsay atthay eythay ouldshay ebay orcedfay otay omecay
otay anway actionway almostway overway ourway orpsescay? Oday otnay utterlyway epriveday emthay ofway
ouryay aidway, orfay eythay avehay urnedspay allway oughtsthay ofway ersonalpay angerday onway
accountway ofway ouryay afetysay; ornay ybay ouryay ollyfay, ashnessray, andway owardicecay,
ushcray allway Aulgay andway oomday itway otay anway eternalway averyslay. Oday ouyay oubtday eirthay
idelityfay andway irmnessfay ecausebay eythay avehay otnay omecay atway ethay appointedway ayday?
Atwhay enthay? Oday ouyay upposesay atthay ethay Omansray areway employedway everyway ayday inway ethay
outerway ortificationsfay orfay eremay amusementway? Ifway ouyay annotcay ebay assuredway ybay
eirthay espatchesday, incesay everyway avenueway isway ockedblay upway, aketay ethay Omansray asway
evidenceway atthay eirthay approachway isway awingdray earnay; incesay eythay, intimidatedway ybay
alarmway atway isthay, abourlay ightnay andway ayday atway eirthay orksway. Atwhay, ereforethay, isway
ymay esignday? Otay oday asway ourway ancestorsway idday inway ethay arway againstway ethay Imbricay andway
Eutonestay, ichwhay asway ybay onay eansmay equallyway omentousmay; owhay, enwhay ivendray intoway
eirthay ownstay, andway oppressedway ybay imilarsay ivationspray, upportedsay ifelay ybay ethay
orpsescay ofway osethay owhay appearedway uselessway orfay arway onway accountway ofway eirthay ageway,
andway idday otnay urrendersay otay ethay enemyway andway evenway ifway eway adhay otnay away ecedentpray
