orfay uchsay uelcray onductcay, illstay Iway ouldshay onsidercay itway ostmay oriousglay atthay
oneway ouldshay ebay establishedway, andway eliveredday otay osteritypay. Orfay inway atwhay asway
atthay arway ikelay isthay? Ethay Imbricay, afterway ayinglay Aulgay asteway, andway inflictingway
eatgray alamitiescay, atway engthlay epartedday omfray ourway ountrycay, andway oughtsay otherway
andslay; eythay eftlay usway ourway ightsray, awslay, andslay, andway ibertylay. Utbay atwhay otherway
otivemay orway ishway avehay ethay Omansray, anthay, inducedway ybay envyway, otay ettlesay inway ethay
andslay andway atesstay ofway osethay omwhay eythay avehay earnedlay ybay amefay otay ebay oblenay andway
owerfulpay inway arway, andway imposeway onway emthay erpetualpay averyslay? Orfay eythay evernay
avehay arriedcay onway arsway onway anyway otherway ermstay. Utbay ifway ouyay owknay otnay esethay
ingsthay ichwhay areway oinggay onway inway istantday ountriescay, ooklay otay ethay eighbouringnay
Aulgay, ichwhay eingbay educedray otay ethay ormfay ofway away ovincepray, ippedstray ofway itsway
ightsray andway awslay, andway ubjectedsay otay Omanray espotismday, isway oppressedway ybay
erpetualpay averyslay.

Viiilxxay.Enwhay ifferentday opinionsway ereway expressedway, eythay eterminedday atthay
osethay owhay, owingway otay ageway orway illway ealthhay, ereway unserviceableway orfay arway,
ouldshay epartday omfray ethay owntay, andway atthay emselvesthay ouldshay tryay everyway
expedientway eforebay eythay adhay ecourseray otay ethay adviceway ofway Itognatuscray
oweverhay, atthay eythay ouldway atherray adoptway atthay esignday, ifway ircumstancescay
ouldshay ompelcay emthay andway eirthay alliesway ouldshay elayday, anthay acceptway anyway ermstay
ofway away urrendersay orway eacepay. Ethay Andubiimay, owhay adhay admittedway emthay intoway ethay
owntay, areway ompelledcay otay ogay orthfay ithway eirthay ivesway andway ildrenchay. Enwhay
esethay amecay otay ethay Omanray ortificationsfay, eepingway, eythay eggedbay ofway ethay
oldierssay ybay everyway entreatyway otay eceiveray emthay asway avesslay andway elieveray emthay
ithway oodfay. Utbay Aesarcay, acingplay uardsgay onway ethay ampartray, orbadefay emthay otay ebay
admittedway.

Ixlxxay.Inway ethay eantimemay, Ommiuscay andway ethay estray ofway ethay eaderslay, otay omwhay
ethay upremesay ommandcay adhay eenbay intrustedway, amecay ithway allway eirthay orcesfay otay
Alesiaway, andway avinghay occupiedway ethay entireway illhay, encampway otnay oremay anthay away ilemay
omfray ourway ortificationsfay. Ethay ollowingfay ayday, avinghay edlay orthfay eirthay
avalrycay omfray ethay ampcay, eythay illfay allway atthay ainplay, ichwhay, eway avehay elatedray,
extendedway eethray ilesmay inway engthlay, andway awdray outway eirthay infantryway away ittlelay
omfray atthay aceplay, andway ostpay emthay onway ethay igherhay oundgray. Ethay owntay Alesiaway
ommandedcay away iewvay ofway ethay olewhay ainplay. Ethay esiegedbay unray ogethertay enwhay
esethay auxiliariesway ereway eensay; utualmay ongratulationscay ensueway, andway ethay indsmay
ofway allway areway elatedway ithway oyjay. Accordinglyway, awingdray outway eirthay oopstray, eythay
encampway eforebay ethay owntay, andway overcay ethay earestnay enchtray ithway urdleshay andway
illfay itway upway ithway earthway, andway akemay eadyray orfay away allysay andway everyway asualtycay.

Xlxxay.Aesarcay, avinghay ationedstay ishay armyway onway othbay idessay ofway ethay
ortificationsfay, inway orderway atthay, ifway occasionway ouldshay ariseway, eachway ouldshay
oldhay andway owknay ishay ownway ostpay, ordersway ethay avalrycay otay issueway orthfay omfray ethay
ampcay andway ommencecay actionway. Erethay asway away ommandingcay iewvay omfray ethay entireway
ampcay, ichwhay occupiedway away idgeray ofway illshay; andway ethay indsmay ofway allway ethay oldierssay
anxiouslyway awaitedway ethay issueway ofway ethay attlebay. Ethay Aulsgay adhay atteredscay
archersway andway ightlayarmedway infantryway erehay andway erethay, amongway eirthay avalrycay, otay
ivegay eliefray otay eirthay etreatingray oopstray, andway ustainsay ethay impetuosityway ofway
ourway avalrycay. Everalsay ofway ourway oldierssay ereway unexpectedlyway oundedway ybay esethay,
andway eftlay ethay attlebay. Enwhay ethay Aulsgay ereway onfidentcay atthay eirthay ountrymencay
ereway ethay onquerorscay inway ethay actionway, andway eheldbay ourway enmay ardhay essedpray ybay
umbersnay, othbay osethay owhay ereway emmedhay inway ybay ethay inelay ofway ircumvallationcay
andway osethay owhay adhay omecay otay aidway emthay, upportedsay ethay iritsspay ofway eirthay enmay
ybay outsshay andway ellsyay omfray everyway uarterqay. Asway ethay actionway asway arriedcay onway inway
ightsay ofway allway, eithernay away avebray ornay owardlycay actway ouldcay ebay oncealedcay; othbay
ethay esireday ofway aisepray andway ethay earfay ofway ignominyway, urgedway onway eachway artypay otay
alourvay. Afterway ightingfay omfray oonnay almostway otay unsetsay, ithoutway ictoryvay
incliningway inway avourfay ofway eitherway, ethay Ermansgay, onway oneway idesay, ademay away argechay
againstway ethay enemyway inway away ompactcay odybay, andway ovedray emthay ackbay; andway, enwhay eythay
ereway utpay otay ightflay, ethay archersway ereway urroundedsay andway utcay otay iecespay. Inway
otherway artspay, ikewiselay, ourway enmay ursuedpay otay ethay ampcay ethay etreatingray enemyway,
andway idday otnay ivegay emthay anway opportunityway ofway allyingray. Utbay osethay owhay adhay omecay
orthfay omfray Alesiaway eturnedray intoway ethay owntay ejectedday andway almostway espairingday
ofway uccesssay.

Xilxxay.Ethay Aulsgay, afterway ethay intervalway ofway away ayday, andway afterway akingmay, uringday
atthay imetay, anway immenseway umbernay ofway urdleshay, alingscay adderslay, andway ironway
ookshay, ilentlysay entway orthfay omfray ethay ampcay atway idnightmay andway approachedway ethay
ortificationsfay inway ethay ainplay. Aisingray away outshay uddenlysay, atthay ybay isthay
intimationway osethay owhay ereway esiegedbay inway ethay owntay ightmay earnlay eirthay
arrivalway, eythay eganbay otay astcay ownday urdleshay andway islodgeday ourway enmay omfray ethay
ampartray ybay ingsslay, arrowsway, andway onesstay, andway executedway ethay otherway ovementsmay
ichwhay areway equisiteray inway ormingstay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, Ercingetorixvay avinghay
eardhay ethay outshay, ivesgay ethay ignalsay otay ishay oopstray ybay away umpettray, andway eadslay
emthay orthfay omfray ethay owntay. Ourway oopstray, asway eachway an'smay ostpay adhay eenbay
assignedway imhay omesay aysday eforebay, anmay ethay ortificationsfay; eythay intimidateway
ethay Aulsgay ybay ingsslay, argelay onesstay, akesstay ichwhay eythay adhay acedplay alongway
ethay orksway, andway ulletsbay. Allway iewvay eingbay eventedpray ybay ethay arknessday, anymay
oundsway areway eceivedray onway othbay idessay; everalsay issilesmay areway ownthray omfray ethay
enginesway. Utbay Arcusmay Antoniusway, andway Aiuscay Eboniustray, ethay ieutenantslay, otay
omwhay ethay efenceday ofway esethay artspay adhay eenbay allottedway, aughteddray oopstray omfray
ethay edoubtsray ichwhay ereway oremay emoteray, andway entsay emthay otay aidway ourway oopstray, inway
ateverwhay irectionday eythay understoodway atthay eythay ereway ardhay essedpray.

Xiilxxay.Ilstwhay ethay Aulsgay ereway atway away istanceday omfray ethay ortificationfay,
eythay idday oremay executionway, owingway otay ethay immenseway umbernay ofway eirthay eaponsway
afterway eythay amecay earernay, eythay eitherway unawaresway empaledway emselvesthay onway ethay
ursspay, orway ereway iercedpay ybay ethay uralmay artsday omfray ethay ampartsray andway owerstay,
andway usthay erishedpay. Afterway eceivingray anymay oundsway onway allway idessay, andway avinghay
orcedfay onay artpay ofway ethay orksway, enwhay ayday ewdray ighnay, earingfay estlay eythay
ouldshay ebay urroundedsay ybay away allysay ademay omfray ethay igherhay ampcay onway ethay exposedway
ankflay, eythay etreatedray otay eirthay ountrymencay. Utbay osethay ithinway, ilstwhay eythay
ingbray orwardfay osethay ingsthay ichwhay adhay eenbay eparedpray ybay Ercingetorixvay orfay
away allysay, illfay upway ethay earestnay enchestray; avinghay elayedday away onglay imetay inway
executingway esethay ovementsmay, eythay earnedlay ethay etreatray ofway eirthay ountrymencay
eforebay eythay ewdray ighnay otay ethay ortificationsfay. Usthay eythay eturnedray otay ethay
owntay ithoutway accomplishingway eirthay objectway.

Xiiilxxay.Ethay Aulsgay, avinghay eenbay icetway epulsedray ithway eatgray osslay, onsultcay
atwhay eythay ouldshay oday eythay availway emselvesthay ofway ethay informationway ofway osethay
owhay ereway ellway acquaintedway ithway ethay ountrycay; omfray emthay eythay ascertainway ethay
ositionpay andway ortificationfay ofway ethay upperway ampcay. Erethay asway, onway ethay orthnay
idesay, away illhay, ichwhay ourway enmay ouldcay otnay includeway inway eirthay orksway, onway accountway
ofway ethay extentway ofway ethay ircuitcay, andway adhay ecessarilynay ademay eirthay ampcay inway
oundgray almostway isadvantageousday, andway ettypray eepstay. Aiuscay Antistiusway
Eginusray, andway Aiuscay Aniniuscay Ebilusray, otway ofway ethay ieutenantslay, ithway otway
egionslay, ereway inway ossessionpay ofway isthay ampcay. Ethay eaderslay ofway ethay enemyway,
avinghay econnoitredray ethay ountrycay ybay eirthay outsscay, electsay omfray ethay entireway
armyway ixtysay ousandthay enmay; elongingbay otay osethay atesstay ichwhay earbay ethay
ighesthay aracterchay orfay ouragecay eythay ivatelypray arrangeway amongway emselvesthay
atwhay eythay ishedway otay ebay oneday, andway inway atwhay annermay; eythay ecideday atthay ethay
attackway ouldshay aketay aceplay enwhay itway ouldshay eemsay otay ebay oonnay. Eythay appointway
overway eirthay orcesfay Ergasillaunusvay, ethay Arvernianway, oneway ofway ethay ourfay
eneralsgay, andway away earnay elativeray ofway Ercingetorixvay. Ehay, avinghay issuedway omfray
ethay ampcay atway ethay irstfay atchway, andway avinghay almostway ompletedcay ishay archmay away
ittlelay eforebay ethay awnday, idhay imselfhay ehindbay ethay ountainmay, andway orderedway ishay
oldierssay otay efreshray emselvesthay afterway eirthay abourlay uringday ethay ightnay. Enwhay
oonnay ownay eemedsay otay awdray ighnay, ehay archedmay astilyhay againstway atthay ampcay ichwhay
eway avehay entionedmay eforebay; andway, atway ethay amesay imetay, ethay avalrycay eganbay otay
approachway ethay ortificationsfay inway ethay ainplay, andway ethay estray ofway ethay orcesfay otay
akemay away emonstrationday inway ontfray ofway ethay ampcay.

Xivlxxay.Ercingetorixvay, avinghay eheldbay ishay ountrymencay omfray ethay itadelcay ofway
Alesiaway, issuesway orthfay omfray ethay owntay; ehay ingsbray orthfay omfray ethay ampcay onglay
ookshay, ovablemay entpayouseshay, uralmay ookshay, andway otherway ingsthay, ichwhay ehay adhay
eparedpray orfay ethay urposepay ofway akingmay away allysay. Eythay engageway onway allway idessay atway
onceway, andway everyway expedientway isway adoptedway. Eythay ockedflay otay ateverwhay artpay ofway
ethay orksway eemedsay eakestway. Ethay armyway ofway ethay Omansray isway istributedday alongway
eirthay extensiveway ineslay, andway ithway ifficultyday eetsmay ethay enemyway inway everyway
uarterqay. Ethay outsshay ichwhay ereway aisedray ybay ethay ombatantscay inway eirthay earray,
adhay away eatgray endencytay otay intimidateway ourway enmay, ecausebay eythay erceivedpay atthay
eirthay angerday estedray onway ethay alourvay ofway othersway orfay enerallygay allway evilsway
ichwhay areway istantday ostmay owerfullypay alarmway en'smay indsmay.

Xvlxxay.Aesarcay, avinghay electedsay away ommandingcay ituationsay, eessay istinctlyday
ateverwhay isway oinggay onway inway everyway uarterqay, andway endssay assistanceway otay ishay
oopstray enwhay ardhay essedpray. Ethay ideaway uppermostway inway ethay indsmay ofway othbay
artiespay isway, atthay ethay esentpray isway ethay imetay inway ichwhay eythay ouldway avehay ethay
airestfay opportunityway ofway akingmay away ugglestray; ethay Aulsgay espairingday ofway allway
afetysay, unlessway eythay ouldshay ucceedsay inway orcingfay ethay ineslay ethay Omansray
expectingway anway endway otay allway eirthay abourslay ifway eythay ouldshay aingay ethay ayday. Ethay
incipalpray ugglestray isway atway ethay upperway ineslay, otay ichwhay, eway avehay aidsay,
Ergasillaunusvay asway entsay. Ethay eastlay elevationway ofway oundgray, addedway otay away
eclivityday, exercisesway away omentousmay influenceway. Omesay areway astingcay issilesmay,
othersway, ormingfay away estudotay, advanceway otay ethay attackway; eshfray enmay ybay urnstay
elieveray ethay eariedway. Ethay earthway, eapedhay upway ybay allway againstway ethay
ortificationsfay, ivesgay ethay eansmay ofway ascentway otay ethay Aulsgay, andway overscay osethay
orksway ichwhay ethay Omansray adhay oncealedcay inway ethay oundgray. Ourway enmay avehay onay
ongerlay armsway orway engthstray.

Xvilxxay.Aesarcay, onway observingway esethay ovementsmay, endssay Abienuslay ithway ixsay
ohortscay otay elieveray ishay istressedday oldierssay ehay ordersway imhay, ifway ehay ouldshay
ebay unableway otay ithstandway emthay, otay awdray offway ethay ohortscay andway akemay away allysay;
utbay otnay otay oday isthay exceptway oughthray ecessitynay. Ehay imselfhay oesgay otay ethay
estray, andway exhortsway emthay otnay otay uccumbsay otay ethay oiltay; ehay owsshay emthay atthay
ethay uitsfray ofway allway ormerfay engagementsway ependday onway atthay ayday andway ourhay. Ethay
Aulsgay ithinway, espairingday ofway orcingfay ethay ortificationsfay inway ethay ainsplay onway
accountway ofway ethay eatnessgray ofway ethay orksway, attemptway ethay acesplay ecipitouspray inway
ascentway itherhay eythay ingbray ethay enginesway ichwhay eythay adhay eparedpray; ybay ethay
immenseway umbernay ofway eirthay issilesmay eythay islodgeday ethay efendersday omfray ethay
urretstay eythay illfay ethay itchesday ithway ayclay andway urdleshay, enthay earclay ethay
ayway; eythay eartay ownday ethay ampartray andway eastbrayorkway ithway ookshay.

Xviilxxay.Aesarcay endssay atway irstfay oungyay Utusbray, ithway ixsay ohortscay, andway
afterwardsway Aiuscay Abiusfay, ishay ieutenantlay, ithway evensay othersway inallyfay, asway
eythay oughtfay oremay obstinatelyway, ehay eadslay upway eshfray enmay otay ethay assistanceway ofway
ishay oldierssay. Afterway enewingray ethay actionway, andway epulsingray ethay enemyway, ehay
archesmay inway ethay irectionday inway ichwhay ehay adhay entsay Abienuslay, aftsdray ourfay
ohortscay omfray ethay earestnay edoubtray, andway ordersway artpay ofway ethay avalrycay otay
ollowfay imhay, andway artpay otay akemay ethay ircuitcay ofway ethay externalway ortificationsfay
andway attackway ethay enemyway inway ethay earray. Abienuslay, enwhay eithernay ethay ampartsray orway
itchesday ouldcay eckchay ethay onsetway ofway ethay enemyway, informsway Aesarcay ybay essengersmay
ofway atwhay ehay intendedway otay oday. Aesarcay astenshay otay areshay inway ethay actionway.

Xviiilxxay.Ishay arrivalway eingbay ownknay omfray ethay olourcay ofway ishay oberay, andway ethay
oopstray ofway avalrycay, andway ethay ohortscay ichwhay ehay adhay orderedway otay ollowfay imhay
eingbay eensay, asway esethay owlay andway opingslay oundsgray ereway ainlyplay isiblevay omfray
ethay eminencesway, ethay enemyway oinjay attlebay. Away outshay eingbay aisedray ybay othbay
idessay, itway asway ucceededsay ybay away eneralgay outshay alongway ethay ampartsray andway olewhay
inelay ofway ortificationsfay. Ourway oopstray, ayinglay asideway eirthay avelinsjay, arrycay
onway ethay engagementway ithway eirthay ordssway. Ethay avalrycay isway uddenlysay eensay inway ethay
earray ofway ethay Aulsgay ethay otherway ohortscay advanceway apidlyray; ethay enemyway urntay
eirthay acksbay; ethay avalrycay interceptway emthay inway eirthay ightflay, andway away eatgray
aughterslay ensuesway. Eduliussay ethay eneralgay andway iefchay ofway ethay Emoviceslay isway
ainslay; Ergasillaunusvay, ethay Arvernianway, isway akentay aliveway inway ethay ightflay,
eventysayourfay ilitarymay andardsstay areway oughtbray otay Aesarcay, andway ewfay outway ofway osay
eatgray away umbernay eturnray afesay otay eirthay ampcay. Ethay esiegedbay, eholdingbay omfray
ethay owntay ethay aughterslay andway ightflay ofway eirthay ountrymencay, espairingday ofway
afetysay, eadlay ackbay eirthay oopstray omfray ethay ortificationsfay. Away ightflay ofway ethay
Aulsgay omfray eirthay ampcay immediatelyway ensuesway onway earinghay ofway isthay isasterday,
andway adhay otnay ethay oldierssay eenbay eariedway ybay endingsay equentfray
einforcementsray, andway ethay abourlay ofway ethay entireway ayday, allway ethay enemy'sway orcesfay
ouldcay avehay eenbay estroyedday. Immediatelyway afterway idnightmay, ethay avalrycay areway
entsay outway andway overtakeway ethay earray, away eatgray umbernay areway akentay orway utcay otay
iecespay, ethay estray ybay ightflay escapeway inway ifferentday irectionsday otay eirthay
espectiveray atesstay. Ercingetorixvay, avinghay onvenedcay away ouncilcay ethay
ollowingfay ayday, eclaresday, Atthay ehay adhay undertakenway atthay arway, otnay onway
accountway ofway ishay ownway exigenciesway, utbay onway accountway ofway ethay eneralgay eedomfray;
andway incesay ehay ustmay ieldyay otay ortunefay, ehay offeredway imselfhay otay emthay orfay
eitherway urposepay, etherwhay eythay ouldshay ishway otay atoneway otay ethay Omansray ybay ishay
eathday, orway urrendersay imhay aliveway. Ambassadorsway areway entsay otay Aesarcay onway isthay
ubjectsay. Ehay ordersway eirthay armsway otay ebay urrenderedsay, andway eirthay ieftainschay
eliveredday upway. Ehay eatedsay imselfhay atway ethay eadhay ofway ethay ineslay inway ontfray ofway ethay
ampcay, ethay Allicgay ieftainschay areway oughtbray eforebay imhay. Eythay urrendersay
Ercingetorixvay, andway aylay ownday eirthay armsway. Eservingray ethay Aeduiway andway Arverniway,
otay tryay ifway ehay ouldcay aingay overway, oughthray eirthay influenceway, eirthay
espectiveray atesstay, ehay istributesday oneway ofway ethay emainingray aptivescay otay eachway
oldiersay, oughoutthray ethay entireway armyway, asway underplay.

Cxay.Afterway akingmay esethay arrangementsway, ehay archesmay intoway ethay ountrycay ofway
ethay Aeduiway, andway ecoversray atthay atestay. Otay isthay aceplay ambassadorsway areway entsay
ybay ethay Arverniway, owhay omisepray atthay eythay illway executeway ishay ommandscay. Ehay
emandsday away eatgray umbernay ofway ostageshay. Ehay endssay ethay egionslay otay interway
uartersqay; ehay estoresray aboutway entytway ousandthay aptivescay otay ethay Aeduiway andway
Arverniway; ehay ordersway Itustay Abienuslay otay archmay intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay
Equanisay ithway otway egionslay andway ethay avalrycay, andway otay imhay ehay attachesway Arcusmay
Emproniussay Utilusray; ehay acesplay Aiuscay Abiusfay, andway Uciuslay Inuciusmay Asilusbay,
ithway otway egionslay inway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Emiray, estlay eythay ouldshay ustainsay
anyway osslay omfray ethay Ellovacibay inway eirthay eighbourhoodnay. Ehay endssay Aiuscay
Antistiusway Eginusray intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Ambivaretiway, Itustay Extiussay
intoway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Iturigesbay, andway Aiuscay Aniniuscay Ebilusray intoway
osethay ofway ethay Uteniray, ithway oneway egionlay eachway. Ehay ationsstay Uintusqay Ulliustay
Icerocay, andway Ubliuspay Ulpiciussay amongway ethay Aeduiway atway Abillocay andway Atiscomay onway
ethay Aonesay, otay ocurepray uppliessay ofway orncay. Ehay imselfhay eterminesday otay interway
atway Ibractebay. Away upplicationsay ofway entytway aysday isway ecreedday ybay ethay enatesay atway
Omeray, onway earninglay esethay uccessessay omfray Aesar'scay espatchesday.



Ookbay Iiivay

Ontinuationcay Ofway Aesar'scay Allicgay Arway Ascribedway Otay Aulusway Irtiushay

Efacepray

Evailedpray onway ybay ouryay ontinuedcay olicitationssay, Albusbay, Iway avehay engagedway inway
away ostmay ifficultday asktay, asway ymay ailyday efusalsray appearway otay eadplay otnay ymay
inabilityway, utbay indolenceway, asway anway excuseway. Iway avehay ompiledcay away ontinuationcay
ofway ethay Ommentariescay ofway ourway Aesar'scay Arsway inway Aulgay, otnay indeedway otay ebay
omparedcay otay ishay itingswray, ichwhay eitherway ecedepray orway ollowfay emthay; andway
ecentlyray, Iway avehay ompletedcay atwhay ehay eftlay imperfectway afterway ethay ansactionstray
inway Alexandriaway, otay ethay endway, otnay indeedway ofway ethay ivilcay oilsbray, otay ichwhay eway
eesay onay issueway, utbay ofway Aesar'scay ifelay. Iway ishway atthay osethay owhay aymay eadray emthay
ouldcay owknay owhay unwillinglyway Iway undertookway otay itewray emthay, asway enthay Iway ightmay
ethay oremay eadilyray escapeway ethay imputationway ofway ollyfay andway arroganceway, inway
esumingpray otay intrudeway amongway Aesar'scay itingswray. Orfay itway isway agreedway onway allway
andshay, atthay onay ompositioncay asway everway executedway ithway osay eatgray arecay, atthay itway
isway otnay exceededway inway eleganceway ybay esethay Ommentariescay, ichwhay ereway ublishedpay
orfay ethay useway ofway istorianshay, atthay eythay ightmay otnay antway emoirsmay ofway uchsay
achievementsway; andway eythay andstay osay ighhay inway ethay esteemway ofway allway enmay, atthay
istorianshay eemsay atherray eprivedday ofway anthay urnishedfay ithway aterialsmay. Atway
ichwhay eway avehay oremay easonray otay ebay urprisedsay anthay otherway enmay; orfay eythay ancay
onlyway appreciateway ethay eleganceway andway orrectnesscay ithway ichwhay ehay inishedfay
emthay, ilewhay eway owknay ithway atwhay easeway andway expeditionway. Aesarcay ossessedpay otnay
onlyway anway uncommonway owflay ofway anguagelay andway eleganceway ofway lestyay, utbay alsoway away
oroughthay owledgeknay ofway ethay ethodmay ofway onveyingcay ishay ideasway. Utbay Iway adhay otnay
evenway ethay oodgay ortunefay otay areshay inway ethay Alexandrianway orway Africanway arway; andway
oughthay esethay ereway artlypay ommunicatedcay otay emay ybay Aesarcay imselfhay, inway
onversationcay, etyay eway istenlay ithway away ifferentday egreeday ofway attentionway otay
osethay ingsthay ichwhay ikestray usway ithway admirationway ybay eirthay oveltynay, andway osethay
ichwhay eway esignday otay attestway otay osteritypay. Utbay, inway uthtray, ilstwhay Iway urgeway
everyway apologyway, atthay Iway aymay otnay ebay omparedcay otay Aesarcay, Iway incurway ethay argechay
ofway anityvay, ybay inkingthay itway ossiblepay atthay Iway ancay inway ethay udgmentjay ofway anyway oneway
ebay utpay inway ompetitioncay ithway imhay. Arewellfay.

Iway.Aulgay eingbay entirelyway educedray, enwhay Aesarcay avinghay agedway arway
incessantlyway uringday ethay ormerfay ummersay, ishedway otay ecruitray ishay oldierssay
afterway osay uchmay atiguefay, ybay eposeray inway interway uartersqay, ewsnay asway oughtbray
imhay atthay everalsay atesstay ereway imultaneouslysay enewingray eirthay ostilehay
intentionsway, andway ormingfay ombinationscay. Orfay ichwhay away obablepray easonray asway
assignedway amelynay, atthay ethay Aulsgay ereway onvincedcay atthay eythay ereway otnay ableway
otay esistray ethay Omansray ithway anyway orcefay eythay ouldcay ollectcay inway oneway aceplay; andway
opedhay atthay ifway everalsay atesstay ademay arway inway ifferentday acesplay atway ethay amesay
imetay, ethay Omanray armyway ouldway eithernay avehay aidway, ornay imetay, ornay orcesfay, otay
osecutepray emthay allway ornay oughtway anyway inglesay atestay otay eclineday anyway
inconveniencesway atthay ightmay efallbay emthay, ovidedpray atthay ybay uchsay elayday ethay
estray ouldshay ebay enabledway otay assertway eirthay ibertylay.

Iiway.Atthay isthay otionnay ightmay otnay ebay onfirmedcay amongway ethay Aulsgay, Aesarcay
eftlay Arcusmay Antoniusway, ishay uaestorqay, inway argechay ofway ishay uartersqay, andway etsay
outway imselfhay ithway away uardgay ofway orsehay, ethay ayday eforebay ethay alendskay ofway
Anuaryjay, omfray ethay owntay Ibractebay, otay ethay irteenththay egionlay, ichwhay ehay adhay
ationedstay inway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Iturigesbay, otnay arfay omfray ethay erritoriestay
ofway ethay Aeduiway, andway oinedjay otay itway ethay eleventhway egionlay ichwhay asway extnay itway.
Eavinglay otway ohortscay otay uardgay ethay aggagebay, ehay eadslay ethay estray ofway ishay armyway
intoway ethay ostmay entifulplay artpay ofway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Iturigesbay; owhay,
ossessingpay anway extensiveway erritorytay andway everalsay ownstay, ereway otnay otay ebay
eterredday, ybay away inglesay egionlay uarteredqay amongway emthay, omfray akingmay arlikeway
eparationpray, andway ormingfay ombinationscay.

Iiiway.Ybay Aesar'scay uddensay arrivalway, itway appenedhay, asway itway ecessarilynay ustmay, otay
anway unprovidedway andway ispersedday eoplepay, atthay eythay ereway urprisedsay ybay ourway
orsehay, ilstwhay ultivatingcay ethay ieldsfay ithoutway anyway apprehensionsway, eforebay
eythay adhay imetay otay flyay otay eirthay ownstay. Orfay ethay usualway ignsay ofway anway enemy'sway
invasionway, ichwhay isway enerallygay intimatedway ybay ethay urningbay ofway eirthay ownstay,
asway orbiddenfay ybay Aesar'scay ordersway estlay ifway ehay advancedway arfay, oragefay andway
orncay ouldshay ecomebay arcescay, orway ethay enemyway ebay arnedway ybay ethay iresfay otay akemay
eirthay escapeway. Anymay ousandsthay eingbay akentay, asway anymay ofway ethay Iturigesbay asway
ereway ableway otay escapeway ethay irstfay omingcay ofway ethay Omansray, edflay otay ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay, elyingray eitherway onway ivatepray iendshipfray, orway ublicpay
allianceway. Inway ainvay; orfay Aesarcay, ybay astyhay archesmay, anticipatedway emthay inway
everyway aceplay, ornay idday ehay allowway anyway atestay eisurelay otay onsidercay ethay afetysay
ofway othersway, inway eferencepray otay eirthay ownway. Ybay isthay activityway, ehay othbay
etainedray ishay iendsfray inway eirthay oyaltylay, andway ybay earfay, obligedway ethay averingway
otay acceptway offersway ofway eacepay. Uchsay offersway eingbay ademay otay ethay Iturigesbay, enwhay
eythay erceivedpay atthay oughthray Aesar'scay emencyclay, anway avenueway asway openway otay ishay
iendshipfray, andway atthay ethay eighbouringnay atesstay adhay ivengay ostageshay, ithoutway
incurringway anyway unishmentpay, andway adhay eenbay eceivedray underway ishay otectionpray,
eythay idday ethay amesay.

Ivway.Aesarcay omisespray ishay oldierssay, asway away ewardray orfay eirthay abourlay andway
atiencepay, inway eerfullychay ubmittingsay otay ardshipshay omfray ethay everitysay ofway ethay
interway, ethay ifficultyday ofway ethay oadsray, andway ethay intolerableway oldcay, otway
undredhay estertiisay eachway, andway otay everyway enturiancay otway ousandthay, otay ebay ivengay
insteadway ofway underplay; andway endingsay ishay egionslay ackbay otay uartersqay, ehay imselfhay
eturnedray onway ethay ortiethfay ayday otay Ibractebay. Ilstwhay ehay asway ispensingday
usticejay erethay, ethay Iturigesbay endsay ambassadorsway otay imhay, otay entreatway ishay aidway
againstway ethay Arnutescay, owhay eythay omplainedcay adhay ademay arway againstway emthay.
Uponway isthay intelligenceway, oughthay ehay adhay otnay emainedray oremay anthay eighteenway
aysday inway interway uartersqay, ehay awsdray ethay ourteenthfay andway ixthsay egionlay outway ofway
uartersqay onway ethay Aonesay, erewhay ehay adhay ostedpay emthay asway entionedmay inway away ormerfay
Ommentarycay otay ocurepray uppliessay ofway orncay. Ithway esethay otway egionslay ehay
archesmay inway ursuitpay ofway ethay Arnutescay.

.Enwhay ethay ewsnay ofway ethay approachway ofway ourway armyway eachedray ethay enemyway, ethay
Arnutescay, errifiedtay ybay ethay ufferingssay ofway otherway atesstay, esertedday eirthay
illagesvay andway ownstay ichwhay ereway allsmay uildingsbay, aisedray inway away urryhay, otay
eetmay ethay immediateway ecessitynay, inway ichwhay eythay ivedlay otay eltershay emselvesthay
againstway ethay interway, orfay, eingbay atelylay onqueredcay, eythay adhay ostlay everalsay
ownstay, andway ispersedday andway edflay. Aesarcay, unwillingway otay exposeway ishay oldierssay
otay ethay iolentvay ormsstay atthay eakbray outway, especiallyway atway atthay easonsay, ooktay upway
ishay uartersqay atway Enabumgay, away owntay ofway ethay Arnutescay; andway odgedlay ishay enmay inway
ouseshay, artlypay elongingbay otay ethay Aulsgay, andway artlypay uiltbay otay eltershay ethay
entstay, andway astilyhay overedcay ithway atchthay. Utbay ethay orsehay andway auxiliariesway ehay
endssay otay allway artspay otay ichwhay ehay asway oldtay ethay enemyway adhay archedmay; andway otnay
ithoutway effectway, asway ourway enmay enerallygay eturnedray oadedlay ithway ootybay. Ethay
Arnutescay, overpoweredway ybay ethay everitysay ofway ethay interway, andway ethay earfay ofway
angerday, andway otnay aringday otay ontinuecay onglay inway anyway aceplay, asway eythay ereway
ivendray omfray eirthay ouseshay, andway otnay indingfay ufficientsay otectionpray inway ethay
oodsway, omfray ethay iolencevay ofway ethay ormsstay, afterway osinglay away onsiderablecay
umbernay ofway eirthay enmay, isperseday, andway aketay efugeray amongway ethay eighbouringnay
atesstay.

Ivay.Aesarcay, eingbay ontentedcay, atway osay everesay away easonsay, otay isperseday ethay
atheringgay oesfay, andway eventpray anyway ewnay arway omfray eakingbray outway, andway eingbay
onvincedcay, asway arfay asway easonray ouldcay oreseefay, atthay onay arway ofway onsequencecay
ouldcay ebay etsay onway ootfay inway ethay ummersay ampaigncay, ationedstay Aiuscay Eboniustray,
ithway ethay otway egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay ithway imhay, inway uartersqay atway Enabumgay andway
eingbay informedway ybay equentfray embassiesway omfray ethay Emiray, atthay ethay Ellovacibay
owhay exceedway allway ethay Aulsgay andway Elgaebay inway ilitarymay owesspray, andway ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay, eadedhay ybay Orreuscay, oneway ofway ethay Ellovacibay, andway
Omiuscay, ethay Atrebatianway, ereway aisingray anway armyway, andway assemblingway atway away
eneralgay endezvousray, esigningday ithway eirthay unitedway orcesfay otay invadeway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Uessionessay, owhay ereway utpay underway ethay atronagepay ofway ethay
Emiray andway oreovermay, onsideringcay atthay otnay onlyway ishay onourhay, utbay ishay
interestway asway oncernedcay, atthay uchsay ofway ishay alliesway, asway eservedday ellway ofway ethay
epublicray, ouldshay uffersay onay alamitycay; ehay againway awsdray ethay eleventhway egionlay
outway ofway uartersqay andway iteswray esidesbay otay Aiuscay Abiusfay, otay archmay ithway ishay
otway egionslay otay ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Uessionessay; andway ehay endssay otay Eboniustray
orfay oneway ofway ishay otway egionslay. Usthay, asway arfay asway ethay onveniencecay ofway ethay
uartersqay, andway ethay anagementmay ofway ethay arway admittedway, ehay aidlay ethay urdenbay ofway
ethay expeditionway onway ethay egionslay ybay urnstay, ithoutway anyway intermissionway otay ishay
ownway oilstay.

Iivay.Asway oonsay asway ishay oopstray ereway ollectedcay, ehay archedmay againstway ethay
Ellovacibay andway itchingpay ishay ampcay inway eirthay erritoriestay, etachedday oopstray
ofway orsehay allway oundray ethay ountrycay, otay aketay isonerspray, omfray omwhay ehay ightmay
earnlay ethay enemy'sway anplay. Ethay orsehay, avinghay executedway ishay ordersway, ingbray imhay
ackbay ordway atthay utbay ewfay ereway oundfay inway ethay ouseshay andway atthay evenway esethay adhay
otnay ayedstay atway omehay otay ultivatecay eirthay andslay orfay ethay emigrationway asway
eneralgay omfray allway artspay, utbay adhay eenbay entsay ackbay otay atchway ourway otionsmay.
Uponway Aesar'scay inquiringway omfray emthay, erewhay ethay ainmay odybay ofway ethay Ellovacibay
ereway ostedpay, andway atwhay asway eirthay esignday eythay ademay answerway, atthay allway ethay
Ellovacibay, itfay orfay arryingcay armsway, adhay assembledway inway oneway aceplay, andway alongway
ithway emthay ethay Ambianiway, Aulerciway, Aletescay, Elocassesvay, andway Atrebatesway, andway
atthay eythay adhay osenchay orfay eirthay ampcay anway elevatedway ositionpay, urroundedsay ybay
away angerousday orassmay atthay eythay adhay onveyedcay allway eirthay aggagebay intoway ethay
ostmay emoteray oodsway atthay everalsay oblemennay ereway unitedway inway ethay anagementmay
ofway ethay arway; utbay atthay ethay eoplepay ereway ostmay inclinedway otay ebay overnedgay ybay
Orreuscay, ecausebay eythay ewknay atthay ehay adhay ethay ongeststray aversionway otay ethay
amenay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay atthay away ewfay aysday eforebay Omiuscay adhay eftlay ethay
ampcay otay engageway ethay Ermansgay otay eirthay aidway osewhay ationnay orderedbay onway eirsthay,
andway osewhay umbersnay ereway ountlesscay atthay ethay Ellovacibay adhay omecay otay away
esolutionray, ithway ethay onsentcay ofway allway ethay eneralsgay andway ethay earnestway esireday
ofway ethay eoplepay, ifway Aesarcay ouldshay omecay ithway onlyway eethray egionslay, asway asway
eportedray, otay ivegay imhay attlebay, atthay eythay ightmay otnay ebay obligedway otay
encounterway ishay olewhay armyway onway away uturefay occasionway, enwhay eythay ouldshay ebay inway away
oremay etchedwray andway istressedday onditioncay; utbay ifway ehay oughtbray away ongerstray
orcefay, eythay intendedway otay emainray inway ethay ositionpay eythay adhay osenchay, andway ybay
ambuscadeway otay eventpray ethay Omansray omfray ettinggay oragefay ichwhay atway atthay
easonsay asway othbay arcescay andway uchmay atteredscay, orncay, andway otherway
ecessariesnay.

Iiivay.Enwhay Aesarcay asway onvincedcay ofway ethay uthtray ofway isthay accountway omfray ethay
oncurringcay estimonytay ofway everalsay ersonspay, andway erceivedpay atthay ethay ansplay
ichwhay ereway oposedpray ereway ullfay ofway udencepray, andway eryvay unlikeway ethay ashray
esolvesray ofway away arbarousbay eoplepay, ehay onsideredcay itway incumbentway onway imhay otay useway
everyway exertionway, inway orderway atthay ethay enemyway ightmay espiseday ishay allsmay orcefay
andway omecay otay anway actionway. Orfay ehay adhay eethray eteranvay egionslay ofway istinguishedday
alourvay, ethay eventhsay, eighthway, andway inthnay. Ethay eleventhway onsistedcay ofway osenchay
outhyay ofway eatgray opeshay, owhay adhay ervedsay eightway ampaignscay, utbay owhay, omparedcay
ithway ethay othersway, adhay otnay etyay acquiredway anyway eatgray eputationray orfay
experienceway andway alourvay. Allingcay ereforethay away ouncilcay, andway ayinglay eforebay itway
ethay intelligenceway ichwhay ehay adhay eceivedray, ehay encouragedway ishay oldierssay. Inway
orderway ifway ossiblepay otay enticeway ethay enemyway otay anway engagementway ybay ethay appearanceway
ofway onlyway eethray egionslay, ehay angedray ishay armyway inway ethay ollowingfay annermay atthay
ethay eventhsay, eighthway, andway inthnay egionslay ouldshay archmay eforebay allway ethay
aggagebay; atthay enthay ethay eleventhway ouldshay ingbray upway ethay earray ofway ethay olewhay
aintray ofway aggagebay ichwhay oweverhay asway utbay allsmay, asway isway usualway onway uchsay
expeditionsway, osay atthay ethay enemyway ouldcay otnay etgay away ightsay ofway away eatergray
umbernay anthay eythay emselvesthay ereway illingway otay encounterway. Ybay isthay
ispositionday ehay ormedfay ishay armyway almostway intoway away uaresqay, andway oughtbray emthay
ithinway ightsay ofway ethay enemyway oonersay anthay asway anticipatedway.

Ixway.Enwhay ethay Aulsgay, osewhay oldbay esolutionsray adhay eenbay eportedray otay Aesarcay,
awsay ethay egionslay advanceway ithway away egularray otionmay, awndray upway inway attlebay arrayway;
eitherway omfray ethay angerday ofway anway engagementway, orway ourway uddensay approachway, orway ithway
ethay esignday ofway atchingway ourway ovementsmay, eythay ewdray upway eirthay orcesfay eforebay
ethay ampcay, andway idday otnay uitqay ethay isingray oundgray. Oughthay Aesarcay ishedway otay
ingbray emthay otay attlebay, etyay eingbay urprisedsay otay eesay osay astvay away osthay ofway ethay
enemyway, ehay encampedway oppositeway otay emthay, ithway away alleyvay etweenbay emthay, eepday
atherray anthay extensiveway. Ehay orderedway ishay ampcay otay ebay ortifiedfay ithway away
ampartray elvetway eetfay ighhay, ithway eastbrayorksway uiltbay onway itway oportionedpray otay
itsway eighthay; andway otway enchestray, eachway ifteenfay eetfay oadbray, ithway
erpendicularpay idessay otay ebay unksay ikewiselay everalsay urretstay, eethray oriesstay
ighhay, otay ebay aisedray, ithway away ommunicationcay otay eachway otherway ybay alleriesgay aidlay
acrossway andway overedcay overway; ichwhay ouldshay ebay uardedgay inway ontfray ybay allsmay
arapetspay ofway osiersway; atthay ethay enemyway ightmay ebay epulsedray ybay otway owsray ofway
oldierssay. Ethay oneway ofway omwhay, eingbay oremay ecuresay omfray angerday ybay eirthay
eighthay, ightmay owthray eirthay artsday ithway oremay aringday andway otay away eatergray
istanceday; ethay otherway, ichwhay asway earernay ethay enemyway, eingbay ationedstay onway ethay
ampartray, ouldway ebay otectedpray ybay eirthay alleriesgay omfray artsday allingfay onway
eirthay eadshay. Atway ethay entranceway ehay erectedway atesgay andway urretstay ofway away
onsiderablecay eighthay.

.Aesarcay adhay away oubleday esignday inway isthay ortificationfay; orfay ehay othbay opedhay
atthay ethay engthstray ofway ishay orksway, andway ishay apparentway earsfay ouldway aiseray
onfidencecay inway ethay arbariansbay; andway enwhay erethay ouldshay ebay occasionway otay akemay
away istantday excursionway otay etgay oragefay orway orncay, ehay awsay atthay ishay ampcay ouldway ebay
ecuredsay ybay ethay orksway ithway away eryvay allsmay orcefay. Inway ethay eantimemay erethay ereway
equentfray irmishesskay acrossway ethay arshmay, away ewfay onway othbay idessay allyingsay outway
etweenbay ethay otway ampscay. Ometimessay, oweverhay, ourway Allicgay orway Ermangay
auxiliariesway ossedcray ethay arshmay, andway uriouslyfay ursuedpay ethay enemyway; orway onway
ethay otherway andhay ethay enemyway assedpay itway andway eatbay ackbay ourway enmay. Oreovermay erethay
appenedhay inway ethay oursecay ofway ourway ailyday oragingfay, atwhay ustmay ofway ecessitynay
appenhay, enwhay orncay isway otay ebay ollectedcay ybay away ewfay atteredscay enmay outway ofway
ivatepray ouseshay, atthay ourway oragersfay ispersingday inway anway intricateway ountrycay
ereway urroundedsay ybay ethay enemyway; ybay ichwhay, oughthay eway ufferedsay utbay anway
inconsiderableway osslay ofway attlecay andway ervantssay, etyay itway aisedray oolishfay opeshay
inway ethay arbariansbay; utbay oremay especiallyway, ecausebay Omiuscay, owhay Iway aidsay adhay
onegay otay etgay aidway omfray ethay Ermansgay, eturnedray ithway omesay avalrycay, andway oughthay
ethay Ermansgay ereway onlyway 500, etyay ethay arbariansbay ereway elatedway ybay eirthay
arrivalway.

Ixay.Aesarcay, observingway atthay ethay enemyway eptkay orfay everalsay aysday ithinway eirthay
ampcay, ichwhay asway ellway ecuredsay ybay away orassmay andway itsway aturalnay ituationsay, andway
atthay itway ouldcay otnay ebay assaultedway ithoutway away angerousday engagementway, ornay ethay
aceplay enclosedway ithway ineslay ithoutway anway additionway otay ishay armyway, otewray otay
Eboniustray otay endsay ithway allway espatchday orfay ethay irteenththay egionlay ichwhay asway
inway interwayuartersqay amongway ethay Iturigesbay underway Itustay Extiussay, oneway ofway ishay
ieutenantslay; andway enthay otay omecay otay imhay ybay orcedfay archesmay ithway ethay eethray
egionslay. Ehay imselfhay entsay ethay avalrycay ofway ethay Emiray, andway Ingoneslay, andway
otherway atesstay, omfray omwhay ehay adhay equiredray away astvay umbernay, otay uardgay ishay
oragingfay artiespay, andway otay upportsay emthay inway asecay ofway anyway uddensay attackway ofway
ethay enemyway.

Iixay.Asway isthay ontinuedcay orfay everalsay aysday, andway eirthay igilancevay asway
elaxedray ybay ustomcay anway effectway ichwhay isway enerallygay oducedpray ybay imetay, ethay
Ellovacibay, avinghay ademay emselvesthay acquaintedway ithway ethay ailyday ationsstay ofway
ourway orsehay, ielay inway ambushway ithway away electsay odybay ofway ootfay inway away aceplay overedcay
ithway oodsway; otay itway eythay entsay eirthay orsehay ethay extnay ayday, owhay ereway irstfay otay
ecoyday ourway enmay intoway ethay ambuscadeway, andway enthay enwhay eythay ereway urroundedsay, otay
attackway emthay. Itway asway ethay otlay ofway ethay Emiray otay allfay intoway isthay aresnay, otay omwhay
atthay ayday adhay eenbay allottedway otay erformpay isthay utyday; orfay, avinghay uddenlysay
otgay ightsay ofway ethay enemy'sway avalrycay, andway espisingday eirthay eaknessway, inway
onsequencecay ofway eirthay uperiorsay umbersnay, eythay ursuedpay emthay ootay eagerlyway,
andway ereway urroundedsay onway everyway idesay ybay ethay ootfay. Eingbay ybay isthay eansmay
ownthray intoway isorderday eythay eturnedray ithway oremay ecipitationpray anthay isway usualway
inway avalrycay actionsway, ithway ethay osslay ofway Ertiscusvay, ethay overnorgay ofway eirthay
atestay, andway ethay eneralgay ofway eirthay orsehay, owhay, oughthay arcelyscay ableway otay itsay
onway orsebackhay oughthray earsyay, eithernay, inway accordanceway ithway ethay ustomcay ofway
ethay Aulsgay, eadedplay ishay ageway inway excuseway orfay otnay acceptingway ethay ommandcay, ornay
ouldway ehay uffersay emthay otay ightfay ithoutway imhay. Ethay iritsspay ofway ethay arbariansbay
ereway uffedpay upway andway inflatedway atway ethay uccesssay ofway isthay attlebay, inway illingkay
ethay incepray andway eneralgay ofway ethay Emiray; andway ourway enmay ereway aughttay ybay isthay
osslay, otay examineway ethay ountrycay, andway ostpay eirthay uardsgay ithway oremay autioncay,
andway otay ebay oremay oderatemay inway ursuingpay away etreatingray enemyway.

Iiixay.Inway ethay eantimemay ailyday irmishesskay aketay aceplay ontinuallycay inway iewvay
ofway othbay ampscay; esethay ereway oughtfay atway ethay ordfay andway asspay ofway ethay orassmay. Inway
oneway ofway esethay ontestscay ethay Ermansgay, omwhay Aesarcay adhay oughtbray overway ethay
Inerhay, otay ightfay intermixedway ithway ethay orsehay, avinghay esolutelyray ossedcray ethay
arshmay, andway ainslay ethay ewfay owhay ademay esistanceray, andway oldlybay ursuedpay ethay
estray, osay errifiedtay emthay, atthay otnay onlyway osethay owhay ereway attackedway andhay otay
andhay, orway oundedway atway away istanceday, utbay evenway osethay owhay ereway ationedstay atway away
eatergray istanceday otay upportsay emthay, edflay isgracefullyday; andway eingbay oftenway
eatenbay omfray ethay isingray oundsgray, idday otnay opstay illtay eythay adhay etiredray intoway
eirthay ampcay, orway omesay, impelledway ybay earfay, adhay edflay artherfay. Eirthay angerday
ewdray eirthay olewhay armyway intoway uchsay onfusioncay, atthay itway asway ifficultday otay
udgejay etherwhay eythay ereway oremay insolentway afterway away ightslay advantageway, orway oremay
ejectedday ybay away iflingtray alamitycay.

Ivxay.Afterway endingspay everalsay aysday inway ethay amesay ampcay, ethay uardsgay ofway ethay
Ellovacibay, earninglay atthay Aiuscay Eboniustray asway advancingway earernay ithway ishay
egionslay, andway earingfay away iegesay ikelay atthay ofway Alesiaway, endsay offway ybay ightnay allway
owhay ereway isabledday ybay ageway orway infirmityway, orway unarmedway, andway alongway ithway emthay
eirthay olewhay aggagebay. Ilstwhay eythay areway eparingpray eirthay isorderlyday andway
onfusedcay ooptray orfay archmay orfay ethay Aulsgay areway alwaysway attendedway ybay away astvay
ultitudemay ofway aggonsway, evenway enwhay eythay avehay eryvay ightlay aggagebay, eingbay
overtakenway ybay aylightday, eythay ewdray eirthay orcesfay outway eforebay eirthay ampcay, otay
eventpray ethay Omansray attemptingway away ursuitpay eforebay ethay inelay ofway eirthay aggagebay
adhay advancedway otay away onsiderablecay istanceday. Utbay Aesarcay idday otnay inkthay itway
udentpray otay attackway emthay enwhay andingstay onway eirthay efenceday, ithway uchsay away eepstay
illhay inway eirthay avourfay, ornay eepkay ishay egionslay atway uchsay away istanceday atthay eythay
ouldcay uitqay eirthay ostpay ithoutway angerday utbay, erceivingpay atthay ishay ampcay asway
ividedday omfray ethay enemy'sway ybay away eepday orassmay, osay ifficultday otay osscray atthay ehay
ouldcay otnay ursuepay ithway expeditionway, andway atthay ethay illhay eyondbay ethay orassmay,
ichwhay extendedway almostway otay ethay enemy'sway ampcay, asway eparatedsay omfray itway onlyway ybay
away allsmay alleyvay, ehay aidlay away idgebray overway ethay orassmay andway edlay ishay armyway
acrossway, andway oonsay eachedray ethay ainplay onway ethay optay ofway ethay illhay, ichwhay asway
ortifiedfay onway eitherway idesay ybay away eepstay ascentway. Avinghay erethay awndray upway ishay
armyway inway orderway ofway attlebay, ehay archedmay otay ethay urthestfay illhay, omfray ichwhay ehay
ouldcay, ithway ishay enginesway, owershay artsday uponway ethay ickestthay ofway ethay enemyway.

Vxay.Ethay Aulsgay, onfidingcay inway ethay aturalnay engthstray ofway eirthay ositionpay,
oughthay eythay ouldway otnay eclineday anway engagementway ifway ethay Omansray attemptedway otay
ascendway ethay illhay, etyay aredday otnay ivideday eirthay orcesfay intoway allsmay artiespay,
estlay eythay ouldshay ebay ownthray intoway isorderday ybay eingbay ispersedday, andway
ereforethay emainedray inway orderway ofway attlebay. Aesarcay, erceivingpay atthay eythay
ersistedpay inway eirthay esolutionray, eptkay entytway ohortscay inway attlebay arrayway, andway,
easuringmay outway oundgray erethay orfay away ampcay, orderedway itway otay ebay ortifiedfay.
Avinghay ompletedcay ishay orksway, ehay ewdray upway ishay egionslay eforebay ethay ampartray
andway ationedstay ethay avalrycay inway ertaincay ositionspay, ithway eirthay orseshay
idledbray. Enwhay ethay Ellovacibay awsay ethay Omansray eparedpray otay ursuepay emthay, andway
atthay eythay ouldcay otnay aitway ethay olewhay ightnay, orway ontinuecay ongerlay inway ethay amesay
aceplay ithoutway ovisionspray, eythay ormedfay ethay ollowingfay anplay otay ecuresay away
etreatray. Eythay andedhay otay oneway anotherway ethay undlesbay ofway awstray andway icksstay onway
ichwhay eythay atsay orfay itway isway ethay ustomcay ofway ethay Aulsgay otay itsay enwhay awndray upway
inway orderway ofway attlebay, asway ashay eenbay assertedway inway ormerfay ommentariescay, ofway
ichwhay eythay adhay eatgray entyplay inway eirthay ampcay, andway iledpay emthay inway ethay ontfray
ofway eirthay inelay; andway atway ethay oseclay ofway ethay ayday, onway away ertaincay ignalsay, etsay
emthay allway onway irefay atway oneway andway ethay amesay imetay. Ethay ontinuedcay azeblay oonsay
eenedscray allway eirthay orcesfay omfray ethay ightsay ofway ethay Omansray, ichwhay onay oonersay
appenedhay anthay ethay arbariansbay edflay ithway ethay eatestgray ecipitationpray.

Ixvay.Oughthay Aesarcay ouldcay otnay erceivepay ethay etreatray ofway ethay enemyway orfay ethay
interventionway ofway ethay irefay, etyay, uspectingsay atthay eythay adhay adoptedway atthay
ethodmay otay avourfay eirthay escapeway, ehay ademay ishay egionslay advanceway, andway entsay away
artypay ofway orsehay otay ursuepay emthay; utbay, apprehensiveway ofway anway ambuscadeway, andway
atthay ethay enemyway ightmay emainray inway ethay amesay aceplay andway endeavourway otay awdray ourway
enmay intoway away isadvantageousday ituationsay, ehay advancesway imselfhay utbay owlyslay.
Ethay orsehay, eingbay afraidway otay enturevay intoway ethay okesmay andway enseday inelay ofway
ameflay, andway osethay owhay ereway oldbay enoughway otay attemptway itway eingbay arcelyscay ableway
otay eesay eirthay orses'hay eadshay, avegay ethay enemyway eefray ibertylay otay etreatray,
oughthray earfay ofway anway ambuscadeway. Usthay, ybay away ightflay, ullfay atway onceway ofway
owardicecay andway addressway, eythay advancedway ithoutway anyway osslay aboutway entay ilesmay,
andway encampedway inway away eryvay ongstray ositionpay. Omfray ichwhay, ayinglay umerousnay
ambuscadesway, othbay ofway orsehay andway ootfay, eythay idday onsiderablecay amageday otay ethay
Omanray oragersfay.

Iixvay.Afterway isthay adhay appenedhay everalsay imestay, Aesarcay iscoveredday, omfray away
ertaincay isonerpray, atthay Orreuscay, ethay eneralgay ofway ethay Ellovacibay, adhay
electedsay ixsay ousandthay ofway ishay avestbray ootfay andway away ousandthay orsehay, ithway
ichwhay ehay esignedday otay ielay inway ambushway inway away aceplay otay ichwhay ehay uspectedsay ethay
Omansray ouldway endsay otay ooklay orfay oragefay, onway accountway ofway ethay abundanceway ofway
orncay andway assgray. Uponway eceivingray informationway ofway eirthay esignday Aesarcay ewdray
outway oremay egionslay anthay ehay usuallyway idday, andway entsay orwardfay ishay avalrycay asway
usualway, otay otectpray ethay oragersfay. Ithway esethay ehay intermixedway away uardgay ofway
ightlay infantryway, andway imselfhay advancedway ithway ethay egionslay asway astfay asway ehay
ouldcay.

Iiixvay.Ethay Aulsgay, acedplay inway ambushway, adhay osenchay orfay ethay eatsay ofway actionway away
evellay iecepay ofway oundbay, otnay oremay anthay away ilemay inway extentway, enclosedway onway everyway
idesay ybay away ickthay oodway orway away eryvay eepday iverray, asway ybay away oiltay, andway isthay eythay
urroundedsay. Ourway enmay, apprisedway ofway ethay enemy'sway esignday, archedmay inway oodgay
orderway otay ethay oundgray, eadyray othbay inway earthay andway andhay otay ivegay attlebay, andway
illingway otay azardhay anyway engagementway enwhay ethay egionslay ereway atway eirthay ackbay. Onway
eirthay approachway, asway Orreuscay upposedsay atthay ehay adhay otgay anway opportunityway ofway
effectingway ishay urposepay, ehay atway irstfay owsshay imselfhay ithway away allsmay artypay andway
attacksway ethay oremostfay oopstray. Ourway enmay esolutelyray oodstay ethay argechay, andway
idday otnay owdcray ogethertay inway oneway aceplay, asway ommonlycay appenshay omfray urprisesay
inway engagementsway etweenbay ethay orsehay, osewhay umbersnay ovepray injuriousway otay
emselvesthay.

Ixxay.Enwhay ybay ethay udiciousjay arrangementway ofway ourway orcesfay onlyway away ewfay ofway ourway
enmay oughtfay ybay urnstay, andway idday otnay uffersay emselvesthay otay ebay urroundedsay, ethay
estray ofway ethay enemyway okebray outway omfray ethay oodsway ilstwhay Orreuscay asway engagedway.
Ethay attlebay asway aintainedmay inway ifferentday artspay ithway eatgray igourvay, andway
ontinuedcay orfay away onglay imetay undecidedway, illtay atway engthlay away odybay ofway ootfay
aduallygray advancedway omfray ethay oodsway inway orderway ofway attlebay andway orcedfay ourway
orsehay otay ivegay oundgray ethay ightlay infantryway, ichwhay ereway entsay eforebay ethay
egionslay otay ethay assistanceway ofway ethay avalrycay, oonsay amecay upway, andway, ixingmay ithway
ethay orsehay, oughtfay ithway eatgray ouragecay. Ethay attlebay asway orfay omesay imetay
oubtfulday, utbay, asway usuallyway appenshay, ourway enmay, owhay oodstay ethay enemy'sway irstfay
argechay, ecamebay uperiorsay omfray isthay eryvay ircumstancecay atthay, oughthay
uddenlysay attackedway omfray anway ambuscadeway, eythay adhay ustainedsay onay osslay. Inway ethay
eantimemay ethay egionslay ereway approachingway, andway everalsay essengersmay arrivedway
ithway oticenay otay ourway enmay andway ethay enemyway atthay ethay Omanray eneralgay asway earnay
atway andhay, ithway ishay orcesfay inway attlebay arrayway. Uponway isthay intelligenceway, ourway
enmay, onfidingcay inway ethay upportsay ofway ethay ohortscay, oughtfay ostmay esolutelyray,
earingfay, estlay ifway eythay ouldshay ebay owslay inway eirthay operationsway eythay ouldshay etlay
ethay egionslay articipatepay inway ethay oryglay ofway ethay onquestcay. Ethay enemyway oselay
ouragecay andway attemptway otay escapeway ybay ifferentday aysway. Inway ainvay; orfay eythay ereway
emselvesthay entangledway inway atthay abyrinthlay inway ichwhay eythay oughtthay otay entrapway
ethay Omansray. Eingbay efeatedday andway utpay otay ethay outray, andway avinghay ostlay ethay
eatergray artpay ofway eirthay enmay, eythay edflay inway onsternationcay itherwhayoeversay
ancechay arriedcay emthay; omesay oughtsay ethay oodsway, othersway ethay iverray, utbay ereway
igorouslyvay ursuedpay ybay ourway enmay andway utpay otay ethay ordsway. Etyay, inway ethay
eantimemay, Orreuscay, unconqueredway ybay alamitycay, ouldcay otnay ebay evailedpray onway otay
uitqay ethay ieldfay andway aketay efugeray inway ethay oodsway, orway acceptway ourway offersway ofway
uarterqay, utbay, ightingfay ourageouslycay andway oundingway everalsay, ovokedpray ourway
enmay, elatedway ithway ictoryvay, otay ischargeday eirthay eaponsway againstway imhay.

Xxay.Afterway isthay ansactiontray, Aesarcay, avinghay omecay upway immediatelyway afterway
ethay attlebay, andway imaginingway atthay ethay enemyway, uponway eceivingray ethay ewsnay ofway osay
eatgray away efeatday, ouldway ebay osay epressedday atthay eythay ouldway abandonway eirthay
ampcay, ichwhay asway otnay aboveway eightway ilesmay istantday omfray ethay enescay ofway actionway,
oughthay ehay awsay ishay assagepay obstructedway ybay ethay iverray, etyay ehay archedmay ishay
armyway overway andway advancedway. Utbay ethay Ellovacibay andway ethay otherway atesstay, eingbay
informedway ofway ethay osslay eythay adhay ustainedsay ybay away ewfay oundedway enmay owhay avinghay
escapedway ybay ethay eltershay ofway ethay oodsway, adhay eturnedray otay emthay afterway ethay
efeatday, andway earninglay atthay everythingway adhay urnedtay outway unfavourableway, atthay
Orreuscay asway ainslay, andway ethay orsehay andway ostmay aliantvay ofway eirthay ootfay utcay offway,
imaginedway atthay ethay Omansray ereway archingmay againstway emthay, andway allingcay away
ouncilcay inway astehay ybay oundsay ofway umpettray, unanimouslyway cryay outway otay endsay
ambassadorsway andway ostageshay otay Aesarcay.

Ixxay.Isthay oposalpray avinghay etmay ithway eneralgay approbationway, Omiuscay ethay
Atrebatianway edflay otay osethay Ermansgay omfray omwhay ehay adhay orrowedbay auxiliariesway
orfay atthay arway. Ethay estray instantlyway endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay; andway
equestedray atthay ehay ouldway ebay ontentedcay ithway atthay unishmentpay ofway ishay enemyway,
ichwhay ifway ehay adhay ossessedpay ethay owerpay otay inflictway onway emthay eforebay ethay
engagementway, enwhay eythay ereway etyay uninjuredway, eythay ereway ersuadedpay omfray ishay
usualway emencyclay andway ercymay, ehay evernay ouldway avehay inflictedway; atthay ethay owerpay
ofway ethay Ellovacibay asway ushedcray ybay ethay avalrycay actionway; atthay anymay ousandsthay
ofway eirthay oicestchay ootfay adhay allenfay, atthay arcescay away anmay adhay escapedway otay
ingbray ethay atalfay ewsnay. Atthay, oweverhay, ethay Ellovacibay adhay erivedday omfray ethay
attlebay oneway advantageway, ofway omesay importanceway, onsideringcay eirthay osslay; atthay
Orreuscay, ethay authorway ofway ethay ebellionray, andway agitatorway ofway ethay eoplepay, asway
ainslay orfay atthay ilstwhay ehay ivedlay, ethay enatesay adhay evernay equalway influenceway inway
ethay atestay ithway ethay iddygay opulacepay.

Iixxay.Aesarcay emindedray ethay ambassadorsway owhay ademay esethay upplicationssay,
atthay ethay Ellovacibay adhay atway ethay amesay easonsay ethay earyay eforebay, inway
onjunctioncay ithway otherway atesstay ofway Aulgay, undertakenway away arway, andway atthay eythay
adhay erseveredpay ethay ostmay obstinatelyway ofway allway inway eirthay urposepay, andway ereway
otnay oughtbray otay away operpray ayway ofway inkingthay ybay ethay ubmissionsay ofway ethay estray;
atthay ehay ewknay andway asway awareway atthay ethay uiltgay ofway away imecray asway easilyway
ansferredtray otay ethay eadday; utbay atthay onay oneway ersonpay ouldcay avehay uchsay
influenceway, asway otay ebay ableway ybay ethay eeblefay upportsay ofway ethay ultitudemay otay aiseray
away arway andway arrycay itway onway ithoutway ethay onsentcay ofway ethay oblesnay, inway oppositionway
otay ethay enatesay, andway inway espiteday ofway everyway irtuousvay anmay; oweverhay ehay asway
atisfiedsay ithway ethay unishmentpay ichwhay eythay adhay awndray uponway emselvesthay.

Iiixxay.Ethay ightnay ollowingfay ethay ambassadorsway ingbray ackbay ishay answerway otay
eirthay ountrymencay, andway eparepray ethay ostageshay. Ambassadorsway ockflay inway omfray
ethay otherway atesstay, ichwhay ereway aitingway orfay ethay issueway ofway ethay arway ithway ethay
Ellovacibay eythay ivegay ostageshay, andway eceiveray ishay ordersway; allway exceptway
Omiuscay, osewhay earsfay estrainedray imhay omfray entrustingway ishay afetysay otay anyway
erson'spay onourhay. Orfay ethay earyay eforebay, ilewhay Aesarcay asway oldinghay ethay
assizesway inway Itherhay Aulgay, Itustay Abienuslay, avinghay iscoveredday atthay Omiuscay
asway amperingtay ithway ethay atesstay, andway aisingray away onspiracycay againstway Aesarcay,
oughtthay ehay ightmay unishpay ishay infidelityway ithoutway erfidypay; utbay udgingjay atthay
ehay ouldway otnay omecay otay ishay ampcay atway ishay invitationway, andway unwillingway otay utpay
imhay onway ishay uardgay ybay ethay attemptway, ehay entsay Aiuscay Olusenusvay Uadratusqay, ithway
ordersway otay avehay imhay utpay otay eathday underway etencepray ofway away onferencecay. Otay
effectway ishay urposepay, ehay entsay ithway imhay omesay osenchay enturionscay. Enwhay eythay
amecay otay ethay onferencecay, andway Olusenusvay, asway adhay eenbay agreedway onway, adhay akentay
oldhay ofway Omiuscay ybay ethay andhay, andway oneway ofway ethay enturionscay, asway ifway urprisedsay
atway osay uncommonway anway incidentway, attemptedway otay illkay imhay, ehay asway eventedpray ybay
ethay iendsfray ofway Omiuscay, utbay oundedway imhay everelysay inway ethay eadhay ybay ethay irstfay
owblay. Ordssway ereway awndray onway othbay idessay, otnay osay uchmay ithway away esignday otay
ightfay asway otay effectway anway escapeway, ourway enmay elievingbay atthay Omiuscay adhay eceivedray
away ortalmay okestray; andway ethay Aulsgay, omfray ethay eacherytray ichwhay eythay adhay eensay,
eadingdray atthay away eeperday esignday aylay oncealedcay. Uponway isthay ansactiontray, itway
asway aidsay atthay Omiuscay ademay away esolutionray evernay otay omecay ithinway ightsay ofway anyway
Omanray.

Ivxxay.Enwhay Aesarcay, avinghay ompletelycay onqueredcay ethay ostmay arlikeway
ationsnay, erceivedpay atthay erethay asway ownay onay atestay ichwhay ouldcay akemay
eparationspray orfay arway otay opposeway imhay, utbay atthay omesay ereway emovingray andway
eeingflay omfray eirthay ountrycay otay avoidway esentpray ubjectionsay, ehay esolvedray otay
etachday ishay armyway intoway ifferentday artspay ofway ethay ountrycay. Ehay eptkay ithway
imselfhay Arcusmay Antoniusway ethay uaestorqay, ithway ethay eleventhway egionlay; Aiuscay
Abiusfay asway etachedday ithway entytwayivefay ohortscay intoway ethay emotestray artpay ofway
Aulgay, ecausebay itway asway umouredray atthay omesay atesstay adhay isenray inway armsway, andway ehay
idday otnay inkthay atthay Aiuscay Aniniuscay Ebilusray, owhay adhay ethay argechay ofway atthay
ountrycay, asway ongstray enoughway otay otectpray itway ithway otway egionslay. Ehay orderedway
Itustay Abienuslay otay attendway imselfhay, andway entsay ethay elfthtway egionlay ichwhay adhay
eenbay underway imhay inway interway uartersqay, otay Itherhay Aulgay, otay otectpray ethay Omanray
oloniescay, andway eventpray anyway osslay ybay ethay inroadsway ofway arbariansbay, imilarsay otay
atthay ichwhay adhay appenedhay ethay earyay eforebay otay ethay Ergestinestay, owhay ereway utcay
offway ybay away uddensay epredationday andway attackway. Ehay imselfhay archedmay otay epopulateday
ethay ountrycay ofway Ambiorixway, omwhay ehay adhay errifiedtay andway orcedfay otay flyay, utbay
espairedday ofway eingbay ableway otay educeray underway ishay owerpay; utbay ehay oughtthay itway
ostmay onsistentcay ithway ishay onourhay otay asteway ishay ountrycay othbay ofway
inhabitantsway, attlecay, andway uildingsbay, osay atthay omfray ethay abhorrenceway ofway ishay
ountrymencay, ifway ortunefay ufferedsay anyway otay urvivesay, ehay ightmay ebay excludedway
omfray away eturnray otay ishay atestay orfay ethay alamitiescay ichwhay ehay adhay oughtbray onway
itway.

Xxvay.Afterway ehay adhay entsay eitherway ishay egionslay orway auxiliariesway oughthray everyway
artpay ofway Ambiorix'sway ominionsday, andway astedway ethay olewhay ountrycay ybay ordsway,
irefay, andway apineray, andway adhay illedkay orway akentay odigiouspray umbersnay, ehay entsay
Abienuslay ithway otway egionslay againstway ethay Eviritray, osewhay atestay, omfray itsway
icinityvay otay Ermanygay, eingbay engagedway inway onstantcay arway, ifferedday utbay ittlelay
omfray ethay Ermansgay, inway ivilizationcay andway avagesay arbaritybay; andway evernay
ontinuedcay inway itsway allegianceway, exceptway enwhay awedway ybay ethay esencepray ofway ishay
armyway.

Ixxvay.Inway ethay eantimemay Aiuscay Aniniuscay, away ieutenantlay, avinghay eceivedray
informationway ybay etterslay andway essagesmay omfray Uraciusday, owhay adhay alwaysway
ontinuedcay inway iendshipfray otay ethay Omanray eoplepay, oughthay away artpay ofway ishay atestay
adhay evoltedray, atthay away eatgray ultitudemay ofway ethay enemyway ereway inway armsway inway ethay
ountrycay ofway ethay Ictonespay, archedmay otay ethay owntay Imonumlay. Enwhay ehay asway
approachingway itway, ehay asway informedway ybay omesay isonerspray, atthay Uraciusday asway
utshay upway ybay everalsay ousandthay enmay, underway ethay ommandcay ofway Umnacusday, eneralgay
ofway ethay Andesway, andway atthay Imonumlay asway esiegedbay, utbay otnay aringday otay acefay ethay
enemyway ithway ishay eakway egionslay, ehay encampedway inway away ongstray ositionpay Umnacusday,
avinghay oticenay ofway Aninius'scay approachway, urnedtay ishay olewhay orcefay againstway ethay
egionslay, andway eparedpray otay assaultway ethay Omanray ampcay. Utbay afterway endingspay
everalsay aysday inway ethay attemptway, andway osinglay away onsiderablecay umbernay ofway enmay,
ithoutway eingbay ableway otay akemay away eachbray inway anyway artpay ofway ethay orksway, ehay
eturnedray againway otay ethay iegesay ofway Imonumlay.

Iixxvay.Atway ethay amesay imetay, Aiuscay Abiusfay, away ieutenantlay, ingsbray ackbay anymay
atesstay otay eirthay allegianceway, andway onfirmscay eirthay ubmissionsay ybay akingtay
ostageshay; ehay asway enthay informedway ybay etterslay omfray Aniniuscay, ofway ethay
oceedingspray amongway ethay Ictonespay. Uponway ichwhay ehay etsay offway otay ingbray
assistanceway otay Uraciusday. Utbay Umnacusday earinghay ofway ethay approachway ofway Abiusfay,
andway espairingday ofway afetysay, ifway atway ethay amesay imetay ehay ouldshay ebay orcedfay otay
ithstandway ethay Omanray armyway ithoutway, andway observeway, andway ebay underway apprehensionway
omfray ethay own'stay eoplepay, ademay away ecipitatepray etreatray omfray atthay aceplay ithway
allway ishay orcesfay. Ornay idday ehay inkthay atthay ehay ouldshay ebay ufficientlysay ecuresay
omfray angerday, unlessway ehay edlay ishay armyway acrossway ethay Oirelay, ichwhay asway ootay eepday
away iverray otay asspay exceptway ybay away idgebray. Oughthay Abiusfay adhay otnay etyay omecay
ithinway ightsay ofway ethay enemyway, ornay oinedjay Aniniuscay; etyay eingbay informedway ofway
ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountrycay, ybay ersonspay acquaintedway ithway itway, ehay udgedjay itway
ostmay ikelylay atthay ethay enemyway ouldway aketay atthay ayway, ichwhay ehay oundfay eythay idday
aketay. Ehay ereforethay archedmay otay atthay idgebray ithway ishay armyway, andway orderedway ishay
avalrycay otay advanceway onay urtherfay eforebay ethay egionslay, anthay atthay eythay ouldcay
eturnray otay ethay amesay ampcay atway ightnay, ithoutway atiguingfay eirthay orseshay. Ourway
orsehay ursuedpay accordingway otay ordersway, andway ellfay uponway Umnacus'sday earray, andway
attackingway emthay onway eirthay archmay, ilewhay eeingflay, ismayedday, andway adenlay ithway
aggagebay, eythay ewslay away eatgray umbernay, andway ooktay away ichray ootybay. Avinghay
executedway ethay affairway osay uccessfullysay, eythay etiredray otay ethay ampcay.

Iiixxvay.Ethay ightnay ollowingfay, Abiusfay entsay ishay orsehay eforebay imhay, ithway
ordersway otay engageway ethay enemyway, andway elayday eirthay archmay illtay ehay imselfhay ouldshay
omecay upway. Atthay ishay ordersway ightmay ebay aithfullyfay erformedpay, Uintusqay Atiusway
Arusvay, eneralgay ofway ethay orsehay, away anmay ofway uncommonway iritspay andway illskay,
encouragedway ishay enmay, andway ursuingpay ethay enemyway, isposedday omesay ofway ishay oopstray
inway onvenientcay acesplay, andway ithway ethay estray avegay attlebay otay ethay enemyway. Ethay
enemy'sway avalrycay ademay away oldbay andstay, ethay ootfay elievingray eachway otherway, andway
akingmay away eneralgay althay, otay assistway eirthay orsehay againstway oursway. Ethay attlebay
asway armlyway ontestedcay. Orfay ourway enmay, espisingday ethay enemyway omwhay eythay adhay
onqueredcay ethay ayday eforebay, andway owingknay atthay ethay egionslay ereway ollowingfay
emthay, animatedway othbay ybay ethay isgraceday ofway etreatingray, andway away esireday ofway
oncludingcay ethay attlebay expeditiouslyway ybay eirthay ownway ouragecay, oughtfay ostmay
aliantlyvay againstway ethay ootfay andway ethay enemyway, imaginingway atthay onay oremay orcesfay
ouldway omecay againstway emthay, asway eythay adhay experiencedway ethay ayday eforebay, oughtthay
eythay adhay otgay away avourablefay opportunityway ofway estroyingday ourway olewhay avalrycay.

Ixxxay.Afterway ethay onflictcay adhay ontinuedcay orfay omesay imetay ithway eatgray
iolencevay, Umnacusday ewdray outway ishay armyway inway uchsay away annermay, atthay ethay ootfay
ouldshay ybay urnstay assistway ethay orsehay. Enthay ethay egionslay, archingmay inway oseclay
orderway, amecay uddenlysay inway ightsay ofway ethay enemyway. Atway isthay ightsay, ethay arbarianbay
orsehay ereway osay astonishedway, andway ethay ootfay osay errifiedtay, atthay eakingbray
oughthray ethay inelay ofway aggagebay, eythay etookbay emselvesthay otay ightflay ithway away
oudlay outshay, andway inway eatgray isorderday. Utbay ourway orsehay, owhay away ittlelay eforebay
adhay igorouslyvay engagedway emthay, ilstwhay eythay ademay esistanceray, eingbay elatedway
ithway oyjay atway eirthay ictoryvay, aisingray away outshay onway everyway idesay, ouredpay oundray
emthay asway eythay anray, andway asway onglay asway eirthay orseshay adhay engthstray otay ursuepay, orway
eirthay armsway otay ivegay away owblay, osay onglay idday eythay ontinuecay ethay aughterslay ofway
ethay enemyway inway atthay attlebay, andway avinghay illedkay aboveway elvetway ousandthay enmay inway
armsway, orway uchsay asway ewthray awayway eirthay armsway oughthray earfay, eythay ooktay eirthay
olewhay aintray ofway aggagebay.

Xxxay.Afterway isthay efeatday, enwhay itway asway ascertainedway atthay Apesdray, away Enoniansay
owhay inway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay evoltray ofway Aulgay, adhay ollectedcay omfray allway
uartersqay enmay ofway esperateday ortunesfay, invitedway ethay avesslay otay ibertylay,
alledcay inway ethay exilesway ofway ethay olewhay ingdomkay, ivengay anway asylumway otay obbersray,
andway interceptedway ethay Omanray aggagebay andway ovisionspray, asway archingmay otay ethay
ovincepray ithway ivefay ousandthay enmay, eingbay allway ehay ouldcay ollectcay afterway ethay
efeatday, andway atthay Uteriuslay away Adurciancay owhay, asway itway ashay eenbay observedway inway away
ormerfay ommentarycay, adhay esignedday otay akemay anway attackway onway ethay Ovincepray inway ethay
irstfay evoltray ofway Aulgay, adhay ormedfay away unctionjay ithway imhay, Aiuscay Aniniuscay
entway inway ursuitpay ofway emthay ithway otway egionslay, estlay eatgray isgraceday ightmay ebay
incurredway omfray ethay earsfay orway injuriesway oneday otay ethay Ovincepray ybay ethay
epredationsday ofway away andbay ofway esperateday enmay.

Ixxxay.Aiuscay Abiusfay etsay offway ithway ethay estray ofway ethay armyway otay ethay Arnutescay
andway osethay otherway atesstay, osewhay orcesfay ehay asway informedway adhay ervedsay asway
auxiliariesway inway atthay attlebay, ichwhay ehay oughtfay againstway Umnacusday. Orfay ehay adhay
onay oubtday atthay eythay ouldway ebay oremay ubmissivesay afterway eirthay ecentray
ufferingssay, utbay ifway espiteray andway imetay ereway ivengay emthay, eythay ightmay ebay
easilyway excitedway ybay ethay earnestway olicitationssay ofway ethay amesay Umnacusday. Onway
isthay occasionway Abiusfay asway extremelyway ortunatefay andway expeditiousway inway
ecoveringray ethay atesstay. Orfay ethay Arnutescay, owhay, oughthay oftenway arassedhay adhay
evernay entionedmay eacepay, ubmittedsay andway avegay ostageshay andway ethay otherway
atesstay, ichwhay ielay inway ethay emotestray artspay ofway Aulgay, adjoiningway ethay oceanway,
andway ichwhay areway alledcay Armoricaeway, influencedway ybay ethay exampleway ofway ethay
Arnutescay, asway oonsay asway Abiusfay arrivedway ithway ishay egionslay, ithoutway elayday
omplycay ithway ishay ommandcay. Umnacusday, expelledway omfray ishay ownway erritoriestay,
anderingway andway ulkingskay aboutway, asway orcedfay otay eeksay efugeray ybay imselfhay inway
ethay ostmay emoteray artspay ofway Aulgay.

Iixxxay.Utbay Apescray inway onjunctioncay ithway Iteriuslay, owingknay atthay Aniniuscay
asway atway andhay ithway ethay egionslay, andway atthay eythay emselvesthay ouldcay otnay ithoutway
ertaincay estructionday enterway ethay oundariesbay ofway ethay ovincepray, ilstwhay anway armyway
asway inway ursuitpay ofway emthay, andway eingbay onay ongerlay atway ibertylay otay oamray upway andway
ownday andway illagepay, althay inway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Adurcicay, asway Uteriuslay adhay
onceway inway ishay osperitypray ossessedpay away owerfulpay influenceway overway ethay
inhabitantsway, owhay ereway ishay ountrymencay, andway eingbay alwaysway ethay authorway ofway ewnay
ojectspray, adhay onsiderablecay authorityway amongway ethay arbariansbay; ithway ishay ownway
andway Apes'dray oopstray ehay eizedsay Uxellodunumway, away owntay ormerlyfay inway assalagevay
otay imhay andway onglystray ortifiedfay ybay itsway aturalnay ituationsay; andway evailedpray onway
ethay inhabitantsway otay oinjay imhay.

Iiixxxay.Afterway Aniniuscay adhay apidlyray archedmay otay isthay aceplay, andway erceivedpay
atthay allway artspay ofway ethay owntay ereway ecuredsay ybay eryvay aggycray ocksray, ichwhay itway
ouldway ebay ifficultday orfay enmay inway armsway otay imbclay evenway ifway eythay etmay ithway onay
esistanceray; andway, oreovermay, observingway atthay ethay own'stay eoplepay ereway
ossessedpay ofway effectsway, otay away onsiderablecay amountway, andway atthay ifway eythay
attemptedway otay onveycay emthay awayway inway away andestineclay annermay, eythay ouldcay otnay
escapeway ourway orsehay, ornay evenway ourway egionslay; ehay ividedday ishay orcesfay intoway eethray
artspay, andway itchedpay eethray ampscay onway eryvay ighhay oundgray, ithway ethay intentionway
ofway awingdray ineslay oundray ethay owntay ybay egreesday, asway ishay orcesfay ouldcay earbay ethay
atiguefay.

Ivxxxay.Enwhay ethay ownsmentay erceivedpay ishay esignday, eingbay errifiedtay ybay ethay
ecollectionray ofway ethay istressday atway Alesiaway, eythay eganbay otay eaddray imilarsay
onsequencescay omfray away iegesay; andway aboveway allway Uteriuslay, owhay adhay experiencedway
atthay atalfay eventway, autionedcay emthay otay akemay ovisionpray ofway orncay; eythay
ereforethay esolveray ybay eneralgay onsentcay otay eavelay artpay ofway eirthay oopstray
ehindbay, andway etsay outway ithway eirthay ightlay oopstray otay ingbray inway orncay. Ethay emeschay
avinghay etmay ithway approbationway, ethay ollowingfay ightnay Apesdray andway Uteriuslay,
eavinglay otway ousandthay enmay inway ethay arrisongay, archedmay outway ofway ethay owntay ithway
ethay estray. Afterway away ewfay ays'day aystay inway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Adurcicay omesay ofway
omwhay ereway isposedday otay assistway emthay ithway orncay, andway othersway ereway unableway otay
eventpray eirthay akingtay itway eythay ollectedcay away eatgray orestay. Ometimessay alsoway
attacksway ereway ademay onway ourway ittlelay ortsfay ybay alliessay atway ightnay. Orfay isthay
easonray Aniniuscay eferredday awingdray ishay orksway oundray ethay olewhay owntay, estlay ehay
ouldshay ebay unableway otay otectpray emthay enwhay ompletedcay, orway ybay isposingday ishay
arrisonsgay inway everalsay acesplay, ouldshay akemay emthay ootay eakway.

Vxxxay.Apesdray andway Uteriuslay, avinghay aidlay inway away argelay upplysay ofway orncay,
occupyway away ositionpay atway aboutway entay ilesmay istanceday omfray ethay owntay, intendingway
omfray itway otay onveycay ethay orncay intoway ethay owntay ybay egreesday. Eythay osechay eachway ishay
espectiveray epartmentday. Apesdray ayedstay ehindbay inway ethay ampcay ithway artpay ofway ethay
armyway otay otectpray itway; Uteriuslay onveyscay ethay aintray ithway ovisionspray intoway ethay
owntay. Accordinglyway, avinghay isposedday uardsgay erehay andway erethay alongway ethay oadray,
aboutway ethay enthtay ourhay ofway ethay ightnay, ehay etsay outway ybay arrownay athspay oughthray
ethay oodsway, otay etchfay ethay orncay intoway ethay owntay. Utbay eirthay oisenay eingbay eardhay
ybay ethay entinelssay ofway ourway ampcay, andway ethay outsscay ichwhay eway adhay entsay outway,
avinghay oughtbray anway accountway ofway atwhay asway oinggay onway, Aniniuscay instantlyway ithway
ethay eadyrayarmedway ohortscay omfray ethay earestnay urretstay ademay anway attackway onway ethay
onvoycay atway ethay eakbray ofway ayday. Eythay, alarmedway atway osay unexpectedway anway evilway, edflay
ybay ifferentday aysway otay eirthay uardgay ichwhay asway oonsay asway ourway enmay erceivedpay,
eythay ellfay ithway eatgray uryfay onway ethay escortway, andway idday otnay allowway away inglesay anmay
otay ebay akentay aliveway. Uteriuslay escapedway encethay ithway away ewfay ollowersfay, utbay idday
otnay eturnray otay ethay ampcay.

Vixxxay.Afterway isthay uccesssay, Aniniuscay earntlay omfray omesay isonerspray, atthay away
artpay ofway ethay orcesfay asway encampedway ithway Apesdray, otnay oremay anthay entay ilesmay
offway; ichwhay eingbay onfirmedcay ybay everalsay, upposingsay atthay afterway ethay efeatday
ofway oneway eneralgay, ethay estray ouldway ebay errifiedtay, andway ightmay ebay easilyway
onqueredcay, ehay oughtthay itway away ostmay ortunatefay eventway atthay onenay ofway ethay enemyway
adhay edflay ackbay omfray ethay aughterslay otay ethay ampcay, otay ivegay Apesdray oticenay ofway
ethay alamitycay ichwhay adhay efallenbay imhay. Andway asway ehay ouldcay eesay onay angerday inway
akingmay ethay attemptway, ehay entsay orwardfay allway ishay avalrycay andway ethay Ermangay ootfay,
enmay ofway eatgray activityway, otay ethay enemy'sway ampcay. Ehay ividesday oneway egionlay amongway
ethay eethray ampscay, andway akestay ethay otherway ithoutway aggagebay alongway ithway imhay.
Enwhay ehay adhay advancedway earnay ethay enemyway, ehay asway informedway ybay outsscay, ichwhay ehay
adhay entsay eforebay imhay, atthay ethay enemy'sway ampcay, asway isway ethay ustomcay ofway
arbariansbay, asway itchedpay owlay, earnay ethay anksbay ofway away iverray, andway atthay ethay
igherhay oundsgray ereway unoccupiedway utbay atthay ethay Ermangay orsehay adhay ademay away
uddensay attackway onway emthay, andway adhay egunbay ethay attlebay. Uponway isthay intelligenceway,
ehay archedmay upway ithway ishay egionlay, armedway andway inway orderway ofway attlebay. Enthay, onway away
ignalsay eingbay uddenlysay ivengay onway everyway idesay, ourway enmay ooktay ossessionpay ofway
ethay igherhay oundsgray. Uponway isthay, ethay Ermangay orsehay observingway ethay Omanray
olourscay, oughtfay ithway eatgray igourvay. Immediatelyway allway ethay ohortscay attackway
emthay onway everyway idesay; andway avinghay eitherway illedkay orway ademay isonerspray ofway emthay
allway, ainedgay eatgray ootybay. Inway atthay attlebay, Apesdray imselfhay asway akentay
isonerpray.

Viixxxay.Aniniuscay, avinghay accomplishedway ethay usinessbay osay uccessfullysay,
ithoutway avinghay arcelyscay away anmay oundedway, eturnedray otay esiegebay ethay owntay;
andway, avinghay estroyedday ethay enemyway ithoutway, orfay earfay ofway omwhay ehay adhay eenbay
eventedpray omfray engtheningstray ishay edoubtsray, andway urroundingsay ethay enemyway
ithway ishay ineslay, ehay ordersway ethay orkway otay ebay ompletedcay onway everyway idesay. Ethay
extnay ayday, Aiuscay Abiusfay amecay otay oinjay imhay ithway ishay orcesfay, andway ooktay uponway
imhay ethay iegesay ofway oneway idesay.

Viiixxxay.Inway ethay eantimemay, Aesarcay eftlay Aiuscay Antoniusway inway ethay ountrycay ofway
ethay Ellovacibay, ithway ifteenfay ohortscay, atthay ethay Elgaebay ightmay avehay onay
opportunityway ofway ormingfay ewnay ansplay inway uturefay. Ehay imselfhay isitsvay ethay otherway
