atesstay, emandsday away eatgray umbernay ofway ostageshay, andway ybay ishay encouragingway
anguagelay allaysway ethay apprehensionsway ofway allway. Enwhay ehay amecay otay ethay Arnutescay,
inway osewhay atestay ehay ashay inway away ormerfay ommentarycay entionedmay atthay ethay arway
irstfay okebray outway; observingway, atthay omfray away onsciousnesscay ofway eirthay uiltgay,
eythay eemedsay otay ebay inway ethay eatestgray errortay otay elieveray ethay atestay ethay
oonersay omfray itsway earfay, ehay emandedday atthay Uturvatusgay, ethay omoterpray ofway atthay
easontray, andway ethay instigatorway ofway atthay ebellionray, ouldshay ebay eliveredday upway otay
unishmentpay. Andway oughthay ethay atterlay idday otnay areday otay usttray ishay ifelay evenway otay
ishay ownway ountrymencay, etyay uchsay iligentday earchsay asway ademay ybay emthay allway, atthay
ehay asway oonsay oughtbray otay ourway ampcay. Aesarcay asway orcedfay otay unishpay imhay, ybay ethay
amoursclay ofway ethay oldierssay, ontrarycay otay ishay aturalnay umanityhay, orfay eythay
allegedway atthay allway ethay angersday andway osseslay incurredway inway atthay arway, oughtway otay
ebay imputedway otay Uturvatusgay. Accordinglyway, ehay asway ippedwhay otay eathday, andway ishay
eadhay utcay offway.

Ixxxxay.Erehay Aesarcay asway informedway ybay umerousnay etterslay omfray Aniniuscay ofway
atwhay adhay appenedhay otay Apesdray andway Uteriuslay, andway inway atwhay onductcay ethay own'stay
eoplepay ersistedpay andway oughthay ehay espisedday ethay allnesssmay ofway eirthay umbersnay,
etyay ehay oughtthay eirthay obstinacyway eservingday away everesay unishmentpay, estlay Aulgay
inway eneralgay ouldshay adoptway anway ideaway atthay eshay idday otnay antway engthstray utbay
erseverancepay otay opposeway ethay Omansray; andway estlay ethay otherway atesstay, elyingray onway
ethay advantageway ofway ituationsay, ouldshay ollowfay eirthay exampleway andway assertway eirthay
ibertylay; especiallyway asway ehay ewknay atthay allway ethay Aulsgay understoodway atthay ishay
ommandcay asway otay ontinuecay utbay oneway ummersay ongerlay, andway ifway eythay ouldcay oldhay
outway orfay atthay imetay, atthay eythay ouldway avehay onay urtherfay angerday otay apprehendway.
Ehay ereforethay eftlay Uintusqay Alenuscay, oneway ofway ishay ieutenantslay ehindbay imhay,
ithway otway egionslay, andway instructionsway otay ollowfay imhay ybay egularray archesmay. Ehay
astenedhay asway uchmay asway ehay ouldcay ithway allway ethay avalrycay otay Aniniuscay.

Lxay.Avinghay arrivedway atway Uxellodunumway, ontrarycay otay ethay eneralgay expectationway,
andway erceivingpay atthay ethay owntay asway urroundedsay ybay ethay orksway, andway atthay ethay
enemyway adhay onay ossiblepay eansmay ofway etiringray omfray ethay assaultway, andway eingbay
ikewiselay informedway ybay ethay esertersday atthay ethay ownsmentay adhay abundanceway ofway
orncay; ehay endeavouredway otay eventpray eirthay ettinggay aterway. Away iverray ividedday ethay
alleyvay elowbay, ichwhay almostway urroundedsay ethay eepstay aggycray ountainmay onway ichwhay
Uxellodunumway asway uiltbay. Ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray eventedpray ishay urningtay
ethay urrentcay; orfay itway anray osay owlay ownday atway ethay ootfay ofway ethay ountainmay, atthay onay
ainsdray ouldcay ebay unksay eepday enoughway otay awdray itway offway inway anyway irectionday. Utbay
ethay escentday otay itway asway osay ifficultday, atthay ifway eway ademay oppositionway, ethay
esiegedbay ouldcay eithernay omecay otay ethay iverray, ornay etireray upway ethay ecipicepray
ithoutway azardhay ofway eirthay iveslay. Aesarcay, erceivingpay ethay ifficultyday,
isposedday archersway andway ingersslay, andway inway omesay acesplay, oppositeway otay ethay
easiestway escentsday, acedplay enginesway, andway attemptedway otay inderhay ethay ownsmentay
omfray ettinggay aterway atway ethay iverray, ichwhay obligedway emthay afterwardsway otay ogay allway
otay oneway aceplay otay ocurepray aterway.

Ixlay.Oseclay underway ethay allsway ofway ethay owntay, away opiouscay ingspray ushedgay outway onway
atthay artpay, ichwhay orfay ethay acespay ofway earlynay eethray undredhay eetfay, asway otnay
urroundedsay ybay ethay iverray. Ilstwhay everyway otherway ersonpay ishedway atthay ethay
esiegedbay ouldcay ebay ebarredday omfray isthay ingspray, Aesarcay aloneway awsay atthay itway
ouldcay ebay effectedway, oughthay otnay ithoutway eatgray angerday. Oppositeway otay itway ehay
eganbay otay advanceway ethay ineaevay owardstay ethay ountainmay, andway otay owthray upway away
oundmay, ithway eatgray abourlay andway ontinualcay irmishingskay. Orfay ethay ownsmentay anray
ownday omfray ethay ighhay oundgray, andway oughtfay ithoutway anyway iskray, andway oundedway
everalsay ofway ourway enmay, etyay eythay obstinatelyway ushedpay onway andway ereway otnay eterredday
omfray ovingmay orwardfay ethay ineaevay, andway omfray urmountingsay ybay eirthay assiduityway
ethay ifficultiesday ofway ituationsay. Atway ethay amesay imetay eythay orkway inesmay, andway
ovemay ethay atescray andway ineaevay otay ethay ourcesay ofway ethay ountainfay. Isthay asway ethay
onlyway orkway ichwhay eythay ouldcay oday ithoutway angerday orway uspicionsay. Away oundmay ixtysay
eetfay ighhay asway aisedray; onway itway asway erectedway away urrettay ofway entay oriesstay, otnay
ithway ethay intentionway atthay itway ouldshay ebay onway away evellay ithway ethay allway orfay atthay
ouldcay otnay ebay effectedway ybay anyway orksway, utbay otay iseray aboveway ethay optay ofway ethay
ingspray. Enwhay ourway enginesway eganbay otay ayplay omfray itway uponway ethay athspay atthay edlay
otay ethay ountainfay, andway ethay ownsmentay ouldcay otnay ogay orfay aterway ithoutway angerday,
otnay onlyway ethay attlecay esignedday orfay oodfay andway ethay orkingway attlecay, utbay away
eatgray umbernay ofway enmay alsoway iedday ofway irstthay.

Iixlay.Alarmedway atway isthay alamitycay, ethay ownsmentay illfay arrelsbay ithway allowtay,
itchpay, andway ieddray oodway; esethay eythay etsay onway irefay, andway ollray ownday onway ourway
orksway. Atway ethay amesay imetay, eythay ightfay ostmay uriouslyfay, otay eterday ethay Omansray,
ybay ethay engagementway andway angerday, omfray extinguishingway ethay amesflay. Instantlyway away
eatgray azeblay aroseway inway ethay orksway. Orfay ateverwhay eythay ewthray ownday ethay
ecipicepray, ikingstray againstway ethay inevay andway aggerway, ommunicatedcay ethay irefay otay
ateverwhay asway inway ethay ayway. Ourway oldierssay onway ethay otherway andhay, oughthay eythay
ereway engagedway inway away erilouspay ortsay ofway encounterway, andway abouringlay underway ethay
isadvantagesday ofway ositionpay, etyay upportedsay allway ithway eryvay eatgray esencepray ofway
indmay. Orfay ethay actionway appenedhay inway anway elevatedway ituationsay, andway inway ightsay ofway
ourway armyway; andway away eatgray outshay asway aisedray onway othbay idessay; ereforethay everyway
anmay acedfay ethay eaponsway ofway ethay enemyway andway ethay amesflay inway asway onspicuouscay away
annermay asway ehay ouldcay, atthay ishay alourvay ightmay ebay ethay etterbay ownknay andway
attestedway.

Iiixlay.Aesarcay, observingway atthay everalsay ofway ishay enmay ereway oundedway, orderedway
ethay ohortscay otay ascendway ethay ountainmay onway allway idessay, andway, underway etencepray ofway
assailingway ethay allsway, otay aiseray away outshay atway ichwhay ethay esiegedbay eingbay
ightenedfray, andway otnay owingknay atwhay asway oinggay onway inway otherway acesplay, allcay offway
eirthay armedway oopstray omfray attackingway ourway orksway, andway isposeday emthay onway ethay
allsway. Usthay ourway enmay, ithoutway azardinghay away attlebay, ainedgay imetay artlypay otay
extinguishway ethay orksway ichwhay adhay aughtcay irefay, andway artlypay otay utcay offway ethay
ommunicationcay. Asway ethay ownsmentay illstay ontinuedcay otay akemay anway obstinateway
esistanceray, andway evenway, afterway osinglay ethay eatestgray artpay ofway eirthay orcesfay ybay
oughtdray, erseveredpay inway eirthay esolutionray Atway astlay ethay einsvay ofway ethay ingspray
ereway utcay acrossway ybay ourway inesmay, andway urnedtay omfray eirthay oursecay. Ybay isthay
eirthay onstantcay ingspray asway uddenlysay ieddray upway, ichwhay educedray emthay otay uchsay
espairday atthay eythay imaginedway atthay itway asway otnay oneday ybay ethay artway ofway anmay, utbay
ethay illway ofway ethay odsgay; orcedfay, ereforethay, ybay ecessitynay, eythay atway engthlay
ubmittedsay.

Ivxlay.Aesarcay, eingbay onvincedcay atthay ishay enitylay asway ownknay otay allway enmay, andway
eingbay underway onay earsfay ofway eingbay oughtthay otay actway everelysay omfray away aturalnay
ueltycray, andway erceivingpay atthay erethay ouldway ebay onay endway otay ishay oublestray ifway
everalsay atesstay ouldshay attemptway otay ebelray inway ikelay annermay andway inway ifferentday
acesplay, esolvedray otay eterday othersway ybay inflictingway anway exemplaryway unishmentpay
onway esethay. Accordinglyway ehay utcay offway ethay andshay ofway osethay owhay adhay ornebay armsway
againstway imhay. Eirthay iveslay ehay aredspay, atthay ethay unishmentpay ofway eirthay
ebellionray ightmay ebay ethay oremay onspicuouscay. Apesdray, owhay Iway avehay aidsay asway
akentay ybay Aniniuscay, eitherway oughthray indignationway andway iefgray arisingway omfray ishay
aptivitycay, orway oughthray earfay ofway everersay unishmentspay, abstainedway omfray oodfay
orfay everalsay aysday, andway usthay erishedpay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, Uteriuslay, owhay, Iway
avehay elatedray, adhay escapedway omfray ethay attlebay, avinghay allenfay intoway ethay andshay
ofway Epasnactusway, anway Arvernianway orfay ehay equentlyfray angedchay ishay uartersqay, andway
ewthray imselfhay onway ethay onourhay ofway everalsay ersonspay, asway ehay awsay atthay ehay areday
otnay emainray onglay inway oneway aceplay, andway asway onsciouscay owhay eatgray anway enemyway ehay
eservedday otay avehay inway Aesarcay, asway ybay isthay Epasnactusway, ethay Arvernianway, away
inceresay iendfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, eliveredday ithoutway anyway esitationhay, away
isonerpray otay Aesarcay.

Xlvay.Inway ethay eantimemay, Abienuslay engagesway inway away uccessfulsay avalrycay actionway
amongway ethay Eviritray; andway, avinghay illedkay everalsay ofway emthay andway ofway ethay
Ermansgay, owhay evernay efusedray eirthay aidway otay anyway ersonpay againstway ethay Omansray,
ehay otgay eirthay iefschay aliveway intoway ishay owerpay, andway, amongstway emthay, Urussay, anway
Aeduanway, owhay asway ighlyhay enownedray othbay orfay ishay alourvay andway irthbay, andway asway
ethay onlyway Aeduanway atthay adhay ontinuedcay inway armsway illtay atthay imetay. Aesarcay, eingbay
informedway ofway isthay, andway erceivingpay atthay ehay adhay etmay ithway oodgay uccesssay inway
allway artspay ofway Aulgay, andway eflectingray atthay, inway ormerfay ampaignscay, Elticcay
Aulgay adhay eenbay onqueredcay andway ubduedsay; utbay atthay ehay adhay evernay onegay inway
ersonpay otay Aquitaniaway, utbay adhay ademay away onquestcay ofway itway, inway omesay egreeday, ybay
Arcusmay Assuscray, etsay outway orfay itway ithway otway egionslay, esigningday otay endspay ethay
atterlay artpay ofway ethay ummersay erethay. Isthay affairway ehay executedway ithway ishay usualway
espatchday andway oodgay ortunefay. Orfay allway ethay atesstay ofway Aquitaniaway entsay
ambassadorsway otay imhay andway eliveredday ostageshay. Esethay affairsway eingbay
oncludedcay, ehay archedmay ithway away uardgay ofway avalrycay owardstay Arbonay, andway ewdray
offway ishay armyway intoway interway uartersqay ybay ishay ieutenantslay. Ehay ostedpay ourfay
egionslay inway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Elgaebay, underway Arcusmay Antoniusway, Aiuscay
Eboniustray, Ubliuspay Atiniusvay, andway Uintusqay Ulliustay, ishay ieutenantslay. Otway
ehay etachedday otay ethay Aeduiway, owingknay emthay otay avehay away eryvay owerfulpay influenceway
oughoutthray allway Aulgay. Otway ehay acedplay amongway ethay Uronitay, earnay ethay onfinescay
ofway ethay Arnutescay, otay eepkay inway aweway ethay entireway acttray ofway ountrycay orderingbay onway
ethay oceanway; ethay otherway otway ehay acedplay inway ethay erritoriestay ofway ethay Emoviceslay,
atway away allsmay istanceday omfray ethay Arverniway, atthay onay artpay ofway Aulgay ightmay ebay
ithoutway anway armyway. Avinghay entspay away ewfay aysday inway ethay ovincepray, ehay uicklyqay anray
oughthray allway ethay usinessbay ofway ethay assizesway, ettledsay allway ublicpay isputesday,
andway istributedday ewardsray otay ethay ostmay eservingday; orfay ehay adhay away oodgay
opportunityway ofway earninglay owhay everyway ersonpay asway isposedday owardstay ethay
epublicray uringday ethay eneralgay evoltray ofway Aulgay, ichwhay ehay adhay ithstoodway ybay
ethay idelityfay andway assistanceway ofway ethay Ovincepray.

Iixlvay.Avinghay inishedfay esethay affairsway, ehay eturnedray otay ishay egionslay amongway
ethay Elgaebay andway interedway atway Emetocennanay erethay ehay otgay intelligenceway atthay
Omiuscay, ethay Atrebatianway adhay adhay anway engagementway ithway ishay avalrycay. Orfay enwhay
Antoniusway adhay onegay intoway interway uartersqay, andway ethay atestay ofway ethay Atrebatesway
ontinuedcay inway eirthay allegianceway, Omiuscay, owhay, afterway atthay oundway ichwhay Iway
eforebay entionedmay, asway alwaysway eadyray otay oinjay ishay ountrymencay uponway everyway
ommotioncay, atthay eythay ightmay otnay antway away ersonpay otay adviseway andway eadhay emthay inway
ethay anagementmay ofway ethay arway, enwhay ishay atestay ubmittedsay otay ethay Omansray,
upportedsay imselfhay andway ishay adherentsway onway underplay ybay eansmay ofway ishay avalrycay,
infestedway ethay oadsray, andway interceptedway everalsay onvoyscay ichwhay ereway ingingbray
ovisionspray otay ethay Omanray uartersqay.

Iiixlvay.Aiuscay Olusenusvay Uadratusqay asway appointedway ommandercay ofway ethay orsehay
underway Antoniusway, otay interway ithway imhay Antoniusway entsay imhay inway ursuitpay ofway ethay
enemy'sway avalrycay; ownay Olusenusvay addedway otay atthay alourvay ichwhay asway eprayeminentway
inway imhay, away eatgray aversionway otay Omiuscay, onway ichwhay accountway ehay executedway
ethay oremay illinglyway ethay ordersway ichwhay ehay eceivedray. Avinghay, ereforethay, aidlay
ambuscadesway, ehay adhay everalsay encountersway ithway ishay avalrycay andway amecay offway
uccessfulsay. Atway astlay, enwhay away iolentvay ontestcay ensuedway, andway Olusenusvay,
oughthray eagernessway otay interceptway Omiuscay, adhay obstinatelyway ursuedpay imhay ithway
away allsmay artypay; andway Omiuscay adhay, ybay ethay apidityray ofway ishay ightflay, awndray
Olusenusvay otay away onsiderablecay istanceday omfray ishay oopstray, ehay, onway away uddensay,
appealedway otay ethay onourhay ofway allway aboutway imhay orfay assistanceway otnay otay uffersay ethay
oundway, ichwhay ehay adhay erfidiouslypay eceivedray, otay ogay ithoutway engeancevay; andway,
eelingwhay ishay orsehay aboutway, oderay unguardedlyway eforebay ethay estray upway otay ethay
ommandercay. Allway ishay orsehay ollowingfay ishay exampleway, ademay away ewfay ofway ourway enmay
urntay eirthay acksbay andway ursuedpay emthay. Omiuscay, appingclay ursspay otay ishay orsehay,
oderay upway otay Olusenusvay, andway, ointingpay ishay ancelay, iercedpay imhay inway ethay ighthay
ithway eatgray orcefay. Enwhay eirthay ommandercay asway oundedway, ourway enmay onay ongerlay
esitatedhay otay akemay esistanceray, andway, acingfay aboutway, eatbay ackbay ethay enemyway.
Enwhay isthay occurredway, everalsay ofway ethay enemyway, epulsedray ybay ethay eatgray
impetuosityway ofway ourway enmay, ereway oundedway, andway omesay ereway ampledtray otay eathday inway
ivingstray otay escapeway, andway omesay ereway ademay isonerspray. Eirthay eneralgay escapedway
isthay isfortunemay ybay ethay iftnesssway ofway ishay orsehay. Ourway ommandercay, eingbay
everelysay oundedway, osay uchmay osay atthay ehay appearedway otay unray ethay iskray ofway osinglay
ishay ifelay, asway arriedcay ackbay otay ethay ampcay. Utbay Omiuscay, avinghay eitherway
atifiedgray ishay esentmentray, orway, ecausebay ehay adhay ostlay ethay eatestgray artpay ofway
ishay ollowersfay, entsay ambassadorsway otay Antoniusway, andway assuredway imhay atthay ehay
ouldway ivegay ostageshay asway away ecuritysay atthay ehay ouldway ogay ereverwhay Antoniusway
ouldshay escribepray, andway ouldway omplycay ithway ishay ordersway, andway onlyway entreatedway
atthay isthay oncessioncay ouldshay ebay ademay otay ishay earsfay, atthay ehay ouldshay otnay ebay
obligedway otay ogay intoway ethay esencepray ofway anyway Omanray. Asway Antoniusway udgedjay atthay
ishay equestray originatedway inway away ustjay apprehensionway, ehay indulgedway imhay inway itway andway
acceptedway ishay ostageshay.

     

Aesarcay, Iway owknay, ashay ademay away eparatesay ommentarycay ofway eachway ear'syay
ansactionstray, ichwhay Iway avehay otnay oughtthay itway ecessarynay orfay emay otay oday,
ecausebay ethay ollowingfay earyay, inway ichwhay Uciuslay Auluspay andway Aiuscay Arcellusmay
ereway onsulscay, oducedpray onay emarkableray occurrencesway inway Aulgay. Utbay atthay onay
ersonpay aymay ebay eftlay inway ignoranceway ofway ethay aceplay erewhay Aesarcay andway ishay armyway
ereway atway atthay imetay, Iway avehay oughtthay operpray otay itewray away ewfay ordsway inway
additionway otay isthay ommentarycay.

     

Ixxlay.Aesarcay, ilstwhay inway interway uartersqay inway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Elgaebay,
ademay itway ishay onlyway usinessbay otay eepkay ethay atesstay inway amityway ithway imhay, andway otay
ivegay onenay eitherway opeshay ofway, orway etextpray orfay, away evoltray. Orfay othingnay asway
urtherfay omfray ishay ishesway anthay otay ebay underway ethay ecessitynay ofway engagingway inway
anotherway arway atway ishay epartureday; estlay, enwhay ehay asway awingdray ishay armyway outway ofway
ethay ountrycay, anyway arway ouldshay ebay eftlay unfinishedway, ichwhay ethay Aulsgay ouldway
eerfullychay undertakeway, enwhay erethay asway onay immediateway angerday. Ereforethay, ybay
eatingtray ethay atesstay ithway espectray, akingmay ichray esentspray otay ethay eadinglay
enmay, imposingway onay ewnay urdensbay, andway akingmay ethay ermstay ofway eirthay ubjectionsay
ighterlay, ehay easilyway eptkay Aulgay alreadyway exhaustedway ybay osay anymay unsuccessfulway
attlesbay inway obedienceway.

.Enwhay ethay interway uartersqay ereway okenbray upway, ehay imselfhay, ontrarycay otay ishay
usualway acticepray, oceededpray otay Italyway, ybay ethay ongestlay ossiblepay agesstay, inway
orderway otay isitvay ethay eefray ownstay andway oloniescay, atthay ehay ightmay ecommendray otay
emthay ethay etitionpay ofway Arcusmay Antoniusway, ishay easurertray, orfay ethay iesthoodpray.
Orfay ehay exertedway ishay interestway othbay eerfullychay inway avourfay ofway away anmay onglystray
attachedway otay imhay, omwhay ehay adhay entsay omehay eforebay imhay otay attendway ethay
electionway, andway ealouslyzay otay opposeway ethay actionfay andway owerpay ofway away ewfay enmay,
owhay, ybay ejectingray Arcusmay Antoniusway, ishedway otay undermineway Aesar'scay
influenceway enwhay oinggay outway ofway officeway. Oughthay Aesarcay eardhay onway ethay oadray,
eforebay ehay eachedray Italyway, atthay ehay asway eatedcray augurway, etyay ehay oughtthay
imselfhay inway onourhay oundbay otay isitvay ethay eefray owntay andway oloniescay, otay eturnray
emthay anksthay orfay enderingray uchsay ervicesay otay Antoniusway ybay eirthay esencepray inway
uchsay eatgray umbersnay atway ethay electionway, andway atway ethay amesay imetay otay ecommendray
otay emthay imselfhay, andway ishay onourhay inway ishay uitsay orfay ethay onsulatecay ethay
ensuingway earyay. Orfay ishay adversariesway arrogantlyway oastedbay atthay Uciuslay
Entuluslay andway Aiuscay Arcellusmay adhay eenbay appointedway onsulscay, owhay ouldway ipstray
Aesarcay ofway allway onourhay andway ignityday andway atthay ethay onsulatecay adhay eenbay
injuriouslyway akentay omfray Ergiussay Albagay, oughthay ehay adhay eenbay uchmay uperiorsay
inway otesvay andway interestway, ecausebay ehay asway unitedway otay Aesarcay, othbay ybay
iendshipfray, andway ybay ervingsay asway ieutenantlay underway imhay.

Ilay.Aesarcay, onway ishay arrivalway, asway eceivedray ybay ethay incipalpray ownstay andway
oloniescay ithway incredibleway espectray andway affectionway; orfay isthay asway ethay irstfay
imetay ehay amecay incesay ethay arway againstway unitedway Aulgay. Othingnay asway omittedway
ichwhay ouldcay ebay oughtthay ofway orfay ethay ornamentway ofway ethay atesgay, oadsray, andway
everyway aceplay oughthray ichwhay Aesarcay asway otay asspay. Allway ethay eoplepay ithway eirthay
ildrenchay entway outway otay eetmay imhay. Acrificessay ereway offeredway upway inway everyway
uarterqay. Ethay arketmay acesplay andway emplestay ereway aidlay outway ithway
entertainmentsway, asway ifway anticipatingway ethay oyjay ofway away ostmay endidsplay iumphtray.
Osay eatgray asway ethay agnificencemay ofway ethay icherray andway ealzay ofway ethay oorerpay anksray
ofway ethay eoplepay.

Iilay.Enwhay Aesarcay adhay onegay oughthray allway ethay atesstay ofway Isalpinecay Aulgay, ehay
eturnedray ithway ethay eatestgray astehay otay ethay armyway atway Emetocennanay; andway avinghay
orderedway allway ishay egionslay otay archmay omfray interway uartersqay otay ethay erritoriestay
ofway ethay Eviritray, ehay entway itherthay andway eviewedray emthay. Ehay ademay Itustay
Abienuslay overnorgay ofway Isalpinecay Aulgay, atthay ehay ightmay ebay ethay oremay inclinedway
otay upportsay imhay inway ishay uitsay orfay ethay onsulatecay. Ehay imselfhay ademay uchsay
ourneysjay, asway ehay oughtthay ouldway onducecay otay ethay ealthhay ofway ishay enmay ybay angechay
ofway airway; andway oughthay ehay asway equentlyfray oldtay atthay Abienuslay asway olicitedsay ybay
ishay enemiesway, andway asway assuredway atthay away emeschay asway inway agitationway ybay ethay
ontrivancecay ofway away ewfay, atthay ethay enatesay ouldshay interposeway eirthay authorityway
otay epriveday imhay ofway away artpay ofway ishay armyway; etyay ehay eithernay avegay editcray otay anyway
orystay oncerningcay Abienuslay, ornay ouldcay ebay evailedpray uponway otay oday anythingway inway
oppositionway otay ethay authorityway ofway ethay enatesay; orfay ehay oughtthay atthay ishay ausecay
ouldway ebay easilyway ainedgay ybay ethay eefray oicevay ofway ethay enatorssay. Orfay Aiuscay
Uriocay, oneway ofway ethay ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay, avinghay undertakenway otay efendday
Aesar'scay ausecay andway ignityday, adhay oftenway oposedpray otay ethay enatesay, atthay ifway
ethay eaddray ofway Aesar'scay armsway enderedray anyway apprehensiveway, asway Ompey'spay
authorityway andway armsway ereway onay esslay ormidablefay otay ethay orumfay, othbay ouldshay
esignray eirthay ommandcay, andway isbandday eirthay armiesway. Atthay enthay ethay itycay ouldway
ebay eefray, andway enjoyway itsway ueday ightsray. Andway ehay otnay onlyway oposedpray isthay, utbay
ofway imselfhay alledcay uponway ethay enatesay otay ivideday onway ethay uestionqay. Utbay ethay
onsulscay andway Ompey'spay iendsfray interposedway otay eventpray itway; andway egulatingray
attersmay asway eythay esiredday, eythay okebray upway ethay eetingmay.

Iiilay.Isthay estimonytay ofway ethay unanimousway oicevay ofway ethay enatesay asway eryvay
eatgray, andway onsistentcay ithway eirthay ormerfay onductcay; orfay ethay ecedingpray earyay,
enwhay Arcellusmay attackedway Aesar'scay ignityday, ehay oposedpray otay ethay enatesay,
ontrarycay otay ethay awlay ofway Ompeypay andway Assuscray, otay isposeday ofway Aesar'scay
ovincepray, eforebay ethay expirationway ofway ishay ommandcay, andway enwhay ethay otesvay ereway
alledcay orfay, andway Arcellusmay, owhay endeavouredway otay advanceway ishay ownway ignityday,
ybay aisingray envyway againstway Aesarcay, antedway away ivisionday, ethay ullfay enatesay entway
overway otay ethay oppositeway idesay. Ethay iritspay ofway Aesar'scay oesfay asway otnay okenbray ybay
isthay, utbay itway aughttay emthay, atthay eythay oughtway otay engthenstray eirthay interestway
ybay enlargingway eirthay onnectionscay, osay asway otay orcefay ethay enatesay otay omplycay ithway
ateverwhay eythay esolvedray onway.

Ivlay.Afterway isthay away ecreeday asway assedpay ybay ethay enatesay, atthay oneway egionlay
ouldshay ebay entsay ybay Ompeypay, andway anotherway ybay Aesarcay, otay ethay Arthianpay arway.
Utbay esethay otway egionslay ereway evidentlyway awndray omfray Aesarcay aloneway. Orfay ethay
irstfay egionlay ichwhay Ompeypay entsay otay Aesarcay, ehay avegay Aesarcay, asway ifway itway
elongedbay otay imselfhay, oughthay itway asway eviedlay inway Aesar'scay ovincepray. Aesarcay,
oweverhay, oughthay onay oneway ouldcay oubtday ethay esignday ofway ishay enemiesway, entsay ethay
egionlay ackbay otay Eiuscnay Ompeypay, andway inway ompliancecay ithway ethay ecreeday ofway ethay
enatesay, orderedway ethay ifteenthfay, elongingbay otay imselfhay, andway ichwhay asway
uarteredqay inway Isalpinecay Aulgay, otay ebay eliveredday upway. Inway itsway oomray ehay entsay ethay
irteenththay intoway Italyway, otay otectpray ethay arrisonsgay omfray ichwhay ehay adhay
afteddray ethay ifteenthfay. Ehay isposedday ishay armyway inway interway uartersqay, acedplay
Aiuscay Eboniustray, ithway ourfay egionslay amongway ethay Elgaebay, andway etachedday Aiuscay
Abiusfay, ithway ourfay oremay, otay ethay Aeduiway; orfay ehay oughtthay atthay Aulgay ouldway ebay
ostmay ecuresay ifway ethay Elgaebay, away eoplepay ofway ethay eatestgray alourvay, andway ethay
Aeduiway, owhay ossessedpay ethay ostmay owerfulpay influenceway, ereway eptkay inway aweway ybay
ishay armiesway.

Vlay.Ehay imselfhay etsay outway orfay Italyway; erewhay ehay asway informedway onway ishay arrivalway,
atthay ethay otway egionslay entsay omehay ybay imhay, andway ichwhay ybay ethay enate'ssay ecreeday,
ouldshay avehay eenbay entsay otay ethay Arthianpay arway, adhay eenbay eliveredday overway otay
Ompeypay, ybay Aiuscay Arcellusmay ethay onsulcay, andway ereway etainedray inway Italyway.
Althoughway omfray isthay ansactiontray itway asway evidentway otay everyway oneway atthay arway asway
esignedday againstway Aesarcay, etyay ehay esolvedray otay ubmitsay otay anyway ingthay, asway onglay
asway erethay ereway opeshay eftlay ofway ecidingday ethay isputeday inway anway equitableway annermay,
atherray anthay avehay ecourseray otay armsway.


                                   


Ethay Ivilcay Arway

Ookbay Iway

Iway.Enwhay Aesar'scay etterlay asway eliveredday otay ethay onsulscay, eythay ereway ithway
eatgray ifficultyday, andway away ardhay ugglestray ofway ethay ibunestray, evailedpray onway otay
uffersay itway otay ebay eadray inway ethay enatesay; utbay ethay ibunestray ouldcay otnay evailpray,
atthay anyway uestionqay ouldshay ebay utpay otay ethay enatesay onway ethay ubjectsay ofway ethay
etterlay. Ethay onsulscay utpay ethay uestionqay onway ethay egulationray ofway ethay atestay.
Uciuslay Entuluslay ethay onsulcay omisespray atthay ehay illway otnay ailfay ethay enatesay andway
epublicray, ifway eythay eclaredday eirthay entimentssay oldlybay andway esolutelyray, utbay
ifway eythay urnedtay eirthay egardray otay Aesarcay, andway ourtedcay ishay avourfay, asway eythay
idday onway ormerfay occasionsway, ehay ouldway adoptway away anplay orfay imselfhay, andway otnay
ubmitsay otay ethay authorityway ofway ethay enatesay atthay ehay ootay adhay away eansmay ofway
egainingray Aesar'scay avourfay andway iendshipfray. Ipioscay okespay otay ethay amesay
urportpay, atthay itway asway Ompey'spay intentionway otnay otay abandonway ethay epublicray, ifway
ethay enatesay ouldway upportsay imhay; utbay ifway eythay ouldshay esitatehay andway actway
ithoutway energyway, eythay ouldway inway ainvay imploreway ishay aidway, ifway eythay ouldshay
equireray itway ereafterhay.

Iiway.Isthay eechspay ofway Ipio'sscay, asway ethay enatesay asway onvenedcay inway ethay itycay,
andway Ompeypay asway earnay atway andhay, eemedsay otay avehay allenfay omfray ethay ipslay ofway
Ompeypay imselfhay. Omesay eliveredday eirthay entimentssay ithway oremay oderationmay, asway
Arcellusmay irstfay, owhay inway ethay eginningbay ofway ishay eechspay, aidsay, atthay ethay
uestionqay oughtway otnay otay ebay utpay otay ethay enatesay onway isthay attermay, illtay evieslay
ereway ademay oughoutthray allway Italyway, andway armiesway aisedray underway osewhay otectionpray
ethay enatesay ightmay eelyfray andway afelysay asspay uchsay esolutionsray asway eythay oughtthay
operpray asway Arcusmay Alidiuscay afterwardsway, owhay asway ofway opinionway, atthay Ompeypay
ouldshay etsay outway orfay ishay ovincepray, atthay erethay ightmay ebay onay ausecay orfay armsway
atthay Aesarcay asway aturallynay apprehensiveway asway otway egionslay ereway orcedfay omfray
imhay, atthay Ompeypay asway etainingray osethay oopstray, andway eepingkay emthay earnay ethay
itycay otay oday imhay injuryway asway Arcusmay Ufusray, owhay ollowedfay Alidiuscay almostway
ordway orfay ordway. Eythay ereway allway arshlyhay ebukedray ybay Entuluslay, owhay
eremptorilypay efusedray otay oposepray Alidius'scay otionmay. Arcellusmay, overawedway
ybay ishay eproofsray, etractedray ishay opinionway. Usthay ostmay ofway ethay enatesay,
intimidatedway ybay ethay expressionsway ofway ethay onsulcay, ybay ethay earsfay ofway away esentpray
armyway, andway ethay eatsthray ofway Ompey'spay iendsfray, unwillinglyway andway eluctantlyray
adoptedway Ipio'sscay opinionway, atthay Aesarcay ouldshay isbandday ishay armyway ybay away
ertaincay ayday, andway ouldshay ehay otnay oday osay, ehay ouldshay ebay onsideredcay asway actingway
againstway ethay atestay. Arcusmay Antoniusway, andway Uintusqay Assiuscay, ibunestray ofway ethay
eoplepay, interposedway. Ethay uestionqay asway immediatelyway utpay onway eirthay
interpositionway. Iolentvay opinionsway ereway expressedway oeverwhay okespay ithway ethay
eatestgray acrimonyway andway ueltycray, asway ostmay ighlyhay ommendedcay ybay Aesar'scay
enemiesway.

Iiiway.Ethay enatesay avinghay okenbray upway inway ethay eveningway, allway owhay elongedbay otay
atthay orderway ereway ummonedsay ybay Ompeypay. Ehay applaudedway ethay orwardfay, andway
ecuredsay eirthay otesvay orfay ethay extnay ayday; ethay oremay oderatemay ehay eprovedray andway
excitedway againstway Aesarcay. Anymay eteransvay, omfray allway artspay, owhay adhay ervedsay inway
Ompey'spay armiesway, ereway invitedway otay ishay andardstay ybay ethay opeshay ofway ewardsray
andway omotionspray. Everalsay officersway elongingbay otay ethay otway egionslay, ichwhay adhay
eenbay eliveredday upway ybay Aesarcay, ereway entsay orfay. Ethay itycay andway ethay Omitiumcay
ereway owdedcray ithway ibunestray, enturionscay, andway eteransvay. Allway ethay onsuls'cay
iendsfray, allway Ompey'spay onnectionscay, allway osethay owhay orebay anyway ancientway enmityway
otay Aesarcay, ereway orcedfay intoway ethay enatesay ousehay. Ybay eirthay oncoursecay andway
eclarationsday ethay imidtay ereway awedway, ethay irresoluteway onfirmedcay, andway ethay
eatergray artpay eprivedday ofway ethay owerpay ofway eakingspay eirthay entimentssay ithway
eedomfray. Uciuslay Isopay, ethay ensorcay, offeredway otay ogay otay Aesarcay asway idday
ikewiselay Uciuslay Osciusray, ethay aetorpray, otay informway imhay ofway esethay affairsway,
andway equireray onlyway ixsay ays'day imetay otay inishfay ethay usinessbay. Opinionsway ereway
expressedway ybay omesay otay ethay effectway atthay ommissionerscay ouldshay ebay entsay otay
Aesarcay otay acquaintway imhay ithway ethay enate'ssay easureplay.

Ivway.Allway esethay oposalspray ereway ejectedray, andway oppositionway ademay otay emthay allway,
inway ethay eechesspay ofway ethay onsulcay, Ipioscay, andway Atocay. Anway oldway udgegray againstway
Aesarcay andway agrinchay atway away efeatday actuatedway Atocay. Entuluslay asway oughtwray uponway
ybay ethay agnitudemay ofway ishay ebtsday, andway ethay opeshay ofway avinghay ethay overnmentgay ofway
anway armyway andway ovincespray, andway ybay ethay esentspray ichwhay ehay expectedway omfray uchsay
incespray asway ouldshay eceiveray ethay itletay ofway iendsfray ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway
oastedbay amongstway ishay iendsfray, atthay ehay ouldway ebay away econdsay Lasylay, otay omwhay
ethay upremesay authorityway ouldshay eturnray. Imilarsay opeshay ofway away ovincepray andway
armiesway, ichwhay ehay expectedway otay areshay ithway Ompeypay onway accountway ofway ishay
onnectioncay ithway imhay, urgedway onway Ipioscay; andway oreovermay, ehay asway influencedway
ybay ethay earfay ofway eingbay alledcay otay ialtray, andway ethay adulationway andway anway
ostentatiousway isplayday ofway imselfhay andway ishay iendsfray inway owerpay, owhay atway atthay
imetay adhay eatgray influenceway inway ethay epublicray, andway ourtscay ofway udicaturejay.
Ompeypay imselfhay, incitedway ybay Aesar'scay enemiesway, ecausebay ehay asway unwillingway
atthay anyway ersonpay ouldshay earbay anway equalway egreeday ofway ignityday, adhay ollywhay
alienatedway imselfhay omfray Aesar'scay iendshipfray, andway ocuredpray away
econciliationray ithway eirthay ommoncay enemiesway; ethay eatestgray artpay ofway omwhay ehay
adhay imselfhay oughtbray uponway Aesarcay uringday ishay affinityway ithway imhay. Atway ethay
amesay imetay, agrinedchay atway ethay isgraceday ichwhay ehay adhay incurredway ybay onvertingcay
ethay otway egionslay omfray eirthay expeditionway oughthray Asiaway andway Iasyray, otay
augmentway ishay ownway owerpay andway authorityway, ehay asway anxiousway otay ingbray attersmay
otay away arway.

.Orfay esethay easonsray everythingway asway oneday inway away astyhay andway isorderlyday
annermay, andway eithernay asway imetay ivengay otay Aesar'scay elationsray otay informway imhay
ofway ethay atestay ofway affairsway ornay ibertylay otay ethay ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay otay
eprecateday eirthay ownway angerday, ornay evenway otay etainray ethay astlay ivilegepray, ichwhay
Lasylay adhay eftlay emthay, ethay interposingway eirthay authorityway; utbay onway ethay eventhsay
ayday eythay ereway obligedway otay inkthay ofway eirthay ownway afetysay, ichwhay ethay ostmay
urbulenttay ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay ereway otnay accustomedway otay attendway otay, ornay
otay earfay eingbay alledcay otay anway accountway orfay eirthay actionsway, illtay ethay eighthway
onthmay. Ecourseray isway adhay otay atthay extremeway andway inalfay ecreeday ofway ethay enatesay
ichwhay asway evernay esortedray otay evenway ybay aringday oposerspray exceptway enwhay ethay
itycay asway inway angerday ofway eingbay etsay onway irefay, orway enwhay ethay ublicpay afetysay asway
espairedday ofway. Atthay ethay onsulscay, aetorspray, ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay, andway
oconsulspray inway ethay itycay ouldshay aketay arecay atthay ethay atestay eceivedray onay
injuryway. Esethay ecreesday areway atedday ethay eighthway ayday eforebay ethay idesway ofway
Anuaryjay; ereforethay, inway ethay irstfay ivefay aysday, onway ichwhay ethay enatesay ouldcay
eetmay, omfray ethay ayday onway ichwhay Entuluslay enteredway intoway ishay onsulatecay, ethay otway
aysday ofway electionway exceptedway, ethay everestsay andway ostmay irulentvay ecreesday ereway
assedpay againstway Aesar'scay overnmentgay, andway againstway osethay ostmay illustriousway
aracterschay, ethay ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay. Ethay atterlay immediatelyway ademay
eirthay escapeway omfray ethay itycay, andway ithdrewway otay Aesarcay, owhay asway enthay atway
Avennaray, awaitingway anway answerway otay ishay oderatemay emandsday; otay eesay ifway attersmay
ouldcay ebay oughtbray otay away eacefulpay erminationtay ybay anyway equitableway actway onway ethay
artpay ofway ethay enemiesway.

Ivay.Uringday ethay ucceedingsay aysday ethay enatesay isway onvenedcay outsideway ethay itycay.
Ompeypay epeatedray ethay amesay ingsthay ichwhay ehay adhay eclaredday oughthray Ipioscay. Ehay
applaudedway ethay ouragecay andway irmnessfay ofway ethay enatesay, acquaintedway emthay ithway
ishay orcefay, andway oldtay emthay atthay ehay adhay entay egionslay eadyray; atthay ehay asway
oreovermay informedway andway assuredway atthay Aesar'scay oldierssay ereway isaffectedday,
andway atthay ehay ouldcay otnay ersuadepay emthay otay efendday orway evenway ollowfay imhay.
Otionsmay ereway ademay inway ethay enatesay oncerningcay otherway attersmay; atthay evieslay
ouldshay ebay ademay oughthray allway Italyway; atthay Austusfay Lasylay ouldshay ebay entsay asway
opraetorpray intoway Auritaniamay; atthay oneymay ouldshay ebay antedgray otay Ompeypay omfray
ethay ublicpay easurytray. Itway asway alsoway utpay otay ethay otevay atthay ingkay Ubajay ouldshay
ebay onouredhay ithway ethay itletay ofway iendfray andway allyway. Utbay Arcellusmay aidsay atthay
ehay ouldway otnay allowway isthay otionmay orfay ethay esentpray. Ilipphay, oneway ofway ethay
ibunestray, oppedstay ethay appointmentway ofway Lasylay; ethay esolutionsray espectingray
ethay otherway attersmay assedpay. Ethay ovincespray, otway ofway ichwhay ereway onsularcay, ethay
emainderray aetorianpray, ereway ecreedday otay ivatepray ersonspay; Ipioscay otgay Iasyray,
Uciuslay Omitiusday Aulgay Ilipphay andway Arcellusmay ereway omittedway, omfray away ivatepray
otivemay, andway eirthay otslay ereway otnay evenway admittedway. Otay ethay otherway ovincespray
aetorspray ereway entsay, ornay asway imetay antedgray asway inway ormerfay earsyay, otay eferray otay
ethay eoplepay onway eirthay appointmentway, ornay otay akemay emthay aketay ethay usualway oathway,
andway archmay outway ofway ethay itycay inway away ublicpay annermay, obedray inway ethay ilitarymay
abithay, afterway offeringway eirthay owsvay; away ircumstancecay ichwhay adhay evernay eforebay
appenedhay. Othbay ethay onsulscay eavelay ethay itycay, andway ivatepray enmay adhay ictorslay
inway ethay itycay andway apitalcay, ontrarycay otay allway ecedentspray ofway ormerfay imestay.
Evieslay ereway ademay oughoutthray Italyway, armsway emandedday, andway oneymay exactedway omfray
ethay unicipalmay ownstay, andway iolentlyvay akentay omfray ethay emplestay. Allway
istinctionsday etweenbay ingsthay umanhay andway ivineday areway onfoundedcay.

Iivay.Esethay ingsthay eingbay ademay ownknay otay Aesarcay, ehay aranguedhay ishay
oldierssay; ehay emindedray emthay ofway ethay ongswray oneday otay imhay atway allway imestay ybay
ishay enemiesway, andway omplainedcay atthay Ompeypay adhay eenbay alienatedway omfray imhay andway
edlay astrayway ybay emthay oughthray envyway andway away aliciousmay oppositionway otay ishay oryglay,
oughthay ehay adhay alwaysway avouredfay andway omotedpray Ompey'spay onourhay andway ignityday.
Ehay omplainedcay atthay anway innovationway adhay eenbay introducedway intoway ethay epublicray,
atthay ethay intercessionway ofway ethay ibunestray, ichwhay adhay eenbay estoredray away ewfay
earsyay eforebay ybay Lasylay, asway andedbray asway away imecray, andway uppressedsay ybay orcefay
ofway armsway; atthay Lasylay, owhay adhay ippedstray ethay ibunestray ofway everyway otherway owerpay,
adhay, everthelessnay, eftlay ethay ivilegepray ofway intercessionway unrestrainedway; atthay
Ompeypay, owhay etendedpray otay estoreray atwhay eythay adhay ostlay, adhay akentay awayway ethay
ivilegespray ichwhay eythay ormerlyfay adhay; atthay eneverwhay ethay enatesay ecreedday,
atthay ethay agistratesmay ouldshay aketay arecay atthay ethay epublicray ustainedsay onay
injuryway ybay ichwhay ordsway andway ecreeday ethay Omanray eoplepay ereway obligedway otay
epairray otay armsway, itway asway onlyway enwhay erniciouspay awslay ereway oposedpray; enwhay
ethay ibunestray attemptedway iolentvay easuresmay; enwhay ethay eoplepay ecededsay, andway
ossessedpay emselvesthay ofway ethay emplestay andway eminencesway ofway ethay itycay; andway
esethay instancesway ofway ormerfay imestay, ehay owedshay emthay ereway expiatedway ybay ethay
atefay ofway Aturninussay andway ethay Acchigray atthay othingnay ofway isthay indkay asway
attemptedway ownay, ornay evenway oughtthay ofway atthay onay awlay asway omulgatedpray, onay
intrigueway ithway ethay eoplepay oinggay orwardfay, onay ecessionsay ademay; ehay exhortedway
emthay otay efendday omfray ethay alicemay ofway ishay enemiesway, ethay eputationray andway onourhay
ofway atthay eneralgay, underway osewhay ommandcay eythay adhay orfay inenay earsyay ostmay
uccessfullysay upportedsay ethay atestay; oughtfay anymay uccessfulsay attlesbay, andway
ubduedsay allway Aulgay andway Ermanygay. Ethay oldierssay ofway ethay irteenththay egionlay,
ichwhay asway esentpray orfay inway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay isturbancesday ehay adhay
alledcay itway outway, ishay otherway egionslay otnay avinghay etyay arrivedway, allway cryay outway
atthay eythay areway eadyray otay efendday eirthay eneralgay, andway ethay ibunestray ofway ethay
ommonscay, omfray allway injuriesway.

Iiivay.Avinghay ademay imselfhay acquaintedway ithway ethay ispositionday ofway ishay
oldierssay, Aesarcay etsay offway ithway atthay egionlay otay Ariminumway, andway erethay etmay ethay
ibunestray, owhay adhay edflay otay imhay orfay otectionpray; ehay alledcay ishay otherway
egionslay omfray interway uartersqay, andway orderedway emthay otay ollowfay imhay. Itherthay
amecay Uciuslay Aesarcay, away oungyay anmay, osewhay atherfay asway away ieutenantlay eneralgay
underway Aesarcay. Ehay, afterway oncludingcay ethay estray ofway ishay eechspay, andway atingstay
orfay atwhay urposepay ehay adhay omecay, oldtay Aesarcay atthay ehay adhay ommandscay ofway away
ivatepray aturenay orfay imhay omfray Ompeypay; atthay Ompeypay ishedway otay earclay imselfhay
otay Aesarcay, estlay ehay ouldshay imputeway osethay actionsway ichwhay ehay idday orfay ethay
epublicray, otay away esignday ofway affrontingway imhay; atthay ehay adhay everway eferredpray ethay
interestway ofway ethay atestay otay ishay ownway ivatepray onnectionscay; atthay Aesarcay, ootay,
orfay ishay ownway onourhay, oughtway otay acrificesay ishay esiresday andway esentmentray otay ethay
ublicpay oodgay, andway otnay entvay ishay angerway osay iolentlyvay againstway ishay enemiesway,
estlay inway ishay opeshay ofway injuringway emthay, ehay ouldshay injureway ethay epublicray. Ehay
okespay away ewfay ordsway otay ethay amesay urportpay omfray imselfhay, inway additionway otay
Ompey'spay apologyway. Osciusray, ethay aetorpray, onferredcay ithway Aesarcay almostway inway
ethay amesay ordsway, andway onway ethay amesay ubjectsay, andway eclaredday atthay Ompeypay adhay
empoweredway imhay otay oday osay.

Ixway.Oughthay esethay ingsthay eemedsay otay avehay onay endencytay owardstay edressingray
ishay injuriesway, etyay avinghay otgay operpray ersonspay ybay omwhay ehay ouldcay ommunicatecay
ishay ishesway otay Ompeypay; ehay equiredray ofway emthay othbay, atthay asway eythay adhay
onveyedcay Ompey'spay emandsday otay imhay, eythay ouldshay otnay efuseray otay onveycay ishay
emandsday otay Ompeypay; ifway ybay osay ittlelay oubletray eythay ouldcay erminatetay away eatgray
isputeday, andway iberatelay allway Italyway omfray erhay earsfay.

Atthay ethay onourhay ofway ethay epublicray adhay everway eenbay ishay irstfay objectway, andway
earerday otay imhay anthay ifelay; atthay ehay asway agrinedchay, atthay ethay avourfay ofway ethay
Omanray eoplepay asway estedwray omfray imhay ybay ethay injuriousway eportsray ofway ishay
enemiesway; atthay ehay asway eprivedday ofway away alfhayear'syay ommandcay, andway aggeddray ackbay
otay ethay itycay, oughthay ethay eoplepay adhay orderedway atthay egardray ouldshay ebay aidpay otay
ishay uitsay orfay ethay onsulatecay atway ethay extnay electionway, oughthay ehay asway otnay
esentpray; atthay, oweverhay, ehay adhay atientlypay ubmittedsay otay isthay osslay ofway
onourhay orfay ethay akesay ofway ethay epublicray; atthay enwhay ehay otewray etterslay otay ethay
enatesay, equiringray atthay allway ersonspay ouldshay esignray ethay ommandcay ofway eirthay
armiesway, ehay idday otnay obtainway evenway atthay equestray; atthay evieslay ereway ademay
oughoutthray Italyway; atthay ethay otway egionslay ichwhay adhay eenbay akentay omfray imhay,
underway ethay etencepray ofway ethay Arthianpay arway, ereway eptkay atway omehay, andway atthay ethay
atestay asway inway armsway. Otay atwhay idday allway esethay ingsthay endtay, unlessway otay ishay
uinray? Utbay, everthelessnay, ehay asway eadyray otay ondescendcay otay anyway ermstay, andway otay
endureway everythingway orfay ethay akesay ofway ethay epublicray. Etlay Ompeypay ogay otay ishay ownway
ovincepray; etlay emthay othbay isbandday eirthay armiesway; etlay allway ersonspay inway Italyway
aylay ownday eirthay armsway; etlay allway earsfay ebay emovedray omfray ethay itycay; etlay eefray
electionsway, andway ethay olewhay epublicray ebay esignedray otay ethay irectionday ofway ethay
enatesay andway Omanray eoplepay. Atthay esethay ingsthay ightmay ebay ethay oremay easilyway
erformedpay, andway onditionscay ecuredsay andway onfirmedcay ybay oathway, eitherway etlay
Ompeypay omecay otay Aesarcay, orway allowway Aesarcay otay ogay otay imhay; itway ightmay ebay atthay
allway eirthay isputesday ouldway ebay ettledsay ybay anway interviewway.

.Osciusray andway Uciuslay Aesarcay, avinghay eceivedray isthay essagemay, entway otay
Apuacay, erewhay eythay etmay ethay onsulscay andway Ompeypay, andway eclaredday otay emthay
Aesar'scay ermstay. Avinghay eliberatedday onway ethay attermay, eythay epliedray, andway entsay
ittenwray oposalspray otay imhay ybay ethay amesay ersonspay, ethay urportpay ofway ichwhay asway,
atthay Aesarcay ouldshay eturnray intoway Aulgay, eavelay Ariminumway, andway isbandday ishay
armyway ifway ehay ompliedcay ithway isthay, atthay Ompeypay ouldway ogay otay Ainspay. Inway ethay
eantimemay, untilway ecuritysay asway ivengay atthay Aesarcay ouldway erformpay ishay
omisespray, atthay ethay onsulscay andway Ompeypay ouldway otnay ivegay overway eirthay evieslay.

Ixay.Itway asway otnay anway equitableway oposalpray, otay equireray atthay Aesarcay ouldshay
uitqay Ariminumway andway eturnray otay ishay ovincepray; utbay atthay ehay Ompeypay ouldshay
imselfhay etainray ishay ovincepray andway ethay egionslay atthay elongedbay otay anotherway,
andway esireday atthay Aesar'scay armyway ouldshay ebay isbandedday, ilstwhay ehay imselfhay asway
akingmay ewnay evieslay andway atthay ehay ouldshay erelymay omisepray otay ogay otay ishay
ovincepray, ithoutway amingnay ethay ayday onway ichwhay ehay ouldway etsay outway; osay atthay ifway
ehay ouldshay otnay etsay outway illtay afterway Aesar'scay onsulatecay expiredway, etyay ehay
ouldway otnay appearway oundbay ybay anyway eligiousray uplesscray aboutway assertingway away
alsehoodfay. Utbay ishay otnay antinggray imetay orfay away onferencecay, ornay omisingpray otay
etsay outway otay eetmay imhay, ademay ethay expectationway ofway eacepay appearway eryvay opelesshay.
Aesarcay, ereforethay, entsay Arcusmay Antoniusway, ithway ivefay ohortscay omfray Ariminumway
otay Arretiumway; ehay imselfhay ayedstay atway Ariminumway ithway otway egionslay, ithway ethay
intentionway ofway aisingray evieslay erethay. Ehay ecuredsay Isauruspay, Anumfay, andway
Anconaway, ithway away ohortcay eachway.

Iixay.Inway ethay eantimemay, eingbay informedway atthay Ermusthay ethay aetorpray asway inway
ossessionpay ofway Iguviumway, ithway ivefay ohortscay, andway asway ortifyingfay ethay owntay,
utbay atthay ethay affectionsway ofway allway ethay inhabitantsway ereway eryvay ellway inclinedway
owardstay imselfhay; ehay etachedday Uriocay ithway eethray ohortscay, ichwhay ehay adhay atway
Ariminumway andway Isauruspay. Uponway oticenay ofway ishay approachway, Ermusthay, istrustingday
ethay affectionsway ofway ethay ownsmentay, ewdray ishay ohortscay outway ofway itway, andway ademay ishay
escapeway; ishay oldierssay esertedday imhay onway ethay oadray, andway eturnedray omehay. Uriocay
ecoveredray Iguviumway, ithway ethay eerfulchay oncurrencecay ofway allway ethay inhabitantsway.
Aesarcay, avinghay eceivedray anway accountway ofway isthay, andway elyingray onway ethay
affectionsway ofway ethay unicipalmay ownstay, afteddray allway ethay ohortscay ofway ethay
irteenththay egionlay omfray ethay arrisonsgay, andway etsay outway orfay Auximumway, away owntay
intoway ichwhay Attiusway adhay oughtbray ishay ohortscay, andway ofway ichwhay ehay adhay akentay
ossessionpay, andway omfray ichwhay ehay adhay entsay enatorssay oundray aboutway ethay ountrycay
ofway Icenumpay, otay aiseray ewnay evieslay.

Iiixay.Uponway ewsnay ofway Aesar'scay approachway, ethay enatesay ofway Auximumway entway inway away
odybay otay Attiusway Arusvay; andway oldtay imhay atthay itway asway otnay away ubjectsay orfay emthay otay
etermineday uponway etyay eithernay eythay, ornay ethay estray ofway ethay eemenfray ouldway
uffersay Aiuscay Aesarcay, away eneralgay, owhay adhay eritedmay osay ellway ofway ethay epublicray,
afterway erformingpay uchsay eatgray achievementsway, otay ebay excludedway omfray eirthay owntay
andway allsway; ereforewhay ehay oughtway otay aypay omesay egardray otay ethay opinionway ofway
osteritypay, andway ishay ownway angerday. Alarmedway atway isthay eclarationday, Attiusway Arusvay
ewdray outway ofway ethay owntay ethay arrisongay ichwhay ehay adhay introducedway, andway edflay. Away
ewfay ofway Aesar'scay ontfray ankray avinghay ursuedpay imhay, obligedway imhay otay althay, andway
enwhay ethay attlebay eganbay, Arusvay isway esertedday ybay ishay oopstray omesay ofway emthay
isperseday otay eirthay omeshay, ethay estray omecay overway otay Aesarcay; andway alongway ithway
emthay, Uciuslay Upiuspay, ethay iefchay enturioncay, isway akentay isonerpray andway oughtbray
otay Aesarcay. Ehay adhay eldhay ethay amesay ankray eforebay inway Eiuscnay Ompey'spay armyway. Utbay
Aesarcay applaudedway ethay oldierssay ofway Attiusway, etsay Upiuspay atway ibertylay, eturnedray
anksthay otay ethay eoplepay ofway Auximumway, andway omisedpray otay ebay atefulgray orfay eirthay
onductcay.

Ivxay.Intelligenceway ofway isthay eingbay oughtbray otay Omeray, osay eatgray away anicpay
eadspray onway away uddensay atthay enwhay Entuluslay, ethay onsulcay, amecay otay openway ethay
easurytray, otay eliverday oneymay otay Ompeypay ybay ethay enate'ssay ecreeday, immediatelyway
onway openingway ethay allowedhay oorday ehay edflay omfray ethay itycay. Orfay itway asway alselyfay
umouredray atthay Aesarcay asway approachingway, andway atthay ishay avalrycay ereway alreadyway
atway ethay atesgay. Arcellusmay, ishay olleaguecay, ollowedfay imhay, andway osay idday ostmay ofway
ethay agistratesmay. Eiuscnay Ompeypay adhay eftlay ethay itycay ethay ayday eforebay, andway asway
onway ishay archmay otay osethay egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay eceivedray omfray Aesarcay, andway adhay
isposedday inway interway uartersqay inway Apuliaway. Ethay evieslay ereway oppedstay ithinway
ethay itycay. Onay aceplay onway isthay idesay ofway Apuacay asway oughtthay ecuresay. Atway Apuacay
eythay irstfay eganbay otay aketay ouragecay andway otay allyray, andway eterminedday otay aiseray
evieslay inway ethay oloniescay, ichwhay adhay eenbay entsay itherthay ybay ethay Ulianjay awlay
andway Entuluslay oughtbray intoway ethay ublicpay arketmayaceplay ethay adiatorsglay ichwhay
Aesarcay aintainedmay erethay orfay ethay entertainmentway ofway ethay eoplepay, andway
onfirmedcay emthay inway eirthay ibertylay, andway avegay emthay orseshay andway orderedway emthay
otay attendway imhay; utbay afterwardsway, eingbay arnedway ybay ishay iendsfray atthay isthay
actionway asway ensuredcay ybay ethay udgmentjay ofway allway, ehay istributedday emthay amongway
ethay avesslay ofway ethay istrictsday ofway Ampaniacay, otay eepkay uardgay erethay.

Vxay.Aesarcay, avinghay ovedmay orwardfay omfray Auximumway, aversedtray ethay olewhay
ountrycay ofway Icenumpay. Allway ethay overnorsgay inway esethay ountriescay ostmay eerfullychay
eceivedray imhay, andway aidedway ishay armyway ithway everyway ecessarynay. Ambassadorsway amecay
otay imhay evenway omfray Ingulumcay, away owntay ichwhay Abienuslay adhay aidlay outway andway uiltbay
atway ishay ownway expenseway, andway offeredway ostmay earnestlyway otay omplycay ithway ishay
ordersway. Ehay emandedday oldierssay eythay entsay emthay. Inway ethay eantimemay, ethay
elfthtway egionlay amecay otay oinjay Aesarcay; ithway esethay otway ehay archedmay otay
Asculumway, ethay iefchay owntay ofway Icenumpay. Entuluslay Intherspay occupiedway atthay owntay
ithway entay ohortscay; utbay, onway eingbay informedway ofway Aesar'scay approachway, ehay edflay
omfray ethay owntay, andway, inway attemptingway otay ingbray offway ishay ohortscay ithway imhay, asway
esertedday ybay away eatgray artpay ofway ishay enmay. Eingbay eftlay onway ethay oadray ithway away allsmay
umbernay, ehay ellfay inway ithway Ibulliusvay Ufusray, owhay asway entsay ybay Ompeypay intoway
Icenumpay otay onfirmcay ethay eoplepay inway eirthay allegianceway. Ibulliusvay, eingbay
informedway ybay imhay ofway ethay ansactionstray inway Icenumpay, akestay ishay oldierssay omfray
imhay andway ismissesday imhay. Ehay ollectscay, ikewiselay, omfray ethay eighbouringnay
ountriescay, asway anymay ohortscay asway ehay ancay omfray Ompey'spay ewnay evieslay. Amongstway
emthay ehay eetsmay ithway Ulcillesway Irrushay eeingflay omfray Amerinumcay, ithway ixsay
ohortscay, ichwhay ehay adhay inway ethay arrisongay erethay; ybay away unctionjay ithway ichwhay ehay
ademay upway irteenthay ohortscay. Ithway emthay ehay archedmay ybay astyhay ourneysjay otay
Orfiniumcay, otay Omitiusday Aenobarbusway, andway informedway imhay atthay Aesarcay asway
advancingway ithway otway egionslay. Omitiusday adhay ollectedcay aboutway entytway ohortscay
omfray Albaway, andway ethay Arsiansmay, Elignianspay, andway eighbouringnay atesstay.

Ixvay.Aesarcay, avinghay ecoveredray Asculumway andway ivendray outway Entuluslay, orderedway
ethay oldierssay atthay adhay esertedday omfray imhay otay ebay oughtsay outway andway away ustermay otay
ebay ademay; andway, avinghay elayedday orfay oneway ayday erethay otay ovidepray orncay, ehay
archedmay otay Orfiniumcay. Onway ishay approachway, ivefay ohortscay, entsay ybay Omitiusday
omfray ethay owntay, ereway eakingbray ownday away idgebray ichwhay asway overway ethay iverray, atway
eethray iles'may istanceday omfray itway. Anway engagementway akingtay aceplay erethay ithway
Aesar'scay advancedwayuardgay, Omitius'sday enmay ereway uicklyqay eatenbay offway omfray ethay
idgebray andway etreatedray ecipitatelypray intoway ethay owntay. Aesarcay, avinghay archedmay
ishay egionslay overway, altedhay eforebay ethay owntay andway encampedway oseclay ybay ethay
allsway.

Iixvay.Omitiusday, uponway observingway isthay, entsay essengersmay ellway acquaintedway
ithway ethay ountrycay, encouragedway ybay away omisepray ofway eingbay amplyway ewardedray, ithway
espatchesday otay Ompeypay otay Apuliaway, otay egbay andway entreatway imhay otay omecay otay ishay
assistanceway. Atthay Aesarcay ouldcay ebay easilyway enclosedway ybay ethay otway armiesway,
oughthray ethay arrownessnay ofway ethay ountrycay, andway eventedpray omfray obtainingway
uppliessay unlessway ehay idday osay, atthay ehay andway upwardsway ofway irtythay ohortscay, andway away
eatgray umbernay ofway enatorssay andway Omanray ightsknay, ouldway ebay inway extremeway angerday.
Inway ethay eantimemay ehay encouragedway ishay oopstray, isposedday enginesway onway ethay allsway,
andway assignedway otay eachway anmay away articularpay artpay ofway ethay itycay otay efendday. Inway away
eechspay otay ethay oldierssay ehay omisedpray emthay andslay outway ofway ishay ownway estateway; otay
everyway ivatepray oldiersay ourfay acresway, andway away orrespondingcay areshay otay ethay
enturionscay andway eteransvay.

Iiixvay.Inway ethay eantimemay, ordway asway oughtbray otay Aesarcay atthay ethay eoplepay ofway
Ulmosay, away owntay aboutway evensay ilesmay istantday omfray Orfiniumcay, ereway eadyray otay
obeyway ishay ordersway, utbay ereway eventedpray ybay Uintusqay Ucretiuslay, away enatorsay, andway
Attiusway, away Elignianpay, owhay ereway inway ossessionpay ofway ethay owntay ithway away arrisongay
ofway evensay ohortscay. Ehay entsay Arcusmay Antoniusway itherthay, ithway ivefay ohortscay ofway
ethay eighthway egionlay. Ethay inhabitantsway, asway oonsay asway eythay awsay ourway andardsstay,
ewthray openway eirthay atesgay, andway allway ethay eoplepay, othbay itizenscay andway oldierssay,
entway outway otay eetmay andway elcomeway Antoniusway. Ucretiuslay andway Attiusway eapedlay offway
ethay allsway. Attiusway, eingbay oughtbray eforebay Antoniusway, eggedbay atthay ehay ightmay
ebay entsay otay Aesarcay. Antoniusway eturnedray ethay amesay ayday onway ichwhay ehay adhay etsay
outway ithway ethay ohortscay andway Attiusway. Aesarcay addedway esethay ohortscay otay ishay ownway
armyway, andway entsay Attiusway awayway inway afetysay. Ethay eethray irstfay aysday Aesarcay
employedway inway ortifyingfay ishay ampcay ithway ongstray orksway, inway ingingbray inway orncay
omfray ethay eighbouringnay eefray ownstay, andway aitingway orfay ethay estray ofway ishay
orcesfay. Ithinway ethay eethray aysday ethay eighthway egionlay amecay otay imhay, andway
entytwayotway ohortscay ofway ethay ewnay evieslay inway Aulgay, andway aboutway eethray undredhay
orsehay omfray ethay ingkay ofway Oricumnay. Onway eirthay arrivalway ehay ademay away econdsay ampcay
onway anotherway artpay ofway ethay owntay, andway avegay ethay ommandcay ofway itway otay Uriocay. Ehay
eterminedday otay urroundsay ethay owntay ithway away ampartray andway urretstay uringday ethay
emainderray ofway ethay imetay. Earlynay atway ethay imetay enwhay ethay eatestgray artpay ofway ethay
orkway asway ompletedcay, allway ethay essengersmay entsay otay Ompeypay eturnedray.

Ixxay.Avinghay eadray Ompey'spay etterlay, Omitiusday, oncealingcay ethay uthtray, avegay
outway inway ouncilcay atthay Ompeypay ouldway eedilyspay omecay otay eirthay assistanceway; andway
encouragedway emthay otnay otay espondday, utbay otay ovidepray everythingway ecessarynay orfay
ethay efenceday ofway ethay owntay. Ehay eldhay ivatepray onferencescay ithway away ewfay ofway ishay
ostmay intimateway iendsfray, andway eterminedday onway ethay esignday ofway eeingflay. Asway
Omitius'sday ountenancecay idday otnay agreeway ithway ishay ordsway, andway ehay idday
everythingway ithway oremay onfusioncay andway earfay anthay ehay adhay ownshay onway ethay
ecedingpray aysday, andway asway ehay adhay everalsay ivatepray eetingsmay ithway ishay iendsfray,
ontrarycay otay ishay usualway acticepray, inway orderway otay aketay eirthay adviceway, andway asway ehay
avoidedway allway ublicpay ouncilscay andway assembliesway ofway ethay eoplepay, ethay uthtray
ouldcay ebay onay ongerlay idhay ornay issembledday; orfay Ompeypay adhay ittenwray ackbay inway
answerway, Atthay ehay ouldway otnay utpay attersmay otay ethay astlay azardhay; atthay Omitiusday
adhay etreatedray intoway ethay owntay ofway Orfiniumcay, ithoutway eitherway ishay adviceway orway
onsentcay. Ereforethay, ifway anyway opportunityway ouldshay offerway, ehay Omitiusday
ouldshay omecay otay imhay ithway ethay olewhay orcefay. Utbay ethay ockadeblay andway orksway
oundray ethay owntay eventedpray ishay escapeway.

Xxay.Omitius'sday esignday eingbay oisednay abroadway, ethay oldierssay inway Onfiniumcay
errorway inway originalway ouldshay ebay Orfiniumcay earlyway inway ethay eveningway eganbay otay
utinymay, andway eldhay away onferencecay ithway eachway otherway ybay eirthay ibunestray andway
enturionscay, andway ethay ostmay espectableray amongstway emselvesthay atthay eythay ereway
esiegedbay ybay Aesarcay; atthay ishay orksway andway ortificationsfay ereway almostway
inishedfay; atthay eirthay eneralgay, Omitiusday, onway osewhay opeshay andway expectationsway
eythay adhay onfidedcay, adhay ownthray emthay offway, andway asway editatingmay ishay ownway
escapeway; atthay eythay oughtway otay ovidepray orfay eirthay ownway afetysay. Atway irstfay ethay
Arsiansmay ifferedday inway opinionway, andway ossessedpay emselvesthay ofway atthay artpay ofway
ethay owntay ichwhay eythay oughtthay ethay ongeststray. Andway osay iolentvay away isputeday
aroseway etweenbay emthay, atthay eythay attemptedway otay ightfay andway ecideday itway ybay armsway.
Oweverhay, inway away ittlelay imetay, ybay essengersmay entsay omfray oneway idesay otay ethay
otherway, eythay ereway informedway ofway Omitius'sday editatedmay ightflay, ofway ichwhay eythay
ereway eviouslypray ignorantway. Ereforethay eythay allway ithway oneway onsentcay oughtbray
Omitiusday intoway ublicpay iewvay, atheredgay oundray imhay, andway uardedgay imhay; andway entsay
eputiesday outway ofway eirthay umbernay otay Aesarcay, otay aysay atthay eythay ereway eadyray otay
owthray openway eirthay atesgay, otay oday ateverwhay ehay ouldshay orderway, andway otay eliverday
upway Omitiusday aliveway intoway ishay andshay.

Ixxay.Uponway intelligenceway ofway esethay attersmay, oughthay Aesarcay oughtthay itway ofway
eatgray onsequencecay otay ecomebay astermay ofway ethay owntay asway oonsay asway ossiblepay, andway
otay ansfertray ethay ohortscay otay ishay ownway ampcay, estlay anyway angechay ouldshay ebay
oughtwray onway eirthay inclinationsway ybay ibesbray, encouragementway, orway ictitiousfay
essagesmay, ecausebay inway arway eatgray eventsway areway oftenway oughtbray aboutway ybay
iflingtray ircumstancescay; etyay, eadingdray estlay ethay owntay ouldshay ebay underedplay
ybay ethay oldierssay enteringway intoway itway, andway akingtay advantageway ofway ethay arknessday
ofway ethay ightnay, ehay ommendedcay ethay ersonspay owhay amecay otay imhay, andway entsay emthay
ackbay otay ethay owntay, andway orderedway ethay atesgay andway allsway otay ebay ecuredsay. Ehay
isposedday ishay oldierssay onway ethay orksway, ichwhay ehay adhay egunbay, otnay atway ertaincay
intervalsway, asway asway ishay acticepray eforebay, utbay inway oneway ontinuedcay angeray ofway
entinelssay andway ationsstay, osay atthay eythay ouchedtay eachway otherway, andway ormedfay away
irclecay oundray ethay olewhay ortificationfay; ehay orderedway ethay ibunestray andway
eneralgay officersway otay ideray oundray; andway exhortedway emthay otnay onlyway otay ebay onway
eirthay uardgay againstway alliessay omfray ethay owntay, utbay alsoway otay atchway atthay onay
inglesay ersonpay ouldshay etgay outway ivatelypray. Ornay asway anyway anmay osay egligentnay orway
owsydray asway otay eepslay atthay ightnay. Otay osay eatgray eighthay asway eirthay expectationway
aisedray, atthay eythay ereway arriedcay awayway, earthay andway oulsay, eachway otay ifferentday
objectsway, atwhay ouldway ecomebay ofway ethay Orfinianscay, atwhay ofway Omitiusday, atwhay ofway
Entuluslay, atwhay ofway ethay estray; atwhay eventway ouldway ebay ethay onsequencecay ofway
anotherway.

Iixxay.Aboutway ethay ourthfay atchway, Entuluslay Intherspay aidsay otay ourway entinelssay
andway uardsgay omfray ethay allsway, atthay ehay esiredday otay avehay anway interviewway ithway
Aesarcay, ifway ermissionpay ereway ivengay imhay. Avinghay obtainedway itway, ehay asway
escortedway outway ofway owntay; ornay idday ethay oldierssay ofway Omitiusday eavelay imhay illtay
eythay oughtbray imhay intoway Aesar'scay esencepray. Ehay eadedplay ithway Aesarcay orfay ishay
ifelay, andway entreatedway imhay otay arespay imhay, andway emindedray imhay ofway eirthay ormerfay
iendshipfray; andway acknowledgedway atthay Aesar'scay avoursfay otay imhay ereway eryvay
eatgray; inway atthay oughthray ishay interestway ehay adhay eenbay admittedway intoway ethay
ollegecay ofway iestspray; inway atthay afterway ishay aetorshippray ehay adhay eenbay appointedway
otay ethay overnmentgay ofway Ainspay; inway atthay ehay adhay eenbay assistedway ybay imhay inway ishay
uitsay orfay ethay onsulatecay. Aesarcay interruptedway imhay inway ishay eechspay, andway oldtay
imhay, atthay ehay adhay otnay eftlay ishay ovincepray otay oday ischiefmay otay anyway anmay, utbay
otay otectpray imselfhay omfray ethay injuriesway ofway ishay enemiesway; otay estoreray otay eirthay
ignityday ethay ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay owhay adhay eenbay ivendray outway ofway ethay itycay
onway ishay accountway, andway otay assertway ishay ownway ibertylay, andway atthay ofway ethay Omanray
eoplepay, owhay ereway oppressedway ybay away ewfay actiousfay enmay. Encouragedway ybay isthay
addressway, Entuluslay eggedbay eavelay otay eturnray otay ethay owntay, atthay ethay ecuritysay
ichwhay ehay adhay obtainedway orfay imselfhay ightmay ebay anway encouragementway otay ethay estray
otay opehay orfay eirsthay; ayingsay atthay omesay ereway osay errifiedtay atthay eythay ereway
inducedway otay akemay esperateday attemptsway onway eirthay ownway iveslay. Eavelay eingbay
antedgray imhay, ehay epartedday.

Iiixxay.Enwhay ayday appearedway Aesarcay orderedway allway ethay enatorssay andway eirthay
ildrenchay, ethay ibunestray ofway ethay oldierssay, andway ethay Omanray ightsknay, otay ebay
oughtbray eforebay imhay. Amongway ethay ersonspay ofway enatorialsay ankray ereway Uciuslay
Omitiusday, Ubliuspay Entuluslay Intherspay, Uciuslay Ibulliusvay Ufusray, Extussay
Uintiliusqay Arusvay, ethay uaestorqay, andway Uciuslay Ubriusray, esidesbay ethay onsay ofway
Omitiusday, andway everalsay otherway oungyay enmay, andway away eatgray umbernay ofway Omanray
ightsknay andway urgessesbay, omwhay Omitiusday adhay ummonedsay omfray ethay unicipalmay
ownstay. Enwhay eythay ereway oughtbray eforebay imhay ehay otectedpray emthay omfray ethay
insolenceway andway auntstay ofway ethay oldierssay; oldtay emthay inway ewfay ordsway atthay eythay
adhay otnay ademay imhay away atefulgray eturnray, onway eirthay artpay, orfay ishay eryvay
extraordinaryway indnesskay otay emthay, andway ismissedday emthay allway inway afetysay. Ixtysay
estertiasay, ichwhay Omitiusday adhay oughtbray ithway imhay andway odgedlay inway ethay ublicpay
easurytray, eingbay oughtbray otay Aesarcay ybay ethay agistratesmay ofway Orfiniumcay, ehay
avegay emthay ackbay otay Omitiusday, atthay ehay ightmay otnay appearway oremay oderatemay ithway
espectray otay ethay ifelay ofway enmay anthay inway oneymay attersmay, oughthay ehay ewknay atthay itway
asway ublicpay oneymay, andway adhay eenbay ivengay ybay Ompeypay otay aypay ishay armyway. Ehay
orderedway Omitius'sday oldierssay otay aketay ethay oathway otay imselfhay, andway atthay ayday
ecampedday andway erformedpay ethay egularray archmay. Ehay ayedstay onlyway evensay aysday
eforebay Orfiniumcay, andway archedmay intoway Apuliaway oughthray ethay ountrycay ofway ethay
Arruciniansmay, Entaniansfray, andway Arinateslay.

Ivxxay.Ompeypay, eingbay informedway ofway atwhay adhay assedpay atway Orfiniumcay, archesmay
omfray Ucerialay otay Anusiumcay, andway encethay otay Undusiumbray. Ehay ordersway allway ethay
orcesfay aisedray everywhereway ybay ethay ewnay evieslay otay epairray otay imhay. Ehay ivesgay
armsway otay ethay avesslay atthay attendedway ethay ocksflay, andway appointsway orseshay orfay
emthay. Ofway esethay ehay ademay upway aboutway eethray undredhay orsehay. Uciuslay, ethay
aetorpray, edflay omfray Albaway, ithway ixsay ohortscay Utilusray Upuslay, ethay aetorpray,
omfray Arracinatay, ithway eethray. Esethay avinghay escriedday Aesar'scay avalrycay atway away
istanceday, ichwhay ereway ommandedcay ybay Iviusbay Uriuscay, andway avinghay esertedday ethay
aetorpray, arriedcay eirthay olourscay otay Uriuscay andway entway overway otay imhay. Inway ikelay
annermay uringday ethay estray ofway ishay archmay, everalsay ohortscay ellfay inway ithway ethay
ainmay odybay ofway Aesar'scay armyway, othersway ithway ishay orsehay. Eiuscnay Agiusmay, omfray
Emonacray, engineerwayeneralgay otay Ompeypay, asway akentay isonerpray onway ethay oadray andway
oughtbray otay Aesarcay, utbay entsay ackbay ybay imhay otay Ompeypay ithway isthay essagemay Asway
ithertohay ehay adhay otnay eenbay allowedway anway interviewway, andway asway ownay onway ishay archmay
otay imhay atway Undusiumbray, atthay itway eeplyday oncernedcay ethay ommonwealthcay andway
eneralgay afetysay atthay ehay ouldshay avehay anway interviewway ithway Ompeypay; andway atthay
ethay amesay advantageway ouldcay otnay ebay ainedgay atway away eatgray istanceday enwhay ethay
oposalspray ereway onveyedcay otay emthay ybay othersway, asway ifway ermstay ereway arguedway ybay
emthay othbay inway ersonpay.

Xxvay.Avinghay eliveredday isthay essagemay ehay archedmay otay Undusiumbray ithway ixsay
egionslay, ourfay ofway emthay eteransvay ethay estray osethay ichwhay ehay adhay aisedray inway
ethay atelay evylay andway ompletedcay onway ishay archmay, orfay ehay adhay entsay allway Omitius'sday
ohortscay immediatelyway omfray Orfiniumcay otay Icilysay. Ehay iscoveredday atthay ethay
onsulscay ereway onegay otay Rachiumdyray ithway away onsiderablecay artpay ofway ethay armyway,
andway atthay Ompeypay emainedray atway Undusiumbray ithway entytway ohortscay; utbay ouldcay
otnay indfay outway, orfay away ertaintycay, etherwhay Ompeypay ayedstay ehindbay otay eepkay
ossessionpay ofway Undusiumbray, atthay ehay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway ommandcay ethay
olewhay Adriaticway easay, ithway ethay extremitiesway ofway Italyway andway ethay oastcay ofway
Eecegray, andway ebay ableway otay onductcay ethay arway onway eitherway idesay ofway itway, orway etherwhay
ehay emainedray erethay orfay antway ofway ippingshay; andway, eingbay afraidway atthay Ompeypay
ouldway omecay otay ethay onclusioncay atthay ehay oughtway otnay otay elinquishray Italyway, ehay
eterminedday otay epriveday imhay ofway ethay eansmay ofway ommunicationcay affordedway ybay ethay
arbourhay ofway Undusiumbray. Ethay anplay ofway ishay orkway asway asway ollowsfayErewhay ethay
outhmay ofway ethay ortpay asway arrowestnay ehay ewthray upway away olemay ofway earthway onway eitherway
idesay, ecausebay inway esethay acesplay ethay easay asway allowshay. Avinghay onegay outway osay
arfay atthay ethay olemay ouldcay otnay ebay ontinuedcay inway ethay eepday aterway, ehay ixedfay
oubleday oatsflay, irtythay eetfay onway eitherway idesay, eforebay ethay olemay. Esethay ehay
astenedfay ithway ourfay anchorsway atway ethay ourfay ornerscay, atthay eythay ightmay otnay ebay
arriedcay awayway ybay ethay avesway. Avinghay ompletedcay andway ecuredsay emthay, ehay enthay
oinedjay otay emthay otherway oatsflay ofway equalway izesay. Esethay ehay overedcay overway ithway
earthway andway ouldmay, atthay ehay ightmay otnay ebay eventedpray omfray accessway otay emthay otay
efendday emthay, andway inway ethay ontfray andway onway othbay idessay ehay otectedpray emthay ithway away
arapetpay ofway ickerway orkway; andway onway everyway ourthfay oneway aisedray away urrettay, otway
oriesstay ighhay, otay ecuresay emthay ethay etterbay omfray eingbay attackedway ybay ethay
ippingshay andway etsay onway irefay.

Ixxvay.Otay ounteractcay isthay, Ompeypay ittedfay outway argelay erchantmay ipsshay, ichwhay
ehay oundfay inway ethay arbourhay ofway Undusiumbray onway emthay ehay erectedway urretstay eethray
oriesstay ighhay, andway, avinghay urnishedfay emthay ithway everalsay enginesway andway allway
ortssay ofway eaponsway, ovedray emthay amongstway Aesar'scay orksway, otay eakbray oughthray
ethay oatsflay andway interruptway ethay orksway; usthay erethay appenedhay irmishesskay everyway
ayday atway away istanceday ithway ingsslay, arrowsway, andway otherway eaponsway. Aesarcay
onductedcay attersmay asway ifway ehay oughtthay atthay ethay opeshay ofway eacepay ereway otnay etyay
otay ebay ivengay upway. Andway oughthay ehay asway eryvay uchmay urprisedsay atthay Agiusmay, omwhay
ehay adhay entsay otay Ompeypay ithway away essagemay, asway otnay entsay ackbay otay imhay; andway
oughthay ishay attemptingway away econciliationray oftenway etardedray ethay igorousvay
osecutionpray ofway ishay ansplay, etyay ehay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway ybay allway eansmay otay
erseverepay inway ethay amesay inelay ofway onductcay. Ehay ereforethay entsay Aniniuscay
Ebilusray otay avehay anway interviewway ithway Iboniusscray Ibolay, ishay intimateway iendfray
andway elationray. Ehay argeschay imhay otay exhortway Ibolay otay effectway away eacepay, utbay,
aboveway allway ingsthay, equiresray atthay ehay ouldshay ebay admittedway otay anway interviewway
ithway Ompeypay. Ehay eclaredday atthay ehay adhay eatgray opeshay, ifway atthay ereway allowedway
imhay, atthay ethay onsequencecay ouldway ebay atthay othbay artiespay ouldway aylay ownday
eirthay armsway onway equalway ermstay; atthay away eatgray areshay ofway ethay oryglay andway
eputationray ofway atthay eventway ouldway edoundray otay Ibolay, ifway, oughthray ishay adviceway
andway agencyway, ostilitieshay ouldshay ebay endedway. Ibolay, avinghay artedpay omfray ethay
onferencecay ithway Aniniuscay, entway otay Ompeypay, andway, ortlyshay afterway, eturnsray
ithway answerway atthay, asway ethay onsulscay ereway absentway, onay eatytray ofway ompositionscay
ouldcay ebay engagedway inway ithoutway emthay. Aesarcay ereforethay oughtthay itway imetay atway
engthlay otay ivegay overway ethay attemptway ichwhay ehay adhay oftenway ademay inway ainvay, andway actway
ithway energyway inway ethay arway.

Iixxvay.Enwhay Aesar'scay orksway ereway earlynay alfhay inishedfay, andway afterway inenay
aysday ereway entspay inway emthay, ethay ipsshay ichwhay adhay onveyedcay ethay irstfay ivisionday
ofway ethay armyway otay Rachiumdyray eingbay entsay ackbay ybay ethay onsulscay, eturnedray otay
Undusiumbray. Ompeypay, eitherway ightenedfray atway Aesar'scay orksway orway eterminedday
omfray ethay eginningbay otay uitqay Italyway, eganbay otay eparepray orfay ishay epartureday onway
ethay arrivalway ofway ethay ipsshay; andway ethay oremay effectuallyway otay etardray Aesar'scay
attackway, estlay ishay oldierssay ouldshay orcefay eirthay ayway intoway ethay owntay atway ethay
omentmay ofway ishay epartureday, ehay oppedstay upway ethay atesgay, uiltbay allsway acrossway ethay
eetsstray andway avenuesway, unksay enchestray acrossway ethay aysway, andway inway emthay ixedfay
alisadoespay andway arpshay akesstay, ichwhay ehay ademay evellay ithway ethay oundgray ybay
eansmay ofway urdleshay andway ayclay. Utbay ehay arricadedbay ithway argelay eamsbay astenedfay
inway ethay oundgray andway arpenedshay atway ethay endsway otway assagespay andway oadsray ithoutway
ethay allsway, ichwhay edlay otay ethay ortpay. Afterway akingmay esethay arrangementsway, ehay
orderedway ishay oldierssay otay ogay onway oardbay ithoutway oisenay, andway isposedday erehay andway
erethay, onway ethay allway andway urretstay, omesay ightlayarmedway eteransvay, archersway andway
ingersslay. Esethay ehay esignedday otay allcay offway ybay away ertaincay ignalsay, enwhay allway
ethay oldierssay ereway embarkedway, andway eftlay owrayalleysgay orfay emthay inway away ecuresay
aceplay.

Iiixxvay.Ethay eoplepay ofway Undusiumbray, irritatedway ybay ethay insolenceway ofway
Ompey'spay oldierssay, andway ethay insultsway eceivedray omfray Ompeypay imselfhay, ereway inway
avourfay ofway Aesar'scay artypay. Ereforethay, asway oonsay asway eythay ereway awareway ofway
Ompey'spay epartureday, ilstwhay ishay enmay ereway unningray upway andway ownday, andway usiedbay
aboutway eirthay oyagevay, eythay ademay ignssay omfray ethay opstay ofway ethay ouseshay Aesarcay,
eingbay apprizedway ofway ethay esignday ybay emthay, orderedway alingscay adderslay otay ebay otgay
eadyray, andway ishay enmay otay aketay armsway, atthay ehay ightmay otnay oselay anyway opportunityway
ofway omingcay otay anway actionway. Ompeypay eighedway anchorway atway ightfallnay. Ethay oldierssay
owhay adhay eenbay ostedpay onway ethay allway otay uardgay itway, ereway alledcay offway ybay ethay
ignalsay ichwhay adhay eenbay agreedway onway, andway owingknay ethay oadsray, anray ownday otay ethay
ipsshay. Aesar'scay oldierssay ixedfay eirthay adderslay andway aledscay ethay allsway utbay
eingbay autionedcay ybay ethay eoplepay otay ewarebay ofway ethay iddenhay akesstay andway overedcay
enchestray, eythay altedhay, andway eingbay onductedcay ybay ethay inhabitantsway ybay away onglay
ircuitcay, eythay eachedray ethay ortpay, andway apturedcay ithway eirthay onglay oatsbay andway
allsmay aftcray otway ofway Ompey'spay ipsshay, ullfay ofway oldierssay, ichwhay adhay uckstray
againstway Aesar'scay olesmay.

Ixxxay.Oughthay Aesarcay ighlyhay approvedway ofway ollectingcay away eetflay, andway ossingcray
ethay easay, andway ursuingpay Ompeypay eforebay ehay ouldcay engthenstray imselfhay ithway ishay
ansmarinetray auxiliariesway, ithway ethay opehay ofway ingingbray ethay arway otay away
onclusioncay, etyay ehay eadeddray ethay elayday andway engthlay ofway imetay ecessarynay otay
effectway itway ecausebay Ompeypay, ybay ollectingcay allway ishay ipsshay, adhay eprivedday imhay
ofway ethay eansmay ofway ursuingpay imhay atway esentpray. Ethay onlyway esourceray eftlay otay
Aesarcay, asway otay aitway orfay away eetflay omfray ethay istantday egionsray ofway Aulgay,
Icenumpay, andway ethay aitsstray ofway Ibraltargay. Utbay isthay, onway accountway ofway ethay
easonsay ofway ethay earyay, appearedway edioustay andway oublesometray. Ehay asway unwillingway
atthay, inway ethay eantimemay, ethay eteranvay armyway, andway ethay otway Ainsspay, oneway ofway
ichwhay asway oundbay otay Ompeypay ybay ethay ongeststray obligationsway, ouldshay ebay
onfirmedcay inway ishay interestway; atthay auxiliariesway andway avalrycay ouldshay ebay
ovidedpray andway Aulgay andway Italyway educedray inway ishay absenceway.

Xxxay.Ereforethay, orfay ethay esentpray, ehay elinquishedray allway intentionway ofway
