ursuingpay Ompeypay, andway esolvedray otay archmay otay Ainspay, andway ommandedcay ethay
agistratesmay ofway ethay eefray ownstay otay ocurepray imhay ipsshay, andway otay avehay emthay
onveyedcay otay Undusiumbray. Ehay etachedday Aleriusvay, ishay ieutenantlay, ithway oneway
egionlay otay Ardiniasay; Uriocay, ethay oprietorpray, otay Icilysay ithway eethray egionslay;
andway orderedway imhay, enwhay ehay adhay ecoveredray Icilysay, otay immediatelyway ansporttray
ishay armyway otay Africaway. Arcusmay Ottacay asway atway isthay imetay overnorgay ofway Ardiniasay
Arcusmay Atocay, ofway Icilysay andway Uberotay, ybay ethay otslay, ouldshay avehay adhay ethay
overnmentgay ofway Africaway. Ethay Aralitanicay, asway oonsay asway eythay eardhay atthay
Aleriusvay asway entsay againstway emthay, evenway eforebay ehay eftlay Italyway, ofway eirthay ownway
accordway ovedray Ottacay outway ofway ethay owntay; owhay, errifiedtay ecausebay ehay understoodway
atthay ethay olewhay ovincepray asway ombinedcay againstway imhay, edflay omfray Ardiniasay
otay Africaway. Atocay asway inway Icilysay, epairingray ethay oldway ipsshay ofway arway, andway
emandingday ewnay onesway omfray ethay atesstay, andway esethay ingsthay ehay erformedpay ithway
eatgray ealzay. Ehay asway aisingray evieslay ofway Omanray itizenscay, amongway ethay Ucanilay
andway Utiibray, ybay ishay ieutenantslay, andway exactingway away ertaincay uotaqay ofway orsehay
andway ootfay omfray ethay atesstay ofway Icilysay. Enwhay esethay ingsthay ereway earlynay
ompletedcay, eingbay informedway ofway Urio'scay approachway, ehay ademay away omplaintcay atthay
ehay asway abandonedway andway etrayedbay ybay Ompeypay, owhay adhay undertakenway anway
unnecessaryway arway, ithoutway akingmay anyway eparationpray, andway enwhay uestionedqay ybay
imhay andway otherway embersmay inway ethay enatesay, adhay assuredway emthay atthay everyway ingthay
asway eadyray andway ovidedpray orfay ethay arway. Afterway avinghay ademay esethay omplaintscay
inway away ublicpay assemblyway, ehay edflay omfray ishay ovincepray.

Ixxxay.Aleriusvay oundfay Ardiniasay, andway Uriocay, Icilysay, esertedday ybay eirthay
overnorsgay enwhay eythay arrivedway erethay ithway eirthay armiesway. Enwhay Uberotay arrivedway
inway Africaway, ehay oundfay Attiusway Arusvay inway ethay overnmentgay ofway ethay ovincepray, owhay,
avinghay ostlay ishay ohortscay, asway alreadyway elatedray, atway Auximumway, adhay aightwaystray
edflay otay Africaway, andway indingfay itway ithoutway away overnorgay, adhay eizedsay itway ofway ishay
ownway accordway, andway akingmay evieslay, adhay aisedray otway egionslay. Omfray ishay
acquaintanceway ithway ethay eoplepay andway ountrycay, andway ishay owledgeknay ofway atthay
ovincepray, ehay oundfay ethay eansmay ofway effectingway isthay; ecausebay away ewfay earsyay
eforebay, atway ethay expirationway ofway ishay aetorshippray, ehay adhay obtainedway atthay
ovincepray. Ehay, enwhay Uberotay amecay otay Uticaway ithway ishay eetflay, eventedpray ishay
enteringway ethay ortpay orway owntay, andway idday otnay uffersay ishay onsay, oughthay abouringlay
underway icknesssay, otay etsay ootfay onway oreshay; utbay obligedway imhay otay eighway anchorway
andway uitqay ethay aceplay.

Ilxxxay.Enwhay esethay affairsway ereway espatchedday, Aesarcay, atthay erethay ightmay ebay
anway intermissionway omfray abourlay orfay ethay estray ofway ethay easonsay, ewdray offway ishay
oldierssay otay ethay earestnay unicipalmay ownstay, andway etsay offway inway ersonpay orfay Omeray.
Avinghay assembledway ethay enatesay, ehay emindedray emthay ofway ethay injusticeway ofway ishay
enemiesway; andway oldtay emthay, Atthay ehay aimedway atway onay extraordinaryway onourhay, utbay
adhay aitedway orfay ethay imetay appointedway ybay awlay, orfay andingstay andidatecay orfay ethay
onsulatecay, eingbay ontentedcay ithway atwhay asway allowedway otay everyway itizencay. Atthay
away illbay adhay eenbay arriedcay ybay ethay entay ibunestray ofway ethay eoplepay
otwithstandingnay ethay esistanceray ofway ishay enemiesway, andway away eryvay iolentvay
oppositionway omfray Atocay, owhay inway ishay usualway annermay, onsumedcay ethay ayday ybay away
edioustay aranguehay atthay ehay ouldshay ebay allowedway otay andstay andidatecay, oughthay
absentway, evenway inway ethay onsulshipcay ofway Ompeypay; andway ifway ethay atterlay isapprovedday
ofway ethay illbay, whyay idday ehay allowway itway otay asspay? ifway ehay approvedway ofway itway, whyay
ouldshay ehay ebarday imhay Aesarcay omfray ethay eople'spay avourfay? Ehay ademay entionmay
ofway ishay ownway atiencepay, inway atthay ehay adhay eelyfray oposedpray atthay allway armiesway
ouldshay ebay isbandedday, ybay ichwhay ehay imselfhay ouldway uffersay ethay osslay othbay ofway
ignityday andway onourhay. Ehay urgedway ethay irulencevay ofway ishay enemiesway, owhay efusedray
otay omplycay ithway atwhay eythay equiredray omfray othersway, andway adhay atherray atthay allway
ingsthay ouldshay ebay ownthray intoway onfusioncay, anthay atthay eythay ouldshay oselay eirthay
owerpay andway eirthay armiesway. Ehay expatiatedway onway eirthay injusticeway, inway akingtay awayway
ishay egionslay eirthay ueltycray andway insolenceway inway abridgingway ethay ivilegespray ofway
ethay ibunestray; ethay oposalspray ehay adhay ademay, andway ishay entreatiesway ofway anway
interviewway, ichwhay adhay eenbay efusedray imhay Orfay ichwhay easonsray, ehay eggedbay andway
esiredday atthay eythay ouldway undertakeway ethay anagementmay ofway ethay epublicray, andway
uniteway ithway imhay inway ethay administrationway ofway itway. Utbay ifway oughthray earfay eythay
eclinedday itway, ehay ouldway otnay ebay away urdenbay otay emthay, utbay aketay ethay anagementmay
ofway itway onway imselfhay. Atthay eputiesday oughtway otay ebay entsay otay Ompeypay, otay oposepray away
econciliationray; asway ehay idday otnay egardray atwhay Ompeypay adhay atelylay assertedway inway
ethay enatesay, atthay authorityway asway acknowledgedway otay ebay estedvay inway osethay
ersonspay otay omwhay ambassadorsway ereway entsay, andway earfay impliedway inway osethay atthay
entsay emthay. Atthay esethay ereway ethay entimentssay ofway owlay, eakway indsmay atthay orfay
ishay artpay, asway ehay adhay ademay itway ishay udystay otay urpasssay othersway inway oryglay, osay ehay
asway esirousday ofway excellingway emthay inway usticejay andway equityway.

Iiixxxay.Ethay enatesay approvedway ofway endingsay eputiesday, utbay onenay ouldcay ebay
oundfay itfay otay executeway ethay ommissioncay orfay everyway ersonpay, omfray ishay ownway
ivatepray earsfay, eclinedday ethay officeway. Orfay Ompeypay, onway eavinglay ethay itycay, adhay
eclaredday inway ethay openway enatesay, atthay ehay ouldway oldhay inway ethay amesay egreeday ofway
estimationway, osethay owhay ayedstay inway Omeray andway osethay inway Aesar'scay ampcay. Usthay
eethray aysday ereway astedway inway isputesday andway excusesway. Esidesbay, Uciuslay
Etellusmay, oneway ofway ethay ibunestray, asway ubornedsay ybay Aesar'scay enemiesway, otay
eventpray isthay, andway otay embarrassway everythingway elseway ichwhay Aesarcay ouldshay
oposepray. Aesarcay avinghay iscoveredday ishay intentionway, afterway endingspay everalsay
aysday otay onay urposepay, eftlay ethay itycay, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay oselay anyway
oremay imetay, andway entway otay Ansalpinetray Aulgay, ithoutway effectingway atwhay ehay adhay
intendedway.

Ivxxxay.Onway ishay arrivalway erethay, ehay asway informedway atthay, Ibulliusvay Ufusray,
omwhay ehay adhay akentay away ewfay aysday eforebay atway Orfiniumcay, andway etsay atway ibertylay,
asway entsay ybay Ompeypay intoway Ainspay; andway atthay Omitiusday alsoway asway onegay otay eizesay
Assiliamay ithway evensay owrayalleysgay, ichwhay ereway ittedfay upway ybay omesay ivatepray
ersonspay atway Igiliumway andway Osacay, andway ichwhay ehay adhay annedmay ithway ishay ownway
avesslay, eedmenfray, andway olonistscay andway atthay omesay oungyay oblemennay ofway
Assiliamay adhay eenbay entsay eforebay imhay; omwhay Ompeypay, enwhay eavinglay Omeray adhay
exhortedway, atthay ethay atelay ervicessay ofway Aesarcay ouldshay otnay eraseway omfray eirthay
indsmay ethay emorymay ofway ishay ormerfay avoursfay. Onway eceivingray isthay essagemay, ethay
Assiliansmay adhay utshay eirthay atesgay againstway Aesarcay, andway invitedway overway otay emthay
ethay Albiciway, owhay adhay ormerlyfay eenbay inway allianceway ithway emthay, andway owhay
inhabitedway ethay ountainsmay atthay overhungway Assiliamay eythay adhay ikewiselay
onveyedcay ethay orncay omfray ethay urroundingsay ountrycay, andway omfray allway ethay ortsfay
intoway ethay itycay; adhay openedway armouriesway inway ethay itycay andway ereway epairingray ethay
allsway, ethay eetflay, andway ethay atesgay.

Vxxxay.Aesarcay entsay orfay ifteenfay ofway ethay incipalpray ersonspay ofway Assiliamay otay
attendway imhay. Otay eventpray ethay arway ommencingcay amongway emthay, ehay emonstratesray
inway ethay ollowingfay anguagelay; atthay eythay oughtway otay ollowfay ethay ecedentpray
etsay ybay allway Italyway, atherray anthay ubmitsay otay ethay illway ofway anyway oneway anmay. Ehay
ademay useway ofway uchsay argumentsway asway ehay oughtthay ouldway endtay otay ingbray emthay otay
easonray. Ethay eputiesday eportedray ishay eechspay otay eirthay ountrymencay, andway ybay ethay
authorityway ofway ethay atestay ingbray imhay ackbay isthay answerway Atthay eythay understoodway
atthay ethay Omanray eoplepay asway ividedday intoway otway actionsfay atthay eythay adhay
eithernay udgmentjay ornay abilitiesway otay ecideday ichwhay adhay ethay usterjay ausecay; utbay
atthay ethay eadshay ofway esethay actionsfay ereway Eiuscnay Ompeypay andway Aiuscay Aesarcay,
ethay otway atronspay ofway ethay atestay ethay ormerfay ofway omwhay adhay antedgray otay eirthay
atestay ethay andslay ofway ethay Olcaevay Arecomiciway, andway Elviihay; ethay atterlay adhay
assignedway emthay away artpay ofway ishay onquestscay inway Aulgay, andway adhay augmentedway eirthay
evenueray. Ereforewhay, avinghay eceivedray equalway avoursfay omfray othbay, eythay oughtway
otay owshay equalway affectionway otay othbay, andway assistway eithernay againstway ethay otherway,
ornay admitway eitherway intoway eirthay itycay orway arbourshay.

Vixxxay.Ilstwhay isthay eatytray asway oinggay orwardfay, Omitiusday arrivedway atway
Assiliamay ithway ishay eetflay, andway asway eceivedray intoway ethay itycay, andway ademay
overnorgay ofway itway. Ethay iefchay anagementmay ofway ethay arway asway entrustedway otay imhay. Atway
ishay ommandcay eythay endsay ethay eetflay otay allway artspay; eythay eizesay allway ethay
erchantmenmay eythay ouldcay eetmay ithway, andway arrycay emthay intoway ethay arbourhay; eythay
applyway ethay ailsnay, imbertay, andway iggingray, ithway ichwhay eythay ereway urnishedfay otay
igray andway efitray eirthay otherway esselsvay. Eythay aylay upway inway ethay ublicpay oresstay, allway
ethay orncay atthay asway oundfay inway ethay ipsshay, andway eserveray ethay estray ofway eirthay
adinglay andway onvoycay orfay ethay iegesay ofway ethay owntay, ouldshay uchsay anway eventway aketay
aceplay. Ovokedpray atway uchsay illway eatmenttray, Aesarcay edlay eethray egionslay againstway
Assiliamay, andway esolvedray otay ovidepray urretstay, andway inaevay otay assaultway ethay
owntay, andway otay uildbay elvetway ipsshay atway Arelasway, ichwhay eingbay ompletedcay andway
iggedray inway irtythay aysday omfray ethay imetay ethay imbertay asway utcay ownday, andway eingbay
oughtbray otay Assiliamay, ehay utpay underway ethay ommandcay ofway Ecimusday Utusbray; andway
eftlay Aiuscay Eboniustray ishay ieutenantlay, otay investway ethay itycay.

Viixxxay.Ilstwhay ehay asway eparingpray andway ettinggay esethay ingsthay inway eadinessray,
ehay entsay Aiuscay Abiusfay oneway ofway ishay ieutenantslay intoway Ainspay ithway eethray
egionslay, ichwhay ehay adhay isposedday inway interway uartersqay inway Arbonay, andway ethay
eighbouringnay ountrycay; andway orderedway imhay immediatelyway otay eizesay ethay assespay ofway
ethay Eneespyray, ichwhay ereway atway atthay imetay occupiedway ybay etachmentsday omfray
Uciuslay Afraniusway, oneway ofway Ompey'spay ieutenantslay. Ehay esiredday ethay otherway
egionslay, ichwhay ereway assingpay ethay interway atway away eatgray istanceday, otay ollowfay
oseclay afterway imhay. Abiusfay, accordingway otay ishay ordersway, ybay usingway expeditionway,
islodgedday ethay artypay omfray ethay illshay, andway ybay astyhay archesmay amecay upway ithway
ethay armyway ofway Afraniusway.

Viiixxxay.Onway ethay arrivalway ofway Ibulliusvay Ufusray, omwhay, eway avehay alreadyway
entionedmay, Ompeypay adhay entsay intoway Ainspay, Afraniusway, Etreiuspay, andway Arrovay,
ishay ieutenantslay oneway ofway omwhay adhay ethay ommandcay ofway Itherhay Ainspay, ithway eethray
egionslay; ethay econdsay ofway ethay ountrycay omfray ethay orestfay ofway Astulocay otay ethay
iverray Uadianagay ithway otway egionslay; ethay irdthay omfray ethay iverray Uadianagay otay
ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Ettonesvay andway Usitanialay, ithway ethay ikelay umbernay ofway
egionslay, ividedday amongstway emselvesthay eirthay espectiveray epartmentsday.
Etreiuspay asway otay archmay omfray Usitanialay oughthray ethay Ettonesvay, andway oinjay
Afraniusway ithway allway ishay orcesfay; Arrovay asway otay uardgay allway Urtherfay Ainspay ithway
atwhay egionslay ehay adhay. Esethay attersmay eingbay ettledsay, einforcementsray ofway
orsehay andway ootfay ereway emandedday omfray Usitanialay, ybay Etreiuspay; omfray ethay
Eltibericay, Antabricay, andway allway ethay arbarousbay ationsnay ichwhay orderbay onway ethay
oceanway, ybay Afraniusway. Enwhay eythay ereway aisedray, Etreiuspay immediatelyway archedmay
oughthray ethay Ettonesvay otay Afraniusway. Eythay esolvedray ybay ointjay onsentcay otay
arrycay onway ethay arway inway ethay icinityvay ofway Ilerdaway, onway accountway ofway ethay advantagesway
ofway itsway ituationsay.

Ixxxxay.Afraniusway, asway aboveway entionedmay, adhay eethray egionslay, Etreiuspay otway.
Erethay ereway esidesbay aboutway eightyway ohortscay aisedray inway Itherhay andway Urtherfay
Ainspay ofway ichwhay, ethay oopstray elongingbay otay ethay ormerfay ovincepray adhay
ieldsshay, osethay ofway ethay atterlay argetstay, andway aboutway ivefay ousandthay orsehay
aisedray inway othbay ovincespray. Aesarcay adhay entsay ishay egionslay intoway Ainspay, ithway
aboutway ixsay ousandthay auxiliaryway ootfay, andway eethray ousandthay orsehay, ichwhay adhay
ervedsay underway imhay inway allway ishay ormerfay arsway, andway ethay amesay umbernay omfray Aulgay,
ichwhay ehay imselfhay adhay ovidedpray, avinghay expresslyway alledcay outway allway ethay ostmay
oblenay andway aliantvay enmay ofway eachway atestay. Ethay avestbray ofway esethay ereway omfray ethay
Aquitaniway andway ethay ountaineersmay, owhay orderbay onway ethay Ovincepray inway Aulgay. Ehay
adhay eenbay informedway atthay Ompeypay asway archingmay oughthray Auritaniamay ithway ishay
egionslay otay Ainspay, andway ouldway ortlyshay arriveway. Ehay atway ethay amesay imetay orrowedbay
oneymay omfray ethay ibunestray andway enturionscay, ichwhay ehay istributedday amongstway ishay
oldierssay. Ybay isthay oceedingpray ehay ainedgay otway ointspay; ehay ecuredsay ethay
interestway ofway ethay enturionscay ybay isthay edgeplay inway ishay andshay, andway ybay ishay
iberalitylay ehay urchasedpay ethay affectionsway ofway ishay armyway.

Lxay.Abiusfay oundedsay ethay inclinationsway ofway ethay eighbouringnay atesstay ybay
etterslay andway essengersmay. Ehay adhay ademay otway idgesbray overway ethay iverray Egresay, atway
ethay istanceday ofway ourfay ilesmay omfray eachway otherway. Ehay entsay oragingfay artiespay
overway esethay idgesbray, ecausebay ehay adhay alreadyway onsumedcay allway ethay oragefay atthay
asway onway ishay idesay ofway ethay iverray. Ethay eneralsgay ofway Ompey'spay armyway idday almostway
ethay amesay ingthay, andway orfay ethay amesay easonray andway ethay orsehay adhay equentfray
irmishesskay ithway eachway otherway. Enwhay otway ofway Abius'sfay egionslay adhay, asway asway
eirthay onstantcay acticepray, onegay orthfay asway ethay usualway otectionpray otay ethay
oragersfay, andway adhay ossedcray ethay iverray, andway ethay aggagebay, andway allway ethay orsehay
ereway ollowingfay emthay, onway away uddensay, omfray ethay eightway ofway ethay attlecay, andway ethay
assmay ofway aterway, ethay idgebray ellfay, andway allway ethay orsehay ereway utcay offway omfray ethay
ainmay armyway, ichwhay eingbay ownknay otay Etreiuspay andway Afraniusway, omfray ethay imbertay
andway urdleshay atthay ereway arriedcay ownday ethay iverray, Afraniusway immediatelyway
ossedcray ishay ownway idgebray, ichwhay ommunicatedcay etweenbay ishay ampcay andway ethay
owntay, ithway ourfay egionslay andway allway ethay avalrycay, andway archedmay againstway
Abius'sfay otway egionslay. Enwhay ishay approachway asway announcedway, Uciuslay Ancusplay,
owhay adhay ethay ommandcay ofway osethay egionslay, ompelledcay ybay ethay emergencyway, ooktay
ostpay onway away isingray oundgray; andway ewdray upway ishay armyway ithway otway ontsfray, atthay itway
ightmay otnay ebay urroundedsay ybay ethay avalrycay. Usthay, oughthay engagedway ithway
uperiorsay umbersnay, ehay ustainedsay ethay uriousfay argechay ofway ethay egionslay andway ethay
orsehay. Enwhay ethay attlebay asway egunbay ybay ethay orsehay, erethay ereway observedway atway away
istanceday ybay othbay idessay ethay olourscay ofway otway egionslay, ichwhay Aiuscay Abiusfay
adhay entsay oundray ybay ethay urtherfay idgebray otay einforceray ourway enmay, uspectingsay,
asway ethay eventway erifiedvay, atthay ethay enemy'sway eneralsgay ouldway aketay advantageway ofway
ethay opportunityway ichwhay ortunefay adhay utpay inway eirthay ayway, otay attackway ourway enmay.
Eirthay approachway utpay anway endway otay ethay attlebay, andway eachway eneralgay edlay ackbay ishay
egionslay otay eirthay espectiveray ampscay.

Ixlay.Inway otway aysday afterway Aesarcay amecay otay ethay ampcay ithway inenay undredhay orsehay,
ichwhay ehay adhay etainedray orfay away odyguardbay. Ethay idgebray ichwhay adhay eenbay okenbray
ownday ybay ethay ormstay asway almostway epairedray, andway ehay orderedway itway otay ebay inishedfay
inway ethay ightnay. Eingbay acquaintedway ithway ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountrycay, ehay eftlay
ehindbay imhay ixsay ohortscay otay uardgay ethay idgebray, ethay ampcay, andway allway ishay
aggagebay, andway ethay extnay ayday etsay offway inway ersonpay orfay Ilerdaway, ithway allway ishay
orcesfay awndray upway inway eethray ineslay, andway altedhay ustjay eforebay ethay ampcay ofway
Afraniusway, andway avinghay emainedray erethay away ortshay imetay underway armsway, ehay offeredway
imhay attlebay onway equalway ermstay. Enwhay isthay offerway asway ademay, Afraniusway ewdray outway
ishay orcesfay, andway ostedpay emthay onway ethay iddlemay ofway away illhay, earnay ishay ampcay. Enwhay
Aesarcay erceivedpay atthay Afraniusway eclinedday omingcay otay anway engagementway, ehay
esolvedray otay encampway atway omewhatsay esslay anthay alfhay away ile'smay istanceday omfray ethay
eryvay ootfay ofway ethay ountainmay; andway atthay ishay oldierssay ilstwhay engagedway inway eirthay
orksway, ightmay otnay ebay errifiedtay ybay anyway uddensay attackway ofway ethay enemyway, orway
isturbedday inway eirthay orkway, ehay orderedway emthay otnay otay ortifyfay itway ithway away allway,
ichwhay ustmay iseray ighhay, andway ebay eensay atway away istanceday, utbay awdray, onway ethay ontfray
oppositeway ethay enemyway, away enchtray ifteenfay eetfay oadbray. Ethay irstfay andway econdsay
ineslay ontinuedcay underway armsway asway asway omfray ethay irstfay appointedway. Ehindbay emthay
ethay irdthay inelay asway arryingcay onway ethay orkway ithoutway eingbay eensay; osay atthay ethay
olewhay asway ompletedcay eforebay Afraniusway iscoveredday atthay ethay ampcay asway eingbay
ortifiedfay.

Iixlay.Inway ethay eveningway Aesarcay ewdray ishay egionslay ithinway isthay enchtray, andway
estedray emthay underway armsway ethay extnay ightnay. Ethay ayday ollowingfay ehay eptkay ishay
olewhay armyway ithinway itway, andway asway itway asway ecessarynay otay ingbray aterialsmay omfray away
onsiderablecay istanceday, ehay orfay ethay esentpray ursuedpay ethay amesay anplay inway ishay
orkway; andway otay eachway egionlay, oneway afterway ethay otherway, ehay assignedway oneway idesay ofway
ethay ampcay otay ortifyfay, andway orderedway enchestray ofway ethay amesay agnitudemay otay ebay
utcay ehay eptkay ethay estray ofway ethay egionslay underway armsway ithoutway aggagebay otay
opposeway ethay enemyway. Afraniusway andway Etreiuspay, otay ightenfray usway andway obstructway ethay
orkway, ewdray outway eirthay orcesfay atway ethay eryvay ootfay ofway ethay ountainmay, andway
allengedchay usway otay attlebay. Aesarcay, oweverhay, idday otnay interruptway ishay orkway,
elyingray onway ethay otectionpray ofway ethay eethray egionslay, andway ethay engthstray ofway ethay
ossefay. Afterway ayingstay orfay away ortshay imetay, andway advancingway onay eatgray istanceday
omfray ethay ottombay ofway ethay illhay, eythay edlay ackbay eirthay orcesfay otay eirthay ampcay.
Ethay irdthay ayday Aesarcay ortifiedfay ishay ampcay ithway away ampartray, andway orderedway ethay
otherway ohortscay ichwhay ehay adhay eftlay inway ethay upperway ampcay, andway ishay aggagebay otay ebay
emovedray otay itway.

IilxlayEtweenbay ethay owntay ofway Ilerdaway andway ethay extnay illhay, onway ichwhay Afraniusway
andway Etreiuspay ereway encampedway, erethay asway away ainplay aboutway eethray undredhay acespay
oadbray, andway earnay ethay iddlemay ofway itway anway eminenceway omewhatsay aisedray aboveway ethay
evellay Aesarcay opedhay atthay ifway ehay ouldcay etgay ossessionpay ofway isthay andway ortifyfay
itway, ehay ouldshay ebay ableway otay utcay offway ethay enemyway omfray ethay owntay, ethay idgebray,
andway allway ethay oresstay ichwhay eythay adhay aidlay upway inway ethay owntay. Inway expectationway ofway
isthay ehay edlay eethray egionslay outway ofway ethay ampcay, andway, awingdray upway ishay armyway inway
anway advantageousway ositionpay, ehay orderedway ethay advancedway enmay ofway oneway egionlay otay
astenhay orwardfay andway eizesay ethay eminenceway. Uponway intelligenceway ofway isthay ethay
ohortscay ichwhay ereway onway uardgay eforebay Afranius'sway ampcay ereway instantlyway entsay away
earernay ayway otay occupyway ethay amesay ostpay. Ethay otway artiespay engageway, andway asway
Afranius'sway enmay adhay eachedray ethay eminenceway irstfay, ourway enmay ereway epulsedray,
andway, onway away einforcementray eingbay entsay, eythay ereway obligedway otay urntay eirthay
acksbay andway etreatray otay ethay andardsstay ofway egionslay.

Ivxlay.Ethay annermay ofway ightingfay ofway osethay oldierssay asway otay unray orwardfay ithway
eatgray impetuosityway andway oldlybay aketay away ostpay, andway otnay otay eepkay eirthay anksray
ictlystray, utbay otay ightfay inway allsmay atteredscay artiespay ifway ardhay essedpray eythay
oughtthay itway onay isgraceday otay etireray andway ivegay upway ethay ostpay, eingbay accustomedway
otay isthay annermay ofway ightingfay amongway ethay Usitanianslay andway otherway arbarousbay
ationsnay; orfay itway ommonlycay appenshay atthay oldierssay areway onglystray influencedway
ybay ethay ustomscay ofway osethay ountriescay inway ichwhay eythay avehay entspay uchmay imetay.
Isthay ethodmay, oweverhay, alarmedway ourway enmay, owhay ereway otnay usedway otay uchsay away
escriptionday ofway arfareway. Orfay eythay imaginedway atthay eythay ereway aboutway otay ebay
urroundedsay onway eirthay exposedway ankflay ybay ethay inglesay enmay owhay anray orwardfay omfray
eirthay anksray; andway eythay oughtthay itway eirthay utyday otay eepkay eirthay anksray, andway otnay
otay uitqay eirthay olourscay, ornay, ithoutway oodgay easonray, otay ivegay upway ethay ostpay
ichwhay eythay adhay akentay. Accordinglyway, enwhay ethay advancedway uardgay avegay ayway, ethay
egionlay ichwhay asway ationedstay onway atthay ingway idday otnay eepkay itsway oundgray, utbay
etreatedray otay ethay extnay illhay.

Xlvay.Almostway ethay olewhay armyway eingbay auntedday atway isthay, ecausebay itway adhay
occurredway ontrarycay otay eirthay expectationsway andway ustomcay, Aesarcay encouragedway
ishay enmay andway edlay ethay inthnay egionlay otay eirthay eliefray, andway eckedchay ethay
insolentway andway eagerway ursuitpay ofway ethay enemyway, andway obligedway emthay, inway eirthay
urntay, otay owshay eirthay acksbay andway etreatray otay Ilerdaway, andway aketay ostpay underway ethay
allsway. Utbay ethay oldierssay ofway ethay inthnay egionlay, eingbay overway ealouszay otay
epairray ethay ishonourday ichwhay adhay eenbay ustainedsay, avinghay ashlyray ursuedpay ethay
eeingflay enemyway, advancedway intoway isadvantageousday oundgray andway entway upway otay ethay
ootfay ofway ethay ountainmay onway ichwhay ethay owntay Ilerdaway asway uiltbay. Andway enwhay eythay
ishedway otay etireray eythay ereway againway attackedway ybay ethay enemyway omfray ethay isingray
oundgray. Ethay aceplay asway aggycray inway ethay ontfray andway eepstay onway eitherway idesay, andway
asway osay arrownay atthay evenway eethray ohortscay, awndray upway inway orderway ofway attlebay,
ouldway illfay itway; utbay onay eliefray ouldcay ebay entsay onway ethay anksflay, andway ethay orsehay
ouldcay ebay ofway onay ervicesay otay emthay enwhay ardhay essedpray. Omfray ethay owntay, indeedway,
ethay ecipicepray inclinedway ithway away entlegay opeslay orfay earnay ourfay undredhay acespay.
Ourway enmay adhay otay etreatray isthay ayway, asway eythay adhay, oughthray eirthay eagernessway,
advancedway ootay inconsideratelyway. Ethay eatestgray ontestcay asway inway isthay aceplay,
ichwhay asway uchmay otay ethay isadvantageday ofway ourway oopstray, othbay onway accountway ofway itsway
arrownessnay, andway ecausebay eythay ereway ostedpay atway ethay ootfay ofway ethay ountainmay, osay
atthay onay eaponway asway ownthray atway emthay ithoutway effectway etyay eythay exertedway eirthay
alourvay andway atiencepay, andway orebay everyway oundway. Ethay enemy'sway orcesfay ereway
increasingway, andway ohortscay ereway equentlyfray entsay otay eirthay aidway omfray ethay ampcay
oughthray ethay owntay, atthay eshfray enmay ightmay elieveray ethay earyway. Aesarcay asway
obligedway otay oday ethay amesay, andway elieveray ethay atiguedfay ybay endingsay ohortscay otay
atthay ostpay.

Ixlvay.Afterway ethay attlebay adhay inway isthay annermay ontinuedcay incessantlyway orfay
ivefay ourshay, andway ourway enmay adhay ufferedsay uchmay omfray uperiorsay umbersnay, avinghay
entspay allway eirthay avelinsjay, eythay ewdray eirthay ordssway andway argedchay ethay enemyway
upway ethay illhay, andway, avinghay illedkay away ewfay, obligedway ethay estray otay flyay. Ethay
ohortscay eingbay eatenbay ackbay otay ethay allway, andway omesay eingbay ivendray ybay eirthay
earsfay intoway ethay owntay, anway easyway etreatray asway affordedway otay ourway enmay. Ourway
avalrycay alsoway, onway eitherway ankflay, oughthay ationedstay onway opingslay orway owlay
oundgray, etyay avelybray uggledstray upway otay ethay optay ofway ethay illhay, andway, idingray
etweenbay ethay otway armiesway, ademay ourway etreatray oremay easyway andway ecuresay. Uchsay ereway
ethay ariousvay urnstay ofway ortunefay inway ethay attlebay. Inway ethay irstfay encounterway aboutway
eventysay ofway ourway enmay ellfay amongstway emthay Uintusqay Ulgeniusfay, irstfay enturioncay
ofway ethay econdsay inelay ofway ethay ourteenthfay egionlay, owhay, orfay ishay extraordinaryway
alourvay, adhay eenbay omotedpray omfray ethay owerlay anksray otay atthay ostpay. Aboutway ixsay
undredhay ereway oundedway. Ofway Afranius'sway artypay erethay ereway illedkay Itustay
Aeciliuscay, incipalpray enturioncay, andway ourfay otherway enturionscay, andway aboveway otway
undredhay enmay.

Iixlvay.Utbay isthay opinionway isway eadspray abroadway oncerningcay isthay ayday, atthay eachway
artypay oughtthay atthay eythay amecay offway onquerorscay. Afranius'sway oldierssay,
ecausebay, oughthay eythay ereway esteemedway inferiorway inway ethay opinionway ofway allway, etyay
eythay adhay oodstay ourway attackway andway ustainedsay ourway argechay, andway, atway irstfay, adhay
eptkay ethay ostpay andway ethay illhay ichwhay adhay eenbay ethay occasionway ofway ethay isputeday;
andway, inway ethay irstfay encounterway, adhay obligedway ourway enmay otay flyay utbay oursway,
ecausebay, otwithstandingnay ethay isadvantageday ofway ethay oundgray andway ethay
isparityday ofway umbersnay, eythay adhay aintainedmay ethay attlebay orfay ivefay ourshay, adhay
advancedway upway ethay illhay ordsway inway andhay, andway adhay orcedfay ethay enemyway otay flyay omfray
ethay igherhay oundgray andway ivendray emthay intoway ethay owntay. Ethay enemyway ortifiedfay ethay
illhay, aboutway ichwhay ethay ontestcay adhay eenbay, ithway ongstray orksway, andway ostedpay away
arrisongay onway itway.

Iiixlvay.Inway otway aysday afterway isthay ansactiontray, erethay appenedhay anway
unexpectedway isfortunemay. Orfay osay eatgray away ormstay aroseway, atthay itway asway agreedway
atthay erethay ereway evernay eensay igherhay oodsflay inway osethay ountriescay; itway eptsway
ownday ethay owsnay omfray allway ethay ountainsmay, andway okebray overway ethay anksbay ofway ethay
iverray, andway inway oneway ayday arriedcay awayway othbay ethay idgesbray ichwhay Abiusfay adhay
uiltbay,away ircumstancecay ichwhay ausedcay eatgray ifficultiesday otay Aesar'scay armyway.
Orfay asway ourway ampcay, asway alreadyway entionedmay, asway itchedpay etweenbay otway iversray,
ethay Egresay andway Incacay, andway asway eithernay ofway esethay ouldcay ebay ordedfay orfay ethay
acespay ofway irtythay ilesmay, eythay ereway allway ofway ecessitynay onfinedcay ithinway esethay
arrownay imitslay. Eithernay ouldcay ethay atesstay, ichwhay adhay espousedway Aesar'scay
ausecay, urnishfay imhay ithway orncay, ornay ethay oopstray, ichwhay adhay onegay arfay otay
oragefay, eturnray, asway eythay ereway oppedstay ybay ethay atersway ornay ouldcay ethay
onvoyscay, omingcay omfray Italyway andway Aulgay, akemay eirthay ayway otay ethay ampcay.
Esidesbay, itway asway ethay ostmay istressingday easonsay ofway ethay earyay, enwhay erethay asway
onay orncay inway ethay adeblay, andway itway asway earlynay iperay andway ethay atesstay ereway
exhaustedway, ecausebay Afraniusway adhay onveyedcay almostway allway ethay orncay, eforebay
Aesar'scay arrivalway, intoway Ilerdaway, andway ateverwhay ehay adhay eftlay, adhay eenbay
alreadyway onsumedcay ybay Aesarcay. Ethay attlecay, ichwhay ightmay avehay ervedsay asway away
econdarysay esourceray againstway antway, adhay eenbay emovedray ybay ethay atesstay otay away
eatgray istanceday onway accountway ofway ethay arway. Eythay owhay adhay onegay outway otay etgay
oragefay orway orncay, ereway asedchay ybay ethay ightlay oopstray ofway ethay Usitanianslay, andway
ethay argeteerstay ofway Itherhay Ainspay, owhay ereway ellway acquaintedway ithway ethay
ountrycay, andway ouldcay eadilyray imsway acrossway ethay iverray, ecausebay itway isway ethay
ustomcay ofway allway osethay eoplepay otnay otay oinjay eirthay armiesway ithoutway addersblay.

Ixxlay.Utbay Afranius'sway armyway adhay abundanceway ofway everythingway; away eatgray ockstay ofway
orncay adhay eenbay ovidedpray andway aidlay inway onglay eforebay, away argelay uantityqay asway
omingcay inway omfray ethay olewhay ovincepray eythay adhay away oodgay orestay ofway oragefay. Ethay
idgebray ofway Ilerdaway affordedway anway opportunityway ofway ettinggay allway esethay ithoutway
anyway angerday, andway ethay acesplay eyondbay ethay idgebray, otay ichwhay Aesarcay adhay onay
accessway, ereway asway etyay untouchedway.

.Osethay oodsflay ontinuedcay everalsay aysday. Aesarcay endeavouredway otay epairray
ethay idgesbray, utbay ethay eighthay ofway ethay aterway idday otnay allowway imhay andway ethay
ohortscay isposedday alongway ethay anksbay idday otnay uffersay emthay otay ebay ompletedcay;
andway itway asway easyway orfay emthay otay eventpray itway, othbay omfray ethay aturenay ofway ethay
iverray andway ethay eighthay ofway ethay aterway, utbay especiallyway ecausebay eirthay artsday
ereway ownthray omfray ethay olewhay oursecay ofway ethay ankbay onway oneway onfinedcay otspay; andway
itway asway onay easyway attermay atway oneway andway ethay amesay imetay otay executeway away orkway inway away
eryvay apidray oodflay, andway otay avoidway ethay artsday.

Ilay.Intelligenceway asway oughtbray otay Afraniusway atthay ethay eatgray onvoyscay, ichwhay
ereway onway eirthay archmay otay Aesarcay, adhay altedhay atway ethay iverray. Archersway omfray ethay
Utheniray, andway orsehay omfray ethay Aulsgay, ithway away onglay aintray ofway aggagebay,
accordingway otay ethay Allicgay ustomcay ofway avellingtray, adhay arrivedway erethay; erethay
ereway esidesbay aboutway ixsay ousandthay eoplepay ofway allway escriptionsday, ithway avesslay
andway eedfray enmay. Utbay erethay asway onay orderway, orway egularray isciplineday, asway everyway
oneway ollowedfay ishay ownway umourhay, andway allway avelledtray ithoutway apprehensionway,
akingtay ethay amesay ibertylay asway onway ormerfay archesmay. Erethay ereway everalsay oungyay
oblemennay, onssay ofway enatorssay, andway ofway equestrianway ankray; erethay ereway
ambassadorsway omfray everalsay atesstay; erethay ereway ieutenantslay ofway Aesar'scay. Ethay
iverray oppedstay emthay allway. Otay attackway emthay ybay urprisesay, Afraniusway etsay outway inway
ethay eginningbay ofway ethay ightnay, ithway allway ishay avalrycay andway eethray egionslay, andway
entsay ethay orsehay onway eforebay, otay allfay onway emthay unawaresway; utbay ethay Allicgay orsehay
oonsay otgay emselvesthay inway eadinessray, andway attackedway emthay. Oughthay utbay ewfay,
eythay ithstoodway ethay astvay umbernay ofway ethay enemyway, asway onglay asway eythay oughtfay onway
equalway ermstay utbay enwhay ethay egionslay eganbay otay approachway, avinghay ostlay away ewfay
enmay, eythay etreatedray otay ethay extnay ountainsmay. Ethay elayday occasionedway ybay isthay
attlebay asway ofway eatgray importanceway otay ethay ecuritysay ofway ourway enmay; orfay avinghay
ainedgay imetay, eythay etiredray otay ethay igherhay oundsgray. Erethay ereway issingmay atthay
ayday aboutway otway undredhay owbayenmay, away ewfay orsehay, andway anway inconsiderableway umbernay
ofway ervantssay andway aggagebay.

Iilay.Oweverhay, ybay allway esethay ingsthay, ethay icepray ofway ovisionspray asway aisedray,
ichwhay isway ommonlycay away isasterday attendantway, otnay onlyway onway away imetay ofway esentpray
arcityscay, utbay onway ethay apprehensionway ofway uturefay antway. Ovisionspray adhay ownay
eachedray iftyfay enariiday eachway ushelbay; andway ethay antway ofway orncay adhay iminishedday
ethay engthstray ofway ethay oldierssay; andway ethay inconveniencesway ereway increasingway
everyway ayday andway osay eatgray anway alterationway asway oughtwray inway away ewfay aysday, andway
ortunefay adhay osay angedchay idessay, atthay ourway enmay adhay otay ugglestray ithway ethay antway
ofway everyway ecessarynay; ilewhay ethay enemyway adhay anway abundantway upplysay ofway allway
ingsthay, andway ereway onsideredcay otay avehay ethay advantageway. Aesarcay emandedday omfray
osethay atesstay ichwhay adhay accededway otay ishay allianceway, away upplysay ofway attlecay, asway
eythay adhay utbay ittlelay orncay. Ehay entsay awayway ethay ampcay ollowersfay otay ethay oremay
istantday atesstay, andway endeavouredway otay emedyray ethay esentpray arcityscay ybay everyway
esourceray inway ishay owerpay.

Iiilay.Afraniusway andway Etreiuspay, andway eirthay iendsfray, entsay ullerfay andway oremay
ircumstantialcay accountsway ofway esethay ingsthay otay Omeray, otay eirthay acquaintancesway.
Eportray exaggeratedway emthay osay atthay ethay arway appearedway otay ebay almostway atway anway endway.
Enwhay esethay etterslay andway espatchesday ereway eceivedray atway Omeray, away eatgray
oncoursecay ofway eoplepay esortedray otay ethay ousehay ofway Afraniusway, andway
ongratulationscay anray ighhay everalsay entway outway ofway Italyway otay Eiuscnay Ompeypay;
omesay ofway emthay, otay ebay ethay irstfay otay ingbray imhay ethay intelligenceway; othersway,
atthay eythay ightmay otnay ebay oughtthay otay avehay aitedway ethay issueway ofway ethay arway, andway
otay avehay omecay astlay ofway allway.

Ivlay.Enwhay Aesar'scay affairsway ereway inway isthay unfavourableway ositionpay, andway allway
ethay assespay ereway uardedgay ybay ethay oldierssay andway orsehay ofway Afraniusway, andway ethay
idgesbray ouldcay otnay ebay eparedpray, Aesarcay orderedway ishay oldierssay otay akemay ipsshay
ofway ethay indkay atthay ishay owledgeknay ofway Itainbray away ewfay earsyay eforebay adhay aughttay
imhay. Irstfay, ethay eelskay andway ibsray ereway ademay ofway ightlay imbertay, enthay, ethay estray
ofway ethay ulkhay ofway ethay ipsshay asway oughtwray ithway ickerwayorkway, andway overedcay overway
ithway ideshay. Enwhay esethay ereway inishedfay, ehay ewdray emthay ownday otay ethay iverray inway
aggonsway inway oneway ightnay, away istanceday ofway entytwayotway ilesmay omfray ishay ampcay, andway
ansportedtray inway emthay omesay oldierssay acrossway ethay iverray, andway onway away uddensay ooktay
ossessionpay ofway away illhay adjoiningway ethay ankbay. Isthay ehay immediatelyway ortifiedfay,
eforebay ehay asway erceivedpay ybay ethay enemyway. Otay isthay ehay afterwardsway ansportedtray
away egionlay andway avinghay egunbay away idgebray onway othbay idessay, ehay inishedfay itway inway otway
aysday. Ybay isthay eansmay, ehay oughtbray afesay otay ishay ampcay ethay onvoyscay, andway osethay
owhay adhay onegay outway otay oragefay; andway eganbay otay eparepray away onveyancecay orfay ethay
ovisionspray.

Vlay.Ethay amesay ayday ehay ademay away eatgray artpay ofway ishay orsehay asspay ethay iverray, owhay,
allingfay onway ethay oragersfay ybay urprisesay asway eythay ereway ispersedday ithoutway anyway
uspicionssay, interceptedway anway incredibleway umbernay ofway attlecay andway eoplepay; andway
enwhay omesay Anishspay ightlayarmedway ohortscay ereway entsay otay einforceray ethay enemyway,
ourway enmay udiciouslyjay ividedday emselvesthay intoway otway artspay, ethay oneway otay
otectpray ethay oilspay, ethay otherway otay esistray ethay advancingway oefay, andway otay eatbay
emthay ackbay, andway eythay utcay offway omfray ethay estray andway urroundedsay oneway ohortcay,
ichwhay adhay ashlyray enturedvay outway ofway ethay inelay eforebay ethay othersway, andway afterway
uttingpay itway otay ethay ordsway, eturnedray afesay ithway onsiderablecay ootybay otay ethay
ampcay overway ethay amesay idgebray.

Ilvay.Ilstwhay esethay affairsway areway oinggay orwardfay atway Ilerdaway, ethay Assiliansmay,
adoptingway ethay adviceway ofway Omitiusday, eparedpray eventeensay ipsshay ofway arway, ofway
ichwhay elevenway ereway eckedday. Otay esethay eythay addway everalsay allersmay esselsvay,
atthay ourway eetflay ightmay ebay errifiedtay ybay umbersnay eythay anmay emthay ithway away eatgray
umbernay ofway archersway andway ofway ethay Albiciway, ofway omwhay entionmay ashay eenbay alreadyway
ademay, andway esethay eythay incitedway ybay ewardsray andway omisespray. Omitiusday equiredray
ertaincay ipsshay orfay ishay ownway useway, ichwhay ehay annedmay ithway olonistscay andway
epherdsshay, omwhay ehay adhay oughtbray alongway ithway imhay. Away eetflay eingbay usthay
urnishedfay ithway everyway ecessarynay, ehay advancedway ithway eatgray onfidencecay
againstway ourway ipsshay, ommandedcay ybay Ecimusday Utusbray. Itway asway ationedstay atway anway
islandway oppositeway otay Assiliamay.

Iilvay.Utusbray asway uchmay inferiorway inway umbernay ofway ipsshay; utbay Aesarcay adhay
appointedway otay atthay eetflay ethay avestbray enmay electedsay omfray allway ishay egionslay,
antesignaniway andway enturionscay, owhay adhay equestedray otay ebay employedway inway atthay
ervicesay. Eythay adhay ovidedpray ironway ookshay andway arpoonshay, andway adhay urnishedfay
emselvesthay ithway away astvay umbernay ofway avelinsjay, artsday, andway issilesmay. Usthay
eparedpray, andway eingbay apprisedway ofway ethay enemy'sway approachway, eythay utpay outway omfray
ethay arbourhay, andway engagedway ethay Assiliansmay. Othbay idessay oughtfay ithway eatgray
ouragecay andway esolutionray; ornay idday ethay Albiciway, away ardyhay eoplepay, edbray onway ethay
ighlandshay andway inuredway otay armsway, allfay uchmay ortshay ofway ourway enmay inway alourvay andway
eingbay atelylay omecay omfray ethay Assiliansmay, eythay etainedray inway eirthay indsmay
eirthay ecentray omisespray andway ethay ildway epherdsshay, encouragedway ybay ethay opehay ofway
ibertylay, ereway eagerway otay ovepray eirthay ealzay inway ethay esencepray ofway eirthay
astersmay.

Iiilvay.Ethay Assiliansmay emselvesthay, onfidingcay inway ethay uicknessqay ofway eirthay
ipsshay, andway ethay illskay ofway eirthay ilotspay, eludedway oursway, andway evadedway ethay ockshay,
andway asway onglay asway eythay ereway ermittedpay ybay earclay acespay, engtheninglay eirthay
inelay eythay endeavouredway otay urroundsay usway, orway otay attackway inglesay ipsshay ithway
everalsay ofway eirsthay, orway otay unray acrossway ourway ipsshay, andway arrycay awayway ourway oarsway,
ifway ossiblepay; utbay enwhay ecessitynay obligedway emthay otay omecay earernay, eythay adhay
ecourseray, omfray ethay illskay andway artway ofway ethay ilotspay, otay ethay alourvay ofway ethay
ountaineersmay. Utbay ourway enmay, otnay avinghay uchsay expertway eamensay, orway ilfulskay
ilotspay, orfay eythay adhay eenbay astilyhay afteddray omfray ethay erchantmay ipsshay, andway
ereway otnay etyay acquaintedway evenway ithway ethay amesnay ofway ethay iggingray, ereway
oreovermay impededway ybay ethay eavinesshay andway ownessslay ofway ourway esselsvay, ichwhay
avinghay eenbay uiltbay inway away urryhay andway ofway eengray imbertay, ereway otnay osay easilyway
anoeuvredmay. Ereforethay, enwhay Aesar'scay enmay adhay anway opportunityway ofway away oseclay
engagementway, eythay eerfullychay opposedway otway ofway ethay enemy'sway ipsshay ithway oneway ofway
eirsthay. Andway owingthray inway ethay applinggray ironsway, andway oldinghay othbay ipsshay
astfay, eythay oughtfay onway othbay idessay ofway ethay eckday, andway oardedbay ethay enemy'sway;
andway avinghay illedkay umbersnay ofway ethay Albiciway andway epherdsshay, eythay anksay omesay ofway
eirthay ipsshay, ooktay othersway ithway ethay enmay onway oardbay, andway ovedray ethay estray intoway
ethay arbourhay. Atthay ayday ethay Assiliansmay ostlay inenay ipsshay, includingway osethay
atthay ereway akentay.

Ixlay.Enwhay ewsnay ofway isthay attlebay asway oughtbray otay Aesarcay atway Ilerdaway, ethay
idgebray eingbay ompletedcay atway ethay amesay imetay, ortunefay oonsay ooktay away urntay. Ethay
enemyway, auntedday ybay ethay ouragecay ofway ourway orsehay, idday otnay ourscay ethay ountrycay asway
eelyfray orway asway oldlybay asway eforebay utbay ometimessay advancingway away allsmay istanceday
omfray ethay ampcay, atthay eythay ightmay avehay away eadyray etreatray, eythay oragedfay ithinway
arrowernay oundsbay atway otherway imestay, eythay ooktay away ongerlay ircuitcay otay avoidway ourway
outpostsway andway artiespay ofway orsehay; orway avinghay ustainedsay omesay osslay, orway
escriedday ourway orsehay atway away istanceday, eythay edflay inway ethay idstmay ofway eirthay
expeditionway, eavinglay eirthay aggagebay ehindbay emthay; atway engthlay eythay esolvedray
otay eavelay offway oragingfay orfay everalsay aysday, andway, ontrarycay otay ethay acticepray ofway
allway ationsnay, otay ogay outway atway ightnay.

Xlay.Inway ethay eantimemay ethay Oscensesway andway ethay Alagurritanicay, owhay ereway underway
ethay overnmentgay ofway ethay Oscensesway, endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay, andway offerway otay
ubmitsay otay ishay ordersway. Eythay areway ollowedfay ybay ethay Arraconensestay, Acetanijay,
andway Ausetaniway, andway inway away ewfay aysday oremay ybay ethay Illurgavonensesway, owhay elldway
earnay ethay iverray Ebroway. Ehay equiresray ofway emthay allway otay assistway imhay ithway orncay, otay
ichwhay eythay agreedway, andway avinghay ollectedcay allway ethay attlecay inway ethay ountrycay,
eythay onveycay emthay intoway ishay ampcay. Oneway entireway ohortcay ofway ethay
Illurgavonensesway, owingknay ethay esignday ofway eirthay atestay, amecay overway otay Aesarcay,
omfray ethay aceplay erewhay eythay ereway ationedstay, andway arriedcay eirthay olourscay ithway
emthay. Away eatgray angechay isway ortlyshay ademay inway ethay acefay ofway affairsway. Ethay idgebray
eingbay inishedfay, ivefay owerfulpay atesstay eingbay oinedjay otay Aesarcay, away ayway
openedway orfay ethay eceivingray ofway orncay, andway ethay umoursray ofway ethay assistanceway ofway
egionslay ichwhay ereway aidsay otay ebay onway eirthay archmay, ithway Ompeypay atway eirthay eadhay,
oughthray Auritaniamay, avinghay iedday awayway, everalsay ofway ethay oremay istantday atesstay
evoltray omfray Afraniusway, andway enterway intoway eaguelay ithway Aesarcay.

Ilxay.Ilstwhay ethay iritsspay ofway ethay enemyway ereway ismayedday atway esethay ingsthay,
Aesarcay, atthay ehay ightmay otnay ebay alwaysway obligedway otay endsay ishay orsehay away onglay
ircuitcay oundray ybay ethay idgebray, avinghay oundfay away onvenientcay aceplay, eganbay otay
inksay everalsay ainsdray, irtythay eetfay eepday, ybay ichwhay ehay ightmay awdray offway away artpay
ofway ethay iverray Egresay, andway akemay away ordfay overway itway. Enwhay esethay ereway almostway
inishedfay, Afraniusway andway Etreiuspay eganbay otay ebay eatlygray alarmedway, estlay eythay
ouldshay ebay altogetherway utcay offway omfray orncay andway oragefay, ecausebay Aesarcay asway
eryvay ongstray inway avalrycay. Eythay ereforethay esolvedray otay uitqay eirthay ostspay, andway
otay ansfertray ethay arway otay Eltiberiacay. Erethay asway, oreovermay, away ircumstancecay
atthay onfirmedcay emthay inway isthay esolutionray orfay ofway ethay otway adverseway artiespay,
atthay ichwhay adhay oodstay ybay Ertoriussay inway ethay atelay arway, eingbay onqueredcay ybay
Ompeypay, illstay embledtray atway ishay amenay andway aysway, oughthay absentway ethay otherway
ichwhay adhay emainedray irmfay inway Ompey'spay interestway, ovedlay imhay orfay ethay avoursfay
ichwhay eythay adhay eceivedray utbay Aesar'scay amenay asway otnay ownknay otay ethay
arbariansbay. Omfray esethay eythay expectedway onsiderablecay aidway, othbay ofway orsehay andway
ootfay, andway opedhay otay otractpray ethay arway illtay interway, inway away iendlyfray ountrycay.
Avinghay omecay otay isthay esolutionray, eythay avegay ordersway otay ollectcay allway ethay
ipsshay inway ethay iverray Ebroway, andway otay ingbray emthay otay Octogesaway, away owntay ituatedsay
onway ethay iverray Ebroway, aboutway entytway ilesmay istantday omfray eirthay ampcay. Atway isthay
artpay ofway ethay iverray, eythay orderedway away idgebray otay ebay ademay ofway oatsbay astenedfay
ogethertay, andway ansportedtray otway egionslay overway ethay iverray Egresay, andway
ortifiedfay eirthay ampcay ithway away ampartray, elvetway eetfay ighhay.

Iilxay.Oticenay ofway isthay eingbay ivengay ybay ethay outsscay, Aesarcay ontinuedcay ishay
orkway ayday andway ightnay, ithway eryvay eatgray atiguefay otay ethay oldierssay, otay aindray
ethay iverray, andway osay arfay effectedway ishay urposepay, atthay ethay orsehay ereway othbay
ableway andway oldbay enoughway, oughthay ithway omesay ifficultyday andway angerday, otay asspay
ethay iverray; utbay ethay ootfay adhay onlyway eirthay ouldersshay andway upperway artpay ofway eirthay
eastbray aboveway ethay aterway, osay atthay eirthay ordingfay itway asway etardedray, otnay onlyway
ybay ethay epthday ofway ethay aterway, utbay alsoway ybay ethay apidityray ofway ethay urrentcay.
Oweverhay, almostway atway ethay amesay instantway, ewsnay asway eceivedray ofway ethay idgebray
eingbay earlynay ompletedcay overway ethay Ebroway, andway away ordfay asway oundfay inway ethay Egresay.

Iiilxay.Ownay indeedway ethay enemyway eganbay otay inkthay atthay eythay oughtway otay astenhay
eirthay archmay. Accordinglyway, eavinglay otway auxiliaryway ohortscay inway ethay arrisongay
atway Ilerdaway, eythay ossedcray ethay Egresay ithway eirthay olewhay orcefay, andway ormedfay oneway
ampcay ithway ethay otway egionslay ichwhay eythay adhay edlay acrossway away ewfay aysday eforebay.
Aesarcay adhay onay esourceray, utbay otay annoyway andway utcay ownday eirthay earray; incesay ithway
ishay avalrycay otay ogay ybay ethay idgebray, equiredray imhay otay aketay away onglay ircuitcay; osay
atthay eythay ouldway arriveway atway ethay Ebroway ybay away uchmay ortershay outeray. Ethay orsehay,
ichwhay ehay adhay etachedday, ossedcray ethay ordfay, andway enwhay Afraniusway andway Etreiuspay
adhay okenbray upway eirthay ampcay aboutway ethay irdthay atchway, eythay uddenlysay appearedway
onway eirthay earray, andway eadingspray oundray emthay inway eatgray umbersnay, eganbay otay
etardray andway impedeway eirthay archmay.

Ivlxay.Atway eakbray ofway ayday, itway asway erceivedpay omfray ethay isingray oundsgray ichwhay
oinedjay Aesar'scay ampcay, atthay eirthay earray asway igorouslyvay essedpray ybay ourway
orsehay; atthay ethay astlay inelay ometimessay altedhay andway asway okenbray; atway otherway
imestay, atthay eythay oinedjay attlebay andway atthay ourway enmay ereway eatenbay ackbay ybay away
eneralgay argechay ofway eirthay ohortscay, andway, inway eirthay urntay, ursuedpay emthay enwhay
eythay eeledwhay aboutway utbay oughthray ethay olewhay ampcay ethay oldierssay atheredgay inway
artiespay, andway eclaredday eirthay agrinchay atthay ethay enemyway adhay eenbay ufferedsay otay
escapeway omfray eirthay andshay andway atthay ethay arway adhay eenbay unnecessarilyway
otractedpray. Eythay appliedway otay eirthay ibunestray andway enturionscay, andway entreatedway
emthay otay informway Aesarcay atthay ehay eednay otnay arespay eirthay abourlay orway onsidercay
eirthay angerday; atthay eythay ereway eadyray andway ableway, andway ouldway enturevay otay ordfay
ethay iverray erewhay ethay orsehay adhay ossedcray. Aesarcay, encouragedway ybay eirthay ealzay
andway importunityway, oughthay ehay eltfay eluctantray otay exposeway ishay armyway otay away iverray
osay exceedinglyway argelay, etyay udgedjay itway udentpray otay attemptway itway andway akemay away
ialtray. Accordinglyway, ehay orderedway allway ethay eakerway oldierssay, osewhay iritspay orway
engthstray eemedsay unequalway otay ethay atiguefay, otay ebay electedsay omfray eachway
enturycay, andway eftlay emthay, ithway oneway egionlay esidesbay, otay uardgay ethay ampcay ethay
estray ofway ethay egionslay ehay ewdray outway ithoutway anyway aggagebay, andway, avinghay
isposedday away eatgray umbernay ofway orseshay inway ethay iverray, aboveway andway elowbay ethay
ordfay, ehay edlay ishay armyway overway. Away ewfay ofway ishay oldierssay eingbay arriedcay awayway ybay
ethay orcefay ofway ethay urrentcay, ereway oppedstay ybay ethay orsehay andway akentay upway, andway
otnay away anmay erishedpay. Ishay armyway eingbay afesay onway ethay oppositeway ankbay, ehay ewdray
outway ishay orcesfay andway esolvedray otay eadlay emthay orwardfay inway eethray attalionsbay
andway osay eatgray asway ethay ardourway ofway ethay oldierssay atthay, otwithstandingnay ethay
additionway ofway away ircuitcay ofway ixsay ilesmay andway away onsiderablecay elayday inway ordingfay
ethay iverray, eforebay ethay inthnay ourhay ofway ethay ayday eythay amecay upway ithway osethay owhay
adhay etsay outway atway ethay irdthay atchway.

Lxvay.Enwhay Afraniusway, owhay asway inway ompanycay ithway Etreiuspay, awsay emthay atway away
istanceday, eingbay affrightedway atway osay unexpectedway away ightsay, ehay altedhay onway away
isingray oundgray andway ewdray upway ishay armyway. Aesarcay efreshedray ishay armyway onway ethay
ainplay atthay ehay ightmay otnay exposeway emthay otay attlebay ilstwhay atiguedfay; andway enwhay
ethay enemyway attemptedway otay enewray eirthay archmay, ehay ursuedpay andway oppedstay emthay.
Eythay ereway obligedway otay itchpay eirthay ampcay oonersay anthay eythay adhay intendedway, orfay
erethay ereway ountainsmay atway away allsmay istanceday; andway ifficultday andway arrownay oadsray
awaitedway emthay aboutway ivefay ilesmay offway. Eythay etiredray ehindbay esethay ountainsmay
atthay eythay ightmay avoidway Aesar'scay avalrycay, andway, acingplay artiespay inway ethay
arrownay oadsray, opstay ethay ogresspray ofway ishay armyway andway eadlay eirthay ownway orcesfay
acrossway ethay Ebroway ithoutway angerday orway apprehensionway. Isthay itway asway eirthay
interestway otay attemptway andway otay effectway ybay anyway eansmay ossiblepay; utbay, atiguedfay
ybay ethay irmishesskay allway ayday, andway ybay ethay abourlay ofway eirthay archmay, eythay
eferredday itway illtay ethay ollowingfay ayday Aesarcay ikewiselay encampedway onway ethay extnay
illhay.

Ilxvay.Aboutway idnightmay away ewfay ofway eirthay enmay owhay adhay onegay omesay istanceday omfray
ethay ampcay otay etchfay aterway, eingbay akentay ybay ourway orsehay, Aesarcay isway informedway ybay
emthay atthay ethay eneralsgay ofway ethay enemyway ereway awingdray eirthay oopstray outway ofway ethay
ampcay ithoutway oisenay. Uponway isthay informationway Aesarcay orderedway ethay ignalsay otay
ebay ivengay andway ethay ilitarymay outshay otay ebay aisedray orfay ackingpay upway ethay aggagebay.
Enwhay eythay eardhay ethay outshay, eingbay afraidway estlay eythay ouldshay ebay oppedstay inway
ethay ightnay andway obligedway otay engageway underway eirthay aggagebay, orway estlay eythay ouldshay
ebay onfinedcay inway ethay arrownay oadsray ybay Aesar'scay orsehay, eythay utpay away opstay otay
eirthay archmay andway eptkay eirthay orcesfay inway eirthay ampcay. Ethay extnay ayday Etreiuspay
entway outway ivatelypray ithway away ewfay orsehay otay econnoitreray ethay ountrycay. Away
imilarsay ovementmay asway ademay omfray Aesar'scay ampcay. Uciuslay Ecidiusday Axasay asway
etachedday ithway away allsmay artypay otay exploreway ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountrycay. Eachway
eturnedray ithway ethay amesay accountway otay ishay ampcay, atthay erethay asway away evellay oadray
orfay ethay extnay ivefay ilesmay, atthay erethay enthay ucceededsay away oughray andway
ountainousmay ountrycay. Icheverwhay ouldshay irstfay obtainway ossessionpay ofway ethay
efilesday ouldway avehay onay oubletray inway eventingpray ethay other'sway ogresspray.

Iilxvay.Erethay asway away ebateday inway ethay ouncilcay etweenbay Afraniusway andway Etreiuspay,
andway ethay imetay ofway archingmay asway ethay ubjectsay. Ethay ajoritymay ereway ofway opinionway
atthay eythay ouldshay eginbay eirthay archmay atway ightnay, orfay eythay ightmay eachray ethay
efilesday eforebay eythay ouldshay ebay iscoveredday. Othersway, ecausebay away outshay adhay
eenbay aisedray ethay ightnay eforebay inway Aesar'scay ampcay, usedway isthay asway anway argumentway
atthay eythay ouldcay otnay eavelay ethay ampcay unnoticedway atthay Aesar'scay avalrycay
ereway atrollingpay ethay olewhay ightnay, andway atthay allway ethay aysway andway oadsray ereway
esetbay; atthay attlesbay atway ightnay oughtway otay ebay avoidedway, ecausebay inway ivilcay
issensionday, away oldiersay onceway auntedday isway oremay aptway otay onsultcay ishay earsfay anthay
ishay oathway; atthay ethay aylightday aisedray away ongstray ensesay ofway ameshay inway ethay eyesway
ofway allway, andway atthay ethay esencepray ofway ethay ibunestray andway enturionscay adhay ethay
amesay effectway ybay esethay ingsthay ethay oldierssay ouldway ebay eray ainedstray andway awedway
otay eirthay utyday. Ereforewhay eythay ouldshay, ybay allway eansmay, attemptway otay orcefay
eirthay ayway ybay ayday; orfay, oughthay away iflingtray osslay ightmay ebay ustainedsay, etyay
ethay ostpay ichwhay eythay esiredday ightmay ebay ecuredsay ithway afetysay otay ethay ainmay
odybay ofway ethay armyway. Isthay opinionway evailedpray inway ethay ouncilcay, andway ethay extnay
ayday, atway ethay awnday, eythay esolvedray otay etsay orwardfay.

Iiilxvay.Aesarcay, avinghay akentay away iewvay ofway ethay ountrycay, ethay omentmay ethay skyay
eganbay otay owgray itewhay, edlay ishay orcesfay omfray ethay ampcay andway archedmay atway ethay
eadhay ofway ishay armyway ybay away onglay ircuitcay, eepingkay otay onay egularray oadray; orfay ethay
oadray ichwhay edlay otay ethay Ebroway andway Octogesaway asway occupiedway ybay ethay enemy'sway
ampcay, ichwhay aylay inway Aesar'scay ayway. Ishay oldierssay ereway obligedway otay osscray
extensiveway andway ifficultday alleysvay. Aggycray iffsclay, inway everalsay acesplay,
interruptedway eirthay archmay, insomuchway atthay eirthay armsway adhay otay ebay andedhay otay
oneway anotherway, andway ethay oldierssay ereway orcedfay otay erformpay away eatgray artpay ofway
eirthay archmay unarmedway, andway ereway iftedlay upway ethay ocksray ybay eachway otherway. Utbay otnay
away anmay urmuredmay atway ethay atiguefay, ecausebay eythay imaginedway atthay erethay ouldway ebay
away eriodpay otay allway eirthay oilstay ifway eythay ouldcay utcay offway ethay enemyway omfray ethay
Ebroway andway interceptway eirthay onvoyscay.

Ixlxay.Atway irstfay, Afranius'sway oldierssay anray inway ighhay iritsspay omfray eirthay ampcay
otay ooklay atway usway, andway inway ontumeliouscay anguagelay upbraidedway usway, atthay eway ereway
orcedfay, orfay antway ofway ecessarynay ubsistencesay, otay unray awayway, andway eturnray otay
Ilerdaway. Orfay ourway outeray asway ifferentday omfray atwhay eway oposedpray, andway eway
appearedway otay ebay oinggay away ontrarycay ayway. Utbay eirthay eneralsgay applaudedway eirthay
ownway udencepray inway eepingkay ithinway eirthay ampcay, andway itway asway away ongstray
onfirmationcay ofway eirthay opinionway, atthay eythay awsay eway archedmay ithoutway aggonsway
orway aggagebay, ichwhay ademay emthay onfidentcay atthay eway ouldcay otnay onglay endureway
antway. Utbay enwhay eythay awsay ourway armyway aduallygray eelwhay otay ethay ightray, andway
observedway ourway anvay asway alreadyway assingpay ethay inelay ofway eirthay ampcay, erethay asway
obodynay osay upidstay, orway averseway otay atiguefay, asway otnay otay inkthay itway ecessarynay otay
archmay omfray ethay ampcay immediatelyway, andway opposeway usway. Ethay cryay otay armsway asway
aisedray, andway allway ethay armyway, exceptway away ewfay ichwhay ereway eftlay otay uardgay ethay
ampcay, etsay outway andway archedmay ethay irectday oadray otay ethay Ebroway.

Lxxay.Ethay ontestcay ependedday entirelyway onway espatchday, ichwhay ouldshay irstfay etgay
ossessionpay ofway ethay efileday andway ethay ountainmay. Ethay ifficultyday ofway ethay oadsray
elayedday Aesar'scay armyway, utbay ishay avalrycay ursuingpay Afranius'sway orcesfay,
etardedray eirthay archmay. Oweverhay, ethay affairway asway ecessarilynay educedray otay
isthay ointpay, ithway espectray otay Afranius'sway enmay, atthay ifway eythay irstfay ainedgay
ethay ountainsmay, ichwhay eythay esiredday, eythay ouldway emselvesthay avoidway allway
angerday, utbay ouldcay otnay avesay ethay aggagebay ofway eirthay olewhay armyway, ornay ethay
ohortscay ichwhay eythay adhay eftlay ehindbay inway ethay ampscay, otay ichwhay, eingbay
interceptedway ybay Aesar'scay armyway, ybay onay eansmay ouldcay assistanceway ebay ivengay.
Aesarcay irstfay accomplishedway ethay archmay, andway avinghay oundfay away ainplay ehindbay
argelay ocksray, ewdray upway ishay armyway erethay inway orderway ofway attlebay andway acingfay ethay
enemyway. Afraniusway, erceivingpay atthay ishay earray asway alledgay ybay ourway avalrycay, andway
eeingsay ethay enemyway eforebay imhay, avinghay omecay otay away illhay, ademay away althay onway itway.
Encethay ehay etachedday ourfay ohortscay ofway Anishspay ightlay infantryway otay ethay ighesthay
ountainmay ichwhay asway inway iewvay otay isthay ehay orderedway emthay otay astenhay ithway allway
expeditionway, andway otay aketay ossessionpay ofway itway, ithway ethay intentionway ofway oinggay otay
ethay amesay aceplay ithway allway ishay orcesfay, enthay alteringway ishay outeray, andway
ossingcray ethay illshay otay Octogesaway. Asway ethay Aniardsspay ereway akingmay owardstay itway
inway anway obliqueway irectionday, Aesar'scay orsehay espiedway emthay andway attackedway emthay,
ornay ereway eythay ableway otay ithstandway ethay argechay ofway ethay avalrycay evenway orfay away
omentmay, utbay ereway allway urroundedsay andway utcay otay iecespay inway ethay ightsay ofway ethay
otway armiesway.

Ilxxay.Erethay asway ownay anway opportunityway orfay anagingmay affairsway uccessfullysay,
ornay idday itway escapeway Aesarcay, atthay anway armyway auntedday atway ufferingsay uchsay away osslay
eforebay eirthay eyesway, ouldcay otnay andstay, especiallyway asway eythay ereway urroundedsay
ybay ourway orsehay, andway ethay engagementway ouldway aketay aceplay onway evenway andway openway
oundgray. Otay isthay ehay asway importunedway onway allway idessay. Ethay ieutenantslay,
enturionscay, andway ibunestray, atheredgay oundray imhay, andway eggedbay atthay ehay ouldway
otnay esitatehay otay eginbay ethay attlebay atthay ethay eartshay ofway allway ethay oldierssay
ereway eryvay anxiousway orfay itway atthay Afranius'sway enmay adhay ybay everalsay
ircumstancescay etrayedbay ignssay ofway earfay; inway atthay eythay adhay otnay assistedway
eirthay artypay; inway atthay eythay adhay otnay uittedqay ethay illhay; inway atthay eythay idday otnay
ustainsay ethay argechay ofway ourway avalrycay, utbay owdingcray eirthay andardsstay intoway oneway
aceplay, idday otnay observeway eitherway ankray orway orderway. Utbay ifway ehay adhay anyway
apprehensionsway omfray ethay isadvantageday ofway ethay oundgray, atthay anway opportunityway
ouldway ebay ivengay imhay ofway omingcay otay attlebay inway omesay otherway aceplay orfay atthay
Afraniusway ustmay ertainlycay omecay ownday, andway ouldway otnay ebay ableway otay emainray erethay
orfay antway ofway aterway.

Iilxxay.Aesarcay adhay onceivedcay opeshay ofway endingway ethay affairway ithoutway anway
engagementway, orway ithoutway ikingstray away owblay, ecausebay ehay adhay utcay offway ethay
enemy'sway uppliessay. Whyay ouldshay ehay azardhay ethay osslay ofway anyway ofway ishay enmay, evenway
inway away uccessfulsay attlebay? Whyay ouldshay ehay exposeway oldierssay otay ebay oundedway; owhay
adhay eservedday osay ellway ofway imhay? Whyay, inway ortshay, ouldshay ehay empttay ortunefay?
especiallyway enwhay itway asway asway uchmay away eneral'sgay utyday otay onquercay ybay acticstay,
asway ybay ethay ordsway. Esidesbay, ehay asway ovedmay ithway ompassioncay orfay osethay
itizenscay, owhay, ehay oresawfay, ustmay allfay andway ehay adhay atherray aingay ishay objectway
ithoutway anyway osslay orway injuryway otay emthay. Isthay esolutionray ofway Aesarcay asway otnay
enerallygay approvedway ofway; utbay ethay oldierssay openlyway eclaredday otay eachway otherway,
atthay incesay uchsay anway opportunityway ofway ictoryvay asway etlay asspay, eythay ouldway otnay
omecay otay anway engagementway, evenway enwhay Aesarcay ouldshay ishway itway. Ehay erseveredpay
oweverhay inway ishay esolutionray, andway etiredray away ittlelay omfray atthay aceplay otay abateway
ethay enemy'sway earsfay. Etreiuspay andway Afraniusway, avinghay otgay isthay opportunityway,
etiredray otay eirthay ampcay. Aesarcay, avinghay isposedday artiespay onway ethay ountainsmay,
andway utcay offway allway accessway otay ethay Ebroway, ortifiedfay ishay ampcay asway oseclay otay ethay
enemyway asway ehay ouldcay.

Iiilxxay.Ethay ayday ollowingfay, ethay eneralsgay ofway ishay opponentsway, eingbay alarmedway
atthay eythay adhay ostlay allway ospectpray ofway uppliessay, andway ofway accessway otay ethay Ebroway,
onsultedcay asway otay atwhay otherway oursecay eythay ouldshay aketay. Erethay ereway otway
oadsray, oneway otay Ilerdaway, ifway eythay osechay otay eturnray, ethay otherway otay Arracotay, ifway
eythay ouldshay archmay otay itway. Ilstwhay eythay ereway eliberatingday onway esethay attersmay,
intelligenceway asway oughtbray emthay atthay eirthay ateringway artiespay ereway attackedway
ybay ourway orsehay uponway ichwhay informationway, eythay isposeday everalsay artiespay ofway
orsehay andway auxiliaryway ootfay alongway ethay oadray, andway intermixway omesay egionarylay
ohortscay, andway eginbay otay owthray upway away ampartray omfray ethay ampcay otay ethay aterway,
atthay eythay ightmay ebay ableway otay ocurepray aterway ithinway eirthay ineslay, othbay
ithoutway earfay, andway ithoutway away uardgay. Etreiuspay andway Afraniusway ividedday isthay
asktay etweenbay emselvesthay, andway entway inway ersonpay otay omesay istanceday omfray eirthay
ampcay orfay ethay urposepay ofway eeingsay itway accomplishedway.

Ivlxxay.Ethay oldierssay avinghay obtainedway ybay eirthay absenceway away eefray opportunityway
ofway onversingcay ithway eachway otherway, amecay outway inway eatgray umbersnay, andway inquiredway
eachway orfay ateverwhay acquaintanceway orway ellowfay itizencay ehay adhay inway ourway ampcay, andway
invitedway imhay otay imhay. Irstfay eythay eturnedray emthay eneralgay anksthay orfay aringspay
emthay ethay ayday eforebay, enwhay eythay ereway eatlygray errifiedtay, andway acknowledgedway
atthay eythay ereway aliveway oughthray eirthay indnesskay; enthay eythay inquiredway aboutway
ethay onourhay ofway ourway eneralgay, andway etherwhay eythay ouldcay ithway afetysay entrustway
emselvesthay otay imhay; andway eclaredday eirthay orrowsay atthay eythay adhay otnay oneday osay
inway ethay eginningbay, andway atthay eythay adhay akentay upway armsway againstway eirthay
elationsray andway insmenkay. Encouragedway ybay esethay onferencescay, eythay esiredday ethay
eneral'sgay arolepay orfay ethay iveslay ofway Etreiuspay andway Afraniusway, atthay eythay ightmay
otnay appearway uiltygay ofway away imecray, inway avinghay etrayedbay eirthay eneralsgay. Enwhay
eythay ereway assuredway ofway obtainingway eirthay emandsday, eythay omisedpray atthay eythay
ouldway immediatelyway emoveray eirthay andardsstay, andway entsay enturionscay ofway ethay
irstfay ankray asway eputiesday otay eattray ithway Aesarcay aboutway away eacepay. Inway ethay
eantimemay omesay ofway emthay inviteway eirthay acquaintancesway, andway ingbray emthay otay
eirthay ampcay, othersway areway oughtbray awayway ybay eirthay iendsfray, osay atthay ethay otway
ampscay eemedsay otay ebay unitedway intoway oneway, andway everalsay ofway ethay ibunestray andway
enturionscay amecay otay Aesarcay, andway aidpay eirthay espectsray otay imhay. Ethay amesay asway
oneday ybay omesay ofway ethay obilitynay ofway Ainspay, omwhay eythay ummonedsay otay eirthay
assistanceway, andway eptkay inway eirthay ampcay asway ostageshay. Eythay inquiredway afterway
eirthay acquaintanceway andway iendsfray, ybay omwhay eachway ightmay avehay ethay eansmay ofway
eingbay ecommendedray otay Aesarcay. Evenway Afranius'sway onsay, away oungyay anmay,
endeavouredway ybay eansmay ofway Ulpitiussay ethay ieutenantlay, otay akemay ermstay orfay ishay
ownway andway ishay ather'sfay ifelay. Everyway aceplay asway illedfay ithway irthmay andway
ongratulationscay; inway ethay oneway armyway, ecausebay eythay oughtthay eythay adhay escapedway
osay impendingway angerday; inway ethay otherway, ecausebay eythay oughtthay eythay adhay
ompletedcay osay importantway away attermay ithoutway owsblay; andway Aesarcay, inway everyway
an'smay udgmentjay, eapedray ethay advantageway ofway ishay ormerfay enitylay, andway ishay
onductcay asway applaudedway ybay allway.

Vlxxay.Enwhay esethay ircumstancescay ereway announcedway otay Afraniusway, ehay eftlay ethay
orkway ichwhay ehay adhay egunbay, andway eturnedray otay ishay ampcay eterminedday, asway itway
appearedway, ateverwhay ouldshay ebay ethay eventway otay earbay itway ithway anway evenway andway
eadystay indmay. Etreiuspay idday otnay eglectnay imselfhay; ehay armedway ishay omesticsday;
ithway emthay andway ethay aetorianpray ohortcay ofway Aniardsspay, andway away ewfay oreignfay
orsehay, ishay ependantsday, omwhay ehay ommonlycay eptkay earnay imhay otay uardgay ishay
ersonpay, ehay uddenlysay ewflay otay ethay ampartray, interruptedway ethay onferencescay ofway
ethay oldierssay, ovedray ourway enmay omfray ethay ampcay, andway utpay otay eathday asway anymay asway
ehay aughtcay. Ethay estray ormedfay intoway away odybay, andway, eingbay alarmedway ybay ethay
unexpectedway angerday, appedwray eirthay eftlay armsway inway eirthay oaksclay, andway ewdray
eirthay ordssway, andway inway isthay annermay, ependingday onway ethay earnessnay ofway eirthay
ampcay, efendedday emselvesthay againstway ethay Aniardsspay, andway ethay orsehay, andway ademay
oodgay eirthay etreatray otay ethay ampcay, erewhay eythay ereway otectedpray ybay ethay
ohortscay, ichwhay ereway onway uardgay.

Vilxxay.Etreiuspay, afterway accomplishingway isthay, entway oundray everyway aniplemay,
allingcay ethay oldierssay ybay eirthay amesnay andway entreatingway ithway earstay, atthay eythay
ouldway otnay ivegay upway imhay andway eirthay absentway eneralgay Ompeypay, asway away acrificesay otay
ethay engeancevay ofway eirthay enemiesway. Immediatelyway eythay anray inway owdscray otay ethay
eneral'sgay avilionpay, enwhay ehay equiredray emthay allway otay aketay anway oathway atthay eythay
ouldway otnay esertday ornay etraybay ethay armyway ornay ethay eneralsgay, ornay ormfay anyway
esignday istinctday omfray ethay eneralgay interestway. Ehay imselfhay oresway irstfay otay ethay
enortay ofway osethay ordsway, andway obligedway Afraniusway otay aketay ethay amesay oathway. Ethay
ibunestray andway enturionscay ollowedfay eirthay exampleway; ethay oldierssay ereway
oughtbray outway ybay enturiescay, andway ooktay ethay amesay oathway. Eythay avegay ordersway, atthay
oeverwhay adhay anyway ofway Aesar'scay oldierssay ouldshay oducepray emthay; asway oonsay asway
eythay ereway oducedpray, eythay utpay emthay otay eathday ubliclypay inway ethay aetoriumpray,
utbay ostmay ofway emthay oncealedcay osethay atthay eythay adhay entertainedway, andway etlay emthay
outway atway ightnay overway ethay ampartray. Usthay ethay errortay aisedray ybay ethay eneralsgay,
ethay ueltycray ofway ethay unishmentspay, ethay ewnay obligationway ofway anway oathway, emovedray
allway opeshay ofway urrendersay orfay ethay esentpray, angedchay ethay oldiers'say indsmay, andway
educedray attersmay otay ethay ormerfay atestay ofway arway.

Viilxxay.Aesarcay orderedway ethay enemy'sway oldierssay, owhay adhay omecay intoway ishay ampcay
otay oldhay away onferencecay, otay ebay earchedsay orfay ithway ethay icteststray iligenceday,
andway entsay ackbay. Utbay ofway ethay ibunestray andway enturionscay, everalsay oluntarilyvay
emainedray ithway imhay, andway ehay afterwardsway eatedtray emthay ithway eatgray espectray.
Ethay enturionscay ehay omotedpray otay igherhay anksray, andway onferredcay onway ethay Omanray
ightsknay ethay onourhay ofway ibunestray.

Viiilxxay.Afranius'sway enmay ereway istressedday inway oragingfay, andway ocuredpray aterway
ithway ifficultyday. Ethay egionarylay oldierssay adhay away olerabletay upplysay ofway orncay,
ecausebay eythay adhay eenbay orderedway otay ingbray omfray Ilerdaway ufficientsay otay astlay
entytwayotway aysday; ethay Anishspay andway auxiliaryway orcesfay adhay onenay, orfay eythay adhay
utbay ewfay opportunitiesway ofway ocuringpray anyway, andway eirthay odiesbay ereway otnay
accustomedway otay earbay urdensbay; andway ereforethay away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay amecay
overway otay Aesarcay everyway ayday. Eirthay affairsway ereway underway esethay ifficultiesday;
utbay ofway ethay otway emesschay oposedpray, ethay ostmay expedientway eemedsay otay ebay otay
eturnray otay Ilerdaway, ecausebay eythay adhay eftlay omesay orncay erethay; andway erethay eythay
opedhay otay ecideday onway away anplay orfay eirthay uturefay onductcay. Arracotay aylay atway away
eatergray istanceday; andway inway uchsay away acespay eythay ewknay affairsway ightmay admitway ofway
anymay angeschay. Eirthay esignday avinghay etmay ithway approbationway, eythay etsay outway
omfray eirthay ampcay. Aesarcay avinghay entsay orwardfay ishay avalrycay, otay annoyway andway
etardray eirthay earray, ollowedfay oseclay afterway ithway ishay egionslay. Otnay away omentmay
assedpay inway ichwhay eirthay earray asway otnay engagedway ithway ourway orsehay.

Ixlxxay.Eirthay annermay ofway ightingfay asway isthay ethay ightlay ohortscay osedclay
eirthay earray, andway equentlyfray ademay away andstay onway ethay evellay oundsgray. Ifway eythay
adhay away ountainmay otay ascendway, ethay eryvay aturenay ofway ethay aceplay eadilyray ecuredsay
emthay omfray anyway angerday; orfay ethay advancedway uardsgay, omfray ethay isingray oundsgray,
otectedpray ethay estray inway eirthay ascentway. Enwhay eythay approachedway away alleyvay orway
eclivityday, andway ethay advancedway enmay ouldcay otnay impartway assistanceway otay ethay
ardytay, ourway orsehay ewthray eirthay artsday atway emthay omfray ethay isingray oundsgray ithway
advantageway; enthay eirthay affairsway ereway inway away erilouspay ituationsay; ethay onlyway
anplay eftlay asway, atthay eneverwhay eythay amecay earnay uchsay acesplay, eythay ouldshay
ivegay ordersway otay ethay egionslay otay althay, andway ybay away iolentvay effortway epulseray ourway
orsehay; andway esethay eingbay orcedfay otay ivegay ayway, eythay ouldshay uddenlysay, ithway
ethay utmostway eedspay, unray allway ogethertay ownday otay ethay alleyvay, andway avinghay assedpay
itway, ouldshay acefay aboutway againway onway ethay extnay illhay. Orfay osay arfay ereway eythay omfray
erivingday anyway assistanceway omfray eirthay orsehay ofway ichwhay eythay adhay away argelay
umbernay, atthay eythay ereway obligedway otay eceiveray emthay intoway ethay entrecay ofway eirthay
armyway, andway emselvesthay otectpray emthay, asway eythay ereway auntedday ybay ormerfay
attlesbay. Andway onway eirthay archmay onay oneway ouldcay uitqay ethay inelay ithoutway eingbay
akentay ybay Aesar'scay orsehay.

Xlxxay.Ilstwhay irmishesskay ereway oughtfay inway isthay annermay, eythay advancedway utbay
owlyslay andway aduallygray, andway equentlyfray altedhay otay elphay eirthay earray, asway enthay
appenedhay. Orfay avinghay advancedway ourfay ilesmay, andway eingbay eryvay uchmay arassedhay
ybay ourway orsehay, eythay ooktay ostpay onway away ighhay ountainmay, andway erethay entrenchedway
emselvesthay onway ethay ontfray onlyway, acingfay ethay enemyway; andway idday otnay aketay eirthay
aggagebay offway eirthay attlecay. Enwhay eythay erceivedpay atthay Aesar'scay ampcay asway
itchedpay, andway ethay entstay ixedfay upway, andway ishay orsehay entsay outway otay oragefay, eythay
uddenlysay ushedray outway aboutway elvetway o'clockway ethay amesay ayday, andway, avinghay opeshay
atthay eway ouldshay ebay elayedday ybay ethay absenceway ofway ourway orsehay, eythay eganbay otay
archmay, ichwhay Aesarcay erceivingpay, ollowedfay emthay ithway ethay egionslay atthay
emainedray. Ehay eftlay away ewfay ohortscay otay uardgay ishay aggagebay, andway orderedway ethay
oragersfay otay ebay alledcay omehay atway ethay enthtay ourhay, andway ethay orsehay otay ollowfay
imhay. Ethay orsehay ortlyshay eturnedray otay eirthay ailyday utyday onway archmay, andway
argedchay ethay earray osay igorouslyvay, atthay eythay almostway orcedfay emthay otay flyay; andway
everalsay ivatespray andway omesay enturionscay ereway illedkay. Ethay ainmay odybay ofway
Aesar'scay armyway asway atway andhay, andway universalway uinray eatenedthray emthay.

Xilxxay.Enthay indeedway, otnay avinghay opportunityway eitherway otay oosechay away
onvenientcay ositionpay orfay eirthay ampcay, orway otay archmay orwardfay, eythay ereway
obligedway otay althay, andway otay encampway atway away istanceday omfray aterway, andway onway oundgray
aturallynay unfavourableway. Utbay orfay ethay easonsray alreadyway ivengay, Aesarcay idday
otnay attackway emthay, ornay uffersay away enttay otay ebay itchedpay atthay ayday, atthay ishay enmay
ightmay ebay ethay eadierray otay ursuepay emthay etherwhay eythay attemptedway otay unray offway ybay
ightnay orway ybay ayday. Observingway ethay efectday inway eirthay ositionpay, eythay entspay ethay
olewhay ightnay inway extendingway eirthay orksway, andway urntay eirthay ampcay otay oursway. Ethay
extnay ayday, atway awnday, eythay oday ethay amesay, andway endspay ethay olewhay ayday inway atthay
annermay, utbay inway oportionpray asway eythay advancedway eirthay orksway, andway extendedway
eirthay ampcay, eythay ereway artherfay istantday omfray ethay aterway; andway oneway evilway asway
emediedray ybay anotherway. Ethay irstfay ightnay, onay oneway entway outway orfay aterway. Ethay
extnay ayday, eythay eftlay away uardgay inway ethay ampcay, andway edlay outway allway eirthay orcesfay otay
aterway utbay otnay away ersonpay asway entsay otay ooklay orfay oragefay. Aesarcay asway oremay
esirousday atthay eythay ouldshay ebay umbledhay ybay esethay eansmay, andway orcedfay otay omecay
otay ermstay, anthay ecideday ethay ontestcay ybay attlebay. Etyay ehay endeavouredway otay
urroundsay emthay ithway away allway andway enchtray, atthay ehay ightmay ebay ableway otay eckchay
eirthay ostmay uddensay allysay, otay ichwhay ehay imaginedway atthay eythay ustmay avehay
