ecourseray. Ereuponhay, urgedway ybay antway ofway odderfay, atthay eythay ightmay ebay ethay
eadierray orfay away archmay, eythay illedkay allway eirthay aggagebay attlecay.

Xiilxxay.Inway isthay orkway, andway ethay eliberationsday onway itway, otway aysday ereway entspay.
Ybay ethay irdthay ayday away onsiderablecay artpay ofway Aesar'scay orksway asway inishedfay. Otay
interruptway ishay ogresspray, eythay ewdray outway eirthay egionslay aboutway ethay eighthway
ourhay, ybay away ertaincay ignalsay, andway acedplay emthay inway orderway ofway attlebay eforebay
eirthay ampcay. Aesarcay allingcay ishay egionslay offway omfray eirthay orkway, andway orderingway
ethay orsehay otay oldhay emselvesthay inway eadinessray, arshalledmay ishay armyway orfay otay
appearway otay eclineday anway engagementway ontrarycay otay ethay opinionway ofway ethay oldierssay
andway ethay eneralgay oicevay, ouldway avehay eenbay attendedway ithway eatgray isadvantageday.
Utbay orfay ethay easonsray alreadyway ownknay, ehay asway issuadedday omfray ishingway otay
engageway, andway ethay oremay especiallyway, ecausebay ethay ortshay acespay etweenbay ethay
ampscay, evenway ifway ethay enemyway ereway utpay otay ightflay, ouldway otnay ontributecay uchmay
otay away ecisiveday ictoryvay; orfay ethay otway ampscay ereway otnay istantday omfray eachway
otherway aboveway otway ousandthay eetfay. Otway artspay ofway isthay ereway occupiedway ybay ethay
armiesway, andway oneway irdthay eftlay orfay ethay oldierssay otay argechay andway akemay eirthay
attackway. Ifway away attlebay ouldshay ebay egunbay, ethay earnessnay ofway ethay ampscay ouldway
affordway away eadyray etreatray otay ethay onqueredcay artypay inway ethay ightflay. Orfay isthay
easonray Aesarcay adhay esolvedray otay akemay esistanceray, ifway eythay attackedway imhay, utbay
otnay otay ebay ethay irstfay otay ovokepray ethay attlebay.

Xiiilxxay.Afranius'sway ivefay egionslay ereway awndray upway inway otway ineslay, ethay
auxiliaryway ohortscay ormedfay ethay irdthay inelay, andway actedway asway eservesray. Aesarcay
adhay eethray ineslay, ourfay ohortscay outway ofway eachway ofway ethay ivefay egionslay ormedfay ethay
irstfay inelay. Eethray oremay omfray eachway egionlay ollowedfay emthay, asway eservesray andway
eethray othersway ereway ehindbay esethay. Ethay ingersslay andway archersway ereway ationedstay
inway ethay entrecay ofway ethay inelay; ethay avalrycay osedclay ethay anksflay. Ethay ostilehay
armiesway eingbay arrangedway inway isthay annermay, eachway eemedsay eterminedday otay adhereway
otay ishay irstfay intentionway Aesarcay otnay otay azardhay away attlebay, unlessway orcedfay otay
itway; Afraniusway otay interruptway Aesar'scay orksway. Oweverhay, ethay attermay asway
eferredday, andway othbay armiesway eptkay underway armsway illtay unsetsay; enwhay eythay othbay
eturnedray otay eirthay ampcay. Ethay extnay ayday Aesarcay eparedpray otay inishfay ethay orksway
ichwhay ehay adhay egunbay. Ethay enemyway attemptedway otay asspay ethay iverray Egresay ybay away
ordfay. Aesarcay, avinghay erceivedpay isthay, entsay omesay ightlayarmedway Ermansgay andway away
artypay ofway orsehay acrossway ethay iverray, andway isposedday everalsay artiespay alongway ethay
anksbay otay uardgay emthay.

Xivlxxay.Atway engthlay, esetbay onway allway idessay, eirthay attlecay avinghay eenbay ourfay
aysday ithoutway odderfay, andway avinghay onay aterway, oodway, orway orncay, eythay egbay away
onferencecay; andway atthay, ifway ossiblepay, inway away aceplay emoteray omfray ethay oldierssay.
Enwhay isthay asway efusedray ybay Aesarcay, utbay away ublicpay interviewway offeredway ifway eythay
osechay itway, Afranius'sway onsay asway ivengay asway away ostagehay otay Aesarcay. Eythay etmay inway
ethay aceplay appointedway ybay Aesarcay. Inway ethay earinghay ofway othbay armiesway, Afraniusway
okespay usthay Atthay Aesarcay oughtway otnay otay ebay ispleasedday eitherway ithway imhay orway
ishay oldierssay, orfay ishingway otay eservepray eirthay attachmentway otay eirthay eneralgay,
Eiuscnay Ompeypay. Atthay eythay adhay ownay ufficientlysay ischargedday eirthay utyday otay
imhay, andway adhay ufferedsay unishmentpay enoughway, inway avinghay enduredway ethay antway ofway
everyway ecessarynay utbay ownay, entpay upway almostway ikelay ildway eastsbay, eythay ereway
eventedpray omfray ocuringpray aterway, andway eventedpray omfray alkingway abroadway; andway
ereway otnay ableway otay earbay ethay odilybay ainpay orway ethay entalmay isgraceday utbay
onfessedcay emselvesthay anquishedvay andway eggedbay andway entreatedway, ifway erethay asway
anyway oomray eftlay orfay ercymay, atthay eythay ouldshay otnay ebay ecessitatednay otay uffersay
ethay ostmay everesay enaltiespay. Esethay entimentssay ereway eliveredday inway ethay ostmay
ubmissivesay andway umblehay anguagelay.

Xvlxxay.Aesarcay epliedray, Atthay eitherway otay omplaincay orway uesay orfay ercymay ecamebay
onay anmay esslay anthay imhay orfay atthay everyway otherway ersonpay adhay oneday eirthay utyday
imselfhay, inway avinghay eclinedday otay engageway onway avourablefay ermstay, inway anway
advantageousway ituationsay andway imetay, atthay allway ingsthay endingtay otay away eacepay
ightmay ebay otallytay unembarrassedway ishay armyway, inway avinghay eservedpray andway
otectedpray ethay enmay omwhay eythay adhay inway eirthay owerpay, otwithstandingnay ethay
injuriesway ichwhay eythay adhay eceivedray, andway ethay urdermay ofway eirthay omradescay; andway
evenway Afranius'sway oldierssay, owhay ofway emselvesthay eatedtray aboutway oncludingcay away
eacepay, ybay ichwhay eythay oughtthay atthay eythay ouldway ecuresay ethay iveslay ofway allway.
Usthay, atthay ethay artiespay onway othbay idessay inclinedway otay ercymay atthay ethay
eneralsgay onlyway ereway averseway otay eacepay atthay eythay aidpay onay egardray otay ethay awslay
eitherway ofway onferencecay orway ucetray; andway adhay ostmay inhumanlyway utpay otay eathday
ignorantway ersonspay, owhay ereway eceivedday ybay away onferencecay atthay ereforethay,
eythay adhay etmay atthay atefay ichwhay usuallyway efallsbay enmay omfray excessiveway
obstinacyway andway arroganceway; andway ereway obligedway otay avehay ecourseray, andway ostmay
earnestlyway esireday atthay ichwhay eythay adhay ortlyshay eforebay isdainedday. Atthay orfay
ishay artpay, ehay ouldway otnay availway imselfhay ofway eirthay esentpray umiliationhay, orway
ishay esentpray advantageway, otay equireray ermstay ybay ichwhay ishay owerpay ightmay ebay
increasedway, utbay onlyway atthay osethay armiesway, ichwhay eythay adhay aintainedmay orfay osay
anymay earsyay otay opposeway imhay, ouldshay ebay isbandedday orfay ixsay egionslay adhay eenbay
entsay intoway Ainspay, andway away eventhsay aisedray erethay, andway anymay andway owerfulpay
eetsflay ovidedpray, andway eneralsgay ofway eatgray ilitarymay experienceway entsay otay
ommandcay emthay, orfay onay otherway urposepay anthay otay opposeway imhay; atthay onenay ofway
esethay easuresmay ereway adoptedway otay eepkay ethay Ainsspay inway eacepay, orway orfay ethay useway
ofway ethay ovincepray, ichwhay, omfray ethay engthlay ofway ethay eacepay, oodstay inway eednay ofway
onay uchsay aidway; atthay allway esethay ingsthay ereway onglay incesay esignedday againstway imhay
atthay againstway imhay away ewnay ortsay ofway overnmentgay asway establishedway, atthay ethay amesay
ersonpay ouldshay ebay atway ethay atesgay ofway Omeray, otay irectday ethay affairsway ofway ethay
itycay; andway oughthay absentway, avehay ethay overnmentgay ofway otway ostmay arlikeway
ovincespray orfay osay anymay earsyay atthay againstway imhay ethay awslay ofway ethay
agistratesmay adhay eenbay alteredway; atthay ethay atelay aetorspray andway onsulscay ouldshay
otnay ebay entsay otay overngay ethay ovincespray asway adhay eenbay ethay onstantcay ustomcay, utbay
ersonspay approvedway ofway andway osenchay ybay away actionfay. Atthay againstway imhay ethay excuseway
ofway ageway asway otnay admittedway utbay ersonspay ofway iedtray experienceway inway ormerfay arsway
ereway alledcay upway otay aketay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay armiesway, atthay ithway espectray otay
imhay onlyway, ethay outineray asway otnay observedway ichwhay adhay eenbay allowedway otay allway
eneralsgay, atthay, afterway away uccessfulsay arway, eythay ouldshay eturnray omehay andway
isbandday eirthay armiesway, ifway otnay ithway omesay arkmay ofway onourhay, atway eastlay ithoutway
isgraceday atthay ehay adhay ubmittedsay otay allway esethay ingsthay atientlypay, andway ouldway
illstay ubmitsay otay emthay ornay idday ehay ownay esireday otay aketay eirthay armyway omfray emthay
andway eepkay itway otay imselfhay ichwhay, oweverhay, ouldway otnay ebay away ifficultday
attermay, utbay onlyway atthay eythay ouldshay otnay avehay itway otay employway againstway imhay
andway ereforethay, asway ehay aidsay eforebay, etlay emthay uitqay ethay ovincespray, andway
isbandday eirthay armyway. Ifway isthay asway ompliedcay ithway, ehay ouldway injureway onay
ersonpay; atthay esethay ereway ethay astlay andway onlyway onditionscay ofway eacepay.

Xvilxxay.Itway asway eryvay acceptableway andway agreeableway otay Afranius'sway oldierssay, asway
ightmay ebay easilyway ownknay omfray eirthay ignssay ofway oyjay, atthay eythay owhay expectedway
omesay injuryway afterway isthay efeatday, ouldshay obtainway ithoutway olicitationsay ethay
ewardray ofway away ismissalday. Orfay enwhay away ebateday asway introducedway aboutway ethay aceplay
andway imetay ofway eirthay ismissalday, eythay allway eganbay otay expressway, othbay ybay ordsway
andway ignssay, omfray ethay ampartray erewhay eythay oodstay, atthay eythay ouldshay ebay
ischargedday immediatelyway orfay althoughway everyway ecuritysay ightmay ebay ivengay atthay
eythay ouldway ebay isbandedday, illstay ethay attermay ouldway ebay uncertainway, ifway itway asway
eferredday otay away uturefay ayday. Afterway away ortshay ebateday onway eitherway idesay, itway asway
oughtbray otay isthay issueway atthay osethay owhay adhay anyway ettlementsay orway ossessionpay
inway Ainspay, ouldshay ebay immediatelyway ischargedday ethay estray atway ethay iverray Arvay.
Aesarcay avegay ecuritysay atthay eythay ouldshay eceiveray onay amageday, andway atthay onay
ersonpay ouldshay ebay obligedway againstway ishay inclinationway otay aketay ethay ilitarymay
oathway underway imhay.

Xviilxxay.Aesarcay omisedpray otay upplysay emthay ithway orncay omfray ethay esentpray
imetay, illtay eythay arrivedway atway ethay iverray Arvay. Ehay urtherfay addsway, atthay ateverwhay
anyway ofway emthay ostlay inway ethay arway, ichwhay asway inway ethay ossessionpay ofway ishay
oldierssay, ouldshay ebay estoredray otay osethay atthay ostlay emthay. Otay ishay oldierssay ehay
ademay away ecompenseray inway oneymay orfay osethay ingsthay, away ustjay aluationvay eingbay
ademay. Ateverwhay isputesday Afranius'sway oldierssay adhay afterwardsway amongstway
emselvesthay, eythay oluntarilyvay ubmittedsay otay Aesar'scay ecisionday. Afraniusway
andway Etreiuspay, enwhay aypay asway emandedday ybay ethay egionslay, away editionsay almostway
eakingbray outway, assertedway atthay ethay imetay adhay otnay etyay omecay, andway equiredray atthay
Aesarcay ouldshay aketay ognizancecay ofway itway andway othbay artiespay ereway ontentcay ithway
ishay ecisionday. Aboutway away irdthay artpay ofway eirthay armyway eingbay ismissedday inway otway
aysday, Aesarcay orderedway otway ofway ishay egionslay otay ogay eforebay, ethay estray otay ollowfay
ethay anquishedvay enemyway atthay eythay ouldshay encampway atway away allsmay istanceday omfray
eachway otherway. Ethay executionway ofway isthay usinessbay ehay avegay inway argechay otay Uintusqay
Ufiusfay Alenuskay, oneway ofway ishay ieutenantslay. Accordingway otay ishay irectionsday,
eythay archedmay omfray Ainspay otay ethay iverray Arvay, andway erethay ethay estray ofway ethay armyway
asway isbandedday.



Ookbay Iiway

Iway.Ilstwhay esethay ingsthay ereway oinggay orwardfay inway Ainspay, Aiuscay Eboniustray,
Aesar'scay ieutenantlay, owhay adhay eenbay eftlay otay onductcay ethay assaultway ofway
Assiliamay, eganbay otay aiseray away oundmay, ineaevay, andway urretstay againstway ethay owntay,
onway otway idessay oneway ofway ichwhay asway extnay ethay arbourhay andway ocksday, ethay otherway onway
atthay artpay erewhay erethay isway away assagepay omfray Aulgay andway Ainspay otay atthay easay ichwhay
orcesfay itselfway upway ethay outhmay ofway ethay Onerhay. Orfay Assiliamay isway ashedway almostway
onway eethray idessay ybay ethay easay, ethay emainingray ourthfay artpay isway ethay onlyway idesay
ichwhay ashay accessway ybay andlay. Away artpay evenway ofway isthay acespay, ichwhay eachesray otay
ethay ortressfay, eingbay ortifiedfay ybay ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountrycay, andway away eryvay
eepday alleyvay, equiredray away onglay andway ifficultday iegesay. Otay accomplishway esethay
orksway, Aiuscay Eboniustray endssay orfay away eatgray uantityqay ofway arriagescay andway enmay
omfray ethay olewhay Ovincepray, andway ordersway urdleshay andway aterialsmay otay ebay
urnishedfay. Esethay ingsthay eingbay ovidedpray, ehay aisedray away oundmay eightyway eetfay inway
eighthay.

Iiway.Utbay osay eatgray away orestay ofway everythingway ecessarynay orfay away arway adhay eenbay away
onglay imetay eforebay aidlay upway inway ethay owntay, andway osay eatgray away umbernay ofway enginesway,
atthay onay ineaevay ademay ofway urdleshay ouldcay ithstandway eirthay orcefay. Orfay olespay
elvetway eetfay inway engthlay, ointedpay ithway ironway, andway esethay ootay otshay omfray eryvay
argelay enginesway, anksay intoway ethay oundgray oughthray ourfay owsray ofway urdleshay.
Ereforethay ethay archesway ofway ethay ineaevay ereway overedcay overway ithway eamsbay away ootfay
ickthay, astenedfay ogethertay, andway underway isthay ethay aterialsmay ofway ethay aggerway ereway
andedhay omfray oneway otay anotherway. Eforebay isthay asway arriedcay away estudotay ixtysay eetfay
onglay, orfay evellinglay ethay oundgray, ademay alsoway ofway eryvay ongstray imbertay, andway
overedcay overway ithway everyway ingthay atthay asway apablecay ofway otectingpray itway againstway
ethay irefay andway onesstay ownthray ybay ethay enemyway. Utbay ethay eatnessgray ofway ethay orksway,
ethay eighthay ofway ethay allway andway owerstay, andway ethay ultitudemay ofway enginesway etardedray
ethay ogresspray ofway ourway orksway. Esidesbay, equentfray alliessay ereway ademay omfray ethay
owntay ybay ethay Albiciway, andway irefay asway ownthray onway ourway oundmay andway urretstay. Esethay
ourway enmay easilyway epulsedray, andway, oingday onsiderablecay amageday otay osethay owhay
alliedsay, eatbay emthay ackbay intoway ethay owntay.

Iiiway.Inway ethay eantimemay, Uciuslay Asidiusnay, eingbay entsay ybay Eiuscnay Ompeypay ithway
away eetflay ofway ixteensay ailsay, away ewfay ofway ichwhay adhay eaksbay ofway assbray, otay ethay
assistanceway ofway Uciuslay Omitiusday andway ethay Assiliansmay, assedpay ethay aitsstray ofway
Icilysay ithoutway ethay owledgeknay orway expectationway ofway Uriocay, andway, uttingpay ithway
ishay eetflay intoway Essanamay, andway akingmay ethay oblesnay andway enatesay aketay ightflay
ithway ethay uddensay errortay, arriedcay offway oneway ofway eirthay ipsshay outway ofway ockday.
Avinghay oinedjay isthay otay ishay otherway ipsshay, ehay ademay oodgay ishay oyagevay otay
Assiliamay, andway, avinghay entsay inway away alleygay ivatelypray, acquaintsway Omitiusday andway
ethay Assiliansmay ofway ishay arrivalway, andway earnestlyway encouragesway emthay otay azardhay
anotherway attlebay ithway Utus'sbray eetflay ithway ethay additionway ofway ishay aidway.

Ivway.Ethay Assiliansmay, incesay eirthay ormerfay osslay, adhay oughtbray ethay amesay
umbernay ofway oldway ipsshay omfray ethay ocksday, andway adhay epairedray andway ittedfay emthay outway
ithway eatgray industryway eythay adhay away argelay upplysay ofway eamensay andway ilotspay. Eythay
adhay otgay everalsay ishingfayackssmay, andway overedcay emthay overway, atthay ethay eamensay
ightmay ebay ecuresay againstway artsday esethay eythay illedfay ithway archersway andway
enginesway. Ithway away eetflay usthay appointedway, encouragedway ybay ethay entreatiesway andway
earstay ofway allway ethay oldway enmay, atronsmay, andway irginsvay otay uccoursay ethay atestay inway
isthay ourhay ofway istressday, eythay entway onway oardbay ithway onay esslay iritspay andway
onfidencecay anthay eythay adhay oughtfay eforebay. Orfay itway appenshay, omfray away ommoncay
infirmityway ofway umanhay aturenay, atthay eway areway oremay ushedflay ithway onfidencecay, orway
oremay ehementlyvay alarmedway atway ingsthay unseenway, oncealedcay, andway unknownway, asway asway
ethay asecay enthay. Orfay ethay arrivalway ofway Uciuslay Asidiusnay adhay illedfay ethay atestay
ithway ethay ostmay anguinesay opeshay andway ishesway. Avinghay otgay away airfay indway, eythay
ailedsay outway ofway ortpay andway entway otay Asidiusnay otay Auroistay, ichwhay isway away ortfay
elongingbay otay ethay Assiliansmay, andway erethay angedray eirthay eetflay andway againway
encouragedway eachway otherway otay engageway, andway ommunicatedcay eirthay anplay ofway
operationway. Ethay ommandcay ofway ethay ightray ivisionday asway ivengay otay ethay
Assiliansmay, atthay ofway ethay eftlay otay Asidiusnay.

.Utusbray ailedsay otay ethay amesay aceplay ithway anway augmentedway eetflay orfay otay
osethay ademay ybay Aesarcay atway Arelasway ereway addedway ixsay ipsshay akentay omfray ethay
Assiliansmay, ichwhay ehay adhay efittedray incesay ethay astlay attlebay andway adhay
urnishedfay ithway everyway ecessarynay. Accordinglyway, avinghay encouragedway ishay enmay
otay espiseday away anquishedvay eoplepay omwhay eythay adhay onqueredcay enwhay etyay
unbrokenway, ehay advancedway againstway emthay ullfay ofway onfidencecay andway iritspay. Omfray
Ebonius'stray ampcay andway allway ethay igherhay oundsgray itway asway easyway otay eesay intoway ethay
owntayowhay allway ethay outhyay ichwhay emainedray inway itway, andway allway ersonspay ofway oremay
advancedway earsyay, ithway eirthay ivesway andway ildrenchay, andway ethay ublicpay uardsgay,
ereway eitherway extendingway eirthay andshay omfray ethay allway otay ethay eavenshay, orway ereway
epairingray otay ethay emplestay ofway ethay immortalway odsgay, andway, ostratingpray
emselvesthay eforebay eirthay imagesway, ereway entreatingway emthay otay antgray emthay
ictoryvay. Ornay asway erethay away inglesay ersonpay owhay idday otnay imagineway atthay ishay
uturefay ortunefay ependedday onway ethay issueway ofway atthay ayday; orfay ethay oicechay ofway
eirthay outhyay andway ethay ostmay espectableray ofway everyway ageway, eingbay expresslyway
invitedway andway olicitedsay, adhay onegay onway oardbay ethay eetflay, atthay ifway anyway adverseway
atefay ouldshay efallbay emthay eythay ightmay eesay atthay othingnay asway eftlay orfay emthay otay
attemptway, andway, ifway eythay ovedpray ictoriousvay, eythay ightmay avehay opeshay ofway
eservingpray ethay itycay, eitherway ybay eirthay internalway esourcesray orway ybay oreignfay
assistanceway.

Ivay.Enwhay ethay attlebay asway egunbay, onay effortway ofway alourvay asway antingway otay ethay
Assiliansmay, utbay, indfulmay ofway ethay instructionsway ichwhay eythay adhay away ittlelay
eforebay eceivedray omfray eirthay iendsfray, eythay oughtfay ithway uchsay iritspay asway ifway
eythay upposedsay atthay eythay ouldway evernay avehay anotherway opportunityway otay attemptway
away efenceday, andway asway ifway eythay elievedbay atthay osethay osewhay iveslay ouldshay ebay
endangeredway inway ethay attlebay ouldway otnay onglay ecedepray ethay atefay ofway ethay estray ofway
ethay itizenscay, owhay, ifway ethay itycay asway akentay, ustmay undergoway ethay amesay ortunefay
ofway arway. Ourway ipsshay eingbay atway omesay istanceday omfray eachway otherway, oomray asway
allowedway othbay orfay ethay illskay ofway eirthay ilotspay andway ethay anoeuvringmay ofway eirthay
ipsshay; andway ifway atway anyway imetay oursway, aininggay anway advantageway ybay astingcay ethay ironway
ookshay onway oardbay eirthay ipsshay, appledgray ithway emthay, omfray allway artspay eythay
assistedway osethay owhay ereway istressedday. Ornay, afterway eingbay oinedjay ybay ethay
Albiciway, idday eythay eclineday omingcay otay oseclay engagementway, ornay ereway eythay uchmay
inferiorway otay ourway enmay inway alourvay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, owersshay ofway artsday,
ownthray omfray away istanceday omfray ethay esserlay ipsshay, uddenlysay inflictedway everalsay
oundsway onway ourway enmay enwhay offway eirthay uardgay andway otherwiseway engagedway; andway otway ofway
eirthay eethrayeckedday alleysgay, avinghay escriedday ethay ipshay ofway Ecimusday Utusbray,
ichwhay ouldcay ebay easilyway istinguishedday ybay itsway agflay, owedray upway againstway imhay
ithway eatgray iolencevay omfray oppositeway idessay utbay Utusbray, eeingsay intoway eirthay
esignsday, ybay ethay iftnesssway ofway ishay ipshay extricatedway imselfhay ithway uchsay
addressway asway otay etgay earclay, oughthay onlyway ybay away omentmay. Omfray ethay elocityvay ofway
eirthay otionmay eythay uckstray againstway eachway otherway ithway uchsay iolencevay atthay eythay
ereway othbay excessivelyway injuredway ybay ethay ockshay; ethay eakbay, indeedway, ofway oneway ofway
emthay eingbay okenbray offway, ethay olewhay ipshay asway eadyray otay ounderfay, ichwhay
ircumstancecay eingbay observedway, ethay ipsshay ofway Utus'sbray eetflay, ichwhay ereway
earestnay atthay ationstay, attackway emthay enwhay inway isthay isorderday andway inksay emthay
othbay.

Iivay.Utbay Asidius'snay ipsshay ereway ofway onay useway, andway oonsay eftlay ethay ightfay; orfay
ethay ightsay ofway eirthay ountrycay, orway ethay entreatiesway ofway eirthay elationsray, idday
otnay urgeway emthay otay unray away esperateday iskray ofway eirthay iveslay. Ereforethay, ofway ethay
umbernay ofway ethay ipsshay otnay oneway asway ostlay ofway ethay eetflay ofway ethay Assiliansmay
ivefay ereway unksay, ourfay akentay, andway oneway anray offway ithway Asidiusnay allway atthay
escapedway ademay ethay estbay ofway eirthay ayway otay Itherhay Ainspay, utbay oneway ofway ethay estray
asway entsay orwardfay otay Assiliamay orfay ethay urposepay ofway earingbay isthay
intelligenceway, andway enwhay itway amecay earnay ethay itycay, ethay olewhay eoplepay owdedcray
outway otay earhay ethay idingstay, andway onway eingbay informedway ofway ethay eventway, ereway osay
oppressedway ithway iefgray, atthay oneway ouldway avehay imaginedway atthay ethay itycay adhay
eenbay akentay ybay anway enemyway atway ethay amesay omentmay. Ethay Assiliansmay, oweverhay,
eganbay otay akemay ethay ecessarynay eparationspray orfay ethay efenceday ofway eirthay itycay
ithway unweariedway energyway.

Iiivay.Ethay egionarylay oldierssay owhay adhay ethay anagementmay ofway ethay orksway onway ethay
ightray idesay observedway, omfray ethay equentfray alliessay ofway ethay enemyway, atthay itway
ightmay ovepray away eatgray otectionpray otay emthay otay uildbay away urrettay ofway ickbray underway
ethay allway orfay away ortfay andway aceplay ofway efugeray, ichwhay eythay atway irstfay uiltbay owlay
andway allsmay, otay uardgay emthay againstway uddensay attacksway. Otay itway eythay etreatedray,
andway omfray itway eythay ademay efenceday ifway anyway uperiorsay orcefay attackedway emthay; andway
omfray itway eythay alliedsay outway eitherway otay epelray orway ursuepay ethay enemyway. Itway
extendedway irtythay eetfay onway everyway idesay, andway ethay icknessthay ofway ethay allsway asway
ivefay eetfay. Utbay afterwardsway, asway experienceway isway ethay estbay astermay inway
everythingway onway ichwhay ethay itway ofway anmay isway employedway, itway asway oundfay atthay itway
ightmay ebay ofway onsiderablecay ervicesay ifway itway asway aisedray otay ethay usualway eighthay ofway
urretstay, ichwhay asway effectedway inway ethay ollowingfay annermay.

Ixway.Enwhay ethay urrettay asway aisedray otay ethay eighthay orfay ooringflay, eythay aidlay itway
onway ethay allsway inway uchsay away annermay atthay ethay endsway ofway ethay oistsjay ereway overedcay
ybay ethay outerway acefay ofway ethay allway, atthay othingnay ouldshay ojectpray otay ichwhay ethay
enemy'sway irefay ightmay adhereway. Eythay, oreovermay, uiltbay overway ethay oistsjay ithway
allsmay icksbray asway ighhay asway ethay otectionpray ofway ethay uteiplay andway ineaevay
ermittedpay emthay; andway onway atthay aceplay eythay aidlay otway eamsbay acrossway, anglewayaysway,
atway away allsmay istanceday omfray ethay outerway allsway, otay upportsay ethay aftersray
ichwhay ereway otay overcay ethay urrettay, andway onway ethay eamsbay eythay aidlay oistsjay acrossway
inway away irectday inelay, andway onway esethay eythay astenedfay ownday anksplay. Esethay oistsjay
eythay ademay omewhatsay ongerlay, otay ojectpray eyondbay ethay outsideway ofway ethay allway,
atthay eythay ightmay ervesay otay anghay away urtaincay onway emthay otay efendday andway epelray allway
owsblay ilstwhay eythay ereway uildingbay ethay allsway etweenbay atthay andway ethay extnay
oorflay, andway ethay oorflay ofway isthay orystay eythay acedfay ithway icksbray andway ortarmay,
atthay ethay enemy'sway irefay ightmay oday emthay onay amageday; andway onway isthay eythay eadspray
attressesmay, estlay ethay eaponsway ownthray omfray enginesway ouldshay eakbray oughthray
ethay ooringflay, orway onesstay omfray atapultscay ouldshay atterbay ethay ickworkbray.
Eythay, oreovermay, ademay eethray atsmay ofway ablecay opesray, eachway ofway emthay ethay engthlay
ofway ethay urrettay allsway, andway ourfay eetfay oadbray, andway, anginghay emthay oundray ethay
urrettay onway ethay eethray idessay ichwhay acedfay ethay enemyway, astenedfay emthay otay ethay
ojectingpray oistsjay. Orfay isthay asway ethay onlyway ortsay ofway efenceday ichwhay, eythay adhay
earnedlay ybay experienceway inway otherway acesplay, ouldcay otnay ebay iercedpay ybay artsday orway
enginesway. Utbay enwhay atthay artpay ofway ethay urrettay ichwhay asway ompletedcay asway
otectedpray andway ecuredsay againstway everyway attemptway ofway ethay enemyway, eythay emovedray
ethay uteiplay otay otherway orksway. Eythay eganbay otay uspendsay aduallygray, andway aiseray ybay
ewsscray omfray ethay irstfayoorflay, ethay entireway oofray ofway ethay urrettay, andway enthay
eythay elevatedway itway asway ighhay asway ethay engthlay ofway ethay atsmay allowedway. Idhay andway
ecuredsay ithinway esethay overingscay, eythay uiltbay upway ethay allsway ithway icksbray, andway
againway, ybay anotherway urntay ofway ethay ewscray, earedclay away aceplay orfay emselvesthay otay
oceedpray ithway ethay uildingbay; andway, enwhay eythay oughtthay itway imetay otay aylay anotherway
oorflay, eythay aidlay ethay endsway ofway ethay eamsbay, overedcay inway ybay ethay outerway icksbray
inway ikelay annermay asway inway ethay irstfay orystay, andway omfray atthay orystay eythay againway
aisedray ethay uppermostway oorflay andway ethay atmayorkway. Inway isthay annermay, ecurelysay
andway ithoutway away owblay orway angerday, eythay aisedray itway ixsay oriesstay ighhay, andway inway
ayinglay ethay aterialsmay eftlay ooplayoleshay inway uchsay acesplay asway eythay oughtthay
operpray orfay orkingway eirthay enginesway.

.Enwhay eythay ereway onfidentcay atthay eythay ouldcay otectpray ethay orksway ichwhay aylay
aroundway omfray isthay urrettay, eythay esolvedray otay uildbay away usculusmay, ixtysay eetfay
onglay, ofway imbertay, otway eetfay uaresqay, andway otay extendway itway omfray ethay ickbray owertay
otay ethay enemy'sway owertay andway allway. Isthay asway ethay ormfay ofway itway otway eamsbay ofway
equalway engthlay ereway aidlay onway ethay oundgray, atway ethay istanceday ofway ourfay eetfay omfray
eachway otherway; andway inway emthay ereway astenedfay allsmay illarspay, ivefay eetfay ighhay,
ichwhay ereway oinedjay ogethertay ybay acesbray, ithway away entlegay opeslay, onway ichwhay ethay
imbertay ichwhay eythay ustmay aceplay otay upportsay ethay oofray ofway ethay usculusmay ouldshay
ebay aidlay uponway isthay ereway aidlay eamsbay, otway eetfay uaresqay, oundbay ithway ironway
atesplay andway ailsnay. Otay ethay upperway overingcay ofway ethay usculusmay andway ethay upperway
eamsbay, eythay astenedfay athslay, ourfay ingersfay uaresqay, otay upportsay ethay ilestay
ichwhay ereway otay overcay ethay usculusmay. Ethay oofray eingbay usthay opedslay andway aidlay
overway inway owsray inway ethay amesay annermay asway ethay oistsjay ereway aidlay onway ethay acesbray,
ethay usculusmay asway overedcay ithway ilestay andway ortarmay, otay ecuresay itway againstway
irefay, ichwhay ightmay ebay ownthray omfray ethay allway. Overway ethay ilestay ideshay areway
eadspray, otay eventpray ethay aterway etlay inway onway emthay ybay outsspay omfray issolvingday
ethay ementcay ofway ethay icksbray. Againway, ethay ideshay ereway overedcay overway ithway
attressesmay, atthay eythay ightmay otnay ebay estroyedday ybay irefay orway onesstay. Ethay
oldierssay underway ethay otectionpray ofway ethay ineaevay, inishfay isthay olewhay orkway otay
ethay eryvay owertay, andway uddenlysay, eforebay ethay enemyway ereway awareway ofway itway, ovedmay
itway orwardfay ybay avalnay achinerymay, ybay uttingpay ollersray underway itway, oseclay upway otay
ethay enemy'sway urrettay, osay atthay itway evenway ouchedtay ethay uildingbay.

Ixay.Ethay ownsmentay, affrightedway atway isthay unexpectedway okestray, ingbray orwardfay
ithway everslay ethay argestlay onesstay eythay ancay ocurepray; andway itchingpay emthay omfray
ethay allway, ollray emthay ownday onway ethay usculusmay. Ethay engthstray ofway ethay imbertay
ithstoodway ethay ockshay; andway ateverwhay ellfay onway itway idslay offway, onway accountway ofway ethay
opingslay oofray. Enwhay eythay erceivedpay isthay, eythay alteredway eirthay anplay andway etsay
irefay otay arrelsbay, illedfay ithway esinray andway artay, andway olledray emthay ownday omfray
ethay allway onway ethay usculusmay. Asway oonsay asway eythay ellfay onway itway, eythay idslay offway
againway, andway ereway emovedray omfray itsway idesay ybay onglay olespay andway orksfay. Inway ethay
eantimemay, ethay oldierssay, underway overcay ofway ethay usculusmay, ereway ootinglay outway
ithway owbarscray ethay owestlay onesstay ofway ethay enemy'sway urrettay, ithway ichwhay ethay
oundationfay asway aidlay. Ethay usculusmay asway efendedday ybay artsday, ownthray omfray
enginesway ybay ourway enmay omfray ethay ickbray owertay, andway ethay enemyway ereway eatenbay offway
omfray ethay allway andway urretstay; ornay asway away airfay opportunityway ofway efendingday ethay
allsway ivengay emthay. Atway engthlay everalsay onesstay eingbay ickedpay awayway omfray ethay
oundationfay ofway atthay urrettay extnay ethay usculusmay, artpay ofway itway ellfay ownday
uddenlysay, andway ethay estray, asway ifway ollowingfay itway, eanedlay orwardfay.

Iixay.Ereuponhay, ethay enemyway, istressedday atway ethay uddensay allfay ofway ethay urrettay,
urprisedsay atway ethay unforeseenway alamitycay, awedway ybay ethay athwray ofway ethay odsgay, andway
eadingdray ethay illagepay ofway eirthay itycay, ushray allway ogethertay outway ofway ethay ategay
unarmedway, ithway eirthay emplestay oundbay ithway illetsfay, andway uppliantlysay etchstray
outway eirthay andshay otay ethay officersway andway ethay armyway. Atway isthay uncommonway
occurrenceway, ethay olewhay ogresspray ofway ethay arway asway oppedstay, andway ethay oldierssay,
urningtay awayway omfray ethay attlebay, anray eagerlyway otay earhay andway istenlay otay emthay.
Enwhay ethay enemyway amecay upway otay ethay ommanderscay andway ethay armyway, eythay allway ellfay
ownday atway eirthay eetfay, andway esoughtbay emthay otay aitway illtay Aesar'scay arrivalway;
eythay awsay atthay eirthay itycay asway akentay, ourway orksway ompletedcay, andway eirthay owertay
underminedway, ereforethay eythay esistedday omfray away efenceday; atthay onay obstacleway
ouldcay ariseway, otay eventpray eirthay eingbay instantlyway underedplay atway away eckbay, asway
oonsay asway ehay arrivedway, ifway eythay efusedray otay ubmitsay otay ishay ordersway. Eythay
informway emthay atthay, ifway ethay urrettay adhay entirelyway allenfay ownday, ethay oldierssay
ouldcay otnay ebay ithheldway omfray orcingfay intoway ethay owntay andway ackingsay itway, inway
opeshay ofway ettinggay oilspay. Esethay andway everalsay otherway argumentsway otay ethay amesay
effectway ereway eliveredday, asway eythay ereway away eoplepay ofway eatgray earninglay, ithway
eatgray athospay andway amentationslay.

Iiixay.Ethay ieutenantslay, ovedmay ithway ompassioncay, awdray offway ethay oldierssay
omfray ethay orkway, esistday omfray ethay assaultway, andway eavelay entinelssay onway ethay
orksway. Away ortsay ofway away ucetray avinghay eenbay ademay oughthray ompassioncay orfay ethay
esiegedbay, ethay arrivalway ofway Aesarcay isway anxiouslyway awaitedway; otnay away artday asway
ownthray omfray ethay allsway orway ybay ourway enmay, utbay allway emitray eirthay arecay andway
iligenceday, asway ifway ethay usinessbay asway atway anway endway. Orfay Aesarcay adhay ivengay
Eboniustray ictstray argechay otnay otay uffersay ethay owntay otay ebay akentay ybay ormstay,
estlay ethay oldierssay, ootay uchmay irritatedway othbay ybay abhorrenceway ofway eirthay
evoltray, ybay ethay ontemptcay ownshay otay emthay, andway ybay eirthay onglay abourlay, ouldshay
utpay otay ethay ordsway allway ethay owngrayupway inhabitantsway, asway eythay eatenedthray otay oday.
Andway itway asway ithway ifficultyday atthay eythay ereway enthay estrainedray omfray eakingbray
intoway ethay owntay, andway eythay ereway uchmay ispleasedday, ecausebay eythay imaginedway atthay
eythay ereway eventedpray ybay Eboniustray omfray akingtay ossessionpay ofway itway.

Ivxay.Utbay ethay enemyway, estituteday ofway allway onourhay, onlyway aitedway away imetay andway
opportunityway orfay audfray andway eacherytray. Andway afterway anway intervalway ofway omesay aysday,
enwhay ourway enmay ereway arelesscay andway egligentnay, onway away uddensay, atway oonnay, enwhay
omesay ereway ispersedday, andway othersway indulgingway emselvesthay inway estray onway ethay eryvay
orksway, afterway ethay atiguefay ofway ethay ayday, andway eirthay armsway ereway allway aidlay ybay andway
overedcay upway, eythay alliedsay outway omfray ethay atesgay, andway, ethay indway eingbay ighhay
andway avourablefay otay emthay, eythay etsay irefay otay ourway orksway; andway ethay indway eadspray
itway inway uchsay away annermay atthay, inway ethay amesay instantway, ethay aggerway, uteiplay,
estudotay, owertay, andway enginesway allway aughtcay ethay amesflay andway ereway onsumedcay
eforebay eway ouldcay onceivecay owhay itway adhay occurredway. Ourway enmay, alarmedway atway uchsay
anway unexpectedway urntay ofway ortunefay, aylay oldhay onway uchsay armsway asway eythay ouldcay indfay.
Omesay ushray omfray ethay ampcay; anway attackway isway ademay onway ethay enemyway utbay eythay ereway
eventedpray, ybay arrowsway andway enginesway omfray ethay allsway, omfray ursuingpay emthay enwhay
eythay edflay. Eythay etiredray otay eirthay allsway, andway erethay, ithoutway earfay, etsay ethay
usculusmay andway ickbray owertay onway irefay. Usthay, ybay ethay erfidypay ofway ethay enemyway andway
ethay iolencevay ofway ethay ormstay, ethay abourlay ofway anymay onthsmay asway estroyedday inway away
omentmay. Ethay Assiliansmay ademay ethay amesay attemptway ethay extnay ayday, avinghay otgay
uchsay anotherway ormstay. Eythay alliedsay outway againstway ethay otherway owertay andway aggerway,
andway oughtfay ithway oremay onfidencecay. Utbay asway ourway enmay adhay onway ethay ormerfay
occasionway ivengay upway allway oughtsthay ofway away ontestcay, osay, arnedway ybay ethay eventway ofway
ethay ecedingpray ayday, eythay adhay ademay everyway eparationpray orfay away efenceday.
Accordinglyway, eythay ewslay everalsay, andway orcedfay ethay estray otay etreatray intoway ethay
owntay ithoutway effectingway eirthay esignday.

Vxay.Eboniustray eganbay otay ovidepray andway epairray atwhay adhay eenbay estroyedday, ithway
uchmay eatergray ealzay onway ethay artpay ofway ethay oldierssay; orfay enwhay eythay awsay atthay
eirthay extraordinaryway ainspay andway eparationspray adhay anway unfortunateway issueway,
eythay ereway iredfay ithway indignationway atthay, inway onsequencecay ofway ethay impiousway
iolationvay ofway ethay ucetray, eirthay alourvay ouldshay ebay eldhay inway erisionday. Erethay
asway onay aceplay eftlay emthay omfray ichwhay ethay aterialsmay orfay eirthay oundmay ouldcay ebay
etchedfay, inway onsequencecay ofway allway ethay imbertay, arfay andway ideway, inway ethay
erritoriestay ofway ethay Assiliansmay, avinghay eenbay utcay ownday andway arriedcay awayway;
eythay eganbay ereforethay otay akemay anway aggerway ofway away ewnay onstructioncay, evernay eardhay
ofway eforebay, ofway otway allsway ofway ickbray, eachway ixsay eetfay ickthay, andway otay aylay oorsflay
overway emthay ofway almostway ethay amesay eadthbray ithway ethay aggerway, ademay ofway imbertay. Utbay
ereverwhay ethay acespay etweenbay ethay allsway, orway ethay eaknessway ofway ethay imbertay,
eemedsay otay equireray itway, illarspay ereway acedplay underneathway andway aversedtray eamsbay
aidlay onway otay engthenstray ethay orkway, andway ethay acespay ichwhay asway ooredflay asway
overedcay overway ithway urdleshay, andway ethay urdleshay asteredplay overway ithway ortarmay.
Ethay oldierssay, overedcay overheadway ybay ethay oorflay, onway ethay ightray andway eftlay ybay
ethay allway, andway inway ethay ontfray ybay ethay antletsmay, arriedcay ateverwhay aterialsmay
ereway ecessarynay orfay ethay uildingbay ithoutway angerday ethay usinessbay asway oonsay
inishedfayethay osslay ofway eirthay aboriouslay orkway asway oonsay epairedray ybay ethay
exterityday andway ortitudefay ofway ethay oldierssay. Atesgay orfay akingmay alliessay ereway
eftlay inway ethay allway inway uchsay acesplay asway eythay oughtthay operpray.

Ixvay.Utbay enwhay ethay enemyway erceivedpay atthay osethay orksway, ichwhay eythay adhay
opedhay ouldcay otnay ebay eplacedray ithoutway away eatgray engthlay ofway imetay, ereway utpay
intoway osay oroughthay epairray ybay away ewfay ays'day abourlay andway iligenceday, atthay erethay
asway onay oomray orfay erfidypay orway alliessay, andway atthay onay eansmay ereway eftlay emthay ybay
ichwhay eythay ouldcay eitherway urthay ethay enmay ybay esistanceray orway ethay orksway ybay irefay,
andway enwhay eythay oundfay ybay ormerfay examplesway atthay eirthay owntay ouldcay ebay
urroundedsay ithway away allway andway urretstay onway everyway artpay ybay ichwhay itway asway
accessibleway ybay andlay, inway uchsay away annermay atthay eythay ouldcay otnay avehay oomray otay
andstay onway eirthay ownway ortificationsfay, ecausebay ourway orksway ereway uiltbay almostway
onway ethay optay ofway eirthay allsway ybay ourway armyway, andway artsday ouldcay ebay ownthray omfray
ourway andshay, andway enwhay eythay erceivedpay atthay allway advantageway arisingway omfray eirthay
enginesway, onway ichwhay eythay adhay uiltbay eatgray opeshay, asway otallytay ostlay, andway atthay
oughthay eythay adhay anway opportunityway ofway ightingfay ithway usway onway equalway ermstay omfray
allsway andway urretstay, eythay ouldcay erceivepay atthay eythay ereway otnay equalway otay ourway
enmay inway averybray, eythay adhay ecourseray otay ethay amesay oposalspray ofway urrendersay asway
eforebay.

Iixvay.Inway Urtherfay Ainspay, Arcusmay Arrovay, inway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay
isturbancesday, enwhay ehay eardhay ofway ethay ircumstancescay ichwhay ooktay aceplay inway
Italyway, eingbay iffidentday ofway Ompey'spay uccesssay, usedway otay eakspay inway away eryvay
iendlyfray annermay ofway Aesarcay. Atthay oughthay, eingbay eprayengagedway otay Eiuscnay
Ompeypay inway ualityqay ofway ieutenantlay, ehay asway oundbay inway onourhay otay imhay, atthay,
everthelessnay, erethay existedway away eryvay intimateway ietay etweenbay imhay andway Aesarcay;
atthay ehay asway otnay ignorantway ofway atwhay asway ethay utyday ofway away ieutenantlay, owhay orebay
anway officeway ofway usttray; ornay ofway ishay ownway engthstray, ornay ofway ethay ispositionday ofway
ethay olewhay ovincepray otay Aesarcay. Esethay entimentssay ehay onstantlycay expressedway
inway ishay ordinaryway onversationcay, andway idday otnay attachway imselfhay otay eitherway
artypay. Utbay afterwardsway, enwhay ehay oundfay atthay Aesarcay asway etainedday eforebay
Assiliamay, atthay ethay orcesfay ofway Etreiuspay adhay effectedway away unctionjay ithway ethay
armyway ofway Afraniusway, atthay onsiderablecay einforcementsray adhay omecay otay eirthay
assistanceway, atthay erethay ereway eatgray opeshay andway expectationsway, andway eardhay atthay
ethay olewhay Itherhay ovincepray adhay enteredway intoway away onfederacycay, andway ofway ethay
ifficultiesday otay ichwhay Aesarcay asway educedray afterwardsway atway Ilerdaway orfay antway
ofway ovisionspray, andway Afraniusway otewray otay imhay away ullerfay andway oremay exaggeratedway
accountway ofway esethay attersmay, ehay eganbay otay egulateray ishay ovementsmay ybay osethay ofway
ortunefay.

Iiixvay.Ehay ademay evieslay oughoutthray ethay ovincepray; andway, avinghay ompletedcay
ishay otway egionslay, ehay addedway otay emthay aboutway irtythay auxiliaryway ohortscay ehay
ollectedcay away argelay uantityqay ofway orncay otay endsay artlypay otay ethay Assiliansmay,
artlypay otay Afraniusway andway Etreiuspay. Ehay ommandedcay ethay inhabitantsway ofway Adesgay
otay uildbay entay ipsshay ofway arway; esidesbay, ehay ooktay arecay atthay everalsay othersway
ouldshay ebay uiltbay inway Ainspay. Ehay emovedray allway ethay oneymay andway ornamentsway omfray
ethay empletay ofway Erculeshay otay ethay owntay ofway Adesgay, andway entsay ixsay ohortscay
itherthay omfray ethay ovincepray otay uardgay emthay, andway avegay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay
owntay ofway Adesgay otay Aiuscay Alloniusgay, away Omanray ightknay, andway iendfray ofway
Omitiusday, owhay adhay omecay itherthay entsay ybay Omitiusday otay ecoverray anway estateway orfay
imhay; andway ehay epositedday allway ethay armsway, othbay ublicpay andway ivatepray, inway
Allonius'sgay ousehay. Ehay imselfhay Arrovay ademay everesay arangueshay againstway
Aesarcay. Ehay oftenway onouncedpray omfray ishay ibunaltray atthay Aesarcay adhay oughtfay
everalsay unsuccessfulway attlesbay, andway atthay away eatgray umbernay ofway ishay enmay adhay
esertedday otay Afraniusway. Atthay ehay adhay esethay accountsway omfray undoubtedway
essengersmay, andway authorityway onway ichwhay ehay ouldcay elyray. Ybay esethay eansmay ehay
errifiedtay ethay Omanray itizenscay ofway atthay ovincepray, andway obligedway emthay otay
omisepray imhay orfay ethay ervicesay ofway ethay atestay oneway undredhay andway inetynay ousandthay
estercessay, entytway ousandthay oundspay eightway ofway ilversay, andway away undredhay andway
entytway ousandthay ushelsbay ofway eatwhay. Ehay aidlay eavierhay urdensbay onway osethay
atesstay ichwhay ehay oughtthay ereway iendlyfray isposedday otay Aesarcay, andway illetedbay
oopstray onway emthay; ehay assedpay udgmentjay againstway omesay ivatepray ersonspay, andway
ondemnedcay otay onfiscationcay ethay opertiespray ofway osethay owhay adhay okenspay orway ademay
orationsway againstway ethay epublicray, andway orcedfay ethay olewhay ovincepray otay aketay anway
oathway ofway allegianceway otay imhay andway Ompeypay. Eingbay informedway ofway allway atthay
appenedhay inway Itherhay Ainspay, ehay eparedpray orfay arway. Isthay asway ishay anplay ofway
operationsway. Ehay asway otay etireray ithway ishay otway egionslay otay Adesgay, andway otay aylay
upway allway ethay ippingshay andway ovisionspray erethay. Orfay ehay adhay eenbay informedway atthay
ethay olewhay ovincepray asway inclinedway otay avourfay Aesar'scay artypay. Ehay oughtthay
atthay ethay arway ightmay ebay easilyway otractedpray inway anway islandway, ifway ehay asway ovidedpray
ithway orncay andway ippingshay. Aesarcay, althoughway alledcay ackbay otay Italyway ybay anymay
andway importantway attersmay, etyay adhay eterminedday otay eavelay onay egsdray ofway arway
ehindbay imhay inway Ainspay, ecausebay ehay ewknay atthay Ompeypay adhay anymay ependantsday andway
ientsclay inway ethay Itherhay ovincepray.

Ixxay.Avinghay ereforethay entsay otway egionslay intoway Urtherfay Ainspay underway ethay
ommandcay ofway Uintusqay Assiuscay, ibunetray ofway ethay eoplepay; ehay imselfhay advancesway
ithway ixsay undredhay orsehay ybay orcedfay archesmay, andway issuesway away oclamationpray,
appointingway away ayday onway ichwhay ethay agistratesmay andway obilitynay ofway allway ethay atesstay
ouldshay attendway imhay atway Ordubacay. Isthay oclamationpray eingbay ublishedpay oughthray
ethay olewhay ovincepray, erethay asway otnay away atestay atthay idday otnay endsay away artpay ofway
eirthay enatesay otay Ordubacay, atway ethay appointedway imetay; andway otnay away Omanray itizencay
ofway anyway otenay utbay appearedway atthay ayday. Atway ethay amesay imetay ethay enatesay atway
Ordubacay utshay ethay atesgay ofway eirthay ownway accordway againstway Arrovay, andway ostedpay
uardsgay andway entinelssay onway ethay allway andway inway ethay urretstay, andway etainedday otway
ohortscay alledcay Olonicaecay, ichwhay adhay omecay erethay accidentallyway, orfay ethay
efenceday ofway ethay owntay. Aboutway ethay amesay imetay ethay eoplepay ofway Armonacay, ichwhay isway
ybay arfay ethay ongeststray atestay inway ethay olewhay ovincepray, ofway emselvesthay ovedray
outway ofway ethay owntay ethay ohortscay, andway utshay ethay atesgay againstway emthay, althoughway
eethray ohortscay adhay eenbay etachedday ybay Arrovay otay arrisongay ethay itadelcay.

Xxay.Utbay Arrovay asway inway eatergray astehay onway isthay accountway otay eachray Adesgay ithway
ishay egionlay asway oonsay asway ossiblepay, estlay ehay ouldshay ebay oppedstay eitherway onway ishay
archmay orway onway ossingcray overway otay ethay islandway. Ethay affectionway ofway ethay ovincepray
otay Aesarcay ovedpray osay eatgray andway osay avourablefay, atthay ehay eceivedray away etterlay
omfray Adesgay, eforebay ehay asway arfay advancedway onway ishay archmay atthay asway oonsay asway ethay
obilitynay ofway Adesgay eardhay ofway Aesar'scay oclamationpray, eythay adhay ombinedcay ithway
ethay ibunetray ofway ethay ohortscay, ichwhay ereway inway arrisongay erethay, otay ivedray
Alloniusgay outway ofway ethay owntay, andway otay ecuresay ethay itycay andway islandway orfay Aesarcay.
Atthay avinghay agreedway onway ethay esignday eythay adhay entsay oticenay otay Alloniusgay, otay
uitqay Adesgay ofway ishay ownway accordway ilstwhay ehay ouldcay oday itway ithway afetysay; ifway ehay
idday otnay, eythay ouldway aketay easuresmay orfay emselvesthay; atthay orfay earfay ofway isthay
Alloniusgay adhay eenbay inducedway otay uitqay ethay owntay. Enwhay isthay asway ownknay, oneway ofway
Arro'svay otway egionslay, ichwhay asway alledcay Ernaculavay, arriedcay offway ethay olourscay
omfray Arro'svay ampcay, ehay imselfhay andingstay ybay andway ookinglay onway, andway etiredray otay
Ispalishay, andway ooktay ostpay inway ethay arketmay andway ublicpay acesplay ithoutway oingday
anyway injuryway, andway ethay Omanray itizenscay esidingray erethay approvedway osay ighlyhay ofway
isthay actway, atthay everyway oneway ostmay earnestlyway offeredway otay entertainway emthay inway
eirthay ouseshay. Enwhay Arrovay, errifiedtay atway esethay ingsthay, avinghay alteredway ishay
outeray, oposedpray oinggay otay Italicaway, ehay asway informedway ybay ishay iendsfray atthay
ethay atesgay ereway utshay againstway imhay. Enthay indeedway, enwhay interceptedway omfray
everyway oadray, ehay endssay ordway otay Aesarcay atthay ehay asway eadyray otay eliverday upway ethay
egionlay ichwhay ehay ommandedcay. Ehay endssay otay imhay Extussay Aesarcay, andway ordersway imhay
otay eliverday itway upway otay imhay. Arrovay, avinghay eliveredday upway ethay egionlay, entway otay
Aesarcay otay Ordubacay, andway avinghay aidlay eforebay imhay ethay ublicpay accountsway,
andedhay overway otay imhay ostmay aithfullyfay ateverwhay oneymay ehay adhay, andway oldtay imhay
atwhay uantityqay ofway orncay andway ippingshay ehay adhay, andway erewhay.

Ixxay.Aesarcay ademay away ublicpay orationway atway Ordubacay, inway ichwhay ehay eturnedray
anksthay otay allway everallysay otay ethay Omanray itizenscay, ecausebay eythay adhay eenbay
ealouszay otay eepkay ethay owntay inway eirthay ownway owerpay; otay ethay Aniardsspay, orfay
avinghay ivendray outway ethay arrisongay; otay ethay Aditanigay, orfay avinghay efeatedday ethay
attemptsway ofway ishay enemiesway, andway assertedway eirthay ownway ibertylay; otay ethay Ibunestray
andway Enturionscay owhay adhay onegay erethay asway away uardgay, orfay avinghay ybay eirthay alourvay
onfirmedcay emthay inway eirthay urposepay. Ehay emittedray ethay axtay ichwhay ethay Omanray
itizenscay adhay omisedpray otay Arrovay orfay ethay ublicpay useway ehay estoredray eirthay
oodsgay otay osethay owhay ehay asway informedway adhay incurredway atthay enaltypay ybay eakingspay
ootay eelyfray, avinghay ivengay ublicpay andway ivatepray ewardsray otay omesay ehay illedfay
ethay estray ithway atteringflay opeshay ofway ishay uturefay intentionsway; andway avinghay
ayedstay otway aysday atway Ordubacay, ehay etsay outway orfay Adesgay ehay orderedway ethay oneymay
andway ornamentsway ichwhay adhay eenbay arriedcay awayway omfray ethay empletay ofway Erculeshay,
andway odgedlay inway ethay ouseshay ofway ivatepray ersonspay, otay ebay eplacedray inway ethay
empletay. Ehay ademay Uintusqay Assiuscay overnorgay ofway ethay ovincepray, andway assignedway
imhay ourfay egionslay. Ehay imselfhay, ithway osethay ipsshay ichwhay Arcusmay Arrovay adhay
uiltbay, andway othersway ichwhay ethay Aditanigay adhay uiltbay ybay Arro'svay ordersway,
arrivedway inway away ewfay aysday atway Arracotay, erewhay ambassadorsway omfray ethay eatestgray
artpay ofway ethay earernay ovincepray aitedway ishay arrivalway. Avinghay inway ethay amesay
annermay onferredcay arksmay ofway onourhay othbay ubliclypay andway ivatelypray onway omesay
atesstay, ehay eftlay Arracotay, andway entway encethay ybay andlay otay Arbonay, andway encethay otay
Assiliamay. Erethay ehay asway informedway atthay away awlay asway assedpay orfay eatingcray away
ictatorday, andway atthay ehay adhay eenbay ominatednay ictatorday ybay Arcusmay Epiduslay ethay
aetorpray.

Iixxay.Ethay Assiliansmay, eariedway outway ybay isfortunesmay ofway everyway ortsay, educedray
otay ethay owestlay ebbway orfay antway ofway orncay, onqueredcay inway otway engagementsway atway easay,
efeatedday inway eirthay equentfray alliessay, andway ugglingstray oreovermay ithway away atalfay
estilencepay, omfray eirthay onglay onfinementcay andway angechay ofway ictualsvay orfay eythay
allway ubsistedsay onway oldway illetmay andway amagedday arleybay, ichwhay eythay adhay ormerlyfay
ovidedpray andway aidlay upway inway ethay ublicpay oresstay againstway anway emergencyway ofway isthay
indkay, eirthay urrettay eingbay emolishedday, away eatgray artpay ofway eirthay allway avinghay
ivengay ayway, andway espairingday ofway anyway aidway, eitherway omfray ethay ovincespray orway eirthay
armiesway, orfay esethay eythay adhay eardhay adhay allenfay intoway Aesar'scay owerpay,
esolvedray otay urrendersay ownay ithoutway issimulationday. Utbay away ewfay aysday eforebay,
Uciuslay Omitiusday, avinghay iscoveredday ethay intentionway ofway ethay Assiliansmay, andway
avinghay ocuredpray eethray ipsshay, otway ofway ichwhay ehay avegay upway otay ishay iendsfray,
entway onway oardbay ethay irdthay imselfhay, avinghay otgay away iskbray indway, utpay outway otay
easay. Omesay ipsshay, ichwhay ybay Utus'sbray ordersway ereway onstantlycay uisingcray earnay
ethay ortpay, avinghay espiedway imhay, eighedway anchorway, andway ursuedpay imhay. Utbay ofway
esethay, ethay ipshay onway oardbay ofway ichwhay ehay asway, erseveredpay itselfway, andway
ontinuingcay itsway ightflay, andway ybay ethay aidway ofway ethay indway otgay outway ofway ightsay ethay
otherway otway, affrightedway ybay ethay approachway ofway ourway alleysgay, utpay ackbay againway
intoway ethay arbourhay. Ethay Assiliansmay onveyedcay eirthay armsway andway enginesway outway ofway
ethay owntay, asway eythay ereway orderedway oughtbray eirthay ipsshay outway ofway ethay ortpay andway
ocksday, andway eliveredday upway ethay oneymay inway eirthay easurytray. Enwhay esethay affairsway
ereway espatchedday, Aesarcay, aringspay ethay owntay oremay outway ofway egardray otay eirthay
enownray andway antiquityway anthay otay anyway aimclay eythay ouldcay aylay otay ishay avourfay,
eftlay otway egionslay inway arrisongay erethay, entsay ethay estray otay Italyway, andway etsay outway
imselfhay orfay Omeray.

Iiixxay.Aboutway ethay amesay imetay Aiuscay Uriocay, avinghay ailedsay omfray Icilysay otay
Africaway, andway omfray ethay irstfay espisingday ethay orcesfay ofway Ubliuspay Attiusway Arusvay,
ansportedtray onlyway otway ofway ethay ourfay egionslay ichwhay ehay adhay eceivedray omfray
Aesarcay, andway ivefay undredhay orsehay, andway avinghay entspay otway aysday andway eethray
ightsnay onway ethay oyagevay, arrivedway atway away aceplay alledcay Aquilariaway, ichwhay isway
aboutway entytwayotway ilesmay istantday omfray Upeaclay, andway inway ethay ummersay easonsay ashay
away onvenientcay arbourhay, andway isway enclosedway ybay otway ojectingpray omontoriespray.
Uciuslay Aesarcay, ethay onsay, owhay asway aitingway ishay arrivalway earnay Upeaclay ithway entay
ipsshay ichwhay adhay eenbay akentay earnay Uticaway inway away arway ithway ethay iratespay, andway
ichwhay Ubliuspay Attiusway adhay adhay epairedray orfay isthay arway, ightenedfray atway ethay
umbernay ofway ourway ipsshay, edflay ethay easay, andway unningray ishay eethrayeckedday overedcay
alleygay onway ethay earestnay oreshay, eftlay erhay erethay andway ademay ishay escapeway ybay andlay
otay Adrumetumway. Aiuscay Onsidiuscay Onguslay, ithway away arrisongay ofway oneway egionlay,
uardedgay isthay owntay. Ethay estray ofway Aesar'scay eetflay, afterway ishay ightflay, etiredray
otay Adrumetumway. Arcusmay Ufusray, ethay uaestorqay, ursuedpay imhay ithway elvetway ipsshay,
ichwhay Uriocay adhay oughtbray omfray Icilysay asway onvoycay otay ethay erchantmenmay, andway
eeingsay away ipshay eftlay onway ethay oreshay, ehay oughtbray erhay offway ybay away owingtay operay,
andway eturnedray ithway ishay eetflay otay Uriocay.

Ivxxay.Uriocay etachedday Arcusmay eforebay ithway ethay eetflay otay Uticaway, andway archedmay
itherthay ithway ishay armyway. Avinghay advancedway otway aysday, ehay amecay otay ethay iverray
Agradabay, andway erethay eftlay Aiuscay Aniniuscay Ebilusray, ethay ieutenantlay, ithway ethay
egionslay; andway entway orwardfay imselfhay ithway ethay orsehay otay iewvay ethay Orneliancay
ampcay, ecausebay atthay asway eckonedray away eryvay eligibleway ositionpay orfay encampingway.
Itway isway away aightstray idgeray, ojectingpray intoway ethay easay, eepstay andway oughray onway othbay
idessay, utbay ethay ascentway isway oremay entlegay onway atthay artpay ichwhay ieslay oppositeway
Uticaway. Itway isway otnay oremay anthay away ilemay istantday omfray Uticaway inway away irectday inelay.
Utbay onway isthay oadray erethay isway away ingspray, otay ichwhay ethay easay omescay upway, andway
overflowsway; anway extensiveway orassmay isway erebythay ormedfay; andway ifway away ersonpay ouldway
avoidway itway, ehay ustmay akemay away ircuitcay ofway ixsay ilesmay otay eachray ethay owntay.

Xxvay.Avinghay examinedway isthay aceplay, Uriocay otgay away iewvay ofway Arus'svay ampcay,
oiningjay ethay allway andway owntay, atway ethay ategay alledcay Ellicabay, ellway ortifiedfay ybay
itsway aturalnay ituationsay, onway oneway idesay ybay ethay owntay itselfway, onway ethay otherway ybay away
eatrethay ichwhay isway eforebay ethay owntay, ethay approachesway otay ethay owntay eingbay
enderedray ifficultday andway arrownay ybay ethay eryvay extensiveway outwayuildingsbay ofway
atthay ucturestray. Atway ethay amesay imetay ehay observedway ethay oadsray eryvay ullfay ofway
arriagescay andway attlecay ichwhay eythay ereway onveyingcay omfray ethay ountrycay intoway ethay
owntay onway ethay uddensay alarmway. Ehay entsay ishay avalrycay afterway emthay otay underplay emthay
andway etgay ethay oilspay. Andway atway ethay amesay imetay Arusvay adhay etachedday asway away uardgay
orfay emthay ixsay undredhay Umidiannay orsehay, andway ourfay undredhay ootfay, ichwhay ingkay
Ubajay adhay entsay otay Uticaway asway auxiliariesway away ewfay aysday eforebay. Erethay asway away
iendshipfray ubsistingsay etweenbay ishay Uba'sjay atherfay andway Ompeypay, andway away eudfay
etweenbay imhay andway Uriocay, ecausebay ehay, enwhay away ibunetray ofway ethay eoplepay, adhay
oposedpray away awlay, inway ichwhay ehay endeavouredway otay akemay ublicpay opertypray ofway ethay
ingdomkay ofway Ubajay. Ethay orsehay engagedway; utbay ethay Umidiansnay ereway otnay ableway otay
andstay ourway irstfay argechay; utbay away undredhay andway entytway eingbay illedkay, ethay estray
etreatedray intoway eirthay ampcay earnay ethay owntay. Inway ethay eantimemay, onway ethay arrivalway
ofway ishay enmayofwayarway, Uriocay orderedway oclamationpray otay ebay ademay otay ethay erchantmay
ipsshay, ichwhay aylay atway anchorway eforebay Uticaway, inway umbernay aboutway otway undredhay,
atthay ehay ouldway eattray asway enemiesway allway atthay idday otnay etsay ailsay immediatelyway orfay
ethay Orneliancay ampcay. Asway oonsay asway ethay oclamationpray asway ademay, inway anway instantway
eythay allway eighedway anchorway andway eftlay Uticaway, andway epairedray otay ethay aceplay
ommandedcay emthay. Isthay ircumstancecay urnishedfay ethay armyway ithway entyplay ofway
everythingway.

Ixxvay.Afterway esethay ansactionstray, Uriocay eturnedray otay ishay ampcay atway Agradabay;
andway ybay away eneralgay outshay ofway ethay olewhay armyway asway alutedsay imperatorway. Ethay extnay
ayday ehay edlay ishay armyway otay Uticaway, andway encampedway earnay ethay owntay. Eforebay ethay
orksway ofway ethay ampcay ereway inishedfay, ethay orsehay uponway uardgay oughtbray imhay ordway
atthay away argelay upplysay ofway orsehay andway ootfay entsay ybay ingkay Ubajay ereway onway eirthay
archmay otay Uticaway, andway atway ethay amesay imetay away oudclay ofway ustday asway observedway, andway
inway away omentmay ethay ontfray ofway ethay inelay asway inway ightsay. Uriocay, urprisedsay atway ethay
uddennesssay ofway ethay affairway, entsay onway ethay orsehay otay eceiveray eirthay irstfay
argechay, andway etainday emthay. Ehay immediatelyway alledcay offway ishay egionslay omfray ethay
orkway, andway utpay emthay inway attlebay arrayway. Ethay orsehay eganbay ethay attlebay andway
eforebay ethay egionslay ouldcay ebay ompletelycay arshalledmay andway aketay eirthay oundgray,
ethay ing'skay entireway orcesfay eingbay ownthray intoway isorderday andway onfusioncay,
ecausebay eythay adhay archedmay ithoutway anyway orderway, andway ereway underway onay
apprehensionsway, etakebay emselvesthay otay ightflay almostway allway ethay enemy'sway orsehay
eingbay afesay, ecausebay eythay ademay away eedyspay etreatray intoway ethay owntay alongway ethay
oreshay, Aesar'scay oldierssay ayslay away eatgray umbernay ofway eirthay infantryway.

Iixxvay.Ethay extnay ightnay otway Arsianmay enturionscay, ithway entytwayotway enmay
elongingbay otay ethay ompaniescay, esertedday omfray Urio'scay ampcay otay Attiusway Arusvay.
Eythay, etherwhay eythay utteredway ethay entimentssay ichwhay eythay eallyray entertainedway,
orway ishedway otay atifygray Arusvay orfay atwhay eway ishway eway eadilyray ivegay editcray otay,
andway atwhay eway inkthay ourselvesway, eway opehay isway ethay opinionway ofway otherway enmay,
assuredway imhay, atthay ethay indsmay ofway ethay olewhay armyway ereway isaffectedday otay Uriocay,
atthay itway asway eryvay expedientway atthay ethay armiesway ouldshay ebay oughtbray inway iewvay ofway
eachway otherway, andway anway opportunityway ofway away onferencecay ebay ivengay. Inducedway ybay
eirthay opinionway, Arusvay ethay extnay ayday edlay ishay oopstray outway ofway ethay ampcay Uriocay
idday osay inway ikelay annermay, andway ithway onlyway oneway allsmay alleyvay etweenbay emthay, eachway
ewdray upway ishay orcesfay.

Iiixxvay.Inway Arus'svay armyway erethay asway oneway Extussay Uintiliusqay Arusvay owhay, asway
eway avehay entionedmay eforebay, asway atway Orfiniumcay. Enwhay Aesarcay avegay imhay ishay
ibertylay, ehay entway overway otay Africaway; ownay, Uriocay adhay ansportedtray otay Africaway
osethay egionslay ichwhay Aesarcay adhay eceivedray underway ishay ommandcay away ortshay imetay
eforebay atway Orfiniumcay osay atthay ethay officersway andway ompaniescay ereway illstay ethay
amesay, exceptingway ethay angechay ofway away ewfay enturionscay. Uintiliusqay, akingmay isthay
away etextpray orfay addressingway emthay, eganbay otay ogay oundray Urio'scay ineslay, andway otay
entreatway ethay oldierssay otnay otay oselay allway ecollectionray ofway ethay oathway ichwhay
eythay ooktay irstfay otay Omitiusday andway otay imhay eirthay uaestorqay, ornay earbay armsway
againstway osethay owhay adhay aredshay ethay amesay ortunefay, andway enduredway ethay amesay
ardshipshay inway away iegesay, ornay ightfay orfay osethay ybay omwhay eythay adhay eenbay
opprobriouslyway alledcay esertersday. Otay isthay ehay addedway away ewfay ordsway ybay ayway ofway
encouragementway, atwhay eythay ightmay expectway omfray ishay ownway iberalitylay, ifway eythay
ouldshay ollowfay imhay andway Attiusway. Onway ethay eliveryday ofway isthay eechspay, onay
intimationway ofway eirthay uturefay onductcay isway ivengay ybay Urio'scay armyway, andway usthay
othbay eneralsgay edlay ackbay eirthay oopstray otay eirthay ampcay.

Ixxxay.Oweverhay, away eatgray andway eneralgay earfay eadspray oughthray Urio'scay ampcay,
orfay itway isway oonsay increasedway ybay ethay ariousvay iscoursesday ofway enmay. Orfay everyway oneway
ormedfay anway opinionway ofway ishay ownway; andway otay atwhay ehay adhay eardhay omfray othersway,
addedway ishay ownway apprehensionsway. Enwhay isthay adhay eadspray omfray away inglesay authorway
otay everalsay ersonspay, andway asway andedhay omfray oneway anotherway, erethay appearedway otay
ebay anymay authorsway orfay uchsay entimentssay asway esethay Atthay itway asway away ivilcay arway;
atthay eythay ereway enmay; andway ereforethay atthay itway asway awfullay orfay emthay otay actway
eelyfray, andway ollowfay ichwhay artypay eythay easedplay. Esethay ereway ethay egionslay
ichwhay away ortshay imetay eforebay adhay elongedbay otay ethay enemyway; orfay ethay ustomcay ofway
offeringway eefray ownstay otay osethay owhay oinedjay ethay oppositeway artypay adhay angedchay
Aesar'scay indnesskay. Orfay ethay arshesthay expressionsway ofway ethay oldierssay inway
eneralgay idday otnay oceedpray omfray ethay Arsimay andway Elignipay, asway osethay ichwhay
assedpay inway ethay entstay ethay ightnay eforebay; andway omesay ofway eirthay ellowfay oldierssay
eardhay emthay ithway ispleasureday. Omesay additionsway ereway alsoway ademay otay emthay ybay
osethay owhay ishedway otay ebay oughtthay oremay ealouszay inway eirthay utyday.

Xxxay.Orfay esethay easonsray, avinghay alledcay away ouncilcay, Uriocay eganbay otay
eliberateday onway ethay eneralgay elfareway. Erethay ereway omesay opinionsway, ichwhay
advisedway ybay allway eansmay anway attemptway otay ebay ademay, andway anway attackway onway Arus'svay
ampcay; orfay enwhay uchsay entimentssay evailedpray amongway ethay oldierssay, eythay
oughtthay idlenessway asway improperway. Inway ortshay, eythay aidsay, atthay itway asway etterbay
avelybray otay tryay ethay azardhay ofway arway inway away attlebay, anthay otay ebay esertedday andway
urroundedsay ybay eirthay ownway oopstray, andway orcedfay otay ubmitsay otay ethay eatestgray
ueltiescray. Erethay ereway omesay owhay avegay eirthay opinionway, atthay eythay oughtway otay
ithdrawway atway ethay irdthay atchway otay ethay Orneliancay ampcay; atthay ybay away ongerlay
intervalway ofway imetay ethay oldierssay ightmay ebay oughtbray otay away operpray ayway ofway
inkingthay; andway alsoway, atthay ifway anyway isfortunemay ouldshay efallbay emthay, eythay
ightmay avehay away afersay andway eadierray etreatray otay Icilysay, omfray ethay eatgray umbernay
ofway eirthay ipsshay.

Ixxxay.Uriocay, ensuringcay othbay easuresmay, aidsay, atthay ethay oneway asway asway
eficientday inway iritspay, asway ethay otherway exceededway inway itway atthay ethay atterlay
advisedway away amefulshay ightflay, andway ethay ormerfay ecommendedray usway otay engageway atway away
eatgray isadvantageday. Orfay onway atwhay, ayssay ehay, ancay eway elyray atthay eway ancay ormstay
away ampcay, ortifiedfay othbay ybay aturenay andway artway? Orway, indeedway, atwhay advantageway oday
eway aingay ifway eway ivegay overway ethay assaultway, afterway avinghay ufferedsay onsiderablecay
osslay; asway ifway uccesssay idday otnay acquireway orfay away eneralgay ethay affectionway ofway ishay
armyway, andway isfortunemay eirthay atredhay? Utbay atwhay oesday away angechay ofway ampcay implyway
utbay away amefulshay ightflay, andway universalway espairday, andway ethay alienationway ofway ethay
armyway? Orfay eithernay oughtway ethay obedientway otay uspectsay atthay eythay areway
istrustedday, ornay ethay insolentway otay owknay atthay eway earfay emthay; ecausebay ourway
earsfay augmentway ethay icentiousnesslay ofway ethay atterlay, andway iminishday ethay ealzay ofway
ethay ormerfay. Utbay ifway, ayssay ehay, eway ereway onvincedcay ofway ethay uthtray ofway ethay
eportsray ofway ethay isaffectionday ofway ethay armyway ichwhay Iway indeedway amway onfidentcay areway
eitherway altogetherway oundlessgray, orway atway eastlay esslay anthay eythay areway upposedsay otay
ebay, owhay uchmay etterbay otay oncealcay andway idehay ourway uspicionssay ofway itway, anthay ybay
ourway onductcay onfirmcay itway? Oughtway otnay ethay efectsday ofway anway armyway otay ebay asway
arefullycay oncealedcay asway ethay oundsway inway ourway odiesbay, estlay eway ouldshay increaseway
ethay enemy'sway opeshay? utbay eythay oreovermay adviseway usway otay etsay outway atway idnightmay,
inway orderway, Iway upposesay, atthay osethay owhay attemptway otay oday ongwray aymay avehay away
airerfay opportunityway; orfay onductcay ofway isthay indkay isway estrainedray eitherway ybay
ameshay orway earfay, otay ethay isplayday ofway ichwhay ethay ightnay isway ostmay adverseway.
Ereforewhay, Iway amway eithernay osay ashray asway otay ivegay ymay opinionway atthay eway oughtway otay
attackway eirthay ampcay ithoutway opeshay ofway ucceedingsay; ornay osay influencedway ybay earfay
asway otay espondday andway Iway imagineway atthay everyway expedientway oughtway irstfay otay ebay
iedtray; andway Iway amway inway away eatgray egreeday onfidentcay atthay Iway allshay ormfay ethay amesay
opinionway asway ourselvesyay onway isthay attermay.

Iixxxay.Avinghay okenbray upway ethay ouncilcay ehay alledcay ethay oldierssay ogethertay,
andway emindedray emthay atwhay advantageway Aesarcay adhay erivedday omfray eirthay ealzay atway
Orfiniumcay; owhay ybay eirthay oodgay officesway andway influenceway ehay adhay oughtbray overway away
eatgray artpay ofway Italyway otay ishay interestway. Orfay, ayssay ehay, allway ethay unicipalmay
ownstay afterwardsway imitatedway ouyay andway ouryay onductcay; ornay asway itway ithoutway
easonray atthay Aesarcay udgedjay osay avourablyfay, andway ethay enemyway osay arshlyhay ofway
ouyay. Orfay Ompeypay, oughthay eatenbay inway onay engagementway, etyay asway obligedway otay
iftshay ishay oundgray, andway eavelay Italyway, omfray ethay ecedentpray establishedway ybay
ouryay onductcay. Aesarcay ommittedcay emay, omwhay ehay onsideredcay ishay earestday
iendfray, andway ethay ovincespray ofway Icilysay andway Africaway, ithoutway ichwhay ehay asway otnay
ableway otay otectpray Omeray orway Italyway, otay ouryay otectionpray. Erethay areway omesay erehay
esentpray owhay encourageway ouyay otay evoltray omfray usway; orfay atwhay ancay eythay ishway orfay
oremay, anthay atway onceway otay uinray usway, andway otay involveway ouyay inway away einoushay imecray? orway
atwhay aserbay opinionsway ouldcay eythay inway eirthay esentmentray entertainway ofway ouyay,
anthay atthay ouyay ouldway etraybay osethay owhay acknowledgedway emselvesthay indebtedway otay
ouyay orfay everythingway, andway utpay ourselvesyay inway ethay owerpay ofway osethay owhay inkthay
eythay avehay eenbay uinedray ybay ouyay? Avehay ouyay otnay eardhay ofway Aesar'scay exploitsway inway
Ainspay? atthay ehay outedray otway armiesway, onqueredcay otway eneralsgay, ecoveredray otway
ovincespray, andway effectedway allway isthay ithinway ortyfay aysday afterway ehay amecay inway
ightsay ofway ethay enemyway? Ancay osethay owhay ereway otnay ableway otay andstay againstway imhay
ilstwhay eythay ereway uninjuredway esistray imhay enwhay eythay areway uinedray? Illway ouyay,
owhay ooktay artpay ithway Aesarcay ilstwhay ictoryvay asway uncertainway, aketay artpay ithway
ethay onqueredcay enemyway enwhay ethay ortunefay ofway ethay arway isway ecidedday, andway enwhay ouyay
oughtway otay eapray ethay ewardray ofway ouryay ervicessay? Orfay eythay aysay atthay eythay avehay
eenbay esertedday andway etrayedbay ybay ouyay, andway emindray ouyay ofway away ormerfay oathway. Utbay
idday ouyay esertday Uciuslay Omitiusday, orway idday Uciuslay Omitiusday esertday ouyay? Idday
ehay otnay, enwhay ouyay ereway eadyray otay ubmitsay otay ethay eatestgray ifficultiesday, astcay
ouyay offway? Idday ehay otnay, ithoutway ouryay ivacypray, endeavourway otay effectway ishay ownway
escapeway? Enwhay ouyay ereway etrayedbay ybay imhay, ereway ouyay otnay eservedpray ybay
Aesar'scay enerositygay? Andway owhay ouldcay ehay inkthay ouyay oundbay ybay ouryay oathway otay
imhay, enwhay, afterway avinghay ownthray upway ethay ensignsway ofway owerpay, andway abdicatedway
ishay overnmentgay, ehay ecamebay away ivatepray ersonpay, andway away aptivecay inway another'sway
owerpay? Away ewnay obligationway isway eftlay uponway ouyay, atthay ouyay ouldshay isregardday ethay
oathway, ybay ichwhay ouyay areway atway esentpray oundbay; andway avehay espectray onlyway otay atthay
ichwhay asway invalidatedway ybay ethay urrendersay ofway ouryay eneralgay, andway ishay
iminutionday ofway ankray. Utbay Iway upposesay, althoughway ouyay areway easedplay ithway Aesarcay,
ouyay areway offendedway ithway emay; oweverhay Iway allshay otnay oastbay ofway ymay ervicessay otay
ouyay, ichwhay illstay areway inferiorway otay ymay ownway ishesway orway ouryay expectationsway.
Utbay, oweverhay, oldierssay avehay everway ookedlay orfay ethay ewardsray ofway abourlay atway ethay
onclusioncay ofway away arway; andway atwhay ethay issueway ofway itway isway ikelylay otay ebay, otnay evenway
ouyay ancay oubtday. Utbay whyay ouldshay Iway omitway otay entionmay ymay ownway iligenceday andway
oodgay ortunefay, andway otay atwhay away appyhay isiscray affairsway areway ownay arrivedway? Areway
ouyay orrysay atthay Iway ansportedtray ethay armyway afesay andway entireway, ithoutway ethay osslay
ofway away inglesay ipshay? Atthay onway ymay arrivalway, inway ethay eryvay irstfay attackway, Iway outedray
ethay enemy'sway eetflay? Atthay icetway inway otway aysday Iway efeatedday ethay enemy'sway orsehay?
Atthay Iway arriedcay outway ofway ethay eryvay arbourhay andway aybay, otway undredhay ofway ethay
enemy'sway ictuallersvay, andway educedray emthay otay atthay ituationsay atthay eythay ancay
eceiveray onay uppliessay eitherway ybay andlay orway easay? Illway ouyay ivorceday ourselvesyay
omfray isthay ortunefay andway esethay eneralsgay; andway eferpray ethay isgraceday ofway
Orfiniumcay, ethay efeatday ofway Italyway, ethay urrendersay ofway othbay Ainsspay, andway ethay
estigepray ofway ethay Africanway arway? Iway, orfay ymay artpay, ishedway otay ebay alledcay away
oldiersay ofway Aesar'scay; ouyay onouredhay emay ithway ethay itletay ofway Imperatorway. Ifway ouyay
epentray ouryay ountybay, Iway ivegay itway ackbay otay ouyay; estoreray otay emay ymay ormerfay amenay
atthay ouyay aymay otnay appearway otay avehay onferredcay ethay onourhay onway emay asway away
eproachray.

Iiixxxay.Ethay oldierssay, eingbay affectedway ybay isthay orationway, equentlyfray
attemptedway otay interruptway imhay ilstwhay ehay asway eakingspay, osay atthay eythay appearedway
otay earbay ithway excessiveway anguishway ethay uspicionsay ofway eacherytray, andway enwhay ehay
asway eavinglay ethay assemblyway eythay unanimouslyway esoughtbay imhay otay ebay ofway oodgay
iritsspay, andway otnay esitatehay otay engageway ethay enemyway andway utpay eirthay idelityfay andway
ouragecay otay away ialtray. Asway ethay ishesway andway opinionsway ofway allway ereway angedchay ybay
isthay actway, Uriocay, ithway ethay eneralgay onsentcay, eterminedday, eneverwhay
opportunityway offeredway, otay azardhay away attlebay. Ethay extnay ayday ehay edlay outway ishay
orcesfay andway angedray emthay inway orderway ofway attlebay onway ethay amesay oundgray erewhay eythay
adhay eenbay ostedpay ethay ecedingpray ayday; ornay idday Attiusway Arusvay esitatehay otay awdray
outway ishay enmay, atthay, ifway anyway occasionway ouldshay offerway, eitherway otay ampertay ithway
ourway enmay orway otay engageway onway equalway ermstay, ehay ightmay otnay issmay ethay opportunityway.

Ivxxxay.Erethay aylay etweenbay ethay otway armiesway away alleyvay, asway alreadyway entionedmay,
otnay eryvay eepday, utbay ofway away ifficultday andway eepstay ascentway. Eachway asway aitingway
illtay ethay enemy'sway orcesfay ouldshay attemptway otay asspay itway, atthay eythay ightmay
engageway ithway ethay advantageway ofway ethay oundgray. Atway ethay amesay imetay, onway ethay eftlay
ingway, ethay entireway avalrycay ofway Ubliuspay Attiusway, andway everalsay ightlayarmedway
infantryway intermixedway ithway emthay, ereway erceivedpay escendingday intoway ethay
alleyvay. Againstway emthay Uriocay etachedday ishay avalrycay andway otway ohortscay ofway ethay
Arrucinimay, osewhay irstfay argechay ethay enemy'sway orsehay ereway unableway otay andstay,
utbay, ettingsay ursspay otay eirthay orseshay, edflay ackbay otay eirthay iendsfray ethay
ightlayinfantryway eingbay esertedday ybay osethay owhay adhay omecay outway alongway ithway emthay,
ereway urroundedsay andway utcay otay iecespay ybay ourway enmay. Arus'svay olewhay armyway, acingfay
atthay ayway, awsay eirthay enmay eeflay andway utcay ownday. Uponway ichwhay Ebilusray, oneway ofway
Aesar'scay ieutenantslay, omwhay Uriocay adhay oughtbray ithway imhay omfray Icilysay
owingknay atthay ehay adhay eatgray experienceway inway ilitarymay attersmay, iedcray outway,
Ouyay eesay ethay enemyway areway auntedday, Uriocay! whyay oday ouyay esitatehay otay aketay
advantageway ofway ethay opportunityway? Uriocay, avinghay erelymay expressedway isthay,
atthay ethay oldierssay ouldshay eepkay inway indmay ethay ofessionspray ichwhay eythay adhay
ademay otay imhay ethay ayday eforebay, enthay orderedway emthay otay ollowfay imhay, andway anray
arfay eforebay emthay allway. Ethay alleyvay asway osay ifficultday ofway ascentway atthay ethay
oremostfay enmay ouldcay otnay ugglestray upway itway unlessway assistedway ybay osethay ehindbay.
Utbay ethay indsmay ofway Attius'sway oldierssay eingbay epossessedpray ithway earfay andway ethay
ightflay andway aughterslay ofway eirthay enmay, evernay oughtthay ofway opposingway usway; andway
eythay allway imaginedway atthay eythay ereway alreadyway urroundedsay ybay ourway orsehay, andway,
ereforethay, eforebay away artday ouldcay ebay ownthray orway ourway enmay omecay earnay emthay,
Arus'svay olewhay armyway urnedtay eirthay acksbay andway etreatedray otay eirthay ampcay.

Vxxxay.Inway isthay ightflay oneway Abiusfay, away Elignianpay andway ommoncay oldiersay inway
Urio'scay armyway, ursuingpay ethay enemy'sway earray, ithway away oudlay oicevay outedshay otay
Arusvay ybay ishay amenay, andway oftenway alledcay imhay, osay atthay ehay eemedsay otay ebay oneway ofway
ishay oldierssay, owhay ishedway otay eakspay otay imhay andway ivegay imhay adviceway. Enwhay
Arusvay, afterway eingbay epeatedlyray alledcay, oppedstay andway ookedlay atway imhay, andway
inquiredway owhay ehay asway andway atwhay ehay antedway, ehay ademay away owblay ithway ishay ordsway atway
ishay akednay ouldershay andway asway eryvay earnay illingkay Arusvay, utbay ehay escapedway ethay
angerday ybay aisingray ishay ieldshay otay ardway offway ethay owblay. Abiusfay asway urroundedsay
ybay ethay oldierssay earnay imhay andway utcay otay iecespay; andway ybay ethay ultitudemay andway
owdscray ofway osethay atthay edflay, ethay atesgay ofway ethay ampscay ereway ongedthray andway ethay
assagepay oppedstay, andway away eatergray umbernay erishedpay inway atthay aceplay ithoutway away
okestray anthay inway ethay attlebay andway ightflay. Ornay ereway eway arfay omfray ivingdray emthay
omfray isthay ampcay; andway omesay ofway emthay anray aightwaystray otay ethay owntay ithoutway
altinghay. Utbay othbay ethay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray andway ethay engthstray ofway ethay
ortificationsfay eventedpray ourway accessway otay ethay ampcay; orfay Urio'scay oldierssay,
archingmay outway otay attlebay, ereway ithoutway osethay ingsthay ichwhay ereway equisiteray
orfay ormingstay away ampcay. Uriocay, ereforethay, edlay ishay armyway ackbay otay ethay ampcay,
