ithway allway ishay oopstray afesay exceptway Abiusfay. Ofway ethay enemyway aboutway ixsay undredhay
ereway illedkay andway away ousandthay oundedway, allway ofway omwhay, afterway Urio'scay eturnray,
andway everalsay oremay underway etextpray ofway eirthay oundsway, utbay inway actfay oughthray
earfay, ithdrewway omfray ethay ampcay intoway ethay owntay, ichwhay Arusvay erceivingpay andway
owingknay ethay errortay ofway ishay armyway, eavinglay away umpetertray inway ishay ampcay andway away
ewfay entstay orfay owshay, atway ethay irdthay atchway edlay ackbay ishay armyway uietlyqay intoway
ethay owntay.

Vixxxay.Ethay extnay ayday Uriocay esolvedray otay esiegebay Uticaway, andway otay awdray ineslay
aboutway itway. Inway ethay owntay erethay asway away ultitudemay ofway eoplepay, ignorantway ofway arway,
owingway otay ethay engthlay ofway ethay eacepay; omesay ofway emthay Uticansway, eryvay ellway
inclinedway otay Aesarcay, orfay ishay avoursfay otay emthay; ethay Omanray opulationpay asway
omposedcay ofway ersonspay ifferingday idelyway inway eirthay entimentssay. Ethay errortay
occasionedway ybay ormerfay attlesbay asway eryvay eatgray; andway ereforethay eythay openlyway
alkedtay ofway urrenderingsay, andway arguedway ithway Attiusway atthay ehay ouldshay otnay uffersay
ethay ortunefay ofway emthay allway otay ebay uinedray ybay ishay obstinacyway. Ilstwhay esethay
ingsthay ereway inway agitationway, ourierscay, owhay adhay eenbay entsay orwardfay, arrivedway
omfray ingkay Ubajay, ithway ethay intelligenceway atthay ehay asway onway ishay archmay, ithway
onsiderablecay orcesfay, andway encouragedway emthay otay otectpray andway efendday eirthay
itycay, away ircumstancecay ichwhay eatlygray omfortedcay eirthay espondingday eartshay.

Viixxxay.Ethay amesay intelligenceway asway oughtbray otay Uriocay; utbay orfay omesay imetay
ehay ouldcay otnay ivegay editcray otay itway, ecausebay ehay adhay osay eatgray onfidencecay inway
ishay ownway oodgay ortunefay. Andway atway isthay imetay Aesar'scay uccesssay inway Ainspay asway
announcedway inway Africaway ybay essagesmay andway etterslay. Eingbay elatedway ybay allway esethay
ingsthay, ehay imaginedway atthay ethay ingkay ouldway otnay areday otay attemptway anythingway
againstway imhay. Utbay enwhay ehay oundfay outway, omfray undoubtedway authorityway, atthay ishay
orcesfay ereway esslay anthay entytway ilesmay istantday omfray Uticaway, abandoningway ishay
orksway, ehay etiredray otay ethay Orneliancay ampcay. Erehay ehay eganbay otay aylay inway orncay
andway oodway, andway otay ortifyfay ishay ampcay, andway immediatelyway espatchedday ordersway otay
Icilysay, atthay ishay otway egionslay andway ethay emainderray ofway ishay avalrycay ouldshay ebay
entsay otay imhay. Ishay ampcay asway ellway adaptedway orfay otractingpray away arway, omfray ethay
aturenay andway engthstray ofway ethay ituationsay, omfray itsway oximitypray otay ethay easay, andway
ethay abundanceway ofway aterway andway altsay, ofway ichwhay away eatgray uantityqay adhay eenbay
oredstay upway omfray ethay eighbouringnay altsayitspay. Imbertay ouldcay otnay ailfay imhay
omfray ethay umbernay ofway eestray, ornay orncay, ithway ichwhay ethay andslay aboundedway.
Ereforewhay, ithway ethay eneralgay onsentcay, Uriocay eterminedday otay aitway orfay ethay
estray ofway ishay orcesfay, andway otractpray ethay arway.

Viiixxxay.Isthay anplay eingbay ettledsay, andway ishay onductcay approvedway ofway, ehay isway
informedway ybay omesay esertersday omfray ethay owntay atthay Ubajay adhay ayedstay ehindbay inway
ishay ownway ingdomkay, eingbay alledcay omehay ybay away eighbouringnay arway, andway away isputeday
ithway ethay eoplepay ofway Eptislay; andway atthay Aburasay, ishay ommandercayinwayiefchay, owhay
adhay eenbay entsay ithway away allsmay orcefay, asway awingdray earnay otay Uticaway. Uriocay
ashlyray elievingbay isthay informationway, alteredway ishay esignday, andway esolvedray otay
azardhay away attlebay. Ishay outhyay, ishay iritsspay, ishay ormerfay oodgay ortunefay andway
onfidencecay ofway uccesssay, ontributedcay uchmay otay onfirmcay isthay esolutionray.
Inducedway ybay esethay otivesmay, earlyway inway ethay ightnay ehay entsay allway ishay avalrycay otay
ethay enemy'sway ampcay earnay ethay iverray Agradabay, ofway ichwhay Aburasay, ofway omwhay eway
avehay alreadyway okenspay, asway ethay ommandercay. Utbay ethay ingkay asway omingcay afterway
emthay ithway allway ishay orcesfay, andway asway ostedpay atway away istanceday ofway ixsay ilesmay
ehindbay Aburasay. Ethay orsehay atthay ereway entsay erformpay eirthay archmay atthay ightnay,
andway attackway ethay enemyway unawaresway andway unexpectedlyway; orfay ethay Umidiansnay, afterway
ethay usualway arbarousbay ustomcay, encampedway erehay andway erethay ithoutway anyway
egularityray. Ethay avalrycay avinghay attackedway emthay, enwhay unksay inway eepslay andway
ispersedday, illedkay away eatgray umbernay ofway emthay; anymay ereway ightenedfray andway anray
awayway. Afterway ichwhay ethay orsehay eturnedray otay Uriocay, andway oughtbray omesay
isonerspray ithway emthay.

Ixxxxay.Uriocay adhay etsay outway atway ethay ourthfay atchway ithway allway ishay orcesfay,
exceptway ivefay ohortscay ichwhay ehay eftlay otay uardgay ethay ampcay. Avinghay advancedway ixsay
ilesmay, ehay etmay ethay orsehay, eardhay atwhay adhay appenedhay, andway inquiredway omfray ethay
aptivescay owhay ommandedcay ethay ampcay atway Agradabay. Eythay epliedray Aburasay. Oughthray
eagernessway otay erformpay ishay ourneyjay, ehay eglectednay otay akemay urtherfay
inquiriesway, utbay ookinglay ackbay otay ethay ompanycay extnay imhay, On'tday ouyay eesay,
oldierssay, ayssay ehay, atthay ethay answerway ofway ethay isonerspray orrespondscay ithway
ethay accountway ofway ethay esertersday, atthay ethay ingkay isway otnay ithway imhay, andway atthay ehay
entsay onlyway away allsmay orcefay ichwhay asway otnay ableway otay ithstandway away ewfay orsehay?
Astenhay enthay otay oilspay, otay oryglay; atthay eway aymay ownay eginbay otay inkthay ofway
ewardingray ouyay, andway eturningray ouyay anksthay. Ethay achievementsway ofway ethay orsehay
ereway eatgray inway emselvesthay, especiallyway ifway eirthay allsmay umbernay ebay omparedcay
ithway ethay astvay osthay ofway Umidiansnay. Oweverhay, ethay accountway asway enlargedway ybay
emselvesthay, asway enmay areway aturallynay inclinedway otay oastbay ofway eirthay ownway eritmay.
Esidesbay, anymay oilsspay ereway oducedpray; ethay enmay andway orseshay atthay ereway akentay
ereway oughtbray intoway eirthay ightsay, atthay eythay ightmay imagineway atthay everyway omentmay
ofway imetay ichwhay intervenedway asway away elayday otay eirthay onquestcay. Ybay isthay eansmay
ethay opeshay ofway Uriocay ereway econdedsay ybay ethay ardourway ofway ethay oldierssay. Ehay
orderedway ethay orsehay otay ollowfay imhay, andway astenedhay ishay archmay, atthay ehay ightmay
attackway emthay asway oonsay asway ossiblepay, ilewhay inway onsternationcay afterway eirthay
ightflay. Utbay ethay orsehay, atiguedfay ybay ethay expeditionway ofway ethay ecedingpray
ightnay, ereway otnay ableway otay eepkay upway ithway imhay, utbay ellfay ehindbay inway ifferentday
acesplay. Evenway isthay idday otnay abateway Urio'scay opeshay.

Lxay.Ubajay, eingbay informedway ybay Aburasay ofway ethay attlebay inway ethay ightnay, entsay otay
ishay eliefray otway ousandthay Anishspay andway Allicgay orsehay, ichwhay ehay asway
accustomedway otay eepkay earnay imhay otay uardgay ishay ersonpay, andway atthay artpay ofway ishay
infantryway onway ichwhay ehay adhay ethay eatestgray ependenceday, andway ehay imselfhay
ollowedfay owlyslay afterway ithway ethay estray ofway ishay orcesfay andway ortyfay elephantsway,
uspectingsay atthay asway Uriocay adhay entsay ishay orsehay eforebay, ehay imselfhay ouldway
ollowfay emthay. Aburasay ewdray upway ishay armyway, othbay orsehay andway ootfay, andway ommandedcay
emthay otay ivegay ayway aduallygray andway etreatray oughthray ethay etencepray ofway earfay;
atthay enwhay itway asway ecessarynay ehay ouldway ivegay emthay ethay ignalsay orfay attlebay, andway
uchsay ordersway asway ehay oundfay ircumstancescay equiredray. Uriocay, asway ishay ideaway ofway
eirthay esentpray ehaviourbay asway alculatedcay otay onfirmcay ishay ormerfay opeshay,
imaginedway atthay ethay enemyway ereway unningray awayway, andway edlay ishay armyway omfray ethay
isingray oundsgray ownday otay ethay ainplay.

Ixlay.Andway enwhay ehay adhay advancedway omfray isthay aceplay aboutway ixteensay ilesmay, ishay
armyway eingbay exhaustedway ithway ethay atiguefay, ehay altedhay. Aburasay avegay ishay enmay
ethay ignalsay, arshalledmay ishay armyway, andway eganbay otay ogay aroundway ishay anksray andway
encourageway emthay. Utbay ehay ademay useway ofway ethay ootfay onlyway orfay owshay; andway entsay ethay
orsehay otay ethay argechay Uriocay asway otnay eficientday inway illskay, andway encouragedway
ishay enmay otay estray allway eirthay opeshay inway eirthay alourvay. Eithernay ereway ethay
oldierssay, oughthay eariedway, ornay ethay orsehay, oughthay ewfay andway exhaustedway ithway
atiguefay, eficientday inway ardourway otay engageway, andway ouragecay utbay ethay atterlay ereway
inway umbernay utbay otway undredhay ethay estray adhay oppeddray ehindbay onway ethay archmay.
Ereverwhay eythay argedchay eythay orcedfay ethay enemyway otay ivegay oundgray, utbay eythay
ereway otnay ableway otay ursuepay emthay arfay enwhay eythay edflay, orway otay esspray eirthay
orseshay ootay everelysay. Esidesbay, ethay enemy'sway avalrycay eganbay otay urroundsay usway
onway othbay ingsway andway otay ampletray ownday ourway earray. Enwhay anyway ohortscay anray orwardfay
outway ofway ethay inelay, ethay Umidiansnay, eingbay eshfray, ybay eirthay eedspay avoidedway ourway
argechay, andway urroundedsay oursway enwhay eythay attemptedway otay eturnray otay eirthay ostpay,
andway utcay emthay offway omfray ethay ainmay odybay. Osay atthay itway idday otnay appearway afesay
eitherway otay eepkay eirthay oundgray andway aintainmay eirthay anksray, orway otay issueway omfray
ethay inelay, andway unray ethay iskray. Ethay enemy'sway oopstray ereway equentlyfray
einforcedray ybay assistanceway entsay omfray Ubajay; engthstray eganbay otay ailfay ourway enmay
oughthray atiguefay; andway osethay owhay adhay eenbay oundedway ouldcay eithernay uitqay ethay
ieldfay ornay etireray otay away aceplay ofway afetysay, ecausebay ethay olewhay ieldfay asway
urroundedsay ybay ethay enemy'sway avalrycay. Ereforethay, espairingday ofway eirthay ownway
afetysay, asway enmay usuallyway oday inway ethay astlay omentmay ofway eirthay iveslay, eythay eitherway
amentedlay eirthay unhappyway eathsday, orway ecommendedray eirthay arentspay otay ethay
urvivorssay, ifway ortunefay ouldshay avesay anyway omfray ethay impendingway angerday. Allway
ereway ullfay ofway earfay andway iefgray.

Iixlay.Enwhay Uriocay erceivedpay atthay inway ethay eneralgay onsternationcay eithernay
ishay exhortationsway ornay entreatiesway ereway attendedway otay, imaginingway atthay ethay
onlyway opehay ofway escapingway inway eirthay eplorableday ituationsay asway otay aingay ethay
earestnay illshay, ehay orderedway ethay olourscay otay ebay ornebay atthay ayway. Utbay away artypay
ofway orsehay, atthay adhay eenbay entsay ybay Aburasay, adhay alreadyway otgay ossessionpay ofway
emthay. Ownay indeedway ourway enmay ereway educedray otay extremeway espairday andway omesay ofway
emthay ereway illedkay ybay ethay avalrycay inway attemptingway otay escapeway omesay ellfay otay
ethay oundgray unhurtway. Eiuscnay Omitiusday, ommandercay ofway ethay avalrycay, andingstay
oundray Uriocay ithway away allsmay artypay ofway orsehay, urgedway Uriocay otay endeavourway otay
escapeway ybay ightflay, andway otay astenhay otay ishay ampcay; andway assuredway imhay atthay ehay
ouldway otnay orsakefay imhay. Utbay Uriocay eclaredday atthay ehay ouldway evernay oremay
appearway inway Aesar'scay ightsay, afterway osinglay ethay armyway ichwhay adhay eenbay ommittedcay
ybay Aesarcay otay ishay argechay, andway accordinglyway oughtfay illtay ehay asway illedkay. Eryvay
ewfay ofway ethay orsehay escapedway omfray atthay attlebay, utbay osethay owhay adhay ayedstay
ehindbay otay efreshray eirthay orseshay avinghay erceivedpay atway away istanceday ethay efeatday
ofway ethay olewhay armyway, etiredray inway afetysay otay eirthay ampcay.

Iiixlay.Ethay oldierssay ereway allway illedkay otay away anmay. Arcusmay Ufusray, ethay
uaestorqay, owhay asway eftlay ehindbay inway ethay ampcay ybay Uriocay, avinghay otgay
intelligenceway ofway esethay ingsthay, encouragedway ishay enmay otnay otay ebay isheartenedday.
Eythay egbay andway entreatway otay ebay ansportedtray otay Icilysay. Ehay onsentedcay, andway
orderedway ethay astersmay ofway ethay ipsshay otay avehay allway ethay oatsbay oughtbray oseclay otay
ethay oreshay earlyway inway ethay eveningway. Utbay osay eatgray asway ethay errortay inway eneralgay
atthay omesay aidsay atthay Uba'sjay orcesfay ereway archingmay upway, othersway atthay Arusvay
asway asteninghay ithway ishay egionslay, andway atthay eythay alreadyway awsay ethay ustday
aisedray ybay eirthay omingcay; ofway ichwhay otnay oneway ircumstancecay adhay appenedhay
othersway uspectedsay atthay ethay enemy'sway eetflay ouldway immediatelyway ebay uponway emthay.
Ereforethay, inway ethay eneralgay onsternationcay, everyway anmay onsultedcay ishay ownway
afetysay. Osethay owhay ereway onway oardbay ofway ethay eetflay, ereway inway away urryhay otay etsay
ailsay, andway eirthay ightflay astenedhay ethay astersmay ofway ethay ipsshay ofway urdenbay. Away
ewfay allsmay ishingfay oatsbay attendedway eirthay utyday andway ishay ordersway. Utbay asway ethay
oresshay ereway owdedcray, osay eatgray asway ethay ugglestray otay etermineday owhay ofway uchsay
away astvay umbernay ouldshay irstfay etgay onway oardbay, atthay omesay ofway ethay esselsvay anksay
ithway ethay eightway ofway ethay ultitudemay, andway ethay earsfay ofway ethay estray elayedday emthay
omfray omingcay otay ethay oreshay.

Ivxlay.Omfray ichwhay ircumstancescay itway appenedhay atthay away ewfay ootfay andway agedway
enmay, atthay ouldcay evailpray eitherway oughthray interestway orway itypay, orway owhay ereway
ableway otay imsway otay ethay ipsshay, ereway akentay onway oardbay, andway andedlay afesay inway
Icilysay. Ethay estray ofway ethay oopstray entsay eirthay enturionscay asway eputiesday otay
Arusvay atway ightnay, andway urrenderedsay emselvesthay otay imhay. Utbay Ubajay, ethay extnay
ayday avinghay iedspay eirthay ohortscay eforebay ethay owntay, aimedclay emthay asway ishay
ootybay, andway orderedway away eatgray artpay ofway emthay otay ebay utpay otay ethay ordsway; away ewfay ehay
electedsay andway entsay omehay otay ishay ownway ealmray. Althoughway Arusvay omplainedcay atthay
ishay onourhay asway insultedway ybay Ubajay, etyay ehay areday otnay opposeway imhay Ubajay oderay
onway orsebackhay intoway ethay owntay, attendedway ybay everalsay enatorssay, amongstway omwhay
ereway Erviussay Ulpiciussay andway Iciniuslay Amasippusday, andway inway away ewfay aysday
arrangedway andway orderedway atwhay ehay ouldway avehay oneday inway Uticaway, andway inway away ewfay aysday
oremay eturnedray otay ishay ownway ingdomkay, ithway allway ishay orcesfay.



Ookbay Iiiway

Iway.Uliusjay Aesarcay, oldinghay ethay electionway asway ictatorday, asway imselfhay
appointedway onsulcay ithway Ubliuspay Erviliussay; orfay isthay asway ethay earyay inway ichwhay
itway asway ermittedpay ybay ethay awslay atthay ehay ouldshay ebay osenchay onsulcay. Isthay
usinessbay eingbay endedway, asway editcray asway eginningbay otay ailfay inway Italyway, andway ethay
ebtsday ouldcay otnay ebay aidpay, ehay eterminedday atthay arbitratorsway ouldshay ebay
appointedway andway atthay eythay ouldshay akemay anway estimateway ofway ethay ossessionspay andway
opertiespray ofway ethay ebtorsday, owhay uchmay eythay ereway orthway eforebay ethay arway,
andway atthay eythay ouldshay ebay andedhay overway inway aymentpay otay ethay editorscray. Isthay ehay
oughtthay ethay ostmay ikelylay ethodmay otay emoveray andway abateway ethay apprehensionway ofway
anway abolitionway ofway ebtday, ethay usualway onsequencecay ofway ivilcay arsway andway
issensionsday, andway otay upportsay ethay editcray ofway ethay ebtorsday. Ehay ikewiselay
estoredray otay eirthay ormerfay onditioncay ethay aetorspray andway ibunestray irstfay
ubmittingsay ethay uestionqay otay ethay eoplepay omesay ersonspay ondemnedcay orfay
iberybray atway ethay electionsway, ybay irtuevay ofway Ompey'spay awlay, atway ethay imetay enwhay
Ompeypay eptkay ishay egionslay uarteredqay inway ethay itycay esethay ialstray ereway
inishedfay inway away inglesay ayday, oneway udgejay earinghay ethay eritsmay, andway anotherway
onouncingpray ethay entencessay, ecausebay eythay adhay offeredway eirthay ervicesay otay
imhay inway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay ivilcay arway, ifway ehay osechay otay acceptway emthay;
ettingsay ethay amesay aluevay onway emthay asway ifway ehay adhay acceptedway emthay, ecausebay eythay
adhay utpay emselvesthay inway ishay owerpay. Orfay ehay adhay eterminedday atthay eythay oughtway
otay ebay estoredray, atherray ybay ethay udgmentjay ofway ethay eoplepay, anthay appearway
admittedway otay itway ybay ishay ountybay atthay ehay ightmay eithernay appearway ungratefulway inway
epayingray anway obligationway, ornay arrogantway inway eprivingday ethay eoplepay ofway eirthay
erogativepray ofway exercisingway isthay ountybay.

Iiway.Inway accomplishingway esethay ingsthay, andway elebratingcay ethay Atinlay estivalfay,
andway oldinghay allway ethay electionsway, ehay entspay elevenway aysday; andway avinghay esignedray
ethay ictatorshipday, etsay outway omfray ethay itycay, andway entway otay Undisiumbray, erewhay
ehay adhay orderedway elvetway egionslay andway allway ishay avalrycay otay eetmay imhay. Utbay ehay
arcelyscay oundfay asway anymay ipsshay asway ouldway ebay ufficientsay otay ansporttray ifteenfay
ousandthay egionarylay oldierssay andway ivefay undredhay orsehay. Isthay ethay arcityscay
ofway ippingshay asway ethay onlyway ingthay atthay eventedpray Aesarcay omfray uttingpay away
eedyspay onclusioncay otay ethay arway. Andway evenway esethay oopstray embarkedway eryvay ortshay
ofway eirthay umbernay, ecausebay everalsay adhay allenfay inway osay anymay arsway inway Aulgay, andway
ethay onglay archmay omfray Ainspay adhay essenedlay eirthay umbernay eryvay uchmay, andway away
everesay autumnway inway Apuliaway andway ethay istrictday aboutway Undisiumbray, afterway ethay
eryvay olesomewhay ountriescay ofway Ainspay andway Aulgay, adhay impairedway ethay ealthhay ofway
ethay olewhay armyway.

Iiiway.Ompeypay avinghay otgay away ear'syay espiteray otay ovidepray orcesfay, uringday ichwhay
ehay asway otnay engagedway inway arway, ornay employedway ybay anway enemyway, adhay ollectedcay away
umerousnay eetflay omfray Asiaway, andway ethay Ladescycay, omfray Orcyracay, Athensway,
Ontuspay, Ithyniabay, Iasyray, Iliciacay, Oeniciaphay, andway Egyptway, andway adhay ivengay
irectionsday atthay away eatgray umbernay ouldshay ebay uiltbay inway everyway otherway aceplay. Ehay
adhay exactedway away argelay umsay ofway oneymay omfray Asiaway, Iasyray, andway allway ethay ingskay,
astsdynay, etrarchstay, andway eefray atesstay ofway Achaiaway; andway adhay obligedway ethay
orporationscay ofway osethay ovincespray, ofway ichwhay ehay imselfhay adhay ethay overnmentgay,
otay ountcay ownday otay imhay away argelay umsay.

Ivway.Ehay adhay ademay upway inenay egionslay ofway Omanray itizenscay; ivefay omfray Italyway,
ichwhay ehay adhay oughtbray ithway imhay; oneway eteranvay egionlay omfray Icilysay, ichwhay
eingbay omposedcay ofway otway, ehay alledcay ethay Emellagay; oneway omfray Etecray andway
Acedoniamay, ofway eteransvay owhay adhay eenbay ischargedday ybay eirthay ormerfay eneralsgay,
andway adhay ettledsay inway osethay ovincespray; otway omfray Asiaway, ichwhay adhay eenbay eviedlay
ybay ethay activityway ofway Entuluslay. Esidesbay ehay adhay istributedday amongway ishay
egionslay away onsiderablecay umbernay, ybay ayway ofway ecruitsray, omfray Essalythay,
Oeotiabay, Achaiaway, andway Epirusway ithway ishay egionslay ehay alsoway intermixedway ethay
oldierssay akentay omfray Aiuscay Antoniusway. Esidesbay esethay, ehay expectedway otway
egionslay omfray Iasyray, ithway Ipioscay; omfray Etecray, Acedaemonlay, Ontuspay, Iasyray,
andway otherway atesstay, ehay otgay aboutway eethray ousandthay archersway, ixsay ohortscay ofway
ingersslay, otway ousandthay ercenarymay oldierssay, andway evensay ousandthay orsehay; ixsay
undredhay ofway ichwhay, Eiotarusday adhay oughtbray omfray Aulgay; Ariobarzanesway, ivefay
undredhay omfray Appadociacay. Otuscay adhay ivengay imhay aboutway ethay amesay umbernay omfray
Acethray, andway adhay entsay ishay onsay Adalissay ithway emthay. Omfray Acedoniamay erethay
ereway otway undredhay, ofway extraordinaryway alourvay, ommandedcay ybay Ascipolisray; ivefay
undredhay Aulsgay andway Ermansgay; Abinius'sgay oopstray omfray Alexandriaway, omwhay Aulusway
Abiniusgay adhay eftlay ithway ingkay Olemyptay, otay uardgay ishay ersonpay. Ompeypay, ethay
onsay, adhay oughtbray inway ishay eetflay eightway undredhay, omwhay ehay adhay aisedray amongway
ishay ownway andway ishay epherds'shay avesslay. Arcundariustay, Astorcay andway Onilausday adhay
ivengay eethray undredhay omfray Allograeciagay oneway ofway esethay amecay imselfhay, ethay
otherway entsay ishay onsay. Otway undredhay ereway entsay omfray Iasyray ybay Omagenuscay
Antiochusway, omwhay Ompeypay ewardedray amplyway. Ethay ostmay ofway emthay ereway archersway. Otay
esethay ereway addedway Ardaniansday, andway Essiansbay, omesay ofway emthay ercenariesmay;
othersway ocuredpray ybay owerpay andway influenceway alsoway, Acedoniansmay, Essaliansthay,
andway oopstray omfray otherway ationsnay andway atesstay, ichwhay ompletedcay ethay umbernay
ichwhay eway entionedmay eforebay.

.Ehay adhay aidlay inway astvay uantitiesqay ofway orncay omfray Essalythay, Asiaway, Egyptway,
Etecray, Enecyray, andway otherway ountriescay. Ehay adhay esolvedray otay ixfay ishay interway
uartersqay atway Rachiumdyray, Apolloniaway, andway ethay otherway easayortspay, otay inderhay
Aesarcay omfray assingpay ethay easay andway orfay isthay urposepay adhay ationedstay ishay
eetflay alongway ethay easayoastcay. Ethay Egyptianway eetflay asway ommandedcay ybay Ompeypay,
ethay onsay ethay Asiaticway, ybay Ecimusday Aeliuslay, andway Aiuscay Iariustray ethay
Iansyray, ybay Aiuscay Assiuscay ethay Odianrhay, ybay Aiuscay Arcellusmay, inway
onjunctioncay ithway Aiuscay Oponiuscay; andway ethay Iburnianlay, andway Achaianway, ybay
Iboniusscray Ibolay, andway Arcusmay Octaviusway. Utbay Arcusmay Ibulusbay asway appointedway
ommandercayinwayiefchay ofway ethay olewhay aritimemay epartmentday, andway egulatedray everyway
attermay. Ethay iefchay irectionday estedray uponway imhay.

Ivay.Enwhay Aesarcay amecay otay Undisiumbray, ehay ademay away eechspay otay ethay oldierssay
Atthay incesay eythay ereway ownay almostway arrivedway atway ethay erminationtay ofway eirthay
oilstay andway angersday, eythay ouldshay atientlypay ubmitsay otay eavelay eirthay avesslay
andway aggagebay inway Italyway, andway otay embarkway ithoutway uggagelay, atthay away eatergray
umbernay ofway enmay ightmay ebay utpay onway oardbay atthay eythay ightmay expectway everythingway
omfray ictoryvay andway ishay iberalitylay. Eythay iedcray outway ithway oneway oicevay, ehay
ightmay ivegay atwhay ordersway ehay easedplay, atthay eythay ouldway eerfullychay ulfilfay
emthay. Ehay accordinglyway etsay ailsay ethay ourthfay ayday ofway Anuaryjay, ithway evensay
egionslay onway oardbay, asway alreadyway emarkedray. Ethay extnay ayday ehay eachedray andlay,
etweenbay ethay Erauniancay ocksray andway otherway angerousday acesplay; eetingmay ithway away
afesay oadray orfay ishay ippingshay otay ideray inway, andway eadingdray allway otherway ortspay
ichwhay ehay imaginedway ereway inway ossessionpay ofway ethay enemyway, ehay andedlay ishay enmay atway
away aceplay alledcay Arsalusphay, ithoutway ethay osslay ofway away inglesay esselvay.

Iivay.Ucretiuslay Espillovay andway Inutiusmay Ufusray ereway atway Oricumway, ithway
eighteenway Asiaticway ipsshay, ichwhay ereway ivengay intoway eirthay argechay ybay ethay ordersway
ofway Ecimusday Aeliuslay Arcusmay Ibulusbay atway Orcyracay, ithway away undredhay andway entay
ipsshay. Utbay eythay adhay otnay ethay onfidencecay otay areday otay ovemay outway ofway ethay
arbourhay; oughthay Aesarcay adhay oughtbray onlyway elvetway ipsshay asway away onvoycay, onlyway
ourfay ofway ichwhay adhay ecksday; ornay idday Ibulusbay, ishay eetflay eingbay isorderedday andway
ishay eamensay ispersedday, omecay upway inway imetay orfay Aesarcay asway eensay atway ethay
ontinentcay eforebay anyway accountway atsoeverwhay ofway ishay approachway adhay eachedray
osethay egionsray.

Iiivay.Aesarcay, avinghay andedlay ishay oldierssay, entsay ackbay ishay ipsshay ethay amesay
ightnay otay Undisiumbray, otay ansporttray ethay estray ofway ishay egionslay andway avalrycay.
Ethay argechay ofway isthay usinessbay asway ommittedcay otay ieutenantlay Ufiusfay Alenuskay,
ithway ordersway otay ebay expeditiousway inway ansportingtray ethay egionslay. Utbay ethay ipsshay
avinghay utpay otay easay ootay atelay, andway otnay avinghay akentay advantageway ofway ethay ightnay
eezebray, ellfay away acrificesay onway eirthay eturnray. Orfay Ibulusbay, atway Orcyracay, eingbay
informedway ofway Aesar'scay approachway, opedhay otay allfay inway ithway omesay artpay ofway ourway
ipsshay, ithway eirthay argoescay, utbay oundfay emthay emptyway; andway avinghay akentay aboutway
irtythay, entedvay onway emthay ishay ageray atway ishay ownway emissnessray, andway etsay emthay allway
onway irefay andway, ithway ethay amesay amesflay, ehay estroyedday ethay arinersmay andway
astersmay ofway ethay esselsvay, opinghay ybay ethay everitysay ofway ethay unishmentpay otay
eterday ethay estray. Avinghay accomplishedway isthay affairway, ehay illedfay allway ethay
arbourshay andway oresshay omfray Alonasay otay Oricumway ithway ishay eetsflay. Avinghay
isposedday ishay uardgay ithway eatgray arecay, ehay aylay onway oardbay imselfhay inway ethay epthday
ofway interway, ecliningday onay atiguefay orway utyday, andway otnay aitingway orfay
einforcementsray, inway opeshay atthay ehay ightmay omecay ithinway Aesar'scay eachray.

Ixway.Utbay afterway ethay epartureday ofway ethay Iburnianlay eetflay, Arcusmay Octaviusway
ailedsay omfray Illyricumway ithway atwhay ipsshay ehay adhay otay Alonasay; andway avinghay
iritedspay upway ethay Almatiansday, andway otherway arbarousbay ationsnay, ehay ewdray Issaway
offway omfray itsway onnectioncay ithway Aesarcay; utbay otnay eingbay ableway otay evailpray ithway
ethay ouncilcay ofway Alonasay, eitherway ybay omisespray orway enacesmay, ehay esolvedray otay
ormstay ethay owntay. Utbay itway asway ellway ortifiedfay ybay itsway aturalnay ituationsay, andway
away illhay. Ethay Omanray itizenscay uiltbay oodenway owerstay, ethay etterbay otay ecuresay itway;
utbay enwhay eythay ereway unableway otay esistray, onway accountway ofway ethay allnesssmay ofway
eirthay umbersnay, eingbay eakenedway ybay everalsay oundsway, eythay oopedstay otay ethay
astlay esourceray, andway etsay atway ibertylay allway ethay avesslay oldway enoughway otay earbay
armsway; andway uttingcay ethay airhay offway ethay omen'sway eadshay, ademay opesray orfay eirthay
enginesway. Octaviusway, eingbay informedway ofway eirthay eterminationday, urroundedsay ethay
owntay ithway ivefay encampmentsway, andway eganbay otay esspray emthay atway onceway ithway away iegesay
andway ormstay. Eythay ereway eterminedday otay endureway everyway ardshiphay, andway eirthay
eatestgray istressday asway ethay antway ofway orncay. Eythay, ereforethay, entsay eputiesday
otay Aesarcay, andway eggedbay away upplysay omfray imhay; allway otherway inconveniencesway eythay
orebay ybay eirthay ownway esourcesray, asway ellway asway eythay ouldcay andway afterway away onglay
intervalway, enwhay ethay engthlay ofway ethay iegesay adhay ademay Octavius'sway oopstray oremay
emissray anthay usualway, avinghay otgay anway opportunityway atway oonnay, enwhay ethay enemyway
ereway ispersedday, eythay isposedday eirthay ivesway andway ildrenchay onway ethay allsway, otay
eepkay upway ethay appearanceway ofway eirthay usualway attentionway; andway ormingfay emselvesthay
intoway oneway odybay, ithway ethay avesslay omwhay eythay adhay atelylay enfranchisedway, eythay
ademay anway attackway onway Octavius'sway earestnay ampcay, andway avinghay orcedfay atthay,
attackedway ethay econdsay ithway ethay amesay uryfay; andway enthay ethay irdthay andway ethay
ourthfay, andway enthay ethay otherway, andway eatbay emthay omfray emthay allway andway avinghay
illedkay away eatgray umbernay, obligedway ethay estray andway Octaviusway imselfhay otay flyay orfay
efugeray otay eirthay ipsshay. Isthay utpay anway endway otay ethay ockadeblay. Interway asway ownay
approachingway, andway Octaviusway, espairingday ofway apturingcay ethay owntay, afterway
ustainingsay uchsay onsiderablecay osseslay, ithdrewway otay Ompeypay, otay Rachiumdyray.

.Eway avehay entionedmay atthay Ibulliusvay Ufusray, anway officerway ofway Ompey'spay, adhay
allenfay icetway intoway Aesar'scay owerpay; irstfay atway Orfiniumcay, andway afterwardsway inway
Ainspay. Aesarcay oughtthay imhay away operpray ersonpay, onway accountway ofway ishay avoursfay
onferredcay onway imhay, otay endsay ithway oposalspray otay Ompeypay andway ehay ewknay atthay ehay
adhay anway influenceway overway Ompeypay. Isthay asway ethay ubstancesay ofway ishay oposalspray
Atthay itway asway ethay utyday ofway othbay, otay utpay anway endway otay eirthay obstinacyway, andway
orbearfay ostilitieshay, andway otnay empttay ortunefay anyway urtherfay; atthay ufficientsay
osslay adhay eenbay ufferedsay onway othbay idessay, otay ervesay asway away essonlay andway
instructionway otay emthay, otay enderray emthay apprehensiveway ofway uturefay alamitiescay,
ybay Ompeypay, inway avinghay eenbay ivendray outway ofway Italyway, andway avinghay ostlay Icilysay,
Ardiniasay, andway ethay otway Ainsspay, andway oneway undredhay andway irtythay ohortscay ofway
Omanray itizenscay, inway Italyway andway Ainspay ybay imselfhay, inway ethay eathday ofway Uriocay,
andway ethay osslay ofway osay eatgray anway armyway inway Africaway, andway ethay urrendersay ofway ishay
oldierssay inway Orcyracay. Ereforewhay, eythay ouldshay avehay itypay onway emselvesthay, andway
ethay epublicray orfay, omfray eirthay ownway isfortunesmay, eythay adhay ufficientsay
experienceway ofway atwhay ortunefay ancay effectway inway arway. Atthay isthay asway ethay onlyway
imetay otay eattray ofway eacepay; enwhay eachway adhay onfidencecay inway ishay ownway engthstray,
andway othbay eemedsay onway anway equalway ootingfay. Incesay, ifway ortunefay owedshay everway osay
ittlelay avourfay otay eitherway, ehay owhay oughtthay imselfhay uperiorsay, ouldway otnay
ubmitsay otay ermstay ofway accommodationway; ornay ouldway ehay ebay ontentcay ithway anway equalway
ivisionday, enwhay ehay ightmay expectway otay obtainway ethay olewhay. Atthay, asway eythay ouldcay
otnay agreeway eforebay, ethay ermstay ofway eacepay oughtway otay ebay ubmittedsay otay ethay enatesay
andway eoplepay inway Omeray. Atthay inway ethay eantimemay, itway oughtway otay ontentcay ethay
epublicray andway emselvesthay, ifway eythay othbay immediatelyway ooktay oathway inway away ublicpay
assemblyway, atthay eythay ouldway isbandday eirthay orcesfay ithinway ethay eethray
ollowingfay aysday. Atthay avinghay ivestedday emselvesthay ofway ethay armsway andway
auxiliariesway, onway ichwhay eythay acedplay eirthay esentpray onfidencecay, eythay ustmay
othbay ofway ecessitynay acquiesceway inway ethay ecisionday ofway ethay eoplepay andway enatesay. Otay
ivegay Ompeypay ethay ullerfay assuranceway ofway ishay intentionsway, ehay ouldway ismissday allway
ishay orcesfay onway andlay, evenway ishay arrisonsgay.

Ixay.Ibulliusvay, avinghay eceivedray isthay ommissioncay omfray Aesarcay, oughtthay itway
onay esslay ecessarynay otay ivegay Ompeypay oticenay ofway Aesar'scay uddensay approachway,
atthay ehay ightmay adoptway uchsay ansplay asway ethay ircumstancecay equiredray, anthay otay
informway imhay ofway Aesar'scay essagemay; andway ereforethay ontinuingcay ishay ourneyjay ybay
ightnay asway ellway asway ybay ayday, andway akingtay eshfray orseshay orfay espatchday, ehay ostedpay
awayway otay Ompeypay, otay informway imhay atthay Aesarcay asway archingmay owardstay imhay ithway
allway ishay orcesfay. Ompeypay asway atway isthay imetay inway Andaviacay, andway asway onway ishay
archmay omfray Acedoniamay otay ishay interway uartersqay inway Apolloniaway andway Rachiumdyray;
utbay urprisedsay atway ethay unexpectedway ewsnay, ehay eterminedday otay ogay otay Apolloniaway
ybay eedyspay archesmay, otay eventpray Aesarcay omfray ecomingbay astermay ofway allway ethay
aritimemay atesstay. Utbay asway oonsay asway Aesarcay adhay andedlay ishay oopstray, ehay etsay offway
ethay amesay ayday orfay Oricumway enwhay ehay arrivedway erethay, Uciuslay Orquatustay, owhay
asway overnorgay ofway ethay owntay ybay Ompey'spay appointmentway, andway adhay away arrisongay ofway
Arthinianspay inway itway, endeavouredway otay utshay ethay atesgay andway efendday ethay owntay,
andway orderedway ethay Eeksgray otay anmay ethay allsway, andway otay aketay armsway. Utbay asway eythay
efusedray otay ightfay againstway ethay owerpay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway asway ethay
itizenscay ademay away ontaneousspay attemptway otay admitway Aesarcay, espairingday ofway anyway
assistanceway, ehay ewthray openway ethay atesgay, andway urrenderedsay imselfhay andway ethay
owntay otay Aesarcay, andway asway eservedpray afesay omfray injuryway ybay imhay.

Iixay.Avinghay akentay Oricumway, Aesarcay archedmay ithoutway akingmay anyway elayday otay
Apolloniaway. Aberiusstay ethay overnorgay, earinghay ofway ishay approachway, eganbay otay
ingbray aterway intoway ethay itadelcay, andway otay ortifyfay itway, andway otay emandday ostageshay
ofway ethay own'stay eoplepay. Utbay eythay efuseray otay ivegay anyway, orway otay utshay eirthay
atesgay againstway ethay onsulcay, orway otay aketay uponway emthay otay udgejay ontrarycay otay atwhay
allway Italyway andway ethay Omanray eoplepay adhay udgedjay. Asway oonsay asway ehay ewknay eirthay
inclinationsway, ehay ademay ishay escapeway ivatelypray. Ethay inhabitantsway ofway Apolloniaway
entsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay, andway avegay imhay admissionway intoway eirthay owntay.
Eirthay exampleway asway ollowedfay ybay ethay inhabitantsway ofway Ullisbay, Amantiaway, andway
ethay otherway eighbouringnay atesstay, andway allway Epirusway andway eythay entsay ambassadorsway
otay Aesarcay, andway omisedpray otay obeyway ishay ommandscay.

Iiixay.Utbay Ompeypay avinghay eceivedray informationway ofway ethay ansactionstray atway
Oricumway andway Apolloniaway, eganbay otay ebay alarmedway orfay Rachiumdyray, andway
endeavouredway otay eachray itway, archingmay ayday andway ightnay. Asway oonsay asway itway asway aidsay
atthay Aesarcay asway approachingway, uchsay away anicpay ellfay uponway Ompey'spay armyway,
ecausebay inway ishay astehay ehay adhay ademay onay istinctionday etweenbay ightnay andway ayday,
andway adhay archedmay ithoutway intermissionway, atthay eythay almostway everyway anmay
esertedday eirthay olourscay inway Epirusway andway ethay eighbouringnay ountriescay; everalsay
ewthray ownday eirthay armsway, andway eirthay archmay adhay ethay appearanceway ofway away ightflay.
Utbay enwhay Ompeypay adhay altedhay earnay Rachiumdyray, andway adhay ivengay ordersway orfay
easuringmay outway ethay oundgray orfay ishay ampcay, ishay armyway evenway etyay ontinuingcay inway
eirthay ightfray, Abienuslay irstfay eppedstay orwardfay andway oresway atthay ehay ouldway
evernay esertday imhay, andway ouldway areshay ateverwhay atefay ortunefay ouldshay assignway otay
imhay. Ethay otherway ieutenantslay ooktay ethay amesay oathway, andway ethay ibunestray andway
enturionscay ollowedfay eirthay exampleway andway ethay olewhay armyway oresway inway ikelay
annermay. Aesarcay, indingfay ethay oadray otay Rachiumdyray alreadyway inway ethay ossessionpay
ofway Ompeypay, asway inway onay eatgray astehay, utbay encampedway ybay ethay iverray Apsusway, inway
ethay erritorytay ofway Apolloniaway, atthay ethay atesstay ichwhay adhay eservedday ishay
upportsay ightmay ebay ertaincay ofway otectionpray omfray ishay outwayuardsgay andway ortsfay;
andway erethay ehay esolvedray otay aitway ethay arrivalway ofway ishay otherway egionslay omfray
Italyway, andway otay interway inway entstay. Ompeypay idday ethay amesay; andway itchingpay ishay
ampcay onway ethay otherway idesay ofway ethay iverray Apsusway, ollectedcay erethay allway ishay
oopstray andway auxiliariesway.

Ivxay.Alenuskay, avinghay utpay ethay egionslay andway avalrycay onway oardbay atway
Undisiumbray, asway Aesarcay adhay irectedday imhay, asway arfay asway ethay umbernay ofway ishay
ipsshay allowedway, eighedway anchorway andway avinghay ailedsay away ittlelay istanceday omfray
ortpay, eceivedray away etterlay omfray Aesarcay, inway ichwhay ehay asway informedway, atthay allway
ethay ortspay andway ethay olewhay oreshay asway occupiedway ybay ethay enemy'sway eetflay onway
eceivingray isthay informationway ehay eturnedray intoway ethay arbourhay, andway ecalledray
allway ethay esselsvay. Oneway ofway emthay, ichwhay ontinuedcay ethay oyagevay andway idday otnay
obeyway Alenus'skay ommandcay, ecausebay itway arriedcay onay oopstray, utbay asway ivatepray
opertypray, orebay awayway orfay Oricumway, andway asway akentay ybay Ibulusbay, owhay aredspay
eithernay avesslay ornay eefray enmay, ornay evenway ildrenchay; utbay utpay allway otay ethay
ordsway. Usthay ethay afetysay ofway ethay olewhay armyway ependedday onway away eryvay ortshay acespay
ofway imetay andway away eatgray asualtycay.

Vxay.Ibulusbay, asway ashay eenbay observedway eforebay, aylay ithway ishay eetflay earnay
Oricumway, andway asway ehay ebarredday Aesarcay ofway ethay ibertylay ofway ethay easay andway
arbourshay, osay ehay asway eprivedday ofway allway intercourseway ithway ethay ountrycay ybay
andlay; orfay ethay olewhay oreshay asway occupiedway ybay artiespay isposedday inway ifferentday
acesplay ybay Aesarcay. Andway ehay asway otnay allowedway otay etgay eitherway oodway orway aterway, orway
evenway anchorway earnay ethay andlay. Ehay asway educedray otay eatgray ifficultiesday, andway
istressedday ithway extremeway arcityscay ofway everyway ecessarynay; insomuchway atthay ehay
asway obligedway otay ingbray, inway ansportstray omfray Orcyracay, otnay onlyway ovisionspray,
utbay evenway oodway andway aterway; andway itway onceway appenedhay atthay, eetingmay ithway iolentvay
ormsstay, eythay ereway orcedfay otay atchcay ethay ewday ybay ightnay ichwhay ellfay onway ethay
ideshay atthay overedcay eirthay ecksday; etyay allway esethay ifficultiesday eythay orebay
atientlypay andway ithoutway epiningray, andway oughtthay eythay oughtway otnay otay eavelay ethay
oresshay andway arbourshay eefray omfray ockadeblay. Utbay enwhay eythay ereway ufferingsay
underway ethay istressday ichwhay Iway avehay entionedmay, andway Ibolay adhay oinedjay Ibulusbay,
eythay othbay alledcay omfray onway ipshayoardbay otay Arcusmay Aciliusway andway Atiusstay
Arcusmay, ethay ieutenantslay, oneway ofway omwhay ommandedcay ethay owntay, ethay otherway ethay
uardsgay onway ethay oastcay, atthay eythay ishedway otay eakspay otay Aesarcay onway affairsway ofway
importanceway, ifway ermissionpay ouldshay ebay antedgray emthay. Eythay addway omethingsay
urtherfay otay engthenstray ethay impressionway atthay eythay intendedway otay eattray aboutway
anway accommodationway. Inway ethay eantimemay eythay equestedray away ucetray, andway obtainedway
itway omfray emthay; orfay atwhay eythay oposedpray eemedsay otay ebay ofway importanceway, andway itway
asway ellway ownknay atthay Aesarcay esiredday itway aboveway allway ingsthay, andway itway asway
imaginedway atthay omesay advantageway ouldway ebay erivedday omfray Ibulus'sbay oposalspray.

Ixvay.Aesarcay avinghay etsay outway ithway oneway egionlay otay aingay ossessionpay ofway ethay
oremay emoteray atesstay, andway otay ovidepray orncay, ofway ichwhay ehay adhay utbay away allsmay
uantityqay, asway atway isthay imetay atway Uthrotumbay, oppositeway otay Orcyracay. Erethay
eceivingray Aciliusway andway Arcus'smay etterslay, informingway imhay ofway Ibo'slay andway
Ibulus'sbay emandsday, ehay eftlay ishay egionlay ehindbay imhay, andway eturnedray imselfhay
otay Oricumway. Enwhay ehay arrivedway, eythay ereway invitedway otay away onferencecay. Ibolay amecay
andway ademay anway apologyway orfay Ibulusbay, atthay ehay asway away anmay ofway ongstray assionpay,
andway adhay away ivatepray uarrelqay againstway Aesarcay, ontractedcay enwhay ehay asway aedileway
andway aetorpray; atthay orfay isthay easonray ehay adhay avoidedway ethay onferencecay, estlay
affairsway ofway ethay utmostway importanceway andway advantageway ightmay ebay impededway ybay ethay
armthway ofway ishay empertay. Atthay itway ownay asway andway everway adhay eenbay Ompey'spay ostmay
earnestway ishway, atthay eythay ouldshay ebay econciledray, andway aylay ownday eirthay armsway;
utbay eythay ereway otnay authorizedway otay eattray onway atthay ubjectsay, ecausebay eythay
esignedray ethay olewhay anagementmay ofway ethay arway, andway allway otherway attersmay, otay
Ompeypay, ybay orderway ofway ethay ouncilcay. Utbay enwhay eythay ereway acquaintedway ithway
Aesar'scay emandsday, eythay ouldway ansmittray emthay otay Ompeypay, owhay ouldway oncludecay
allway ofway imselfhay ybay eirthay ersuasionspay. Inway ethay eantimemay, etlay ethay ucetray ebay
ontinuedcay illtay ethay essengersmay ouldcay eturnray omfray imhay; andway etlay onay injuryway
ebay oneday onway eitherway idesay. Otay isthay ehay addedway away ewfay ordsway ofway ethay ausecay orfay
ichwhay eythay oughtfay, andway ofway ishay ownway orcesfay andway esourcesray.

Iixvay.Otay isthay, Aesarcay idday otnay enthay inkthay operpray otay akemay anyway eplyray, ornay
oday eway ownay inkthay itway orthway ecordingray. Utbay Aesarcay equiredray atthay ehay ouldshay
ebay allowedway otay endsay ommissionerscay otay Ompeypay, owhay ouldshay uffersay onay
ersonalpay injuryway; andway atthay eitherway eythay ouldshay antgray itway, orway ouldshay aketay
ishay ommissionerscay inway argechay, andway onveycay emthay otay Ompeypay. Atthay asway otay ethay
ucetray, ethay arway inway itsway esentpray atestay asway osay ividedday, atthay eythay ybay eirthay
eetflay eprivedday imhay ofway ishay ippingshay andway auxiliariesway; ilewhay ehay eventedpray
emthay omfray ethay useway ofway ethay andlay andway eshfray aterway; andway ifway eythay ishedway atthay
isthay estraintray ouldshay ebay emovedray omfray emthay, eythay ouldshay elinquishray eirthay
ockadeblay ofway ethay eassay, utbay ifway eythay etainedray ethay oneway, ehay inway ikelay annermay
ouldway etainray ethay otherway; atthay everthelessnay, ethay eatytray ofway accommodationway
ightmay illstay ebay arriedcay onway, oughthay esethay ointspay ereway otnay oncededcay, andway
atthay eythay eednay otnay ebay anway impedimentway otay itway. Eythay ouldway eithernay eceiveray
Aesar'scay ommissionerscay, ornay uaranteegay eirthay afetysay, utbay eferredray ethay
olewhay otay Ompeypay. Eythay urgedway andway uggledstray eagerlyway otay aingay ethay oneway ointpay
espectingray away ucetray. Utbay enwhay Aesarcay erceivedpay atthay eythay adhay oposedpray ethay
onferencecay erelymay otay avoidway esentpray angerday andway istressday, utbay atthay eythay
offeredway onay opeshay orway ermstay ofway eacepay, ehay appliedway ishay oughtsthay otay ethay
osecutionpray ofway ethay arway.

Iiixvay.Ibulusbay, eingbay eventedpray omfray andinglay orfay everalsay aysday, andway
eingbay eizedsay ithway away iolentvay istemperday omfray ethay oldcay andway atiguefay, asway ehay
ouldcay eithernay ebay uredcay onway oardbay, ornay asway illingway otay esertday ethay argechay
ichwhay ehay adhay akentay uponway imhay, asway unableway otay earbay upway againstway ethay iolencevay
ofway ethay iseaseday. Onway ishay eathday, ethay olesay ommandcay evolvedday onway onay inglesay
individualway, utbay eachway admiralway anagedmay ishay ownway ivisionday eparatelysay, andway atway
ishay ownway iscretionday. Ibulliusvay, asway oonsay asway ethay alarmway, ichwhay Aesar'scay
unexpectedway arrivalway adhay aisedray, asway overway, eganbay againway otay eliverday Aesar'scay
essagemay inway ethay esencepray ofway Ibolay, Uciuslay Ucceiuslay, andway Eophanesthay, otay
omwhay Ompeypay usedway otay ommunicatecay ishay ostmay onfidentialcay ecretssay. Ehay adhay
arcelyscay enteredway onway ethay ubjectsay enwhay Ompeypay interruptedway imhay, andway orbadefay
imhay otay oceedpray. Atwhay eednay, ayssay ehay, avehay Iway ofway ifelay orway Omeray, ifway ethay
orldway allshay inkthay Iway enjoyway emthay ybay ethay ountybay ofway Aesarcay; anway opinionway ichwhay
ancay evernay ebay emovedray ilstwhay itway allshay ebay oughtthay atthay Iway avehay eenbay oughtbray
ackbay ybay imhay otay Italyway, omfray ichwhay Iway etsay outway. Afterway ethay onclusioncay ofway ethay
arway, Aesarcay asway informedway ofway esethay expressionsway ybay omesay ersonspay owhay ereway
esentpray atway ethay onversationcay. Ehay attemptedway, oweverhay, ybay otherway eansmay otay
ingbray aboutway away egotiationnay ofway eacepay.

Ixxay.Etweenbay Ompey'spay andway Aesar'scay ampcay erethay asway onlyway ethay iverray Apsusway,
andway ethay oldierssay equentlyfray onversedcay ithway eachway otherway; andway ybay away ivatepray
arrangementway amongway emselvesthay, onay eaponsway ereway ownthray uringday eirthay
onferencescay. Aesarcay entsay Ubliuspay Atiniusvay, oneway ofway ishay ieutenantslay, otay
ethay ankbay ofway ethay iverray, otay akemay uchsay oposalspray asway ouldshay appearway ostmay
onducivecay otay eacepay; andway otay cryay outway equentlyfray ithway away oudlay oicevay
askingway, Areway itizenscay ermittedpay otay endsay eputiesday otay itizenscay otay eattray
ofway eacepay? away oncessioncay ichwhay adhay eenbay ademay evenway otay ugitivesfay onway ethay
Eneanpyray ountainsmay, andway otay obbersray, especiallyway enwhay ybay osay oingday eythay
ouldway eventpray itizenscay omfray ightingfay againstway itizenscay. Avinghay okenspay
uchmay inway umblehay anguagelay, asway ecamebay away anmay eadingplay orfay ishay ownway andway ethay
eneralgay afetysay, andway eingbay istenedlay otay ithway ilencesay ybay ethay oldierssay ofway
othbay armiesway, ehay eceivedray anway answerway omfray ethay enemy'sway artypay atthay Aulusway
Arrovay oposedpray omingcay ethay extnay ayday otay away onferencecay, andway atthay eputiesday
omfray othbay idessay ightmay omecay ithoutway angerday, andway explainway eirthay ishesway, andway
accordinglyway away ixedfay imetay asway appointedway orfay ethay interviewway. Enwhay ethay
eputiesday etmay ethay extnay ayday, away eatgray ultitudemay omfray othbay idessay assembledway,
andway ethay expectationsway ofway everyway ersonpay oncerningcay isthay ubjectsay ereway aisedray
eryvay ighhay, andway eirthay indsmay eemedsay otay ebay eagerlyway isposedday orfay eacepay.
Itustay Abienuslay alkedway orwardfay omfray ethay owdcray, andway inway ubmissivesay ermstay
eganbay otay eakspay ofway eacepay, andway otay argueway ithway Atiniusvay. Utbay eirthay
onversationcay asway uddenlysay interruptedway ybay artsday ownthray omfray allway idessay,
omfray ichwhay Atiniusvay escapedway ybay eingbay otectedpray ybay ethay armsway ofway ethay
oldierssay. Oweverhay, everalsay ereway oundedway; andway amongway emthay Orneliuscay
Albusbay, Arcusmay Otiusplay, andway Uciuslay Iburtiustay, enturionscay, andway omesay
ivatespray; ereuponhay Abienuslay exclaimedway, Orbearfay, enthay, otay eakspay anyway oremay
aboutway anway accommodationway, orfay eway ancay avehay onay eacepay unlessway eway arrycay
Aesar'scay eadhay ackbay ithway usway.

Xxay.Atway ethay amesay imetay inway Omeray, Arcusmay Aeliuscay Ufusray, oneway ofway ethay
aetorspray, avinghay undertakenway ethay ausecay ofway ethay ebtorsday, onway enteringway intoway
ishay officeway, ixedfay ishay ibunaltray earnay ethay enchbay ofway Aiuscay Eboniustray, ethay
itycay aetorpray, andway omisedpray ifway anyway ersonpay appealedway otay imhay inway egardray otay
ethay aluationvay andway aymentpay ofway ebtsday ademay ybay arbitrationway, asway appointedway ybay
Aesarcay enwhay inway Omeray, atthay ehay ouldway elieveray emthay. Utbay itway appenedhay, omfray
ethay usticejay ofway Ebonius'stray ecreesday andway ishay umanityhay orfay ehay oughtthay atthay
inway uchsay angerousday imestay usticejay ouldshay ebay administeredway ithway oderationmay
andway ompassioncay, atthay otnay oneway ouldcay ebay oundfay owhay ouldway offerway imselfhay ethay
irstfay otay odgelay anway appealway. Orfay otay eadplay overtypay, otay omplaincay ofway ishay ownway
ivatepray alamitiescay, orway ethay eneralgay istressesday ofway ethay imestay, orway otay assertway
ethay ifficultyday ofway ettingsay ethay oodsgay otay alesay, isway ethay ehaviourbay ofway away anmay
evenway ofway away oderatemay empertay; utbay otay etainray eirthay ossessionspay entireway, andway
atway ethay amesay imetay acknowledgeway emselvesthay inway ebtday, atwhay ortsay ofway iritspay,
andway atwhay impudenceway ouldway itway otnay avehay arguedway! Ereforethay obodynay asway oundfay
osay unreasonableway asway otay akemay uchsay emandsday. Utbay Aeliuscay ovedpray oremay everesay
otay osethay eryvay ersonspay orfay osewhay advantageway itway adhay eenbay esignedday; andway
artingstay omfray isthay eginningbay, inway orderway atthay ehay ightmay otnay appearway otay avehay
engagedway inway osay ishonourableday anway affairway ithoutway effectingway omethingsay, ehay
omulgatedpray away awlay, atthay allway ebtsday ouldshay ebay ischargedday inway ixsay equalway
aymentspay, ofway ixsay onthsmay eachway, ithoutway interestway.

Ixxay.Enwhay Erviliussay, ethay onsulcay, andway ethay otherway agistratesmay opposedway imhay,
andway ehay imselfhay effectedway esslay anthay ehay expectedway, inway orderway otay aiseray ethay
assionspay ofway ethay eoplepay, ehay oppeddray itway, andway omulgatedpray otway othersway; oneway,
ybay ichwhay ehay emittedray ethay annualway entsray ofway ethay ouseshay otay ethay enantstay, ethay
otherway, anway actway ofway insolvencyway uponway ichwhay ethay obmay ademay anway assaultway onway Aiuscay
Eboniustray, andway avinghay oundedway everalsay ersonspay, ovedray imhay omfray ishay
ibunaltray. Ethay onsulcay Erviliussay informedway ethay enatesay ofway ishay oceedingspray,
owhay assedpay away ecreeday atthay Aeliuscay ouldshay ebay emovedray omfray ethay anagementmay
ofway ethay epublicray. Uponway isthay ecreeday, ethay onsulcay orbadefay imhay ethay enatesay;
andway enwhay ehay asway attemptingway otay aranguehay ethay eoplepay, urnedtay imhay outway ofway ethay
ostrumray. Ungstay ithway ethay ignominyway andway ithway esentmentray, ehay etendedpray inway
ublicpay atthay ehay ouldway ogay otay Aesarcay, utbay ivatelypray entsay essengersmay otay
Ilomay, owhay adhay urderedmay Odiusclay, andway adhay eenbay ondemnedcay orfay itway; andway
avinghay invitedway imhay intoway Italyway, ecausebay ehay adhay engagedway ethay emainsray ofway ethay
adiatorsglay otay ishay interestway, ybay akingmay emthay upplesay esentspray, ehay oinedjay
imhay, andway entsay imhay otay Urinumthay otay ampertay ithway ethay epherdsshay. Enwhay ehay
imselfhay asway onway ishay oadray otay Asilinumcay, atway ethay amesay imetay atthay ishay ilitarymay
andardsstay andway armsway ereway eizedsay atway Apuacay, ishay avesslay eensay atway Aplesnay, andway
ethay esignday ofway etrayingbay ethay owntay iscoveredday ishay otsplay eingbay evealedray,
andway Apuacay utshay againstway imhay, eingbay apprehensiveway ofway angerday, ecausebay ethay
Omanray itizenscay esidingray erethay adhay armedway emselvesthay, andway oughtthay ehay oughtway
otay ebay eatedtray asway anway enemyway otay ethay atestay, ehay abandonedway ishay irstfay esignday,
andway angedchay ishay outeray.

Iixxay.Ilomay inway ethay eantimemay espatchedday etterslay otay ethay eefray ownstay,
urportingpay atthay ehay actedway asway ehay idday ybay ethay ordersway andway ommandscay ofway Ompeypay,
onveyedcay otay imhay ybay Ibulusbay andway ehay endeavouredway otay engageway inway ishay interestway
allway ersonspay omwhay ehay imaginedway ereway underway ifficultiesday ybay easonray ofway eirthay
ebtsday. Utbay otnay eingbay ableway otay evailpray ithway emthay, ehay etsay atway ibertylay omesay
avesslay omfray ethay orkwayouseshay, andway eganbay otay assaultway Osacay inway ethay istrictday
ofway Urinumthay. Erethay avinghay eceivedray away owblay ofway away onestay ownthray omfray ethay
allway ofway ethay owntay ichwhay asway ommandedcay ybay Uintusqay Ediuspay ithway oneway egionlay,
ehay iedday ofway itway; andway Aeliuscay avinghay etsay outway, asway ehay etendedpray orfay Aesarcay,
entway otay Uriithay, erewhay ehay asway utpay otay eathday asway ehay asway amperingtay ithway omesay
ofway ethay eemenfray ofway ethay owntay, andway asway offeringway oneymay otay Aesar'scay Allicgay
andway Anishspay orsehay, ichwhay ehay adhay entsay erethay otay engthenstray ethay arrisongay.
Andway usthay esethay ightymay eginningsbay, ichwhay adhay embroiledway Italyway, andway eptkay
ethay agistratesmay employedway, oundfay away eedyspay andway appyhay issueway.

Iiixxay.Ibolay avinghay ailedsay omfray Oricumway, ithway away eetflay ofway iftyfay ipsshay,
ichwhay ehay ommandedcay, amecay otay Undisiumbray, andway eizedsay anway islandway, ichwhay ieslay
oppositeway otay ethay arbourhay; udgingjay itway etterbay otay uardgay atthay aceplay, ichwhay
asway ourway onlyway asspay otay easay, anthay otay eepkay allway ethay oresshay andway ortspay ockedblay
upway ybay away eetflay. Ybay ishay uddensay arrivalway, ehay ellfay inway ithway omesay ofway ourway
ansportstray, andway etsay emthay onway irefay, andway arriedcay offway oneway adenlay ithway orncay;
ehay uckstray eatgray errortay intoway ourway enmay, andway avinghay inway ethay ightnay andedlay away
artypay ofway oldierssay andway archersway, ehay eatbay ourway uardgay ofway orsehay omfray eirthay
ationstay, andway ainedgay osay uchmay ybay ethay advantageway ofway ituationsay, atthay ehay
espatchedday etterslay otay Ompeypay, atthay ifway ehay easedplay ehay ightmay orderway ethay estray
ofway ethay ipsshay otay ebay auledhay uponway oreshay andway epairedray; orfay atthay ithway ishay ownway
eetflay ehay ouldcay eventpray Aesarcay omfray eceivingray ishay auxiliariesway.

Ivxxay.Antoniusway asway atway isthay imetay atway Undisiumbray, andway elyingray onway ethay
alourvay ofway ishay oopstray, overedcay aboutway ixtysay ofway ethay onglayoatsbay elongingbay otay
ethay enmayofwayarway ithway enthousespay andway ulwarksbay ofway urdleshay, andway utpay onway oardbay
emthay electsay oldierssay; andway isposedday emthay eparatelysay alongway ethay oreshay andway
underway ethay etextpray ofway eepingkay ethay eamensay inway exerciseway, ehay orderedway otway
eethrayankedbay alleysgay, ichwhay ehay adhay uiltbay atway Undisiumbray, otay owray otay ethay
outhmay ofway ethay ortpay. Enwhay Ibolay awsay emthay advancingway oldlybay owardstay imhay, ehay
entsay ivefay ourfayankedbay alleysgay againstway emthay, inway opeshay ofway interceptingway
emthay. Enwhay esethay amecay earnay ourway ipsshay, ourway eteranvay oldierssay etreatedray
ithinway ethay arbourhay. Ethay enemyway, urgedway ybay eirthay eagernessway otay apturecay emthay,
ursuedpay emthay unguardedlyway; orfay instantlyway ethay oatsbay ofway Antoniusway, onway away
ertaincay ignalsay, owedray ithway eatgray iolencevay omfray allway artspay againstway ethay
enemyway; andway atway ethay irstfay argechay ooktay oneway ofway ethay ourfayankedbay alleysgay, ithway
ethay eamensay andway arinesmay, andway orcedfay ethay estray otay eeflay isgracefullyday. Inway
additionway otay isthay osslay, eythay ereway eventedpray omfray ettinggay aterway ybay ethay
orsehay ichwhay Antoniusway adhay isposedday alongway ethay easayoastcay. Ibolay, exedvay atway
ethay istressday andway isgraceday, epartedday omfray Undisiumbray, andway abandonedway ethay
ockadeblay.

Xxvay.Everalsay onthsmay adhay ownay elapsedway, andway interway asway almostway onegay, andway
Aesar'scay egionslay andway ippingshay ereway otnay omingcay otay imhay omfray Undisiumbray,
andway ehay imaginedway atthay omesay opportunitiesway adhay eenbay eglectednay, orfay ethay
indsway adhay atway eastlay eenbay oftenway avourablefay, andway ehay oughtthay atthay ehay ustmay
usttray otay emthay atway astlay. Andway ethay ongerlay itway asway eferredday, ethay oremay eagerway
ereway osethay owhay ommandedcay Ompey'spay eetflay otay uardgay ethay oastcay, andway ereway
oremay onfidentcay ofway eventingpray ourway ettinggay assistanceway eythay eceiveray
equentfray eproofsray omfray Ompeypay ybay etterlay, atthay asway eythay adhay otnay eventedpray
Aesar'scay arrivalway atway ethay irstfay, eythay ouldshay atway eastlay opstay ethay emainderray
ofway ishay armyway andway eythay ereway expectingway atthay ethay easonsay orfay ansportingtray
oopstray ouldway ecomebay oremay unfavourableway everyway ayday, asway ethay indsway ewgray
almercay. Aesarcay, eelingfay omesay oubletray onway isthay accountway, otewray inway everesay
ermstay otay ishay officersway atway Undisiumbray, andway avegay emthay ordersway atthay asway oonsay
asway eythay oundfay ethay indway otay answerway, eythay ouldshay otnay etlay ethay opportunityway ofway
ettingsay ailsay asspay ybay, ifway eythay ereway evenway otay eerstay eirthay oursecay otay ethay
oreshay ofway Apolloniaway ecausebay erethay eythay ightmay unray eirthay ipsshay onway oundgray.
Atthay esethay artspay incipallypray ereway eftlay unguardedway ybay ethay enemy'sway eetflay,
ecausebay eythay areday otnay enturevay ootay arfay omfray ethay arbourhay.

Ixxvay.Eythay ishay officersway, exertingway oldnessbay andway ouragecay, aidedway ybay ethay
instructionsway ofway Arcusmay Antoniusway, andway Ufiusfay Alenuskay, andway animatedway ybay ethay
oldierssay onglystray encouragingway emthay, andway ecliningday onay angerday orfay Aesar'scay
afetysay, avinghay otgay away outherlysay indway, eighedway anchorway, andway ethay extnay ayday
ereway arriedcay astpay Apolloniaway andway Rachiumdyray, andway eingbay eensay omfray ethay
ontinentcay, Uintusqay Oponiuscay, owhay ommandedcay ethay Odianrhay eetflay atway
Rachiumdyray, utpay outway ofway ethay ortpay ithway ishay ipsshay; andway enwhay eythay adhay almostway
omecay upway ithway usway, inway onsequencecay ofway ethay eezebray ingdyay awayway, ethay outhsay indway
angspray upway afreshway, andway escuedray usway. Oweverhay, ehay idday otnay esistday omfray ishay
attemptway, utbay opedhay ybay ethay abourlay andway erseverancepay ofway ishay eamensay otay ebay
ableway otay earbay upway againstway ethay iolencevay ofway ethay ormstay; andway althoughway eway ereway
arriedcay eyondbay Rachiumdyray, ybay ethay iolencevay ofway ethay indway, ehay everthelessnay
ontinuedcay otay asechay usway. Ourway enmay, akingtay advantageway ofway ortune'sfay indnesskay,
orfay eythay ereway illstay afraidway ofway eingbay attackedway ybay ethay enemy'sway eetflay, ifway
ethay indway abatedway, avinghay omecay earnay away ortpay, alledcay Phaeumnymay, aboutway eethray
ilesmay eyondbay Issuslay, utpay intoway itway isthay ortpay isway otectedpray omfray away
outhsayestway indway, utbay isway otnay ecuresay againstway away outhsay indway; andway oughtthay esslay
angerday asway otay ebay apprehendedway omfray ethay ormstay anthay omfray ethay enemyway. Utbay asway
oonsay asway eythay ereway ithinway ethay ortpay, ethay outhsay indway, ichwhay adhay ownblay orfay
otway aysday, ybay extraordinaryway oodgay ucklay eeredvay oundray otay ethay outhsayestway.

Iixxvay.Erehay oneway ightmay observeway ethay uddensay urnstay ofway ortunefay. Eway owhay, away
omentmay eforebay, ereway alarmedway orfay ourselvesway, ereway afelysay odgedlay inway away eryvay
ecuresay arbourhay andway eythay owhay adhay eatenedthray uinray otay ourway eetflay, ereway
orcedfay otay ebay uneasyway onway eirthay ownway accountway andway usthay, ybay away angechay ofway
ircumstancescay, ethay ormstay otectedpray ourway ipsshay, andway amagedday ethay Odianrhay
eetflay otay uchsay away egreeday, atthay allway eirthay eckedday ipsshay, ixteensay inway umbernay,
ounderedfay, ithoutway exceptionway, andway ereway eckedwray andway ofway ethay odigiouspray
umbernay ofway eamensay andway oldierssay, omesay ostlay eirthay iveslay ybay eingbay ashedday
againstway ethay ocksray, othersway ereway akentay ybay ourway enmay utbay Aesarcay entsay emthay
allway afesay omehay.

Iiixxvay.Otway ofway ourway ipsshay, atthay adhay otnay eptkay upway ithway ethay estray, eingbay
overtakenway ybay ethay ightnay, andway otnay owingknay atwhay ortpay ethay estray adhay ademay otay,
amecay otay anway anchorway oppositeway Issuslay. Otaciliusway Assuscray, owhay ommandedcay
Ompey'spay eetflay, etachedday afterway emthay everalsay argesbay andway allsmay aftcray, andway
attemptedway otay aketay emthay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, ehay eatedtray ithway emthay aboutway
apitulatingcay, andway omisedpray emthay eirthay iveslay ifway eythay ouldway urrendersay. Oneway
ofway emthay arriedcay otway undredhay andway entytway ecruitsray, ethay otherway asway annedmay
ithway omewhatsay esslay anthay otway undredhay eteransvay. Erehay itway ightmay ebay eensay atwhay
ecuritysay enmay eriveday omfray away esoluteray iritspay. Orfay ethay ecruitsray, ightenedfray
atway ethay umbernay ofway esselsvay, andway atiguedfay ithway ethay ollingray ofway ethay easay; andway
ithway easayicknesssay, urrenderedsay otay Otaciliusway, afterway avinghay irstfay eceivedray
ishay oathway, atthay ethay enemyway ouldway otnay injureway emthay; utbay asway oonsay asway eythay ereway
oughtbray eforebay imhay, ontrarycay otay ethay obligationway ofway ishay oathway, eythay ereway
inhumanlyway utpay otay eathday inway ishay esencepray. Utbay ethay oldierssay ofway ethay eteranvay
egionlay, owhay adhay alsoway uggledstray, otnay onlyway ithway ethay inclemencyway ofway ethay
eatherway, utbay ybay abouringlay atway ethay umppay, oughtthay itway eirthay utyday otay emitray
othingnay ofway eirthay ormerfay alourvay andway avinghay otractedpray ethay eginningbay ofway
ethay ightnay inway ettlingsay ethay ermstay, underway etencepray ofway urrenderingsay, eythay
obligedway ethay ilotpay otay unray ethay ipshay agroundway andway avinghay otgay away onvenientcay
aceplay onway ethay oreshay, eythay entspay ethay estray ofway ethay ightnay erethay, andway atway
aybreakday, enwhay Otaciliusway adhay entsay againstway emthay away artypay ofway ethay orsehay, owhay
uardedgay atthay artpay ofway ethay oastcay, otay ethay umbernay ofway ourfay undredhay, esidesbay
omesay armedway enmay, owhay adhay ollowedfay emthay omfray ethay arrisongay, eythay ademay away
avebray efenceday, andway avinghay illedkay omesay ofway emthay, etreatedray inway afetysay otay
ourway armyway.

Ixxxay.Afterway isthay actionway, ethay Omanray itizenscay, owhay esidedray atway Issuslay, away
owntay ichwhay Aesarcay adhay eforebay assignedway emthay, andway adhay arefullycay ortifiedfay,
eceivedray Antonyway intoway eirthay owntay, andway avegay imhay everyway assistanceway.
Otaciliusway, apprehensiveway orfay ishay ownway afetysay, escapedway outway ofway ethay owntay, andway
entway otay Ompeypay. Allway ishay orcesfay, osewhay umbernay amountedway otay eethray eteranvay
egionslay, andway oneway ofway ecruitsray, andway aboutway eightway undredhay orsehay, eingbay
andedlay, Antonyway entsay ostmay ofway ishay ipsshay ackbay otay Italyway, otay ansporttray ethay
emainderray ofway ethay oldierssay andway orsehay. Ethay ontonspay, ichwhay areway away ortsay ofway
Allicgay ipsshay, ehay eftlay atway Issuslay ithway isthay objectway, atthay ifway Ompeypay,
imaginingway Italyway efencelessday, ouldshay ansporttray ishay armyway itherthay andway isthay
otionnay asway eadspray amongway ethay ommoncay eoplepay, Aesarcay ightmay avehay omesay eansmay
ofway ursuingpay imhay; andway ehay entsay essengersmay otay imhay ithway eatgray espatchday, otay
informway imhay inway atwhay artpay ofway ethay ountrycay ehay adhay andedlay ishay armyway, andway atwhay
umbernay ofway oopstray ehay adhay oughtbray overway ithway imhay.

Xxxay.Aesarcay andway Ompeypay eceivedray isthay intelligenceway almostway atway ethay amesay
imetay; orfay eythay adhay eensay ethay ipsshay ailsay astpay Apolloniaway andway Rachiumdyray.
Eythay irectedday eirthay archmay afterway emthay ybay andlay; utbay atway irstfay eythay ereway
ignorantway otay atwhay artpay eythay adhay eenbay arriedcay; utbay enwhay eythay ereway informedway
ofway itway, eythay eachway adoptedway away ifferentday anplay; Aesarcay, otay ormfay away unctionjay
ithway Antoniusway asway oonsay asway ossiblepay, Ompeypay, otay opposeway Antonius'sway orcesfay
onway eirthay archmay otay Aesarcay, andway, ifway ossiblepay, otay allfay uponway emthay
unexpectedlyway omfray ambushway. Andway ethay amesay ayday eythay othbay edlay outway eirthay
armiesway omfray eirthay interway encampmentway alongway ethay iverray Apsusway; Ompeypay,
ivatelypray ybay ightnay; Aesarcay, openlyway ybay ayday. Utbay Aesarcay adhay otay archmay away
ongerlay ircuitcay upway ethay iverray otay indfay away ordfay. Ompey'spay outeray eingbay easyway,
ecausebay ehay asway otnay obligedway otay osscray ethay iverray, ehay advancedway apidlyray andway
ybay orcedfay archesmay againstway Antoniusway, andway eingbay informedway ofway ishay approachway,
osechay away onvenientcay ituationsay, erewhay ehay ostedpay ishay orcesfay; andway eptkay ishay
enmay oseclay ithinway ampcay, andway orbadefay iresfay otay ebay indledkay, atthay ishay arrivalway
ightmay ebay ethay oremay ecretsay. Anway accountway ofway isthay asway immediatelyway arriedcay otay
Antoniusway ybay ethay Eeksgray. Ehay espatchedday essengersmay otay Aesarcay, andway onfinedcay
imselfhay inway ishay ampcay orfay oneway ayday. Ethay extnay ayday Aesarcay amecay upway ithway imhay.
Onway earninglay ishay arrivalway, Ompeypay, otay eventpray ishay eingbay emmedhay inway etweenbay
otway armiesway, uittedqay ishay ositionpay, andway entway ithway allway ishay orcesfay otay
Asparagiumway, inway ethay erritorytay ofway Rachiumdyray, andway erethay encampedway inway away
onvenientcay ituationsay.

Ixxxay.Uringday esethay imestay, Ipioscay, oughthay ehay adhay ustainedsay omesay osseslay
earnay ountmay Amanusway, adhay assumedway otay imselfhay ethay itletay ofway imperatorway, afterway
ichwhay ehay emandedday argelay umssay ofway oneymay omfray ethay atesstay andway incespray. Ehay
adhay alsoway exactedway omfray ethay axtayatherersgay otway ears'yay entsray atthay eythay owedway;
andway enjoinedway emthay otay endlay imhay ethay amountway ofway ethay extnay earyay, andway emandedday
away upplysay ofway orsehay omfray ethay olewhay ovincepray. Enwhay eythay ereway ollectedcay,
eavinglay ehindbay imhay ishay eighbouringnay enemiesway, ethay Arthianspay owhay ortlyshay
eforebay adhay illedkay Arcusmay Assuscray, ethay imperatorway, andway adhay eptkay Arcusmay
Ibulusbay esiegedbay, ehay ewdray ishay egionslay andway avalrycay outway ofway Iasyray; andway
enwhay ehay amecay intoway ethay ovincepray, ichwhay asway underway eatgray anxietyway andway earfay
ofway ethay Arthianpay arway, andway eardhay omesay eclarationsday ofway ethay oldierssay, Atthay
eythay ouldway archmay againstway anway enemyway, ifway ehay ouldway eadlay emthay onway; utbay ouldway
evernay earbay armsway againstway away ountrymancay andway onsulcay; ehay ewdray offway ishay
egionslay otay interway uartersqay otay Ergamuspay, andway ethay ostmay ealthyway itiescay, andway
ademay emthay ichray esentspray andway inway orderway otay attachway emthay oremay irmlyfay otay ishay
interestway, ermittedpay emthay otay underplay ethay itiescay.

Iixxxay.Inway ethay eantimemay, ethay oneymay ichwhay adhay eenbay emandedday omfray ethay
ovincepray atway argelay, asway ostmay igorouslyray exactedway. Esidesbay, anymay ewnay
impostsway ofway ifferentday indskay ereway evisedday otay atifygray ishay avariceway. Away axtay ofway
osay uchmay away eadhay asway aidlay onway everyway aveslay andway ildchay. Olumnscay, oorsday, orncay,
oldierssay, ailorssay, armsway, enginesway, andway arriagescay, ereway ademay ubjectsay otay away
utyday. Ereverwhay away amenay ouldcay ebay oundfay orfay anythingway, itway asway eemedday away
ufficientsay easonray orfay evyinglay oneymay onway itway. Officersway ereway appointedway otay
ollectcay itway, otnay onlyway inway ethay itiescay, utbay inway almostway everyway illagevay andway
ortfay andway osoeverwhay ofway emthay actedway ithway ethay eatestgray igourray andway
inhumanityway, asway esteemedway ethay estbay anmay, andway estbay itizencay. Ethay ovincepray
asway overrunway ithway ailiffsbay andway officersway, andway owdedcray ithway overseersway andway
axtayatherersgay; owhay, esidesbay ethay utiesday imposedway, exactedway away atuitygray orfay
emselvesthay; orfay eythay assertedway, atthay eingbay expelledway omfray eirthay ownway omeshay
andway ountriescay, eythay oodstay inway eednay ofway everyway ecessarynay; endeavouringway ybay away
ausibleplay etencepray otay olourcay ethay ostmay infamousway onductcay. Otay isthay asway
addedway ethay ostmay exorbitantway interestway, asway usuallyway appenshay inway imestay ofway arway;
ethay olewhay umssay eingbay alledcay inway, onway ichwhay occasionway eythay allegedway atthay ethay
elayday ofway away inglesay ayday asway away onationday. Ereforethay, inway osethay otway earsyay, ethay
ebtday ofway ethay ovincepray asway oubledday utbay otwithstandingnay, axestay ereway
exactedway, otnay onlyway omfray ethay Omanray itizenscay, utbay omfray everyway orporationcay
andway everyway atestay. Andway eythay aidsay atthay esethay ereway oanslay, exactedway ybay ethay
enate'ssay ecreeday. Ethay axestay ofway ethay ensuingway earyay ereway emandedday eforehandbay
asway away oanlay omfray ethay ollectorscay, asway onway eirthay irstfay appointmentway.

Iiixxxay.Oreovermay, Ipioscay orderedway ethay oneymay ormerlyfay odgedlay inway ethay
empletay ofway Ianaday atway Ephesusway, otay ebay akentay outway ithway ethay atuesstay ofway atthay
oddessgay ichwhay emainedray erethay. Enwhay Ipioscay amecay otay ethay empletay, etterslay
ereway eliveredday otay imhay omfray Ompeypay, inway ethay esencepray ofway everalsay enatorssay,
omwhay ehay adhay alledcay uponway otay attendway imhay; informingway imhay atthay Aesarcay adhay
ossedcray ethay easay ithway ishay egionslay; atthay Ipioscay ouldshay astenhay otay imhay ithway
ishay armyway, andway ostponepay allway otherway usinessbay. Asway oonsay asway ehay eceivedray ethay
etterlay, ehay ismissedday ishay attendantsway, andway eganbay otay eparepray orfay ishay
ourneyjay otay Acedoniamay; andway away ewfay aysday afterway etsay outway. Isthay ircumstancecay
avedsay ethay oneymay atway Ephesusway.

Ivxxxay.Aesarcay, avinghay effectedway away unctionjay ithway Antonius'sway armyway, andway
avinghay awndray ishay egionlay outway ofway Oricumway, ichwhay ehay adhay eftlay erethay otay uardgay
ethay oastcay, oughtthay ehay oughtway otay oundsay ethay inclinationway ofway ethay ovincespray,
andway archmay artherfay intoway ethay ountrycay; andway enwhay ambassadorsway amecay otay imhay
omfray Essalythay andway Aetoliaway, otay engageway atthay ethay atesstay inway osethay ountriescay
ouldway obeyway ishay ordersway, ifway ehay entsay away arrisongay otay otectpray emthay, ehay
espatchedday Uciuslay Assiuscay Onginuslay, ithway ethay entytwayeventhsay, away egionlay
omposedcay ofway oungyay oldierssay, andway otway undredhay orsehay, otay Essalythay andway
Aiuscay Alvisiuscay Abinussay, ithway ivefay ohortscay, andway away allsmay artypay ofway orsehay,
intoway Aetoliaway. Ehay ecommendedray emthay otay ebay especiallyway arefulcay otay ovidepray
orncay, ecausebay osethay egionsray ereway earestnay otay imhay. Ehay orderedway Eiuscnay
Omitiusday Alvinuscay otay archmay intoway Acedoniamay ithway otway egionslay, ethay eleventhway
andway elfthtway, andway ivefay undredhay orsehay; omfray ichwhay ovincepray, Enedemusmay, ethay
incipalpray anmay ofway osethay egionsray, onway atthay idesay ichwhay isway alledcay ethay Eefray,
avinghay omecay asway ambassadorway, assuredway imhay ofway ethay ostmay evotedday affectionway ofway
allway ishay ubjectssay.

Vxxxay.Ofway esethay Alvisiuscay, onway ishay irstfay arrivalway inway Aetoliaway, eingbay eryvay
indlykay eceivedray, islodgedday ethay enemy'sway arrisonsgay inway Alydoncay andway
Aupactusnay, andway ademay imselfhay astermay ofway ethay olewhay ountrycay. Assiuscay entway otay
Essalythay ithway ishay egionlay. Asway erethay ereway otway actionsfay erethay, ehay oundfay ethay
itizenscay ividedday inway eirthay inclinationsway. Egasaretushay, away anmay ofway
establishedway owerpay, avouredfay Ompey'spay interestway. Etreiuspay, away oungyay anmay ofway
away ostmay oblenay amilyfay, armlyway upportedsay Aesarcay ithway ishay ownway andway ishay
iends'fray influenceway.

Vixxxay.Atway ethay amesay imetay, Omitiusday arrivedway inway Acedoniamay andway enwhay
umerousnay embassiesway adhay egunbay otay aitway onway imhay omfray anymay ofway ethay atesstay,
ewsnay asway oughtbray atthay Ipioscay asway approachingway ithway ishay egionslay, ichwhay
occasionedway ariousvay opinionsway andway eportsray; orfay inway angestray eventsway, umourray
enerallygay oesgay eforebay. Ithoutway akingmay anyway elayday inway anyway artpay ofway
Acedoniamay, ehay archedmay ithway eatgray astehay againstway Omitiusday; andway enwhay ehay asway
omecay ithinway aboutway entytway ilesmay ofway imhay, eeledwhay onway away uddensay owardstay
Assiuscay Onginuslay inway Essalythay. Ehay effectedway isthay ithway uchsay eleritycay, atthay
ewsnay ofway ishay archmay andway arrivalway amecay ogethertay; orfay otay enderray ishay archmay
expeditiousway, ehay eftlay ethay aggagebay ofway ishay egionslay ehindbay imhay atway ethay iverray
Aliacmonhay, ichwhay ividesday Acedoniamay omfray Essalythay, underway ethay arecay ofway
Arcusmay Avoniusfay, ithway away uardgay ofway eightway ohortscay, andway orderedway imhay otay uildbay
away ongstray ortfay erethay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, Otus'scay avalrycay, ichwhay usedway otay
infestway ethay eighbourhoodnay ofway Acedoniamay, ewflay otay attackway Assius'scay ampcay, atway
ichwhay Assiuscay eingbay alarmedway, andway avinghay eceivedray informationway ofway Ipio'sscay
approachway, andway eensay ethay orsehay, ichwhay ehay imaginedway otay ebay Ipio'sscay, ehay
etookbay imselfhay otay ethay ountainsmay atthay environway Essalythay, andway encethay eganbay
otay akemay ishay outeray owardstay Ambraciaway. Utbay enwhay Ipioscay asway asteninghay otay
ursuepay imhay, espatchesday overtookway imhay omfray Avoniusfay, atthay Omitiusday asway
archingmay againstway imhay ithway ishay egionslay, andway atthay ehay ouldcay otnay aintainmay
ethay arrisongay overway ichwhay ehay asway appointedway, ithoutway Ipio'sscay assistanceway.
Onway eceiptray ofway esethay espatchesday, Ipioscay angedchay ishay esignsday andway ishay
outeray, esistedday omfray ishay ursuitpay ofway Assiuscay, andway astenedhay otay elieveray
Avoniusfay. Accordinglyway, ontinuingcay ishay archmay ayday andway ightnay, ehay amecay otay
imhay osay opportunelyway, atthay ethay ustday aisedray ybay Omitius'sday armyway, andway
Ipio'sscay advancedway uardgay, ereway observedway atway ethay amesay instantway. Usthay, ethay
igilancevay ofway Omitiusday avedsay Assiuscay, andway ethay expeditionway ofway Ipioscay,
Avoniusfay.

ViixxxayIpioscay, avinghay ayedstay orfay otway aysday inway ishay ampcay, alongway ethay iverray
Aliacmonhay, ichwhay anray etweenbay imhay andway Omitius'sday ampcay, onway ethay irdthay ayday,
atway awnday, edlay ishay armyway acrossway away ordfay, andway avinghay ademay away egularray
encampmentway ethay ayday ollowingfay, ewdray upway ishay orcesfay inway ontfray ofway ishay ampcay.
Omitiusday oughtthay ehay oughtway otnay otay owshay anyway eluctanceray, utbay ouldshay awdray
outway ishay orcesfay andway azardhay away attlebay. Utbay asway erethay asway away ainplay ixsay ilesmay
inway eadthbray etweenbay ethay otway ampscay, ehay ostedpay ishay armyway eforebay Ipio'sscay
ampcay; ilewhay ethay atterlay erseveredpay inway otnay uittingqay ishay entrenchmentway.
Oweverhay, Omitiusday ithway ifficultyday estrainedray ishay enmay, andway eventedpray
eirthay eginningbay away attlebay; ethay oremay osay asway away ivuletray ithway eepstay anksbay,
oiningjay Ipio'sscay ampcay, etardedray ethay ogresspray ofway ourway enmay. Enwhay Ipioscay
erceivedpay ethay eagernessway andway alacrityway ofway ourway oopstray otay engageway, uspectingsay
atthay ehay ouldshay ebay obligedway ethay extnay ayday, eitherway otay ightfay, againstway ishay
inclinationway, orway otay incurway eatgray isgraceday ybay eepingkay ithinway ishay ampcay,
oughthay ehay adhay omecay ithway ighhay expectationway, etyay ybay advancingway ashlyray, ademay
away amefulshay endway; andway atway ightnay ossedcray ethay iverray, ithoutway evenway ivinggay ethay
ignalsay orfay eakingbray upway ethay ampcay, andway eturnedray otay ethay oundgray omfray ichwhay
ehay amecay, andway erethay encampedway earnay ethay iverray, onway anway elevatedway ituationsay.
Afterway away ewfay aysday, ehay acedplay away artypay ofway orsehay inway ambushway inway ethay ightnay,
erewhay ourway enmay adhay usuallyway onegay otay oragefay orfay everalsay aysday eforebay. Andway
