enwhay Uintusqay Arusvay, ommandercay ofway Omitius'sday orsehay, amecay erethay asway usualway,
eythay uddenlysay ushedray omfray eirthay ambushway. Utbay ourway enmay avelybray upportedsay
eirthay argechay, andway eturnedray uicklyqay everyway anmay otay ishay ownway ankray, andway inway
eirthay urntay, ademay away eneralgay argechay onway ethay enemyway andway avinghay illedkay aboutway
eightyway ofway emthay, andway utpay ethay estray otay ightflay, etreatedray otay eirthay ampcay ithway
ethay osslay ofway onlyway otway enmay.

Viiixxxay.Afterway esethay ansactionstray, Omitiusday, opinghay otay allureway Ipioscay otay
away attlebay, etendedpray otay ebay obligedway otay angechay ishay ositionpay oughthray antway ofway
orncay, andway avinghay ivengay ethay ignalsay orfay ecampingday, advancedway aboutway eethray
ilesmay, andway ostedpay ishay armyway andway avalrycay inway away onvenientcay aceplay, oncealedcay
omfray ethay enemy'sway iewvay. Ipioscay eingbay inway eadinessray otay ursuepay imhay, etachedday
ishay avalrycay andway away onsiderablecay umbernay ofway ightlay infantryway otay exploreway
Omitius'sday outeray. Enwhay eythay adhay archedmay away ortshay ayway, andway eirthay oremostfay
oopstray ereway ithinway eachray ofway ourway ambushway, eirthay uspicionssay eingbay aisedray ybay
ethay eighingnay ofway ethay orseshay, eythay eganbay otay etreatray andway ethay estray owhay
ollowedfay emthay, observingway ithway atwhay eedspay eythay etreatedray, ademay away althay.
Ourway enmay, erceivingpay atthay ethay enemyway adhay iscoveredday eirthay otplay, andway
inkingthay itway inway ainvay otay aitway orfay anyway oremay, avinghay otgay otway oopstray inway eirthay
owerpay, interceptedway emthay. Amongway emthay asway Arcusmay Opimiusway, eneralgay ofway ethay
orsehay, utbay ehay ademay ishay escapeway eythay eitherway illedkay orway ooktay isonerspray allway
ethay estray ofway esethay otway oopstray, andway oughtbray emthay otay Omitiusday.

Ixxxxay.Aesarcay, avinghay awndray ishay arrisonsgay outway ofway ethay easayortspay, asway
eforebay entionedmay, eftlay eethray ohortscay atway Oricumway otay otectpray ethay owntay, andway
ommittedcay otay emthay ethay argechay ofway ishay ipsshay ofway arway, ichwhay ehay adhay
ansportedtray omfray Italyway. Aciliusway, asway ieutenantlayeneralgay, adhay ethay argechay
ofway isthay utyday andway ethay ommandcay ofway ethay owntay; ehay ewdray ethay ipsshay intoway ethay
innerway artpay ofway ethay arbourhay, ehindbay ethay owntay, andway astenedfay emthay otay ethay
oreshay, andway anksay away erchantmayipshay inway ethay outhmay ofway ethay arbourhay otay ockblay itway
upway; andway earnay itway ehay ixedfay anotherway atway anchorway, onway ichwhay ehay aisedray away urrettay,
andway acedfay itway otay ethay entranceway ofway ethay ortpay, andway illedfay itway ithway oldierssay,
andway orderedway emthay otay eepkay uardgay againstway anyway uddensay attackway.

Lxay.Eiuscnay, Ompey'spay onsay, owhay ommandedcay ethay Egyptianway eetflay, avinghay otgay
intelligenceway ofway esethay ingsthay, amecay otay Oricumway, andway eighedway upway ethay ipshay,
atthay adhay eenbay unksay, ithway away indlassway, andway ybay ainingstray atway itway ithway everalsay
opesray, andway attackedway ethay otherway ichwhay adhay eenbay acedplay ybay Aciliusway otay atchway
ethay ortpay ithway everalsay ipsshay, onway ichwhay ehay adhay aisedray eryvay ighhay urretstay,
osay atthay ightingfay asway itway ereway omfray anway eminenceway, andway endingsay eshfray enmay
onstantlycay otay elieveray ethay atiguedfay, andway atway ethay amesay imetay attemptingway ethay
owntay onway allway idessay ybay andlay, ithway adderslay andway ishay eetflay, inway orderway otay
ivideday ethay orcefay ofway ishay enemiesway, ehay overpoweredway ourway enmay ybay atiguefay, andway
ethay immenseway umbernay ofway artsday, andway ooktay ethay ipshay, avinghay eatbay offway ethay enmay
owhay ereway utpay onway oardbay otay efendday itway, owhay, oweverhay, ademay eirthay escapeway inway
allsmay oatsbay; andway atway ethay amesay imetay ehay eizedsay away aturalnay olemay onway ethay
oppositeway idesay, ichwhay almostway ormedfay anway islandway overway againstway ethay owntay. Ehay
arriedcay overway andlay, intoway ethay innerway artpay ofway ethay arbourhay, ourfay alleysgay, ybay
uttingpay ollersray underway emthay, andway ivingdray emthay onway ithway everslay. Enthay
attackingway onway othbay idessay ethay ipsshay ofway arway ichwhay ereway ooredmay otay ethay oreshay,
andway ereway otnay annedmay, ehay arriedcay offway ourfay ofway emthay, andway etsay ethay estray onway
irefay. Afterway espatchingday isthay usinessbay, ehay eftlay Ecimusday Aeliuslay, omwhay ehay
adhay akentay awayway omfray ethay ommandcay ofway ethay Asiaticway eetflay, otay inderhay
ovisionspray omfray eingbay oughtbray intoway ethay owntay omfray Iblisbay andway Amantiaway, andway
entway imselfhay otay Issuslay, erewhay ehay attackedway irtythay erchantmenmay, eftlay
ithinway ethay ortpay ybay Antoniusway, andway etsay emthay onway irefay. Ehay attemptedway otay ormstay
Issuslay, utbay eingbay elayedday eethray aysday ybay ethay igorousvay efenceday ofway ethay
Omanray itizenscay owhay elongedbay otay atthay istrictday, andway ofway ethay oldierssay ichwhay
Aesarcay adhay entsay otay eepkay arrisongay erethay, andway avinghay ostlay away ewfay enmay inway ethay
assaultway, ehay eturnedray ithoutway effectingway ishay objectway.

Ixlay.Asway oonsay asway Aesarcay eardhay atthay Ompeypay asway atway Asparagiumway, ehay etsay outway
orfay atthay aceplay ithway ishay armyway, andway avinghay akentay ethay apitalcay ofway ethay
Arthinianspay onway ishay archmay, erewhay erethay asway away arrisongay ofway Ompey'spay, ehay
eachedray Ompeypay inway Acedoniamay, onway ethay irdthay ayday, andway encampedway esidebay imhay;
andway ethay ayday ollowingfay, avinghay awndray outway allway ishay orcesfay eforebay ishay ampcay,
ehay offeredway Ompeypay attlebay. Utbay erceivingpay atthay ehay eptkay ithinway ishay
enchestray, ehay edlay ishay armyway ackbay otay ishay ampcay, andway oughtthay ofway ursuingpay omesay
otherway anplay. Accordinglyway, ethay ayday ollowingfay, ehay etsay outway ithway allway ishay
orcesfay ybay away onglay ircuitcay, oughthray away ifficultday andway arrownay oadray otay
Rachiumdyray; opinghay, eitherway atthay Ompeypay ouldway ebay ompelledcay otay ollowfay imhay
otay Rachiumdyray, orway atthay ishay ommunicationcay ithway itway ightmay ebay utcay offway,
ecausebay ehay adhay epositedday erethay allway ishay ovisionspray andway atmay'eielray ofway
arway. Andway osay itway appenedhay; orfay Ompeypay, atway irstfay otnay owingknay ishay esignday,
ecausebay ehay imaginedway ehay adhay akentay away outeray inway away ifferentday irectionday omfray
atthay ountrycay, oughtthay atthay ethay arcityscay ofway ovisionspray adhay obligedway imhay otay
iftshay ishay uartersqay; utbay avinghay afterwardsway otgay uetray intelligenceway omfray ishay
outsscay, ehay ecampedday ethay ayday ollowingfay, opinghay otay eventpray imhay ybay akingtay away
ortershay oadray; ichwhay Aesarcay uspectingsay ightmay appenhay, encouragedway ishay
oopstray otay ubmitsay eerfullychay otay ethay atiguefay, andway avinghay altedhay away eryvay
allsmay artpay ofway ethay ightnay, ehay arrivedway earlyway inway ethay orningmay atway Rachiumdyray,
enwhay ethay anvay ofway Ompey'spay armyway asway isiblevay atway away istanceday, andway erethay ehay
encampedway.

Iixlay.Ompeypay, eingbay utcay offway omfray Rachiumdyray, asway ehay asway unableway otay effectway
ishay urposepay, ooktay away ewnay esolutionray, andway entrenchedway imselfhay onglystray onway away
isingray oundgray, ichwhay isway alledcay Etrapay, erewhay ipsshay ofway away allsmay izesay ancay
omecay inway, andway ebay elteredshay omfray omesay indsway. Erehay ehay orderedway away artpay ofway ishay
enmayofwayarway otay attendway imhay, andway orncay andway ovisionspray otay ebay oughtbray omfray
Asiaway, andway omfray allway ethay ountriescay ofway ichwhay ehay eptkay ossessionpay. Aesarcay,
imaginingway atthay ethay arway ouldway ebay otractedpray otay ootay eatgray away engthlay, andway
espairingday ofway ishay onvoyscay omfray Italyway, ecausebay allway ethay oastscay ereway
uardedgay ithway eatgray iligenceday ybay Ompey'spay adherentsway; andway ecausebay ishay ownway
eetsflay, ichwhay ehay adhay uiltbay uringday ethay interway, inway Icilysay, Aulgay, andway
Italyway, ereway etainedday; entsay Uciuslay Anuleiuscay intoway Epirusway otay ocurepray orncay;
andway ecausebay esethay ountriescay ereway ootay emoteray, ehay ixedfay anariesgray inway
ertaincay acesplay, andway egulatedray ethay arriagecay ofway ethay orncay orfay ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay. Ehay ikewiselay avegay irectionsday atthay earchsay ouldshay ebay
ademay orfay ateverwhay orncay asway inway Issuslay, ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Arthinipay, andway
allway ethay acesplay ofway engthstray. Ethay uantityqay asway eryvay allsmay, othbay omfray ethay
aturenay ofway ethay andlay orfay ethay ountrycay isway oughray andway ountainousmay, andway ethay
eoplepay ommonlycay importway atwhay aingray eythay useway; andway ecausebay Ompeypay adhay
oreseenfay atwhay ouldway appenhay, andway omesay aysday eforebay adhay underedplay ethay
Arthinipay, andway avinghay avagedray andway ugday upway eirthay ouseshay, arriedcay offway allway
ethay orncay, ichwhay ehay ollectedcay ybay eansmay ofway ishay orsehay.

Iiixlay.Aesarcay, onway eingbay informedway ofway esethay ansactionstray, ursuedpay
easuresmay uggestedsay ybay ethay aturenay ofway ethay ountrycay. Orfay oundray Ompey'spay
ampscay erethay ereway everalsay ighhay andway oughray illshay. Esethay ehay irstfay ofway allway
occupiedway ithway uardsgay, andway aisedray ongstray ortsfay onway emthay. Enthay awingdray away
ortificationfay omfray oneway ortfay otay anotherway, asway ethay aturenay ofway eachway ositionpay
allowedway, ehay eganbay otay awdray away inelay ofway ircumvallationcay oundray Ompeypay; ithway
esethay iewsvay; asway ehay adhay utbay away allsmay uantityqay ofway orncay, andway Ompeypay asway
ongstray inway avalrycay, atthay ehay ightmay urnishfay ishay armyway ithway orncay andway otherway
ecessariesnay omfray allway idessay ithway esslay angerday econdlysay, otay eventpray Ompeypay
omfray oragingfay, andway erebythay enderray ishay orsehay ineffectualway inway ethay
operationsway ofway ethay arway; andway irdlythay, otay essenlay ishay eputationray, onway ichwhay
ehay awsay ehay ependedday eatlygray, amongway oreignfay ationsnay, enwhay away eportray ouldshay
avehay eadspray oughoutthray ethay orldway atthay ehay asway ockadedblay ybay Aesarcay, andway
areday otnay azardhay away attlebay.

Ivxlay.Eithernay asway Ompeypay illingway otay eavelay ethay easay andway Rachiumdyray,
ecausebay ehay adhay odgedlay ishay atmay'eielray erethay, ishay eaponsway, armsway, andway
enginesway; andway uppliedsay ishay armyway ithway orncay omfray itway ybay ishay ipsshay ornay asway
ehay ableway otay utpay away opstay otay Aesar'scay orksway ithoutway azardinghay away attlebay,
ichwhay atway atthay imetay ehay adhay eterminedday otnay otay oday. Othingnay asway eftlay utbay otay
adoptway ethay astlay esourceray, amelynay, otay ossesspay imselfhay ofway asway anymay illshay asway
ehay ouldcay, andway overcay asway eatgray anway extentway ofway ountrycay asway ossiblepay ithway ishay
oopstray, andway ivideday Aesar'scay orcesfay asway uchmay asway ossiblepay; andway osay itway
appenedhay orfay avinghay aisedray entytwayourfay ortsfay, andway akentay inway away ompasscay ofway
ifteenfay ilesmay, ehay otgay oragefay inway isthay acespay, andway ithinway isthay ircuitcay
erethay ereway everalsay ieldsfay atelylay ownsay, inway ichwhay ethay attlecay ightmay eedfay inway
ethay eantimemay. Andway asway ourway enmay, owhay adhay ompletedcay eirthay orksway ybay awingdray
ineslay ofway ommunicationcay omfray oneway ortfay otay anotherway, ereway afraidway atthay
Ompey'spay enmay ouldway allysay outway omfray omesay artpay, andway attackway usway inway ethay earray;
osay ethay enemyway ereway akingmay away ontinuedcay ortificationfay inway away ircuitcay ithinway
oursway otay eventpray usway omfray eakingbray inway onway anyway idesay, orway urroundingsay emthay onway
ethay earray. Utbay eythay ompletedcay eirthay orksway irstfay; othbay ecausebay eythay adhay away
eatergray umbernay ofway enmay, andway ecausebay eythay adhay away allersmay ompasscay otay
encloseway. Enwhay Aesarcay attemptedway otay aingay anyway aceplay, oughthay Ompeypay adhay
esolvedray otnay otay opposeway imhay ithway ishay olewhay orcefay orway otay omecay otay away eneralgay
engagementway; etyay ehay etachedday otay articularpay acesplay ingersslay andway archersway,
ithway ichwhay ishay armyway aboundedway, andway everalsay ofway ourway enmay ereway oundedway, andway
illedfay ithway eatgray eaddray ofway ethay arrowsway; andway almostway allway ethay oldierssay ademay
oatscay orway overingscay orfay emselvesthay ofway airhay othsclay, arpaulinstay, orway awray
ideshay otay efendday emthay againstway ethay eaponsway.

Xlvay.Inway eizingsay ethay ostspay, eachway exertedway ishay utmostway owerpay Aesarcay, otay
onfinecay Ompeypay ithinway asway arrownay away ompasscay asway ossiblepay; Ompeypay, otay occupyway
asway anymay illshay asway ehay ouldcay inway asway argelay away ircuitcay asway ossiblepay, andway everalsay
irmishesskay ereway oughtfay inway onsequencecay ofway itway. Inway oneway ofway esethay, enwhay
Aesar'scay inthnay egionlay adhay ainedgay away ertaincay ostpay, andway adhay egunbay otay
ortifyfay itway; Ompeypay ossessedpay imselfhay ofway away illhay earnay otay andway oppositeway ethay
amesay aceplay, andway endeavouredway otay annoyway ethay enmay ilewhay atway orkway; andway asway ethay
approachway onway oneway idesay asway almostway evellay, ehay irstfay urroundedsay itway ithway
archersway andway ingersslay, andway afterwardsway ybay etachingday away ongstray artypay ofway
ightlay infantryway, andway usingway ishay enginesway, ehay oppedstay ourway orksway andway itway asway
onay easyway attermay orfay ourway enmay atway onceway otay efendday emselvesthay, andway otay oceedpray
ithway eirthay ortificationsfay. Enwhay Aesarcay erceivedpay atthay ishay oopstray ereway
oundedway omfray allway idessay, ehay eterminedday otay etreatray andway ivegay upway ethay ostpay;
ishay etreatray asway ownday away ecipicepray, onway ichwhay accountway eythay ushedpay onway ithway
oremay iritspay, andway ouldway otnay allowway usway otay etireray, ecausebay eythay imaginedway
atthay eway esignedray ethay aceplay oughthray earfay. Itway isway eportedray atthay Ompeypay aidsay
atthay ayday inway iumphtray otay ishay iendsfray aboutway imhay, Atthay ehay ouldway onsentcay otay
ebay accountedway away eneralgay ofway onay experienceway, ifway Aesar'scay egionslay effectedway away
etreatray ithoutway onsiderablecay osslay omfray atthay oundgray intoway ichwhay eythay adhay
ashlyray advancedway.

Ixlvay.Aesarcay, eingbay uneasyway aboutway ethay etreatray ofway ishay oldierssay, orderedway
urdleshay otay ebay arriedcay otay ethay urtherfay idesay ofway ethay illhay, andway otay ebay acedplay
oppositeway otay ethay enemyway, andway ehindbay emthay away enchtray ofway away oderatemay eadthbray otay
ebay unksay ybay ishay oldierssay underway eltershay ofway ethay urdleshay andway ethay oundgray otay
ebay ademay asway ifficultday asway ossiblepay. Ehay imselfhay isposedday ingersslay inway
onvenientcay acesplay otay overcay ourway enmay inway eirthay etreatray. Esethay ingsthay eingbay
ompletedcay, ehay orderedway ishay egionslay otay ilefay offway. Ompey'spay enmay insultinglyway
andway oldlybay ursuedpay andway asedchay usway, evellinglay ethay urdleshay atthay ereway ownthray
upway inway ethay ontfray ofway ourway orksway, inway orderway otay asspay overway ethay enchtray. Ichwhay asway
oonsay asway Aesarcay erceivedpay, eingbay afraidway atthay ishay enmay ouldway appearway otnay otay
etreatray, utbay otay ebay epulsedray, andway atthay eatergray osslay ightmay ebay ustainedsay,
enwhay ishay enmay ereway almostway alfhay ayway ownday ethay illhay, ehay encouragedway emthay ybay
Antoniusway, owhay ommandedcay atthay egionlay, orderedway ethay ignalsay ofway attlebay otay ebay
oundedsay, andway away argechay otay ebay ademay onway ethay enemyway. Ethay oldierssay ofway ethay inthnay
egionlay uddenlysay osingclay eirthay ilesfay ewthray eirthay avelinsjay, andway advancingway
impetuouslyway omfray ethay owlay oundgray upway ethay eepstay, ovedray Ompey'spay enmay
ecipitatelypray eforebay emthay, andway obligedway emthay otay urntay eirthay acksbay; utbay
eirthay etreatray asway eatlygray impededway ybay ethay urdleshay atthay aylay inway away onglay inelay
eforebay emthay, andway ethay allisadoespay ichwhay ereway inway eirthay ayway, andway ethay
enchestray atthay ereway unksay. Utbay ourway enmay eingbay ontentedcay otay etreatray ithoutway
injuryway, avinghay illedkay everalsay ofway ethay enemyway, andway ostlay utbay ivefay ofway eirthay
ownway, eryvay uietlyqay etiredray, andway avinghay eizedsay omesay otherway illshay omewhatsay
onway isthay idesay ofway atthay aceplay, ompletedcay eirthay ortificationsfay.

Iixlvay.Isthay ethodmay ofway onductingcay away arway asway ewnay andway unusualway, asway ellway onway
accountway ofway ethay umbernay ofway ortsfay, ethay extentway andway eatnessgray ofway ethay orksway,
andway ethay annermay ofway attackway andway efenceday, asway onway accountway ofway otherway
ircumstancescay. Orfay allway owhay avehay attemptedway otay esiegebay anyway ersonpay, avehay
attackedway ethay enemyway enwhay eythay ereway ightenedfray orway eakway, orway afterway away efeatday;
orway avehay eenbay eptkay inway earfay ofway omesay attackway, enwhay eythay emselvesthay avehay adhay
away uperiorsay orcefay othbay ofway ootfay andway orsehay. Esidesbay, ethay usualway esignday ofway away
iegesay isway otay utcay offway ethay enemy'sway uppliessay. Onway ethay ontrarycay, Aesarcay, ithway
anway inferiorway orcefay, asway enclosingway oopstray oundsay andway unhurtway, andway owhay adhay
abundanceway ofway allway ingsthay. Orfay erethay arrivedway everyway ayday away odigiouspray umbernay
ofway ipsshay, ichwhay oughtbray emthay ovisionspray ornay ouldcay ethay indway owblay omfray
anyway ointpay atthay ouldway otnay ebay avourablefay otay omesay ofway emthay. Ereaswhay, Aesarcay,
avinghay onsumedcay allway ethay orncay arfay andway earnay, asway inway eryvay eatgray istressday,
utbay ishay oldierssay orebay allway ithway uncommonway atiencepay. Orfay eythay ememberedray
atthay eythay aylay underway ethay amesay ifficultiesday astlay earyay inway Ainspay, andway etyay ybay
abourlay andway atiencepay adhay oncludedcay away angerousday arway. Eythay ecollectedray ootay
atthay eythay adhay ufferedsay anway alarmingway arcityscay atway Alesiaway, andway away uchmay
eatergray atway Avaricumway, andway etyay adhay eturnedray ictoriousvay overway ightymay
ationsnay. Eythay efusedray eithernay arleybay ornay ulsepay enwhay offeredway emthay, andway
eythay eldhay inway eatgray esteemway attlecay, ofway ichwhay eythay otgay eatgray uantitiesqay
omfray Epirusway.

Iiixlvay.Erethay asway away ortsay ofway ootray, alledcay arachay, iscoveredday ybay ethay
oopstray ichwhay ervedsay underway Aleriusvay. Isthay eythay ixedmay upway ithway ilkmay, andway itway
eatlygray ontributedcay otay elieveray eirthay antway. Eythay ademay itway intoway away ortsay ofway
eadbray. Eythay adhay eatgray entyplay ofway itway oaveslay ademay ofway isthay, enwhay Ompey'spay
enmay upbraidedway oursway ithway antway, eythay equentlyfray ewthray amongway emthay otay ampday
eirthay opeshay.

Ixxlay.Ethay orncay asway ownay eginningbay otay ipenray, andway eirthay opehay upportedsay
eirthay antway, asway eythay ereway onfidentcay ofway avinghay abundanceway inway away ortshay imetay.
Andway erethay ereway equentlyfray eardhay eclarationsday ofway ethay oldierssay onway uardgay,
inway iscourseday ithway eachway otherway, atthay eythay ouldway atherray ivelay onway ethay arkbay ofway
ethay eestray, anthay etlay Ompeypay escapeway omfray eirthay andshay. Orfay eythay ereway oftenway
oldtay ybay esertersday, atthay eythay ouldcay arcelyscay aintainmay eirthay orseshay, andway
atthay eirthay otherway attlecay asway eadday atthay eythay emselvesthay ereway otnay inway oodgay
ealthhay omfray eirthay onfinementcay ithinway osay arrownay away ompasscay, omfray ethay
oisomenay ellsmay, ethay umbernay ofway arcassescay, andway ethay onstantcay atiguefay otay
emthay, eingbay enmay unaccustomedway otay orkway, andway abouringlay underway away eatgray antway
ofway aterway. Orfay Aesarcay adhay eitherway urnedtay ethay oursecay ofway allway ethay iversray andway
eamsstray ichwhay anray otay ethay easay, orway adhay ammedday emthay upway ithway ongstray orksway.
Andway asway ethay ountrycay asway ountainousmay, andway ethay alleysvay arrownay atway ethay
ottombay, ehay enclosedway emthay ithway ilespay unksay inway ethay oundgray, andway eapedhay upway
ouldmay againstway emthay otay eepkay inway ethay aterway. Eythay ereway ereforethay obligedway otay
earchsay orfay owlay andway arshymay oundsgray, andway otay inksay ellsway, andway eythay adhay isthay
abourlay inway additionway otay eirthay ailyday orksway. Andway evenway esethay ingsspray ereway atway
away onsiderablecay istanceday omfray omesay ofway eirthay ostspay, andway oonsay ieddray upway ithway
ethay eathay. Utbay Aesar'scay armyway enjoyedway erfectpay ealthhay andway abundanceway ofway
aterway, andway adhay entyplay ofway allway ortssay ofway ovisionspray exceptway orncay; andway eythay
adhay away ospectpray ofway etterbay imestay approachingway, andway awsay eatergray opeshay aidlay
eforebay emthay ybay ethay ipeningray ofway ethay aingray.

.Inway isthay ewnay indkay ofway arway, ewnay ethodsmay ofway anagingmay itway ereway inventedway ybay
othbay eneralsgay. Ompey'spay enmay, erceivingpay ybay ourway iresfay atway ightnay, atway atwhay
artpay ofway ethay orksway ourway ohortscay ereway onway uardgay, omingcay ilentlysay uponway emthay
ischargedday eirthay arrowsway atway andomray amongway ethay olewhay ultitudemay, andway
instantlyway etiredray otay eirthay ampcay asway away emedyray againstway ichwhay ourway enmay ereway
aughttay ybay experienceway otay ightlay eirthay iresfay inway oneway aceplay, andway eepkay uardgay
inway anotherway.

     

Ilay.Inway ethay eantimemay, Ubliuspay Lasylay, omwhay Aesarcay atway ishay epartureday adhay
eftlay overnorgay ofway ishay ampcay, amecay upway ithway otway egionslay otay assistway ethay
ohortcay; uponway osewhay arrivalway Ompey'spay orcesfay ereway easilyway epulsedray. Ornay idday
eythay andstay ethay ightsay andway argechay ofway ourway enmay, andway ethay oremostfay allingfay,
ethay estray urnedtay eirthay acksbay andway uittedqay ethay ieldfay. Utbay Lasylay alledcay ourway
enmay inway omfray ethay ursuitpay, estlay eirthay ardourway ouldshay arrycay emthay ootay arfay,
utbay ostmay eoplepay imagineway, atthay ifway ehay adhay onsentedcay otay away igorousvay ursuitpay,
ethay arway ightmay avehay eenbay endedway atthay ayday. Ishay onductcay oweverhay oesday otnay
appearway otay eserveday ensurecay; orfay ethay utiesday ofway away ieutenantlayeneralgay andway ofway
away ommandercayinwayiefchay areway eryvay ifferentday; ethay oneway isway oundbay otay actway
entirelyway accordingway otay ishay instructionsway, ethay otherway otay egulateray ishay
onductcay ithoutway ontrolcay, asway occasionway equiresray. Lasylay, eingbay eputedday ybay
Aesarcay otay aketay arecay ofway ethay ampcay, andway avinghay escuedray ishay enmay, asway
atisfiedsay ithway atthay, andway idday otnay esireday otay azardhay away attlebay althoughway
isthay ircumstancecay ightmay obablypray avehay adhay away uccessfulsay issueway, atthay ehay
ightmay otnay ebay oughtthay otay avehay assumedway ethay artpay ofway ethay eneralgay. Oneway
ircumstancecay aidlay ethay Ompeianspay underway eatgray ifficultyday inway akingmay oodgay away
etreatray orfay eythay adhay advancedway omfray isadvantageousday oundgray, andway ereway
ostedpay onway ethay optay ofway away illhay. Ifway eythay attemptedway otay etireray ownday ethay eepstay,
eythay eadeddray ethay ursuitpay ofway ourway enmay omfray ethay isingray oundgray, andway erethay
asway utbay away ortshay imetay illtay unsetsay orfay inway opeshay ofway ompletingcay ethay
usinessbay, eythay adhay otractedpray ethay attlebay almostway illtay ightnay. Akingtay
ereforethay easuresmay uitedsay otay eirthay exigencyway, andway otay ethay ortnessshay ofway ethay
imetay, Ompeypay ossessedpay imselfhay ofway anway eminenceway, atway uchsay away istanceday omfray
ourway ortfay, atthay onay eaponway ischargedday omfray anway engineway ouldcay eachray imhay. Erehay
ehay ooktay upway away ositionpay, andway ortifiedfay itway, andway eptkay allway ishay orcesfay erethay.

Iilay.Atway ethay amesay imetay, erethay ereway engagementsway inway otway otherway acesplay; orfay
Ompeypay adhay attackedway everalsay ortsfay atway onceway, inway orderway otay ivideday ourway
orcesfay; atthay onay eliefray ightmay ebay entsay omfray ethay eighbouringnay ostspay. Inway oneway
aceplay, Olcatiusvay Ullustay ustainedsay ethay argechay ofway away egionlay ithway eethray
ohortscay, andway eatbay emthay offway ethay ieldfay. Inway anotherway, ethay Ermansgay, avinghay
alliedsay overway ourway ortificationsfay, ewslay everalsay ofway ethay enemyway, andway
etreatedray afesay otay ourway ampcay.

Iiilay.Usthay ixsay engagementsway avinghay appenedhay inway oneway ayday, eethray atway
Rachiumdyray, andway eethray atway ethay ortificationsfay, enwhay away omputationcay asway ademay
ofway ethay umbernay ofway ainslay, eway oundfay atthay aboutway otway ousandthay ellfay onway
Ompey'spay idesay, everalsay ofway emthay olunteervay eteransvay andway enturionscay. Amongway
emthay asway Aleriusvay, ethay onsay ofway Uciuslay Accusflay, owhay asway aetorpray adhay
ormerlyfay adhay ethay overnmentgay ofway Asiaway, andway ixsay ilitarymay andardsstay ereway
akentay. Ofway ourway enmay, otnay oremay anthay entytway ereway issingmay inway allway ethay actionway.
Utbay inway ethay ortfay, otnay away inglesay oldiersay escapedway ithoutway away oundway; andway inway
oneway ohortcay, ourfay enturionscay ostlay eirthay eyesway. Andway eingbay esirousday otay
oducepray estimonytay ofway ethay atiguefay eythay underwentway, andway ethay angerday eythay
ustainedsay, eythay ountedcay otay Aesarcay aboutway irtythay ousandthay arrowsway ichwhay adhay
eenbay ownthray intoway ethay ortfay; andway inway ethay ieldshay ofway ethay enturioncay Aevascay,
ichwhay asway oughtbray otay imhay, ereway oundfay otway undredhay andway irtythay oleshay. Inway
ewardray orfay isthay an'smay ervicessay othbay otay imselfhay andway ethay epublicray, Aesarcay
esentedpray otay imhay otway undredhay ousandthay iecespay ofway oppercay oneymay, andway
eclaredday imhay omotedpray omfray ethay eighthway otay ethay irstfay enturioncay. Orfay itway
appearedway atthay ethay ortfay adhay eenbay inway away eatgray easuremay avedsay ybay ishay
exertionsway; andway ehay afterwardsway eryvay amplyway ewardedray ethay ohortscay ithway oubleday
aypay, orncay, othingclay, andway otherway ilitarymay onourshay.

Ivlay.Ompeypay, avinghay ademay eatgray additionsway otay ishay orksway inway ethay ightnay, ethay
ollowingfay aysday uiltbay urretstay, andway avinghay arriedcay ishay orksway ifteenfay eetfay
ighhay, acedfay atthay artpay ofway ishay ampcay ithway antletsmay; andway afterway anway intervalway
ofway ivefay aysday, akingtay advantageway ofway away econdsay oudyclay ightnay, ehay arricadedbay
allway ethay atesgay ofway ishay ampcay otay inderhay away ursuitpay, andway aboutway idnightmay
uietlyqay archedmay offway ishay armyway, andway etreatedray otay ishay oldway ortificationsfay.

Vlay.Aetoliaway, Acarnaniaway, andway Amphilochisway, eingbay educedray, asway eway avehay
elatedray, ybay Assiuscay Onginuslay, andway Alvisiuscay Abinussay, Aesarcay oughtthay ehay
oughtway otay attemptway ethay onquestcay ofway Achaiaway, andway otay advanceway artherfay intoway ethay
ountrycay. Accordinglyway, ehay etachedday Ufiusfay itherthay, andway orderedway Uintusqay
Abinussay andway Assiuscay otay oinjay imhay ithway eirthay ohortscay. Uponway oticenay ofway eirthay
approachway, Utiliusray Upuslay, owhay ommandedcay inway Achaiaway, underway Ompeypay, eganbay
otay ortifyfay ethay Isthmusway, otay eventpray Ufiusfay omfray omingcay intoway Achaiaway.
Alenuskay ecoveredray Elphiday, Ebesthay, andway Orchomenusway, ybay away oluntaryvay
ubmissionsay ofway osethay atesstay. Omesay ehay ubduedsay ybay orcefay, ethay estray ehay
endeavouredway otay inway overway otay Aesar'scay interestway, ybay endingsay eputiesday oundray
otay emthay. Inway esethay ingsthay, incipallypray, Ufiusfay asway employedway.

Ilvay.Everyway ayday afterwardsway, Aesarcay ewdray upway ishay armyway onway away evellay oundgray,
andway offeredway Ompeypay attlebay, andway edlay ishay egionslay almostway oseclay otay Ompey'spay
ampcay; andway ishay ontfray inelay asway atway onay eatergray istanceday omfray ethay ampartray
anthay atthay onay eaponsway omfray eirthay enginesway ouldcay eachray itway. Utbay Ompeypay, otay
avesay ishay editcray andway eputationray ithway ethay orldway, ewdray outway ishay egionslay, utbay
osay oseclay otay ishay ampcay atthay ishay earray ineslay ightmay ouchtay ethay ampartray, andway
atthay ishay olewhay armyway, enwhay awndray upway, ightmay ebay otectedpray ybay ethay artsday
ischargedday omfray itway.

Iilvay.Ilstwhay esethay ingsthay ereway oinggay orwardfay inway Achaiaway andway atway
Rachiumdyray, andway enwhay itway asway ertainlycay ownknay atthay Ipioscay asway arrivedway inway
Acedoniamay, Aesarcay, evernay osinglay ightsay ofway ishay irstfay intentionway, endssay
Odiusclay otay imhay, anway intimateway iendfray otay othbay, omwhay Aesarcay, onway ethay
introductionway andway ecommendationray ofway Ompeypay, adhay admittedway intoway ethay umbernay
ofway ishay acquaintanceway. Otay isthay anmay ehay avegay etterslay andway instructionsway otay
Ompeypay, ethay ubstancesay ofway ichwhay asway asway ollowsfay Atthay ehay adhay ademay everyway
effortway owardstay eacepay, andway imputedway ethay illway uccesssay ofway osethay effortsway otay
ethay aultfay ofway osethay omwhay ehay adhay employedway otay onductcay osethay egotiationsnay
ecausebay eythay ereway afraidway otay arrycay ishay oposalspray otay Ompeypay atway anway improperway
imetay. Atthay Ipioscay adhay uchsay authorityway, atthay ehay ouldcay otnay onlyway eelyfray
explainway atwhay onductcay etmay ishay approbationway, utbay evenway inway omesay egreeday
enforceway ishay adviceway, andway overngay imhay Ompeypay ifway ehay ersistedpay inway errorway;
atthay ehay ommandedcay anway armyway independentway ofway Ompeypay, osay atthay esidesbay ishay
authorityway, ehay adhay engthstray otay ompelcay; andway ifway ehay idday osay, allway enmay ouldway ebay
indebtedway otay imhay orfay ethay uietqay ofway Italyway, ethay eacepay ofway ethay ovincespray, andway
ethay eservationpray ofway ethay empireway. Esethay oposalspray Odiusclay ademay otay imhay,
andway orfay omesay aysday atway ethay irstfay appearedway otay avehay etmay ithway away avourablefay
eceptionray, utbay afterwardsway asway otnay admittedway otay anway audienceway; orfay Ipioscay
eingbay eprimandedray ybay Avoniusfay, asway eway oundfay afterwardsway enwhay ethay arway asway
endedway, andway ethay egotiationnay avinghay iscarriedmay, Odiusclay eturnedray otay
Aesarcay.

Iiilvay.Aesarcay, atthay ehay ightmay ethay oremay easilyway eepkay Ompey'spay orsehay
enclosedway ithinway Rachiumdyray, andway eventpray emthay omfray oragingfay, ortifiedfay
ethay otway arrownay assespay alreadyway entionedmay ithway ongstray orksway, andway erectedway
ortsfay atway emthay. Ompeypay erceivingpay atthay ehay erivedday onay advantageway omfray ishay
avalrycay, afterway away ewfay aysday adhay emthay onveyedcay ackbay otay ishay ampcay ybay easay.
Odderfay asway osay exceedinglyway arcescay atthay ehay asway obligedway otay eedfay ishay orseshay
uponway eaveslay ippedstray offway ethay eestray, orway ethay endertay ootsray ofway eedsray
oundedpay. Orfay ethay orncay ichwhay adhay eenbay ownsay ithinway ethay ineslay asway alreadyway
onsumedcay, andway eythay ouldway ebay obligedway otay upplysay emselvesthay ithway odderfay
omfray Orcyracay andway Acarnaniaway, overway away onglay acttray ofway easay; andway asway ethay
uantityqay ofway atthay ellfay ortshay, otay increaseway itway ybay ixingmay arleybay ithway itway,
andway ybay esethay ethodsmay upportsay eirthay avalrycay. Utbay enwhay otnay onlyway ethay arleybay
andway odderfay inway esethay artspay ereway onsumedcay, andway ethay erbshay utcay awayway, enwhay
ethay eaveslay ootay ereway otnay otay ebay oundfay onway ethay eestray, ethay orseshay eingbay
almostway arvedstay, Ompeypay oughtthay ehay oughtway otay akemay omesay attemptway ybay away allysay.

Ixlay.Inway ethay umbernay ofway Aesar'scay avalrycay ereway otway Allobrogiansway, othersbray,
amednay Oscillusray andway Aegusway, ethay onssay ofway Abducillusway, owhay orfay everalsay earsyay
ossessedpay ethay iefchay owerpay inway ishay ownway atestay; enmay ofway ingularsay alourvay,
osewhay allantgay ervicessay Aesarcay adhay oundfay eryvay usefulway inway allway ishay arsway inway
Aulgay. Otay emthay, orfay esethay easonsray, ehay adhay ommittedcay ethay officesway ofway
eatestgray onourhay inway eirthay ownway ountrycay, andway ooktay arecay otay avehay emthay osenchay
intoway ethay enatesay atway anway unusualway ageway, andway adhay estowedbay onway emthay andslay akentay
omfray ethay enemyway, andway argelay ecuniarypay ewardsray, andway omfray eingbay eedynay adhay
ademay emthay affluentway. Eirthay alourvay adhay otnay onlyway ocuredpray emthay Aesar'scay
esteemway, utbay eythay ereway elovedbay ybay ethay olewhay armyway. Utbay esumingpray onway
Aesar'scay iendshipfray, andway elatedway ithway ethay arroganceway aturalnay otay away oolishfay
andway arbarousbay eoplepay, eythay espisedday eirthay ountrymencay, efraudedday eirthay
avalrycay ofway eirthay aypay, andway appliedway allway ethay underplay otay eirthay ownway useway.
Ispleasedday atway isthay onductcay, eirthay oldierssay entway inway away odybay otay Aesarcay, andway
openlyway omplainedcay ofway eirthay illway usageway; andway otay eirthay otherway argeschay addedway,
atthay alsefay ustersmay ereway ivengay inway otay Aesarcay, andway ethay urchargedsay aypay
appliedway otay eirthay ownway useway.

Xlay.Aesarcay, otnay inkingthay itway away operpray imetay otay allcay emthay otay accountway, andway
illingway otay ardonpay anymay aultsfay, onway accountway ofway eirthay alourvay, eferredday ethay
olewhay attermay, andway avegay emthay away ivatepray ebukeray, orfay avinghay ademay away affictray
ofway eirthay oopstray, andway advisedway emthay otay expectway everythingway omfray ishay
iendshipfray, andway ybay ishay astpay avoursfay otay easuremay eirthay uturefay opeshay. Isthay,
oweverhay, avegay emthay eatgray offenceway, andway ademay emthay ontemptiblecay inway ethay eyesway
ofway ethay olewhay armyway. Ofway isthay eythay ecamebay ensiblesay, asway ellway omfray ethay
eproachesray ofway othersway, asway omfray ethay udgmentjay ofway eirthay ownway indsmay, andway away
onsciousnesscay ofway uiltgay. Omptedpray enthay ybay ameshay, andway erhapspay imaginingway
atthay eythay ereway otnay iberatedlay omfray ialtray, utbay eservedray otay away uturefay ayday,
eythay esolvedray otay eakbray offway omfray usway, otay utpay eirthay ortunefay otay away ewnay
azardhay, andway otay akemay ialtray ofway ewnay onnectionscay. Andway avinghay onferredcay ithway
away ewfay ofway eirthay ientsclay, otay omwhay eythay ouldcay enturevay otay entrustway osay asebay anway
actionway, eythay irstfay attemptedway otay assassinateway Aiuscay Olusenusvay, eneralgay ofway
ethay orsehay asway asway iscoveredday atway ethay endway ofway ethay arway, atthay eythay ightmay
appearway otay avehay edflay otay Ompeypay afterway onferringcay anway importantway ervicesay onway
imhay. Utbay enwhay atthay appearedway ootay ifficultday otay utpay inway executionway, andway onay
opportunityway offeredway otay accomplishway itway, eythay orrowedbay allway ethay oneymay eythay
ouldcay, asway ifway eythay esignedday otay akemay atisfactionsay andway estitutionray orfay atwhay
eythay adhay efraudedday andway avinghay urchasedpay away eatgray umbernay ofway orseshay, eythay
esertedday otay Ompeypay alongway ithway osethay omwhay eythay adhay engagedway inway eirthay otplay.

Ilxay.Asway eythay ereway ersonspay oblynay escendedday andway ofway iberallay educationway, andway
adhay omecay ithway away eatgray etinueray, andway everalsay attlecay, andway ereway eckonedray enmay
ofway ouragecay, andway adhay eenbay inway eatgray esteemway ithway Aesarcay, andway asway itway asway away
ewnay andway uncommonway eventway, Ompeypay arriedcay emthay oundray allway ishay orksway, andway
ademay anway ostentatiousway owshay ofway emthay, orfay illtay atthay ayday, otnay away oldiersay,
eitherway orsehay orway ootfay, adhay esertedday omfray Aesarcay otay Ompeypay, oughthay erethay
ereway esertionsday almostway everyway ayday omfray Ompeypay otay Aesarcay utbay oremay
ommonlycay amongway ethay oldierssay eviedlay inway Epirusway andway Aetoliaway, andway inway osethay
ountriescay ichwhay ereway inway Aesar'scay ossessionpay. Utbay ethay othersbray, avinghay
eenbay acquaintedway ithway allway ingsthay, eitherway atwhay asway incompleteway inway ourway
orksway, orway atwhay appearedway otay ethay estbay udgesjay ofway ilitarymay attersmay otay ebay
eficientday, ethay articularpay imestay, ethay istanceday ofway acesplay, andway ethay ariousvay
attentionway ofway ethay uardsgay, accordingway otay ethay ifferentday empertay andway aracterchay
ofway ethay officerway owhay ommandedcay ethay ifferentday ostspay, avegay anway exactway accountway
ofway allway otay Ompeypay.

Iilxay.Uponway eceivingray isthay intelligenceway, Ompeypay, owhay adhay alreadyway ormedfay
ethay esignday ofway attemptingway away allysay, asway eforebay entionedmay, orderedway ethay
oldierssay otay akemay ozierway overingscay orfay eirthay elmetshay, andway otay ovidepray
ascinesfay. Esethay ingsthay eingbay eparedpray, ehay embarkedway onway oardbay allsmay oatsbay
andway owray alleysgay ybay ightnay, away onsiderablecay umbernay ofway ightlay infantryway andway
archersway, ithway allway eirthay ascinesfay, andway immediatelyway afterway idnightmay, ehay
archedmay ixtysay ohortscay afteddray omfray ethay eatergray ampcay andway ethay outpostsway, otay
atthay artpay ofway ourway orksway ichwhay extendedway owardstay ethay easay, andway ereway atway ethay
arthestfay istanceday omfray Aesar'scay eatergray ampcay. Otay ethay amesay aceplay ehay entsay
ethay ipsshay, ichwhay ehay adhay eightedfray ithway ethay ascinesfay andway ightlayarmedway
oopstray; andway allway ethay ipsshay ofway arway atthay aylay atway Rachiumdyray; andway otay eachway ehay
avegay articularpay instructionsway atway isthay artpay ofway ethay ineslay Aesarcay adhay
ostedpay Entuluslay Arcellinusmay, ethay uaestorqay, ithway ethay inthnay egionlay, andway asway
ehay asway otnay inway away oodgay atestay ofway ealthhay, Ulviusfay Osthumuscay asway entsay otay
assistway imhay inway ethay ommandcay.

Iiilxay.Atway isthay aceplay, ontingfray ethay enemyway, erethay asway away itchday ifteenfay
eetfay ideway, andway away ampartray entay eetfay ighhay, andway ethay optay ofway ethay ampartray asway
entay eetfay inway eadthbray. Atway anway intervalway ofway ixsay undredhay eetfay omfray atthay erethay
asway anotherway ampartray urnedtay ethay ontrarycay ayway, ithway ethay orksway owerlay. Orfay
omesay aysday eforebay, Aesarcay, apprehendingway atthay ourway enmay ightmay ebay urroundedsay
ybay easay, adhay ademay away oubleday ampartray erethay, atthay ifway ehay ouldshay ebay attackedway
onway othbay idessay, ehay ightmay avehay ethay eansmay inway efendingday imselfhay. Utbay ethay
extentway ofway ethay ineslay, andway ethay incessantway abourlay orfay osay anymay aysday, ecausebay
ehay adhay enclosedway away ircuitcay ofway eventeensay ilesmay ithway ishay orksway, idday otnay
allowway imetay otay inishfay emthay. Ereforethay ethay ansversetray ampartray ichwhay ouldshay
akemay away ommunicationcay etweenbay ethay otherway otway, asway otnay etyay ompletedcay. Isthay
ircumstancecay asway ownknay otay Ompeypay, eingbay oldtay otay imhay ybay ethay Allobrogianway
esertersday, andway ovedpray ofway eatgray isadvantageday otay usway. Orfay enwhay ourway ohortscay
ofway ethay inthnay egionlay ereway onway uardgay ybay ethay easayidesay, Ompey'spay armyway arrivedway
uddenlysay ybay eakbray ofway ayday, andway eirthay approachway asway away urprisesay otay ourway enmay,
andway atway ethay amesay imetay, ethay oldierssay atthay amecay ybay easay astcay eirthay artsday onway
ethay ontfray ampartray; andway ethay itchesday ereway illedfay ithway ascinesfay andway ethay
egionarylay oldierssay errifiedtay osethay atthay efendedday ethay innerway ampartray, ybay
applyingway ethay alingscay adderslay, andway ybay enginesway andway eaponsway ofway allway ortssay,
andway away astvay ultitudemay ofway archersway ouredpay oundray uponway emthay omfray everyway idesay.
Esidesbay, ethay overingscay ofway oziersway, ichwhay eythay adhay aidlay overway eirthay
elmetshay, ereway away eatgray ecuritysay otay emthay againstway ethay owsblay ofway onesstay ichwhay
ereway ethay onlyway eaponsway atthay ourway oldierssay adhay. Andway ereforethay, enwhay ourway enmay
ereway oppressedway inway everyway annermay, andway ereway arcelyscay ableway otay akemay
esistanceray, ethay efectday inway ourway orksway asway observedway, andway Ompey'spay oldierssay,
andinglay etweenbay ethay otway ampartsray, erewhay ethay orkway asway unfinishedway,
attackedway ourway enmay inway ethay earray, andway avinghay eatbay emthay omfray othbay idessay ofway
ethay ortificationfay, obligedway emthay otay eeflay.

Ivlxay.Arcellinusmay, eingbay informedway ofway isthay isorderday, etachedday omesay
ohortscay otay ethay eliefray ofway ourway enmay, owhay eeingsay emthay eeflay omfray ethay ampcay,
ereway eithernay ableway otay ersuadepay emthay otay allyray atway eirthay approachway, ornay
emselvesthay otay ustainsay ethay enemy'sway argechay. Andway inway ikelay annermay, ateverwhay
additionalway assistanceway asway entsay, asway infectedway ybay ethay earsfay ofway ethay
efeatedday, andway increasedway ethay errortay andway angerday. Orfay etreatray asway eventedpray
ybay ethay ultitudemay ofway ethay ugitivesfay. Inway atthay attlebay, enwhay ethay eaglewayearerbay
asway angerouslyday oundedway, andway eganbay otay owgray eakway, avinghay otgay ightsay ofway ourway
orsehay, ehay aidsay otay emthay, Isthay eagleway avehay Iway efendedday ithway ethay eatestgray
arecay orfay anymay earsyay, atway ethay azardhay ofway ymay ifelay, andway ownay inway ymay astlay
omentsmay estoreray itway otay Aesarcay ithway ethay amesay idelityfay. Oday otnay, Iway onjurecay
ouyay, uffersay away ishonourday otay ebay ustainedsay inway ethay ieldfay, ichwhay evernay eforebay
appenedhay otay Aesar'scay armyway, utbay eliverday itway afesay intoway ishay andshay. Ybay isthay
accidentway ethay eagleway asway eservedpray, utbay allway ethay enturionscay ofway ethay irstfay
ohortscay ereway illedkay, exceptway ethay incipalpray.

Lxvay.Andway ownay ethay Ompeianspay, afterway eatgray avochay ofway ourway oopstray, ereway
approachingway Arcellinus'smay ampcay, andway adhay uckstray onay allsmay errortay intoway ethay
estray ofway ethay ohortscay, enwhay Arcusmay Antoniusway, owhay ommandedcay ethay earestnay
ortfay, eingbay informedway ofway atwhay adhay appenedhay, asway observedway escendingday omfray
ethay isingray oundgray ithway elvetway ohortscay. Ishay arrivalway eckedchay ethay
Ompeianspay, andway encouragedway ourway enmay otay ecoverray omfray eirthay extremeway
affrightway. Andway ortlyshay afterway, Aesarcay avinghay otgay oticenay ybay ethay okesmay omfray
allway ethay ortsfay, ichwhay asway ethay usualway ignalsay onway uchsay occasionsway, afteddray offway
omesay ohortscay omfray ethay outpostsway, andway entway otay ethay enescay ofway actionway. Andway
avinghay erethay earntlay ethay osslay ehay adhay ustainedsay, andway erceivingpay atthay
Ompeypay adhay orcedfay ourway orksway, andway adhay encampedway alongway ethay oastcay, osay atthay
ehay asway atway ibertylay otay oragefay, andway adhay away ommunicationcay ithway ishay ippingshay,
ehay alteredway ishay anplay orfay onductingcay ethay arway, asway ishay esignday adhay otnay
ucceededsay, andway orderedway away ongstray encampmentway otay ebay ademay earnay Ompeypay.

Ilxvay.Enwhay isthay orkway asway inishedfay, Aesar'scay outsscay observedway atthay omesay
ohortscay, ichwhay otay emthay appearedway ikelay away egionlay, ereway etiredray ehindbay ethay
oodway, andway ereway onway eirthay archmay otay ethay oldway ampcay. Ethay ituationsay ofway ethay otway
ampscay asway asway ollowsfay away ewfay aysday eforebay, enwhay Aesar'scay inthnay egionlay adhay
opposedway away artypay ofway Ompey'spay oopstray, andway ereway endeavouringway otay encloseway
emthay, Aesar'scay oopstray ormedfay away ampcay inway atthay aceplay. Isthay ampcay oinedjay away
ertaincay oodway, andway asway otnay aboveway ourfay undredhay acespay istantday omfray ethay easay.
Afterwardsway, angingchay ishay esignday orfay ertaincay easonsray, Aesarcay emovedray ishay
ampcay otay away allsmay istanceday eyondbay atthay aceplay; andway afterway away ewfay aysday, Ompeypay
ooktay ossessionpay ofway itway, andway addedway oremay extensiveway orksway, eavinglay ethay innerway
ampartray andingstay, asway ehay intendedway otay eepkay everalsay egionslay erethay. Ybay isthay
eansmay, ethay esserlay ampcay includedway ithinway ethay eatergray, answeredway ethay urposepay
ofway away ortfay andway itadelcay. Ehay adhay alsoway arriedcay anway entrenchmentway omfray ethay eftlay
angleway ofway ethay ampcay otay ethay iverray, aboutway ourfay undredhay acespay, atthay ishay
oldierssay ightmay avehay oremay ibertylay andway esslay angerday inway etchingfay aterway. Utbay
ehay ootay, angingchay ishay esignday orfay easonsray otnay ecessarynay otay ebay entionedmay,
abandonedway ethay aceplay. Inway isthay onditioncay ethay ampcay emainedray orfay everalsay
aysday, ethay orksway eingbay allway entireway.

Iilxvay.Aesar'scay outsscay oughtbray imhay ordway atthay ethay andardstay ofway away egionlay
asway arriedcay otay isthay aceplay. Atthay ethay amesay ingthay asway eensay ehay asway assuredway
ybay osethay inway ethay igherhay ortsfay. Isthay aceplay asway alfhay away ilemay istantday omfray
Ompey'spay ewnay ampcay. Aesarcay, opinghay otay urprisesay isthay egionlay, andway anxiousway
otay epairray ethay osslay ustainedsay atthay ayday, eftlay otway ohortscay employedway inway ethay
orksway otay akemay anway appearanceway ofway entrenchingway imselfhay, andway ybay away ifferentday
outeray, asway ivatelypray asway ehay ouldcay, ithway ishay otherway ohortscay amountingway otay
irtythayeethray, amongway ichwhay asway ethay inthnay egionlay, ichwhay adhay ostlay osay anymay
enturionscay, andway osewhay ivatespray ereway eatlygray educedray inway umbernay, ehay
archedmay inway otway ineslay againstway Ompey'spay egionlay andway ishay esserlay ampcay. Ornay
idday isthay irstfay opinionway eceiveday imhay. Orfay ehay eachedray ethay aceplay eforebay
Ompeypay ouldcay avehay oticenay ofway itway; andway oughthay ethay orksway ereway ongstray, etyay
avinghay ademay ethay attackway ithway ethay eftlay ingway, ichwhay ehay ommandedcay inway ersonpay,
ehay obligedway ethay Ompeianspay otay uitqay ethay ampartray inway isorderday. Away arricadebay
adhay eenbay aisedray eforebay ethay atesgay, atway ichwhay away ortshay ontestcay asway
aintainedmay, ourway enmay endeavouringway otay orcefay eirthay ayway inway, andway ethay enemyway otay
efendday ethay ampcay; Itustay Ulciopay, ybay osewhay eansmay eway avehay elatedray atthay Aiuscay
Antonius'sway armyway asway etrayedbay, efendingday emthay ithway ingularsay ouragecay. Utbay
ethay alourvay ofway ourway enmay evailedpray, andway avinghay utcay ownday ethay arricadebay, eythay
irstfay orcedfay ethay eatergray ampcay, andway afterway atthay ethay ortfay ichwhay asway
enclosedway ithinway itway andway asway ethay egionlay onway itsway epulseray adhay etiredray otay
isthay, eythay ewslay everalsay efendingday emselvesthay erethay.

Iiilxvay.Utbay Ortunefay, owhay exertsway away owerfulpay influenceway asway ellway inway otherway
attersmay, asway especiallyway inway arway, effectsway eatgray angeschay omfray iflingtray
ausescay, asway appenedhay atway isthay imetay. Orfay ethay ohortscay onway Aesar'scay ightray
ingway, oughthray ignoranceway ofway ethay aceplay, ollowedfay ethay irectionday ofway atthay
ampartray, ichwhay anray alongway omfray ethay ampcay otay ethay iverray, ilstwhay eythay ereway inway
earchsay ofway away ategay, andway imaginedway atthay itway elongedbay otay ethay ampcay. Utbay enwhay
eythay oundfay atthay itway edlay otay ethay iverray, andway atthay obodynay opposedway emthay, eythay
immediatelyway imbedclay overway ethay ampartray, andway ereway ollowedfay ybay allway ourway
avalrycay.

Ixlxay.Inway ethay eantimemay Ompeypay, ybay ethay eatgray elayday ichwhay isthay occasionedway,
eingbay informedway ofway atwhay adhay appenedhay, archedmay ithway ethay ifthfay egionlay,
ichwhay ehay alledcay awayway omfray eirthay orkway otay upportsay ishay artypay; andway atway ethay
amesay imetay ishay avalrycay ereway advancingway upway otay oursway, andway anway armyway inway orderway ofway
attlebay asway eensay atway away istanceday ybay ourway enmay owhay adhay akentay ossessionpay ofway ethay
ampcay, andway ethay acefay ofway affairsway asway uddenlysay angedchay. Orfay Ompey'spay egionlay,
encouragedway ybay ethay opehay ofway eedyspay upportsay, attemptedway otay akemay away andstay atway
ethay Ecumanday ategay, andway ademay away oldbay argechay onway ourway enmay. Aesar'scay avalrycay,
owhay adhay ountedmay ethay ampartray ybay away arrownay eachbray, eingbay apprehensiveway ofway
eirthay etreatray, ereway ethay irstfay otay eeflay. Ethay ightray ingway, ichwhay adhay eenbay
eparatedsay omfray ethay eftlay, observingway ethay errortay ofway ethay avalrycay, otay eventpray
eirthay eingbay overpoweredway ithinway ethay ineslay, ereway endeavouringway otay etreatray
ybay ethay amesay ayway asway eythay urstbay inway; andway ostmay ofway emthay, estlay eythay ouldshay ebay
engagedway inway ethay arrownay assespay, ewthray emselvesthay ownday away ampartray entay eetfay
ighhay intoway ethay enchestray; andway ethay irstfay eingbay oddentray otay eathday, ethay estray
ocuredpray eirthay afetysay andway escapedway overway eirthay odiesbay. Ethay oldierssay ofway ethay
eftlay ingway, erceivingpay omfray ethay ampartray atthay Ompeypay asway advancingway, andway
eirthay ownway iendsfray eeingflay, eingbay afraidway atthay eythay ouldshay ebay enclosedway
etweenbay ethay otway ampartsray, asway eythay adhay anway enemyway othbay ithinway andway ithoutway,
ovestray otay ecuresay eirthay etreatray ethay amesay ayway eythay amecay. Allway asway isorderday,
onsternationcay, andway ightflay; insomuchway atthay, enwhay Aesarcay aidlay oldhay ofway ethay
olourscay ofway osethay owhay ereway unningray awayway, andway esiredday emthay otay andstay, omesay
eftlay eirthay orseshay ehindbay, andway ontinuedcay otay unray inway ethay amesay annermay;
othersway oughthray earfay evenway ewthray awayway eirthay olourscay, ornay idday away inglesay anmay
acefay aboutway.

Lxxay.Inway isthay alamitycay, ethay ollowingfay avourablefay ircumstancecay occurredway
otay eventpray ethay uinray ofway ourway olewhay armyway, izvay., atthay Ompeypay uspectingsay anway
ambuscadeway ecausebay, asway Iway upposesay, ethay uccesssay adhay arfay exceededway ishay
opeshay, asway ehay adhay eensay ishay enmay away omentmay eforebay eeingflay omfray ethay ampcay,
urstday otnay orfay omesay imetay approachway ethay ortificationfay; andway atthay ishay orsehay
ereway etardedray omfray ursuingpay, ecausebay ethay assespay andway atesgay ereway inway
ossessionpay ofway Aesar'scay oldierssay. Usthay away iflingtray ircumstancecay ovedpray ofway
eatgray importanceway otay eachway artypay; orfay ethay ampartray awndray omfray ethay ampcay otay
ethay iverray, interruptedway ethay ogresspray andway ertaintycay ofway Aesar'scay ictoryvay,
afterway ehay adhay orcedfay Ompey'spay ampcay. Ethay amesay ingthay, ybay etardingray ethay
apidityray ofway ethay enemy'sway ursuitpay, eservedpray ourway armyway.

Ilxxay.Inway ethay otway actionsway ofway isthay ayday, Aesarcay ostlay inenay undredhay andway
ixtysay ankray andway ilefay, everalsay Omanray ightsknay ofway istinctionday, Elginasfay
Uticanustay Allusgay, away enator'ssay onsay; Aiuscay Elginasfay omfray Acentiaplay; Aulusway
Aviusgray omfray Uteolipay; Arcusmay Acrativirsay omfray Apuacay; andway irtythayotway
ilitarymay ibunestray andway enturionscay. Utbay ethay eatestgray artpay ofway allway esethay
erishedpay ithoutway away oundway, eingbay oddentray otay eathday inway ethay enchestray, onway ethay
ampartsray andway anksbay ofway ethay iverray ybay easonray ofway ethay errortay andway ightflay ofway
eirthay ownway enmay. Ompeypay, afterway isthay attlebay, asway alutedsay Imperatorway; isthay
itletay ehay etainedray, andway allowedway imselfhay otay ebay addressedway ybay itway afterwardsway.
Utbay eithernay inway ishay etterslay otay ethay enatesay, ornay inway ethay ascesfay, idday ehay useway
ethay aurellay asway away arkmay ofway onourhay. Utbay Abienuslay, avinghay obtainedway ishay
onsentcay atthay ethay isonerspray ouldshay ebay eliveredday upway otay imhay, adhay emthay allway
oughtbray outway, asway itway appearedway, otay akemay away owshay ofway emthay, andway atthay Ompeypay
ightmay aceplay away eatergray onfidencecay inway imhay owhay asway away eserterday; andway allingcay
emthay ellowfay oldierssay, andway askingway emthay inway ethay ostmay insultingway annermay
etherwhay itway asway usualway ithway eteransvay otay eeflay, orderedway emthay otay ebay utpay otay
eathday inway ethay ightsay ofway ethay olewhay armyway.

Iilxxay.Ompey'spay artypay ereway osay elatedway ithway onfidencecay andway iritspay atway isthay
uccesssay, atthay eythay oughtthay onay oremay ofway ethay ethodmay ofway onductingcay ethay arway,
utbay oughtthay atthay eythay ereway alreadyway onquerorscay. Eythay idday otnay onsidercay
atthay ethay allnesssmay ofway ourway umbersnay, andway ethay isadvantageday ofway ethay aceplay andway
ethay onfinedcay aturenay ofway ethay oundgray occasionedway ybay eirthay avinghay irstfay
ossessedpay emselvesthay ofway ethay ampcay, andway ethay oubleday angerday othbay omfray ithinway
andway ithoutway ethay ortificationsfay, andway ethay eparationsay ofway ethay armyway intoway otway
artspay, osay atthay ethay oneway ouldcay otnay ivegay eliefray otay ethay otherway, ereway ethay
ausecay ofway ourway efeatday. Eythay idday otnay onsidercay, inway additionway, atthay ethay
ontestcay asway otnay ecidedday ybay away igorousvay attackway, ornay away egularray attlebay; andway
atthay ourway enmay adhay ufferedsay eatergray osslay omfray eirthay umbersnay andway antway ofway
oomray, anthay eythay adhay ustainedsay omfray ethay enemyway. Inway inefay, eythay idday otnay
eflectray onway ethay ommoncay asualtiescay ofway arway; owhay iflingtray ausescay, eitherway
omfray oundlessgray uspicionssay, uddensay affrightway, orway eligiousray uplesscray, avehay
oftentimesway eenbay oductivepray ofway onsiderablecay osseslay; owhay oftenway anway armyway ashay
eenbay unsuccessfulway eitherway ybay ethay isconductmay ofway ethay eneralgay, orway ethay
oversightway ofway away ibunetray; utbay asway ifway eythay adhay ovedpray ictoriousvay ybay eirthay
alourvay, andway asway ifway onay angechay ouldcay everway aketay aceplay, eythay ublishedpay ethay
uccesssay ofway ethay ayday oughoutthray ethay orldway ybay eportsray andway etterslay.

Iiilxxay.Aesarcay, isappointedday inway ishay irstfay intentionsway, esolvedray otay
angechay ethay olewhay anplay ofway ishay operationsway. Accordinglyway, ehay atway onceway alledcay
inway allway outwayostspay, avegay overway ethay iegesay, andway ollectingcay ishay armyway intoway oneway
aceplay, addressedway ishay oldierssay andway encouragedway emthay otnay otay ebay oubledtray atway
atwhay adhay appenedhay, ornay otay ebay ismayedday atway itway, utbay otay eighway eirthay anymay
uccessfulsay engagementsway againstway oneway isappointmentday, andway atthay, ootay, away
iflingtray oneway. Atthay eythay oughtway otay ebay atefulgray otay Ortunefay, oughthray osewhay
avourfay eythay adhay ecoveredray Italyway ithoutway ethay effusionway ofway oodblay; oughthray
osewhay avourfay eythay adhay ubduedsay ethay otway Ainsspay, oughthay otectedpray ybay away ostmay
arlikeway eoplepay underway ethay ommandcay ofway ethay ostmay ilfulskay andway experiencedway
eneralsgay oughthray osewhay avourfay eythay adhay educedray otay ubmissionsay ethay
eighbouringnay atesstay atthay aboundedway ithway orncay inway inefay, atthay eythay oughtway otay
ememberray ithway atwhay uccesssay eythay adhay eenbay allway ansportedtray afesay oughthray
ockadingblay eetsflay ofway ethay enemyway, ichwhay ossessedpay otnay onlyway ethay ortspay, utbay
evenway ethay oastscay atthay ifway allway eirthay attemptsway ereway otnay ownedcray ithway
uccesssay, ethay efectsday ofway Ortunefay ustmay ebay uppliedsay ybay industryway; andway
ateverwhay osslay adhay eenbay ustainedsay, oughtway otay ebay attributedway atherray otay erhay
apricescay anthay otay anyway aultsfay inway imhay atthay ehay adhay osenchay away afesay oundgray orfay
ethay engagementway, atthay ehay adhay ossessedpay imselfhay ofway ethay enemy'sway ampcay; atthay
ehay adhay eatenbay emthay outway, andway overcomeway emthay enwhay eythay offeredway esistanceray;
utbay etherwhay eirthay ownway errortay orway omesay istakemay, orway etherwhay Ortunefay erselfhay
adhay interruptedway away ictoryvay almostway ecuredsay andway ertaincay, eythay oughtway allway ownay
otay useway eirthay utmostway effortsway otay epairray ybay eirthay alourvay ethay osslay ichwhay adhay
eenbay incurredway; ifway eythay idday osay, eirthay isfortunesmay ouldway urntay otay eirthay
advantageway, asway itway appenedhay atway Ergoviagay, andway osethay owhay earedfay otay acefay ethay
enemyway ouldway ebay ethay irstfay otay offerway emselvesthay otay attlebay.

Ivlxxay.Avinghay oncludedcay ishay eechspay, ehay isgracedday omesay andardstayearersbay,
andway educedray emthay otay ethay anksray; orfay ethay olewhay armyway asway eizedsay ithway uchsay
iefgray atway eirthay osslay, andway ithway uchsay anway ardentway esireday ofway epairingray eirthay
isgraceday, atthay otnay away anmay equiredray ethay ommandcay ofway ishay ibunetray orway
enturioncay, utbay eythay imposedway eachway onway imselfhay everersay abourslay anthay usualway
asway away unishmentpay, andway atway ethay amesay imetay ereway osay inflamedway ithway eagernessway otay
eetmay ethay enemyway, atthay ethay officersway ofway ethay irstfay ankray, ensiblysay affectedway
atway eirthay entreatiesway, ereway ofway opinionway atthay eythay oughtway otay ontinuecay inway
eirthay esentpray ostspay, andway ommitcay eirthay atefay otay ethay azardhay ofway away attlebay.
Utbay, onway ethay otherway andhay, Aesarcay ouldcay otnay aceplay ufficientsay onfidencecay inway
enmay osay atelylay ownthray intoway onsternationcay, andway oughtthay ehay oughtway otay allowway
emthay imetay otay ecoverray eirthay ejectedday iritsspay; andway avinghay abandonedway ishay
orksway, ehay asway apprehensiveway ofway eingbay istressedday orfay antway ofway orncay.

Vlxxay.Accordinglyway, ufferingsay onay imetay otay interveneway utbay atwhay asway
ecessarynay orfay away operpray attentionway otay ebay aidpay otay ethay icksay andway oundedway, ehay
entsay onway allway ishay aggagebay ivatelypray inway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay ightnay omfray ishay
ampcay otay Apolloniaway, andway orderedway emthay otnay otay althay illtay eythay adhay erformedpay
eirthay ourneyjay; andway ehay etachedday oneway egionlay ithway emthay asway away onvoycay. Isthay
affairway eingbay oncludedcay, avinghay etainedray onlyway otway egionslay inway ishay ampcay; ehay
archedmay ethay estray ofway ishay armyway outway atway eethray o'clockway inway ethay orningmay ybay
everalsay atesgay, andway entsay emthay orwardfay ybay ethay amesay outeray; andway inway away ortshay
acespay afterway, atthay ethay ilitarymay acticepray ightmay ebay eservedpray, andway ishay
archmay ownknay asway atelay asway ossiblepay, ehay orderedway ethay ignalsay orfay ecampingday otay
ebay ivengay; andway ettingsay outway immediatelyway, andway ollowingfay ethay earray ofway ishay ownway
armyway, ehay asway oonsay outway ofway ightsay ofway ethay ampcay. Ornay idday Ompeypay, asway oonsay asway
ehay adhay oticenay ofway ishay esignday, akemay anyway elayday otay ursuepay imhay; utbay ithway away
iewvay otay urprisesay emthay ilstwhay encumberedway ithway aggagebay onway eirthay archmay, andway
otnay etyay ecoveredray omfray eirthay ightfray, ehay edlay ishay armyway outway ofway ishay ampcay,
andway entsay ishay avalrycay onway otay etardray ourway earray; utbay asway otnay ableway otay omecay upway
ithway emthay, ecausebay Aesarcay adhay otgay arfay eforebay imhay, andway archedmay ithoutway
aggagebay. Utbay enwhay eway eachedray ethay iverray Enususgay, ethay anksbay eingbay eepstay,
eirthay orsehay overtookway ourway earray, andway etainedday emthay ybay ingingbray emthay otay
actionway. Otay opposeway omwhay, Aesarcay entsay ishay orsehay, andway intermixedway ithway emthay
aboutway ourfay undredhay ofway ishay advancedway ightlay oopstray, owhay attackedway eirthay
orsehay ithway uchsay uccesssay, atthay avinghay outedray emthay allway, andway illedkay
everalsay, eythay eturnedray ithoutway anyway osslay otay ethay ainmay odybay.

Vilxxay.Avinghay erformedpay ethay exactway archmay ichwhay ehay adhay oposedpray atthay ayday,
andway avinghay edlay ishay armyway overway ethay iverray Enususgay, Aesarcay ostedpay imselfhay inway
ishay oldway ampcay oppositeway Asparagiumway; andway eptkay ishay oldierssay oseclay ithinway ethay
entrenchmentsway; andway orderedway ethay orsehay, owhay adhay eenbay entsay outway underway
etencepray ofway oragingfay, otay etireray immediatelyway intoway ethay ampcay, oughthray ethay
Ecumanday ategay. Ompeypay, inway ikelay annermay, avinghay ompletedcay ethay amesay ay'sday
archmay, ooktay ostpay inway ishay oldway ampcay atway Asparagiumway; andway ishay oldierssay, asway
eythay adhay onay orkway ethay ortificationsfay eingbay entireway, ademay onglay
excursionsway, omesay otay ollectcay oodway andway oragefay; othersway, invitedway ybay ethay
earnessnay ofway ethay ormerfay ampcay, aidlay upway eirthay armsway inway eirthay entstay, andway
uittedqay ethay entrenchmentsway inway orderway otay ingbray atwhay eythay adhay eftlay ehindbay
emthay, ecausebay ethay esignday ofway archingmay eingbay adoptedway inway away urryhay, eythay adhay
eftlay away onsiderablecay artpay ofway eirthay aggonsway andway uggagelay ehindbay. Eingbay usthay
incapableway ofway ursuingpay, asway Aesarcay adhay oreseenfay, aboutway oonnay ehay avegay ethay
ignalsay orfay archingmay, edlay outway ishay armyway, andway oublingday atthay ay'sday archmay, ehay
advancedway eightway ilesmay eyondbay Ompey'spay ampcay; owhay ouldcay otnay ursuepay imhay,
ecausebay ishay oopstray ereway ispersedday.

Viilxxay.Ethay extnay ayday Aesarcay entsay ishay aggagebay orwardfay earlyway inway ethay
ightnay, andway archedmay offway imselfhay immediatelyway afterway ethay ourthfay atchway atthay
ifway ehay ouldshay ebay underway ethay ecessitynay ofway iskingray anway engagementway, ehay ightmay
eetmay away uddensay attackway ithway anway armyway eefray omfray incumbranceway. Ehay idday osay orfay
everalsay aysday uccessivelysay, ybay ichwhay eansmay ehay asway enabledway otay effectway ishay
archmay overway ethay eepestday iversray, andway oughthray ethay ostmay intricateway oadsray
ithoutway anyway osslay. Orfay Ompeypay, afterway ethay irstfay ay'sday elayday, andway ethay
atiguefay ichwhay ehay enduredway orfay omesay aysday inway ainvay, oughthay ehay exertedway
imselfhay ybay orcedfay archesmay, andway asway anxiousway otay overtakeway usway, owhay adhay otgay
ethay artstay ofway imhay, onway ethay ourthfay ayday esistedday omfray ethay ursuitpay, andway
eterminedday otay ollowfay otherway easuresmay.

Viiilxxay.Aesarcay asway obligedway otay ogay otay Apolloniaway, otay odgelay ishay oundedway,
aypay ishay armyway, onfirmcay ishay iendsfray, andway eavelay arrisonsgay inway ethay ownstay. Utbay
orfay esethay attersmay, ehay allowedway onay oremay imetay anthay asway ecessarynay orfay away
ersonpay inway astehay. Andway eingbay apprehensiveway orfay Omitiusday, estlay ehay ouldshay ebay
urprisedsay ybay Ompey'spay arrivalway, ehay astenedhay ithway allway eedspay andway
earnestnessway otay oinjay imhay; orfay ehay annedplay ethay operationsway ofway ethay olewhay
ampaigncay onway esethay inciplespray atthay ifway Ompeypay ouldshay archmay afterway imhay, ehay
ouldway ebay awndray offway omfray ethay easay, andway omfray osethay orcesfay ichwhay ehay adhay
ovidedpray inway Rachiumdyray, andway eparatedsay omfray ishay orncay andway agazinesmay, andway
ebay obligedway otay arrycay onway ethay arway onway equalway ermstay; utbay ifway ehay ossedcray overway
intoway Italyway, Aesarcay, avinghay effectedway away unctionjay ithway Omitiusday, ouldway
archmay oughthray Illyricumway otay ethay eliefray ofway Italyway; utbay ifway ehay endeavouredway otay
ormstay Apolloniaway andway Oricumway, andway excludeway imhay omfray ethay olewhay oastcay, ehay
opedhay, ybay esiegingbay Ipioscay, otay obligeway imhay, ofway ecessitynay, otay omecay otay ishay
assistanceway. Accordinglyway, Aesarcay espatchingday ourierscay, iteswray otay
Omitiusday, andway acquaintsway imhay ithway ishay ishesway onway ethay ubjectsay andway avinghay
ationedstay away arrisongay ofway ourfay ohortscay atway Apolloniaway, oneway atway Issuslay, andway
eethray atway Oricumway, esidesbay osethay owhay ereway icksay ofway eirthay oundsway, ehay etsay
orwardfay onway ishay archmay oughthray Epirusway andway Acarnaniaway. Ompeypay, alsoway,
uessinggay atway Aesar'scay esignday, eterminedday otay astenhay otay Ipioscay, atthay ifway
Aesarcay ouldshay archmay inway atthay irectionday, ehay ightmay ebay eadyray otay elieveray imhay;
utbay atthay ifway Aesarcay ouldshay ebay unwillingway otay uitqay ethay easayoastcay andway
Orcyracay, ecausebay ehay expectedway egionslay andway avalrycay omfray Italyway, ehay imselfhay
ightmay allfay onway Omitiusday ithway allway ishay orcesfay.

Ixlxxay.Orfay esethay easonsray, eachway ofway emthay udiedstay espatchday, atthay ehay ightmay
uccoursay ishay iendsfray, andway otnay issmay anway opportunityway ofway urprisingsay ishay
enemiesway. Utbay Aesar'scay engagementsway atway Apollomaway adhay arriedcay imhay asideway omfray
ethay irectday oadray. Ompeypay adhay akentay ethay ortshay oadray otay Acedoniamay, oughthray
Andaviacay. Otay isthay asway addedway anotherway unexpectedway isadvantageday, atthay
Omitiusday, owhay orfay everalsay aysday adhay eenbay encampedway oppositeway Ipioscay, adhay
uittedqay atthay ostpay orfay ethay akesay ofway ovisionspray, andway adhay archedmay otay
Eracleahay Enticasay, away itycay ubjectsay otay Andaviacay; osay atthay ortunefay erselfhay
eemedsay otay owthray imhay inway Ompey'spay ayway. Ofway isthay, Aesarcay asway ignorantway upway otay
isthay imetay. Etterslay ikewiselay eingbay entsay ybay Ompeypay oughthray allway ethay
ovincespray andway atesstay, ithway anway accountway ofway ethay actionway atway Rachiumdyray, eryvay
uchmay enlargedway andway exaggeratedway eyondbay ethay ealray actsfay, away umourray adhay eenbay
irculatedcay, atthay Aesarcay adhay eenbay efeatedday andway orcedfay otay eeflay, andway adhay
ostlay almostway allway ishay orcesfay. Esethay eportsray adhay ademay ethay oadsray angerousday,
andway awndray offway omesay atesstay omfray ishay allianceway encewhay itway appenedhay, atthay
ethay essengersmay espatchedday ybay Aesarcay, ybay everalsay ifferentday oadsray otay
Omitiusday, andway ybay Omitiusday otay Aesarcay, ereway otnay ableway ybay anyway eansmay otay
accomplishway eirthay ourneyjay. Utbay ethay Allobrogesway, owhay ereway inway ethay etinueray ofway
Aegusway andway Oscillusray, andway owhay adhay esertedday otay Ompeypay, avinghay etmay onway ethay
oadray away outingscay artypay ofway Omitiusday; eitherway omfray oldway acquaintanceway, ecausebay
eythay adhay ervedsay ogethertay inway Aulgay, orway elatedway ithway ainvay oryglay, avegay emthay
anway accountway ofway allway atthay adhay appenedhay, andway informedway emthay ofway Aesar'scay
epartureday, andway Ompey'spay arrivalway. Omitiusday, owhay asway arcescay ourfay ours'hay
archmay istantday, avinghay otgay intelligenceway omfray esethay, ybay ethay ourtesycay ofway
ethay enemyway, avoidedway ethay angerday, andway etmay Aesarcay omingcay otay oinjay imhay atway
Aeginiumway, away owntay onway ethay onfinescay ofway andway oppositeway otay Essalythay.

Xlxxay.Ethay otway armiesway eingbay unitedway, Aesarcay archedmay otay Omphigay, ichwhay isway
ethay irstfay owntay ofway Essalythay onway ethay oadray omfray Epirusway. Ownay, ethay
Essaliansthay, away ewfay onthsmay eforebay, adhay ofway emselvesthay entsay ambassadorsway otay
Aesarcay, offeringway imhay ethay eefray useway ofway everythingway inway eirthay owerpay, andway
equestingray away arrisongay orfay eirthay otectionpray. Utbay ethay eportray, alreadyway
okenspay ofway, ofway ethay attlebay atway Rachiumdyray, ichwhay itway adhay exaggeratedway inway anymay
articularspay, adhay arrivedway eforebay imhay. Inway onsequencecay ofway ichwhay,
Androsthenesway, ethay aetorpray ofway Essalythay, asway ehay eferredpray otay ebay ethay
ompanioncay ofway Ompey'spay ictoryvay, atherray anthay Aesar'scay associateway inway ishay
isfortunesmay, ollectedcay allway ethay eoplepay, othbay avesslay andway eemenfray, omfray ethay
ountrycay intoway ethay owntay andway utshay ethay atesgay, andway espatchedday essengersmay otay
Ipioscay andway Ompeypay otay omecay otay ishay eliefray, atthay ehay ouldcay ependday onway ethay
engthstray ofway ethay owntay, ifway uccoursay asway eedilyspay entsay; utbay atthay itway ouldcay
otnay ithstandway away onglay iegesay. Ipioscay, asway oonsay asway ehay eceivedray adviceway ofway
ethay epartureday ofway ethay armiesway omfray Rachiumdyray, adhay archedmay ithway ishay
egionslay otay Arissalay Ompeypay asway otnay etyay arrivedway earnay Essalythay. Aesarcay
avinghay ortifiedfay ishay ampcay, orderedway alingscay adderslay andway entpayouseshay otay ebay
ademay orfay away uddensay assaultway, andway urdleshay otay ebay ovidedpray. Asway oonsay asway eythay
ereway eadyray, ehay exhortedway ishay oldierssay, andway oldtay emthay ofway atwhay advantageway itway
ouldway ebay otay assistway emthay ithway allway ortssay ofway ecessariesnay ifway eythay ademay
emselvesthay astersmay ofway away ichray andway entifulplay owntay andway, atway ethay amesay imetay,
otay ikestray errortay intoway otherway atesstay ybay ethay exampleway ofway isthay, andway otay effectway
isthay ithway eedspay, eforebay auxiliariesway ouldcay arriveway. Accordinglyway, akingtay
advantageway ofway ethay unusualway ardourway ofway ethay oldierssay, ehay eganbay ishay assaultway onway
ethay owntay atway away ittlelay afterway eethray o'clockway onway ethay eryvay ayday onway ichwhay ehay
arrivedway, andway ooktay itway, oughthay efendedday ithway eryvay ighhay allsway, eforebay
unsetsay, andway avegay itway upway otay ishay armyway otay underplay, andway immediatelyway ecampedday
omfray eforebay itway, andway archedmay otay Etropolismay, ithway uchsay apidityray asway otay
outstripway anyway essengermay orway umourray ofway ethay akingtay ofway Omphigay.

Xilxxay.Ethay inhabitantsway ofway Etropolismay, atway irstfay influencedway ybay ethay amesay
umoursray, ollowedfay ethay amesay easuresmay, utshay ethay atesgay andway annedmay eirthay
allsway. Utbay enwhay eythay ereway ademay acquaintedway ithway ethay atefay ofway ethay itycay ofway
Omphigay ybay omesay isonerspray, omwhay Aesarcay adhay orderedway otay ebay oughtbray upway otay
ethay allsway, eythay ewthray openway eirthay atesgay. Asway ehay eservedpray emthay ithway ethay
eatestgray arecay, erethay asway otnay away atestay inway Essalythay exceptway Arissalay, ichwhay
asway awedway ybay away ongstray armyway ofway Ipio'sscay, utbay onway omparingcay ethay atefay ofway ethay
inhabitantsway ofway Etropolismay ithway ethay everesay eatmenttray ofway Omphigay, avegay
admissionway otay Aesarcay, andway obeyedway ishay ordersway. Avinghay osenchay away ositionpay
onvenientcay orfay ocuringpray orncay, ichwhay asway ownay almostway iperay onway ethay oundgray,
ehay eterminedday erethay otay aitway Ompey'spay arrivalway, andway otay akemay itway ethay entrecay
ofway allway ishay arlikeway operationsway.

Xiilxxay.Ompeypay arrivedway inway Essalythay away ewfay aysday afterway, andway avinghay
aranguedhay ethay ombinedcay armyway, eturnedray anksthay otay ishay ownway enmay, andway
exhortedway Ipio'sscay oldierssay, atthay asway ethay ictoryvay asway ownay ecuredsay, eythay
ouldshay endeavourway otay eritmay away artpay ofway ethay ewardsray andway ootybay. Andway eceivingray
allway ethay egionslay intoway oneway ampcay, ehay aredshay ishay onourshay ithway Ipioscay,
orderedway ethay umpettray otay ebay oundedsay atway ishay enttay, andway away avilionpay otay ebay
erectedway orfay imhay. Ethay orcesfay ofway Ompeypay eingbay usthay augmentedway, andway otway uchsay
owerfulpay armiesway unitedway, eirthay ormerfay expectationsway ereway onfirmedcay, andway
eirthay opeshay ofway ictoryvay osay uchmay increasedway, atthay ateverwhay imetay intervenedway
asway onsideredcay asway osay uchmay elayday otay eirthay eturnray intoway Italyway andway eneverwhay
Ompeypay actedway ithway ownessslay andway autioncay, eythay usedway otay exclaimway, atthay itway
asway ethay usinessbay onlyway ofway away inglesay ayday, utbay atthay ehay adhay away assionpay orfay
owerpay, andway asway elightedday inway avinghay ersonspay ofway onsularcay andway aetorianpray
ankray inway ethay umbernay ofway ishay avesslay. Andway eythay ownay eganbay otay isputeday openlyway
aboutway ewardsray andway iesthoodspray, andway isposedday ofway ethay onsulatecay orfay everalsay
earsyay otay omecay. Othersway utpay inway eirthay aimsclay orfay ethay ouseshay andway opertiespray
ofway allway owhay ereway inway Aesar'scay ampcay, andway inway atthay ouncilcay erethay asway away armway
ebateday, etherwhay Uciuslay Irrushay, owhay adhay eenbay entsay ybay Ompeypay againstway ethay
Arthianspay, ouldshay ebay admittedway away andidatecay orfay ethay aetorshippray inway ishay
absenceway atway ethay extnay electionway; ishay iendsfray imploringway Ompey'spay onourhay otay
ulfilfay ethay engagementsway ichwhay ehay adhay ademay otay imhay atway ishay epartureday, atthay
ehay ightmay otnay eemsay eceivedday oughthray ishay authorityway ilstwhay othersway,
embarkedway inway equalway abourlay andway angerday, eadedplay atthay onay individualway oughtway otay
avehay away eferencepray eforebay allway ethay estray.

Xiiilxxay.Alreadyway Omitiusday, Ipioscay, andway Entuluslay Inthurspay, inway eirthay
ailyday uarrelsqay aboutway Aesar'scay iesthoodpray, openlyway abusedway eachway otherway inway
ethay ostmay urrilousscay anguagelay. Entuluslay urgingway ethay espectray ueday otay ishay
ageway, Omitiusday oastingbay ishay interestway inway ethay itycay andway ishay ignityday, andway
Ipioscay esumingpray onway ishay allianceway ithway Ompeypay. Attiusway Ufusray argedchay
Uciuslay Afraniusway eforebay Ompeypay ithway etrayingbay ethay armyway inway ethay actionway atthay
appenedhay inway Ainspay, andway Uciuslay Omitiusday eclaredday inway ethay ouncilcay atthay itway
asway ishay ishway atthay, enwhay ethay arway ouldshay ebay endedway, eethray illetsbay ouldshay ebay
ivengay otay allway ethay enatorssay owhay adhay akentay artpay ithway emthay inway ethay arway, andway
atthay eythay ouldshay asspay entencesay onway everyway inglesay ersonpay owhay adhay ayedstay
ehindbay atway Omeray, orway owhay adhay eenbay ithinway Ompey'spay arrisonsgay andway adhay otnay
ontributedcay eirthay assistanceway inway ethay ilitarymay operationsway; atthay ybay ethay
irstfay illetbay eythay ouldshayavehay owerpay otay acquitway, ybay ethay econdsay otay asspay
entencesay ofway eathday, andway ybay ethay irdthay otay imposeway away ecuniarypay inefay. Inway
ortshay, Ompey'spay olewhay armyway alkedtay ofway othingnay utbay ethay onourshay orway umssay ofway
oneymay ichwhay ereway otay ebay eirthay ewardsray, orway ofway engeancevay onway eirthay enemiesway;
andway evernay onsideredcay owhay eythay ereway otay efeatday eirthay enemiesway, utbay inway atwhay
annermay eythay ouldshay useway eirthay ictoryvay.

Xivlxxay.Orncay eingbay ovidedpray, andway ishay oldierssay efreshedray, andway away
ufficientsay imetay avinghay elapsedway incesay ethay engagementway atway Rachiumdyray, enwhay
Aesarcay oughtthay ehay adhay ufficientlysay oundedsay ethay ispositionday ofway ishay
oopstray, ehay oughtthay atthay ehay oughtway otay tryay etherwhay Ompeypay adhay anyway intentionway
orway inclinationway otay omecay otay away attlebay. Accordinglyway ehay edlay ishay oopstray outway ofway
ethay ampcay, andway angedray emthay inway orderway ofway attlebay, atway irstfay onway eirthay ownway
oundgray, andway atway away allsmay istanceday omfray Ompey'spay ampcay utbay afterwardsway orfay
everalsay aysday inway uccessionsay ehay advancedway omfray ishay ownway ampcay, andway edlay emthay
