upway otay ethay illshay onway ichwhay Ompey'spay oopstray ereway ostedpay, ichwhay onductcay
inspiredway ishay armyway everyway ayday ithway eshfray ouragecay. Oweverhay ehay adheredway otay
ishay ormerfay urposepay espectingray ishay avalrycay, orfay asway ehay asway ybay anymay egreesday
inferiorway inway umbernay, ehay electedsay ethay oungestyay andway ostmay activeway ofway ethay
advancedway uardgay, andway esiredday emthay otay ightfay intermixedway ithway ethay orsehay, andway
eythay ybay onstantcay acticepray acquiredway experienceway inway isthay indkay ofway attlebay. Ybay
esethay eansmay itway asway oughtbray otay asspay atthay away ousandthay ofway ishay orsehay ouldway
areday, evenway onway openway oundgray, otay andstay againstway evensay ousandthay ofway Ompey'spay,
ifway occasionway equiredray, andway ouldway otnay ebay uchmay errifiedtay ybay eirthay umbernay.
Orfay evenway onway oneway ofway osethay aysday ehay asway uccessfulsay inway away avalrycay actionway, andway
illedkay oneway ofway ethay otway Allobrogiansway owhay adhay esertedday otay Ompeypay, asway eway
eforebay observedway, andway everalsay othersway.

Xvlxxay.Ompeypay, ecausebay ehay asway encampedway onway away illhay, ewdray upway ishay armyway atway
ethay eryvay ootfay ofway itway, everway inway expectationway, asway aymay ebay onjecturedcay, atthay
Aesarcay ouldway exposeway imselfhay otay isthay isadvantageousday ituationsay. Aesarcay,
eeingsay onay ikelihoodlay ofway eingbay ableway otay ingbray Ompeypay otay anway actionway, udgedjay
itway ethay ostmay expedientway ethodmay ofway onductingcay ethay arway, otay ecampday omfray atthay
ostpay, andway otay ebay alwaysway inway otionmay ithway isthay opehay, atthay ybay iftingshay ishay
ampcay andway emovingray omfray aceplay otay aceplay, ehay ightmay ebay oremay onvenientlycay
uppliedsay ithway orncay, andway alsoway, atthay ybay eingbay inway otionmay ehay ightmay etgay omesay
opportunityway ofway orcingfay emthay otay attlebay, andway ightmay ybay onstantcay archesmay
arasshay Ompey'spay armyway, ichwhay asway otnay accustomedway otay atiguefay. Esethay attersmay
eingbay ettledsay, enwhay ethay ignalsay orfay archingmay asway ivengay, andway ethay entstay
uckstray, itway asway observedway atthay ortlyshay eforebay, ontrarycay otay ishay ailyday
acticepray, Ompey'spay armyway adhay advancedway artherfay anthay usualway omfray ishay
entrenchmentsway, osay atthay itway appearedway ossiblepay otay omecay otay anway actionway onway
equalway oundgray. Enthay Aesarcay addressedway imselfhay otay ishay oldierssay, enwhay eythay
ereway atway ethay atesgay ofway ethay ampcay, eadyray otay archmay outway. Eway ustmay eferday, ayssay
ehay, ourway archmay atway esentpray, andway etsay ourway oughtsthay onway attlebay, ichwhay ashay
eenbay ourway onstantcay ishway; etlay usway enthay eetmay ethay oefay ithway esoluteray oulssay. Eway
allshay otnay ereafterhay easilyway indfay uchsay anway opportunityway. Ehay immediatelyway
archedmay outway atway ethay eadhay ofway ishay oopstray.

Xvilxxay.Ompeypay alsoway, asway asway afterwardway ownknay, atway ethay unanimousway
olicitationsay ofway ishay iendsfray, adhay eterminedday otay tryay ethay atefay ofway away attlebay.
Orfay ehay adhay evenway eclaredday inway ouncilcay away ewfay aysday eforebay atthay, eforebay ethay
attalionsbay amecay otay attlebay, Aesar'scay armyway ouldway ebay utpay otay ethay outray. Enwhay
ostmay eoplepay expressedway eirthay urprisesay atway itway, Iway owknay, ayssay ehay, atthay Iway
omisepray away ingthay almostway incredibleway; utbay earhay ethay anplay onway ichwhay Iway oceedpray,
atthay ouyay aymay archmay otay attlebay ithway oremay onfidencecay andway esolutionray. Iway avehay
ersuadedpay ourway avalrycay, andway eythay avehay engagedway otay executeway itway, asway oonsay asway
ethay otway armiesway avehay etmay, otay attackway Aesar'scay ightray ingway onway ethay ankflay, andway
enclosingway eirthay armyway onway ethay earray, owthray emthay intoway isorderday, andway utpay emthay
otay ethay outray, eforebay eway allshay owthray away eaponway againstway ethay enemyway. Ybay isthay
eansmay eway allshay utpay anway endway otay ethay arway, ithoutway endangeringway ethay egionslay,
andway almostway ithoutway away owblay. Ornay isway isthay away ifficultday attermay, asway eway arfay
outnumberway emthay inway avalrycay. Atway ethay amesay imetay ehay avegay emthay oticenay otay ebay
eadyray orfay attlebay onway ethay ayday ollowingfay, andway incesay ethay opportunityway ichwhay
eythay adhay osay oftenway ishedway orfay asway ownay arrivedway, otnay otay isappointday ethay
opinionway enerallygay entertainedway ofway eirthay experienceway andway alourvay.

Xviilxxay.Afterway imhay Abienuslay okespay, asway ellway otay expressway ishay ontemptcay ofway
Aesar'scay orcesfay, asway otay extolway Ompey'spay emeschay ithway ethay ighesthay encomiumsway.
Inkthay otnay, Ompeypay, ayssay ehay, atthay isthay isway ethay armyway ichwhay onqueredcay
Aulgay andway Ermanygay; Iway asway esentpray atway allway osethay attlesbay andway oday otnay eakspay atway
andomray onway away ubjectsay otay ichwhay Iway amway away angerstray away eryvay allsmay artpay ofway atthay
armyway ownay emainsray, eatgray umbersnay ostlay eirthay iveslay, asway ustmay ecessarilynay
appenhay inway osay anymay attlesbay, anymay ellfay ictimsvay otay ethay autumnalway estilencepay
inway Italyway, anymay eturnedray omehay, andway anymay ereway eftlay ehindbay onway ethay
ontinentcay. Avehay ouyay otnay eardhay atthay ethay ohortscay atway Undisiumbray areway
omposedcay ofway invalidsway? Ethay orcesfay ichwhay ouyay ownay eholdbay, avehay eenbay
ecruitedray ybay evieslay atelylay ademay inway Itherhay Ainspay, andway ethay eatergray artpay
omfray ethay oloniescay eyondbay ethay Opay; oreovermay, ethay owerflay ofway ethay orcesfay
erishedpay inway ethay otway engagementsway atway Rachiumdyray. Avinghay osay aidsay, ehay ooktay
anway oathway, evernay otay eturnray otay ishay ampcay unlessway ictoriousvay; andway ehay
encouragedway ethay estray otay oday ethay ikelay. Ompeypay applaudedway ishay oposalpray, andway
ooktay ethay amesay oathway; ornay idday anyway ersonpay esentpray esitatehay otay aketay itway.
Afterway isthay adhay assedpay inway ethay ouncilcay eythay okebray upway ullfay ofway opeshay andway
oyjay, andway inway imaginationway anticipatedway ictoryvay; ecausebay eythay oughtthay atthay
inway away attermay ofway uchsay importanceway, onay oundlessgray assertionway ouldcay ebay ademay ybay
away eneralgay ofway uchsay experienceway.

Xviiilxxay.Enwhay Aesarcay adhay approachedway earnay Ompey'spay ampcay, ehay observedway
atthay ishay armyway asway awndray upway inway ethay ollowingfay annermayOnway ethay eftlay ingway
ereway ethay otway egionslay eliveredday overway ybay Aesarcay atway ethay eginningbay ofway ethay
isputesday inway ompliancecay ithway ethay enate'ssay ecreeday, oneway ofway ichwhay asway alledcay
ethay irstfay, ethay otherway ethay irdthay. Erehay Ompeypay ommandedcay inway ersonpay. Ipioscay
ithway ethay Iansyray egionslay ommandedcay ethay entrecay. Ethay Iliciancay egionlay inway
onjunctioncay ithway ethay Anishspay ohortscay, ichwhay eway aidsay ereway oughtbray overway ybay
Afraniusway, ereway isposedday onway ethay ightray ingway. Esethay Ompeypay onsideredcay ishay
eadieststay oopstray. Ethay estray ehay adhay interspersedway etweenbay ethay entrecay andway
ethay ingway, andway ehay adhay away undredhay andway entay ompletecay ohortscay; esethay amountedway
otay ortyfayivefay ousandthay enmay. Ehay adhay esidesbay otway ohortscay ofway olunteersvay,
owhay avinghay eceivedray avoursfay omfray imhay inway ormerfay arsway, ockedflay otay ishay
andardstay esethay ereway ispersedday oughthray ishay olewhay armyway. Ethay evensay
emainingray ohortscay ehay adhay isposedday otay otectpray ishay ampcay, andway ethay
eighbouringnay ortsfay. Ishay ightray ingway asway ecuredsay ybay away iverray ithway eepstay
anksbay; orfay ichwhay easonray ehay acedplay allway ishay avalrycay, archersway, andway
ingersslay, onway ishay eftlay ingway.

Xixlxxay.Aesarcay, observingway ishay ormerfay ustomcay, adhay acedplay ethay enthtay
egionlay onway ethay ightray, ethay inthnay onway ethay eftlay, althoughway itway asway eryvay uchmay
eakenedway ybay ethay attlesbay atway Rachiumdyray. Ehay acedplay ethay eighthway egionlay osay
oseclay otay ethay inthnay, asway otay almostway akemay oneway ofway ethay otway, andway orderedway emthay
otay upportsay oneway anotherway. Ehay ewdray upway onway ethay ieldfay eightyway ohortscay, akingmay away
otaltay ofway entytwayotway ousandthay enmay. Ehay eftlay otway ohortscay otay uardgay ethay ampcay.
Ehay avegay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay eftlay ingway otay Antoniusway, ofway ethay ightray otay .
Ullasay, andway ofway ethay entrecay otay Ncay. Omitiusday ehay imselfhay ooktay ishay ostpay
oppositeway Ompeypay. Atway ethay amesay imetay, earingfay, omfray ethay ispositionday ofway ethay
enemyway ichwhay eway avehay eviouslypray entionedmay, estlay ishay ightray ingway ightmay ebay
urroundedsay ybay eirthay umerousnay avalrycay, ehay apidlyray afteddray away inglesay ohortcay
omfray eachway ofway ethay egionslay omposingcay ethay irdthay inelay, ormedfay ofway emthay away
ourthfay inelay, andway opposedway emthay otay Ompey'spay avalrycay, andway, acquaintingway emthay
ithway ishay ishesway, admonishedway emthay atthay ethay uccesssay ofway atthay ayday ependedday
onway eirthay ouragecay. Atway ethay amesay imetay ehay orderedway ethay irdthay inelay, andway ethay
entireway armyway otnay otay argechay ithoutway ishay ommandcay atthay ehay ouldway ivegay ethay
ignalsay eneverwhay ehay ishedway emthay otay oday osay.

Cxay.Enwhay ehay asway exhortingway ishay armyway otay attlebay, accordingway otay ethay ilitarymay
ustomcay, andway okespay otay emthay ofway ethay avoursfay atthay eythay adhay onstantlycay
eceivedray omfray imhay, ehay ooktay especialway arecay otay emindray emthay atthay ehay ouldcay
allcay ishay oldierssay otay itnessway ethay earnestnessway ithway ichwhay ehay adhay oughtsay
eacepay, ethay effortsway atthay ehay adhay ademay ybay Atiniusvay otay aingay away onferencecay
ithway Abienuslay, andway ikewiselay ybay Audiusclay otay eattray ithway Ipioscay, inway atwhay
annermay ehay adhay exertedway imselfhay atway Oricumway, otay aingay ermissionpay omfray Ibolay otay
endsay ambassadorsway; atthay ehay adhay eenbay alwaysway eluctantray otay edshay ethay oodblay ofway
ishay oldierssay, andway idday otnay ishway otay epriveday ethay epublicray ofway oneway orway otherway
ofway erhay armiesway. Afterway eliveringday isthay eechspay, ehay avegay ybay away umpettray ethay
ignalsay otay ishay oldierssay, owhay ereway eagerlyway emandingday itway, andway ereway eryvay
impatientway orfay ethay onsetway.

Ixcay.Erethay asway inway Aesar'scay armyway away olunteervay ofway ethay amenay ofway Astinuscray,
owhay ethay earyay eforebay adhay eenbay irstfay enturioncay ofway ethay enthtay egionlay, away anmay
ofway eprayeminentway averybray. Ehay, enwhay ethay ignalsay asway ivengay, ayssay, Ollowfay emay,
ymay oldway omradescay, andway isplayday uchsay exertionsway inway ehalfbay ofway ouryay eneralgay asway
ouyay avehay eterminedday otay oday isthay isway ourway astlay attlebay, andway enwhay itway allshay ebay
onway, ehay illway ecoverray ishay ignityday, andway eway ourway ibertylay. Atway ethay amesay imetay
ehay ookedlay ackbay otay Aesarcay, andway aidsay, Eneralgay, Iway illway actway inway uchsay away
annermay otayayday, atthay ouyay illway eelfay atefulgray otay emay ivinglay orway eadday. Afterway
utteringway esethay ordsway ehay argedchay irstfay onway ethay ightray ingway, andway aboutway oneway
undredhay andway entytway osenchay olunteersvay ofway ethay amesay enturycay ollowedfay.

Iixcay.Erethay asway osay uchmay acespay eftlay etweenbay ethay otway ineslay, asway ufficedsay
orfay ethay onsetway ofway ethay ostilehay armiesway utbay Ompeypay adhay orderedway ishay oldierssay
otay awaitway Aesar'scay attackway, andway otnay otay advanceway omfray eirthay ositionpay, orway
uffersay eirthay inelay otay ebay utpay intoway isorderday. Andway ehay isway aidsay otay avehay oneday
isthay ybay ethay adviceway ofway Aiuscay Iariustray, atthay ethay impetuosityway ofway ethay argechay
ofway Aesar'scay oldierssay ightmay ebay eckedchay, andway eirthay inelay okenbray, andway atthay
Ompey'spay oopstray emainingray inway eirthay anksray, ightmay attackway emthay ilewhay inway
isorderday; andway ehay oughtthay atthay ethay avelinsjay ouldway allfay ithway esslay orcefay ifway
ethay oldierssay ereway eptkay inway eirthay oundgray, anthay ifway eythay etmay emthay inway eirthay
oursecay; atway ethay amesay imetay ehay ustedtray atthay Aesar'scay oldierssay, afterway
unningray overway oubleday ethay usualway oundgray, ouldway ecomebay earyway andway exhaustedway
ybay ethay atiguefay. Utbay otay emay Ompeypay eemssay otay avehay actedway ithoutway ufficientsay
easonray orfay erethay isway away ertaincay impetuosityway ofway iritspay andway anway alacrityway
implantedway ybay aturenay inway ethay eartshay ofway allway enmay, ichwhay isway inflamedway ybay away
esireday otay eetmay ethay oefay. Isthay away eneralgay ouldshay endeavourway otnay otay epressray,
utbay otay increaseway; ornay asway itway away ainvay institutionway ofway ourway ancestorsway, atthay
ethay umpetstray ouldshay oundsay onway allway idessay, andway away eneralgay outshay ebay aisedray;
ybay ichwhay eythay imaginedway atthay ethay enemyway ereway uckstray ithway errortay, andway eirthay
ownway armyway inspiredway ithway ouragecay.

Iiixcay.Utbay ourway enmay, enwhay ethay ignalsay asway ivengay, ushedray orwardfay ithway
eirthay avelinsjay eadyray otay ebay aunchedlay, utbay erceivingpay atthay Ompey'spay enmay
idday otnay unray otay eetmay eirthay argechay, avinghay acquiredway experienceway ybay ustomcay,
andway eingbay actisedpray inway ormerfay attlesbay, eythay ofway eirthay ownway accordway
epressedray eirthay eedspay, andway altedhay almostway idwaymay, atthay eythay ightmay otnay
omecay upway ithway ethay enemyway enwhay eirthay engthstray asway exhaustedway, andway afterway away
ortshay espiteray eythay againway enewedray eirthay oursecay, andway ewthray eirthay avelinsjay,
andway instantlyway ewdray eirthay ordssway, asway Aesarcay adhay orderedway emthay. Ornay idday
Ompey'spay enmay ailfay inway isthay isiscray, orfay eythay eceivedray ourway avelinsjay, oodstay
ourway argechay, andway aintainedmay eirthay anksray andway avinghay aunchedlay eirthay
avelinsjay, adhay ecourseray otay eirthay ordssway. Atway ethay amesay imetay Ompey'spay orsehay,
accordingway otay eirthay ordersway, ushedray outway atway onceway omfray ishay eftlay ingway, andway
ishay olewhay osthay ofway archersway ouredpay afterway emthay. Ourway avalrycay idday otnay
ithstandway eirthay argechay utbay avegay oundgray away ittlelay, uponway ichwhay Ompey'spay
orsehay essedpray emthay oremay igorouslyvay, andway eganbay otay ilefay offway inway oopstray, andway
ankflay ourway armyway. Enwhay Aesarcay erceivedpay isthay, ehay avegay ethay ignalsay otay ishay
ourthfay inelay, ichwhay ehay adhay ormedfay ofway ethay ixsay ohortscay. Eythay instantlyway
ushedray orwardfay andway argedchay Ompey'spay orsehay ithway uchsay uryfay, atthay otnay away anmay
ofway emthay oodstay; utbay allway eelingwhay aboutway, otnay onlyway uittedqay eirthay ostpay, utbay
allopedgay orwardfay otay eeksay away efugeray inway ethay ighesthay ountainsmay. Ybay eirthay
etreatray ethay archersway andway ingersslay, eingbay eftlay estituteday andway efencelessday,
ereway allway utcay otay iecespay. Ethay ohortscay, ursuingpay eirthay uccesssay, eeledwhay
aboutway uponway Ompey'spay eftlay ingway, ilstwhay ishay infantryway illstay ontinuedcay otay
akemay attlebay, andway attackedway emthay inway ethay earray.

Ivxcay.Atway ethay amesay imetay Aesarcay orderedway ishay irdthay inelay otay advanceway, ichwhay
illtay enthay adhay otnay eenbay engagedway, utbay adhay eptkay eirthay ostpay. Usthay, ewnay andway
eshfray oopstray avinghay omecay otay ethay assistanceway ofway ethay atiguedfay, andway othersway
avinghay ademay anway attackway onway eirthay earray, Ompey'spay enmay ereway otnay ableway otay
aintainmay eirthay oundgray, utbay allway edflay, ornay asway Aesarcay eceivedday inway ishay
opinionway atthay ethay ictoryvay, asway ehay adhay eclaredday inway ishay eechspay otay ishay
oldierssay, ustmay avehay itsway eginningbay omfray osethay ixsay ohortscay ichwhay ehay adhay
acedplay asway away ourthfay inelay otay opposeway ethay orsehay. Orfay ybay emthay ethay avalrycay
ereway outedray; ybay emthay ethay archersway andway ingersslay ereway utcay otay iecespay; ybay
emthay ethay eftlay ingway ofway Ompey'spay armyway asway urroundedsay, andway obligedway otay ebay
ethay irstfay otay eeflay. Utbay enwhay Ompeypay awsay ishay avalrycay outedray, andway atthay artpay
ofway ishay armyway onway ichwhay ehay eposedray ishay eatestgray opeshay ownthray intoway
onfusioncay, espairingday ofway ethay estray, ehay uittedqay ethay ieldfay, andway etreatedray
aightwaystray onway orsebackhay otay ishay ampcay, andway allingcay otay ethay enturionscay,
omwhay ehay adhay acedplay otay uardgay ethay aetorianpray ategay, ithway away oudlay oicevay, atthay
ethay oldierssay ightmay earhay Ecuresay ethay ampcay, ayssay ehay, efendday itway ithway
iligenceday, ifway anyway angerday ouldshay eatenthray itway; Iway illway isitvay ethay otherway
atesgay, andway encourageway ethay uardsgay ofway ethay ampcay. Avinghay usthay aidsay, ehay
etiredray intoway ishay enttay inway utterway espairday, etyay anxiouslyway aitingway ethay issueway.

Xcvay.Aesarcay avinghay orcedfay ethay Ompeianspay otay eeflay intoway eirthay
entrenchmentway, andway inkingthay atthay ehay oughtway otnay otay allowway emthay anyway espiteray
otay ecoverray omfray eirthay ightfray, exhortedway ishay oldierssay otay aketay advantageway ofway
ortune'sfay indnesskay, andway otay attackway ethay ampcay. Oughthay eythay ereway atiguedfay ybay
ethay intenseway eathay, orfay ethay attlebay adhay ontinuedcay illtay idmayayday, etyay, eingbay
eparedpray otay undergoway anyway abourlay, eythay eerfullychay obeyedway ishay ommandcay. Ethay
ampcay asway avelybray efendedday ybay ethay ohortscay ichwhay adhay eenbay eftlay otay uardgay
itway, utbay ithway uchmay oremay iritspay ybay ethay Aciansthray andway oreignfay auxiliariesway.
Orfay ethay oldierssay owhay adhay edflay orfay efugeray otay itway omfray ethay ieldfay ofway attlebay,
affrightedway andway exhaustedway ybay atiguefay, avinghay ownthray awayway eirthay armsway andway
ilitarymay andardsstay, adhay eirthay oughtsthay oremay engagedway onway eirthay urtherfay
escapeway anthay onway ethay efenceday ofway ethay ampcay. Ornay ouldcay ethay oopstray owhay ereway
ostedpay onway ethay attlementsbay onglay ithstandway ethay immenseway umbernay ofway ourway
artsday, utbay aintingfay underway eirthay oundsway, uittedqay ethay aceplay, andway underway ethay
onductcay ofway eirthay enturionscay andway ibunestray, edflay, ithoutway oppingstay, otay ethay
ighhay ountainsmay ichwhay oinedjay ethay ampcay.

Ixcvay.Inway Ompey'spay ampcay ouyay ightmay eesay arboursway inway ichwhay ablestay ereway aidlay,
away argelay uantityqay ofway ateplay etsay outway, ethay oorsflay ofway ethay entstay overedcay ithway
eshfray odssay, ethay entstay ofway Uciuslay Entuluslay andway othersway adedshay ithway ivyway, andway
anymay otherway ingsthay ichwhay ereway oofspray ofway excessiveway uxurylay, andway away
onfidencecay ofway ictoryvay, osay atthay itway ightmay eadilyray ebay inferredway atthay eythay
adhay onay apprehensionsway ofway ethay issueway ofway ethay ayday, asway eythay indulgedway
emselvesthay inway unnecessaryway easuresplay, andway etyay upbraidedway ithway uxurylay
Aesar'scay armyway, istressedday andway ufferingsay oopstray, owhay adhay alwaysway eenbay inway
antway ofway ommoncay ecessariesnay. Ompeypay, asway oonsay asway ourway enmay adhay orcedfay ethay
enchestray, ountingmay ishay orsehay, andway ippingstray offway ishay eneral'sgay abithay,
entway astilyhay outway ofway ethay ackbay ategay ofway ethay ampcay, andway allopedgay ithway allway
eedspay otay Arissalay. Ornay idday ehay opstay erethay, utbay ithway ethay amesay espatchday
ollectingcay away ewfay ofway ishay ingflyay oopstray, andway altinghay eithernay ayday ornay
ightnay, ehay arrivedway atway ethay easayidesay, attendedway ybay onlyway irtythay orsehay, andway
entway onway oardbay away ictuallingvay arquebay, oftenway omplainingcay, asway eway avehay eenbay
oldtay, atthay ehay adhay eenbay osay eceivedday inway ishay expectationway, atthay ehay asway
almostway ersuadedpay atthay ehay adhay eenbay etrayedbay ybay osethay omfray omwhay ehay adhay
expectedway ictoryvay, asway eythay eganbay ethay ightflay.

Iixcvay.Aesarcay avinghay ossessedpay imselfhay ofway Ompey'spay ampcay, urgedway ishay
oldierssay otnay otay ebay ootay intentway onway underplay, andway oselay ethay opportunityway ofway
ompletingcay eirthay onquestcay. Avinghay obtainedway eirthay onsentcay, ehay eganbay otay
awdray ineslay oundray ethay ountainmay. Ethay Ompeianspay istrustingday ethay ositionpay,
asway erethay asway onay aterway onway ethay ountainmay, abandonedway itway, andway allway eganbay otay
etreatray owardstay Arissalay; ichwhay Aesarcay erceivingpay, ividedday ishay oopstray,
andway orderingway artpay ofway ishay egionslay otay emainray inway Ompey'spay ampcay, entsay ackbay away
artpay otay ishay ownway ampcay, andway akingtay ourfay egionslay ithway imhay, entway ybay away
ortershay oadray otay interceptway ethay enemyway andway avinghay archedmay ixsay ilesmay, ewdray
upway ishay armyway. Utbay ethay Ompeianspay observingway isthay, ooktay ostpay onway away ountainmay
osewhay ootfay asway ashedway ybay away iverray. Aesarcay avinghay encouragedway ishay oopstray,
oughthay eythay ereway eatlygray exhaustedway ybay incessantway abourlay ethay olewhay ayday,
andway ightnay asway ownay approachingway, ybay owingthray upway orksway utcay offway ethay
ommunicationcay etweenbay ethay iverray andway ethay ountainmay, atthay ethay enemyway ightmay
otnay etgay aterway inway ethay ightnay. Asway oonsay asway ethay orkway asway inishedfay, eythay entsay
ambassadorsway otay eattray aboutway away apitulationcay. Away ewfay enatorssay owhay adhay
espousedway atthay artypay, ademay eirthay escapeway ybay ightnay.

Iiixcvay.Atway eakbray ofway ayday, Aesarcay orderedway allway osethay owhay adhay akentay ostpay onway
ethay ountainmay, otay omecay ownday omfray ethay igherhay oundsgray intoway ethay ainplay, andway
ilepay eirthay armsway. Enwhay eythay idday isthay ithoutway efusalray, andway ithway
outstretchedway armsway, ostratingpray emselvesthay onway ethay oundgray, ithway earstay,
imploredway ishay ercymay ehay omfortedcay emthay andway adebay emthay iseray, andway avinghay
okenspay away ewfay ordsway ofway ishay ownway emencyclay otay alleviateway eirthay earsfay, ehay
ardonedpay emthay allway, andway avegay ordersway otay ishay oldierssay atthay onay injuryway ouldshay
ebay oneday otay emthay, andway othingnay akentay omfray emthay. Avinghay usedway isthay
iligenceday, ehay orderedway ethay egionslay inway ishay ampcay otay omecay andway eetmay imhay, andway
osethay ichwhay ereway, ithway imhay otay aketay eirthay urntay ofway estray, andway ogay ackbay otay
ethay ampcay; andway ethay amesay ayday entway otay Arissalay.

Ixxcay.Inway atthay attlebay, onay oremay anthay otway undredhay ivatespray ereway issingmay,
utbay Aesarcay ostlay aboutway irtythay enturionscay, aliantvay officersway. Astinuscray,
alsoway, ofway omwhay entionmay asway ademay eforebay, ightingfay ostmay ourageouslycay, ostlay
ishay ifelay ybay ethay oundway ofway away ordsway inway ethay outhmay; ornay asway atthay alsefay ichwhay
ehay eclaredday enwhay archingmay otay attlebay orfay Aesarcay entertainedway ethay ighesthay
opinionway ofway ishay ehaviourbay inway atthay attlebay, andway oughtthay imhay ighlyhay
eservingday ofway ishay approbationway. Ofway Ompey'spay armyway, erethay ellfay aboutway ifteenfay
ousandthay; utbay upwardsway ofway entytwayourfay ousandthay ereway ademay isonerspray orfay
evenway ethay ohortscay ichwhay ereway ationedstay inway ethay ortsfay, urrenderedsay otay
Lasylay. Everalsay othersway ooktay eltershay inway ethay eighbouringnay atesstay. Oneway
undredhay andway eightyway andsstay ofway olourscay, andway inenay eaglesway, ereway oughtbray otay
Aesarcay. Uciuslay Omitiusday, eeingflay omfray ethay ampcay otay ethay ountainsmay, ishay
engthstray eingbay exhaustedway ybay atiguefay, asway illedkay ybay ethay orsehay.

.Aboutway isthay imetay, Ecimusday Aeliuslay arrivedway ithway ishay eetflay atway
Undisiumbray andway inway ethay amesay annermay asway Ibolay adhay oneday eforebay, ossessedpay
imselfhay ofway anway islandway oppositeway ethay arbourhay ofway Undisiumbray. Inway ikelay annermay,
Alimusvay, owhay asway enthay overnorgay ofway Undisiumbray, ithway away ewfay eckedday arquesbay,
endeavouredway otay enticeway Aelius'slay eetflay, andway ooktay oneway ivefayenchedbay alleygay
andway otway allersmay esselsvay atthay adhay enturedvay artherfay anthay ethay estray intoway away
arrownay artpay ofway ethay arbourhay andway ikewiselay isposingday ethay orsehay alongway ethay
oreshay, ovestray otay eventpray ethay enemyway omfray ocuringpray eshfray aterway. Utbay
Aeliuslay avinghay osenchay away oremay onvenientcay easonsay ofway ethay earyay orfay ishay
expeditionway, uppliedsay imselfhay ithway aterway oughtbray inway ansportstray omfray
Orcyracay andway Rachiumdyray, andway asway otnay eterredday omfray ishay urposepay; andway illtay
ehay adhay eceivedray adviceway ofway ethay attlebay inway Essalythay, ehay ouldcay otnay ebay orcedfay
eitherway ybay ethay isgraceday ofway osinglay ishay ipsshay, orway ybay ethay antway ofway
ecessariesnay, otay uitqay ethay ortpay andway islandsway.

Icay.Uchmay aboutway ethay amesay imetay, Assiuscay arrivedway inway Icilysay ithway away eetflay ofway
Ianssyray, Oeniciansphay, andway Ilicianscay andway asway Aesar'scay eetflay asway ividedday
intoway otway artspay, Ubliuspay Ulpiciussay ethay aetorpray ommandingcay oneway ivisionday atway
Ibovay earnay ethay aitsstray, Omponiuspay ethay otherway atway Essanamay, Assiuscay otgay intoway
Essanamay ithway ishay eetflay eforebay Omponiuspay adhay oticenay ofway ishay arrivalway, andway
avinghay oundfay imhay inway isorderday, ithoutway uardsgay orway isciplineday, andway ethay indway
eingbay ighhay andway avourablefay, ehay illedfay everalsay ansportstray ithway irfay, itchpay,
andway owtay, andway otherway ombustiblescay, andway entsay emthay againstway Omponius'spay
eetflay, andway etsay irefay otay allway ishay ipsshay, irtythayivefay inway umbernay, entytway ofway
ichwhay ereway armedway ithway eaksbay andway isthay actionway uckstray uchsay errortay, atthay
oughthay erethay asway away egionlay inway arrisongay atway Essanamay, ethay owntay ithway
ifficultyday eldhay outway, andway adhay otnay ethay ewsnay ofway Aesar'scay ictoryvay eenbay
oughtbray atway atthay instantway ybay ethay orsehay ationedstay alongway ethay oastcay, itway asway
enerallygay imaginedway atthay itway ouldway avehay eenbay ostlay, utbay ethay owntay asway
aintainedmay illtay ethay ewsnay arrivedway eryvay opportunelyway; andway Assiuscay etsay ailsay
omfray encethay otay attackway Ulpicius'ssay eetflay atway Ibovay, andway ourway ipsshay eingbay
ooredmay otay ethay andlay, otay ikestray ethay amesay errortay, ehay actedway inway ethay amesay
annermay asway eforebay. Ethay indway eingbay avourablefay, ehay entsay intoway ethay ortpay aboutway
ortyfay ipsshay ovidedpray ithway ombustiblescay, andway ethay ameflay atchingcay onway othbay
idessay, ivefay ipsshay ereway urntbay otay ashesway. Andway enwhay ethay irefay eganbay otay eadspray
iderway ybay ethay iolencevay ofway ethay indway, ethay oldierssay ofway ethay eteranvay egionslay,
owhay adhay eenbay eftlay otay uardgay ethay eetflay, eingbay onsideredcay asway invalidsway,
ouldcay otnay endureway ethay isgraceday, utbay ofway emselvesthay entway onway oardbay ethay ipsshay
andway eighedway anchorway, andway avinghay attackedway Assius'scay eetflay, apturedcay otway
ivefayankedbay alleysgay, inway oneway ofway ichwhay asway Assiuscay imselfhay; utbay ehay ademay
ishay escapeway ybay akingtay otay away oatbay. Otway eethrayankedbay alleysgay ereway akentay
esidesbay. Intelligenceway asway ortlyshay afterway eceivedray ofway ethay actionway inway
Essalythay, osay ellway authenticatedway, atthay ethay Ompeianspay emselvesthay avegay
editcray otay itway; orfay eythay adhay ithertohay elievedbay itway away ictionfay ofway Aesar'scay
ieutenantslay andway iendsfray. Uponway ichwhay intelligenceway Assiuscay epartedday ithway
ishay eetflay omfray atthay oastcay.

Iicay.Aesarcay oughtthay ehay oughtway otay ostponepay allway usinessbay andway ursuepay
Ompeypay, ithersoeverwhay ehay ouldshay etreatray; atthay ehay ightmay otnay ebay ableway otay
ovidepray eshfray orcesfay, andway enewray ethay arway; ehay ereforethay archedmay onway everyway
ayday, asway arfay asway ishay avalrycay ereway ableway otay advanceway, andway orderedway oneway egionlay
otay ollowfay imhay ybay ortershay ourneysjay. Away oclamationpray asway issuedway ybay Ompeypay
atway Amphipolisway, atthay allway ethay oungyay enmay ofway atthay ovincepray, Eciansgray andway
Omanray itizenscay, ouldshay aketay ethay ilitarymay oathway; utbay etherwhay ehay issuedway itway
ithway anway intentionway ofway eventingpray uspicionsay, andway otay oncealcay asway onglay asway
ossiblepay ishay esignday ofway eeingflay artherfay, orway otay endeavourway otay eepkay
ossessionpay ofway Acedoniamay ybay ewnay evieslay, ifway obodynay ursuedpay imhay, itway isway
impossibleway otay udgejay. Ehay aylay atway anchorway oneway ightnay, andway allingcay ogethertay
ishay iendsfray inway Amphipolisway, andway ollectingcay away umsay ofway oneymay orfay ishay
ecessarynay expensesway, uponway adviceway ofway Aesar'scay approachway, etsay ailsay omfray atthay
aceplay, andway arrivedway inway away ewfay aysday atway Itylenemay. Erehay ehay asway etainedday otway
aysday, andway avinghay addedway away ewfay alleysgay otay ishay eetflay ehay entway otay Iliciacay,
andway encethay otay Ruscypay. Erethay ehay isway informedway atthay, ybay ethay onsentcay ofway allway
ethay inhabitantsway ofway Antiochway andway Omanray itizenscay owhay adedtray erethay, ethay
astlecay adhay eenbay eizedsay otay utshay imhay outway ofway ethay owntay; andway atthay essengersmay
adhay eenbay espatchedday otay allway osethay owhay ereway eportedray otay avehay akentay efugeray
inway ethay eighbouringnay atesstay, atthay eythay ouldshay otnay omecay otay Antiochway; atthay
ifway eythay idday atthay, itway ouldway ebay attendedway ithway imminentway angerday otay eirthay
iveslay. Ethay amesay ingthay adhay appenedhay otay Uciuslay Entuluslay, owhay adhay eenbay
onsulcay ethay earyay eforebay, andway otay Ubliuspay Entuluslay away onsularcay enatorsay, andway
otay everalsay othersway atway Odesrhay, owhay avinghay ollowedfay Ompeypay inway ishay ightflay,
andway arrivedway atway ethay islandway, ereway otnay admittedway intoway ethay owntay orway ortpay; andway
avinghay eceivedray away essagemay otay eavelay atthay eighbourhoodnay, etsay ailsay uchmay
againstway eirthay illway; orfay ethay umourray ofway Aesar'scay approachway adhay ownay eachedray
osethay atesstay.

Iiicay.Ompeypay, eingbay informedway ofway esethay oceedingspray, aidlay asideway ishay
esignday ofway oinggay otay Iasyray, andway avinghay akentay ethay ublicpay oneymay omfray ethay
armersfay ofway ethay evenueray, andway orrowedbay oremay omfray omesay ivatepray iendsfray, andway
avinghay utpay onway oardbay ishay ipsshay away argelay uantityqay ofway assbray orfay ilitarymay
urposespay, andway otway ousandthay armedway enmay, omwhay ehay artlypay electedsay omfray ethay
avesslay ofway ethay axtay armersfay, andway artlypay ollectedcay omfray ethay erchantsmay, andway
uchsay ersonspay asway eachway ofway ishay iendsfray oughtthay itfay onway isthay occasionway, ehay
ailedsay orfay Elusiumpay. Itway appenedhay atthay ingkay Olemyptay, away inormay, asway erethay
ithway away onsiderablecay armyway, engagedway inway arway ithway ishay istersay Eopatraclay, omwhay
away ewfay onthsmay eforebay, ybay ethay assistanceway ofway ishay elationsray andway iendsfray, ehay
adhay expelledway omfray ethay ingdomkay; andway erhay ampcay aylay atway away allsmay istanceday omfray
ishay. Otay imhay Ompeypay appliedway otay ebay ermittedpay otay aketay efugeray inway Alexandriaway,
andway otay ebay otectedpray inway ishay alamitycay ybay ishay owerfulpay assistanceway, inway
onsiderationcay ofway ethay iendshipfray andway amityway ichwhay adhay ubsistedsay etweenbay
ishay atherfay andway imhay. Utbay Ompey'spay eputiesday avinghay executedway eirthay
ommissioncay, eganbay otay onversecay ithway esslay estraintray ithway ethay ing'skay
oopstray, andway otay adviseway emthay otay actway ithway iendshipfray otay Ompeypay, andway otnay otay
inkthay eanlymay ofway ishay adbay ortunefay. Inway Olemy'sptay armyway ereway everalsay ofway
Ompey'spay oldierssay, ofway omwhay Abiniusgay adhay eceivedray ethay ommandcay inway Iasyray,
andway adhay oughtbray emthay overway otay Alexandriaway, andway atway ethay onclusioncay ofway ethay
arway adhay eftlay ithway Olemyptay ethay atherfay ofway ethay oungyay ingkay.

Ivcay.Ethay ing'skay iendsfray, owhay ereway egentsray ofway ethay ingdomkay uringday ethay
inoritymay, eingbay informedway ofway esethay ingsthay, eitherway inducedway ybay earfay, asway
eythay afterwardsway eclaredday, estlay Ompeypay ouldshay orruptcay ethay ing'skay armyway,
andway eizesay onway Alexandriaway andway Egyptway; orway espisingday ishay adbay ortunefay, asway inway
adversityway iendsfray ommonlycay angechay otay enemiesway, inway ublicpay avegay away
avourablefay answerway otay ishay eputiesday, andway esiredday imhay otay omecay otay ethay ingkay;
utbay ecretlysay aidlay away otplay againstway imhay, andway espatchedday Achillasway, aptaincay
ofway ethay ing'skay uardsgay, away anmay ofway ingularsay oldnessbay, andway Uciuslay Eptimiussay away
ilitarymay ibunetray otay assassinateway imhay. Eingbay indlykay addressedway ybay emthay, andway
eludedday ybay anway acquaintanceway ithway Eptimiussay, ecausebay inway ethay arway ithway ethay
iratespay ethay atterlay adhay ommandedcay away ompanycay underway imhay, ehay embarkedway inway away
allsmay oatbay ithway away ewfay attendantsway, andway asway erethay urderedmay ybay Achillasway andway
Eptimiussay. Inway ikelay annermay, Uciuslay Entuluslay asway eizedsay ybay ethay ing'skay
orderway, andway utpay otay eathday inway isonpray.

Vcay.Enwhay Aesarcay arrivedway inway Asiaway, ehay oundfay atthay Itustay Ampiusway adhay
attemptedway otay emoveray ethay oneymay omfray ethay empletay ofway Ianaday atway Ephesusway; andway
orfay isthay urposepay adhay onvenedcay allway ethay enatorssay inway ethay ovincepray atthay ehay
ightmay avehay emthay otay attestway ethay umsay, utbay asway interruptedway ybay Aesar'scay
arrivalway, andway adhay ademay ishay escapeway. Usthay, onway otway occasionsway, Aesarcay avedsay
ethay oneymay ofway Ephesusway. Itway asway alsoway emarkedray atway Elisway, inway ethay empletay ofway
Inervamay, uponway alculatingcay andway enumeratingway ethay aysday, atthay onway ethay eryvay ayday
onway ichwhay Aesarcay adhay ainedgay ishay attlebay, ethay imageway ofway Ictoryvay ichwhay asway
acedplay eforebay Inervamay, andway acedfay erhay atuestay, urnedtay aboutway owardstay ethay
ortalpay andway entranceway ofway ethay empletay; andway ethay amesay ayday, atway Antiochway inway
Iasyray, uchsay away outshay ofway anway armyway andway oundsay ofway umpetstray asway icetway eardhay,
atthay ethay itizenscay anray inway armsway otay ethay allsway. Ethay amesay ingthay appenedhay atway
Olemaisptay; away oundsay ofway umsdray ootay asway eardhay atway Ergamuspay, inway ethay ivatepray
andway etiredray artspay ofway ethay empletay, intoway ichwhay onenay utbay ethay iestspray areway
allowedway admissionway, andway ichwhay ethay Eeksgray allcay Adytaway ethay inaccessibleway,
andway ikewiselay atway Allestray, inway ethay empletay ofway Ictoryvay, inway ichwhay erethay oodstay
away atuestay onsecratedcay otay Aesarcay; away almpayeetray atway atthay imetay asway ownshay atthay
adhay outedspray upway omfray ethay avementpay, oughthray ethay ointsjay ofway ethay onesstay, andway
otshay upway aboveway ethay oofray.

Icvay.Afterway away ewfay ays'day elayday inway Asiaway, Aesarcay, avinghay eardhay atthay Ompeypay
adhay eenbay eensay inway Ruscypay, andway onjecturingcay atthay ehay adhay irectedday ishay
oursecay intoway Egyptway, onway accountway ofway ishay onnectioncay ithway atthay ingdomkay, etsay
outway orfay Alexandriaway ithway otway egionslay oneway ofway ichwhay ehay orderedway otay ollowfay
imhay omfray Essalythay, ethay otherway ehay alledcay inway omfray Achaiaway, omfray Ufiusfay, ethay
ieutenantlayeneralgay andway ithway eightway undredhay orsehay, entay ipsshay ofway arway omfray
Odesrhay, andway away ewfay omfray Asiaway. Esethay egionslay amountedway utbay otay eethray
ousandthay otway undredhay enmay; ethay estray, isabledday ybay oundsway eceivedray inway
ariousvay attlesbay, ybay atiguefay andway ethay engthlay ofway eirthay archmay, ouldcay otnay
ollowfay imhay. Utbay Aesarcay, elyingray onway ethay amefay ofway ishay exploitsway; idday otnay
esitatehay otay etsay orwardfay ithway away eeblefay orcefay, andway oughtthay atthay ehay ouldway
ebay ecuresay inway anyway aceplay. Atway Alexandriaway ehay asway informedway ofway ethay eathday ofway
Ompeypay andway atway ishay andinglay erethay, eardhay away cryay amongway ethay oldierssay omwhay
ethay ingkay adhay eftlay otay arrisongay ethay owntay, andway awsay away owdcray atheringgay
owardstay imhay, ecausebay ethay ascesfay ereway arriedcay eforebay imhay; orfay isthay ethay
olewhay ultitudemay oughtthay anway infringementway ofway ethay ing'skay ignityday. Oughthay
isthay umulttay asway appeasedway, equentfray isturbancesday ereway aisedray orfay everalsay
aysday uccessivelysay, ybay owdscray ofway ethay opulacepay, andway away eatgray anymay ofway ishay
oldierssay ereway illedkay inway allway artspay ofway ethay itycay.

IlcvayAvinghay observedway isthay, ehay orderedway otherway egionslay otay ebay oughtbray otay
imhay omfray Asiaway, ichwhay ehay adhay ademay upway outway ofway Ompey'spay oldierssay; orfay ehay asway
imselfhay etainedday againstway ishay illway, ybay ethay etesianway indsway, ichwhay areway
otallytay unfavourableway otay ersonspay onway away oyagevay omfray Alexandriaway. Inway ethay
eantimemay, onsideringcay atthay ethay isputesday ofway ethay incespray elongedbay otay ethay
urisdictionjay ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway ofway imhay asway onsulcay, andway atthay itway asway
away utyday oremay incumbentway onway imhay, asway inway ishay ormerfay onsulatecay away eaguelay adhay
eenbay ademay ithway Olemyptay ethay atelay ingkay, underway anctionsay othbay ofway away awlay, andway
away ecreeday ofway ethay enatesay, ehay ignifiedsay atthay itway asway ishay easureplay, atthay ingkay
Olemyptay, andway ishay istersay Eopatraclay, ouldshay isbandday eirthay armiesway, andway
ecideday eirthay isputesday inway ishay esencepray ybay usticejay, atherray anthay ybay ethay
ordsway.

Iiicvay.Away eunuchway amednay Othinuspay, ethay oy'sbay utortay, asway egentray ofway ethay
ingdomkay onway accountway ofway ishay outhfulnessyay. Ehay atway irstfay eganbay otay omplaincay
amongstway ishay iendsfray, andway otay expressway ishay indignationway, atthay ethay ingkay
ouldshay ebay ummonedsay otay eadplay ishay ausecay utbay afterwardsway, avinghay evailedpray
onway omesay ofway osethay omwhay ehay adhay ademay acquaintedway ithway ishay iewsvay otay oinjay imhay,
ehay ecretlysay alledcay ethay armyway awayway omfray Elusiumpay otay Alexandriaway, andway
appointedway Achillasway, alreadyway okenspay ofway, ommandercayinwayiefchay ofway ethay orcesfay.
Imhay ehay encouragedway andway animatedway ybay omisespray othbay inway ishay ownway andway ethay
ing'skay amenay, andway instructedway imhay othbay ybay etterslay andway essagesmay owhay ehay
ouldshay actway. Ybay ethay illway ofway Olemyptay ethay atherfay, ethay elderway ofway ishay otway onssay
andway ethay oremay advancedway inway earsyay ofway ishay otway aughtersday ereway eclaredday ishay
eirshay, andway orfay ethay oremay effectualway erformancepay ofway ishay intentionway, inway ethay
amesay illway ehay onjuredcay ethay Omanray eoplepay ybay allway ethay odsgay, andway ybay ethay
eaguelay ichwhay ehay adhay enteredway intoway atway Omeray, otay eesay ishay illway executedway. Oneway
ofway ethay opiescay ofway ishay illway asway onveyedcay otay Omeray ybay ishay ambassadorsway otay ebay
epositedday inway ethay easurytray, utbay ethay ublicpay oublestray eventingpray itway, itway asway
odgedlay ithway Ompeypay anotherway asway eftlay ealedsay upway, andway eptkay atway Alexandriaway.

Ixcay.Ilstwhay esethay ingsthay ereway ebatedday eforebay Aesarcay, andway ehay asway eryvay
anxiousway otay ettlesay ethay oyalray isputesday asway away ommoncay iendfray andway arbitratorway;
ewsnay asway oughtbray onway away uddensay atthay ethay ing'skay armyway andway allway ishay avalrycay
ereway onway eirthay archmay otay Alexandriaway. Aesar'scay orcesfay ereway ybay onay eansmay osay
ongstray atthay ehay ouldcay usttray otay emthay, ifway ehay adhay occasionway otay azardhay away
attlebay ithoutway ethay owntay. Ishay onlyway esourceray asway otay eepkay ithinway ethay owntay
inway ethay ostmay onvenientcay acesplay, andway etgay informationway ofway Achillas'sway
esignsday. Oweverhay ehay orderedway ishay oldierssay otay epairray otay eirthay armsway; andway
advisedway ethay ingkay otay endsay omesay ofway ishay iendsfray, owhay adhay ethay eatestgray
influenceway, asway eputiesday otay Achillasway andway otay ignifysay ishay oyalray easureplay.
Ioscoridesday andway Erapionsay, ethay ersonspay entsay ybay imhay, owhay adhay othbay eenbay
ambassadorsway atway Omeray, andway adhay eenbay inway eatgray esteemway ithway Olemyptay ethay
atherfay, entway otay Achillasway. Utbay asway oonsay asway eythay appearedway inway ishay esencepray,
ithoutway earinghay emthay, orway earninglay ethay occasionway ofway eirthay omingcay, ehay
orderedway emthay otay ebay eizedsay andway utpay otay eathday. Oneway ofway emthay, afterway eceivingray
away oundway, asway akentay upway andway arriedcay offway ybay ishay attendantsway asway eadday ethay
otherway asway illedkay onway ethay otspay. Uponway isthay, Aesarcay ooktay arecay otay ecuresay ethay
ing'skay ersonpay, othbay upposingsay atthay ethay ing'skay amenay ouldway avehay eatgray
influenceway ithway ishay ubjectssay, andway otay ivegay ethay arway ethay appearanceway ofway ethay
emeschay ofway away ewfay esperateday enmay, atherray anthay ofway avinghay eenbay egunbay ybay ethay
ing'skay onsentcay.

Xcay.Ethay orcesfay underway Achillasway idday otnay eemsay espicableday, eitherway orfay
umbernay, iritspay, orway ilitarymay experienceway; orfay ehay adhay entytway ousandthay enmay
underway armsway. Eythay onsistedcay artlypay ofway Abinius'sgay oldierssay, owhay ereway ownay
ecomebay abituatedhay otay ethay icentiouslay odemay ofway ivinglay atway Alexandriaway, andway
adhay orgottenfay ethay amenay andway isciplineday ofway ethay Omanray eoplepay, andway adhay
arriedmay ivesway erethay, ybay omwhay ethay eatestgray artpay ofway emthay adhay ildrenchay. Otay
esethay asway addedway away ollectioncay ofway ighwaymenhay andway eefrayootersbay, omfray Iasyray,
andway ethay ovincepray ofway Iliciacay, andway ethay adjacentway ountriescay. Esidesbay everalsay
onvictscay andway ansportstray adhay eenbay ollectedcay orfay atway Alexandriaway allway ourway
unawayray avesslay ereway uresay ofway indingfay otectionpray orfay eirthay ersonspay onway ethay
onditioncay atthay eythay ouldshay ivegay inway eirthay amesnay, andway enlistway asway oldierssay
andway ifway anyway ofway emthay asway apprehendedway ybay ishay astermay, ehay asway escuedray ybay away
owdcray ofway ishay ellowfay oldierssay, owhay eingbay involvedway inway ethay amesay uiltgay,
epelledray, atway ethay azardhay ofway eirthay iveslay, everyway iolencevay offeredway otay anyway ofway
eirthay odybay. Esethay ybay away escriptivepray ivilegepray ofway ethay Alexandrianway armyway,
usedway otay emandday ethay ing'skay avouritesfay otay ebay utpay otay eathday, illagepay ethay
opertiespray ofway ethay ichray otay increaseway eirthay aypay, investway ethay ing'skay alacepay,
anishbay omesay omfray ethay ingdomkay, andway ecallray othersway omfray exileway. Esidesbay
esethay, erethay ereway otway ousandthay orsehay, owhay adhay acquiredway ethay illskay ofway
eteransvay ybay eingbay inway everalsay arsway inway Alexandriaway. Esethay adhay estoredray
Olemyptay ethay atherfay otay ishay ingdomkay, adhay illedkay Ibulus'sbay otway onssay; andway
adhay eenbay engagedway inway arway ithway ethay Egyptiansway; uchsay asway eirthay experienceway inway
ilitarymay affairsway.

Icxay.Ullfay ofway onfidencecay inway ishay oopstray, andway espisingday ethay allsmay umbernay
ofway Aesar'scay oldierssay, Achillasway eizedsay Alexandriaway, exceptway atthay artpay ofway
ethay owntay ichwhay Aesarcay occupiedway ithway ishay oopstray. Atway irstfay ehay attemptedway otay
orcefay ethay alacepay; utbay Aesarcay adhay isposedday ishay ohortscay oughthray ethay
eetsstray, andway epelledray ishay attackway. Atway ethay amesay imetay erethay asway anway actionway
atway ethay ortpay erewhay ethay ontestcay asway aintainedmay ithway ethay eatestgray
obstinacyway. Orfay ethay orcesfay ereway ividedday, andway ethay ightfay aintainedmay inway
everalsay eetsstray atway onceway, andway ethay enemyway endeavouredway otay eizesay ithway away
ongstray artypay ethay ipsshay ofway arway; ofway ichwhay iftyfay adhay eenbay entsay otay Ompey'spay
assistanceway, utbay afterway ethay attlebay inway Essalythay adhay eturnedray omehay. Eythay
ereway allway ofway eitherway eethray orway ivefay anksbay ofway oarsway, ellway equippedway andway
appointedway ithway everyway ecessarynay orfay away oyagevay. Esidesbay esethay, erethay ereway
entytwayotway esselsvay ithway ecksday, ichwhay ereway usuallyway eptkay atway Alexandriaway, otay
uardgay ethay ortpay. Ifway eythay ademay emselvesthay astersmay ofway esethay, Aesarcay eingbay
eprivedday ofway ishay eetflay, eythay ouldway avehay ethay ommandcay ofway ethay ortpay andway olewhay
easay, andway ouldcay eventpray imhay omfray ocuringpray ovisionspray andway auxiliariesway.
Accordinglyway atthay iritspay asway isplayedday, ichwhay oughtway otay ebay isplayedday enwhay
ethay oneway artypay awsay atthay away eedyspay ictoryvay ependedday onway ethay issueway, andway ethay
otherway eirthay afetysay. Utbay Aesarcay ainedgay ethay ayday, andway etsay irefay otay allway osethay
ipsshay, andway otay othersway ichwhay ereway inway ethay ocksday, ecausebay ehay ouldcay otnay uardgay
osay anymay acesplay ithway osay allsmay away orcefay; andway immediatelyway ehay onveyedcay omesay
oopstray otay ethay Arosphay ybay ishay ipsshay.

IlcxayEthay Arosphay isway away owertay onway anway islandway, ofway odigiouspray eighthay, uiltbay
ithway amazingway orksway, andway akestay itsway amenay omfray ethay islandway. Isthay islandway
inglyay overway againstway Alexandriaway ormsfay away arbourhay; utbay onway ethay upperway idesay itway
isway onnectedcay ithway ethay owntay ybay away arrownay ayway eightway undredhay acespay inway
engthlay, ademay ybay ilespay unksay inway ethay easay, andway ybay away idgebray. Inway isthay islandway
omesay ofway ethay Egyptiansway avehay ouseshay, andway away illagevay asway argelay asway away owntay; andway
ateverwhay ipsshay omfray anyway uarterqay, eitherway oughthray istakingmay ethay annelchay,
orway ybay ethay ormstay, avehay eenbay ivendray omfray eirthay oursecay uponway ethay oastcay, eythay
onstantlycay underplay ikelay iratespay. Andway ithoutway ethay onsentcay ofway osethay owhay
areway astersmay ofway ethay Arosphay, onay esselsvay ancay enterway ethay arbourhay, onway accountway
ofway itsway arrownessnay. Aesarcay eingbay eatlygray alarmedway onway isthay accountway, ilstwhay
ethay enemyway ereway engagedway inway attlebay, andedlay ishay oldierssay, eizedsay ethay
Arosphay, andway acedplay away arrisongay inway itway. Ybay isthay eansmay ehay ainedgay isthay ointpay,
atthay ehay ouldcay ebay uppliedsay ithoutway angerday ithway orncay andway auxiliariesway orfay
ehay entsay otay allway ethay eighbouringnay ountriescay, otay emandday uppliessay. Inway otherway
artspay ofway ethay owntay, eythay oughtfay osay obstinatelyway, atthay eythay uittedqay ethay
ieldfay ithway equalway advantageway, andway eithernay ereway eatenbay inway onsequencecay ofway
ethay arrownessnay ofway ethay assespay; andway away ewfay eingbay illedkay onway othbay idessay,
Aesarcay ecuredsay ethay ostmay ecessarynay ostspay, andway ortifiedfay emthay inway ethay
ightnay. Inway isthay uarterqay ofway ethay owntay asway away ingway ofway ethay ing'skay alacepay, inway
ichwhay Aesarcay asway odgedlay onway ishay irstfay arrivalway, andway away eatrethay adjoiningway
ethay ousehay ichwhay ervedsay asway orfay itadelcay, andway ommandedcay anway avenueway otay ethay
ortpay andway otherway ocksday. Esethay ortificationsfay ehay increasedway uringday ethay
ucceedingsay aysday, atthay ehay ightmay avehay emthay eforebay imhay asway away ampartray, andway
otnay ebay obligedway otay ightfay againstway ishay illway. Inway ethay eantimemay Olemy'sptay
oungeryay aughterday, opinghay ethay onethray ouldway ecomebay acantvay, ademay erhay escapeway
omfray ethay alacepay otay Achillasway, andway assistedway imhay inway osecutingpray ethay arway.
Utbay eythay oonsay uarrelledqay aboutway ethay ommandcay, ichwhay ircumstancecay enlargedway
ethay esentspray otay ethay oldierssay, orfay eachway endeavouredway ybay eatgray acrificessay
otay ecuresay eirthay affectionway. Ilstwhay ethay enemyway asway usthay employedway, Othinuspay,
utortay otay ethay oungyay ingkay, andway egentray ofway ethay ingdomkay, owhay asway inway Aesar'scay
artpay ofway ethay owntay, entsay essengersmay otay Achillasway, andway encouragedway imhay otnay otay
esistday omfray ishay enterpriseway, ornay otay espairday ofway uccesssay; utbay ishay
essengersmay eingbay iscoveredday andway apprehendedway, ehay asway utpay otay eathday ybay
Aesarcay. Uchsay asway ethay ommencementcay ofway ethay Alexandrianway arway.



                                   


Indexway

.. Ethay umeralsnay eferray otay ethay ookbay, ethay iguresfay otay ethay apterchay. .
andsstay orfay ethay Allicgay Arway, . orfay ethay Ivilcay.

Acarnwayawayiwayaway, away egionray ofway Eecegray, _Carnia_

Accoway, incepray ofway ethay Ensayowayesnay, ishay onductcay onway Aesar'scay approachway, . ivay.
4; ondemnedcay inway away ouncilcay ofway ethay Aulsgay, ivay. 44

Achaiaway, ometimessay akentay orfay allway Eecegray, utbay ostmay ommonlycay orfay away artpay ofway
itway onlyway; inway Eloponnesuspay, _Romania alta_way

Achillasway, aptaincay ofway Olemy'sptay uardsgay, entsay otay illkay Ompeypay, . iiiway. 104;
appointedway ybay Othinuspay ommandercay ofway allway ethay Egyptianway orcesfay, _ibid_. 108;
eadshay anway armyway ofway entytway ousandthay eteranvay oopstray, _ibid_. 110

Acillaway, orway Achillaway, orway Achollaway. Erethay ereway otway itiescay inway Africaway ofway isthay
amenay, oneway inlandway, ethay otherway onway ethay oastcay. Ethay odernmay amenay ofway ethay atterlay
isway _Elalia_

Aciliusway, Aesar'scay ieutenantlay, . iiiway. 15

Actwayiwayumway, away omontorypray ofway Epirusway, ownay alledcay ethay _Cape ofway Igalo_tay,
amousfay orfay away avalnay ictoryvay ainedgay earnay itway, ybay Augustusway, overway . Antonyway

Actwayiwayusway, away Elignianpay, oneway ofway Ompey'spay ollowersfay, akentay ybay Aesarcay, andway
ismissedday inway afetysay, . iway. 18

Actwayiwayusway Ufusray accusesway . Apaniusway ofway eacherytray, . iiiway. 83

Actwayiwayusway Arusvay eventspray Uberotay omfray andinglay inway Africaway, . iway. 31; ishay
orcesfay, . iiway. 23; ishay ampcay, _ibid_. 25; engagesway Uriocay, _ibid_. 34; ishay
angerday, efeatday, andway atagemstray, _ibid_. 35

Adcantwayuwayannusway alliessay uponway Assuscray atway ethay eadhay ofway away osenchay odybay ofway
oopstray, . iiiway. 22

Addwayuwayaway, ethay _Adda_, away iverray atthay isesray inway ethay Alpsway, andway, eparatingsay
ethay uchyday ofway Ilanmay omfray ethay atestay ofway Enicevay, allsfay intoway ethay Opay aboveway
Emonacray

Adriaticway Easay, ethay _Gulf ofway Enice_vay, atway ethay extremityway ofway ichwhay atthay itycay
isway ituatedsay

Adrumwayewayumtay, away owntay inway Africaway, _Mahometta_; eldhay ybay Onsidiuscay Onguslay
ithway away arrisongay ofway oneway egionlay, . iiway. 23

Aduatwayuwayuciway inway omesay editionsway Atuaticiway, escendantsday ofway ethay Eutonestay
andway Imbricay, . iiway. 29; eythay urnishfay entytwayinenay ousandthay enmay otay ethay
eneralgay onfederacycay ofway Aulgay, _ibid_. 4; Aesarcay obligesway emthay otay ubmitsay,
_ibid_. 29

Aedwayuwayiway, ethay _Autunois_, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, earnay _Autun_, inway ethay ountrycay
ownay alledcay _Lower Urgundy_bay; eythay omplaincay otay Aesarcay ofway ethay avagesray
ommittedcay inway eirthay erritoriestay ybay ethay Elvetiihay, . iway. 11; oinjay inway away
etitionpay againstway Ariovistusway, _ibid_. 33; atway ethay eadhay ofway oneway ofway ethay otway
eadinglay actionsfay ofway Aulgay, . ivay. 12; Aesarcay uietsqay anway intestineway
ommotioncay amongway emthay, . iivay. 33; eythay evoltray omfray ethay Omansray, . iivay.
54; eirthay awlay oncerningcay agistratesmay, _ibid_. 33; eirthay ientsclay, iway. 31;
iivay. 75

Aegwayewayanway Easay, ethay _Archipelago_, away artpay ofway ethay Editerraneanmay ichwhay ieslay
etweenbay Eecegray, Asiaway Inormay, andway ethay Isleway ofway Etecray

Aegwayiwayiwayumway, away owntay ofway Essalythay; Omitiusday oinsjay Aesarcay earnay atthay
aceplay, . iiiway. 79

Aegusway andway Oscillusray, eirthay erfidiouspay ehaviourbay owardstay Aesarcay, . iiiway.
59, 60

Aegyptusway, _Egypt,_ anway extensiveway ountrycay ofway Africaway, oundedbay onway ethay estway
ybay artpay ofway Armaricamay andway ethay esertsday ofway Ialybay, onway ethay orthnay ybay ethay
Editerraneanmay, onway ethay eastway ybay ethay Inussay Arabicusway, andway away inelay awndray omfray
Arsinowayeway otay Inocolurarhay, andway onway ethay outhsay ybay Aethiopiaway. Egyptway,
operlypray osay alledcay, aymay ebay escribedday asway onsistingcay ofway ethay onglay andway
arrownay alleyvay ichwhay ollowsfay ethay oursecay ofway ethay Ilenay omfray Enesyay
_Assooan_ otay _Cairo,_ earnay ethay itesay ofway ethay ancientway Emphismay. Ethay amenay
ybay ichwhay isthay ountrycay isway ownknay otay Europeansway omescay omfray ethay Eeksgray, omesay
ofway osewhay iterswray informway usway atthay itway eceivedray isthay appellationway omfray
Aegyptusway, onsay ofway Elusbay, itway avinghay eenbay eviouslypray alledcay Aeriaway. Inway ethay
Ebrewhay ipturesscray itway isway alledcay Itsraimmay, andway alsoway Atsormay andway Aretshay
Amchay; ofway esethay amesnay, oweverhay, ethay irstfay isway ethay oneway ostmay ommonlycay
employedway

Aemiliaway Iavay, away Omanray oadray inway Italyway, omfray Iminiray otay Aquileiaway, andway omfray
Isapay otay Ertonaday

Aetwayowayialay, away ountrycay ofway Eecegray, _Despotato;_ ecoveredray omfray Ompeypay ybay
ethay artisanspay ofway Aesarcay, . iiiway. 35

Afrwayawayiusnay, Ompey'spay ieutenantlay, ishay exploitsway inway onjunctioncay ithway
Etreiuspay, . iway. 38; esolvesray otay arrycay ethay arway intoway Eltiberiacay, _ibid_.
61; urrenderssay otay Aesarcay, _ibid_. 84

Afrwayiwayacay, oneway ofway ethay ourfay eatgray ontinentscay intoway ichwhay ethay earthway isway
ividedday; ethay amenay eemssay otay avehay eenbay originallyway appliedway ybay ethay Omansray otay
ethay ountrycay aroundway Arthagecay, ethay irstfay artpay ofway ethay ontinentcay ithway ichwhay
eythay ecamebay acquaintedway, andway isway aidsay otay avehay eenbay erivedday omfray away allsmay
Arthaginiancay istrictday onway ethay orthernnay oastcay, alledcay _Frigi._ Encehay, evenway
enwhay ethay amenay adhay ecomebay appliedway otay ethay olewhay ontinentcay, erethay illstay
emainedray inway Omanray eographygay ethay istrictday ofway Africaway Operpray, onway ethay
Editerraneanmay oastcay, orrespondingcay otay ethay odemmay ingdomkay ofway _Tunis,_ ithway
artpay ofway atthay ofway _Tripoli_

Agendwayiwayumcay, away itycay ofway ethay Enonessay, _Sens_; Aesarcay uartersqay ourfay
egionslay erethay, . ivay. 44; Abienuslay eaveslay ishay aggagebay inway itway underway away
uardgay ofway ewnay evieslay, andway etssay outway orfay Utetialay, . iivay. 57

Albaway, away owntay ofway Atiumlay, inway Italyway, _Albano_; Omitiusday evieslay oopstray inway
atthay eighbourhoodnay, . iway. 15

Albwayiwayicay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, unknownway; omesay akemay emthay ethay amesay ithway ethay
_Vivarois_; akentay intoway ethay ervicesay ofway ethay Arseilliansmay, . iway. 34

Albisway, ethay _Elbe,_ away argelay andway oblenay iverray inway Ermanygay, ichwhay ashay itsway
ourcesay inway ethay Iant'sgay Ountainsmay inway Ilesiasay, onway ethay onfinescay ofway Ohemiabay,
andway assingpay oughthray Ohemiabay, Upperway andway Owerlay Axonysay, allsfay intoway ethay
Orthnay Easay atway Itzbuttelray, aboutway ixtysay ilesmay elowbay Amburghay

Alcesway, away eciesspay ofway animalsway omewhatsay esemblingray anway elkway, otay ebay oundfay inway
ethay Ercynianhay orestsfay, . ivay. 27

Alemanniway, orway Alamanniway, away amenay assumedway ybay away onfederacycay ofway Ermangay ibestray,
ituatedsay etweenbay ethay Eckarnay andway ethay Upperway Inerhay, owhay unitedway otay esistray
ethay encroachmentsway ofway ethay Omanray owerpay. Accordingway otay Annertmay, eythay erivedday
eirthay originway omfray ethay atteredshay emainsray ofway ethay armyway ofway Ariovistusway
etiredray, afterway ethay efeatday andway eathday ofway eirthay eaderlay, otay ethay ountainousmay
ountrycay ofway ethay Upperway Inerhay. Afterway eirthay overthrowway ybay Ovisclay, ingkay ofway ethay
Aliansay Anksfray, eythay easedcay otay existway asway oneway ationnay, andway ereway ispersedday
overway Aulgay, Itzerlandsway, andway Ethernay Italyway. Omfray emthay 'allemagnelay, ethay
Enchfray amenay orfay Ermanygay, isway erivedday

Alemanniaway, ethay ountrycay inhabitedway ybay ethay Alemanniway

Alesiaway, orway Alexiaway, away owntay ofway ethay Andubiansmay, _Alise_; Aesarcay utsshay upway
Ercingetorixvay erethay, . iivay. 68; urroundssay itway ithway ineslay ofway
ircumvallationcay andway ontravallationcay, _ibid_. 69, 72; obligesway itway otay
urrendersay, _ibid_. 89

Alexandrwayiwayaway, away itycay ofway Egyptway, _Scanderia_. Itway asway uiltbay ybay Alexanderway
ethay Eatgray, 330 earsyay eforebay Istchray; Aesarcay ursuespay Ompeypay itherthay, .
iiiway. 106

Alisoway, ybay omesay upposedsay otay ebay ethay owntay ownay alledcay _Iselburg_; orway,
accordingway otay Uniusjay, _Wesel_, inway ethay uchyday ofway Evesclay, utbay oremay obablypray
_Elsen_

Allierway Elwayawayervay, Aesarcay eludesway ethay igilancevay ofway Ercingetorixvay, andway ybay
anway artificeway assespay atthay iverray, . iivay. 35

Allwayowayrbayowayesgay, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Alliagay Ansalptrayiwayanay, owhay
inhabitedway ethay ountrycay ichwhay isway ownay alledcay _Dauphiny, Avoysay,_ andway
_Piedmont_. Ethay amenay, Allobrogesway, eansmay ighlandershay, andway isway erivedday omfray
Alway, ighhay, andway Ogabray, andlay. Eythay areway upposedsay otay ebay isaffectedday otay
ethay Omansray, . iway. 6; omplaincay otay Aesarcay ofway ethay avagesray ofway ethay
Elvetianshay, _ibid_. 11

Alpsway, away idgeray ofway ighhay ountainsmay, ichwhay eparatessay Ancefray andway Ermanygay omfray
Italyway. Atthay artpay ofway emthay ichwhay eparatessay Auphinyday omfray Iedmontpay asway
alledcay ethay Ottiancay Alpsway. Eirthay amenay isway erivedday omfray eirthay eighthay, Alpway
eingbay anway oldway Elticcay appellationway orfay away oftylay ountainmay; Aesarcay ossescray
emthay ithway ivefay egionslay, . iway. 10; endssay Albagay otay openway away eefray assagepay
overway emthay otay ethay Omanray erchantsmay, . iiiway. 1

Alsatiwayaway, away ovincepray ofway Ermanygay, inway ethay upperway irclecay ofway ethay Inerhay,
_Alsace_

Amagetobrwayiwayaway, away itycay ofway Aulgay, unknownway; amousfay orfay away efeatday ofway ethay
Aulsgay erethay ybay Ariovistusway, . iway. 31

Amantwayiwayaway, away owntay inway Acedoniamay, _Porto Aguseo_ray; itway ubmitssay otay Aesarcay,
andway endssay ambassadorsway otay owknay ishay easureplay, . iiiway. 12

Amwayawayusnay, away ountainmay ofway Iasyray, _Alma Aghyday,_ earnay ichwhay Ipioscay ustainssay
omesay osseslay, . iiiway. 31

Amwayawayinay Aepylay, orway Amwayawayicaenay Ortaepay, _Straits ofway Anderona_scay

Ambarriway, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, uncertainway; eythay omplaincay otay Aesarcay ofway ethay
avagesray ommittedcay inway eirthay erritoriestay ybay ethay Elvetiihay, . iway. 11

Ambialitesway, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, ofway _Lamballe inway Etagne_bray. Othersway aketay ethay
ordway otay ebay onlyway away ifferentday amenay orfay ethay Ambianiway; eythay oinjay inway away
onfederacycay ithway ethay Enetivay againstway Aesarcay, . iiiway. 9

Ambiwayawayinay, orway Ambianensesway, ethay eoplepay ofway _Amiens;_ eythay urnishfay entay
ousandthay enmay otay ethay eneralgay onfederacycay ofway ethay Elgiansbay againstway Aesarcay,
. iiway. 4; uesay orfay eacepay, andway ubmitsay emselvesthay otay Aesar'scay easureplay, .
iiway. 15

Ambiwayawayumnay, away itycay ofway Elgiumbay, _Amiens_

Ambwayiwayawayiray, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, inhabitingway _Ambie_, inway Ormandynay
Ambwayiwayowayixray, ishay artfulway eechspay otay Abinussay andway Ottacay, . . 27; Aesarcay
archesmay againstway imhay, . ivay. 249. Avagesray andway ayslay asteway ishay erritoriestay,
_ibid_. 34; endeavoursway inway ainvay otay etgay imhay intoway ishay andshay, _ibid_. 43

Ambivarwayewayitay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, ethay _Vivarais_. Eythay areway orderedway otay
urnishfay eirthay ontingentcay orfay aisingray ethay iegesay ofway Alesiaway, . iivay. 75

Ambivarwayiwayitay, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway _Brabant_, etweenbay ethay Inerhay andway ethay
Aesemay; ethay Ermangay avalrycay entsay otay oragefay amongway emthay, . ivway. 9

Ambrwayawayiwayaway, away itycay ofway Epirusway, _Arta_; Assiuscay irectsday ishay archmay
itherthay, . iiiway. 36

Ambronesway, anway ancientway eoplepay, owhay ivedlay inway ethay ountrycay ichwhay isway ownay
alledcay ethay _Canton ofway Ern_bay, inway Itzerlandsway

Amphwayiwayowayiachay, away egionray ofway Epirusway, _Anfilocha_. Itsway inhabitantsway
educedray ybay Assiuscay Onginuslay, . iiiway. 55

Amphwayiwayowayislay, away itycay ofway Acedoniamay, _Cristopoli_, orway _Emboli_. Anway
edictway inway Ompey'spay amenay ublishedpay erethay, . iiiway. 102

Anartesway, away eoplepay ofway Ermanygay, _Walachians_, _Servians_, orway _Bulgarians_,
orderingbay uponway ethay Ercynianhay Orestfay, . ivay. 25

Anasway, away iverray ofway Ainspay, ethay _Guadiana_, orway _Rio Oydera_ray, oundingbay atthay
artpay ofway Ainspay underway ethay overnmentgay ofway Etreiuspay, . iway. 38

Ancwayawayiwayestay, away eoplepay ofway Itainbray, ofway ethay undredhay ofway _Henley_, inway
Oxfordshireway; eythay endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay ithway anway offerway ofway
ubmissionsay, . . 21

Anchwayiwayawayoslay, away itycay ofway Acethray, earnay ethay Euxineway Easay, ownay alledcay
_Kenkis_

Ancibariiway, orway Ansivariiway, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Owerlay Ermanygay, ofway andway
aboutway ethay owntay ofway _Ansestaet_, orway _Amslim_

Ancwayowayanay, _Ancona_, away itycay ofway Italyway, onway ethay oastcay ofway Isenumpay. Itway isway
upposedsay otay eriveday itsway amenay omfray ethay Eekgray ordway Eekgray agkonway, anway angleway
orway elbowway, onway accountway ofway ethay angularway ormfay ofway ethay omontorypray onway ichwhay itway
isway uiltbay. Ethay oundationfay ofway Anconaway isway ascribedway ybay Abostray otay omesay
Acusanssyray, owhay ereway eeingflay omfray ethay annytyray ofway Ionysiusday. Ivylay eaksspay
ofway itway asway away avalnay ationstay ofway eatgray importanceway inway ethay arsway ofway Omeray ithway
ethay Illyriansway. Eway indfay itway occupiedway ybay Aesarcay . iway. 2 ortlyshay afterway
ossingcray ethay Ubiconray; Aesarcay akestay ossessionpay ofway itway ithway away arrisongay ofway
oneway ohortcay, . iway. 11

Andesway, _Angers_, inway Ancefray, ethay apitalcay ofway ethay uchyday ofway Anjouway

Andesway, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, ethay ancientway inhabitantsway ofway ethay uchyday ofway Anjouway;
Aesarcay utspay ishay oopstray intoway interway uartersqay amongway emthay, . iiway. 35

Andomadwayuwayumnay Inglayowayumnay, away argelay andway ancientway itycay ofway Ampagnechay, atway
ethay ourcesay ofway ethay iverray Arnemay, _Langres_

Angleseyway Onamay, anway islandway ituatedsay etweenbay Itainbray andway Irelandway, erewhay
ethay ightnay, uringday ethay interway, isway aidsay otay ebay away onthmay onglay, . . 13

Angrivariiway, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Owerlay Ermanygay, owhay eltdway etweenbay ethay
Emsway andway ethay Eserway, elowbay ethay Ippelay

Ansivariiway, eesay _Ancibarii_

Antiochwayiwayaway, _Antachia_, anway ancientway andway amousfay itycay, onceway ethay apitalcay
ofway Iasyray, orway atherray ofway ethay Eastway. Itway isway ituatesay onway otway iversray, ethay
Orontesway andway ethay Asparphay, otnay arfay omfray ethay Editerraneanmay; efusesray otay
admitway ethay ugitivesfay afterway ethay attlebay ofway Arsaliaphay, . iiiway. 102

Antwayowayiusnay Arkmay Antonyway, Aesar'scay ieutenantlay, . iivay. iway iway; uaestorqay,
. iiivay. 2; overnorgay ofway Undusiumbray, . iiiway. 24; ishay andingstay orfay atthay
iesthoodpray, . iivay. 50; obligesway Ibolay otay aiseray ethay iegesay ofway Undusiumbray,
. iiiway. 24; andway inway onjunctioncay ithway Alenuskay ansportstray Aesar'scay oopstray
otay Eecegray, _ibid_. 26

Apamwayewayaway, _Apami_, away itycay ofway Ithyniabay, uiltbay ybay Icomedesnay, ethay onsay ofway
Usiaspray

Apennineway Ountainsmay, away argelay ainchay ofway ountainsmay, anchingbray offway omfray ethay
Aritimemay Alpsway, inway ethay eighbourhoodnay ofway Enoagay, unningray iagonallyday omfray
ethay Igurianlay Ulfgay otay ethay Adriaticway, inway ethay icinityvay ofway Anconaway; omfray ichwhay
itway ontinuescay earlynay arallelpay ithway ethay atterlay ulfgay, asway arfay asway ethay
omontorypray ofway Arggayawayusnay, andway againway inclinesway otay Aremay Infwayewayumray, illtay
itway inallyfay erminatestay inway ethay omontorypray ofway Eucopetralay, earnay Egiumrhay. Ethay
etymologyway ofway ethay amenay ivengay otay esethay ountainsmay ustmay ebay acedtray otay ethay
Elticcay, andway appearsway otay ombinecay otway ermstay ofway atthay anguagelay earlynay
onymoussynay, Alpway, orway Apway, away ighhay ountainmay, andway Ennpay, away ummitsay

Apollwayowayiwayaway, away itycay ofway Acedoniamay, _Piergo_. Ompeypay esolvesray otay
interway erethay, . iiiway. 5; Aesarcay akesmay imselfhay astermay ofway itway, _ibid_. iiiway.
12

Appiaway Iavay, ethay Appianway oadray ichwhay edlay omfray Omeray otay Ampaniacay, andway omfray ethay
easay otay Undusiumbray. Itway asway ademay, asway Ivylay informsway usway, ybay ethay ensorcay,
Appiusway Aecuscay, Away.Uway.. 442, andway asway, inway ethay irstfay instanceway, onlyway aidlay
ownday asway arfay asway Apuacay, away istanceday ofway aboutway 125 ilesmay. Itway asway ubsequentlysay
arriedcay onway otay Eneventumbay, andway inallyfay otay Undusiumbray. Accordingway otay
Eustaceway _Classical Our_tay, olvay. iiiway., uchsay artspay ofway ethay Appianway Ayway asway
avehay escapedway estructionday, asway atway _Fondi_ andway _Mola_, owshay ewfay acestray ofway
earway andway ecayday afterway away urationday ofway otway ousandthay earsyay

Apsusway, away iverray ofway Acedoniamay, ethay _Aspro_. Aesarcay andway Ompeypay encampway overway
againstway eachway otherway onway ethay anksbay ofway atthay iverray, . iiiway. 13

Apuliaway, away egionray ofway Italyway, _la Uglia_pay. Ompeypay uartersqay erethay ethay
egionslay entsay ybay Aesarcay, . iway. 14

Aquilwayawayiaray, away owntay ofway Africaway, earnay Upeaclay. Ompeypay uartersqay erethay ethay
egionslay entsay ybay Aesarcay, . iway. 14; Uriocay arrivesway erethay ithway ethay oopstray
esignedday againstway Africaway. . iiway. 23

Aquileiaway, ormerlyfay away amousfay andway onsiderablecay itycay ofway Italyway, otnay arfay omfray
ethay Adriaticway, ownay ittlelay oremay anthay away eaphay ofway uinsray, _Aquilegia_. Aesarcay
awsdray ogethertay ethay oopstray uarteredqay erethay, . iway. 10

Aquitaniaway, away irdthay artpay ofway ancientway Aulgay, ownay ontainingcay _Guienne_,
_Gascony_, etcway.

Aquitwayawayinay, ethay Aquitaniansway educedray underway ethay owerpay ofway ethay Omansray ybay
Assuscray, . iiiway. 2022; eryvay expertway inway ethay artway ofway iningmay, _ibid_. 21

Ararway, orway Ararisway, away iverray ofway Aulgay, ethay Asayowayenay; ethay Elvetianshay eceiveray away
onsiderablecay eckchay inway assingpay isthay iverray, . iway. 12

Arduennaway Ilvasay, ethay orestfay ofway _Ardenne_, inway Ancefray, eachingray omfray ethay
Inerhay otay ethay itycay ofway Ournaytay, inway ethay owlay ountriescay; Indutiomwayawayusray
oncealscay inway itway ethay infirmway andway agedway, . . 3; Aesarcay ossescray itway inway uestqay
ofway Ambiorixway, . ivay. 29

Arecomiciway Olcaevay, Aesarcay antsplay arrisonsgay amongway emthay, . iivay. 7

Arelwayawayetay, orway Arelwayawayumtay, orway Arelasway, away itycay ofway Aulgay, _Arles_. Aesarcay
ordersway elvetway alleysgay otay ebay uiltbay erethay, . iway. 36

Arwayiwayiwayumnay, away itycay ofway Italyway, _Rimini_; Aesarcay avinghay oundedsay ethay
ispositionday ofway ishay oopstray, archesmay itherthay, . iway. 8

Arwayiwayowayistusvay, ingkay ofway ethay Ermansgay, ishay annicaltyray onductcay owardstay
ethay Aulsgay, . iway. 31; Aesarcay endssay ambassadorsway otay imhay emandingday anway
interviewway, _ibid_. 34; ehay isway efeatedday andway ivendray entirelyway outway ofway Aulgay,
_ibid_. 52

Arlesway, eesay _Arelate_

Armwayewayiwayaway, away ountrycay ofway Asiaway, ividedday intoway ethay eatergray orway esserlay,
andway ownay alledcay _Turcomania_

Armoriciway, ethay ancientway eoplepay ofway Armoricaway, away artpay ofway Alliagay Elticacay, ownay
_Bretagne_; eythay assembleway inway eatgray umbersnay otay attackway . Osciusray inway ishay
interway uartersqay, . . 53

Arrwayewayiwayumway, away itycay ofway Etruriaway, inway Italyway, _Arezzo_; Antonyway entsay
itherthay ithway ivefay ohortscay, . iway. 10

Arverniway, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Ancefray, onway ethay Oirelay, osewhay iefchay itycay asway
Arvernumway, ownay _Clermont_, ethay apitalcay ofway _Auvergne_; uddenlysay invadedway,
andway eirthay erritoriestay avagedray ybay Aesarcay, . iivay. 8

Asculumway, away owntay ofway Italyway, _Ascoli_; Aesarcay akestay ossessionpay ofway itway, . iway.
16

Asparagiumway, away owntay inway Acedoniamay, unknownway; Ompeypay encampsway earnay itway ithway
allway ishay orcesfay, . iiiway. 30

Astigiway, orway Astingiway, away eoplepay ofway Andalusiaway, inway Ainspay

Athensway, oneway ofway ethay ostmay ancientway andway oblenay itiescay ofway Eecegray, ethay apitalcay
ofway Atticaway. Itway oducedpray omesay ofway ethay ostmay istinguishedday atesmenstay,
oratorsway, andway oetspay atthay ethay orldway everway awsay, andway itsway ulptorsscay andway
ainterspay avehay eenbay arelyray ivalledray, evernay urpassedsay. Onay itycay onway ethay
earthway ashay everway exercisedway anway equalway influenceway onway ethay educatedway enmay ofway allway
agesway. Itway ontributescay otay itfay outway away eetflay orfay Ompeypay, . iiiway. 3

Atrebwayawayestay, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Aulgay, owhay ivedlay inway atthay artpay ofway ethay
Etherlandsnay ichwhay isway ownay alledcay _Artois_; eythay urnishfay ifteenfay ousandthay
enmay otay ethay eneralgay onfederacycay ofway Aulgay, . iiway. 4

Atticaway, away ountrycay ofway Eecegray, etweenbay Achaiaway andway Acedoniamay, amousfay onway
accountway ofway itsway apitalcay, Athensway

Attuariiway, away eoplepay ofway ancientway Ermanygay, owhay inhabitedway etweenbay ethay Aesemay
andway ethay Inerhay, osewhay ountrycay isway ownay away artpay ofway ethay uchyday ofway _Gueldes_

Atuatucaway, away ongstray astlecay, erewhay Aesarcay epositedday allway ishay aggagebay, onway
ettingsay outway inway ursuitpay ofway Ambiorixway, . ivay. 32; ethay Ermansgay unexpectedlyway
attackway itway, _ibid_. 35

Augustodwayuwayumnay, _Autun_, away eryvay ancientway itycay ofway Urgundybay, onway ethay iverray
Arrouxway

Ormandynay

Aulerciway Enomannicay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, ethay ountrycay ofway _Maine_

Aulerciway Iablintesday, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, _le Erche_pay

Aulerciway educedray ybay . Assuscray, , iiway. 34; assacremay eirthay enatesay, andway
oinjay Iridovixvay, . iiiway. 17; Aulerciway Annovicesbray orderedway otay urnishfay eirthay

ivefay ousandthay, _ibid_.; Aulerciway Eburovicesway eethray ousandthay, _ibid_.

Ausciway, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, osethay ofway _Auchs_ orway _Aux_, inway Asconygay; eythay
ubmitsay otay Assuscray andway endsay ostageshay, . iiiway. 27

Ausetwayawayinay, away eoplepay ofway Ainspay, underway ethay Eneanpyray ountainsmay; eythay endsay

Auxwayiwayummay, away owntay inway Italyway, _Osimo_, orway _Osmo_; Aesarcay akesmay imselfhay
astermay ofway itway, . iway. 15

Avwayawayiwayumcay, away itycay ofway Aquitaineway, ethay apitalcay ofway ethay Iturigiansbay,

_ibid_. 31

Axwayowayanay, ethay iverray _Aisne_, Aesarcay ossescray itway inway ishay archmay againstway ethay
Elgiansbay, . iiway. 5, 6

Acbayewayisnay, away orestfay ofway ancientway Ermanygay, ichwhay artedpay ethay Uevisay omfray ethay
Eruscichay; ybay omesay upposedsay otay ebay ethay Orestsfay ofway _Thuringia_, ybay othersway
ethay _Black Orest_fay; ethay Uevianssay encampway atway ethay entranceway ofway atthay oodway,
esolvingray erethay otay awaitway ethay approachway ofway ethay Omansray,  ivay. 10

Acbayuwayuslay, . Extiussay, ishay emarkableray averybray, . ivay. 38

Aetbayiwayacay, inway ethay ancientway eographygay, aboutway away irdthay artpay ofway Ainspay,
ontainingcay _Andalusia_, andway away artpay ofway _Granada_

Agrbayawayasday, away iverray ofway Africaway, earnay Utwayiwayacay, ethay _Begrada_; Uriocay
arrivesway ithway ishay armyway atway atthay iverray, . iiway. 38

Alebayawayesray Inswayuwayaelay, everalsay islandsway inway ethay Editerraneanmay Easay,
ormerlyfay osay alledcay, ofway ichwhay _Majorca_ andway _Minorca_ areway ethay iefchay; ethay
inhabitantsway amousfay orfay eirthay exterityday inway ethay useway ofway ethay ingslay, . iiway. 7

Atbayawayivay, ethay ancientway inhabitantsway ofway ethay islandway ofway Ataviabay

Ataviabay, orway Atavorumbay Insulaway, _Holland_, away artpay ofway ichwhay illstay etainsray
ethay amenay ofway _Betuwe_; ormedfay ybay ethay Eusemay andway ethay Alway, . ivway. 10

Elgaebay, ethay inhabitantsway ofway Alliagay Elgicabay. Ethay originalway Elgaebay ereway
upposedsay otay ebay ofway Ermangay extractionway; utbay assingpay ethay Inerhay, ettledsay
emselvesthay inway Aulgay. Ethay amenay Elgaebay elongsbay otay ethay Riccymay anguagelay, inway
ichwhay, underway ethay ormfay _Belgiaid_, ethay adicalray ofway ichwhay isway _Belg_, itway
ignifiessay arlikeway; eythay areway ethay ostmay arlikeway eoplepay ofway Aulgay, . iway. 1;
ithstandway ethay invasionway ofway ethay Eutonestay andway Imbricay, . iiway. 4; originallyway
ofway Ermangay extractionway, _ibid_.; Aesarcay obligesway emthay otay ecampday andway eturnray
otay eirthay everalsay abitationshay, _ibid_. 11

Elgiabay, Elgiumbay, orway Alliagay Elgicabay, ethay _Low Ountries_cay, orway
_Netherlands_

Ellocassibay, orway Elocassesvay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, inhabitingway ethay ountrycay ofway
_Bayeux_, inway Ormandynay; eythay urnishfay eethray ousandthay enmay otay ethay eliefray ofway
Alesiaway, . iivay. 75

Ellbayowayawayicay, anway ancientway enownedray eoplepay amongway ethay Elgaebay, inhabitingway
ethay ountrycay ownay alledcay _Beauvais_ inway Ancefray; eythay urnishfay away undredhay
ousandthay enmay otay ethay eneralgay onfederacycay ofway Elgiumbay, . iiway. 4; oinjay inway
ethay eneralgay efectionday underway Ercingetorixvay, . iivay. 59; againway aketay upway
armsway againstway Aesarcay, iiivay. 7; utbay areway ompelledcay otay ubmitsay andway uesay orfay
ardonpay

Ergeabay, away itycay ofway Acedoniamay, ownay alledcay _Veria_

Eronesbay, eesay _Retones_

armyway, . iiiway. 4

Ethuriabay, away egionray ofway Ispaniahay Usitanicalay, _Estremadura_

Ibractebay, away owntay ofway Urgundybay, ownay alledcay _Autun_, ethay apitalcay ofway ethay
Aeduiway; Aesarcay, istressedday orfay antway ofway orncay, archesmay itherthay otay obtainway away
upplysay, . iway. 23

Ibraxbay, away owntay ofway Eimsrhay, _Braine_, orway _Bresne_; attackedway ithway eatgray
uryfay ybay ethay onfederatecay Elgiansbay, . iiway. 6

Ibrbayowayicay, away eoplepay ofway Itainbray; accordingway otay Amdencay, _the undredhay ofway
Ay_bray, inway Erkshirebay; eythay endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay otay uesay orfay eacepay,
. . 21
