Aesarcay, _ibid_. 8, 16; ishay ueltycray owardstay ethay isonerspray atthay ellfay intoway
ishay andshay, _ibid_. 14; ishay eathday, _ibid_. 18; eathday ofway ishay otway onssay,
_ibid_. 110

Igerrionesbay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, inhabitingway ethay ountrycay ownay alledcay
_Bigorre,_ inway Asconygay; eythay urrendersay andway ivegay ostageshay otay Assuscray, .
iiiway. 27

Ithyniabay, away ountrycay ofway Asiaway Inormay, adjoiningway otay Oastray, overway againstway
Acethray, _Becsangial_

Itbayuwayiwayesgay, away eoplepay ofway Uiennegay, inway Ancefray, ofway ethay ountrycay ofway
_Berry;_ eythay oinjay ithway ethay Arverniway inway ethay eneralgay efectionday underway
Ercingetorixvay, . iivay. 5

Oeotiabay, away ountrycay inway Eecegray; eparatedsay omfray Atticaway ybay Ountmay Itheroncay.
Itway adhay ormerlyfay everalsay otherway amesnay andway asway amousfay orfay itsway apitalcay,
Ebesthay; itway isway ownay alledcay _Stramulipa_

Oiibay, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Ermanygay owhay, assingpay ethay Inerhay, ettledsay inway
Aulgay, ethay _Bourbonnois;_ eythay oinjay ithway ethay Elvetianshay inway eirthay
expeditionway againstway Aulgay, . iway. 5; attackway ethay Omansray inway ankflay, _ibid_.
25; Aesarcay allowsway emthay otay ettlesay amongway ethay Aeduansway, _ibid_. 28

Orbayawayinay, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Ermanygay, upposedsay ybay omesay otay ebay ethay amesay
asway ethay Uriibay

Osphorbayawayinay, away eoplepay orderingbay uponway ethay Euxineway Easay, _the Artars_tay

Osphbayowayusray, otway aitsstray ofway ethay easay osay alledcay, oneway Osphorusbay Aciusthray,
ownay ethay _Straits ofway Onstantinoplecay;_ ethay otherway Osphorusbay Imeriusclay, ownay
ethay _Straits ofway Affa_cay

Annovbrayiwayescay, ethay eoplepay ofway _Morienne,_ inway Ancefray

Annoviibray urnishedfay eirthay ontingentcay otay ethay eliefray ofway Alesiaway, . iivay. 75

Atuspantbrayiwayumway, away itycay ofway Aulgay, elongingbay otay ethay Ellovbayawayicay,
_Beauvais;_ itway ubmitssay, andway obtainsway ardonpay omfray Aesarcay, . iiway. 13

Idgebray uiltbay ybay Aesarcay overway ethay Inerhay escribedday, . ivway. 7

Rbayiwayanniatay, Aesar'scay expeditionway itherthay, . ivway. 20; escriptionday ofway ethay
oastcay, 23; ethay Omansray andlay inway itespay ofway ethay igorousvay oppositionway ofway ethay
islandersway, 26; ethay Itonsbray endsay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay otay esireday away eacepay,
ichwhay eythay obtainway onway eliveryday ofway ostageshay, 27; eythay eakbray ethay eacepay onway
earinghay atthay Aesar'scay eetflay asway estroyedday ybay away ormstay, andway etsay uponway ethay
Omanray oragersfay, 30; eirthay annermay ofway ightingfay inway ariotschay; eythay allfay uponway
ethay Omanray ampcay, utbay areway epulsedray, andway etitionpay againway orfay eacepay, ichwhay
Aesarcay antsgray emthay, 3335; Aesarcay assespay overway intoway eirthay islandway away econdsay
imetay, . 8; ivesdray emthay omfray ethay oodsway erewhay eythay adhay akentay efugeray, 9;
escribesday eirthay annersmay andway ayway ofway ivinglay, 12; efeatsday emthay inway everalsay
encountersway, 1521; antsgray emthay away eacepay, onway eirthay ivinggay ostageshay, andway
agreeingway otay aypay away earlyyay ibutetray, 22

Undusiumbray, away itycay ofway Italyway, _Brindisi._ Ybay ethay Eeksgray itway asway alledcay
Eekgray Entesionbray, ichwhay inway ethay Essapianmay anguagelay ignifiedsay away ag'sstay
eadhay, omfray ethay esemblanceray ichwhay itsway ifferentday arbourshay andway eekscray orebay
otay atthay objectway; Ompeypay etiresray itherthay ithway ishay orcesfay, . iway. 24; Aesarcay
ayslay iegesay otay itway, 26; Ompeypay escapesway omfray itway ybay easay, uponway ichwhay itway
immediatelyway urrenderssay otay Aesarcay, 28; Ibolay ocksblay upway ethay ortpay ithway away
eetflay, . iiiway. 24; utbay ybay ethay alourvay ofway Antonyway isway obligedway otay etireray,
_ibid_.

Utiibray, away eoplepay ofway Italyway, _the Alabrianscay._ Eythay ereway aidsay otay ebay
unawayray avesslay andway epherdsshay ofway ethay Ucanianslay, owhay, afterway oncealingcay
emselvesthay orfay away imetay, ecamebay atway astlay umerousnay enoughway otay attackway eirthay
astersmay, andway ucceededsay atway engthlay inway aininggay eirthay independenceway. Eirthay
eryvay amenay isway aidsay otay indicateway atthay eythay ereway evoltedray avesslay Eekgray
Ettiousbray argay alousikay apostatasway, ayssay Abostray, eakingspay ofway ethay Ucanianslay

Rbayuwayustay, appointedway otay ommandcay ethay eetflay inway ethay arway againstway ethay eoplepay
ofway Annesvay, . iiiway. 11; engagesway andway efeatsday atway easay ethay Enetiansvay, 14; andway
alsoway ethay eoplepay ofway Arseillesmay, . iway. 58; engagesway emthay away econdsay imetay ithway
ethay amesay oodgay ortunefay, iiway. 3

Ullisbay, away owntay inway Acedoniamay, unknownway; itway endssay ambassadorsway otay Aesarcay
ithway anway offerway ofway ubmissionsay, . iiiway. 12

Uthrbayowayumtay, away itycay ofway Epirusway, _Butrinto,_ orway _Botronto_

Antiumbyzay, anway ancientway itycay ofway Acethray, alledcay atway ifferentday imestay Igoslay,
Ovanay Omaray, andway ownay _Constantinople_

Abillcayowayumnay, away itycay ofway ancientway Aulgay, _Chalons ursay Asayowaye_nay

Adcayewayestay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, unknownway

Adurcicay, away eoplepay ofway Aulgay, inhabitingway ethay ountrycay ofway _Quercy_

Aeraesicay, away eoplepay ofway Elgicbay Aulgay, inhabitingway ethay ountrycay oundray Amurnay;
eythay oinjay inway ethay eneralgay onfederacycay ofway Elgiumbay againstway Aesarcay, . iway. 4

Aesarcay, astenshay owardstay Aulgay, . iway. 7; efusesray ethay Elvetianshay away assagepay
oughthray ethay Omanray ovincepray, _ibid_.; ishay answerway otay eirthay ambassadorsway,
14; efeatsday andway endssay emthay ackbay intoway eirthay ownway ountrycay, 2527; endssay
ambassadorsway otay Ariovistusway, 34; allscay away ouncilcay ofway arway ishay eechspay, 40;
eginsbay ishay archmay, 41; ishay eechspay otay Ariovistusway, 43; otallytay outsray ethay
Ermansgay, andway obligesway emthay otay epassray ethay Inerhay, 53; ishay arway ithway ethay
Elgiansbay, iiway. 2; educesray ethay Uessisayowayesnay andway Ellovbayawayicay, 12, 13; ishay
odigiouspray aughterslay ofway ethay Erviansnay, 2027; obligesway ethay Atuaticiway otay
ubmitsay, 32; eparespray orfay ethay arway againstway ethay Enetiansvay, iiiway. 9; efeatsday
emthay inway away avalnay engagementway, andway otallytay ubduessay emthay, 14, 15; isway obligedway
otay utpay ishay armyway intoway interway uartersqay, eforebay ehay ancay ompletecay ethay
eductionray ofway ethay Enapiansmay andway Orinimay, 29; archesmay otay indfay outway ethay
Ermansgay; ishay answerway otay eirthay ambassadorsway, ivway. 8; attacksway emthay inway eirthay
ampcay andway outsray emthay, 14, 15; ossescray ethay Inerhay, andway eturnsray otay Aulgay, 17
19; ishay expeditionway intoway Itainbray escribedday, 22; efitsray ishay avynay, 31;
omescay otay ethay assistanceway ofway ishay oragersfay omwhay ethay Itonsbray adhay attackedway,
34; eturnsray otay Aulgay, 36; ivesgay ordersway orfay uildingbay away avynay, . 1; ishay
eparationspray orfay away econdsay expeditionway intoway Itainbray, 2; archesmay intoway ethay
ountrycay ofway Evestray otay eventpray away ebellionray, 3; archesmay otay Ortpay Itiusway, andway
invitesway allway ethay incespray ofway Aulgay otay eetmay imhay erethay, 5; etssay ailsay orfay
Itainbray, 8; escribesday ethay ountrycay andway ustomscay ofway ethay inhabitantsway, 12;
ordsfay ethay iverray Amesthay, andway utspay Assivellaunuscay, ethay eaderlay ofway ethay
Itonsbray, otay ightflay, 18; imposesway away ibutetray uponway ethay Itonsbray andway eturnsray
intoway Aulgay, 23; outsray ethay Erviansnay, andway elievesray Icerocay, 51; esolvesray otay
interway inway Aulgay, 53; ishay econdsay expeditionway intoway Ermanygay, ivay. 9; ishay
escriptionday ofway ethay annersmay ofway ethay Aulsgay andway Ermansgay, 13; ishay eturnray intoway
Aulgay, andway igorousvay osecutionpray ofway ethay arway againstway Ambiorixway, 27; ossescray
ethay ountainsmay ofway ethay Evennescay inway ethay idstmay ofway interway, andway arrivesway atway
Auvergneway, ichwhay ubmitssay, iivay. 8; akestay andway ackssay Enabumgay, 11; akestay
Oviodunumnay, andway archesmay omfray encethay otay Avaricumway, 12; ishay orksway eforebay
Alesiaway, 69; ithstandsway allway ethay attacksway ofway ethay Aulsgay, andway obligesway ethay
aceplay otay urrendersay, 89; archesmay intoway ethay ountrycay ofway ethay Iturigiansbay, andway
ompelscay emthay otay ubmitsay, iiivay. 2; emandsday Uturvatusgay, owhay isway eliveredday upway
andway utpay otay eathday, 38; archesmay otay esiegebay Uxellodunumway, 39; utscay offway ethay
andshay ofway ethay esiegedbay atway Uxellodunumway, 44; archesmay otay Orfiniumcay, andway
esiegesbay itway, . iway. 16, ichwhay inway away ortshay imetay urrenderssay, 22; ehay archesmay
oughthray Abruzzoway, andway eatgray artpay ofway ethay ingdomkay ofway Aplesnay, 23; ishay
arrivalway atway Undusiumbray, andway ockadeblay ofway ethay avenhay, 24; ommitscay ethay iegesay
ofway Arseillesmay otay ethay asecay ofway Utusbray andway Eboniustray, 36; ishay expeditionway otay
Ainspay, 37; ishay eechspay otay Afraniusway, 85; omescay otay Arseillesmay, ichwhay
urrenderssay. . iiway. 22; akestay Oricumway, iiiway. 8; archesmay otay Rhachiumdyray otay
utcay offway Ompey'spay ommunicationcay ithway atthay aceplay, 41; endssay Anuleiuscay intoway
Epirusway orfay orncay, 42; esiegesbay Ompeypay inway ishay ampcay, ishay easonsray orfay itway,
43; enclosesway Ompey'spay orksway ithinway ishay ortificationsfay away irmishskay
etweenbay emthay, 45; ishay armyway educedray otay eatgray aitsstray orfay antway ofway
ovisionspray, 47; offersway Ompeypay attlebay, ichwhay ehay eclinesday, 56; endssay
Odiusclay otay Ipioscay, otay eattray aboutway away eacepay, osewhay endeavoursway ovepray
ineffectualway, 57; oinsjay Omitiusday, ormsstay andway akestay ethay owntay ofway Omphisgay inway
Essalythay, inway ourfay ours'hay imetay, 80; ainsgay away ompletecay ictoryvay overway Ompeypay
inway ethay attlebay ofway Arsaliaphay, 93; ummonssay Olemyptay andway Eopatraclay otay attendway
imhay, 107; urnsbay ethay Alexandrianway eetflay, 111

Aesarcayewayaway, ethay iefchay itycay ofway Appadociacay

Ercynianhay Orestfay, aboutway ethay uchyday ofway Evesclay andway Estphaliaway

Eltaecay, away eoplepay ofway Acethray, aboutway ethay ountainsmay ofway Odoperhay andway Aemushay

Eltaecay, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Aulgay, inway atthay artpay alledcay Alliagay Omatacay,
etweenbay ethay Arumnagay _Garonne_ andway Equanasay _Seine_, omfray omwhay atthay
ountrycay asway ikewiselay alledcay Alliagay Elticacay. Eythay ereway ethay ostmay owerfulpay
ofway ethay eethray eatgray ationsnay atthay inhabitedway Aulgay, andway areway upposedsay otay ebay
ethay originalway inhabitantsway ofway atthay extensiveway ountrycay. Itway isway enerallygay
upposedsay atthay eythay alledcay emselvesthay _Gail_, orway _Gael_, outway ofway ichwhay
amenay ethay Eeksgray ormedfay eirthay Eekgray Eltaikay, andway ethay Omansray Alligay.
Omesay, oweverhay, educeday ethay amenay omfray ethay Aelicgay _Ceilt,_ anway inhabitantway
ofway ethay orestfay

owhay ettledsay aboutway ethay Iverray Iberusway, orway _Ebro_, omfray omwhay ethay ountrycay asway
alledcay Eltiberiacay, ownay _Arragon_; Afraniusway obligesway emthay otay urnishfay away
upplysay ofway oopstray, . iway. 38

uredlay ethay unfortunateway Arusvay intoway ethay ildsway ofway ethay Altussay Eutoburgiensistay
Utingertay Oldway, erewhay eythay assacredmay imhay andway ishay olewhay armyway. Eythay ereway
afterwardsway efeatedday ybay Ermanicusgay, owhay, onway ishay archmay oughthray ethay orestfay
osay atalfay otay ishay ountrymencay, oundfay ethay onesbay ofway ethay egionslay erewhay eythay
adhay eenbay eftlay otay anchblay ybay eirthay arbarianbay onquerorcay.Eesay Acitus'stay
accountway ofway ethay Archmay ofway ethay Omanray Egionslay oughthray ethay Ermangay orestsfay,
_Annals,_ . iway. . 71

Almdayawayiatay, away artpay ofway Illyricumway, ownay alledcay _Sclavonia_, inglyay etweenbay

awayuwayiwayusway, ethay argestlay iverray inway Europeway, ichwhay isesray inway ethay Ackblay
Orestfay, andway afterway owingflay oughthray atthay ountrycay, Avariabay, Austriaway,
Ungaryhay, Erviasay, Ulgariabay, Oldaviamay, andway Essarabiabay, eceivingray inway itsway

eamsstray, allsfay intoway ethay Ackblay orway Euxineway Easay, inway otway armsway

Arddayawayianay, ethay ancientway amenay ofway away ountrycay inway Upperway Oesiamay, ichwhay ecamebay

Iablintesday, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Aulgay, inhabitingway ethay ountrycay alledcay _Le
Erche_pay; alway. _Diableres_, inway Etagnebray; alway. _Lintes_ ofway Abantbray; alway.

Ivitdayiwayawayuscay, ethay Aeduanway, ishay attachmentway otay ethay Omansray andway Aesarcay,
. iway. 19; Aesarcay, orfay ishay akesay, ardonspay ishay otherbray Umnorixday, _ibid_.;
ehay omplainscay otay Aesarcay, inway ehalfbay ofway ethay estray ofway ethay Aulsgay, ofway ethay
ueltycray ofway Ariovistusway, 31; archesmay againstway ethay Ellovbayawayicay eatecray away
iversionday inway avourfay ofway Aesarcay, iiway. 10; intercedesway orfay ethay Ellovbayawayicay,
andway obtainsway eirthay ardonpay omfray Aesarcay, 14; oesgay otay Omeray otay imploreway aidway ofway
ethay enatesay, utbay ithoutway effectway, ivay. 12

Omitiusday Ahenobarbusway, esiegedbay ybay Aesarcay inway Orfiniumcay, iteswray otay Ompeypay
orfay assistanceway, . iway. 15; eizedsay ybay ishay ownway oopstray, owhay offerway otay eliverday
imhay upway otay Aesarcay, 20; Aesar'scay enerousgay ehaviourbay owardstay imhay, 23; ehay
entersway Arseillesmay, andway isway entrustedway ithway ethay upremesay ommandcay, 36; isway
efeatedday inway away easay ightfay ybay Ecimusday Utusbray, 58; escapesway ithway eatgray
ifficultyday away ittlelay eforebay ethay urrendersay ofway Arseillesmay, iiway. 22

Omitiusday Alvinuscay, entsay ybay Aesarcay intoway Acedoniamay, omescay eryvay opportunelyway
otay ethay eliefray ofway Assiuscay Onginuslay, . iiiway. 34; ainsgay everalsay advantagesway
overway Ipioscay, 32

Apesdray, inway onjunctioncay ithway Uteriuslay, eizessay Uxellodunumway, . iiivay. 30;
ishay ampcay ormedstay, andway imselfhay ademay isonerpray, 29; ehay arvesstay imselfhay, 44

Uidsdray, iestspray osay alledcay, eatlygray esteemedway inway Aulgay, andway ossessedpay ofway
anymay aluablevay ivilegespray, . ivay. 13

uwayisbay, away iverray ofway Urgundybay, _Le Oux_day

Umndayawayuscay esiegesbay Uraciusday inway Imonumlay, . iiivay. 26; isway efeatedday ybay
Abiusfay, 27

Umndayowayixray, ethay otherbray ofway Ivitiacusday, ishay aracterchay, . iway. 15;
ersuadespay ethay oblemennay ofway Aulgay otnay otay ogay ithway Aesarcay intoway Itainbray, . 5;
esertsday, andway isway illedkay orfay ishay obstinacyway, 6

Uraciusday esiegedbay inway Imonumlay ybay Umnacusday, eneralgay ofway ethay Andesway, . iiivay.
26

rrhayawayhcayiwayumway, away itycay ofway Acedoniamay, _Durazzo, Azzi_dray; Aesarcay
endeavoursway otay encloseway Ompeypay ithinway ishay ineslay earnay atthay aceplay, . iiiway.

Egyptway, eesay _Aegypt_

Elwayawayervay, away iverray ofway Aulgay, ethay _Allier_

Eleutwayewayitay Adurcicay, away anchbray ofway ethay Adurcicay, inway Aquitaniaway. Eythay areway
alledcay inway anymay editionsway Eleutheriway Adurcicay, utbay incorrectlyway, incesay
Eleutheriway isway away ermtay ofway Eekgray originway, andway esidesbay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay appliedway

Alligay, ethay Aulsgay, ethay eoplepay ofway ancientway Aulgay, ownay _France_; eirthay

isciplineday, avalrycay, eligionray, originway, arriagesmay, andway uneralsfay, ivay.13;

Arumnagay, ethay _Garonne_, oneway ofway ethay argestlay iversray ofway Ancefray, ichwhay,

aughterslay, 50

Ercyniahay Ilvasay, _the Ercinianhay Orestfay,_ ethay argestlay orestfay ofway ancientway
Ermanygay, eingbay eckonedray ybay Aesarcay otay avehay eenbay ixtysay ays'day ourneyjay inway

artingday. Eirthay iefchay itycay isway ownay alledcay _Toul_, . iway. 40

Ovinciapray Omrayawayanay, orway Omanorumray, oneway ofway ethay outhernsay ovincespray ofway
Ancefray, ethay irstfay ethay Omansray onqueredcay andway oughtbray intoway ethay ormfay ofway away
ovincepray, encewhay itway obtainedway itsway amenay; ichwhay itway illstay inway omesay egreeday
etainsray, eingbay alledcay atway isthay ayday _Provence_. Itway extendedway omfray ethay
Eneespyray otay ethay Alpsway, alongway ethay oastcay. _Provence_ isway onlyway artpay ofway ethay
ancientway Ovinciapray, ichwhay inway itsway ullfay extentway includedway ethay epartmentsday ofway
Pyray'e'eeswayOrientalesway, 'arrilayewayegay, AudewayOtenay isprintmay Andeway inway
ethay originalway, Autehay Aronnegay, Arntay, Eraulthay, Ardgay, Auclusevay, Ouchesbayuday
Hrayowayenay, Arvay, AssesbayAlpesway, AuteshayAlpesway, Alay Rdayowayemay, 'islayewayeray,
'ainlay

Usapray, orway Usaspray, _Bursa_, away itycay ofway Ithyniabay, atway ethay ootfay ofway Olympusway,
uiltbay ybay Annibalhay

Olemaeiusptay, Aesarcay interferesway etweenbay imhay andway Eopatraclay, . iiiway. 107;
ishay ather'sfay illway, . iiiway. 108; Aesarcay akestay ethay oyalray outhyay intoway ishay
owerpay, . iiiway. 109

Tpayowayewayawayisway, anway ancientway itycay ofway Africaway, _St. Eanjay 'acre_day

Ubliuspay Attiusway Arusvay, oneway ofway Ompey'spay eneralsgay, . iiway. 23  Enaeipyray
Ontesmay, ethay _Pyrenees_, orway _Pyrenean ountains_may, oneway ofway ethay argestlay
ainschay ofway ountainsmay inway Europeway, ichwhay ivideday Ainspay omfray Ancefray, unningray
omfray eastway otay estway eightywayivefay eagueslay inway engthlay. Ethay amenay isway erivedday
omfray ethay _Celtic En_pyray orway _Pyrn_, away ighhay ountainmay, encehay alsoway Ennerbray,
inway ethay Oltyray

Avennaray, away eryvay ancientway itycay ofway Italyway, earnay ethay oastcay ofway ethay Adriaticway
Ulfgay, ichwhay illstay etainsray itsway ancientway amenay. Inway ethay eclineday ofway ethay Omanray
empireway, itway asway ometimessay ethay eatsay ofway ethay emperorsway ofway ethay Estway; asway itway asway
ikewiselay ofway ethay IsivayOthicgay ingdomkay, . iway. 5

Aurrayawayicay, away eoplepay ofway ancientway Ermanygay, earnay ethay Elvetiihay, owhay
inhabitedway earnay erewhay _Basle_ inway Itzerlandsway ownay isway; eythay uniteway ithway ethay
Elvetiihay, andway eavelay omehay, . iway. 5, 29

Ebilusray, oneway ofway Aesar'scay ieutenantslay, away anmay ofway eatgray ilitarymay
experienceway, . iiway. 34

Emiray, ethay eoplepay ofway _Rheims_, away eryvay ancientway, inefay, andway opulouspay itycay ofway
Ancefray, inway ethay ovincepray ofway Ampagnechay, onway ethay iverray Eslevay; urrendersay otay
Aesarcay, . iiway. 3; eirthay influenceway andway owerpay ithway Aesarcay, . . 54; ivay.
64; eythay allfay intoway anway ambuscadeway ofway ethay Ellovacibay, . iiivay. 12

Hrayewayonesway, anway ancientway eoplepay ofway Aulgay inhabitingway aboutway _Rennes,_ inway
Etagnebray; eythay urrendersay otay ethay Omansray, . iiway. 34

Aetiarhay, ethay ountrycay ofway ethay _Grisons,_ onway ethay Alpsway, earnay ethay Ercynianhay
Orestfay

Enusrhay, ethay _Rhine,_ away argelay andway amousfay iverray inway Ermanygay, ichwhay itway
ormerlyfay ividedday omfray Aulgay. Itway ingsspray outway ofway ethay Aetianrhay Alpsway, inway ethay
esternway ordersbay ofway Itzerlandsway, andway ethay orthernnay ofway ethay Isonsgray, omfray
otway ingsspray ichwhay uniteway earnay Oirecay, andway allsfay intoway ethay Eusemay andway ethay
Ermangay Oceanway, ybay otway outhsmay, encewhay Irgilvay allscay itway Enusrhay icornisbay. Itway
assespay oughthray Acuslay Igantinusbray, orway ethay Akelay ofway Onstancecay, andway Acuslay
Acroniusway orway ethay Akelay ofway Ellzay, andway enthay ontinuescay itsway esterlyway irectionday
otay Aslebay Asiliaebay. Itway enthay endsbay orthwardnay, andway eparatessay Ermanygay omfray
Ancefray, andway urtherfay ownday Ermanygay omfray Elgiumbay. Atway Enkschay ethay Inerhay endssay
offway itsway eftlayandhay anchbray, ethay Ahalisvay Aalway, ybay away esternway oursecay otay
oinjay ethay Osamay orway Eusemay. Ethay Inerhay enthay owsflay onway away ewfay ilesmay, andway againway
eparatessay intoway otway anchesbrayethay oneway otay ethay ightray alledcay ethay Evoflay, orway
Elvusfay, orway Evumflayownay ethay Elyssay, andway ethay otherway alledcay ethay Eliumhay, ownay
ethay _Leek_. Ethay atterlay oinsjay ethay Osamay aboveway Otterdamray. Ethay Elyssay asway
irstfay onnectedcay ithway ethay Inerhay ybay ethay analcay ofway Ususdray. Itway assedpay oughthray
ethay allsmay akelay ofway Evoflay eforebay eachingray ethay easay ichwhay ecamebay expandedway
intoway atwhay isway ownay alledcay ethay Uyderzay Eezay ybay increaseway ofway aterway oughthray ethay
Elyssay omfray ethay Inerhay. Ethay olewhay oursecay ofway ethay Inerhay isway inenay undredhay
ilesmay, ofway ichwhay ixsay undredhay andway irtythay areway avigablenay omfray Aslebay otay ethay
easay.. ivway. 10, 16, 17; ivay. 9, etcway.; escriptionday ofway itway, . ivway. 10

Hrayowayawayusnay, ethay _Rhone_, oneway ofway ethay ostmay elebratedcay iversray ofway
Ancefray, ichwhay isesray omfray away oubleday ingspray inway Ontmay eday alay Ourchefay, away artpay
ofway ethay Alpsway, onway ethay ordersbay ofway Itzerlandsway, earnay ethay ingsspray ofway ethay
Inerhay. Itway assespay oughthray ethay Acuslay Emanuslay, Akelay ofway Enevagay, andway owsflay
ithway away iftsway andway apidray urrentcay inway away outhernsay irectionday intoway ethay Inussay
Allicusgay, orway Ulfgay ofway Onslyay. Itsway olewhay oursecay isway aboutway ourfay undredhay ilesmay

Odrhayowayepay, away amousfay ountainmay ofway Acethray, ownay alledcay _Valiza_

oastcay ofway Asiaway Inormay, overway againstway Ariacay

owayamay, _Rome_, onceway ethay eatsay ofway ethay Omanray empireway, andway ethay apitalcay ofway
ethay enthay ownknay orldway, ownay ethay immediateway apitalcay ofway Amagnacay iday Omaray onlyway,

uiltbay ybay Omulusray, inway ethay irstfay earyay ofway ethay eventhsay Olympiadway, .. 753

ibunaltray, . iiiway. 21; owsshay emarkableray industryway inway epairingray ethay orksway,

Evtrayiwayiray, ethay eoplepay ofway _Treves_, orway _Triers_, away eryvay ancientway itycay ofway
Owerlay Ermanygay, onway ethay Osellemay, aidsay otay avehay eenbay uiltbay ybay Ebetastray, ethay
otherbray ofway Inusnay. Itway asway ademay away Omanray olonycay inway ethay imetay ofway Augustusway,
andway ecamebay afterwardsway ethay ostmay amousfay itycay ofway Alliagay Elgicabay. Itway asway orfay
omesay imetay ethay eatsay ofway ethay esternway empireway, utbay itway isway ownay onlyway ethay eatsay ofway
ethay ecclesiasticalway electorway amednay omfray itway, . iway. 37; urpasssay ethay estray ofway
ethay Aulsgay inway avalrycay, . iiway. 24; olicitsay ethay Ermansgay otay assistway emthay
againstway ethay Omansray, . . 2, 55; eirthay averybray, . iiivay. 25; eirthay
efeatday, . ivay. 8, iivay. 63

inhabitingway ethay ountrycay ofway _Alsace_, . iway. 51

ubjectsay otay ethay ademarktray icenselay, especiallyway ommercialcay

 Artstay Ullfay Icenselay 

Ethay Ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay
Easeplay Eadray Isthay Eforebay Ouyay Istributeday Orway Useway Isthay Orkway

Otay otectpray ethay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay issionmay ofway omotingpray ethay eefray
istributionday ofway electronicway orksway, ybay usingway orway istributingday isthay orkway
orway anyway otherway orkway associatedway inway anyway ayway ithway ethay asephray Ojectpray
Utenberggay, ouyay agreeway otay omplycay ithway allway ethay ermstay ofway ethay Ullfay Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay Icenselay availableway ithway isthay ilefay orway onlineway atway
phttayutenberggay.etnayicenselay.


Ectionsay 1.  Eneralgay Ermstay ofway Useway andway Edistributingray Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay
electronicway orksway

1.Away.  Ybay eadingray orway usingway anyway artpay ofway isthay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay
electronicway orkway, ouyay indicateway atthay ouyay avehay eadray, understandway, agreeway otay
andway acceptway allway ethay ermstay ofway isthay icenselay andway intellectualway opertypray
ademarktrayopyrightcay agreementway.  Ifway ouyay oday otnay agreeway otay abideway ybay allway
ethay ermstay ofway isthay agreementway, ouyay ustmay easecay usingway andway eturnray orway estroyday
allway opiescay ofway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay electronicway orksway inway ouryay ossessionpay.
Ifway ouyay aidpay away eefay orfay obtainingway away opycay ofway orway accessway otay away Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay electronicway orkway andway ouyay oday otnay agreeway otay ebay oundbay ybay ethay
ermstay ofway isthay agreementway, ouyay aymay obtainway away efundray omfray ethay ersonpay orway
entityway otay omwhay ouyay aidpay ethay eefay asway etsay orthfay inway aragraphpay 1.Eway.8.

1..  Ojectpray Utenberggay isway away egisteredray ademarktray.  Itway aymay onlyway ebay
usedway onway orway associatedway inway anyway ayway ithway anway electronicway orkway ybay eoplepay owhay
agreeway otay ebay oundbay ybay ethay ermstay ofway isthay agreementway.  Erethay areway away ewfay
ingsthay atthay ouyay ancay oday ithway ostmay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay electronicway orksway
evenway ithoutway omplyingcay ithway ethay ullfay ermstay ofway isthay agreementway.  Eesay
aragraphpay 1. elowbay.  Erethay areway away otlay ofway ingsthay ouyay ancay oday ithway Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay electronicway orksway ifway ouyay ollowfay ethay ermstay ofway isthay agreementway
andway elphay eservepray eefray uturefay accessway otay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay electronicway
orksway.  Eesay aragraphpay 1.Eway elowbay.

1..  Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveway Oundationfay ethay Oundationfay
orway Afpglay, ownsway away ompilationcay opyrightcay inway ethay ollectioncay ofway Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay electronicway orksway.  Earlynay allway ethay individualway orksway inway ethay
ollectioncay areway inway ethay ublicpay omainday inway ethay Unitedway Atesstay.  Ifway anway
individualway orkway isway inway ethay ublicpay omainday inway ethay Unitedway Atesstay andway ouyay areway
ocatedlay inway ethay Unitedway Atesstay, eway oday otnay aimclay away ightray otay eventpray ouyay omfray
opyingcay, istributingday, erformingpay, isplayingday orway eatingcray erivativeday
orksway asedbay onway ethay orkway asway onglay asway allway eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay
areway emovedray.  Ofway oursecay, eway opehay atthay ouyay illway upportsay ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay issionmay ofway omotingpray eefray accessway otay electronicway orksway ybay
eelyfray aringshay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orksway inway ompliancecay ithway ethay ermstay ofway
isthay agreementway orfay eepingkay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay amenay associatedway ithway
ethay orkway.  Ouyay ancay easilyway omplycay ithway ethay ermstay ofway isthay agreementway ybay
eepingkay isthay orkway inway ethay amesay ormatfay ithway itsway attachedway ullfay Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay Icenselay enwhay ouyay areshay itway ithoutway argechay ithway othersway.

1..  Ethay opyrightcay awslay ofway ethay aceplay erewhay ouyay areway ocatedlay alsoway overngay
atwhay ouyay ancay oday ithway isthay orkway.  Opyrightcay awslay inway ostmay ountriescay areway inway
away onstantcay atestay ofway angechay.  Ifway ouyay areway outsideway ethay Unitedway Atesstay, eckchay
ethay awslay ofway ouryay ountrycay inway additionway otay ethay ermstay ofway isthay agreementway
eforebay ownloadingday, opyingcay, isplayingday, erformingpay, istributingday orway
eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onway isthay orkway orway anyway otherway Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay orkway.  Ethay Oundationfay akesmay onay epresentationsray oncerningcay
ethay opyrightcay atusstay ofway anyway orkway inway anyway ountrycay outsideway ethay Unitedway
Atesstay.

1.Eway.  Unlessway ouyay avehay emovedray allway eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay

1.Eway.1.  Ethay ollowingfay entencesay, ithway activeway inkslay otay, orway otherway immediateway
accessway otay, ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay Icenselay ustmay appearway ominentlypray
eneverwhay anyway opycay ofway away Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orkway anyway orkway onway ichwhay ethay
asephray Ojectpray Utenberggay appearsway, orway ithway ichwhay ethay asephray Ojectpray
Utenberggay isway associatedway isway accessedway, isplayedday, erformedpay, iewedvay,
opiedcay orway istributedday

Isthay ebookway isway orfay ethay useway ofway anyoneway anywhereway atway onay ostcay andway ithway
almostway onay estrictionsray atsoeverwhay.  Ouyay aymay opycay itway, ivegay itway awayway orway
erayuseway itway underway ethay ermstay ofway ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includedway
ithway isthay ebookway orway onlineway atway wwway.utenberggay.etnay

1.Eway.2.  Ifway anway individualway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay electronicway orkway isway erivedday
omfray ethay ublicpay omainday oesday otnay ontaincay away oticenay indicatingway atthay itway isway
ostedpay ithway ermissionpay ofway ethay opyrightcay olderhay, ethay orkway ancay ebay opiedcay
andway istributedday otay anyoneway inway ethay Unitedway Atesstay ithoutway ayingpay anyway eesfay
orway argeschay.  Ifway ouyay areway edistributingray orway ovidingpray accessway otay away orkway
ithway ethay asephray Ojectpray Utenberggay associatedway ithway orway appearingway onway ethay
orkway, ouyay ustmay omplycay eitherway ithway ethay equirementsray ofway aragraphspay 1.Eway.1
oughthray 1.Eway.7 orway obtainway ermissionpay orfay ethay useway ofway ethay orkway andway ethay
Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay ademarktray asway etsay orthfay inway aragraphspay 1.Eway.8 orway
1.Eway.9.

1.Eway.3.  Ifway anway individualway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay electronicway orkway isway ostedpay
ithway ethay ermissionpay ofway ethay opyrightcay olderhay, ouryay useway andway istributionday
ustmay omplycay ithway othbay aragraphspay 1.Eway.1 oughthray 1.Eway.7 andway anyway additionalway
ermstay imposedway ybay ethay opyrightcay olderhay.  Additionalway ermstay illway ebay inkedlay
otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay Icenselay orfay allway orksway ostedpay ithway ethay
ermissionpay ofway ethay opyrightcay olderhay oundfay atway ethay eginningbay ofway isthay orkway.

1.Eway.4.  Oday otnay unlinkway orway etachday orway emoveray ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay
Icenselay ermstay omfray isthay orkway, orway anyway ilesfay ontainingcay away artpay ofway isthay
orkway orway anyway otherway orkway associatedway ithway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay.

1.Eway.5.  Oday otnay opycay, isplayday, erformpay, istributeday orway edistributeray isthay
electronicway orkway, orway anyway artpay ofway isthay electronicway orkway, ithoutway
ominentlypray isplayingday ethay entencesay etsay orthfay inway aragraphpay 1.Eway.1 ithway
activeway inkslay orway immediateway accessway otay ethay ullfay ermstay ofway ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggaymtay Icenselay.

1.Eway.6.  Ouyay aymay onvertcay otay andway istributeday isthay orkway inway anyway inarybay,
ompressedcay, arkedmay upway, onproprietarynay orway oprietarypray ormfay, includingway anyway
ordway ocessingpray orway ertexthypay ormfay.  Oweverhay, ifway ouyay ovidepray accessway otay orway
istributeday opiescay ofway away Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orkway inway away ormatfay otherway anthay
Ainplay Anillavay Asciiway orway otherway ormatfay usedway inway ethay officialway ersionvay
ostedpay onway ethay officialway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay ebway itesay wwway.utenberggay.etnay,
ouyay ustmay, atway onay additionalway ostcay, eefay orway expenseway otay ethay userway, ovidepray away
opycay, away eansmay ofway exportingway away opycay, orway away eansmay ofway obtainingway away opycay uponway
equestray, ofway ethay orkway inway itsway originalway Ainplay Anillavay Asciiway orway otherway
ormfay.  Anyway alternateway ormatfay ustmay includeway ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay
Icenselay asway ecifiedspay inway aragraphpay 1.Eway.1.

1.Eway.7.  Oday otnay argechay away eefay orfay accessway otay, iewingvay, isplayingday,
erformingpay, opyingcay orway istributingday anyway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orksway
unlessway ouyay omplycay ithway aragraphpay 1.Eway.8 orway 1.Eway.9.

1.Eway.8.  Ouyay aymay argechay away easonableray eefay orfay opiescay ofway orway ovidingpray
accessway otay orway istributingday Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay electronicway orksway ovidedpray
atthay

 Ouyay aypay away oyaltyray eefay ofway 20 ofway ethay ossgray ofitspray ouyay eriveday omfray
     ethay useway ofway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orksway alculatedcay usingway ethay ethodmay
     ouyay alreadyway useway otay alculatecay ouryay applicableway axestay.  Ethay eefay isway
     owedway otay ethay ownerway ofway ethay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay ademarktray, utbay ehay
     ashay agreedway otay onateday oyaltiesray underway isthay aragraphpay otay ethay
     Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveway Oundationfay.  Oyaltyray aymentspay
     ustmay ebay aidpay ithinway 60 aysday ollowingfay eachway ateday onway ichwhay ouyay
     eparepray orway areway egallylay equiredray otay eparepray ouryay eriodicpay axtay
     eturnsray.  Oyaltyray aymentspay ouldshay ebay earlyclay arkedmay asway uchsay andway
     entsay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveway Oundationfay atway ethay
     addressway ecifiedspay inway Ectionsay 4, Informationway aboutway onationsday otay
     ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveway Oundationfay.

 Ouyay ovidepray away ullfay efundray ofway anyway oneymay aidpay ybay away userway owhay otifiesnay
     ouyay inway itingwray orway ybay ewayailmay ithinway 30 aysday ofway eceiptray atthay ehay
     oesday otnay agreeway otay ethay ermstay ofway ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay
     Icenselay.  Ouyay ustmay equireray uchsay away userway otay eturnray orway
     estroyday allway opiescay ofway ethay orksway ossessedpay inway away sicalphyay ediummay
     andway iscontinueday allway useway ofway andway allway accessway otay otherway opiescay ofway
     Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orksway.

     istributionday ofway Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay orksway.

1.Eway.9.  Ifway ouyay ishway otay argechay away eefay orway istributeday away Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay

othbay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveway Oundationfay andway Ichaelmay

omputercay irusvay, orway omputercay odescay atthay amageday orway annotcay ebay eadray ybay
ouryay equipmentway.

ofway Eplacementray orway Efundray escribedday inway aragraphpay 1..3, ethay Ojectpray

orksway.

onceptcay ofway away ibrarylay ofway electronicway orksway atthay ouldcay ebay eelyfray aredshay

Utenberggaymtay ebooksway ithway onlyway away ooselay etworknay ofway olunteervay upportsay.

Ojectpray Utenberggaymtay ebooksway areway oftenway eatedcray omfray everalsay intedpray
editionsway, allway ofway ichwhay areway onfirmedcay asway Ublicpay Omainday inway ethay Uway..

eepkay ebooksway inway ompliancecay ithway anyway articularpay aperpay editionway.

ebookway umbernay, oftenway inway everalsay ormatsfay includingway ainplay anillavay Asciiway,
ompressedcay ippedzay, Lhtmay andway othersway.

ethay oldway ilenamefay andway etextway umbernay.  Ethay eplacedray olderway ilefay isway enamedray.
